1.2: Tamam tareef Allah ke liye hai jo saare jahan ka paalnewala hai
1.3: Jo bada Meharban nihayat Reham wala hai
1.5: Hum sirf teri hi ibadat karte hain aur sirf tujh se madad maangte hain
1.7: Un logon ka raasta jin par tu ne inaam farmaya, jo na to gazab ka shikar hue aur na hi bhatke

2.2: Yeh Allah ki kitaab hai, is mein koi shaq nahin, hidaayat hai parhezgaaron ke liye
2.3: Jo gaib par imaan laate hain, namaz qayam karte hain, aur jo kuch hum ne unhein diya hai us mein se kharch karte hain
2.4: Aur jo kitaab tum par naazil ki gayi hai (yaani Qur’an), aur jo tum se pehle naazil ki gayi thi, un sab par imaan laate hain, aur aakhirat par yaqeen rakhte hain
2.5: Yahi log apne Rab ki taraf se raah-e-raast par hain, aur wahi falaah paane wale hain
2.6: Jin logon ne (in baaton ko tasleem karne se) inkaar kar diya, un ke liye ek sa hi hai, chahe tum unhein khabardaar karo ya na karo, woh imaan nahin laayenge
2.7: Allah ne un ke dilon aur un ke kaanon par mohar laga di hai, aur un ki aankhon par parda hai, un ke liye sakht azaab hai
2.8: Kuch log aise bhi hain jo kehte hain ke hum Allah par aur aakhri din par imaan laaye hain, halaanke asal mein woh momin nahin hain
2.9: Woh Allah aur imaan laane walon ko dhokha dene ki koshish karte hain, magar asal mein woh apne aap ko hi dhokha de rahe hain aur unhein iska ehsaas nahin hai
2.10: Un ke dilon mein ek bimari hai, Allah ne un ki bimari ko aur zyada kar diya, aur jo jhoot woh bolte hain, us ki wajah se un ke liye dardnaak azaab hai
2.11: Aur jab un se kaha jaata hai ke zameen par fasaad na phailaao, to kehte hain ke hum to sirf islaah karne wale hain
2.12: Khabardaar! Haqeeqat mein yahi log fasaad karne wale hain, magar unhein ehsaas nahin hai
2.13: Aur jab un se kaha jaata hai ke jis tarah dusre log imaan laaye hain, usi tarah tum bhi imaan lao, to kehte hain: 'Kya hum bhi un hi ki tarah imaan laayen jo bewakoof hain?' Khabardaar! Haqeeqat mein to woh khud hi bewakoof hain, magar jaante nahin
2.14: Aur jab yeh log imaan laane walon se milte hain to kehte hain: 'Hum bhi imaan laaye hain', lekin jab apne shayateen ke paas jaate hain to kehte hain: 'Asal mein to hum tumhare saath hain, hum to un logon se sirf mazaaq kar rahe hain'
2.15: Allah un se mazaaq karta hai aur unhein unki sarkashi mein bhatakne ke liye mohlet deta hai.
2.16: Yeh woh log hain jinhon ne hidayat ke badle gumraahi khareed li, lekin un ka yeh soda un ke liye nafa’ bakhsh nahi hai aur na hi yeh raah-e-raast pa sakte hain.
2.17: Un ki misaal aise hai jaise kisi ne aag roshan ki, phir jab us ne aas paas ko roshan kar diya to Allah ne un ki roshni cheen li aur unhein andheron mein chhod diya ke ab woh kuch nahi dekhte.
2.18: Woh behre, goonge, andhe hain, is liye woh kabhi baaz nahin aayenge.
2.19: Ya phir un ki misaal aise hai jaise aasman se tez barish ho rahi ho, aur us ke sath andheriyan, garaj aur bijli bhi ho, woh bijli ki karrak se apni jaan bachane ke liye apne kaanon mein ungliyan daal lete hain, magar Allah ka ghera in kaafiron ko har taraf se le chuka hai.
2.20: Bijli ki chamak un ki aankhon ko aise le jaati hai ke jab bhi un par roshni padti hai to woh chal padte hain, aur jab un par andhera chha jaata hai to khare ho jaate hain. Agar Allah chahe to un ki sunayi aur basarat cheen le, beshak Allah har cheez par qudrat rakhta hai.
2.21: Logon! Apne Rab ki bandagi ikhtiyar karo jis ne tumhein aur tum se pehle logon ko paida kiya, taki tum parhezgaar ban jao.
2.22: Wohi hai jis ne tumhare liye zameen ko farsh banaya, aasman ko chhat banaya, upar se paani barsaya aur us se tarah tarah ke phal tumhare liye nikaale, pas Allah ke saath kisi ko shareek na thehrao jab ke tum jaante ho.
2.23: Aur agar tumhein is baat mein shaq hai ke hum ne apne banday par jo kitaab naazil ki hai woh humari taraf se hai ya nahi, to is ke jaisi ek soorat le aao, aur Allah ke siwa apne sab madadgaaron ko bula lo agar tum sachay ho.
2.24: Lekin agar tum na kar sako, aur hargiz nahi kar sakte, to daro us aag se jiska indhan insaan aur pathar hain, jo taiyar ki gayi hai kaafiron ke liye.
2.25: Aur (ai Nabi), jo log imaan laye aur neik amal kiye, unhein khushkhabri de do ke un ke liye aise baagh hain jin ke neeche nahrein beh rahi hain, jab bhi unhein un baaghon ka koi phal khane ko diya jaayega to woh kahenge: Yeh to wahi hai jo humein pehle bhi diya gaya tha’, aur unhein milta-julta diya jayega. Aur un ke liye wahan paak biwiyan hongi, aur woh wahan hamesha rahenge.
2.26: Beshak Allah is se hargiz nahi sharmata ke machar ya us se bhi choti kisi cheez ki misaal bayan kare. Jo log haqq ko qabool karne wale hain woh is misaal ko dekh kar jaante hain ke yeh un ke Rab ki taraf se hai, lekin jo log inkaar karne wale hain woh kehte hain: Aisi misaalon se Allah ko kya matlab?’ Is tarah Allah bahut se logon ko gumraahi mein daal deta hai aur bahut se logon ko hidayat deta hai, aur gumraahi mein wohi log daale jaate hain jo faasiq hain.
2.27: Jo log Allah ke ahad ko mazbooti se baandhne ke baad tod dete hain, Allah ne jise jorna ka hukm diya hai usay kaat dete hain, aur zameen mein fasaad phailaate hain, asal mein yahi log nuqsan uthane wale hain.
2.28: Tum Allah ka inkaar kaise karte ho jab ke tum murda the, us ne tumhein zindagi di, phir wahi tumhari jaan lega, phir tumhein zindagi dega, phir usi ki taraf tumhein laut kar jaana hai.
2.29: Wohi hai jis ne tumhare liye zameen ki saari cheezein paida ki, phir aasman ki taraf rujoo kiya aur saat aasman banaye, aur woh har cheez ka ilm rakhta hai.
2.30: Aur yaad karo jab tumhare Rab ne farishton se kaha tha: 'Main zameen mein ek khaleefa banane wala hoon.' Unhon ne kaha: 'Kya aap zameen mein aise ko muqarrar karne wale hain jo wahan fasaad karega aur khoon bahaayega, jab ke hum aap ki tareef ke saath tasbeeh aur aap ki taqdees kar rahe hain?' Allah ne farmaya: 'Main woh jaanta hoon jo tum nahi jaante.'
2.31: Phir Allah ne Adam ko sab cheezon ke naam sikhaye, phir unhein farishton ke samne pesh kiya aur farmaya, agar tum sachche ho to in ke naam batao.
2.32: Unho ne arz ki, Beshak aap paak hain, hum to bas wahi jaante hain jo aap ne humein sikhaya hai. Ilm aur hikmat to sirf aap hi ke paas hai.
2.33: Phir Allah ne farmaya, Ai Adam, inhein un ke naam batao. Jab us ne unhein un ke naam bata diye to farmaya, Kya maine tumse nahi kaha tha ke main hi aasmanon aur zameen ke chhupe huye raaz jaanta hoon, aur jo tum zahir karte ho aur jo chhupate ho sab jaanta hoon.
2.34: Aur jab hum ne farishton se farmaya, Adam ko sajda karo, to sab ne sajda kiya magar Iblees ne inkaar kiya, takabbur kiya aur kafiron mein shamil ho gaya.
2.35: Aur hum ne farmaya, Ai Adam, tum aur tumhari biwi jannat mein raho, aur jahan se chaho faraghat se khao, magar is darakht ke qareeb mat jana, warna tum zalimon mein ho jaoge.
2.36: Phir shaitaan ne dono ko wahan se phisla diya, aur jahan se unhein nikala gaya tha wahan se nikal diya. Aur hum ne farmaya, Utro, tum ek dusre ke dushman ho, aur ek waqt tak zameen mein tumhara thikana aur guzara hai.
2.37: Phir Adam ne apne Rab se kuch kalimat seekh kar tauba ki, to Allah ne uski tauba qubool kar li. Beshak Allah bada maaf karne wala aur nihayat meherban hai.
2.38: Hum ne farmaya, Sab ke sab yahan se utar jao. Phir agar mere taraf se tumhare paas koi hidayat aaye, to jo log meri hidayat ki pairwi kareinge un par na koi khauf hoga na woh ghamgeen honge.
2.39: Aur jo log inkar kareinge aur hamari ayaton ko jhuthlayeinge, woh dozakh mein honge, jahan woh hamesha rahenge.
2.40: Ai Bani Israeel, yaad karo meri woh neimat jo maine tum par ki thi, aur mera wada poora karo, main tumhara wada poora karunga. Aur sirf mujh se daro.
2.41: Aur us kitaab par iman lao jo maine nazil ki hai, jo us kitaab ki tasdeeq karti hai jo tumhare paas hai. Sabse pehle tum hi uske inkar karne wale na bano, aur meri ayaton ko thodi keemat par na becho, aur sirf mujh se daro.
2.42: Aur haqq ko baatil ka libaas pehna kar na chhupao, aur na jaante boojhte haqq ko chhupao.
2.43: Namaz qayam karo, zakat do, aur rukoo karne walon ke saath rukoo karo.
2.44: Kya tum logon ko neki ka hukm dete ho aur apne aap ko bhool jaate ho, halanke tum kitaab padhte ho? Kya tum samajhte nahi?
2.45: Sabr aur namaz se madad lo, beshak namaz bahut bhaari hai, magar un logon par nahi jo Allah se darne wale hain.
2.46: Woh log jo samajhte hain ke unhein apne Rab se milna hai aur usi ki taraf laut kar jana hai.
2.47: Ai Bani Israeel! Yaad karo meri woh neimat jo maine tum par ki thi, aur maine tumhein duniya ke logo par fazilat di thi.
2.48: Aur daro us din se jab koi kisi ke kuch kaam nahi aayega, na kisi ki sifarish qubool ki jayegi, na kisi se fidiya liya jayega, aur na unhein koi madad mil sakegi.
2.49: Aur yaad karo jab humne tumhein Firon ke logon se najat di, woh tumhein sakht azaab dete the, tumhare beton ko qatl karte the, aur tumhari auraton ko zinda rakhte the. Aur isme tumhare Rab ki taraf se tumhare liye badi aazmaish thi.
2.50: Aur yaad karo jab humne tumhare liye samundar ko cheer diya, phir tumhein bacha liya aur tumhari aankhon ke saamne Firon ke logon ko gark kar diya.
2.51: Aur yaad karo jab humne Moosa ko chalis raatein waada kiya, phir tumne uske baad bachde ko maabood bana liya, aur tum zaalim ban gaye.
2.52: Phir bhi humne tumhein maaf kar diya, shayad tum shukar guzar ban jao.
2.53: Aur jab humne Moosa ko kitaab aur furqan di taa ke tum hidayat pao.
2.54: Aur jab Moosa ne apni qaum se kaha, Ai meri qaum ke logon! Tumne bachde ko maabood bana kar apne upar zulm kiya hai. To apne paida karne wale ke huzoor tauba karo, aur apne nafs ko qatl karo. Yeh tumhare Rab ke nazdeek tumhare liye behtar hai. Phir usne tumhari tauba qubool ki. Beshak woh bada maaf karne wala, meherban hai.
2.55: Aur yaad karo jab tumne kaha, Ai Moosa! Hum tum par hargiz iman nahi laenge jab tak khud Allah ko khuli aankhon se na dekh lein. To ek bijli ne tumhein le liya, aur tum dekh rahe the.
2.56: Phir humne tumhein tumhari maut ke baad zinda kiya, shayad ke tum shukar guzar ban jao.
2.57: Aur humne tumpar badal ka saaya kiya aur tumhare liye mann o salwa utara. Khao hamari di hui paak cheezen, aur unhone ham par zulm nahi kiya, balke apne upar hi zulm karte rahe.
2.58: Aur jab humne kaha, is basti mein dakhil ho jao aur jahan se jo chaho faraghat se khao, aur darwaze mein sajda karte hue dakhil ho jao, aur kehna 'Hittatun', hum tumhari khataon ko maaf kar denge, aur neki karne walon ko mazeed ajar denge.
2.59: To zaalim logon ne baat ko badal diya, jo unse kahi gayi thi. To humne un zaalimon par aasman se azaab utara, unke nafarmani ke sabab.
2.60: Aur yaad karo jab Moosa ne apni qaum ke liye paani manga, to humne kaha, apni laathi ko pathar par maaro. To us se barah (12) chashme phoot nikle, har giroh ne apni pani lene ki jagah jaan li. Khao aur piyo Allah ke diye hue rizq mein se, aur zameen mein fasaad na machao.
2.61: Aur yaad karo jab tumne kaha, Ai Moosa! Hum ek hi qisam ke khane par sabr nahi kar sakte. To apne Rab se dua karo ke humein zameen ki paida honay wali cheezein — sabzi, kheera, lehsun, masoor, pyaaz — de. Moosa ne kaha, Kya tum behtar cheez ko chhor kar behtar se kam par razi ho rahe ho? Kisi basti mein chalay jao, jo tum maangte ho wahan mil jaayega. Aur un par zillat aur badhali thopi gayi, aur woh Allah ke gazab mein gire, yeh is wajah se ke woh Allah ke ayaton ka inkar karte the aur paighambaron ko na-haq qatl karte the. Yeh unki nafarmani aur hadd se badhne ki wajah se tha.
2.62: Beshak jo log momin hain, aur jo Yahudi hain, Nasara hain, ya Sabii, jo bhi Allah aur aakhri din par iman laye aur neki kare, unke liye unke Rab ke paas ajar hai. Un par na koi khauf hoga aur na woh ghamgeen honge.
2.63: Aur yaad karo jab humne tumse misaaq liya, aur Koh-e-Toor ko tum par uthaya. Lo jo humne tumhein diya hai mazbooti se, aur yaad rakho uski baatein taa ke tum muttaqi ban jao.
2.64: Phir tum iske baad bhi mooh phair baithe. Agar Allah ka fazl aur uski rehmat tum par na hoti to tum nuksaan uthane walon mein hotay.
2.65: Aur yaqeenan tummein se un logon ko to tum jante ho jo sabt ke mamle mein hadd se badh gaye the. To humne unse kaha, bandar ban jao, zillat walay.
2.66: To humne is waqia ko unke liye jo us waqt the aur jo baad mein aayenge, ek ibrat aur muttaqi logon ke liye ek naseehat bana diya.
2.67: Aur jab Moosa ne apni qaum se kaha, Allah tumhein ek gai qurbani karne ka hukm deta hai. Unhon ne kaha, Kya tum humse mazaak karte ho? Moosa ne kaha, Main aise jaahil logon se Allah ki panaah maangta hoon.
2.68: Unhon ne kaha, Apne Rab se poochh kar batayein ke woh gai kaisi ho. Moosa ne kaha, Allah ka farman hai ke woh na zyada budi ho na chhoti, balki unke darmiyan ki ho. Ab karo jo tumhein hukm diya gaya hai.
2.69: Unhon ne kaha, Apne Rab se poochho uska rang kaisa ho. Moosa ne kaha, Allah ka farman hai ke uska rang gehra zard ho, aisa ke dekhne walon ko khushi ho.
2.70: Unhon ne kaha, Apne Rab se poochhkar batao ke woh gai kaun si ho, kyunke humein gaiyon mein is baat mein shakk ho gaya hai. Agar Allah ne chaha to hum raasta paa jaayenge.
2.71: Moosa ne kaha, Allah ke farman ke mutabiq woh gai aisi ho jo na zameen jote, na pani de, sali ho, us mein koi daag na ho. Unhon ne kaha, Ab tumne baat saaf kar di. Phir unhon ne us gai ko ziba kiya, lekin karte nazar nahi aate thay.
2.72: Aur jab tumne ek shaks ko qatl kiya, phir us ke bare mein jhagra karne lage, aur Allah ne woh baat khol di jo tum chhupa rahe thay.
2.73: To humne farmaya, Us murda ko is gai ke ek hisse se maaro. Is tarah Allah murdon ko zinda karta hai, aur tumhein apni nishaniyaan dikhata hai taa ke tum samajh sako.
2.74: Phir iske baad tumhare dil sakht ho gaye, pathar ki tarah, balki usse bhi zyada sakht. Kuch pathar to aise hote hain jin se chashme phoot nikalte hain, aur kuch phatt jaate hain aur unse paani nikalta hai, aur kuch Allah ke khauf se gir padte hain. Aur Allah tumhare aamal se be-khabar nahi.
2.75: Kya tum umeed rakhte ho ke yeh log tumhari baat maan lenge? Halanke inmein se ek giroh aise logon ka raha hai jo Allah ka kalam sun kar, samajhne ke baad us mein tahrif kar dete thay.
2.76: Aur jab woh un logon se milte hain jo iman la chuke hain to kehte hain, hum bhi iman laye hain. Lekin jab aapas mein akele hote hain to kehte hain, Kya tum unhein woh baatein batate ho jo Allah ne tumpar kholi hain taa ke woh tum par tumhare Rab ke samne hujjat pesh karein?
2.77: Kya woh nahi jaante ke Allah un sab baaton ko jaanta hai jo woh chhupate hain aur jo zahir karte hain?
2.78: Aur unmein kuch log aise hain jo ummi hain, na kitab jaante hain, bas apne gumaan par chale ja rahe hain.
2.79: To tabahi hai un logon ke liye jo apne haathon se kitaab likhte hain aur phir kehte hain ke yeh Allah ki taraf se hai, taa ke woh iske badle thoda sa faida kama lein. Tabahi hai jo unke haath likhte hain aur tabahi hai jo woh kama rahe hain.
2.80: Aur kehte hain, Humein aag sirf kuch ginte din chhooyegi. Unse kaho, Kya tumne Allah se koi ahad le liya hai? Phir to Allah apne ahad ke khilaf nahi karega. Ya tum Allah par woh baat kehte ho jo tum nahi jaante?
2.81: Haan, jo burayi kamaaye aur uska gunaah usko gher le, wahi dozakh mein jaane wala hai, jahan woh hamesha rahega.
2.82: Aur jo log iman laaye aur nekiyan ki, woh jannati hain, jahan woh hamesha rahenge.
2.83: Aur yaad karo jab humne Bani Israeel se ahad liya, ke Allah ke siwa kisi ki ibaadat na karna, aur walidain ke saath, qarib rishte daaron, yateemon aur miskeenon ke saath acha sulook karna, aur logon se acchi baat kehna, aur namaz qayam karna aur zakat dena. Phir tum mein se kuch log is ahad se munharif ho gaye.
2.84: Aur jab humne tumse ahad liya ke ek doosre ka khoon na bahana, aur na ek doosre ko gharon se nikalna. Phir tumne iqraar kiya, aur tum khud is par gawah ho.
2.85: Phir tumhi wahi ho ke ek doosre ko qatl karte ho, aur kuch logon ko unke gharon se nikal dete ho, aur ek doosre ke khilaf gunah aur zyadati se madad karte ho. Aur agar woh qaid hokar tumhare paas aayein to unki rehaai ke liye fidya dete ho, halanke unko nikalna hi tum par haraam tha. Kya tum kitaab ke kuch hisson par iman late ho aur kuch ke inkar karte ho? Jo aisa kare, duniya mein uski saza zillat hai, aur aakhirat mein woh sakht azaab ki taraf pher diye jayenge.
2.86: Yeh woh log hain jinhone aakhirat ke badle duniya ki zindagi khareed li hai. To na unka azaab halka kiya jaayega, aur na unhein madad milegi.
2.87: Aur humne Moosa ko kitaab di, aur uske baad paighambaron ka silsila jari kiya. Aur humne Isa Ibn Maryam ko roshan nishaniyan di, aur paak rooh se uski madad ki. Kya yeh aisa har baar karte rahe ke jab bhi koi Rasool unki khwahish ke khilaf baat lekar aaya, to usko jhutlaya ya qatl kar diya?
2.88: Aur kehte hain, Hamare dilon par ghilaf hai. Nahin, balke unke kufr ke sabab Allah ne unpar laanat ki hai, to woh kam hi iman late hain.
2.89: Aur jab unke paas Allah ki taraf se woh kitaab aayi jo unke paas wali kitaab ki tasdeeq karti hai, aur pehle woh uske aane se kafiron ke khilaf fatah ki dua karte the, to jab woh cheez unke paas aa gayi jise woh pehchaan gaye, to uska inkar kar baithe. To Allah ki laanat ho inkaar karne walon par.
2.90: Kitni buri cheez hai jo unhone apne nafs ke liye khareed li ke Allah ke nazil ki hui kitaab ka inkar sirf is wajah se kiya ke Allah ne apna fazl apne jis banday ko chaha ata kiya. To woh gazab par gazab ke mustahiq ho gaye. Aur kafiron ke liye zillat ka azaab hai.
2.91: Aur jab unse kaha jata hai, Jo kuch Allah ne nazil kiya uspar iman lao, to kehte hain, Hum us par iman late hain jo hamare paas nazil hua, aur jo uske siwa hai uska inkar karte hain. Halanke woh haqq hai jo unke paas wali kitaab ki tasdeeq karta hai. Kaho, Agar tum iman wale ho to pehle Allah ke paighambaron ko kyu qatl karte rahe?
2.92: Aur Moosa tumhare paas roshan nishaniyon ke saath aaya, phir bhi tumne uske baad bachde ko maabood bana liya, aur tum zaalim ban gaye.
2.93: Aur jab humne tumse misaaq liya aur Toor ko tumpar uthaya. Lo jo humne tumhein diya hai mazbooti se, aur suno. Unhone kaha, Humne suna aur hum maanenge nahi. Aur unke kufr ke sabab unke dilon mein bachda bas gaya tha. Kaho, Agar tum momin ho to tumhara iman tumhein yeh burai ka hukm deta hai?
2.94: Kaho, Agar tumhara dawa hai ke aakhirat ka ghar sirf tumhare liye hai aur baaqi sab logon ke liye nahi, to phir tum maut ki tamanna karo agar tum sacche ho.
2.95: Lekin yeh maut ki tamanna kabhi nahi karenge, un baaton ki wajah se jo unke haathon ne aage bheji hai. Aur Allah zalimon ko achhi tarah jaanta hai.
2.96: Aur tum unhein sab logon se zyada zindagi ke hirs mein paoge, mushrikon se bhi zyada. Unmein se har ek chahta hai ke kaash use hazaar saal ki zindagi mil jaye. Halanke lambi zindagi bhi use azaab se nahi bacha sakti. Aur Allah unke aamaal ko dekh raha hai.
2.97: Kaho, Jo Jibraeel ka dushman ho, to usse kehdo ke usi ne Allah ke hukum se yeh Quran tumhare dil par nazil kiya, jo pehle aayi kitaabon ki tasdeeq karta hai, aur momineen ke liye hidayat aur khush khabri hai.
2.98: Jo Allah, uske farishton, uske Rasoolon, Jibraeel aur Mikaeel ka dushman ho, to Allah bhi kafiron ka dushman hai.
2.99: Aur humne tumhare paas aisi roshan ayatein bheji hain, jin ka inkar sirf faasiq log hi karte hain.
2.100: Kya har baar jab unhon ne koi ahd kiya, un mein se ek giroh ne use tod nahi diya? Balke un mein zyada log iman nahi laate.
2.101: Aur jab un ke paas Allah ki taraf se ek Rasool aaya jo un ke paas wali kitaab ki tasdeeq karta tha, to kitaab walon mein se ek giroh ne Allah ki kitaab ko is tarah pichhe daal diya jaise woh jaante hi na ho.
2.102: Aur unhon ne us cheez ki pairwi ki jo Shaitaan Sulaiman ke daur mein parhte the, halan ke Sulaiman ne kufr nahi kiya, magar Shaitaan logon ko jaadu sikhate the. Aur woh cheez bhi jo Harut aur Marut par utari gayi thi Babil mein – woh dono kisi ko kuch nahi sikhate the jab tak yeh na kehte ke 'hum to sirf azmaish hain, to tum kufr na karo'.
2.103: Lekin log un se woh cheez seekh lete jisse miyan-biwi ke darmiyan jhagra daal dein. Halan ke woh kisi ko Allah ke hukm ke bagair nuqsaan nahi pohcha sakte. Aur woh aisi cheez seekhte hain jo un ke liye nuqsaan deh hoti hai, nafa nahi deti. Aur yaqeenan woh jaante hain ke jo iska sauda karega uska aakhirat mein koi hissa nahi.
2.104: Agar woh iman late aur parheizgaar ban jaate to Allah ke paas un ke liye behtareen badla hota. Kaash ke woh jaante.
2.105: Kuffar Ahl-e-Kitaab aur Mushrikeen yeh nahi chahte ke tum par tumhare Rab ki taraf se koi bhalai nazil ho. Lekin Allah jise chahta hai apni rehmat ke liye chunta hai, aur Allah badi fazl wala hai.
2.106: Hum koi aayat mansookh karte hain ya bhula dete hain to us se behtar ya us jaisi le aate hain. Kya tum nahi jaante ke Allah har cheez par qadir hai?
2.107: Kya tum nahi jaante ke Allah hi ke liye hai aasmanon aur zameen ki baadshahi? Aur tumhara Allah ke siwa na koi wali hai na madadgaar.
2.108: Kya tum bhi apne Rasool se waisa sawal karna chahte ho jaisa pehle Musa se kiya gaya tha? Aur jo bhi iman ke badle kufr ikhtiyar kare to woh seedhe raaste se bhatak gaya.
2.109: Ahl-e-Kitaab mein se bohot se log chahtay hain ke kaash tumhare iman ke baad tumhein kafir bana dein – sirf apne dil ke hasad ki wajah se – jab ke haq un par zahir ho chuka hai. To unhein maaf karo aur chhodo, jab tak Allah apna faisla na farma de. Beshak Allah har cheez par qadir hai.
2.110: Aur namaz qayam karo aur zakat do. Jo kuch bhi tum aage bhejo ge apne liye bhalai mein, Allah ke paas use pao ge. Beshak Allah tumhare aamal se bakhabar hai.
2.111: Aur kehte hain ke jannat mein sirf wahi jaayenge jo Yahudi ya Nasrani honge. Yeh un ki khwahishat hain. Kaho: apni daleel lao agar tum sachche ho.
2.112: Haan, jo koi apna rukh Allah ki taraf kare aur woh neik amal kare to us ka ajar us ke Rab ke paas hai. Aise logon ko na koi khauf hoga, na woh ghamgeen honge.
2.113: Yahudi kehte hain ke Nasrani kisi baat par nahi, aur Nasrani kehte hain ke Yahudi kisi baat par nahi – halan ke dono kitaab padhte hain. Aise hi un logon ke bhi dawe hain jo kuch nahi jaante. Allah un ke darmiyan Qayamat ke din faisla karega.
2.114: Aur us se bada zalim kaun ho sakta hai jo Allah ki masajid mein us ka naam lene se roke, aur un ki virani mein koshish kare? Aise logon ko wahan dakhil hone ka haqq nahi magar dare hue. Un ke liye duniya mein ruswayi hai aur aakhirat mein azaab-e-azeem.
2.115: Aur mashriq aur maghrib Allah hi ke hain, jahan bhi tum rukh karo ge wahan Allah ka chehra hai. Beshak Allah wasee hai, sab kuch jaanta hai.
2.116: Aur kehte hain ke Allah ne beta banaya hai. Paak hai woh! Balke jo kuch aasmanon aur zameen mein hai usi ka hai. Sab us ke taabedaar hain.
2.117: Woh aasmanon aur zameen ka paida karne wala hai. Jab kisi ka faisla karta hai to kehta hai 'ho ja', to woh ho jaata hai.
2.118: Aur jo nahi jaante kehte hain ke Allah hum se baat kyon nahi karta ya koi nishani kyun nahi aati? Aise hi baatein un se pehle ke log bhi kar chuke hain. Un ke dil milte-julte hain. Hum ne nishaniyan un logon ke liye bayaan kar di hain jo yaqeen rakhte hain.
2.119: Beshak hum ne tumhein haqq ke saath Rasool bana kar bheja hai – basharat dene wala aur darane wala. Aur tum se dozakh walon ke baare mein sawal nahi hoga.
2.120: Aur Yahudi aur Nasrani tum se kabhi raazi nahi honge jab tak tum un ke deen ki pairwi na karo. Kaho: Allah ki hidayat hi asal hidayat hai. Aur agar tum un ke khwahishat ki pairwi karoge is ke baad ke tumhare paas ilm aa chuka, to tumhara Allah ke samne na koi wali hoga na madadgaar.
2.121: Jn logon ko hm ne ktab di he, oh ause as trh prhte hin jisa kh prhne ka hq he oh as pr sche dl se aiman late hin aor joas ke sath kfr ka roih akhtiar krin, ohi asl min nqsan athane oale hin
Jin logon ko hum ne kitaab di thi, woh use is tarah padhte hain jese padhne ka haq hai. Yeh wahi log hain jo us par iman late hain. Aur jo iska inkar karte hain, wahi khasare mein hain.
2.122: Ae Bani Israeel! Yaad karo meri woh ne'mat jo maine tum par ki thi, aur ke maine tumhein duniya ki qaumon par fazilat di thi.
2.123: Aur daro us din se jab koi kisi ke kuch kaam na aa sakega, na us se koi badla liya jaayega, na kisi ki sifarish faida degi, aur na kisi ko madad mil sakegi.
2.124: Aur jab Ibrahim ko uske Rab ne chand baton mein azmaya to usne poora kar diya. Allah ne kaha: Main tujhe logon ka imam banane wala hoon. Usne kaha: 'Aur meri aulad mein se?' Allah ne farmaya: Mera ahd zalimon ko nahi milta.
2.125: Aur jab hum ne is ghar (Kabah) ko logon ke liye markaz banaya, aman ki jagah. Aur hukm diya ke Ibrahim ke maqam ko namaz ki jagah banao. Aur hum ne Ibrahim aur Ismail ko hukm diya ke mere ghar ko paak karo tawaf karne walon, itikaf karne walon, ruku aur sajda karne walon ke liye.
2.126: Aur jab Ibrahim ne kaha: 'Ae mere Rab! Is shehar ko aman wala bana de, aur us ke rehne walon ko, jo Allah aur aakhri din par iman laate hon, phalon ka rizq de.' Allah ne farmaya: 'Aur jo inkar karega, use bhi main kuch din dunia mein rozi dunga, phir use dozakh ke azaab mein dhakel dunga, aur woh bura thikana hai.'
2.127: Aur jab Ibrahim aur Ismail ne is ghar ki buniyad uthai, to dua ki: 'Ae hamare Rab! Hum se qabool kar le, tu sab kuch sunne wala, sab kuch jaane wala hai.'
2.128: Ae hamare Rab! Humein apna farmabardaar bana le, aur hamari nasl mein se bhi ek ummat ko apna farmabardaar bana. Aur humein hamare ibadat ke tareeqe dikha, aur hamari tauba qabool kar. Tu tauba qubool karne wala, meherban hai.’
2.129: Ae hamare Rab! Un mein ek Rasool bhej jo un par teri aayatein padhe, unhein kitaab aur hikmat sikhaye, aur unhein paak kare. Tu hi zabardast hai, hikmat wala hai.’
2.130: Aur kaun Ibrahim ke deen se mooh mor sakta hai siwa us ke jo apne aap ko nadaan bana le? Humne to use duniya mein bhi chuna tha, aur aakhirat mein bhi woh zaroor nek logon mein se hoga.
2.131: Jab uske Rab ne kaha: Muslim ho jaa (Farmabardaar ho jaa),’ to usne kaha: Main Rab-ul-Aalameen ka farmabardaar ban gaya.’
2.132: Aur isi baat ki wasiyat Ibrahim ne apni aulad ko ki, aur Yaqoob ne bhi, ke: Ae mere beton! Allah ne tumhare liye yeh deen pasand kiya hai, to marna magar is halat mein ke tum Muslim ho.’
2.133: Kya tum us waqt maujood the jab Yaqoob ko maut aayi? Jab usne apne beton se kaha: Tum mere baad kis ki ibadat karoge?’ Unhon ne kaha: Hum aapke Rab, aapke baapdada Ibrahim, Ismail aur Ishaq ke Rab – ek hi Allah – ki ibadat karenge, aur hum usi ke Muslim hain.’
2.134: Yeh ek ummat thi jo guzar chuki. Jo kuch usne kamaya woh uske liye hai, aur jo kuch tum kamaoge woh tumhare liye. Aur jo woh karte the uske baare mein tumse nahi poocha jaayega.
2.135: Aur woh kehte hain: 'Yahoodi ya Nasrani ban jao, taake hidayat mile.' Kaho: Balke hum to Ibrahim ke deen waale hain jo baatil se jhuke hue the, aur mushrikeen mein se nahi tha.’
2.136: Kaho: Hum Allah par iman laye, aur us cheez par jo hamare upar utari gayi, aur jo Ibrahim, Ismail, Ishaq, Yaqoob aur unke aulaad par utari gayi, aur jo Moosa aur Isa ko di gayi, aur jo sabhi Nabiyon ko unke Rab ki taraf se di gayi – hum in mein se kisi mein tafreeq nahi karte, aur hum sirf usi ke Muslim hain.’
2.137: Agar woh bhi isi tarah iman laye jaisa tum laye ho, to woh bhi hidayat pa gaye, warna woh sirf jhagra mein hain. To Allah tumhara kaafi hai unke muqable mein. Aur woh sab kuch sunta, jaanta hai.
2.138: Allah ka rang (apna lena) – aur Allah se behtar kis ka rang ho sakta hai? Aur hum to usi ke ibadat karne wale hain.
2.139: Kya tum hum se jhagra karte ho Allah ke baare mein, jab ke woh hamara bhi Rab hai aur tumhara bhi? Aur hamare liye hamare amal hain, aur tumhare liye tumhare amal. Aur hum usi ke liye khule dil se mukhlis hain.
2.140: Kya tum kehte ho ke Ibrahim, Ismail, Ishaq, Yaqoob aur unki aulad Yahoodi ya Nasrani the? Kaho: Kya tum zyada jaante ho ya Allah?’ Aur us se bada zalim kaun hai jo Allah ki gawahi chhupa le jo us ke paas hai? Aur Allah tumhare aamal se bekhabar nahi hai.
2.141: Yeh ek ummat thi jo guzar chuki. Jo kuch usne kamaya woh uske liye hai, aur jo kuch tum kamaoge woh tumhare liye. Aur tum se un ke aamal ke baare mein nahi poocha jaayega.
2.142: Nadaan log kahenge: Unhein unke qibla se kis cheez ne mod diya jise woh pehle istemal karte the?’ Kaho: Mashriq aur maghrib Allah hi ke hain. Woh jise chahta hai seedhi raah dikhata hai.’
2.143: Aur is tarah hum ne tumhein ek behtareen ummat banaya, taake tum logon par gawah bano, aur Rasool tum par gawah bane. Aur jis qibla ko tum pehle istemal karte the, hum ne use sirf is liye banaya tha ke dekh sake kaun Rasool ka paaband hai aur kaun ulat jaata hai. Aur yeh kaam mushkil tha siwa un logon ke jinhein Allah ne hidayat di. Aur Allah tumhare iman ko zaya nahi karega. Beshak Allah logon ke liye nihayat meherban aur reham karne wala hai.
2.144: Hum dekh rahe hain ke tumhara chehra baar baar aasman ki taraf uthta hai. To ab hum zaroor tumhein us qibla ki taraf modenge jo tumhein pasand hai. To ab apna rukh Masjid-e-Haram ki taraf kar lo. Aur jahan bhi tum ho, apna chehra usi ki taraf karo. Aur jin logon ko kitaab di gayi hai, woh jaante hain ke yeh unke Rab ki taraf se haqq hai. Aur Allah un ke aamal se bekhabar nahi hai.
2.145: Aur agar tum un logon ke paas har tarah ki nishani le aao, to bhi woh tumhare qibla ko nahi maanenge. Aur na tum unke qibla ko maano ge. Aur na un mein koi kisi ka qibla maanne wala hai. Aur agar tum unki khwahishon ki pairwi karoge iske baad ke tumhare paas ilm aa chuka, to tum bhi zalimon mein se ho jaoge.
2.146: Jin logon ko hum ne kitaab di thi woh apne beton ko jaise pehchaan lete hain, usi tarah Rasool ko bhi pehchaan lete hain. Magar un mein se ek giroh haqq ko jaante boojhte chhupa raha hai.
2.147: Haqq tumhare Rab ki taraf se hai, to tum shaq karne walon mein se na ho jao.
2.148: Har ek ke liye ek simt hai jiske taraf woh rukh karta hai. To tum nekiyon mein sabqat lo. Jahan bhi tum ho, Allah tum sab ko ikattha karega. Beshak Allah har cheez par qadir hai.
2.149: Aur jahan se bhi tum niklo, apna chehra Masjid-e-Haram ki taraf karo. Yeh tumhare Rab ki taraf se haq hai. Aur Allah tumhare aamal se bekhabar nahi hai.
2.150: Aur jahan se bhi tum niklo, apna rukh Masjid-e-Haram ki taraf kar lo. Aur jahan bhi tum ho, apna chehra usi ki taraf karo, taake logon ke paas tumhare khilaf koi hujjat na rahe – siwa un logon ke jo zalim hain. To unse mat daro, balki mujh se daro, aur yeh is liye hai ke main tum par apni ne'mat poori karoon, aur tum hidayat pao.
2.151: Jese humne tum mein ek Rasool bheja, jo tum par hamari aayatein padhta hai, tumhein paak karta hai, aur tumhein kitaab aur hikmat sikhata hai, aur woh baatein sikhaata hai jo tum nahi jaante the.
2.152: To mujhe yaad karo, main tumhein yaad karunga. Aur mera shukar karo, aur na-shukri na karo.
2.153: Ae logon jo iman laye ho! Sabr aur namaz se madad lo. Beshak Allah sabr karne walon ke saath hai.
2.154: Aur jo log Allah ki raah mein qatl kiye gaye unhein murda na kaho. Balki woh zinda hain, magar tum nahi samajhte.
2.155: Aur zaroor hum tumhein azmaenge kuch dar, bhook, maal, jaanon aur phalon ke nuqsan se. Aur sabr karne walon ko khushkhabri de do.
2.156: Woh log jin par koi museebat aati hai to kehte hain: Beshak hum Allah ke hain, aur hum usi ki taraf lautne wale hain.’
2.157: Aise logon par unke Rab ki taraf se rehmat hai aur rahmat hai. Aur wahi log hidayat yafta hain.
2.158: Safa aur Marwah Allah ke nishanon mein se hain. To jo koi is ghar ka hajj ya umrah kare, us par koi gunaah nahi ke woh in dono ke darmiyan chakkar lagaye. Aur jo khushi se koi neiki kare, to Allah qadr dan, jaane wala hai.
2.159: Jo log hamari nazil ki gayi roshan nishaniyon aur hidayat ko chhupate hain, uske baad ke hum usko logon ke liye kitaab mein wazeh kar chuke, un par Allah ki la'nat hai, aur sab la'nat karne walon ki bhi.
2.160: Magar jo tauba karein, apni haalat durust kar lein, aur haqq ko bayan kar dein, un ki tauba main qubool kar loonga. Aur main bada tauba qubool karne wala, meherban hoon.
2.161: Beshak jo log kufr karein, aur kufr ki haalat mein mar jaayein, un par Allah ki la'nat hai, aur farishton aur sab insano ki bhi.
2.162: Woh is mein hamesha rahenge. Na un se azaab halka kiya jaayega, aur na unhein mohallat di jaayegi.
2.163: Aur tumhara maabood ek hi maabood hai. Uske siwa koi maabood nahi – woh nihayat meherban, nihayat reham karne wala hai.
2.164: Beshak aasmanon aur zameen ki takhleeq mein, raat aur din ke badalne mein, aur kashtiyon mein jo samandar mein logon ke faide ke liye chalte hain, aur pani mein jo Allah aasman se nazil karta hai, phir zameen ko uske murda hone ke baad zinda karta hai, aur har tarah ke janwaron ko usmein phela deta hai, aur hawaon ke badalne mein, aur un badalon mein jo aasman aur zameen ke darmiyan musakkhar hain – yaqeenan in sab mein un logon ke liye nishaniyan hain jo samajhte hain.
2.165: Aur logon mein se kuch aise bhi hain jo Allah ke siwa dusre ko Allah ka mushabih banate hain. Unse aise mohabbat karte hain jese Allah se mohabbat ki jati hai. Magar jin logon ne iman laya, woh Allah se sabse zyada mohabbat karte hain. Aur kaash zalim log woh dekh lein jab woh azaab dekh leinge – ke taqat to saari Allah ke haath mein hai, aur Allah sakht azaab dene wala hai.
2.166: Jab woh log jin ki pairwi ki gayi thi, un logon se jinhon ne unki pairwi ki thi, alag ho jaayenge, aur azaab dekh lenge, aur un ke darmiyan tamaam rishte toot jaayenge.
2.167: Aur woh log jinhon ne pairwi ki thi kahenge: 'Kaash humen ek baar laut kar jaane ka moka mil jaata to hum bhi unse isi tarah alag ho jaate jese unhon ne humse alag ho gaye.' Aise hi Allah unhein unke aamaal dikhata hai, taake woh nadamat mehsoos karein. Magar woh aag se nikalne walay nahi honge.
2.168: Ae logon! Zameen mein se halal aur paak cheezein khao, aur Shaitaan ke qadam ba qadam na chalo. Beshak woh tumhara khula dushman hai.
2.169: Woh tumhein sirf burai aur fahsh ka hukm deta hai, aur ke tum Allah ke bare mein woh baatein kaho jo tum nahi jaante.
2.170: Aur jab un se kaha jata hai ke us cheez ka paalan karo jo Allah ne nazil ki hai, to kehte hain: Hum to usi ka paalan karenge jise humne apne baap-dada ko karte paya hai.’ Kya agar unke baap-dada kuch bhi na samajhte hon, aur na raasta paate hon, to bhi?
2.171: Aur un logon ki misaal jo haqq ka inkar karte hain us shakhs ki misaal jese koi pukarta hai kisi ko jo sirf awaz aur pukar sunta hai – woh na samajhta hai na sochta hai. Woh goonge hain, behre hain, andhe hain – is liye woh nahi samajhte.
2.172: Ae logon jo iman laye ho! Halal aur paak cheezein khao jo humne tumhein di hain, aur agar tum sirf Allah hi ki ibadat karte ho to us ka shukar karo.
2.173: Usne tum par haraam kiya hai sirf murda, khoon, suar ka gosht, aur woh jis par Allah ke siwa kisi aur ka naam liya gaya ho. Magar jo majboori mein ho, is halat mein ke na to baghawat kare, na had se badhe, to us par gunah nahi. Beshak Allah bakhshne wala, reham karne wala hai.
2.174: Jo log Allah ki kitaab ko chhupate hain, aur us ke badle thoda faida lete hain, woh apne pait mein aag bhar rahe hain. Allah qayamat ke din un se na to baat karega, aur na unhein paak karega. Aur unke liye dardnaak azaab hai.
2.175: Yeh wohi log hain jinhon ne hidayat ke badle gumraahi khareedi, aur bakhshish ke badle azaab. To kaise woh aag ke saath sabr karein ge?
2.176: Yeh is liye ke Allah ne kitaab haqq ke saath nazil ki hai. Aur jo log kitaab mein ikhtilaaf karte hain, woh duriyan daalne mein door tak chale gaye hain.
2.177: Neki yeh nahi ke tum apne chehre mashriq ya maghrib ki taraf kar lo. Balke asli neki yeh hai ke koi Allah, aakhri din, farishton, kitaab aur paigambaron par iman laye. Aur maal Allah ki mohabbat mein rishtedaron, yateemon, miskeeno, musafiron, mangne walon, aur ghulamon ke rihaai mein kharch kare. Aur namaz qayam kare, zakat de, aur jab wada kare to usay poora kare. Aur tangi, dukh, aur jung ke waqt sabr kare – yeh hi sachche log hain, aur yeh hi muttaqi hain.
2.178: Ae logon jo iman laye ho! Tum par qisas farz kiya gaya hai qatl ke maamle mein – aazad ke badle aazad, ghulam ke badle ghulam, aur aurat ke badle aurat. Magar agar kisi ko uske bhai ki taraf se kuch maafi mil jaaye to phir uska paalan theek tareeqe se karna aur usse khoob ada karna lazmi hai. Yeh tumhare Rab ki taraf se rahat aur reham hai. Phir jo is ke baad had se badhe to uske liye dardnaak azaab hai.
2.179: Aur tumhare liye qisas mein zindagi hai, ae aqal walon! Taake tum bach jao.
2.180: Tum par likha gaya hai ke jab kisi ki maut qareeb ho aur kuch maal chhod raha ho to waliden aur qareebi rishtedaron ke liye acchi wasiyat kare — yeh haqq hai muttaqiyon par.
2.181: Jo shakhs wasiyat ko sun kar us mein tabdili kare to gunaah un par hoga jo us mein tabdili karte hain. Allah sab kuch sunta hai, jaanta hai.
2.182: Agar koi shakhs wasiyat karne wale ki tarafdari ya ghalti se dar kar dono ke darmiyan sulah kara de to uspe koi gunaah nahi. Allah bakshne wala hai.
2.183: Aey logon jo iman laye ho! Tum par roza farz kiya gaya hai jaise tumse pehle logon par kiya gaya tha — shayad tum taqwa ikhtiyar karo.
2.184: Ginay chunay din hain. Jo beemar ho ya safar mein ho to woh aur dinon mein gin kar roza poora kare. Jo iski taqat na rakhta ho woh ek miskeen ko khana khilaye. Aur jo apni khushi se kuch aur zyada kare to yeh uske liye behtar hai. Roza rakhna tumhare liye behtar hai agar tum samjho.
2.185: Ramazan ka mahina hai jismein Quran nazil kiya gaya — logon ke liye hidayat aur haqq o baatil ka faisla. Tum mein jo is mahine ko paaye to roza rakhe. Jo beemar ho ya safar mein ho to aur dinon mein gin kar poora kare. Allah tumhare liye aasani chahta hai, taqleef nahi.
2.186: Aur jab mere banday tum se mere baare mein poochein to keh do: main qareeb hoon. Jab bhi koi mujhe pukarta hai, main uski dua qubool karta hoon. Pas chahiye ke wo mera kehna maanein aur mujh par iman laayein — shayad ke wo raah paayein.
2.187: Roze ki raaton mein apni biwiyon ke paas jana tumhare liye halal kar diya gaya hai. Wo tumhare liye libaas hain aur tum unke liye libaas ho. Allah ne tumhari khata maaf ki. Ab unse talaq khao. Roza poora karo. Masjid mein aitikaaf ke dauran biwiyon se muqarabat na karo. Ye Allah ki hudood hain — inke paas na jao.
2.188: Apne maal aapas mein na-haq na khao, aur na inhe qazi ke paas le ja kar haqdaaron ka haq maaro — jab tum jante ho.
2.189: Log tum se chand ke baare mein poochte hain. Keh do: ye logon ke liye aur Hajj ke waqt ki nishaniyan hain. Gharon mein darwazon se aao. Allah se daro — shayad ke tum kamiyab ho jao.
2.190: Aur Allah ki raah mein un se ladho jo tum se ladte hain — lekin hadd se na badho. Beshak Allah hadd se badhne walon ko pasand nahi karta.
2.191: Unhein jahan paao qatl karo, aur jahan se unhon ne tumhein nikala wahan se tum bhi nikalo — fitna qatl se zyada bura hai. Masjid-e-Haram mein na ladho jab tak wo tum se na ladhein. Agar wo ladhein to tum bhi ladho.
2.192: Agar wo ruk jaayein to Allah bakshne wala, meharban hai.
2.193: Aur unse ladte raho jab tak ke fitna khatam na ho jaye aur deen sirf Allah ka ho jaye. Agar wo ruk jaayein to koi dushmani nahi siwaye zalimon ke khilaaf.
2.194: Haram ka mahina haram ke muqablay mein hai, aur hurmaton ka badla hurmat hai. Jo tum par zyadati kare us par tum bhi waisi hi zyadati karo. Allah se daro, aur jaano ke Allah muttaqiyon ke saath hai.
2.195: Allah ki raah mein maal kharch karo. Apne aap ko tabahi mein na daalo. Bhalaai karo — Allah bhalaai karne walon se muhabbat karta hai.
2.196: Hajj aur Umrah ko Allah ke liye mukammal karo. Agar ruk jao to jo qurbani aasan ho woh karo. Aur apne sir na moonhvao jab tak qurbani apne muqam tak na pahunch jaye. Agar tum mein koi beemaar ho ya sar mein koi takleef ho to fidya do – roza ya sadqa ya qurbani. Jab tum aman mein ho to jo Umrah ke saath Hajj kare to jo qurbani asaan ho woh kare. Jo na mile to teen roze Hajj ke dino mein aur saat ghar wapas jaa kar – poore das roze. Yeh unke liye hai jo Masjid Haram ke paas na rehte ho. Allah se daro aur jaan lo ke Allah sakht saza dene wala hai.
2.197: Hajj ke mahine ma'loom hai. To jo in mahino mein Hajj ka iraada kare to Hajj mein na koi faahish baat kare, na gunah kare, na jhagde. Jo bhi tum bhalaai karo, Allah use jaanta hai. Apna saamaan le lo, behtareen saamaan taqwa hai. Aqalmand bano, Aey danayi walon.
2.198: Yeh koi gunaah nahi agar tum apne Rab ka fazl (rizq) chaho. Jab tum Arafaat se wapas aao to Mash'ar al-Haram ke paas Allah ka zikr karo aur usi tarah yaad karo jaise us ne tumhein hidayat di, halaanke is se pehle tum gumraah the.
2.199: Phir jahan se log wapas jaate hain wahin se tum bhi wapas aao, aur Allah se maafi maango. Beshak Allah bada maaf karne wala, meharban hai.
2.200: Jab tum apne Hajj ke faraiz mukammal kar lo to Allah ko yaad karo jaise apne baap dada ko yaad karte ho, ya us se bhi zyada. Kuch log kehte hain: 'Rabb humein duniya mein de.' Aise logon ke liye aakhirat mein kuch hissa nahi.
2.201: Aur kuch log kehte hain: 'Rabb humein duniya mein bhi bhalai de aur aakhirat mein bhi bhalai de aur humein dozakh ki aag se bacha.'
2.202: Aise logon ke liye unka hissa hai unke amal ke mutabiq. Aur Allah hisaab mein tez hai.
2.203: Ginay chunay dinon mein Allah ko yaad karo. Phir jo do din mein jaldi wapas ho gaya us par koi gunaah nahi, aur jo ruk gaya us par bhi nahi, agar us ne taqwa ikhtiyar kiya. Allah se daro aur jaan lo ke usi ke paas ikattha kiya jaoge.
2.204: Aur kuch log hain jin ki baat tumhein duniya ki zindagi mein pasand aati hai, aur Allah ko woh apne dil ki gawahi deta hai, halaanke woh sab se zyada jhagdalu hai.
2.205: Jab woh palat kar jaata hai to zameen mein bigaad phailata hai – kheti aur nasl ko tabaah karta hai. Aur Allah bigaadi ko pasand nahi karta.
2.206: Aur jab us se kaha jaye ke Allah se daro, to usay izzat ka ghamand gunaah par le aata hai. To uske liye dozakh kaafi hai – aur woh badtar thikaana hai.
2.207: Aur kuch log apni jaan Allah ki raza ke liye bech dete hain. Aur Allah apne bandon par nihayat meharban hai.
2.208: Aey iman walon! Islam mein poori tarah daakhil ho jao, aur shaytan ke qadam ba qadam na chalo. Beshak woh tumhara khula dushman hai.
2.209: Agar tum phisal gaye baad iske ke tumhare paas saaf saaf daleel aa chuki hai, to jaan lo ke Allah zabardast hai, hikmat wala hai.
2.210: Kya ye log sirf is baat ka intezaar kar rahe hain ke Allah aur farishte badalon ke saaye mein aa jayein aur faisla ho jaye? Aur sab ka maamla Allah hi ki taraf lautaya jaata hai.
2.211: Bani Israel se poochho, humne unhein kitni saaf nishaniyan di. Jo bhi Allah ki ni’mat ke baad usse badal de to Allah ki saza sakht hai.
2.212: Duniya ki zindagi un logon ke liye khoobsurat bana di gayi hai jo kufr karte hain, aur woh iman walon ka mazaaq udaate hain. Lekin taqwa walay qayamat ke din unse upar honge. Aur Allah jise chahe be hisaab rizq deta hai.
2.213: Log ek hi ummat the. Phir Allah ne nabi bheje – khushkhabri dene wale aur darane wale – aur unke saath kitaab nazil ki taake logon ke darmiyan faisla kare jismein unka ikhtilaaf tha. Aur sirf un logon ne ikhtilaaf kiya jinko kitaab mili – saaf daleel ke baad bhi – apas ke hasad ki wajah se. To Allah ne iman walon ko apni ijazat se sachai ka rasta dikha diya, jismein un logon ne ikhtilaaf kiya tha. Aur Allah jise chahe seedha rasta dikhata hai.
2.214: Kya tum samajhte ho ke jannat mein daakhil ho jaoge bina iske ke tum par wahi haal aaye jo tumse pehle logon par aaya? Un par musibat aur tangi aayi, aur woh hila diye gaye, hatta ke Rasool aur iman walay kehne lage: 'Kab aayegi Allah ki madad?' Sun lo! Beshak Allah ki madad qareeb hai.
2.215: Log poochhte hain kya kharch karein? Kaho: Jo maal bhi kharch karo – maa baap, qarib rishte daar, yateem, miskeen aur musafiron ke liye ho. Aur jo bhalai tum karo Allah use jaanta hai.
2.216: Tum par jihad farz kiya gaya hai halaanke woh tumhein napasand hai. Ho sakta hai tum kisi cheez ko napasand karo jo tumhare liye behtari ho, aur kisi cheez ko pasand karo jo tumhare liye buri ho. Allah jaanta hai, tum nahi jaante.
2.217: Woh tum se haram mahine mein ladayi ke baare mein poochhte hain. Kaho: usmein ladna bara gunaah hai. Lekin Allah ke raste se roknay, uska inkar, Masjid Haram se roknay aur wahan ke logon ko nikalna Allah ke nazdeek aur bara gunaah hai. Fitna (fasad) qatal se bhi bara hai. Aur woh lagataar tumse ladte rahenge jab tak tumhare deen se phir na jao. Aur jo deen se phir gaya aur kufr ki halat mein mar gaya, to unka amal duniya aur aakhirat dono mein zaya ho gaya. Aur woh log dozakh waale hain, hamesha usmein rahenge.
2.218: Jo log iman laye, hijrat ki aur Allah ke raaste mein jihad kiya, wohi Allah ki rehmat ke umeedwar hain. Aur Allah bada bakhshne wala, meharban hai.
2.219: Tum se sharab aur jua ke baare mein poochhte hain. Kaho: in dono mein bara gunah hai, aur logon ke liye kuch faida bhi hai – lekin unka gunah unke faide se zyada hai. Aur poochhte hain kya kharch karein? Kaho: jo bacha ho. Is tarah Allah tumhare liye apni aayaat wazeh karta hai taake tum soche samjho.
2.220: Duniya aur aakhirat ke baare mein. Aur poochhte hain yateem ke baare mein – Kaho: unke kaam sudharna behtareen hai. Aur agar unke saath mil kar raho to woh tumhare bhai hain. Allah jaanta hai kaun bigaad lana chahta hai aur kaun sudhar. Aur agar Allah chahta to tum par sakhti karta. Beshak Allah zabardast hai, hikmat wala hai.
2.221: Mushrik auraton se nikah na karo jab tak woh iman na laayen. Ek iman wali laundi mushrik aurat se behtar hai, chahe woh tumhein kitni hi pasand ho. Aur apni betiyan mushrikon se nikah mein na do jab tak woh iman na laayein. Ek iman wala ghulaam mushrik se behtar hai, chahe woh tumhein pasand ho. Ye log jahannum ki taraf bulate hain, aur Allah apne hukum se jannat aur magfirat ki taraf bulata hai. Aur apni aayaat logon ke liye wazeh karta hai taake woh naseehat lein.
2.222: Aur woh tum se haiz ke baare mein poochhte hain. Kaho: woh gandagi hai – to haiz ke dino mein aurat se alag raho. Aur jab tak woh paak na ho jayein, unke paas na jao. Jab woh paak ho jaayein to un ke paas jao jahan se Allah ne hukm diya hai. Beshak Allah taubah karne walon aur paak rehne walon se mohabbat karta hai.
2.223: Tumhari auratein tumhara kheti ka maidan hain – to jao apne kheti mein jahan se chaho. Apne liye kuch aage bhejo (nekiyan). Aur Allah se daro, aur jaan lo ke usse milna hai. Aur momineen ko khushkhabri de do.
2.224: Aur Allah ke naam ka waseela na banao ke tum us se qasam kha kar neki, taqwa aur logon ke darmiyan sulah se ruk jao. Allah sab kuch sunta hai, jaanta hai.
2.225: Allah tumhari be sochi samjhi qasmon par tumhein nahi pakadta, lekin jo dil se tum ne kaha us par pakadta hai. Aur Allah bada bakhshne wala, burdbaar hai.
2.226: Jo log apni biwiyon se alag rehne ki qasam khayein un ke liye chaar mahine ki mohalat hai. Agar woh rujoo kar lein to Allah bakhshne wala, meharban hai.
2.227: Agar talaq ka iraada ho to Allah sab kuch sunta, jaanta hai.
2.228: Talaq shuda auratein teen haiz tak intezar karein. Unhein jaiz nahi ke woh Allah ne jo un ke reham mein banaya hai, use chhupayein agar woh Allah aur aakhirat par iman rakhti hain. Un ke shohar agar sulah chahte hain to is muddat mein unhein rujoo ka haq hai. Aur auraton ke liye bhi wahi huqooq hain jo mardon ke liye – achi tarah. Mardon ko unpar ek darja fazilat ka hai. Aur Allah zabardast, hikmat wala hai.
2.229: Talaq do martaba hai – phir ya to achhi tarah rakh lena ya achhi tarah chhod dena. Aur tumhein jaiz nahi ke tumne jo diya hai us mein se kuch wapas lo – magar dono ko dar ho ke Allah ke hudood ko na poora kar saken. Agar tumhein andesha ho ke woh dono Allah ke hudood ko na poora kar saken to unpar kuch gunaah nahi agar aurat apne haqq ka kuch hissa chhod de. Yeh Allah ke hudood hain – unse tajawuz na karo. Jo tajawuz kare woh zalim hai.
2.230: Agar kisi ne talaq de di aur phir talaq ke baad rujoo kar liya, phir dobaara talaq di, to uske baad uske liye jaiz nahi ke woh us se dobara nikah kare jab tak woh kisi aur shohar se nikah na kare. Phir agar woh us se talaq le le to dono ke liye koi haraj nahi agar woh dobara nikah kar lein – agar unhein lagta hai ke woh Allah ke hudood ko poora karein ge. Yeh Allah ke hukum hain jo woh samajhdar logon ke liye wazeh karta hai.
2.231: Jab tum auraton ko talaq do aur woh apni iddat poori kar lein, to ya to unhein achhi tarah roko ya achhi tarah chhod do. Unhein nuqsan pahunchaane ke liye roko mat taake un par zulm karo. Aur jo aisa kare woh apne aap par zulm karta hai. Allah ke hukumon ko mazaak na banao. Allah ki ni’mat yaad karo jo us ne tum par ki, aur kitab aur hikmat jo tumhein sikhayi – jo tumhein naseehat karti hai. Allah se daro aur jaan lo ke Allah har cheez se waqif hai.
2.232: Jab tum auraton ko talaq do aur woh apni iddat poori kar lein to unhein un ke shoharon se nikah karne se na roko jab woh baaham razi ho jaayein. Is mein un logon ke liye naseehat hai jo Allah aur aakhirat par iman rakhte hain. Yeh tumhare liye zyada paak aur saaf hai. Allah jaanta hai, tum nahi jaante.
2.233: Aur maayein apne bachon ko poore do saal doodh pilayein – agar woh doodh pilana poora karna chahein. Jiska bachcha hai us par uska khana peena hai – lekin maamool ke mutabiq. Kisi par uski maqdaar se zyada bojh na daala jaye. Na maa ko uske bachay ke sabab nuqsan pohanchaya jaye, na baap ko uske sabab. Aur agar dono bachay ka doodh kisi aur se pilwana chahen to koi harj nahi agar woh baaham razi ho jaayein.
2.234: Jo log wafat pa jayein unki biwiyan chaar mahine aur das din intezar karein. Phir jab woh muddat poori kar lein to unke liye jaiz hai ke jo chahein apne baare mein karein – shari’at ke mutabiq. Aur Allah tumhare aamaal se waaqif hai.
2.235: Tum par koi harj nahi agar tum un auraton ke rishtay ki taraf ishaara karo ya chhup kar dil mein rakho. Allah jaanta hai ke tum unka khayal karte ho. Lekin unse chhupi hui baat na karo – siwaye yeh kehne ke: main nikah ka irada rakhta hoon. Aur jab tak woh apni iddat poori na kar lein unse nikah ka iraada na karo. Allah jaanta hai jo tum dil mein rakhte ho – us se daro. Aur jaan lo ke Allah bada burdbaar hai.
2.236: Tum par koi harj nahi agar tum un auraton ko talaq do jinse tum ne haath tak nahi lagaya aur unka haq muqarrar nahi kiya. Unhein kuch na kuch dena chahiye – ameer apni haisiyat ke mutabiq aur ghareeb apni haisiyat ke mutabiq – yeh ek accha sulook hai neik logon ke liye.
2.237: Aur agar tum ne unka haq muqarrar kiya ho aur haath na lagaya ho, to aadha mahr dena hoga – magar agar woh chhod dein ya jis ke haath mein nikah ka ikhtiyar ho woh chhod de. Aur chhod dena taqwa ke zyada kareeb hai. Apas mein ehsan na bhoolo. Beshak Allah tumhare sab aamaal ko dekhta hai.
2.238: Namazon ki hifazat karo – khaaskar beech wali namaz ki. Aur Allah ke samne adab se khade raho.
2.239: Agar tumhein darr ho to paidal ya sawari par (namaz padh lo), aur jab aman ho jaye to Allah ka zikr karo jaise us ne tumhein sikhaya jo tum nahi jaante thay.
2.240: Aur jo log wafat pa jaayein aur apne biwiyon ke liye kuch wasiyat kar jayein – ek saal tak unhein ghar se na nikala jaye, na nikaala jaye – to un par koi harj nahi agar woh khud nikal jayein. Aur Allah sab par gaalib, hikmat wala hai.
2.241: Talaq shuda auraton ko bhi kuch diya jaye – yeh neik logon ke liye ek haqq hai.
2.242: Is tarah Allah apni aayaat tumhare liye wazeh karta hai taake tum samjho.
2.243: Kya tum ne un logon ko nahi dekha jo hazaaron ki tadaad mein apne gharon se nikle maut ke darr se? To Allah ne unhein kaha: mar jao. Phir unhein zinda kiya. Beshak Allah logon par fazl karta hai lekin aksar log shukar nahi karte.
2.244: Aur Allah ke raaste mein jihad karo aur jaan lo ke Allah sunta hai, jaanta hai.
2.245: Kaun hai jo Allah ko achhe tareeqe se qarz de taake Allah use kai guna barhakar wapas de? Allah tang bhi karta hai aur kushhaal bhi karta hai. Aur usi ki taraf tumhein lautna hai.
2.246: Kya tum ne us jamaat ko nahi dekha Bani Israel mein jab unke baad Hazrat Moosa ke baad ek Nabi tha? Unhon ne kaha: humein ek badshah do taake hum Allah ke raaste mein lad sakein. Nabi ne kaha: agar tum par jihad farz kar diya gaya to ladoge? Unhon ne kaha: kyun nahi, humein apne gharon se nikaala gaya, apne bachon se juda kiya gaya. Lekin jab un par jihad farz kiya gaya to unmein se kuch logon ne mooh mor liya. Allah zalimon ko nahi jaanta.
2.247: Aur unke Nabi ne kaha: Allah ne Talut ko tumhara badshah banaya hai. Unhon ne kaha: hum par woh kaise hukmaran ban sakta hai jab ke hum us se zyada haq rakhte hain aur us ke paas maal bhi nahi. Nabi ne kaha: Allah ne use tum par chuna hai aur use ilm aur jism mein zyada fazilat di hai. Allah jise chahta hai apni hukumat deta hai. Aur Allah waseeh hai, sab kuch jaanta hai.
2.248: Aur unke Nabi ne unse kaha: uski nishani yeh hai ke tumhare paas woh taboot aayega jismein tumhare Rab ki taraf se sukoon hai, aur Musa aur Harun ke khandan ki kuch baaqi cheezein hain. Use farishte uthaye hue laayenge. Beshak is mein tumhare liye nishani hai agar tum momin ho.
2.249: Phir jab Talut lashkar le kar chala to kaha: Allah tumhein ek nadi se azmaayega. Jo is se paani piye us ka mujh se koi taluq nahi, aur jo na piye – siwa ek chuski ke – to woh mera hai. Phir unmein se chand ke siwa sab ne piya. Phir jab woh aur iman walay us se guzre to unhon ne kaha: aaj hum mein Jalut aur uske lashkar se ladne ki taqat nahi. Jo yaqeen rakhte thay ke Allah se mulaqat hogi unhon ne kaha: kitni choti choti faujon ne Allah ke hukum se badi faujon ko haraya. Allah sabr karne walon ke saath hai.
2.250: Aur jab woh Jalut aur uske lashkar ke saamne aaye to kaha: Aey hamare Rab! Hum par sabr utaar, humein qadam jamaye rakh, aur kafiron par fatah ata farma.
Aur jab woh Taloot aur us ke lashkar ke saath samne aaye, to unhon ne dua ki: 'Parwardigar! Hum par sabr udaal de, hamare qadam jamaye rakh aur kafiron par humein fatah de'.
2.251: Phir Allah ke hukum se unhon ne unhein shikast di, aur Dawood ne Jaloot ko qatal kiya, aur Allah ne us ko baadshahi aur hikmat ata ki, aur use jo chaaha sikhaya. Aur agar Allah kuch logon ko kuch logon ke zariye na roke to zameen mein fasaad mach jaata. Lekin Allah duniya walon par bada fazl farmata hai.
2.252: Yeh Allah ki aayatein hain, jo hum tumhein theek theek suna rahe hain. Aur beshak tum Rasoolon mein se ho.
2.253: Yeh Rasool aapas mein kuch doosre se afzal kiye gaye. Un mein se kuch se Allah ne kalaam kiya, aur kuch ke darje buland kiye. Aur Isa Ibn-e-Maryam ko roshan nishaniyan dee aur paak rooh se uski taeed ki. Aur agar Allah chahta to un ke baad wale log ek doosre se na ladte, magar unhon ne ikhtilaf kiya, phir kuch ne imaan laya aur kuch ne inkaar kiya. Agar Allah chahta to woh na ladte, lekin Allah jo chahta hai karta hai.
2.254: Aey logon jo imaan laye ho! Jo kuch humne tumhein diya hai, us mein se kharch karo is se pehle ke woh din aa jaye jismein na koi khareed-farokht hogi, na dosti kaam aayegi aur na sifarish chalegi. Aur kafir hi asal zaalim hain.
2.255: Allah – uske siwa koi ilaah nahi – Zinda hai, Qayyam hai. Na usay neend aati hai, na ungh. Jo kuch aasmanon aur zameen mein hai sab usi ka hai. Kaun hai jo us ke huzoor uski ijazat ke bagair sifarish kare? Woh jaanta hai jo kuch un ke samne hai aur jo kuch un ke peechhe hai, aur woh us ke ilm mein se kuch bhi nahi paa sakte, magar jitna woh chahe. Uski kursi aasmanon aur zameen ko ghere hue hai, aur unka hifazat karna us par bhaari nahi, aur woh sab se ooncha aur azeem hai.
2.256: Deen mein koi zabardasti nahi. Hidayat ghalat raaste se alag ho chuki hai. Ab jo taghoot ka inkaar kare aur Allah par imaan laye to usne ek aise mazboot sahare ko thaam liya jise kabhi tootna nahi. Aur Allah sab kuch sunta hai, sab kuch jaanta hai.
2.257: Allah un logon ka wali hai jo imaan laate hain – woh unhein andheron se roshni ki taraf nikaalta hai. Aur jin logon ne kufr ikhtiyar kiya, un ke wali taghoot hain – woh unhein roshni se andheron mein le jaate hain. Yeh aag mein rehne wale log hain, aur yeh usi mein hamesha rahenge.
2.258: Kya tumne us shakhs ko nahi dekha jo Ibrahim se us ke Rab ke baare mein jhagad raha tha sirf is wajah se ke Allah ne us ko baadshahi di thi? Jab Ibrahim ne kaha: Mera Rab woh hai jo zindagi deta hai aur maut deta hai’, to usne kaha: Main bhi zindagi deta hoon aur maut deta hoon.’ Ibrahim ne kaha: Allah suraj ko mashriq se nikaalta hai, tu use maghrib se nikaal.’ To woh kafir hairaan reh gaya. Aur Allah zalimon ko hidayat nahi deta.
2.259: Ya us shakhs ki misaal lo jo ek basti ke paas se guzra jo apni chhatein giraye hue thi. Usne kaha: Allah is basti ko uski maut ke baad kaise zinda karega?’ To Allah ne us ko sau saal tak maar diya, phir us ko zinda kiya. Kaha: Tu kitni der pada raha?’ Usne kaha: Ek din ya din ka kuch hissa.’ Allah ne kaha: Nahi, tu sau saal pada raha. Apna khana aur paani dekho – woh kharab nahi hua. Aur apne gadhe ko dekho – aur hum tujhe logon ke liye nishani bana rahe hain. Aur haddi dekh, kaise hum unhein jor kar gosht chadha dete hain.’ Phir jab us par yeh baat wazeh ho gayi to usne kaha: Main jaanta hoon ke Allah har cheez par qudrat rakhta hai.’
2.260: Aur jab Ibrahim ne kaha: Aey Rab! Mujhe dikha tu murdon ko kaise zinda karta hai.’ Allah ne kaha: Kya tu imaan nahi rakhta?’ Usne kaha: Haan, lekin main chahta hoon ke mere dil ko tasalli ho jaye.’ Allah ne kaha: To chaar parinday le aur unhein apne paas kar le, phir un ka ek-ek hissa har pahadi par rakh de, phir unhein bula – woh teri taraf daud kar aayenge. Aur jaane le ke Allah zabardast hai, hakeem hai.’
2.261: Jo log apne maal Allah ke raaste mein kharch karte hain, unki misaal ek daane ki si hai jis se saat baaliyan ugen aur har baali mein sau daane hon. Aur Allah jis ke liye chahta hai use kai guna badhata hai. Aur Allah wasee hai, sab kuch jaanta hai.
2.262: Jo log apna maal Allah ke raaste mein kharch karte hain, phir us par ehsaan nahi jatate aur na takleef dete hain – unka ajar unke Rab ke paas hai, aur unhein na koi khauf hoga na woh ghamgeen honge.
2.263: Ek meethi baat aur maafi, aise sadqe se behtar hai jiske baad takleef di jaye. Aur Allah be-niyaz hai, haleem hai.
2.264: Aey logon jo imaan laaye ho! Apne sadqon ko ehsaan jatakar aur takleef dekar barbaad mat karo jaise woh shakhs jo logon ko dikhane ke liye maal kharch karta hai, aur Allah aur aakhirat par imaan nahi rakhta. Uski misaal ek uss pathar jaisi hai jis par mitti ho, phir us par tez baarish pade aur usko saaf kar de – aise log apne kiye se kuch haasil nahi karte. Aur Allah kafiron ko hidayat nahi deta.
2.265: Aur jo log Allah ki raza haasil karne ke liye aur apne dilon ke sabit qadmi se maal kharch karte hain, unki misaal ek baagh jaisi hai jo unchi jagah par ho – uspe tez baarish ho to do guna phal de, aur agar tez baarish na ho to halki si shabnam hi kafi hai. Aur Allah tumhare aamal ko dekh raha hai.
2.266: Kya tum mein se koi chahta hai ke uske paas ek baagh ho khajooron aur angooron ka, jismein har tarah ke phal ho, aur uske liye nehrein beh rahi hon, aur us mein sab kuch ho, aur us par budhapa aa jaye, aur uske chhote chhote bachche hon, phir us par aag ki aandhi chale aur usko jala de? Aise hi Allah tumhare liye nishaniyan bayaan karta hai taa ke tum ghoor o fikr karo.
2.267: Aey logon jo imaan laaye ho! Apni acchi cheezein jo tumne kamayi hain, aur jo humne tumhare liye zameen se nikali hain, un mein se kharch karo. Aur buri cheezon ka irada na karo us mein se dene ka jo tum khud lene ke liye raazi na hote, magar aankh band karke. Aur jaan lo ke Allah be-niyaz hai, tareef ke laayak hai.
2.268: Shaitaan tumhein fakr se darata hai aur tumhein bukhl ki talqeen karta hai. Aur Allah tumhein apni maghfirat aur fazl ka waada deta hai. Aur Allah wasee hai, sab kuch jaanta hai.
2.269: Woh jise chahta hai hikmat deta hai, aur jise hikmat di gayi usay bohot bada khazana mila. Magar samajhte sirf aqalmand log hain.
2.270: Jo kuch tum kharch karte ho ya koi nazar maante ho, Allah use jaanta hai. Aur zalimon ke liye koi madadgar nahi.
2.271: Agar tum sadaqat zahir karo to woh bhi acha hai, lekin agar chupke se do aur gareebon ko do to yeh tumhare liye behtar hai, aur Allah tumhari kuch buraiyon ko door kar dega. Aur Allah tumhare aamal se waqif hai.
2.272: Unhein hidayat dena tumhara kaam nahi, balki Allah jise chahta hai hidayat deta hai. Aur jo maal tum kharch karte ho, woh tumhare hi liye hai – sirf Allah ke liye hi kharch karo. Aur jo bhi tum kharch karte ho woh tumhein poora diya jaayega, aur tum par zulm nahi kiya jaayega.
2.273: Woh gareeb jo Allah ke raaste mein roke gaye hain, woh zameen mein chal nahi sakte. Naadan unhein be-niyaz samajhta hai kyun ke woh maangte nahi. Tum unhein un ke chehron se pehchaan loge – woh log logon se chipak kar nahi maangte. Aur jo kuch bhi tum kharch karte ho, Allah usay jaanta hai.
2.274: Jo log apna maal raat ko aur din mein, chhup kar aur zahir kar ke kharch karte hain – unka ajar un ke Rab ke paas hai. Unhein na koi khauf hoga na woh ghamgeen honge.
2.275: Jo log sood khate hain woh us shakhs ki tarah uthte hain jise Shaitaan ne chhoo kar deewana bana diya ho. Yeh is liye ke woh kehte hain: Bey (tijarat) bhi to sood jaisi hi hai.’ Halaankeh Allah ne tijarat ko halaal kiya hai aur sood ko haraam. Ab jise uske Rab se naseehat pohnchi aur woh ruk gaya, to jo guzra woh us ka hai, aur uska maamla Allah ke saath hai. Aur jo dobara wahi kare – to aise log dozakh mein jaayenge, jahan woh hamesha rahenge.
2.276: Allah sood ko mitaata hai aur sadaqat ko barhata hai. Aur Allah kisi na-shukre gunaahgaar ko pasand nahi karta.
2.277: Jo log imaan laaye aur neik amal kiye aur namaz qayam ki aur zakat di – un ka ajar un ke Rab ke paas hai, aur unhein na koi khauf hoga na woh ghamgeen honge.
2.278: Aey logon jo imaan laaye ho! Allah se daro aur agar tum waqai momin ho to jo kuch bhi sood baqi reh gaya ho usay chhod do.
2.279: Aur agar tum aisa nahi karte to jaan lo ke Allah aur uske Rasool se jung ke liye tayyar ho jao. Lekin agar tum toba kar lo to tumhara asal maal tumhara hai – na tum zulm karo na tum par zulm ho.
2.280: Aur agar qarzdaar tangdast ho to use uski sahulat tak mohalat do. Aur agar maaf kar do to tumhare liye zyada behtar hai agar tum jaante ho.
2.281: Aur us din se daro jab tum Allah ki taraf lautaye jaoge. Phir har shakhs ko uske amal ka poora badla diya jayega aur kisi par zulm na hoga.
2.282: Aey logon jo iman laye ho! Jab tum kisi muayyana muddat ke liye qarz lo to usay likh lo. Tumhare darmiyan koi likhne wala insaaf ke saath likhe. Na likhne wala likhne se inkaar kare jaise Allah ne usay sikhaya hai, to use likhna chahiye. Aur jis par qarz hai woh dictate kare, aur Allah se daray jo uska Rab hai, aur usmein se kuch kam na kare. Agar woh qarzdaar nadan ya kamzor ho ya khud na likhwa sakta ho to us ka wali insaaf ke saath likhwaye. Apne mardon mein se do gawah banao. Agar do mard na hon to ek mard aur do auratein ho jayein jinhen tum gawah banane par razi ho, taake agar ek bhool jaye to doosri yaad dila de. Gawah jab bulayein jayein to inkaar na karein. Tum likhne mein susti na karo chaahe woh chhota qarz ho ya bada, uski muddat tak likh lo. Yeh Allah ke nazdeek zyada insaaf par mabni hai, gawahi ke liye zyada theek hai, aur tumhare shak mein padne ka sabab nahi banta. Magar agar koi khud farokht ho jaye, ya haath ke haath sauda ho jaye to likhne mein koi harj nahi. Lekin jab bhi tum muaamla karo to gawah le lo. Na likhne wale ko nuqsan pohchaya jaye, na gawah ko. Agar tum aisa karo to yeh tumhara gunaah hoga. Allah se daro. Allah tumhein sikhata hai. Aur Allah har cheez ka ilm rakhta hai.
2.283: Aur agar tum safar mein ho aur koi likhne wala na mile to girvi (amanat) le lo. Agar tum mein se koi kisi par bharosa kare to jis par bharosa kiya gaya hai use apni amaanat ada karni chahiye aur Allah se darna chahiye, jo us ka Rab hai. Gawah ko na chhupao. Aur jo gawahi chhupaye woh uska gunaah uske dil mein chhupa hoga. Aur Allah tumhare aamal se waaqif hai.
2.284: Jo kuch aasmanon mein hai aur jo kuch zameen mein hai sab Allah ka hai. Tum jo kuch apne dil mein chupao ya zahir karo, Allah us ka hisaab lega. Phir jise chahe maaf kare aur jise chahe saza de. Aur Allah har cheez par qadir hai.
2.285: Rasool ne iman laaya us par jo uske Rab ki taraf se us par nazil hua, aur momineen ne bhi. Sab Allah, uske farishton, uski kitaabon aur uske Rasoolon par iman laye. Hum uske Rasoolon mein tafreeq nahi karte. Aur kehne lage: Humne suna aur maana. Tere maafi chahte hain, Aey Rab! Aur teri hi taraf hum ko lautna hai.
2.286: Allah kisi shakhs par uski taaqat se zyada bojh nahi daalta. Har shakhs ke liye woh hai jo usne kamaya, aur us par hai jo usne kamaya. Aey hamare Rab! Humein na pakar agar hum bhool gayein ya ghalti kar baithein. Aey hamare Rab! Hum par woh bojh na daal jo tu ne hamare pehle logon par daala tha. Aey hamare Rab! Hum par woh bojh na daal jo hamari taaqat se baahar ho. Humein baksh de, humein maaf kar de, humein rahmat de. Tu hi hamara maula hai – to kafiron par humein fatah de.

3.2: Allah, uske siwa koi maabood nahi, Zinda hai, Qayyam hai.
3.3: Usne tum par yeh Kitaab haqq ke saath nazil ki, jo pehle aayi hui kitaab ki tasdeeq karti hai, aur usne Tawrat aur Injeel bhi utari.
3.4: Is se pehle, logon ki hidayat ke liye, aur usne Furqan bhi nazil ki. Jo log Allah ki aayaton ka inkaar karte hain, unke liye sakht azaab hai. Allah zabardast hai, inteqam lene wala hai.
3.5: Allah, woh hai jisko zameen aur aasman mein jo kuch hai sab maloom hai. Tum jo chhupate ho aur jo zaahir karte ho, sab jaanta hai.
3.6: Wahi hai jo tumhein maaon ke pait mein jaisa chahe banata hai. Uske siwa koi maabood nahi, woh zabardast hai, hikmat wala hai.
3.7: Wahi hai jisne tujh par yeh kitaab nazil ki, ismein kuch aayatein mohkamaat hain, jo kitaab ki bunyaad hain, aur doosri mutashabihaat hain. Jin logon ke dilon mein tedh hai, woh mutashabihaat ke peechay padte hain fitna aur apni marzi ki taabeer ki talaash mein, jabke unka asal matlab sirf Allah jaanta hai. Ilm mein pakki raasikh log kehte hain: 'Hum is par iman laye, sab kuch hamare Rab ki taraf se hai.' Aur naseehat sirf aqalmand hi lete hain.
3.8: Aey hamare Rab! Hamare dilon ko hidayat dene ke baad tedha na kar de, aur humein apni rehmat ata farma. Tu hi sab kuch ata karne wala hai.
3.9: Aey hamare Rab! Tu yaqeenan woh hai jo sab logon ko ek din jamaa karega jismein koi shakk nahi. Allah apne waade ke khilaf nahi karta.
3.10: Yaqeenan, jin logon ne kufr kiya, unke maal aur unki aulad Allah ke muqaable mein kuch bhi kaam nahi aayenge, aur woh aag ka indhan banenge.
3.11: Unka anjaam bhi waisa hi hoga jaisa Firaun ke logon aur un se pehle walon ka hua tha. Unhon ne Allah ki aayatein jhutlayeen, toh Allah ne unke gunaahon ki wajah se unhein pakad liya. Allah sakht saza dene wala hai.
3.12: Aey Muhammad (ﷺ)! Un logon se keh do jo tumhari dawat ko qubool nahi karte, anqareeb woh maghloob honge aur jahannum ki taraf hanka jaayenge. Aur jahannum bura thikana hai.
3.13: Tumhare liye do girohon mein ek nishani thi, jo (Badr mein) aamne-saamne aaye. Ek giroh Allah ki raah mein lad raha tha, doosra kafir tha. Woh apni aankhon se dekh rahe the ke kafir giroh momin giroh se do guna hai. Lekin Allah apni madad se jise chahta hai taqat deta hai. Is mein aqalmandon ke liye sabak hai.
3.14: Logon ke liye unki khwahishaat, aurton, beton, sone-chandi ke dher, nishan lagaaye hue ghode, maweshi aur kheton ki mohabbat khubsurat bana di gayi hai. Yeh sab duniya ki chand roz ki zindagi ka samaan hai, lekin behtareen thikana Allah ke paas hai.
3.15: Kaho: Kya main tumhein un sab se behtar cheez bataoon? Jo log taqwa ikhtiyar karte hain, unke liye unke Rab ke paas aise baagh hain jinke neeche nehrein behti hain, jahan woh hamesha rahenge, paak biwiyan unke saath hongi aur Allah ki raza bhi milegi. Allah apne bandon ko khoob dekh raha hai.
3.16: Yeh woh log hain jo kehte hain: 'Aey hamare Rab! Hum imaan laye, humein hamari khataon ko maaf kar de aur humein aag ke azaab se bacha le.'
3.17: Yeh log sabr karte hain, sach bolte hain, farmabardar hain, Allah ki raah mein kharch karte hain, aur raat ke aakhri pehron mein maghfirat ki dua maangte hain.
3.18: Allah ne khud gawahi di hai ke uske siwa koi maabood nahi, aur farishton ne bhi aur ilm walon ne bhi, woh insaaf par qayam hai. Uske siwa koi maabood nahi, woh zabardast hai, hikmat wala hai.
3.19: Allah ke nazdeek deen sirf Islam hai. Jin logon ko kitaab di gayi thi, unhon ne ilm aane ke baad aapas mein zid aur hasad ki wajah se ikhtilaaf kiya. Jo Allah ki aayaton ka inkaar kare, Allah hisaab lene mein bahut tez hai.
3.20: Agar yeh log tumse jhagra karein to keh do: 'Maine aur mere pairawon ne Allah ke aage sar jhuka diya hai.' Aur ahl-e-kitaab aur ummi logon se pucho: 'Kya tum bhi Allah ke aage sar jhukate ho?' Agar woh bhi jhuk jayein to hidayat pa gaye, warna tum par sirf paigham pohanchane ki zimmedari hai. Allah apne bandon ko khoob dekh raha hai.
3.21: Jo log Allah ki aayaton ka inkaar karte hain aur paighambaron ko na-haq qatl karte hain, aur un logon ko bhi maarte hain jo insaaf ki baat karte hain, unhein dardnaak azaab ki khabar de do.
3.22: Yeh woh log hain jinke aamaal duniya aur aakhirat dono mein zaya ho gaye, aur unka koi madadgaar nahi hoga.
3.23: Kya tumne un logon ko nahi dekha jinko kitaab ka hissa diya gaya tha? Jab unhein Allah ki kitaab ki taraf bulaya jata hai taake woh unke darmiyan faisla kare, to unmein se ek giroh mooh pher leta hai aur munh mod kar chala jata hai.
3.24: Yeh is liye hai ke unhon ne kaha, 'Aag ka azaab humein kuch din hi chhooe ga.' Unke banaye hue jhoot ne unhein unke deen ke maamle mein dhoke mein daal diya hai.
3.25: Phir kya hoga jab hum unhein us din jama karenge jismein koi shak nahi, aur har shakhs ko uske kiye ka pura badla diya jayega, unpar koi zulm nahi hoga.
3.26: Kaho: Aey Allah! Tu hi hai mulk ka malik. Tu jise chahe hukumat deta hai, jise chahe hukumat cheen leta hai, jise chahe izzat deta hai, jise chahe zillat deta hai. Tere haath mein har bhalai hai. Tu har cheez par qudrat rakhta hai.
3.27: Tu raat ko din mein daakhil karta hai aur din ko raat mein daakhil karta hai. Tu murde se zinda nikalta hai aur zinde se murda nikalta hai, aur tu jise chahe be-hisab rizq deta hai.
3.28: Iman laane wale momineen, momineen ko chhod kar kafiron ko apna dost na banayein. Jo aisa karega uska Allah se koi taalluq nahi, siwaye iske ke tum unse bachne ke liye koi chaal chalo. Allah tumhein apne aap se daraata hai, aur Allah ki taraf hi laut kar jaana hai.
3.29: Kaho: Chahe tum apne dil ki baat chhupao ya zaahir karo, Allah sab kuch jaanta hai. Zameen aur aasman ki har cheez ko woh jaanta hai. Allah har cheez par qudrat rakhta hai.
3.30: Jis din har shakhs apne kiye hue neik ya buray amal ko apne saamne paayega, to chahega ke uske aur uske bure amal ke darmiyan doori ho. Allah tumhein apne aap se daraata hai, aur Allah apne bandon par meharban hai.
3.31: Kaho: Agar tum Allah se sachchi muhabbat rakhte ho, to meri pairwi karo. Allah tumse muhabbat karega aur tumhare gunaahon ko maaf kar dega. Woh bada maaf karne wala, nihayat meherban hai.
3.32: Kaho: Allah aur Rasool ki itaat qabool karo. Agar woh mooh modte hain to yaqeenan Allah aise logon ko pasand nahi karta jo uski aur uske Rasool ki itaat se inkaar karte hain.
3.33: Allah ne Adam, Nuh, Aal-e-Ibrahim aur Aal-e-Imran ko tamaam duniya walon par bartrai di.
3.34: Yeh ek silsile ke log hain, jo ek doosre ki aulad hain. Allah sab kuch sunta aur jaanta hai.
3.35: (Yaad karo) jab Imran ki biwi ne kaha: 'Aey mere Rab! Jo kuch mere pait mein hai, main usey teri nazar karti hoon, woh teri hi khidmat ke liye hoga. Mera yeh nazrana qubool farma. Beshak tu sab kuch sunne aur jaane wala hai.'
3.36: Phir jab woh bachi paida hui to usne kaha: 'Aey Rab! Mere yahan to larki paida hui hai.' Allah ko maloom tha jo kuch usne paida kiya hai, aur larka larki jaisa nahi hota. 'Maine uska naam Maryam rakha hai, aur main usey aur uski aane wali nasl ko shaitaan-e-rajim se teri panaah mein deti hoon.'
3.37: Phir uske Rab ne us larki ko khoob qubool kiya, usey achhi tarah paala aur Zakariya ko uska sarparast bana diya. Jab bhi Zakariya uske paas mehrab mein jaate, uske paas kuch khana paate. Puchte: 'Maryam! Yeh tujhe kahan se mila?' Woh kehti: 'Yeh Allah ki taraf se hai. Allah jise chahe be-hisab deta hai.'
3.38: Yeh dekh kar Zakariya ne apne Rab se dua ki: 'Aey mere Rab! Mujhe bhi apni rahmat se nek aulad ata farma. Beshak tu dua sunne wala hai.',
3.39: Phir farishton ne usay awaaz di jab woh mehrab mein namaz padh raha tha: 'Allah tujhe Yahya ki khushkhabri deta hai, jo Allah ke ek kalime ki tasdeeq karega, sardari aur paakizgi paayega, nabuwat se nawaza jaayega aur saleheen mein shamil hoga.'
3.40: Zakarriyya ne kaha: 'Parwardigar! Mujhe larka kaisay hoga jab ke mein to budha ho chuka hoon aur meri biwi baanjh hai?' Farmaya: 'Aise hi Allah jo chahe karta hai.'
3.41: Kaha: 'Parwardigar! Mujhe koi nishani de.' Farmaya: 'Tumhari nishani yeh hai ke tum teen din tak logon se sirf ishaare se baat karoge. Apne Rab ko bohot yaad karo aur subah shaam uski tasbeeh karo.'
3.42: Aur (yaad karo) jab farishton ne kaha: 'Ai Maryam! Allah ne tumhein chuna, paak banaya, aur tamaam duniya ki auraton par tumhein bartrari di.'
3.43: Ai Maryam! Apne Rab ke aage sar-e-tasleem kham karo, sajda karo aur ruku karne walon ke saath ruku karo.
3.44: Yeh ghaib ki khabrein hain jo hum tum par wahee ke zariye bhejte hain, jab woh log apne qalam daal rahe thay ke Maryam ki kafalat kaun karega, tum unke paas na thay, aur na hi tum us waqt unke paas thay jab woh jhagad rahe thay.
3.45: Aur (yaad karo) jab farishton ne kaha: 'Ai Maryam! Allah tumhein apne ek kalma ki basharat deta hai, jiska naam Maseeh Isa ibn-e-Maryam hoga. Duniya aur aakhirat mein waajeh o muqarram hoga, aur woh Allah ke muqarrabeen mein se hoga.'
3.46: Woh logon se gehware mein bhi baat karega aur bade hone par bhi, aur woh saleheen mein se hoga.
3.47: Maryam ne kaha: 'Parwardigar! Mujhe larka kaise hoga jab ke mujhe kisi mard ne chhua tak nahi?' Farmaya: 'Aise hi Allah jo chahe paida karta hai. Jab woh kisi kaam ka faisla karta hai to kehta hai ke ho ja, to woh ho jata hai.'
3.48: Aur Allah use kitaab aur hikmat aur Taurat aur Injeel sikhaayega.
3.49: Aur (woh hoga) Allah ka Rasool Bani Israeel ki taraf. (Woh kahega) 'Main tumhare paas tumhare Rab ki taraf se nishani le kar aaya hoon: main mitti se ek parinday ka shakal banata hoon, phir us mein phoonk maar deta hoon to woh Allah ke hukum se udhne lagta hai; main mardo ko theek karta hoon aur kohne ko bhi, aur murdon ko zinda karta hoon Allah ke hukum se; aur jo kuch tum khaate ho aur jo apne gharon mein zakheera karte ho, woh tumhein batata hoon. Agar tum momin ho to yeh sab mere Rab ki taraf se nishaniyan hain.'
3.50: Aur main tasdeeq karne wala hoon us Taurat ka jo mujh se pehle aayi, aur tumhare liye kuch wo cheezein halal karne aaya hoon jo tum par haram kar di gayi thi, aur main tumhare Rab ki taraf se nishani le kar aaya hoon. To Allah se daro aur meri itaat karo.
3.51: Beshak Allah hi mera Rab hai aur tumhara bhi. To usi ki ibadat karo. Yahi seedha raasta hai.
3.52: Phir jab Isa ne unki nafarmani mehsoos ki to kaha: 'Kaun hai jo Allah ke raaste mein mera madadgaar banega?' Hawariyon ne kaha: 'Hum Allah ke madadgaar hain. Hum Allah par imaan laye. Tum gawah ban jao ke hum Musalman hain.'
3.53: 'Parwardigar! Jo kuch toone naazil kiya hum us par imaan laye aur Rasool ki pairwi ki. To humein gawahon mein likh le.'
3.54: Aur unhon ne (Isa ke khilaaf) chalaaki ki, aur Allah ne bhi apni chaal chali, aur Allah behtareen chaal chalne wala hai.
3.55: Jab Allah ne farmaya: 'Ai Isa! Main tujhe wafat dene wala hoon aur apne paas uthane wala hoon, aur tujhe un logon se paak kar doonga jinhon ne kufr kiya, aur un logon ko jo teri pairwi karenge, qayamat tak un logon par jo teri mukhalifat karte hain, baland rakhunga. Phir tum sab mere paas lautaye jaoge, us waqt main tumhare darmiyan faisla karunga jismein tum ikhtilaf karte thay.'
3.56: Pas jin logon ne kufr kiya unhein duniya aur aakhirat mein sakht azaab dunga, aur unka koi madadgaar na hoga.
3.57: Aur jo log imaan laye aur neik amal kiye to Allah unhein unka pura ajar dega. Aur Allah zalimon ko pasand nahi karta.
3.58: Yeh wahi aayatein hain jo hum tumhein sachai ke saath suna rahe hain, aur Allah kisi par zulm ka irada nahi rakhta.
3.59: Beshak Isa ki misaal Allah ke nazdeek Adam ki misaal ki tarah hai. Usne use mitti se banaya, phir kaha: ho ja, to woh ho gaya.
3.60: Yeh sab haq hai tere Rab ki taraf se. Pas tu shak karne walon mein na ho.
3.61: Jo log tumse is maamle mein jhagadte hain, iske baad ke tumhare paas ilm aa chuka hai, to unse keh do: 'Aao hum bula lein apne beton ko aur tumhare beton ko, apni auraton ko aur tumhari auraton ko, apne aap ko aur tum apne aap ko, phir dua karein aur Allah ki laanat bhejein jhooton par.'
3.62: Beshak yeh sachchi baat hai, aur Allah ke siwa koi mabood nahi, aur beshak Allah hi sab par galib aur hakeem hai.
3.63: Pas agar woh mooh moad lein to Allah fasad karne walon ko khoob jaanta hai.
3.64: Kaho: 'Ai Ahl-e-Kitaab! Aao ek baat ki taraf jo hamare aur tumhare darmiyan mushtarika hai: ke hum Allah ke siwa kisi ki ibadat na karein, uske saath kisi ko shareek na thahrayein, aur hum mein se koi kisi ko Allah ke siwa Rab na banaye.' Agar woh mooh moadein to keh do: 'Gawah raho ke hum Musalman hain.'
3.65: Ai Ahl-e-Kitaab! Tum Ibrahim ke baare mein kyun jhagadte ho, halaanke Taurat aur Injeel to uske baad naazil hui thi? Kya tum nahi samajhte?
3.66: Tum aise maamle mein jhagadte ho jiska tumhein ilm hai, phir us maamle mein kyun jhagadte ho jiska tumhein ilm nahi? Allah jaanta hai, tum nahi jaante.
3.67: Ibrahim na Yahudi tha na Nasrani, balki ek Allah ka farma bardar Musalman tha, aur woh mushrikon mein se na tha.
3.68: Logon mein sab se zyada haq daar Ibrahim ke un logon mein se hain jinhon ne uski pairwi ki, aur yeh Nabi aur woh log jo imaan laye, aur Allah momineen ka wali hai.
3.69: Ahl-e-Kitaab ka ek giroh chahta hai ke kaise bhi tumhein gumrah kardein, halaanke woh sirf apne aap ko gumrah kar rahe hain, aur samajhte nahi.
3.70: Ai Ahl-e-Kitaab! Tum Allah ki aayaton ka inkaar kyun karte ho, halaanke tum gawah ho?
3.71: Ai Ahl-e-Kitaab! Tum haq ko baatil ke saath kyun milate ho aur haq ko chhupate ho halaanke tum jaante ho?
3.72: Ahl-e-Kitaab ka ek giroh kehta hai: 'Iman lao jo kuch Musalmanon par naazil hua subah ke waqt, aur sham ko iska inkaar kar do, shayad ke woh bhi palat jaayein.'
3.73: Aur kehte hain: 'Kisi par imaan na lao magar us par jo tumhare deen ka paabi hai.' Kaho: 'Hidayat to Allah ki hidayat hai,' (aur yeh baat woh is liye kehte hain) ke kahin kisi ko wahi kuch na mil jaaye jo tumhein mila tha, ya kahin woh tumse Allah ke huzoor jhagad na lein. Kaho: 'Fazl to Allah ke haath mein hai, jise chahe deta hai. Aur Allah wasee hai, sab kuch jaane wala hai.'
3.74: Woh apni rehmat ke liye jise chahta hai khaas kar leta hai, aur Allah badi fazl wala hai.
3.75: Ahl-e-Kitaab mein kuch aise hain ke agar unhein tum ek dhela bhi de do to woh tumhein wapas na dein, magar jab tak un par khara na ho jao. Yeh is liye ke woh kehte hain: 'Hum par un logon ke muqablay mein (jinhon ne Islam qabool kiya) koi zimmedari nahi.' Aur Allah ke naam ka jhooth bolte hain, jaante boojhte.
3.76: Jo shakhs apne ahad ko poora karta hai aur taqwa ikhtiyar karta hai, to Allah aise muttaqi logon ko pasand karta hai.
3.77: Jo log Allah ke ahad aur apni qasmon ko thodi si keemat par bechte hain, unke liye aakhirat mein koi hissa nahi, aur na Allah un se baat karega, aur na unki taraf dekhega qayamat ke din, aur na unhein paak karega, aur unke liye dardnaak azaab hai.
3.78: Aur un mein se ek giroh aisa hai jo kitaab ko mooh ghooma ghooma kar padhta hai taa ke tum samjho ke yeh kitaab mein se hai, halaanke yeh kitaab mein se nahi hota. Aur kehte hain ke yeh Allah ki taraf se hai, halaanke yeh Allah ki taraf se nahi hota. Aur Allah ke naam ka jhoot bolte hain, jaante boojhte.
3.79: Yeh kisi bashar ke liye mumkin nahi ke Allah usko kitaab aur hukm aur nabuwat de aur phir woh logon se kahe ke Allah ko chhod kar mere bande bano. Balki woh to kahega: 'Rabbani bano, ke tum kitaab ko seekhte ho aur padhaate ho.'
3.80: Aur na woh yeh hukm dega ke tum farishte aur nabiyon ko apna Rab bana lo. Kya woh tumhein kufr ka hukm dega baad iske ke tum Musalman ho chuke ho?
