3.81: Aur jab Allah ne paighambaron se ahad liya: 'Jo kuch main tumhein kitaab aur hikmat doon, phir tumhare paas ek Rasool aaye jo tumhari di gayi kitaab ki tasdeeq kare, to tum us par zaroor imaan lana aur uski zaroor madad karna.' Farmaya: 'Kya tum iqraar karte ho aur is par mera mazboot ahad lete ho?' Unhon ne kaha: 'Hum iqraar karte hain.' Farmaya: 'To gawah raho, aur main bhi tumhare saath gawahon mein hoon.'
3.82: Ab jo iske baad mooh moade to wahi faasiq hai.
3.83: Kya ab bhi Allah ke deen ke siwa kisi aur deen ko chahte ho? Halaanke jo kuch aasmanon aur zameen mein hai, khushi ya majboori se usi ke aage jhuka hua hai, aur usi ki taraf sab lautaye jaayenge.
3.84: Kaho: 'Hum Allah par imaan laye, aur us par jo hum par naazil hua, aur jo Ibrahim, Ismail, Ishaq, Yaqub aur unki aulad par naazil hua, aur jo Musa, Isa aur baqi paighambaron ko unke Rab ki taraf se diya gaya – hum inmein se kisi ke darmiyan tafreeq nahi karte, aur hum usi ke farma bardar hain.'
3.85: Aur jo koi Islam ke siwa kisi aur deen ko talaash karega, to woh us se kabool na kiya jaayega, aur woh aakhirat mein nuqsaan uthaanay walon mein se hoga.
3.86: Allah aise logon ko kaise hidayat de jo imaan la kar phir kufr kar baithe, halaanke woh gawahi de chuke ke Rasool sach hai, aur unke paas khuli nishaniyan aa chuki thi? Allah zalimon ko hidayat nahi deta.
3.87: Aise logon ki saza yeh hai ke unpar Allah, farishton aur tamaam insano ki laanat hai.
3.88: Woh ismein hamesha rahenge. Na unka azaab halka kiya jaayega, aur na unhein mohallat di jaayegi.
3.89: Magar jo uske baad tauba kar le aur apni islaah kar le, to beshak Allah bada bakshne wala, meharban hai.
3.90: Beshak jo log imaan la kar phir kufr kar baithe, phir badhte gaye kufr mein – unki tauba kabhi kabul na ki jaayegi. Aur yahi log gumrah hain.
3.91: Beshak jo log kufr mein mar gaye, agar woh poori zameen bhar sona dekar apne aap ko azaab se chhudaana chaahein to bhi qabool na kiya jaayega. Inke liye dardnaak azaab hai, aur unka koi madadgaar na hoga.
3.92: Tum kabhi neeki ko nahi paa sakte jab tak ke Allah ke raaste mein apni woh cheez na do jo tumhein sab se zyada pyaari hai. Aur jo kuch tum dete ho, Allah use jaanta hai.
3.93: Har khana Bani Israeel ke liye halal tha siwa uske jo Israeel ne khud apne upar haraam kar liya tha, Taurat ke naazil hone se pehle. Kaho: 'Taurat lao aur usse padh kar sunao agar tum sachche ho.'
3.94: Phir jo iske baad bhi jhoot ghade to woh zaalim hain.
3.95: Kaho: 'Allah sach keh raha hai, to Ibrahim ke deen ki pairwi karo – jo ek haneef Musalman tha aur mushrikon mein se na tha.'
3.96: Beshak sab se pehla ghar jo logon ke liye banaya gaya woh wahi hai jo Makkah mein hai, barkat wala aur tamaam jahon ke liye hidayat hai.
3.97: Us mein khuli nishaniyan hain, Maqam-e-Ibrahim hai, aur jo us mein dakhil ho gaya woh mehfooz ho gaya. Aur logon par Allah ke liye yeh farz hai ke jo us tak rasta paa sake woh us ghar ka hajj kare. Aur jo inkaar kare to Allah sab se be-niyaz hai, jahon se.
3.98: Kaho: 'Ai Ahl-e-Kitaab! Tum Allah ki aayaton ka inkaar kyun karte ho, halaanke Allah tumhare sab aamaal ka gawaah hai?'
3.99: Kaho: 'Ai Ahl-e-Kitaab! Tum momineen ko Allah ke raaste se kyun rokte ho, usmein tedh dhoondhte ho, halaanke tum gawah ho? Allah tumhare kartooton se bekhabar nahi hai.'
3.100: Ai logon jo imaan laye ho! Agar tum Ahl-e-Kitaab ke ek giroh ki baat maano to woh tumhein imaan laane ke baad phir se kafir bana denge.
3.101: Aur tum kaise kufr kar sakte ho jab ke tum par Allah ki aayatein padhi ja rahi hain, aur tum mein uska Rasool maujood hai? Aur jo Allah se waabasta ho gaya, woh seedhi raah paa gaya.
3.102: Ai logon jo imaan laye ho! Allah se daro jaise us se darna chahiye, aur marna sirf Musalmaan hokar.
3.103: Aur sab milkar Allah ki rassi ko mazbooti se thaam lo, aur tafreeq mein na pado. Aur yaad karo Allah ka woh ehsaan jo usne tum par kiya ke tum aapas mein dushman thay to usne tumhare dilon mein mohabbat daal di, to tum uske fazl se bhai bhai ban gaye. Aur tum aag ke gaddhe ke kinare par thay, to Allah ne tumhein us se bacha liya. Is tarah Allah tumhare liye apni nishaniyan wazeh karta hai taa ke tum hidayat pao.
3.104: Aur tum mein se ek giroh aisa ho jo neiki ki taraf bulaye, achhe ka hukm de aur burai se roke. Aur yahi log falaah paane wale hain.
3.105: Aur un logon ki tarah na ho jao jo tafreeq mein pad gaye aur jhagde mein pad gaye uske baad ke unke paas khuli nishaniyan aa chuki thin. Aur aise logon ke liye bada azaab hai.
3.106: Jis din kuch chehre roshan honge aur kuch chehre siyah honge. To jinke chehre siyah honge (unse kaha jaayega): 'Kya tum imaan laane ke baad kufr kar baithe? To chakkho azaab kufr karne ke badle.'
3.107: Aur jinke chehre roshan honge to woh Allah ki rehmat mein honge, jismein woh hamesha rahenge.
3.108: Yeh Allah ki aayatein hain jo hum tumhein sachai ke saath suna rahe hain. Aur Allah jahon par zulm nahi chahta.
3.109: Aasmanon aur zameen mein jo kuch hai sab Allah ka hai, aur sab ka maamla Allah ki taraf lautaya jaayega.
3.110: Tum behtareen ummat ho jo logon ke liye nikali gayi, tum achhai ka hukm dete ho, burai se rokte ho, aur Allah par imaan rakhte ho. Agar Ahl-e-Kitaab imaan late to unke liye behtar hota. Unmein kuch momin hain, lekin zyadatar faasiq hain.
3.111: Woh tumhein chot nahi pahucha sakte magar zara si, aur agar woh tumse ladte bhi hain to peeth pher kar bhaag jaayenge, phir unhein madad na milegi.
3.112: Un par zillat thopi gayi jahan bhi paaye gaye, siwa Allah ke zamaan ya logon ke zamaan ke. Woh Allah ke gazab ke mustahiq hue, aur un par zaleel o ruswaai thopi gayi, yeh is wajah se ke woh Allah ke aayaton ka inkaar karte aur paighambaron ko najaayaz taur par qatl karte, yeh is liye ke woh nafarmani karte aur hadd se badhte.
3.113: Sab Ahl-e-Kitaab ek jaise nahi. Un mein kuch log hain jo seedhe hain, raat ke waqt Allah ki aayatein padhtay hain aur sajda karte hain.
3.114: Woh Allah aur aakhri din par imaan rakhte hain, neiki ka hukm dete hain, burai se rokte hain, aur neik kaamon mein aage barhte hain – yahi log saleh logon mein se hain.
3.115: Aur woh jo neik kaam karte hain, unka ajar un se kabhi chhupaya na jaayega, aur Allah parheizgaaron ko khoob jaanta hai.
3.116: Jin logon ne kufr kiya unke maal aur unki aulad unhein Allah ke azaab se kuch bhi na bacha sakegi, aur woh dozakh mein daakhil kiye jaayenge, jahan woh hamesha rahenge.
3.117: Jo kuch woh is duniya ki zindagi mein kharch karte hain uski misaal us hawa jaisi hai jismein sardi ho aur woh un logon ke kheton par chale jin logon ne apne upar zulm kiya ho, to usne unhe barbaad kar diya – Allah ne unpar zulm nahi kiya, balke woh khud apne upar zulm karte hain.
3.118: Ai logon jo imaan laye ho! Ghairon ko apna raazdar na banao. Woh tumhare nuksan mein koi kasar nahi chhodte. Woh chaahte hain ke tum musibat mein padh jao. Unki dushmani unke mooh se zaahir hai, aur jo kuch unke seene mein chhupa hai woh aur bhi bada hai. Humne tumhare liye nishaniyan wazeh kar di hain agar tum samajh sako.
3.119: Lo! Tumhi unse mohabbat karte ho, lekin woh tumse mohabbat nahi karte, aur tum puri kitaab par imaan rakhte ho, aur jab woh tumse milte hain to kehte hain: 'Hum bhi imaan laaye', aur jab akele hote hain to gusse se ungliyaan chabate hain. Kaho: 'Apne gusse mein mar jao.' Beshak Allah dilon ke haal jaanta hai.
3.120: Agar tumhein bhalai pahunchti hai to unhein bura lagta hai, aur agar tumhein takleef hoti hai to woh khush hote hain. Agar tum sabr karo aur taqwa ikhtiyar karo to unki chaalein tumhein koi nuqsan nahi pohcha sakti. Beshak Allah unke aamaal par haavi hai.
3.121: Aur (yaad karo) jab tum subah sawere apne ghar se nikal kar momineen ko ladne ke liye jagah par muqarrar kar rahe thay – aur Allah sab kuch sunta jaanta hai.
3.122: Jab tum mein se do giroh ka iraada hua ke woh peeth pher jaayein, halaanke Allah unka madadgaar tha. To momineen ko chahiye ke Allah par hi bharosa rakhein.
3.123: Aur Allah ne tumhari madad ki Badr mein jab ke tum kamzoor thay – to Allah se daro, taa ke shukar guzaar bano.
3.124: Jab tum momineen se keh rahe thay: 'Kya tumhare liye yeh kaafi nahi ke tumhara Rab teen hazaar farishton se tumhari madad kare jo utarein?'
3.125: Haan, agar tum sabr karo aur taqwa ikhtiyar karo, aur woh log turant tum par aa padhte hain to tumhara Rab paanch hazaar nishan lagaaye hue farishton se tumhari madad karega.
3.126: Aur yeh baat Allah ne sirf is liye ki ke tumhein khushi ho aur tumhare dil mutmain ho jaayein. Aur madad to sirf Allah ki taraf se hoti hai, jo zabardast, hikmat wala hai.
3.127: Taa ke woh kaafir logon ke ek hisse ko kaat de ya unhein zaleel kar de ke woh naakaam ho kar laut jaayein.
3.128: Tumhara is maamle mein koi ikhtiyar nahi – chahe Allah unhein maaf kare ya unhein azaab de, kyunki woh zaalim hain.
3.129: Aur Allah ke liye hai jo kuch aasmanon aur zameen mein hai, jise chahe maaf kare aur jise chahe azaab de – aur Allah bada bakshne wala, meharban hai.
3.130: Ai logon jo imaan laye ho! Sood mat khao, do guna, teen guna kar ke – aur Allah se daro taa ke tum falaah pao.
3.131: Aur us aag se bacho jo kaafiron ke liye taiyaar ki gayi hai.
3.132: Aur Allah aur Rasool ki itaat karo taa ke tum par rahm kiya jaaye.
3.133: Aur daudo us maghfirat aur jannat ki taraf jo aasmaanon aur zameen ke barabar hai, jo muttaqiyon ke liye taiyaar ki gayi hai.
3.134: Woh jo kushhali mein aur tangdasti mein kharch karte hain, aur gusse ko rokte hain, aur logon ko maaf kar dete hain – aur Allah neko kaaron se muhabbat karta hai.
3.135: Aur woh jo jab koi bura kaam kar baithein ya apne upar zulm kar baithen to Allah ko yaad karte hain, aur apne gunahon ki maafi maangte hain – aur Allah ke siwa kaun gunah maaf kare? – aur woh jaane boojhe apne kiye par israr nahi karte.
3.136: Unhi ka badla unke Rab ki taraf se yeh hai: jannatein, jinke neeche nehrein behti hain, jahan woh hamesha rahenge – aur yeh hai neik amal karne walon ka ajar.
3.137: Tumse pehle bhi bohot si ummatein guzar chuki hain, to rooh zameen mein ghoom kar dekho ke jhuthlanewalon ka kya anjaam hua.
3.138: Yeh logon ke liye bayan hai, aur muttaqiyon ke liye hidayat aur naseehat hai.
3.139: Aur na tum kamzor padho, aur na gham karo – agar tum momin ho to tumhi ghalib rahoge.
3.140: Agar tumhein chot lagi hai to usi tarah un logon ko bhi chot lagi thi – aur yeh din hum logon ke darmiyan ghoomate rehte hain – taa ke Allah un logon ko pehchaan le jo imaan laye, aur tum mein se kuchon ko shaheed kare – aur Allah zaalimon ko pasand nahi karta.
3.141: Aur taa ke Allah imaan laane walon ko chhan le, aur kaafiron ko mitaa de.
3.142: Kya tum yeh samajhte ho ke tum jannat mein chale jaoge halaanke Allah ne abhi tak un logon ko nahi pehchaana jo tum mein se jihad karte hain, aur na he sabr karne walon ko pehchana?
3.143: Aur beshak tum maut ki tamanna karte thay is se pehle ke tum us se do char ho – to ab tumne use dekha aankhon se.
3.144: Aur Muhammad to sirf ek Rasool hain – unse pehle bhi bohot se Rasool guzar chuke hain – to kya agar woh wafat paa jaayein ya shaheed kar diye jaayein to tum ulat jaoge apni peethon par? Aur jo koi ulat gaya to Allah ko kuch nuksan nahi pohcha sakega – aur Allah shukar guzaaron ko jaza dega.
3.145: Aur kisi jaan ke liye mumkin nahi ke woh mare magar Allah ke hukum se, ek muqarrar waqt par – aur jo dunya ka inaam chahe hum use denge, aur jo aakhirat ka inaam chahe hum use bhi denge – aur hum shukar guzaaron ko jaza denge.
3.146: Aur kitne hi paighambar hue jinke saath bohot se Allah waale laday, to na woh himmat haare jo kuch un par Allah ke raaste mein aaya, na kamzor padhe aur na jhuk gaye – aur Allah sabr karne walon se muhabbat karta hai.
3.147: Aur unka kehna sirf yeh tha: 'Ai hamare Rab! Humein baksh de, aur hamare aamaal mein jo kami reh gayi usko door kar de, aur humein sabit qadam rakh, aur kaafiron ke muqable mein humein madad de.'
3.148: To Allah ne unhein duniya ka ajar bhi diya aur aakhirat ka bhi behtareen ajar – aur Allah neki karne walon se muhabbat karta hai.
3.149: Ai logon jo imaan laye ho! Agar tum un logon ki baat maano jo kufr mein ghuse hue hain to woh tumhein peeche ulat kar kafir bana denge, phir tum nuqsan uthane walon mein se ho jaoge.
3.150: Balki Allah tumhara madadgaar hai, aur woh behtareen madad karne wala hai.
3.151: Hum un logon ke dilon mein jin logon ne shirk kiya, roab daal denge, is wajah se ke unhon ne Allah ke siwa aise ko shareek banaya jiske liye Allah ne koi sanad nahi utaari. Aur unka thikaana dozakh hai, aur woh zalimon ka bura thikaana hai.
3.152: Aur beshak Allah ne tumse apna waada sach kar dikhaya jab tum unke hukm se unhein maar rahe thay, yahaan tak ke jab tum kamzori dikhaane lage aur us kaam mein jhagadne lage aur hukm ke baad uski nafarmani ki – kuch log duniya ke chahne wale thay aur kuch aakhirat ke. Phir Allah ne tumhein unse mooh mor kar hata diya taa ke tumhein aazmaaye – aur usne tumhein maaf kar diya. Aur Allah momineen par fazl farmane wala hai.
3.153: Jab tum bhaag rahe thay aur kisi ki taraf palat kar nahi dekh rahe thay, aur Rasool tumhein peeche se bula rahe thay – phir Allah ne tumhein gham ke baad gham diya taa ke na to kisi cheez par afsos karo jo tumse nikal gayi aur na kisi museebat par jo tum par aayi – aur Allah tumhare aamaal se baakhabar hai.
3.154: Phir us gham ke baad Allah ne tum par sukoon utaara – aisi neend jo tum mein se kuchon par chhayi – aur doosre log thay jo apni jaanon ki fikr mein uljhe huye thay, woh Allah ke bare mein jaahiliyat ka gumaan kar rahe thay – kehte thay: Kya hamara is maamle mein koi ikhtiyar hai?’ Kaho: Saara ikhtiyar sirf Allah ke haath mein hai.’ Woh jo kuch apne dilon mein chhupate hain tum par zaahir nahi karte. Kehte hain: Agar hamara koi ikhtiyar hota to hum yahan na maare jaate.’ Kaho: Agar tum apne gharon mein bhi hote to jinki qismat mein qatl likha gaya tha woh nikal kar usi jagah aa jaate.’ Aur yeh is liye hua taa ke Allah tumhare dilon ka imtihaan le aur jo kuch tumhare seene mein hai use saaf kare. Aur Allah dilon ke haal jaanta hai.
3.155: Jo log tum mein se us din peeth pher gaye jab do lashkaron ka saamna hua, to unhein shaytan ne unke kuch aamaal ke sabab se phisla diya – magar Allah ne unhein maaf kar diya. Beshak Allah bada bakshne wala, burdbaar hai.
3.156: Ai logon jo imaan laye ho! Un logon ki tarah na ho jao jinhon ne kufr kiya, aur apne bhaiyon ke bare mein jab woh safar par gaye ya jihad mein gaye to kehne lage: Agar woh hamare paas hote to na marte, na maare jaate.’ Taa ke Allah ise unke dilon mein afsos ka sabab bana de. Aur Allah zindagi deta hai aur maut deta hai. Aur Allah jo kuch tum karte ho uska dekhne wala hai.
3.157: Aur agar tum Allah ke raaste mein maare jao ya mar jao to Allah ki taraf se maafi aur rehmat un sab se behtar hai jo woh jama karte hain.
3.158: Aur agar tum mar jao ya maare jao to tum sab Allah ki taraf hi jama kiye jaoge.
3.159: Allah ke fazl se tum unke liye narm dil hue. Agar tum sakht mizaaj aur sakht dil hote to woh tumhare paas se bhag jaate. To unhein maaf kar do, unke liye maafi ki dua maango, aur maamla mein unse mashwara lo. Phir jab kisi baat ka irada kar lo to Allah par bharosa karo. Beshak Allah bharosa karne walon ko pasand karta hai.
3.160: Agar Allah tumhari madad kare to koi tum par galib nahi aa sakta. Aur agar woh tumhein chhod de to kaun hai jo uske baad tumhari madad kare? To momineen ko sirf Allah par bharosa rakhna chahiye.
3.161: Kisi Nabi ke liye yeh mumkin nahi ke woh khyanat kare. Aur jo koi khyanat kare to woh qayamat ke din apne kiye ko lekar aayega. Phir har ek ko uske kiye ka poora badla diya jaayega – aur un par zulm nahi kiya jaayega.
3.162: Kya woh shakhs jo Allah ki raza ka mutaabi ho gaya woh us ke barabar ho sakta hai jo Allah ka gazab le kar aaya aur jiska thikaana jahannam hai? Aur woh badtareen manzil hai.
3.163: Allah ke nazdeek logon ke darjaat hain. Aur Allah un sab ke aamaal ko dekh raha hai.
3.164: Beshak Allah ne momineen par ehsaan kiya jab un mein unhi mein se ek Rasool bheja jo unhein uski aayatein sunata hai, unhein paak karta hai, aur unhein kitaab aur hikmat sikhata hai, halaanke woh is se pehle khuli gumraahi mein thay.
3.165: Kya jab tumhein ek museebat lagi – halaanke tumne dushman ko do guna takleef pohchayi – to tum kehne lage: Yeh kahan se aayi?’ Kaho: Yeh tumhare apne hi paas se aayi.’ Beshak Allah har cheez par qudrat rakhta hai.
3.166: Aur jo kuch tumpar gham ke din hua, woh Allah ke hukum se tha taa ke woh momineen ko pehchaan le.
3.167: Aur taa ke woh un logon ko bhi pehchaan le jo munaafiq hain. Unse kaha gaya: Aao Allah ke raaste mein jihad karo ya (kam az kam) apna difa karo.’ Unhon ne kaha: Agar hum jaante ke ladayi hogi to hum zaroor tumhare saath chalte.’ Woh us din imaan ke muqablay mein kufr ke zyada qareeb thay. Woh apne munh se woh keh rahe thay jo unke dilon mein nahi tha. Aur Allah jaanta hai jo kuch woh chhupate hain.
3.168: Jo log ghar baithe rahe aur apne bhaiyon ke bare mein kehne lage: Agar woh hamari baat maante to na maare jaate.’ Kaho: Agar tum sachche ho to apni jaan se maut ko hata do.’
3.169: Aur jo log Allah ke raaste mein shaheed hue unhein murda na samjho – balki woh zinda hain, apne Rab ke paas rizq paa rahe hain.
3.170: Allah ke fazl mein jo unhein mila us par woh khush hain, aur un logon ke liye bhi khushi mana rahe hain jo abhi tak unke paas nahi pahunche – ke unhein koi khauf na hoga aur na woh ghamgeen honge.
3.171: Woh Allah ke inaam aur fazl ki khushi mana rahe hain, aur yeh ke Allah momineen ke ajar ko zaya nahi karta.
3.172: Jinhon ne Allah aur Rasool ka hukm mana uske baad ke unhein zakham lag chuka tha – jo unmein se neiki aur taqwa par qayam rahe, unke liye bada ajar hai.
3.173: Woh log jinhon ne kaha: Logon ne tumhare khilaaf lashkar jama kiya hai, to unse daro’ – to unka imaan aur badh gaya, aur unhon ne kaha: Humein Allah kaafi hai, aur kya hi behtareen kaar-saz hai.’
3.174: Phir woh Allah ke fazl aur uski meharbani ke saath palat gaye, unhein koi takleef na pahunchee, aur unhon ne Allah ki raza haasil ki. Aur Allah bada fazl farmane wala hai.
3.175: Yeh to sirf shaytan hai jo apne doston se tumhein darata hai – to tum unse na daro, balki mujh se daro agar tum momin ho.
3.176: Aur jo log kufr mein tez bhagte hain woh tumhein ghamzada na karein. Beshak woh Allah ko kuch bhi nuqsan nahi pahuncha sakte. Allah chahta hai ke unke liye aakhirat mein koi hissa na ho, aur unke liye bada azaab hai.
3.177: Jo log imaan ke badle kufr khareed lete hain woh Allah ko kuch bhi nuqsan nahi pahuncha sakte, aur unke liye dardnaak azaab hai.
3.178: Aur kafir yeh na samjhein ke hum unhein mohallat de rahe hain to yeh unke liye behtar hai – hum to unhein sirf is liye mohallat de rahe hain taa ke woh gunaah mein aur barh jaayein – aur unke liye zillat ka azaab hai.
3.179: Allah momineen ko is halat par chhodne wala nahi jab tak ke saaf na kar de achhon ko bure logon se. Aur na hi Allah tumhein ghaib ka ilm dene wala hai, lekin woh apne Rasoolon mein se jise chahta hai chunta hai. To Allah aur uske Rasoolon par imaan lao. Agar tum imaan lao aur taqwa ikhtiyar karo to tumhare liye bada ajar hai.
3.180: Aur jin logon ko Allah ne apne fazl se kuch diya, aur woh us mein bukhl karte hain – to woh yeh na samjhein ke yeh unke liye behtar hai, balke yeh unke liye bura hai – jiska woh bukhl kar rahe hain woh qayamat ke din unki gardan mein taouq banaya jaayega. Aur aasmanon aur zameen ka waris Allah hai – aur Allah tumhare aamaal se baakhabar hai.
3.181: Beshak Allah ne un logon ki baat suni jinhon ne kaha: Allah mohtaaj hai aur hum ameer hain.’ Hum unki yeh baat aur paighambaron ko be-gunaah qatl karne ko likh lenge, aur keh denge: Chakkho jala dene wale azaab ka maza.’
3.182: Yeh us kaam ka badla hai jo tumhare haathon ne aage bheja – aur Allah apne bandon par zulm nahi karta.
3.183: Jinhon ne kaha: Allah ne humse ahad liya hai ke hum kisi Rasool par imaan na laayen jab tak woh aisi qurbani na laaye jise aag kha jaaye.’ Kaho: Mujh se pehle tumhare paas kai Rasool aise aaye jo khuli nishaniyan aur yeh baat bhi le kar aaye, to phir tumne unhein kyun qatl kiya agar tum sachche ho?’
3.184: Agar woh tumhein jhutlaate hain to tumse pehle bhi kai Rasool jhutlaye ja chuke hain jo khuli nishaniyan, suhuf aur roshan kitaab le kar aaye.
3.185: Har jaan ko maut ka maza chakhna hai – aur tumhein tumhara poora ajar qayamat ke din diya jaayega – jo koi dozakh se bacha liya gaya aur jannat mein daakhil ho gaya woh hi kaamyaab hai – aur duniya ki zindagi to sirf ek dhokay ka saamaan hai.
3.186: Tum zaroor aazmaye jaaoge apne maal, apni jaanon mein, aur zaroor tumhein un logon se jo tumse pehle kitaab diye gaye, aur mushrikon se takleef de baatein sunni padengi. Aur agar tum sabr karo aur taqwa ikhtiyar karo to yeh kaamon mein se azmat waala hai.
3.187: Aur (yaad karo) jab Allah ne un logon se ahad liya jinhon ko kitaab di gayi ke use logon se wazeh bayaan karna aur chhupana nahi’, to unhon ne ise peeth peeche daal diya aur uske badle thoda sa faida le liya – to kitna bura hai jo woh khareed rahe hain.
3.188: Jo log apne kaamon par khush hote hain, aur chahte hain ke jo kaam unhon ne nahi kiya us par bhi unki tareef ki jaaye – to tum na samjho ke woh azaab se bache rahenge – unke liye dardnaak azaab hai.
3.189: Aasmanon aur zameen ki baadshaahi Allah ke haath mein hai, aur Allah har cheez par qudrat rakhta hai.
3.190: Beshak aasmanon aur zameen ke paida karne mein, aur raat aur din ke badalte rehne mein, aqal walon ke liye nishaniyan hain.
3.191: Jo log khade, baithe, aur lete hue Allah ko yaad karte hain, aur aasmanon aur zameen ke paidaish mein tafakkur karte hain: Ai hamare Rab! Tu ne yeh sab bekaar nahi banaya – tu paak hai – humein dozakh ke azaab se bacha le.’
3.192: Ai hamare Rab! Jise tu dozakh mein daale use to tu ne ruswa kar diya, aur zalimon ka koi madadgaar nahi.’
3.193: Ai hamare Rab! Humne ek pukaarne wale ko suna jo imaan lane ko keh raha tha ke apne Rab par imaan lao’, to hum imaan le aaye. Ai hamare Rab! Hamaare gunaahon ko baksh de, hamaare buray kaamon ko door kar de, aur humein neik logon ke saath wafaat de.’
3.194: Ai hamare Rab! Jo tu ne humein apne Rasoolon ke zariye waada diya hai woh humein ata farma, aur humein qayamat ke din ruswa na kar. Beshak tu apne waadon ke khilaf nahi karta.’
3.195: To unke Rab ne unki dua qubool kar li: Main tum mein se kisi ka amal zaya nahi karta – chahe mard ho ya aurat – tum ek doosre ke ho. To jo log hijrat karein, apne gharon se nikaale gaye, mere raaste mein sataye gaye, lade, aur shaheed hue – main unki buraiyan door kar dunga, aur unhein jannatein ata karoonga jinke neeche nehrein behti hain – Allah ke paas se inaam – aur Allah ke paas behtareen inaam hai.’
3.196: Kuffar ka duniya mein ghoomna phirna tumhein dhokha na de.
3.197: Yeh sirf thoda sa maza hai, phir unka thikaana jahannam hai – aur woh bura thikaana hai.
3.198: Magar jo log apne Rab se darte hain unke liye jannatein hain jinke neeche nehrein behti hain, jahan woh hamesha rahenge – Allah ki taraf se iqraar kiya hua – aur Allah ke paas jo kuch hai woh behtareen hai neik logon ke liye.
3.199: Aur beshak Ahl-e-Kitaab mein se kuch aise bhi hain jo Allah par, us par jo tumhari taraf naazil hua, aur jo unki taraf naazil hua, imaan laate hain, Allah ke aage jhukte hain, aur Allah ke aage kisi ke badle thoda sa bhi faida lena pasand nahi karte – yeh log hain jin ka ajar unke Rab ke paas hai – aur Allah jald hisaab lene wala hai.
3.200: Ai logon jo imaan laye ho! Sabr karo, sabr mein dusron se aage barho, morche par jam jao, aur Allah se daro – taa ke tum kaamyaab ho jao.

4.1: Aey logon! Apne Rab se daro, jis ne tumhein ek hi jaan se paida kiya, aur usi se uska joda banaya, aur dono se bohot se mard aur auratein phela diye. Aur us Allah se daro jis ka tum naam le kar ek doosre se maangte ho, aur rishte dariyon ka bhi khayal rakho. Beshak Allah tum par nigraan hai.
4.2: Aur yateemon ko un ka maal de do, aur achhe maal ke badle bura maal na lo. Aur un ka maal apne maal ke saath mila kar na khao. Beshak yeh bara gunaah hai.
4.3: Aur agar tumhein dar ho ke tum yateemon ke haq mein insaaf na kar sako ge to jo auratein tumhein pasand aayein un mein se do, teen, ya chaar se nikah kar lo. Agar tumhein dar ho ke tum insaaf na kar sako ge to ek hi kaafi hai, ya jo tumhare haath ka maal ho. Yeh zyada behtar hai ke tum zulm se bacho.
4.4: Aur auraton ko un ke mahr khushi se do. Agar woh khushi se kuch maaf kar dein to use maze se khao.
4.5: Aur apne maal na do un logon ko jo nadan hain, jinhein Allah ne tumhara guzara banaya hai. Unhein us mein se khao pilao, aur achhi baat karo.
4.6: Aur yateemon ko azmaate raho jab tak woh nikah ke laayak ho jaayein. Phir agar tum un mein aqal pao to un ke maal unhein de do. Aur is dar se ke woh bade ho jaayein, had se zyada na lena. Jo ameer ho woh bacha rahe, aur jo gareeb ho woh zaroorat ke mutabiq le. Jab un ke maal unhein do to gawah bana lo. Aur Allah kaafi hai hisaab lene wala.
4.7: Mardon ke liye bhi hissa hai us mein jo maa baap aur qarib rishte daar chhod kar jaayein, aur auraton ke liye bhi hissa hai – chhota ho ya bada – jaise hissa muqarrar kiya gaya hai.
4.8: Aur jab takseem ke waqt qarib rishte daar, yateem aur miskeen aa jaayein to unhein bhi us mein se kuch do, aur un se achhi baat karo.
4.9: Aur un logon ko darna chahiye agar woh khud apne baadon ke liye kuch chhod kar jaatein to kis haal mein hotein. To unhein chahiye ke woh Allah se daren aur raasti ki baat karein.
4.10: Jo log yateemon ka maal zulm se khaate hain woh apne pait mein aag bharte hain, aur jald hi dozakh mein jayein ge.
4.11: Allah tumhein tumhare bachon ke maamle mein hukum deta hai – mardon ka hissa do auraton ke barabar hai. Agar sirf ladkiyan hon – do ya zyada – to unhein maal ka do tihaayi hissa milega. Agar ek ho to aadha milega. Aur maa baap – agar bacha mar jaye aur uske bache hon – to har ek ko chhata hissa. Agar uske bache na hon aur sirf maa baap ho to maa ka ek tihai hissa. Agar uske bhai behan hon to maa ka chhata hissa. Yeh baant Allah ki taraf se hai. Beshak Allah sab kuch jaanta hai, hikmat wala hai.
4.12: Aur jo kuch tumhari biwiyan chhod kar jaayein – agar un ke bache na hon – to tumhein aadha hissa milega. Agar bache hon to chhata hissa. Aur biwiyon ko tumhare chhodne par – agar bache na hon – to aadha hissa milega. Agar bache hon to chhata hissa. Aur agar kisi ka waris na ho, sirf maa baap ya bhai behan ho, to har ek ko chhata hissa. Yeh Allah ki taraf se hukum hai. Allah sab kuch jaanta hai, burdbaar hai.
4.13: Yeh Allah ki hudood hain. Jo Allah aur uske Rasool ka itaat kare usse woh jannaton mein daakhil karega jinke neeche nehrein beh rahi hain. Aur woh hamesha usmein rahenge. Yeh badi kamiyabi hai.
4.14: Aur jo Allah aur uske Rasool ki nafarmaani kare aur uski hudood se tajawuz kare to Allah use dozakh mein daakhil karega jahan woh hamesha rahega – aur uske liye ruswa kun azaab hai.
4.15: Aur tumhari auraton mein se jo badkaari karein un par char gawahon ki gawahi lo. Agar woh gawahi dein to unhein gharon mein roko jab tak ke maut na aa jaye, ya Allah unke liye koi raasta na nikaale.
4.16: Aur tum mein se jo aisa amal karein unhein takleef do. Phir agar woh tauba kar lein aur apna haal sudhar lein to unhein chhod do. Beshak Allah tauba qubool karne wala, meharban hai.
4.17: Tauba sirf un logon ki qabool hoti hai jo nadani mein gunaah kar baithein phir jald hi tauba kar lein. Allah unki tauba qubool karta hai. Allah sab kuch jaanta hai, hikmat wala hai.
4.18: Aur un logon ki tauba qabool nahi hoti jo zindagi bhar gunaah karte rahein aur jab maut samne aa jaye tab kahein ke ab main tauba karta hoon. Aur na un logon ki jo kufr ki halat mein mar jaayein. Unke liye humne dardnaak azaab tayyar kar rakha hai.
4.19: Aey logon jo iman laye ho! Tumhein jaiz nahi ke zabardasti auraton ke waris ban jaao. Aur unhein tang kar ke na roko ke unse kuch le sako jo tum ne unhein diya hai, siwaye is ke ke woh koi khuli badkaari karein. Aur unke saath bhale tareeqe se zindagi guzaro. Agar tum unhein pasand na karo to ho sakta hai ke tum kisi cheez ko pasand na karo aur Allah us mein bohot si bhalai rakh de.
4.20: Aur agar tum ek biwi ke badle doosri biwi karna chaho, aur tum un mein se kisi ko maal de chuke ho to us mein se kuch bhi wapas na lo. Kya tum use zabardasti aur khula zulm kar ke wapas loge?
4.21: Aur tum us maal ko kaise loge jab ke tum ek doosre ke saath mil chuke ho aur un se mazboot ahad le chuke ho?
4.22: Aur un auraton se nikah na karo jin se tumhare baap ne nikah kiya ho – siwaye iske ke jo pehle ho chuka. Yeh fahashi hai, ghinoni baat hai, aur bura raasta hai.
4.23: Tum par haram kiya gaya hai: tumhari maaen, betiyan, behnein, phuphiyaan, khalayein, bhaanjiyaan, bhanjeeyaan, tumhari maan jo tumhein doodh pilayein, doodh behnein, biwiyon ki maaen, aur tumhari un ladkiyon jo tumhari god mein pali hoon – un biwiyon ki jo tum se mil chuki hoon. Agar tum un se mil chuke ho to woh tum par haram hain, warna nahi. Aur tumhare beton ki biwiyan. Aur do behno ko ek saath nikah mein rakhna bhi haram hai – siwaye iske ke jo pehle ho chuka. Beshak Allah bakhshne wala, meharban hai.
4.24: Aur woh auratein jo kisi ke nikah mein hon – siwaye un ke jinhein tumhare haath maal e ghanimat ke taur par aayein. Yeh Allah ka hukm hai. Aur tumhare liye halal kiya gaya hai un ke siwa aur auratein, ke apne maal se unse nikah karo – paak daaman ban kar, zina karne wale nahi. To jin se tum lutf uthao, unka mahr unhein do. Aur agar nikah tay hone ke baad tumhara aapas mein kuch aur tay ho to koi harj nahi. Beshak Allah sab kuch jaanta hai, hikmat wala hai.
4.25: Aur jo tum mein se kisi ko azadi ya haalat ki haisiyat nahi ke azaad auraton se nikah kare to un laundiyon se nikah kare jo momin hoon. Allah tumhare iman ka haal behtar jaanta hai. Tum ek doosre se ho. To un se nikah karo unke malik ki ijazat se, aur unhein unka mahr do – bhale tareeqe se – paak daaman ban kar, zina na karte hue, na kisi ke rakheel ban kar. Phir agar woh nikah ke baad badkaari karein to un par aadha saza hai jo azaad auraton ke liye hai. Yeh un ke liye hai jo gunah mein padne ka darr rakhte hoon. Aur agar sabr karo to behtar hai. Aur Allah bakhshne wala, meharban hai.
4.26: Allah chahta hai ke tumhare liye hukm wazeh karein, aur un logon ke raste par tumhein chalayin jo tumse pehle the. Aur woh tumhein maaf karna chahta hai. Aur Allah sab kuch jaanta hai, hikmat wala hai.
4.27: Aur Allah chahta hai ke tumhari tauba qabool kare, aur jo log apne hawas ke peechay chale woh chahte hain ke tum raaste se bohat door hat jao.
4.28: Allah tum par asani dena chahta hai, aur insaan kamzor paida kiya gaya hai.
4.29: Aey logon jo iman laye ho! Apne maal aapas mein baatil tareeqon se mat khao, magar ke koi tijarat ho jo tumhari raza mandi se ho. Apne aap ko halaak mat karo. Beshak Allah tum par meharban hai.
4.30: Aur jo kisi par zulm se zulm karega to hum use aag mein daalenge. Aur yeh Allah ke liye aasaan hai.
4.31: Agar tum badi badi baatein chhod do jinka tumhein mana kiya gaya hai to hum tumhare chhote gunaah maaf kar denge, aur tumhein izzat ke sath daakhil karenge.
4.32: Aur us cheez ki tamanna mat karo jo Allah ne kuch logon ko doosron par fazilat di hai. Mardon ke liye us mein se hissa hai jo unhon ne kamaya, aur auraton ke liye us mein se hissa hai jo unhon ne kamaya. Allah se uska fazl maango. Beshak Allah har cheez ka ilm rakhta hai.
4.33: Aur har ek ke liye humne waris muqarrar kiya hai us maal mein jo maa baap aur qarib rishte daar chhod kar jaayein. Aur jinke saath tumhara ahad ho unhein unka hissa do. Beshak Allah har cheez par gawah hai.
4.34: Mard auraton par zimmedar hain, is liye ke Allah ne un mein se ek ko doosre par fazilat di hai, aur is liye ke unhon ne apne maal se kharch kiya. Neik auratein farmanbardar hoti hain, aur Allah ki hifazat mein hifazat karne wali hoti hain. Aur jin ki nashoz se darr ho unhein naseehat karo, unhein chhod do soone bistar par, aur maar bhi sakte ho. Phir agar woh tumhari baat maan lein to un par koi raasta na talaash karo. Beshak Allah sab par baala aur azeem hai.
4.35: Aur agar tumhein un dono ke darmiyan jhagde ka darr ho to ek sulah karne wala mard aur ek sulah karne wali aurat ke ghar se bhejo. Agar dono sulah chahte hoon to Allah unmein mail daal dega. Beshak Allah sab kuch jaanta hai, har baat se waaqif hai.
4.36: Aur Allah ki ibadat karo, us ke saath kisi ko shareek na karo. Aur maa baap ke saath bhala sulook karo, qarib rishte daaron, yateemon, miskeeno, qarib padosi, door ke padosi, saathi ke saath, musafir aur tumhare haath ke milk ke logon ke saath bhi. Beshak Allah un logon ko pasand nahi karta jo fakhar karne wale, ghamandi hote hain.
4.37: Jo khud bukhl karte hain aur dusron ko bhi bakhili ka hukm dete hain, aur jo Allah ne unhein apne fazl se diya usko chhupate hain. Humne kaafiron ke liye zaleel karne wala azaab tayyar kar rakha hai.
4.38: Aur jo log Allah ki raza ke baghair apne maal dikhave ke liye kharch karte hain – aur Allah aur aakhri din par iman nahi rakhte – unka masla us pathar jaisa hai jismein thoda sa mitti ho, phir us par tez baarish ho to usay saaf kar de. In logon ke amal kisi kaam ke nahi. Aur Allah kaafiron ko hidayat nahi deta.
4.39: Agar woh Allah aur aakhri din par iman laate aur Allah ke diye huye mein se kharch karte to kya unka kuch nuksan hota? Allah unka haal jaanta hai.
4.40: Beshak Allah kisi par zarra barabar bhi zulm nahi karta. Agar koi neki ho to usay dugna kar deta hai aur apne paas se ajar deta hai.
4.41: Aur socho jab hum har ummat mein se gawah laayenge aur tumhein (Aey Nabi) un logon par gawah banaayenge.
4.42: Us din woh log jinhein kufr tha aur Rasool ki nafarmaani ki thi, kaash zameen mein sama jaayein. Woh Allah se koi baat chhupa na sakenge.
4.43: Aey logon jo iman laye ho! Namaz ke qareeb na jao jab tum nashay mein ho, jab tak samajhne na lago ke kya keh rahe ho. Aur na is halat mein ke jab tum janabat mein ho – siwa is ke ke tum musafir ho – jab tak ghusl na kar lo. Agar paani na mile to paak mitti se tayammum karo – chehre aur haathon ko masah karo. Beshak Allah maaf karne wala, bakhshne wala hai.
4.44: Kya tum ne un logon ko nahi dekha jinhon ne kitaab mein se ek hissa diya gaya tha? Woh gumraahi kharidte hain aur chahte hain ke tum bhi raasta bhool jao.
4.45: Aur Allah tumhara sabse behtar jaanne wala wali hai. Aur Allah kaafi hai tumhara madadgaar.
4.46: Kuch Yahoodi alfaz ko jaghon se badal kar karte hain, aur kehte hain: humne suna aur na maana, sun le tu na suna jaaye, aur Ra'ina kehte hain – apni zaban ghumaa kar aur deen mein taan ke saath. Agar woh kehte ke: humne suna aur maane, aur sun le aur humein dekho, to yeh behtar hota aur zyada theek hota. Lekin Allah ne unhein un ke kufr ke sabab laanat ki hai. Un mein se zyada iman nahi laate.
4.47: Aey logon jinhein kitaab di gayi thi! Imaan lao us par jo hum ne naazil kiya hai – us se pehle ke hum kuch chehron ko bigaad dein ya unhein palat dein. Allah ka hukm poora hota hai.
4.48: Beshak Allah shirk ko nahi bakhshta. Us ke siwa jisay chahe maaf kar deta hai. Jo Allah ke saath shirk karta hai, usne bada jhoot baandha.
4.49: Kya tum ne unhein nahi dekha jo apni taareef karte hain? Beshak Allah jise chahe paak banata hai, aur un par resha bhar zulm nahi hota.
4.50: Dekho to kaise woh Allah par jhoot baandhte hain. Aur yeh khula hua gunaah hai.
4.51: Kya tum ne un logon ko nahi dekha jinhon ko kitaab ka ek hissa diya gaya, ke woh jadoo aur taaghut par iman late hain, aur kehte hain ke kafiron ka raasta mominon se zyada behtar hai?
4.52: Yeh woh log hain jin par Allah ne laanat ki hai. Aur jise Allah laanat de uska koi madadgaar nahi.
4.53: Kya unka kuch hissa hai badshahat mein? Agar hota to logon ko ratti bhar bhi na dete.
4.54: Kya woh log logon se is wajah se hasad karte hain ke Allah ne unhein apne fazl se nawaza hai? To humne Ibrahim ke gharane ko kitaab aur hikmat di aur unhein badi badshahat di.
4.55: Phir un mein se kuch ne us par iman laya, aur kuch ne mooh mor liya. Aur dozakh hi kaafi hai jalane ke liye.
4.56: Beshak jin logon ne hamari aayaton ka inkaar kiya, unhein hum aag mein daalenge. Jab bhi unki khal jal jaayegi to hum unhein doosri khal se badal denge, taake woh azaab ka maza chakkhein. Beshak Allah sab par zabardast hai, hikmat wala hai.
4.57: Aur jo log iman laye aur neik amal kiye, unhein hum jannaton mein daakhil karenge jinke neeche nehrein beh rahi hongi. Jahan woh hamesha rahenge. Wahan unke liye paak biwiyan hongi. Aur hum unhein ghane saaye mein daakhil karenge.
4.58: Beshak Allah tumhein hukm deta hai ke amaanat ko uske haqdaaron tak pahuncha do. Aur jab logon ke darmiyan faisla karo to insaaf se karo. Beshak Allah tumhein achhi naseehat karta hai. Beshak Allah sab kuch sunta hai, dekhta hai.
4.59: Aey logon jo iman laye ho! Allah ka hukm maano, aur Rasool ka, aur un logon ka jo tum mein se zimmedar hain. Phir agar kisi baat mein ikhtilaf ho to usay Allah aur Rasool ke hawale karo, agar tum Allah aur aakhri din par iman rakhte ho. Yeh behtar hai aur anjaam mein behtareen.
4.60: Kya tum ne un logon ko nahi dekha jo daaway to karte hain ke woh iman laye hain, lekin jab unhein taaghut ke paas le jaaya jata hai to woh us se faisla lena chahte hain, jab ke unhein hukm diya gaya tha ke woh uska inkaar karein. Aur shaytaan unhein gumraahi mein daalna chahta hai door tak.
4.61: Aur jab un se kaha jata hai ke Allah ke nazil kiya hua aur Rasool ki taraf aao, to dekhoge ke munaafiq mooh mor lete hain.
4.62: To us waqt kya haal hoga jab un par koi museebat aayegi unke apne haathon ki wajah se, phir woh tumhare paas aa kar kasmein khaayenge ke hum to sirf bhalai aur milaap chahte thay.
4.63: Yeh woh log hain jin ke dilon mein Allah jaanta hai jo kuch chhupa hai. Tum unse door raho, unhein naseehat karo, aur unse aisi baat karo jo unke dil ko lagay.
4.64: Aur humne koi Rasool nahi bheja siwaye is liye ke uski itaat ki jaaye Allah ke hukum se. Aur agar yeh log jab inhon ne apne aap par zulm kiya tha tumhare paas aate, aur Allah se maafi maangte, aur Rasool bhi unke liye dua karta, to woh Allah ko bakhshne wala, meharban paate.
4.65: Magar nahi, tumhare Rab ki kasam! Yeh iman nahi laa sakte jab tak ke apne aapas ke jhagde mein tumhein faisla karne wala na maan lein, phir tumhare faisle par apne dil mein koi tangi mehsoos na karein, aur usay poori tarah maan lein.
4.66: Aur agar hum un par farz karte ke apne aap ko qatl karo, ya apne gharon se nikal jao, to chand log hi usay karte. Lekin agar woh wohi karte jo unhein kaha gaya hai to unke liye behtareen hota aur unke imaan ko mazboot karta.
4.67: Aur us waqt hum unhein apne paas se bada ajar dete.
4.68: Aur unhein seedhe raaste par chalte.
4.69: Aur jo Allah aur Rasool ki itaat kare to woh un logon ke saath hoga jin par Allah ne fazl kiya – nabiyon, siddiqon, shaheedon aur neik logon ke saath. Aur yeh kya hi behtareen rafiq hain!
4.70: Yeh Allah ka fazl hai, aur kaafi hai ke Allah sab kuch jaane wala hai.
4.71: Aey logon jo iman laye ho! Apni hifazat ka intezam karo, phir ya to alag alag toliyon mein niklo, ya sab milkar niklo.
4.72: Aur tum mein se kuch aise hain jo zaroor peechay reh jaayenge, agar tumhein koi museebat pahunche to kahenge: Allah ka shukar hai ke main unke saath nahi tha.
4.73: Lekin agar tumhein Allah ka fazl mil jaaye to zaroor kahenge – goya ke tum aur unke darmiyan koi dosti hi na thi – ke kaash main bhi unke saath hota to badi kamayi hasil karta.
4.74: To jo log duniya ki zindagi ke badle aakhiraat kharidna chahte hain unhein Allah ke raaste mein ladna chahiye. Aur jo Allah ke raaste mein lade – phir ya to shaheed ho ya ghazi bane – to hum usay bada ajar denge.
4.75: Aur tumhein kya ho gaya ke tum Allah ke raaste mein nahi ladte, jab ke kamzor mard, auratein aur bachay kehte hain: Aey hamare Rab! Humein is basti se nikaal jahan ke log zalim hain, aur humein apne paas se koi madadgar de, aur koi haami bana de.
4.76: Iman wale Allah ke raaste mein ladte hain, aur kafir taaghut ke raaste mein. To tum shaytan ke saathiyon se lado. Shaytan ka chaal kamzor hota hai.
4.77: Kya tum ne un logon ko nahi dekha jinhon se kaha gaya tha ke apne haath roke rakho, namaz qayam karo aur zakat do? Phir jab un par jihad farz kar diya gaya to ek hisse ne logon se usi tarah darna shuru kar diya jaise Allah se darte hain – ya us se bhi zyada. Aur kehne lage: Aey Rab! Tu ne hum par jihad kyun farz kiya? Kyun na humein kuch aur mohalat di? Keh do: duniya ka faida thoda sa hai, aur aakhiraat unke liye behtar hai jo taqwa rakhte hain. Aur tum par resha bar zulm na hoga.
4.78: Jahan bhi tum ho maut tumhein aa pakdegi – chahe mazboot qilay mein ho. Aur agar unhein koi bhalai pahunche to kehte hain: yeh Allah ki taraf se hai. Aur agar koi bura haal ho to kehte hain: yeh tumhari wajah se hai. Keh do: sab kuch Allah ki taraf se hai. In logon ko kya ho gaya hai ke baat nahi samajhte?
4.79: Jo tumhein bhalai pahunche woh Allah ki taraf se hai, aur jo bura haal ho woh tumhari apni wajah se hai. Aur humne tumhein Rasool bana kar bheja – Allah gawah hai.
4.80: Jo Rasool ki itaat karta hai, woh Allah ki itaat karta hai. Aur jo mooh modta hai to tum zimmedar nahi ho.
4.81: Woh kehte hain: hum maante hain. Lekin jab tumhare paas se jaate hain to un mein se kuch aur log mashwara karte hain, Allah unki baatein likh leta hai. To tum un se mooh mor lo aur Allah par bharosa karo. Allah kaafi hai kaar saz.
4.82: Kya yeh log Qur’an mein tadabbur nahi karte? Agar yeh Allah ke siwa kisi aur ka hota to zaroor is mein bohot ikhtilaaf paate.
4.83: Aur jab koi khabar aman ya khauf ki aati hai to usay phaila dete hain. Agar woh usay Rasool aur zimmedar logon tak pahuncha dein to un mein se jo usay samajhne wale hain woh usay samajh lein. Agar Allah ka fazl na hota to tum shaytan ke peechay chal jaate – siwaye chand logon ke.
4.84: To Allah ke raaste mein lad, tum zimmedar ho siwaye apne nafs ke. Aur momineen ko uksao. Shayad Allah kafiron ka zor tod de. Allah ka zor zyada hai aur saza bhi.
4.85: Jo koi achhi sifarish kare us mein uska hissa hai. Aur jo buri sifarish kare us mein bhi uska hissa hai. Aur Allah har cheez ka nigehbaan hai.
4.86: Jab tumhein salam kiya jaye to usse behtar jawab do, ya usi tarah. Beshak Allah har cheez ka hisaab lene wala hai.
4.87: Allah! Us ke siwa koi mabood nahi. Woh tumhein zaroor jama karega qayamat ke din jismein koi shakk nahi. Aur Allah se zyada sach kehne wala kaun hai?
4.88: Tumhein kya ho gaya ke tum do giroh ho gaye ho munafiqoon ke maamle mein, jab ke Allah ne unhein un ke amaal ki wajah se ulta daal diya? Kya tum unhein hidayat dena chahte ho jise Allah ne gumraah kiya? Jise Allah gumraah kare uske liye tum koi raasta nahi paaoge.
4.89: Woh chahte hain ke jaise woh khud kafir huye waise tum bhi kafir ho jao, taake sab barabar ho jaayein. To un mein se kisi ko apna dost na banao jab tak ke woh Allah ke raaste mein hijrat na karein. Agar woh mooh mod lein to unhein pakdo, qatl karo jahan pao, aur un mein se kisi ko na dosti do na madad.
4.90: Siwaye un ke jo aise logon se mil jaayein jinke saath tumhara ahad ho, ya tumhare paas aise aayein jinka dil tum se ladne ya apni qaum se ladne ko nahi chahta. Agar Allah chahta to unhein tum par musallat kar deta, phir woh tumse ladte. Pas agar woh tumse alag ho jaayein, tumse ladne se baaz rahein, aur aman ka paigham dein to Allah ne tum par un ke khilaf koi raasta nahi banaya.
4.91: Tum kuch aur logon ko bhi paoge jo chahte hain ke tum se bhi aman mein rahen aur apni qaum se bhi. Lekin jab unhein moka milta hai to fitna mein pad jaate hain. Pas agar woh tumse alag na hon, aman na dein, aur haath na rokein to unhein pakdo, aur jahan pao qatl karo. Un ke khilaf humne tumhein saaf daleel di hai.
4.92: Kisi momin ke liye jaiz nahi ke woh kisi momin ko qatl kare – siwaye ghalti se. Aur jo ghalti se qatl kare to ek momin ko azaad kare aur diya de uske ghar walon ko, siwaye agar woh maaf kar dein. Agar qatl aise logon mein ho jinke tumse dushmani ho to ek momin ko azaad karo. Aur agar woh log aise ho jinke darmiyan tumhara ahad hai to diya dena hoga aur ek momin azaad karna hoga. Jo is ki taaqat na rakhe to do mahine lagataar roza rakhe. Yeh Allah ki taraf se tauba hai. Aur Allah sab kuch jaanta hai, hikmat wala hai.
4.93: Aur jo kisi momin ko jaan bujh kar qatl kare uska badla jahannum hai – jahan woh hamesha rahega. Allah ka ghussa us par hoga, us par laanat karega, aur uske liye bada azaab tayyar kiya hai.
4.94: Aey logon jo iman laye ho! Jab tum Allah ke raaste mein nikalte ho to tahqeeq karo, aur jo salam kare usay na kaho: tu momin nahi – taake maal e duniya hasil karo. Allah ke paas bohot maal hai. Pehle tum bhi aise hi thay, phir Allah ne tum par fazl kiya. Pas tahqeeq karo. Beshak Allah tumhare amal se waaqif hai.
4.95: Ghar baithne wale momin – siwaye un ke jo majboor hon – aur Allah ke raaste mein jaan o maal se ladne wale momin, dono barabar nahi. Allah ne jaan o maal se jihad karne walon ka rutba baithne walon se zyada rakha hai. Har ek ke liye Allah ne achhe waade kiye hain, lekin Allah ne mujahideen ko baithne walon par bada darja diya hai.
4.96: Un ke liye Allah ki taraf se darjat, magfirat aur rehmat hai. Aur Allah bakhshne wala, meharban hai.
4.97: Jin logon ki rooh farishte nikalte hain is haal mein ke woh apne nafs par zulm kar rahe thay – farishte unse kehte hain: tum kis haal mein thay? Woh kehte hain: hum zameen mein kamzor thay. Farishte kehte hain: kya Allah ki zameen waseeh na thi ke us mein hijrat karte? Aise logon ka thikana jahannum hai – aur woh bura thikana hai.
4.98: Siwaye un kamzor mardon, auraton, aur bachon ke jo na raasta jaan sakein aur na uski taraf rasta paa sakein.
4.99: Pas aise logon ko Allah maaf karega. Aur Allah maaf karne wala, bakhshne wala hai.
4.100: Aur jo Allah ke raaste mein hijrat kare to woh zameen mein bohot jagah aur guzara paayega. Aur jo apna ghar chhod kar Allah aur uske Rasool ki taraf hijrat kare, phir usay maut aa jaaye, to uska ajar Allah ke zimmedaar ho gaya. Aur Allah bakhshne wala, meharban hai.
4.101: Aur jab tum safar par nikal jao to namaz ko chhota karne mein tum par koi gunaah nahi, agar tumhein dar ho ke kafir tumhein takleef denge. Beshak kafir tumhare khule dushman hain.
4.102: Aur jab tum unke darmiyan ho aur un ke liye namaz qayam karo to ek giroh ko apne saath khada karo, aur woh apne hathiyaar le kar khade hoon. Phir jab woh sajda kar lein to woh tumhare peechay chale jayein, aur doosra giroh aaye jinhon ne abhi namaz nahi padhi – to woh tumhare saath padhein, aur woh bhi apne ehtiyaat aur hathiyaar saath lein. Kafir chahte hain ke tum apne hathiyar aur samaan se gaflat mein raho taake woh tum par achanak hamla kar dein. Agar tumhare liye baarish ka nuqsan ho ya bimari ki wajah se takleef ho to hathiyar rakhne mein harj nahi. Magar ehtiyaat raho. Beshak Allah ne kafiron ke liye zillat ka azaab tayyar kar rakha hai.
4.103: Phir jab tum namaz ada kar chuko to Allah ko yaad karo – khade, baithe aur letay hue. Phir jab tum mutma’in ho jao to namaz qayam karo. Beshak namaz momineen par waqt muqarrar ke saath farz hai.
4.104: Aur dushman ki talash mein susti na karo. Agar tum takleef utha rahe ho to woh bhi takleef utha rahe hain jaise tum utha rahe ho – aur tum Allah se woh umeed rakhte ho jo woh nahi rakhte. Aur Allah sab kuch jaanta hai, hikmat wala hai.
4.105: Beshak humne tum par haq ke saath kitaab nazil ki taake tum logon ke darmiyan faisla karo us cheez ke mutabiq jo Allah ne tumhein dikhayi hai. Aur khayanat karne walon ki taraf se na lado.
4.106: Aur Allah se maafi maango. Beshak Allah bakhshne wala, meharban hai.
4.107: Aur un logon ki taraf se na lado jo apne aap se khayanat karte hain. Beshak Allah aise khayanat karne walon ko pasand nahi karta.
4.108: Woh log apni baatein logon se chhupate hain, lekin Allah se nahi chhupa sakte. Aur woh us waqt bhi Allah ke saath hote hain jab woh us baat ki mashwarat karte hain jo Allah ko pasand nahi. Aur Allah har cheez ko gheray hue hai.
4.109: Dekho! Tum un logon ke liye duniya ki zindagi mein to jhagad chuke, lekin qayamat ke din Allah ke saamne kaun jhagad karega? Ya kaun unka zimmedar hoga?
4.110: Aur jo koi bura amal kare ya apne aap par zulm kare, phir Allah se maafi maange, to Allah ko bakhshne wala, meharban payega.
4.111: Aur jo koi gunaah kare to uska wabal usi par hoga. Aur Allah sab kuch jaanta hai, hakeem hai.
4.112: Aur jo koi ghalti ya gunaah kare, phir kisi be-gunah par daal de, to usne bara buhtan aur khula gunaah uthaya.
4.113: Agar tum par Allah ka fazl aur uski rehmat na hoti to un mein se kuch log tumhein gumrah karne ka irada rakhte the, lekin woh khud apne aap ke siwa kisi ko gumrah nahi kar sakte. Aur woh tumhein kuch bhi nuqsan nahi pahuncha sakte. Allah ne tum par kitaab aur hikmat nazil ki, aur jo kuch tum nahi jaante thay woh tumhein sikhaya. Aur Allah ka fazl tum par bohot bada hai.
4.114: Un ke zyada mashwaron mein koi bhalai nahi, siwaye uske jo sadaqa dene ka, ya bhalai karne ka, ya logon ke darmiyan sulah karne ka hukum de. Aur jo aise kaam Allah ki raza ke liye kare to hum usay bada ajar denge.
4.115: Aur jo koi Rasool ke khilaf kare baad is ke ke us par hidayat wazeh ho gayi, aur momineen ke raaste ke ilawa kisi aur raaste par chale, to hum usay usi mein chhod denge jise usne chuna hai, aur usay jahannum mein daakhil karenge. Aur woh bura thikana hai.
4.116: Beshak Allah shirk ko nahi bakhshta. Iske siwa jise chahe maaf kar deta hai. Aur jo Allah ke saath shirk kare usne bada gunaah kiya.
4.117: Woh Allah ke siwa auron ko pukarte hain – sirf aurton ko. Aur woh sirf shaitaan ko pukarte hain – jo sarasar nafarmaan hai.
4.118: Allah ne us par laanat ki, aur usne kaha: main tere bandon mein se ek hissa le lunga.
4.119: Aur unhein gumrah karunga, aur unhein umeedein dilaoonga, aur unhein hukm doonga ke woh jaanwaron ke kaanon ko kaat dein, aur main unhein hukm doonga ke woh Allah ki khalq mein tabdili karein. Aur jo Allah ke bajaye shaitaan ko apna wali banaye to usne khula nuksan uthaya.
4.120: Woh unse waade karta hai aur umeedein dilata hai. Aur shaitaan ke waade dhoke ke siwa kuch nahi.
4.121: Aise logon ka thikana jahannum hai, aur woh usse kisi tarah bacha nahi sakte.
4.122: Aur jo log iman laye aur neik amal kiye unhein hum jannaton mein daakhil karenge jinke neeche nehrein beh rahi hongi – jahan woh hamesha rahenge. Allah ka waada hai – jo sabse sachha hai. Aur Allah se zyada sach baat karne wala kaun ho sakta hai?
4.123: Yeh na tumhari khwahish se hoga na Ahl-e-Kitaab ki. Jo bura amal karega use uska badla diya jaayega, aur na uske liye Allah ke siwa koi madadgaar hoga na haami.
4.124: Aur jo momin mard ya aurat neik amal kare to woh jannat mein daakhil hoga, aur un par zarra barabar bhi zulm na hoga.
4.125: Aur us se behtar kis ka deen ho sakta hai jo apne aap ko Allah ke hawale kare, aur woh neik amal bhi kare, aur Ibrahim ke deen ka pairo ho – jo bilkul seedha tha? Allah ne Ibrahim ko apna khaleel banaya.
4.126: Allah hi ke liye hai jo kuch aasmanon mein hai aur jo kuch zameen mein hai. Aur Allah har cheez ko gheray hue hai.
4.127: Woh tum se auraton ke baare mein fatwa maangte hain. Keh do: Allah tumhein unke baare mein fatwa deta hai – aur woh bhi jo tumhein kitaab mein bataya gaya hai un yateem larkiyon ke baare mein jinhein tum woh haq nahi dete jo unka hai, aur tum chahte ho un se nikah karna – aur un kamzor bachon ke baare mein – aur yeh ke tum yateemon ke saath insaaf par qayam raho. Aur jo bhalai tum karo to Allah usay jaanta hai.
4.128: Aur agar kisi aurat ko apne shohar ki taraf se nashoz ya be-raghi ka darr ho to dono mil baith kar sulah kar lein – to is mein koi harj nahi. Aur sulah behtareen hai. Nafse insani mein to bukhilpan hai. Aur agar tum bhalai karo aur taqwa ikhtiyar karo to Allah jo kuch tum karte ho usse bakhabar hai.
4.129: Aur tum kitna bhi chaho, tum auraton ke darmiyan insaaf nahi kar sakte. Pas kisi ki taraf poori jhukti na jao ke doosri ko latakti chhodo. Agar sulah karo aur taqwa ikhtiyar karo to Allah bakhshne wala, meharban hai.
4.130: Aur agar dono alag ho jaayein to Allah har ek ko apni wasat se be-niyaz kar dega. Aur Allah waseeh hai, hikmat wala hai.
4.131: Aur Allah ke liye hai jo kuch aasmanon mein hai aur zameen mein. Aur humne un logon ko bhi naseehat ki jo tum se pehle kitab diye gaye, aur tumhein bhi ke Allah se daro. Agar tum kufr karo to Allah ke liye har cheez be-niyaz hai – aur har tareef Allah ke liye hai.
4.132: Aur Allah ke liye hai jo kuch aasmanon mein hai aur zameen mein. Aur Allah kaafi hai nigehbaan banne ke liye.
4.133: Aey logon! Agar chahe to tumhein hata kar dusre logon ko le aaye – aur Allah is par poori qudrat rakhta hai.
4.134: Jo duniya ka inaam chahta hai to Allah ke paas duniya aur aakhirat – dono ka inaam hai. Aur Allah suntay, dekhte hain.
4.135: Aey logon jo iman laye ho! Insaaf par qaim rehne wale bano – Allah ke liye gawahi dene wale – chahe woh tumhare khilaf ho, ya tumhare maa baap aur qarib rishte daaron ke. Chahe woh ameer ho ya gareeb – Allah unka zyada haqdaar hai. Apni khwahish ki pairwi na karo ke insaaf se hat jao. Aur agar tum baat ghuma do ya mooh mor lo to samajh lo ke Allah tumhare aamal se waaqif hai.
4.136: Aey logon jo iman laye ho! Allah aur uske Rasool par iman lao, aur us kitaab par jo usne apne Rasool par nazil ki, aur us kitaab par jo pehle nazil ki. Aur jo Allah aur uske farishton, uski kitaabon, uske Rasoolon aur aakhri din ka inkaar kare to woh gumrahi mein door nikal gaya.
4.137: Beshak jo log iman laye, phir kufr kiya, phir iman laye, phir kufr kiya, phir kufr mein barh gaye – Allah unhein maaf nahi karega aur na unhein hidayat dega.
4.138: Munaafiqoon ko khushkhabri suna do – ke unke liye dardnaak azaab hai.
4.139: Jo momineen ko chhod kar kafiron ko apna dost banate hain – kya woh izzat unse chahte hain? To izzat to sirf Allah ke haath mein hai.
4.140: Aur Allah ne tum par kitaab mein yeh hukm nazil kiya ke jab tum suno ke Allah ki aayaton ka inkaar ho raha hai aur un ka mazaaq udaya ja raha hai to un ke saath na baitho jab tak ke woh kisi aur baat mein na lag jaayein – warna tum bhi un jaise ho jaoge. Beshak Allah munaafiqoon aur kafiron – dono ko jahannum mein jama karega.
4.141: Woh tumhara intezar karte hain. Agar Allah ki taraf se tumhein fatah milti hai to kehte hain: kya hum tumhare saath nahi thay? Aur agar kafiron ko kuch mil jaata hai to unse kehte hain: kya hum tum par gaalib nahi thay aur tumhein mominoon se bachaya nahi? To Allah tumhare darmiyan qayamat ke din faisla karega. Aur Allah kabhi kafiron ko mominoon par raasta nahi dega.
4.142: Beshak munaafiq Allah ko dhoka dena chahte hain, lekin Allah unhein dhoka deta hai. Jab woh namaz ke liye uthte hain to sust uthte hain – logon ko dikhane ke liye – aur Allah ko kam hi yaad karte hain.
4.143: Woh beech mein latakte hain – na inke hain na unke. Aur jise Allah gumraah kar de uske liye koi raasta nahi.
4.144: Aey logon jo iman laye ho! Momineen ko chhod kar kafiron ko apna dost na banao. Kya tum chaahte ho ke Allah ko apne khilaf daleel do?
4.145: Beshak munaafiq jahannum ke neeche ke darje mein honge. Aur tum unka koi madadgaar na paoge.
4.146: Siwaye un ke jo tauba kar lein, apna haal sudhaar lein, Allah ka daaman tham lein, aur apna deen khula kar Allah ke liye saaf kar dein – to yeh log momineen ke saath hain. Aur Allah momineen ko bada ajar dene wala hai.
4.147: Allah tumhein kyun azaab dega agar tum shukr guzar ho jaao aur iman le aao? Aur Allah shukr guzaron ko qadr karne wala, sab kuch jaane wala hai.
4.148: Allah khula kar kisi ki buraayi kehna pasand nahi karta – siwaye uske jise zulm pahuncha ho. Aur Allah sab kuch sunta hai, jaanta hai.
4.149: Agar tum kisi bhalai ko zahir karo ya chhupao, ya kisi buraayi ko maaf kar do, to Allah bhi maaf karne wala, qudrat wala hai.
4.150: Beshak woh log jo Allah aur uske Rasoolon ka inkaar karte hain, aur kehte hain ke hum kuch Rasoolon par iman laate hain aur kuch ka inkaar karte hain, aur chahte hain ke iske darmiyan ek raasta ikhtiyar karein –
4.151: Woh log asal mein kafir hain. Aur humne kafiron ke liye zillat dene wala azaab tayyar kar rakha hai.
4.152: Lekin jo log Allah aur uske sab Rasoolon par iman laate hain, aur unmein kisi mein tafreeq nahi karte, to aise logon ko Allah unka ajar dega. Aur Allah bakhshne wala, meharban hai.
4.153: Ahl-e-Kitaab tum se yeh demand karte hain ke tum un par aasman se likhi hui kitaab utaaro. Woh to isse bhi badi baat Moosa se maang chuke hain. Unhone kaha: humein Allah ko khuli aankh se dikha do. To unke zulm ki wajah se un par bijli gir gayi. Phir unhone bachde ko khuda bana liya uske baad ke unke paas khuli nishaniyan aa chuki thin. Phir bhi humne unhein maaf kiya aur Moosa ko saaf sabitiyat di.
4.154: Aur unke ahad ki wajah se un par Toor ko uthaya. Aur unse kaha: darwaze mein sajda karte hue daakhil ho. Aur kaha: sabt ke din mein hadd se na barhna. Aur humne unse mazboot ahad liya.
4.155: Phir unke ahad todne, Allah ki aayaton ka inkaar karne, paigambaron ko najaiz qatl karne, aur kehne par ke hamare dil par ghilaf hai – balke Allah ne unke dil par mohar laga di hai unke kufr ki wajah se, to woh kam hi iman laate hain.
4.156: Aur unke kufr, aur Maryam par bohot bada buhtan lagane ki wajah se,
4.157: Aur kehne ki wajah se ke humne Allah ke Rasool, Masih Ibn-e-Maryam ko qatl kar diya – jabke na to unhon ne usay qatl kiya na salaib di. Balki unke liye shabih bana di gayi. Aur jo log is mein ikhtilaf karte hain woh shak mein hain. Unke paas is ka koi yaqeen nahi – siwaye andazay ke. Aur unhon ne yaqeenan usay qatl nahi kiya.
4.158: Balki Allah ne usay apni taraf utha liya. Aur Allah zabardast, hikmat wala hai.
4.159: Aur Ahl-e-Kitaab mein se har shakhs us par zaroor iman laye ga uski maut se pehle. Aur qayamat ke din woh un par gawah banega.
4.160: To Bani Israeel ke zulm, aur unka logon ko Allah ke raaste se roknay ki wajah se, humne un par kuch paak cheezein haram kar di jo unke liye halal thein.
4.161: Aur unke sood lene ke sabab se, jabke unhein mana kiya gaya tha, aur logon ke maal najaiz tareeqe se khaane ki wajah se. Aur humne un mein se kafiron ke liye dardnaak azaab tayyar kiya hai.
4.162: Lekin un mein se jo ilm mein gehre hain, aur jo iman laye – sab Rasoolon, aur us kitaab par jo Muhammad par utari gayi, aur pehle ki kitaabon par – aur jo namaz qayam karte hain, zakat dete hain, aur Allah aur aakhire din par iman rakhte hain – unhein hum bada ajar denge.
4.163: Beshak humne tumhari taraf wahi bheji jaise humne Nooh aur unke baad ke Nabiyon ki taraf bheji thi. Aur humne Ibrahim, Ismail, Ishaq, Yaqub, unki aulad, Isa, Ayyub, Yunus, Haroon aur Suleman ki taraf wahi bheji. Aur humne Daood ko Zaboor di.
4.164: Aur aise Rasool bhi bheje jinka tazkira hum tumse pehle kar chuke hain, aur kuch aise bhi jinka tazkira humne tum se nahi kiya. Aur Allah ne Moosa se seedha kalam kiya.
4.165: Yeh Rasool khushkhabri dene wale aur daraane wale the taake logon ke paas Allah ke baad koi hujjat na rahe. Aur Allah zabardast, hakeem hai.
4.166: Lekin Allah gawahi deta hai ke usne jo kuch tum par nazil kiya, woh apne ilm ke mutabiq nazil kiya – aur farishte bhi gawahi dete hain. Aur Allah kaafi hai gawahi dene ke liye.
4.167: Beshak jo log Allah ka inkaar karte hain aur uske Rasoolon ka bhi, aur chahte hain ke Allah aur uske Rasoolon ke darmiyan tafreeq karein, aur kehte hain ke kuch Rasoolon ko mante hain aur kuch ka inkaar karte hain – aur chahte hain ke iske darmiyan ek raasta ikhtiyar karein –
4.168: Yeh log asal mein kafir hain. Aur humne kafiron ke liye zillat dene wala azaab tayyar kar rakha hai.
4.169: Jo log iman na laye aur zulm karte rahe, Allah na unhein maaf karega, na unke liye koi raasta banayega,
4.170: Siwaye jahannum ke raaste ke – jahan woh hamesha rahenge. Aur yeh Allah ke liye asaan hai.
4.171: Aey Ahl-e-Kitaab! Apne deen mein hadd se na badho, aur Allah ke baare mein sirf sach kehna. Masih Isa Ibn-e-Maryam Allah ka Rasool hai, aur uska kalima hai jo usne Maryam ki taraf bheja, aur uski taraf se ek rooh hai. To Allah aur uske Rasoolon par iman lao, aur na kaho 'teen'. Baaz aa jao – yeh tumhare liye behtar hai. Allah sirf ek hi Ilah hai. Woh paak hai ke uska koi beta ho. Uska hai jo kuch aasmanon aur zameen mein hai. Aur Allah kaafi hai nigehbaan banne ke liye.
4.172: Masih na to Allah ka banda banne se hichkaayega, na hi qareebi farishte. Aur jo koi uski bandagi se inkaar karega aur takabbur karega to Allah un sabko apne paas jama karega.
4.173: To jo log iman laye aur neik amal kiye unhein woh unka pura ajar dega, aur apne fazl se aur bhi zyada dega. Aur jin logon ne inkaar kiya aur takabbur kiya, unhein woh dardnaak azaab dega. Aur Allah ke siwa na unka koi wali hoga na madadgaar.
4.174: Aey logon! Tumhare paas tumhare Rab ki taraf se ek daleel aa chuki hai, aur humne tumhari taraf ek roshan noor utaara hai.
4.175: To jo log Allah par iman laye aur usse daba kar rahe, Allah unhein apni rehmat aur fazl mein daakhil karega, aur unhein apni taraf seedha raasta dikhayega.
4.176: Woh tumse fatwa maangte hain. Keh do: Allah tumhein kalalah ke baare mein fatwa deta hai – agar koi mard mar jaaye jiska koi beta na ho, aur uski ek behan ho, to uske liye uski chhodi hui milkiyat ka aadha hai. Aur agar behan mar jaaye aur uska bhai ho to woh uska waris hoga. Agar dono behan bhai hoon to mard ke liye do hisson ka hissa hai aur aurat ke liye ek hissa. Allah tumhare liye wazeh karta hai taake tum gumrah na ho jao. Aur Allah har cheez ka ilm rakhta hai.

5.1: Aey logon jo iman laye ho! Apne ahadon ko poora karo. Tumhare liye sab paaltu jaanwar halal kiye gaye hain siwaye un ke jo tumhein mana kiye gaye. Magar shikar ko halal na samjho jab tum ehraam mein ho. Beshak Allah jo chahta hai hukm deta hai.
5.2: Aey logon jo iman laye ho! Allah ke nishaaniyon ki be hurmati na karo, na haram mahino ki, na un qurbani ke jaanwaron ki jo kaabe ke liye markaz hain, na un logon ki jo baitullah ka qasdan irada karte hain – jo apne Rab ka fazl aur raza talash karte hain. Aur jab ehraam khol do to shikar karo. Aur kisi qaum ki dushmani tumhein yeh na uksaye ke tum insaaf na karo. Insaaf karo – yeh taqwa ke zyada qareeb hai. Aur Allah se daro. Beshak Allah tumhare aamal se waaqif hai.
5.3: Tum par haram kiya gaya murda jaanwar, khoon, suar ka gosht, woh jo Allah ke siwa kisi aur ke naam par ziba kiya gaya, jo gala ghoont kar mara ho, jo chot se mara ho, jo oonche se gir kar mara ho, jo seeng maar kar mara ho, aur jis ko shikar karne wale ne khaya ho – siwaye uske jo tum ziba kar lo – aur jo buton ke liye ziba kiya gaya, aur jo taqseem ke teeron se qismat nikali jaati hai – yeh sab nafarat ke kaam hain. Aaj kafir tumhare deen se mayoos ho gaye. To tum unse na daro, mujh se daro. Aaj maine tumhare liye tumhara deen mukammal kar diya, aur apna inaam tum par poora kar diya, aur tumhare liye Islam ko deen pasand kiya. Phir jo bhook se majboor ho jaaye bina jaan bujh kar gunah ke, to Allah bakhshne wala, meharban hai.
5.4: Woh tumse poochte hain ke unke liye kya halal hai. Keh do: Tumhare liye saari paak cheezein halal ki gayi hain. Aur woh shikar ke jaanwar jinhein tumne shikar ke liye tarbiyat di ho – jinhein tum Allah ki di hui taleem ke mutabiq sikhao – to jo woh tumhare liye pakdein usay khao aur us par Allah ka naam lo. Aur Allah se daro. Beshak Allah hisaab lene mein tez hai.
5.5: Aaj tumhare liye saari paak cheezein halal hain. Aur un logon ka khana jinko kitaab di gayi halal hai tumhare liye. Aur tumhara khana halal hai unke liye. Aur paak daaman momin auratein, aur paak daaman Ahl-e-Kitaab ki auratein halal hain, jab tum unhein unka mahr do – izzat ke saath nikah mein lao, na ke zina karne ya chhupi dosti rakhne ke liye. Aur jo koi iman se inkaar karega, uska amal zaya ho gaya, aur woh aakhirat mein nuksan uthane walon mein hoga.
5.6: Aey logon jo iman laye ho! Jab tum namaz ke liye uthna chaho to apne chehron ko aur haathon ko kohniyon tak dho lo, aur apne saron ka masah karo, aur apne paon ko takhnon tak dho lo. Aur agar tum janabat ki haalat mein ho to poora paak ho jao. Aur agar tum bimaar ho, ya safar mein ho, ya tum mein se koi haajat se aaye, ya auraton se lagao hua ho, to paani na mile to paak miti se tayammum karo – us se apne chehron aur haathon ka masah karo. Allah tum par tangi nahi daalna chahta, balke chahta hai ke tumhein paak kare, aur apna inaam tum par poora kare taake tum shukar guzar bano.
5.7: Aur Allah ke inaam ko yaad karo jo usne tum par kiya, aur uske ahad ko jo usne tumse liya – jab tumne kaha tha: humne suna aur maana. Aur Allah se daro. Beshak Allah dilon ke haal se waaqif hai.
5.8: Aey logon jo iman laye ho! Allah ke liye insaaf par qayam rehne wale bano – gawahi do insaaf ke saath. Aur kisi qaum ki dushmani tumhein is baat par na le aaye ke tum insaafi karo. Insaaf karo – yeh taqwa ke qareeb hai. Aur Allah se daro. Beshak Allah tumhare aamal se waaqif hai.
5.9: Jo log iman laye aur neik amal kiye, Allah un se waada karta hai ke unke liye bakhshish aur bada ajar hoga.
5.10: Aur jin logon ne kufr kiya aur hamari aayaton ko jhutlaya – woh dozakh mein daakhil honge.
5.11: Aey logon jo iman laye ho! Allah ke inaam ko yaad karo jo usne tum par kiya – jab kuch log tumhare upar haath badhane ka iraada rakhte thay to Allah ne unke haathon ko tumse roka. Aur Allah se daro. Aur momino par Allah hi ka bharosa hai.
5.12: Aur Allah ne Bani Israeel se ahad liya, aur un mein se baarah naqib muqarrar kiye. Aur Allah ne kaha: main tumhare saath hoon – agar tum namaz qayam karo, zakat do, mere Rasoolon ko maano, unki madad karo, aur Allah ko achha qarz do, to main tumse tumhare gunaah mita doonga, aur tumhein jannaton mein daakhil karunga jinke neeche nehrein beh rahi hongi. Phir tum mein se jo iske baad inkaar karega to woh seedhe raaste se bhatak gaya.
5.13: To unke apne ahad todne ki wajah se humne un par laanat ki aur unke dilon ko sakht kar diya – woh kalimaat ko unki jagahon se tabdeel karte hain, aur bhool gaye jo unhein yaad dilaya gaya tha. Aur tum hamesha un mein kisi na kisi khayanat dekhoge – siwaye kuch logon ke. To unhein maaf karo aur chhodo. Beshak Allah neik logon ko pasand karta hai.
5.14: Aur humne un logon se bhi ahad liya jo kehte hain: hum Nasara hain. Phir unhon ne bhool gaya jo unhein yaad dilaya gaya tha. To humne unke darmiyan qayamat tak dushmani aur bugz daal diya. Aur Allah unhein jald hi bata dega jo kuch woh kar rahe hain.
5.15: Aey Ahl-e-Kitaab! Tumhare paas hamara Rasool aa gaya hai jo tumhare liye wazeh kar raha hai bohot si baatein jo tum kitaab mein chhupaya karte thay – aur bohot si baatein chhod bhi deta hai. Tumhare paas Allah ki taraf se ek noor aur saaf kitaab aa gayi hai.
5.16: Jiske zariye Allah un logon ko hidayat deta hai jo uski raza ke talabgaar hain – salaamati ke raaston ki taraf. Aur unhein apni ijazat se andheron se nikal kar roshni mein laata hai, aur unhein seedha raasta dikhata hai.
5.17: Woh log yaqeenan kafir ho gaye jo kehte hain ke Allah hi Masiḥ Ibn-e-Maryam hai. Keh do: agar Allah chahe ke Masiḥ Ibn-e-Maryam aur uski maa aur sab zameen walon ko halaak kar de to kaun hai jo Allah ke faisle ke khilaf kuch bhi kar sake? Aasmaan aur zameen aur unke darmiyan jo kuch hai sab Allah ka hai. Woh jo chahta hai paida karta hai. Aur Allah har cheez par qudrat rakhta hai.
5.18: Aur Yehudi aur Nasara kehte hain: hum Allah ke bete aur us ke mahboob hain. Keh do: to phir woh tumhare gunaahon ki wajah se tumhein kyun azaab deta hai? Balke tum bhi uski makhlooq ho jaise doosre log. Woh jise chahta hai maaf karta hai, jise chahta hai azaab deta hai. Aur aasmaan aur zameen aur jo kuch inmein hai sab Allah ka hai. Aur usi ki taraf sab ko lautna hai.
5.19: Aey Ahl-e-Kitaab! Tumhare paas hamara Rasool aa gaya hai – ek lambi muddat ke baad Rasoolon ka silsila ruka tha – taake tum keh na sako ke hamare paas koi basharat dene wala ya daraane wala nahi aaya. Lo, ab basharat dene wala aur daraane wala aa gaya. Aur Allah har cheez par qudrat rakhta hai.
5.20: Aur yaad karo jab Moosa ne apni qaum se kaha: Aey meri qaum! Allah ka inaam yaad karo jo usne tum par kiya – jab usne tum mein Nabi banaye, aur tumhein baadshah banaya, aur tumhein woh kuch diya jo kisi aur ko duniya mein nahi diya.
5.21: Aey meri qaum! Us paak zameen mein daakhil ho jao jo Allah ne tumhare liye likh di hai. Aur peechhe na murhna – warna nuksaan uthao ge.
5.22: Unhon ne kaha: Aey Moosa! Us mein to zabardast log hain, aur hum wahan kabhi daakhil nahi honge jab tak woh wahan hain. Agar woh wahan se nikal jaayein to hum daakhil ho jaayenge.
5.23: Do aadmi jinhein Allah ne niyamat di thi kehne lage: un par chadhai karo – darwaze mein daakhil ho jao, jab tum daakhil ho jao ge to woh zaroor har jaayenge. Aur Allah par bharosa karo – agar tum momin ho.
5.24: Unhon ne kaha: Aey Moosa! Hum to kabhi wahan daakhil nahi honge jab tak woh wahan hain. Tum aur tera Rab jaakar lado – hum to yahin baithte hain.
5.25: Moosa ne kaha: Aey Rab! Main apne siwa aur mere bhai ke siwa kisi par qaboo nahi rakhta – to hamare aur in faasiq logon ke darmiyan alag kar de.
5.26: Allah ne farmaya: To yeh zameen un par chaalis saal tak haram rahegi – yeh zameen mein bhatak kar phiren ge. To in faasiq logon par afsos na karo.
5.27: Aur unhein Adam ke do beto ka waaqia sachai se sunaao – jab un dono ne qurbani di to ek ki qabool hui aur doosre ki nahi. Usne kaha: main tujhe zaroor qatl kar dunga. Usne jawab diya: Allah sirf muttaqi logon se qabool karta hai.
5.28: Agar tu mere qatl ke liye mujh par haath uthaye ga to main tujh par haath nahi uthaoonga – main Allah se darne wala hoon, jo sab ka Rab hai.
5.29: Main chahta hoon ke tu mere aur apne gunaah ka bojh uthaye aur tu dozakh walon mein ho jaaye – aur yeh zalimon ki saza hai.
5.30: Phir uske nafs ne usse bhai ka qatl karna asaan kar diya – to usne usay qatl kar diya aur khasare mein pad gaya.
5.31: Phir Allah ne ek kaawa bheja jo zameen khod raha tha taake usay dikhaye ke apne bhai ki laash ko kaise chhupaye. Usne kaha: haaye afsos! Kya main is kawe jaisa bhi na ho saka ke apne bhai ki laash chhupa leta? To woh pashemaan hua.
5.32: Isi wajah se humne Bani Israeel par likh diya ke jisne kisi ko – bina kisi qatl ya zameen mein fasaad ke – qatl kiya, to goya usne tamaam insaanon ko qatl kiya. Aur jisne kisi ki jaan bachaayi to goya usne tamaam insaanon ki jaan bachaayi. Aur unke paas hamare Rasool wazeh nishaniyan le kar aaye, phir bhi unmein se bohot se log iske baad bhi zameen mein hadd se guzarte rahe.
5.33: Un logon ki saza jo Allah aur uske Rasool se jung karte hain, aur zameen mein fasaad phailate hain, yeh hai ke unhein qatl kar diya jaye ya unhein sulee di jaye ya unke haath aur paon mukhtalif taraf se kaat diye jayein ya unhein zameen se nikaal diya jaye. Yeh unke liye duniya mein ruswaai hai, aur aakhirat mein unke liye bada azaab hai.
5.34: Siwaye un ke jo tum par qaboo paane se pehle tauba kar lein – to jaane lo ke Allah bakhshne wala, meharban hai.
5.35: Aey logon jo iman laye ho! Allah se daro, aur us ka qurb talash karo, aur uske raaste mein jihad karo taake tum kamiyab ho jao.
5.36: Beshak jin logon ne kufr ikhtiyar kiya, agar unke paas zameen bhar sona ho – aur us ke barabar aur bhi – taake woh usay apne chhutkara ke liye fidiya mein dein, to bhi un se qabool na hoga. Aur unke liye dardnaak azaab hai.
5.37: Woh jahannum se nikalna chaahenge, lekin woh us se kabhi na nikal paayenge. Unke liye daimi azaab hai.
5.38: Chor mard aur chor aurat – dono ke haath kaat do unke kiye ki saza mein – Allah ki taraf se ibretnaak saza. Aur Allah zabardast, hakeem hai.
5.39: Phir jo uske baad tauba kar le aur apna haal sudhaar le to Allah usay maaf kar dega. Beshak Allah bakhshne wala, meharban hai.
5.40: Kya tum nahi jaante ke Allah ke liye hai aasmaan aur zameen ki saltanat? Jise chahta hai azaab deta hai, aur jise chahta hai maaf karta hai. Aur Allah har cheez par qudrat rakhta hai.
5.41: Aey Rasool! Gham na karo un logon se jo kufr mein sabqat karte hain – un mein se jo mooh se kehte hain ke hum iman laye lekin unka dil iman nahi laya, aur un mein se jo Yahudi hain – woh jhoot sunne wale hain, doosri qaum ke liye jo tumhare paas nahi aayi. Woh kalimaat ko unki jagah se tabdeel karte hain. Kehte hain: agar tumhein yeh diya jaye to le lena, aur agar yeh na diya jaye to hoshiyar rehna. Jise Allah gumraah kar de, uske liye tum Allah se kuch nahi kar sakte. Allah aise logon ke dilon ko paak nahi karta – unke liye duniya mein ruswaai hai, aur aakhirat mein bada azaab.
5.42: Jhoot sunne wale hain, haraam khane wale hain. Agar woh tumhare paas aayein to unmein faisla karo ya unhein chhod do. Agar chhod do to woh tumhein kuch bhi nuqsan nahi pahuncha sakte. Aur agar faisla karo to insaaf se karo. Beshak Allah insaaf karne walon ko pasand karta hai.
5.43: Woh tumse kaise faisla chahte hain jab ke unke paas Taurat hai jismein Allah ka faisla hai? Phir bhi woh uske baad mooh mor lete hain – aur woh log momin nahi.
5.44: Beshak humne Taurat nazil ki jismein hidayat aur roshni thi. Uske mutabiq yahudi Nabiyoon ne faisla kiya – un logon ke darmiyan jo Allah ke liye tasleem shuda thay – aur Rabbaniyon aur Ahbaar ne bhi – is liye ke unhein Allah ki kitaab ka zimma diya gaya tha aur woh us par gawaah thay. Pas tum logon se na daro, mujh se daro. Aur meri aayaton ko thode daam par na becho. Aur jo log Allah ke nazil kiye hue ke mutabiq faisla na karein, woh kaafir hain.
5.45: Aur humne us mein likh diya: jaan ke badle jaan, aankh ke badle aankh, naak ke badle naak, kaan ke badle kaan, daant ke badle daant, aur zakhmon ka bhi badla hai. Phir jo koi isko chhod de to yeh us ke liye kaffara hai. Aur jo log Allah ke nazil kiye hue ke mutabiq faisla na karein, woh zalim hain.
5.46: Aur unke baad humne Isa Ibn-e-Maryam ko bheja jo apne se pehle ki Taurat ki tasdeeq karte thay. Aur humne unhein Injeel di jismein hidayat aur roshni thi – aur woh Taurat ki tasdeeq karne wali thi – aur muttaqiyon ke liye hidayat aur naseehat thi.
5.47: Aur Ahl-e-Injeel us ke mutabiq faisla karein jo Allah ne us mein nazil kiya. Aur jo log Allah ke nazil kiye hue ke mutabiq faisla na karein, woh faasiq hain.
5.48: Aur humne tumhari taraf sachai ke saath kitaab nazil ki jo pehle ki kitaabon ki tasdeeq karti hai aur un par nigran hai. To unmein faisla karo us ke mutabiq jo Allah ne nazil kiya, aur unki khwahishon ki pairwi na karo, chhod kar us ke jo tumhare paas aa chuka. Humne tum mein se har ek ke liye ek shari’at aur tareeqa banaya. Aur agar Allah chahta to tum sabko ek ummat bana deta – lekin usne tumhein azmane ke liye alag alag tareeqe diye. To nek kaamon mein aapas mein sabqat lo. Tum sab Allah ki taraf laut kar jaane wale ho – to woh tumhein bata dega jismein tum ikhtilaf karte thay.
5.49: Aur tum unmein faisla karo us ke mutabiq jo Allah ne nazil kiya – aur unki khwahishon ki pairwi na karo. Aur unse hoshiyar raho kahin woh tumhein kisi baat se na bhadka dein jise Allah ne tumhari taraf nazil kiya. Phir agar woh mooh mor lein to jaane lo ke Allah unhein kuch musibat mein daalna chahta hai unke kuch gunaahon ki wajah se. Aur bohot se log faasiq hain.
5.50: Kya woh jaahilana hukm chahte hain? Aur jo log yaqeen rakhte hain unke liye Allah se behtar hukm karne wala kaun hai?
5.51: Aey logon jo iman laye ho! Yahudiyon aur Nasara ko apna dost na banao – woh ek doosre ke dost hain. Aur tum mein se jo unhein dost banaye ga to woh unhi mein se ho jaayega. Beshak Allah zalimon ko hidayat nahi deta.
5.52: Aur tum dekhoge ke jin ke dil mein rog hai woh unke taraf daudte hain, kehte hain: humein darr hai ke koi museebat na aa jaaye. Shayad Allah koi fatah le aaye ya apne taraf se faisla kare – to yeh apne chhupaye hue irade par pashemaan ho jaayein.
5.53: Aur momin kahenge: kya yeh wahi log hain jo Allah ke kasam kha kar kehte thay ke hum tumhare saath hain? Un ke aamal zaya ho gaye – aur yeh nuksaan uthane walay hain.
5.54: Aey logon jo iman laye ho! Jo tum mein se deen se phir jaaye, to Allah ek aur qaum laayega – jo us se mohabbat karegi aur woh us se mohabbat karega – woh mominon ke liye narmi rakhte hain aur kafiron ke liye sakhti – Allah ki raah mein jihad karte hain, kisi malamat karne wale ki parwaah nahi karte. Yeh Allah ka fazl hai – jise chahta hai deta hai. Aur Allah wasay gareeb, jaane wala hai.
5.55: Tumhare wale (dost) sirf Allah, uska Rasool, aur woh log hain jo iman laye, namaz qayam ki, zakat di, aur woh jhukne wale hain.
5.56: Aur jo Allah aur uske Rasool, aur mominon ko dost banaye, to beshak Allah ka lashkar hi ghalib rehta hai.
5.57: Aey logon jo iman laye ho! Un logon ko dost na banao jo tumhare deen ka mazaak uraate hain – chahe woh Ahl-e-Kitaab ho ya kafir. Aur Allah se daro agar tum momin ho.
5.58: Aur jab tum azaan dete ho to woh uska mazaak uraate hain – yeh unka jahalat ka saboot hai.
5.59: Keh do: Aey Ahl-e-Kitaab! Kya tum humein is liye bura keh rahe ho ke hum Allah aur jo kuch hum par utara gaya, aur jo pehle utara gaya, us par iman laye – aur ke tum mein se zyada log faasiq hain?
5.60: Keh do: Kya main tumhein bataoon ke Allah ke nazdeek sabse badtar kaun hai? Woh jin par Allah ne laanat ki, jin par uska gazab hua, jin mein se kuch ko bandar aur suar banaya, aur jin logon ne taghoot ki ibaadat ki – yeh wahi log hain jo darje mein sabse badtar hain aur raah se zyada bhatke hue.
5.61: Aur jab woh tumhare paas aate hain to kehte hain: hum iman laye – halaan ke woh kufr ke saath aaye aur usi ke saath chale gaye. Aur Allah unke chhupaye hue iradon ko jaanta hai.
5.62: Aur tum unmein se bohoton ko dekhoge ke gunah, zyadaani aur haraam khori mein daud rahe hain – kya hi bura kaam hai jo yeh karte hain.
5.63: Rabbaniyon aur Ahbaar unhein gunaah ki baat se aur haraam khori se kyun nahi rokte? Kya hi bura kaam hai jo woh karte hain.
5.64: Aur yahudi kehte hain: Allah ka haath bandha hua hai. Unke haath baandhe gaye aur woh us kehne par laanat ke mustahiq hue. Balki uske dono haath khule hue hain – jaisa chahta hai kharch karta hai. Aur tumhare Rab ki taraf se jo kuch utarta hai woh un mein se zyada logon ki baghawat aur kufr mein izafa karta hai. Aur humne unke darmiyan dushmani aur bugz qayamat tak ke liye daal diya. Jab bhi woh jung ki aag bhadkaate hain to Allah use bujha deta hai. Aur woh zameen mein fasaad phailane ki koshish karte hain – aur Allah fasaad karne walon ko pasand nahi karta.
5.65: Agar Ahl-e-Kitaab iman late aur taqwa ikhtiyar karte to hum unke gunaah zaroor mita dete aur unhein niyamat bhari jannaton mein daakhil kar dete.
5.66: Aur agar woh Taurat, Injeel aur us kitaab ko qayam karte jo unke Rab ki taraf se un par utari gayi to unke oopar se aur unke paon ke neeche se unhein rizq milta. Un mein se ek group meyaana raasta ikhtiyar karta hai, magar un mein se zyada log bure kaam karte hain.
5.67: Aey Rasool! Pohcha do jo kuch tumhare Rab ki taraf se tum par nazil hua. Aur agar tumne na kiya to tumne uska paighaam nahi pohochaya. Aur Allah tumhein logon se bacha lega. Beshak Allah kafiron ko hidayat nahi deta.
5.68: Keh do: Aey Ahl-e-Kitaab! Tum kisi raaste par nahi ho jab tak ke Taurat aur Injeel aur jo kuch tumhare Rab ki taraf se utara gaya usay qayam na karo. Jo kuch tumhare Rab ki taraf se tum par utarta hai woh un mein se zyada logon ki baghawat aur kufr mein izafa karta hai. To tum kafiron ke liye afsos na karo.
5.69: Beshak jo log iman laye, aur jo Yahudi, Saabi, aur Nasara hain – jo bhi Allah aur aakhirat par iman laye aur neik amal kare to unpar na koi darr hoga, na woh ghamgeen honge.
5.70: Beshak humne Bani Israeel se ahad liya, aur unke paas Rasool bheje. Jab bhi koi Rasool unke paas aaya aisi baat le kar jo unke dil ko pasand na thi to unhon ne kuch ko jhutlaya aur kuch ko qatl kar diya.
5.71: Aur unhon ne samjha ke koi saza un par na aayegi – to woh andhe aur behre ho gaye. Phir Allah ne unki tauba qubool ki – phir un mein se bohot se phir andhe aur behre ban gaye. Aur Allah unke aamaal ko dekh raha hai.
5.72: Woh log yaqeenan kafir ho gaye jo kehte hain ke Allah hi Masih Ibn-e-Maryam hai. Halaanke Masih ne kaha tha: Aey Bani Israeel! Allah ki bandagi karo jo mera Rab aur tumhara Rab hai. Jo Allah ke saath shirk kare to Allah ne us par jannat haram kar di, aur uska thikana jahannum hai. Aur zalimon ka koi madadgaar nahi.
