5.73: Woh log bhi kafir ho gaye jo kehte hain: Allah teen mein se teesra hai. Halaanke ek ilah ke siwa koi ilah nahi. Agar woh is baat se baaz na aayein to unmein se jin logon ne kufr ikhtiyar kiya un par dardnaak azaab zaroor hoga.
5.74: To kya woh Allah se tauba nahi karte, aur us se maafi nahi maangte? Aur Allah to bakhshne wala, meharban hai.
5.75: Masih Ibn-e-Maryam sirf Rasool thay – unse pehle bhi Rasool guzar chuke hain. Aur unki maa ek sachchi aurat thi. Dono khana khate thay. Dekho hum unke liye aayatein kis tarah wazeh karte hain – phir dekho woh kaise ulte phirte hain.
5.76: Keh do: Kya tum Allah ke siwa un ki bandagi karte ho jo na tumhare liye nuqsan ke maalik hain na faida ke? Aur Allah sab kuch sunne wala, jaane wala hai.
5.77: Keh do: Aey Ahl-e-Kitaab! Apne deen mein hadd se na guzro – haqq ke siwa – aur un logon ki khwahishon ki pairwi na karo jo pehle gumraah ho chuke, aur bohoton ko gumraah kiya, aur raah se bhatak gaye.
5.78: Un logon par laanat ki gayi jo Bani Israeel mein se kafir hue – Dawood aur Isa Ibn-e-Maryam ki zubaan se. Yeh is liye ke woh nafarmani karte rahe aur hadd se guzarte rahe.
5.79: Woh ek doosre ko buray kaamon se nahi rokte thay jo woh karte thay – kya hi bura kaam tha jo woh karte thay.
5.80: Tum unmein se zyada logon ko dekhoge ke kafiron se dosti rakhte hain – kya hi bura hai jo unke liye unka nafs aage bhejta hai – ke Allah un se naraaz ho gaya – aur woh hamesha azaab mein rahenge.
5.81: Agar woh Allah aur Nabi aur jo un par utara gaya us par iman late to unhein kafiron se dosti na rakhni padti – magar un mein se zyada faasiq hain.
5.82: Tum paoge ke sabse zyada dushmani tumhare liye woh log rakhte hain jo Yahudi hain aur mushrik. Aur sabse qareeb mohabbat mein tum paoge un logon ko jo kehte hain ke hum Nasara hain – kyun ke un mein ilm wale aur zahid log hain – aur woh takabbur nahi karte.
5.83: Aur jab woh woh baatein sunte hain jo Rasool par utari gayi to tum dekhoge ke unki aankhon se aansu beh rahe hain – kyun ke woh haqq ko pehchan lete hain. Kehte hain: Aey Rab! Hum iman laye – humein gawahon ke saath likh le.
5.84: Aur humein kya ho gaya ke hum Allah aur haqq par iman na laayen jo hamare paas aaya – aur hum chaahte hain ke humein hamara Rab neik logon ke saath jannat mein daakhil kare.
5.85: To Allah ne unhein unke kehne ke badle jannatein ata ki – jinke neeche nehrein beh rahi hongi – jahan woh hamesha rahenge – aur yeh neik amal karne walon ka badla hai.
5.86: Aur jin logon ne kufr ikhtiyar kiya aur hamari aayaton ko jhutlaya – woh dozakh wale hain.
5.87: Aey logon jo iman laye ho! Allah ne tumhare liye jo paak cheezein halal ki hain unhein haram na banao, aur hadd se na badho. Beshak Allah hadd se badhne walon ko pasand nahi karta.
5.88: Aur jo kuch Allah ne tumhein halal paak rozi di hai use khao – aur Allah se daro jismein tum iman rakhte ho.
5.89: Allah tumhein tumhari be maqsad kasamon par nahi pakadta, magar jo kasmein tumne irade se khai ho un par pakadta hai. To uska kaffara das mohtaj ko utna khilana hai jitna apne ghar walon ko khilate ho – ya unhein kapde pehnana – ya ek ghulam ko riha karna. Phir jo na paaye to teen din ke roze rakhe. Yeh tumhari kasamon ka kaffara hai jab tum usay todo. Aur apni kasamon ki hifazat karo. Is tarah Allah tumhare liye apne ahkam wazeh karta hai taake tum shukar guzar bano.
5.90: Aey logon jo iman laye ho! Sharab, jua, but, aur qismat ke teer – yeh sab shaitani kaam hain – in se bacho taake tum falaah pao.
5.91: Shaitaan chahta hai ke sharab aur jua ke zariye tumhare darmiyan dushmani aur bugz daale – aur tumhein Allah ki yaad aur namaz se roke – to kya tum ruk jaoge?
5.92: Aur Allah ka hukum maano, aur Rasool ka hukum maano – aur hoshiyar raho. Agar tum mooh moroge to jaane lo ke hamare Rasool par sirf saaf paighaam ponchana hai.
5.93: Jo log iman laye aur neik amal kiye un par jo kuch woh pehle kha chuke us mein koi gunaah nahi – jab tak woh taqwa ikhtiyar karte rahein, aur iman laate rahein, aur neik amal karte rahein, phir taqwa aur iman mein barh jaayein, phir taqwa aur neik amal mein sabqat karein. Aur Allah neik amal karne walon ko pasand karta hai.
5.94: Aey logon jo iman laye ho! Allah tumhein zaroor aazmaaye ga kisi shikar se jo tumhare haathon aur neezon ke qareeb hoga jab tum ehraam mein ho – taake Allah dekh le ke kaun us se bagair dekhe bhi darta hai. Phir jo iske baad hadd se guzre us ke liye dardnaak azaab hai.
5.95: Aey logon jo iman laye ho! Shikar na maro jab tum ehraam mein ho. Aur jo koi jaankar shikar kare to us ka badla ek paaltu jaanwar hai jo us ke barabar ho – aur us ka faisla do aadil log karen – woh qurbani ka jaanwar kaabe tak pohnchaya jaye – ya kaffara ek mohtaj ko khilana – ya us ke barabar roza rakhna – taake woh apne kiye ka maza chakhe. Allah ne jo guzra maaf kar diya, magar jo phir kare usse Allah badla lega. Aur Allah zabardast, badla lene wala hai.
5.96: Samandar ka shikar aur us ka khana tumhare liye halal kiya gaya – tumhare liye aur musafiron ke liye – aur zameen ka shikar tum par haram kiya gaya jab tak tum ehraam mein ho. Aur Allah se daro jiske paas tum ikatthe kiye jaoge.
5.97: Allah ne Kaaba – Bait-ul-Haram – ko logon ke liye qayam ka sabab banaya – aur haram mahine, qurbani ke jaanwar aur un ka galay mein daala gaya haar bhi. Yeh is liye ke tum jaano ke Allah ke liye hai jo kuch aasmaano aur zameen mein hai. Aur Allah har cheez se waaqif hai.
5.98: Jaane lo ke Allah sakht saza dene wala hai – aur Allah bakhshne wala, meharban bhi hai.
5.99: Rasool par sirf paighaam pohnchana hai. Aur Allah jaanta hai jo kuch tum izhaar karte ho aur jo kuch tum chhupate ho.
5.100: Keh do: Napak aur paak barabar nahi ho sakte – chahe napak ki kasrat tumhein achhi lage. To aql walon! Allah se daro taake tum kamiyab ho jao.
5.101: Aey logon jo iman laye ho! Aisi cheezon ke baare mein na pucho jo agar tum par zahir kar di jayein to tumhein takleef pahunchayein – lekin agar tum unhein us waqt pucho jab Quran nazil kiya ja raha ho to woh tum par zahir kar di jayengi. Allah ne unhein chhod diya, aur Allah bakhshne wala, burdabar hai.
5.102: Tum se pehle kuch log aise sawal kar chuke hain, phir woh unhi ki wajah se munkir ban gaye.
5.103: Allah ne na to Bahirah banaya, na Saibah, na Wasilah, na Ham. Magar woh log jinhon ne kufr kiya unhon ne Allah par jhooti baatein ghadh li hain – aur unmein se aksar samajhte nahi.
5.104: Aur jab unse kaha jaata hai ke aao us taraf jo Allah ne nazil kiya hai aur Rasool ki taraf to kehte hain: Humein wahi kaafi hai jo humne apne baapon ko karte dekha – kya agar unke baap kuch bhi na jaante ho aur na hi raasta paayein to bhi?
5.105: Aey logon jo iman laye ho! Apni fikr karo – agar tum raah par ho to woh log jo bhatak gaye hain tumhein nuqsan nahi pahunchayenge. Tum sab ko Allah ki taraf laut kar jaana hai – phir woh tumhein bata dega jo kuch tum karte rahe ho.
5.106: Aey logon jo iman laye ho! Jab tum mein se kisi ki maut ka waqt aa jaye aur woh wasiyat kare to gawahi ke liye tum mein se do insaaf par qayam rakhne wale aadmi hoon – ya agar tum safar mein ho aur tum par museebat aa jaaye to kisi aur qaum ke do log hoon. Tum un dono ko namaz ke baad roko – agar tumhein shak ho – phir woh Allah ki kasam khaayein ke hum is mein koi faida hasil karna nahi chahte, chahe koi qareeb ho – aur na hum Allah ki gawahi ko chhupate hain – warna hum gunahgaar hain.
5.107: Phir agar pata chal jaye ke dono ne gunaah kiya hai to phir unki jagah woh do aadmi khade hon jin ke haqq mein gawahi di gayi ho – aur woh Allah ki kasam khaayein ke hamari gawahi unki gawahi se zyada sachchi hai – aur humne hadd se nahi guzra – warna hum zalimon mein se hon.
5.108: Is tarah yeh zyada mumkin hai ke log theek gawahi dein ya daren ke unki kasamon ka jawab kisi aur ki kasam na ban jaye. Aur Allah se daro aur suno – aur Allah faasiq logon ko hidayat nahi deta.
5.109: Jis din Allah Rasoolon ko jama karega aur poochega: Tumhein kya jawab diya gaya? Woh kahenge: Humein ilm nahi – beshak tu hi gaib ki baatein jaanta hai.
5.110: Jab Allah kahega: Aey Isa Ibn-e-Maryam! Yaad kar meri woh niyamat jo maine tujh par aur teri maa par ki – jab maine tujh ko Rooh-ul-Qudus se taqat di – tu logon se jhule mein aur bade hone ke baad bhi baat karta tha. Aur maine tujhe kitaab aur hikmat aur Taurat aur Injeel ki taleem di. Aur jab tu mere hukum se mitti se ek parinda banata tha, phir us mein phoonkta to woh mere hukum se parinda ban jaata – aur tu mere hukum se madar zaad andhe aur leper ko theek karta – aur jab tu murdon ko nikaal kar zinda karta mere hukum se – aur jab maine Bani Israeel ko tujh se roka jab tu unke paas khuli nishaniyan le kar aaya – to un mein se kuch kehte: yeh to khula jaadu hai.
5.111: Aur jab maine Hawariyon ke dil mein dala ke mujhe aur mere Rasool ko maano – unhon ne kaha: Hum maan gaye – aur gawah raho ke hum muslim hain.
5.112: Jab Hawariyon ne kaha: Aey Isa Ibn-e-Maryam! Kya tera Rab hum par aasmaan se ek sofra utar sakta hai? Usne kaha: Allah se daro agar tum momin ho.
5.113: Unhon ne kaha: Hum chahte hain ke us se khana khayein aur hamare dil mutmaeen ho jayein, aur humein pata chale ke tu ne humein sach kaha – aur hum is par gawah ban jayein.
5.114: Isa Ibn-e-Maryam ne dua ki: Aey Allah! Aey hamare Rab! Hum par aasmaan se ek sofra utaar jo hamare liye aur hamare pehle aur baad ke liye ek tehwaar ho – aur teri taraf se ek nishani – aur humein rizq de – tu behtareen raziq hai.
5.115: Allah ne kaha: Main usay zaroor tum par utaarunga – magar jo is ke baad bhi inkaar karega to usay main aisa azaab dunga jo duniya mein kisi ko na diya hoga.
5.116: Aur jab Allah kahega: Aey Isa Ibn-e-Maryam! Kya tu ne logon se kaha ke mujhe aur meri maa ko Allah ke siwa mabood banao? To woh kahega: Subhanak! Mujhe yeh kaise ho sakta hai ke main woh keh doon jo mujhe ka haq nahi. Agar maine aisi baat kahi hoti to tu zaroor jaanta – tu jaanta hai jo mere dil mein hai – aur main nahi jaanta jo tere dil mein hai. Beshak tu hi gaib ki baatein jaanta hai.
5.117: Main ne unse sirf wahi kaha jo tu ne mujhe hukm diya: ke Allah ki bandagi karo jo mera aur tumhara Rab hai. Aur jab tak main un mein raha un par nigraani karta raha. Phir jab tu ne mujhe utha liya to tu un par nigraan tha – aur tu har cheez par gawah hai.
5.118: Agar tu unhein azaab de to woh tere banday hain – aur agar tu unhein maaf kare to tu sab par gaalib, hakeem hai.
5.119: Allah kahega: Yeh woh din hai jab sachchon ko unki sachai ka faida hoga – unke liye jannatein hongi jinke neeche nehrein beh rahi hongi – jahan woh hamesha rahenge – Allah unse razi, woh Allah se razi – yeh badi kamiyabi hai.
5.120: Allah ke liye hai aasmaanon aur zameen aur unmein jo kuch hai uski baadshahi – aur woh har cheez par qudrat rakhta hai.

6.1: Sab tareef Allah ke liye hai jisne aasman aur zameen ko banaya, aur andheron aur roshni ko paida kiya. Phir bhi woh log jinhein kufr hai, apne Rab ke barabar dosray rakhte hain.
6.2: Wahi hai jisne tumhein mitti se paida kiya, phir ek waqt muqarrar kiya – aur uske paas ek aur waqt likha hua hai – phir bhi tum log shak karte ho.
6.3: Wahi Allah hai aasmano mein bhi aur zameen mein bhi – woh tumhari baat bhi jaanta hai aur jo kuch tum chhupate ho woh bhi – aur woh jaanta hai jo kuch tum kamate ho.
6.4: Aur unke paas unke Rab ki taraf se koi nishani nahi aati magar woh us se mooh mor lete hain.
6.5: So unhon ne jhutlaya sach ko jab woh un ke paas aaya – phir jald hi unke paas us cheez ki khabrein aa jaayengi jiska woh mazaaq udate thay.
6.6: Kya unhon ne nahi dekha ke hum un se pehle kitni qaumein halaak kar chuke hain jinhein humne zameen mein woh qudrat di thi jo tumhein nahi di – aur humne un par aasmaan se bohot saari baarish barsayi, aur humne unke neeche se nadiyaan chala di – phir humne unhein unke gunaahon ke wajah se halaak kar diya, aur un ke baad doosri qaumein uthayi.
6.7: Aur agar hum tum par koi likhi likhai kitaab qagaz mein utaar kar dete aur woh usey apne haathon se chhoo bhi lete to bhi yeh munkir kehte: yeh to khula jaadu hai.
6.8: Aur kehte hain: is par koi farishta kyun nahi utara gaya? Agar hum farishta utaarte to kaam tamam ho chuka hota – phir unhein mohallat na milti.
6.9: Aur agar hum kisi farishte ko bhejte to usey bhi insaan banate – aur woh unko wahi shak mein daal deta jismein woh ab pade hain.
6.10: Aur tum se pehle bhi Rasoolon ka mazaaq banaya gaya – phir jin logon ne unka mazaaq banaya unhein usi cheez ne le liya jiska woh mazaaq udate thay.
6.11: Keh do: zameen mein chalo phiro, phir dekho ke jhutlanay walon ka anjaam kya hua.
6.12: Keh do: kis ka hai jo kuch aasmano aur zameen mein hai? Keh do: Allah ka. Usne apne upar rehmat likh di hai – woh zaroor tumhein qayamat ke din jama karega – is mein koi shak nahi. Magar jin logon ne apni jaanon ko nuqsan diya woh iman nahi laate.
6.13: Aur jo kuch raat mein aur din mein rehta hai woh usi ka hai – aur woh sab kuch sunta, jaanta hai.
6.14: Keh do: kya main Allah ke siwa kisi aur ko apna wali banao jo aasmanon aur zameen ka khaliq hai – aur jo khilata hai magar khata nahi? Keh do: mujhe hukm diya gaya hai ke sabse pehle Muslim banoon – aur hargiz shirk karne walon mein se na hoon.
6.15: Keh do: agar main apne Rab ki nafarmani karoon to mujhe ek bade din ke azaab ka dar hai.
6.16: Jis se us din azaab hata diya gaya, us par Allah ne rahmat ki – aur yahi khuli kamiyabi hai.
6.17: Agar Allah tumhein koi takleef de to uske siwa koi door karne wala nahi – aur agar woh tumhein koi bhalaee de to woh har cheez par qudrat rakhta hai.
6.18: Aur woh apne bandon par sab par qaabiz hai – aur woh hakeem, bakhshne wala hai.
6.19: Keh do: kaunsi cheez gawahi mein sabse badi hai? Keh do: Allah mere aur tumhare darmiyan gawah hai – aur yeh Quran mujhe wahi ke taur par diya gaya hai taake main tumhein aur jise yeh pahunche daraoon. Kya tum waqai gawahi dete ho ke Allah ke saath doosre mabood bhi hain? Keh do: main to gawahi nahi deta. Keh do: bas wohi ek mabood hai – aur main us shirk se bari hoon jo tum karte ho.
6.20: Jinhein humne kitaab di woh usey is tarah pehchante hain jaise apne bete ko pehchante hain – magar jin logon ne apni jaan ka nuksan kiya woh iman nahi laate.
6.21: Aur us se bada zalim kaun hoga jo Allah par jhoot ghade, ya uski aayaat ko jhutlaye? Beshak zalimon ka kabhi falaah nahi.
6.22: Aur us din jab hum un sab ko jama karenge – phir unse kahenge: kahan hain tumhare woh jinke tum dawa karte thay?
6.23: Phir unka jawab kuch na hoga siwa is ke kehna: Hamare Rab ki qasam! Hum shirk karne walay na thay.
6.24: Dekh lo! Unhon ne apne khilaaf jhoot bola – aur woh sab gum ho gaya jo woh ghadhte thay.
6.25: Aur un mein se kuch aise hain jo tumhari taraf dekhte hain – magar humne unke dilon par parde daal diye hain ke woh samajh na paayein – aur unke kaano mein bojh daal diya hai – agar woh har nishani bhi dekh lein to bhi us par iman nahi laayenge – yahaan tak ke jab tumhare paas jhagadne ko aate hain to yeh kehte hain: yeh pehle walon ke qisse ke siwa kuch nahi.
6.26: Woh usse rokte bhi hain aur khud bhi us se door rehte hain – magar woh apne hi ko nuqsan pahucha rahe hain – aur samajhte nahi.
6.27: Kaash tum dekhte jab unhein aag ke samne laya jayega to woh kahenge: kaash hum waapas bheje jaate – to apne Rab ki aayaton ko jhutlaate na, aur momin ho jaate.
6.28: Balki jo kuch woh pehle chhupaya karte thay woh ab un par zahir ho gaya – aur agar unhein waapas bhej diya jaye to phir wahi karein jo pehle karte thay – woh to jhootay hain.
6.29: Aur kehte hain: kuch nahi hai magar yeh duniya ki zindagi – aur hum dobara uthaye nahi jaayenge.
6.30: Kaash tum dekhte jab woh apne Rab ke samne khade kiye jaayenge – to woh kahega: kya yeh haqq nahi? Woh kahenge: haan, hamaare Rab ki qasam – woh kahega: to ab azaab ka maza chhako is ke inkar ki wajah se.
6.31: Nuksaan mein rahe woh log jinhon ne apne Rab se mulaqat ko jhutlaya – yahaan tak ke jab achanak unpar qayamat aa gayi to kehenge: haaye hamari barbaadi! Hum is mein kitni hi kotahi kar baithe. Aur woh apne bojh apni peeth par uthaye honge – sun lo! Kya hi bura bojh hai jo woh uthaaye honge.
6.32: Duniya ki zindagi to sirf khel aur tafreeh hai – aur aakhirat ka ghar un logon ke liye behtar hai jo taqwa ikhtiyar karte hain – kya tum samajhte nahi?
6.33: Humein maloom hai ke unki baatein tumhein ghamgheen karti hain – magar woh tumhein jhutlate nahi – balke yeh zalim Allah ki aayaat ka inkaar kar rahe hain.
6.34: Tum se pehle bhi Rasoolon ko jhutlaya gaya – phir woh sabr karte rahe jise jhutlaya gaya – aur takleef di gayi – yahaan tak ke hamari madad un tak pohnch gayi. Aur Allah ke kalimaat mein koi tabdili nahi – aur tum tak pehle walon ki khabrein pohnch chuki hain.
6.35: Agar tumhara inkaari hona tum par sakht hai to agar tum kisi surang ke zariye zameen mein ghus jao ya seedhi rassi aasman mein laga do to unke liye koi nishani le aao – to agar Allah chahta to sab ko hidayat de deta – to tum jahilon mein se mat ho jao.
6.36: Baat to wahi sunte hain jo qabool karne walay hain – aur murdon ko Allah uthaaye ga – phir usi ki taraf sab lautaye jaayenge.
6.37: Aur kehte hain: is par uske Rab ki taraf se koi nishani kyun nahi utaari gayi? Keh do: Allah har cheez par qadir hai – aur lekin un mein se zyada nahi jaante.
6.38: Zameen mein koi chalne wala janwar aur paron se udne wala koi parinda nahi magar woh bhi tumhari tarah ummatein hain – humne kitaab mein koi kami nahi ki – phir woh apne Rab ki taraf jama kiye jaayenge.
6.39: Aur jo log hamari aayaton ko jhutlate hain woh behre aur goongay hain – andheron mein bhatak rahe hain – jise Allah chahta hai gumraah kar deta hai, aur jise chahta hai raah-e-raast par le aata hai.
6.40: Keh do: batao, agar tum par Allah ka azaab aa jaye ya tum par qayamat aa jaaye to kya tum Allah ke siwa kisi ko pukaroge agar tum sachche ho?
6.41: Balki usi ko pukaroge – phir agar woh chahega to jis museebat ke liye tumne usse dua ki usse door kar dega – aur tum unhein bhool jaoge jinko tum shirk mein pukarte thay.
6.42: Aur humne tum se pehle bhi bohot si qaumon mein Rasool bheje – phir humne unhein tangdasti aur museebat mein dala taake woh gir-giraayein.
6.43: To jab un par hamara azaab aaya to woh kyun nahi gir-giraye? Magar unke dil sakht ho gaye – aur shaitaan ne unhein unke aamaal khushnuma bana diye.
6.44: Phir jab woh bhool gaye jo unhein yaad dilaya gaya tha to humne un par har cheez ke darwaze khol diye – yahaan tak ke jab woh us cheez mein khush ho gaye jo unhein di gayi thi to achanak humne unhein pakad liya – to woh ummed se toot gaye.
6.45: To zulm karne wale log jadh se kaat diye gaye – aur sab tareef Allah ke liye hai jo sab jahanon ka Rab hai.
6.46: Keh do: batao, agar Allah tumhare kaan aur tumhari aankhein le le – aur tumhare dilon par mohr laga de to Allah ke siwa kaunsa mabood hai jo tumhein yeh sab wapas la dega? Dekho hum kis tarah apni aayatein wazeh karte hain – phir bhi woh mooh mor lete hain.
6.47: Keh do: batao, agar tum par Allah ka azaab achanak ya khule aam aa jaye to kya halak kiya jaayega magar zalimon ko?
6.48: Aur hum Rasoolon ko sirf basharat dene walay aur daraane walay bana kar bhejte hain – to jo iman laye aur neik amal kiye un par na dar hoga na woh ghamgeen honge.
6.49: Aur jo hamari aayaton ko jhutlaye unhein azaab chhoo le ga unke fisq ki wajah se.
6.50: Keh do: main tumse nahi kehta ke mere paas Allah ke khazaane hain – aur na main gaib jaanta hoon – aur na main tumse kehta hoon ke main farishta hoon – main to sirf us cheez ka pairwi karta hoon jo meri taraf wahi ki jaati hai – keh do: kya andha aur dekhne wala barabar ho sakte hain? Kya tum ghoor nahi karte?
6.51: Aur us se darrao jo log apne Rab ke samne jama kiye jaayenge – jinke liye uske siwa na koi madadgaar hoga na sifarish karne wala – shayad ke woh dar jaayein.
6.52: Aur unhein na bhagao jo apne Rab ko subah shaam uski raza chah kar pukarte hain – unke hisaab mein tum kuch bhi zimmedar nahi – aur na unke hisaab mein woh – agar unhein bhaga diya to tum zalimon mein se ho jaoge.
6.53: Aur is tarah humne kuch logon ko kuch ke zariye azmaya ke woh kahen: kya yeh woh log hain jin par Allah ne hum mein se fazl kiya? Kya Allah behtar jaane wala nahi hai shukar guzar logon ke baare mein?
6.54: Aur jab tumhare paas woh log aayen jo hamari aayaton par iman laate hain to keh do: tum par salaam ho – tumhare Rab ne apne upar rahmat likh di hai – ke tum mein se jo kisi jahalat se koi bura kaam kar baithe, phir uske baad tauba kar le aur islah kar le to Allah bakhshne wala, meherban hai.
6.55: Aur is tarah hum aayatein tafseel se bayaan karte hain taake mujrimon ka raasta wazeh ho jaye.
6.56: Keh do: mujhe mana kiya gaya hai ke main unhein poojoon jinko tum Allah ke siwa pukarte ho – keh do: main tumhari khwahishon ki pairwi nahi karta – warna main gumraah ho jaoonga aur raah-e-raast par na rahunga.
6.57: Keh do: main apne Rab ki taraf se ek roshan daleel par hoon – aur tumne isay jhutla diya – mere paas woh cheez nahi jiske liye tum jaldi karte ho – faisla to Allah ke haath mein hai – woh sach bayaan karta hai – aur woh behtareen faisla karne wala hai.
6.58: Keh do: agar mere paas woh cheez hoti jiske liye tum jaldi karte ho to kab ka faisla ho chuka hota mere aur tumhare darmiyan – aur Allah zalimon ko khoob jaanta hai.
6.59: Aur usi ke paas gaib ki kunjiyaan hain – unhein us ke siwa koi nahi jaanta – aur woh jaanta hai jo kuch zameen aur samandar mein hai – aur koi patta nahi girta magar woh usey jaanta hai – aur na koi daana zameen ke andheron mein – na koi geela, na koi sukha magar sab kuch kitaab-e-mubeen mein hai.
6.60: Aur wahi hai jo tumhein raat ko wafat deta hai – aur jo kuch tumne din mein kiya usey jaanta hai – phir woh tumhein us mein uthaata hai taake ek muqarrar waqt poora kiya jaye – phir usi ki taraf tumhara rujoo hai – phir woh tumhein bata dega jo kuch tum karte rahe ho.
6.61: Aur wahi apne bandon par qaabiz hai – aur tum par hifaazat karne wale bhejta hai – yahaan tak ke jab tum mein se kisi ki maut aa jaaye to hamare farishte usko wafat dete hain – aur woh koi kotahi nahi karte.
6.62: Phir sab Allah ki taraf lautaye jaate hain – jo unka haqiqi Maula hai – sun lo! Faisla usi ka hai – aur woh sab se tez hisaab lene wala hai.
6.63: Keh do: kaun tumhein zameen aur samandar ke andheron se bachaata hai jab tum usey geer-geer kar aur chupke se pukarte ho ke agar usne humein is museebat se bacha liya to hum zaroor shukar guzar honge?
6.64: Keh do: Allah hi tumhein un sab museebaton se aur har takleef se bachaata hai – phir tum shirk karte ho.
6.65: Keh do: woh is par bhi qadir hai ke tum par koi azaab tumhare upar se ya tumhare paon ke neeche se bhej de – ya tumhein girohon mein baant de – aur tum mein se ek ko doosre ki ladaai ka maza chakhaye – dekho hum kis tarah aayatein wazeh karte hain – shayad ke woh samjhein.
6.66: Aur tumhari qaum ne isay jhutla diya – halaanke yeh haqq hai – keh do: main tumhara zimmedar nahi.
6.67: Har khabar ke liye ek waqt hai – aur anqareeb tum jaan loge.
6.68: Aur jab tum unhein dekho jo hamari aayaton mein uljhte hain to unse mooh mor lo yahaan tak ke woh kisi doosri baat mein lag jaayein – aur agar shaitaan tumhein bhula de to yaad aane ke baad zaalim logon ke saath na baitho.
6.69: Aur taqwa rakhne walon par unka kuch zimma nahi – magar yaad dila dena hai – taake woh bhi dar jaayein.
6.70: Aur un logon ko chhod do jinhon ne apne deen ko tafreeh aur khel bana liya hai – aur duniya ki zindagi ne unhein dhoka diya – aur unhein yaad dilao ke kahin koi apni kamayi ke sabab kisi museebat mein na aa jaye – us waqt Allah ke siwa na koi madadgaar hoga, na sifarish – aur agar woh har cheez de kar chutkara chahen to bhi unse qabool na kiya jaaye – yeh woh log hain jo apni kamayi ke sabab halaak hue – aur unke liye garam pani ka peena hoga – aur dardnaak azaab ke mustahiq honge unke kufr ke sabab.
6.71: Keh do: kya hum Allah ke siwa kisi aur ko pukarein jo na humein faida de sakta hai na nuqsan – aur ulat jaayein baad is ke ke Allah ne humein hidayat di? Jaise woh log jinhein shaitanon ne raahein bhula di – aur woh zameen mein bhatak rahe hain – aur unke saathi kehte hain: hamari taraf aao – keh do: Allah ki hidayat hi hidayat hai – aur humein hukm diya gaya ke hum sab Rab ke liye jhuk jaayein.
6.72: Aur yeh ke namaz qayam karo – aur us se daro – wahi hai jiske paas tum jama kiye jaoge.
6.73: Aur wahi hai jisne aasmano aur zameen ko barhaq paida kiya – us din woh kahega 'ho ja' to ho jaayega – uska kehna haq hai – aur usi ki baadshahi hai jab sur phoonka jaayega – woh zaahir aur baatin ko jaanta hai – aur wahi hakeem, waaqif hai.
6.74: Aur yaad karo jab Ibrahim ne apne baap Azar se kaha: kya tum buthon ko apna mabood banate ho? Mujhe lagta hai ke tum aur tumhari qaum khuli gumraahi mein ho.
6.75: Aur is tarah humne Ibrahim ko aasmano aur zameen ka nizaam dikhaya taake woh yaqeen rakhne walon mein se ho jaaye.
6.76: Phir jab raat us par chhaayi to usne ek taara dekha – kaha: yeh mera Rab hai – magar jab woh chhip gaya to bola: main chhip jaane walon se muhabbat nahi karta.
6.77: Phir jab usne chand ko chamakte dekha to kaha: yeh mera Rab hai – magar jab woh chhip gaya to kaha: agar mera Rab mujhe hidayat na de to main bhi gumraah ho jaoonga.
6.78: Phir jab usne sooraj ko chamakta dekha to kaha: yeh mera Rab hai – yeh to sab se bada hai – magar jab woh bhi chhip gaya to bola: Aey logon! Main us se bari hoon jise tum shirk mein pukarte ho.
6.79: Main ne apna rukh usi ki taraf kar diya jisne aasmano aur zameen ko paida kiya – ek sachche tauheed wale ban kar – aur main shirk karne walon mein se nahi hoon.
6.80: Aur uski qaum ne us se jhagda kiya – usne kaha: kya tum mujh se Allah ke baare mein jhagda karte ho? Halaanke usne mujhe hidayat de di hai – aur main unse nahi darta jise tum uske saath shareek banate ho – magar yeh ke mera Rab kuch chahe – mera Rab har cheez ko apne ilm se ghera hua hai – kya tum hosh mein nahi aate?
6.81: Aur main unse kaise daroon jise tum uske saath shareek banate ho? Jabke tum Allah se nahi darte ke uske saath kuch shareek banate ho jinke liye usne koi dalil nahi utaari – to dono giroh mein kaun hifazat mein hai agar tum jaante ho?
6.82: Woh log jo iman laaye aur apne iman ko zulm se nahi milaya – wahi hain jo aman mein hain – aur wahi raah par hain.
6.83: Aur yeh hamari hujjat thi jo humne Ibrahim ko uski qaum ke khilaaf di – hum jise chahte hain darajaat mein buland karte hain – beshak tumhara Rab hakeem, sab kuch jaane wala hai.
6.84: Aur humne usko Ishaq aur Yaqoob diya – sab ko hidayat di – aur Nuh ko pehle hi hidayat di – aur uske nasl mein Dawood, Sulaiman, Ayub, Yusuf, Moosa, aur Haroon – aur is tarah hum nekon ko jazaa dete hain.
6.85: Aur Zakariya, Yahya, Isa, aur Ilyas – sab neik logon mein se thay.
6.86: Aur Ismail, Alyasa, Yunus, aur Lut – sab ko duniya mein fazilat di – aur aakhirat mein woh sab neik logon mein se hain.
6.87: Aur unke baap dada, unki aulad, aur unke bhaiyon mein se kuch ko – aur unhein chuna – aur sidhe raaste ki hidayat di.
6.88: Yeh Allah ki hidayat hai – jise chahta hai apne bandon mein se deta hai – agar woh shirk karte to unke sab aamal zaya ho jaate.
6.89: Yeh woh log hain jinhon ko humne kitaab, hukm aur nabuwat di – agar yeh log in sab cheezon ka inkaar karte hain to humne aise logon ko unka zimma daar bana diya hai jo unka inkaar nahi karte.
6.90: Yahi woh log hain jinhon ko Allah ne hidayat di – to unki hidayat ki pairwi karo – keh do: main is paighaam par tum se koi ajar nahi maangta – yeh to sirf duniya walon ke liye naseehat hai.
6.91: Aur unhon ne Allah ka kuch haq nahi samjha jab unhon ne kaha: Allah ne kisi bashar par kuch bhi nahi utaara – keh do: kisne utaari woh kitaab jo Moosa par nazil ki gayi – jo roshni aur hidayat thi logon ke liye – jise tumne parchay parchay kar diya – kuch dikhate ho, kuch chhupate ho – aur sikhaya gaya tha jo tum nahi jaante thay – na tumhare baap dada – keh do: Allah – phir unhein unke uljhan mein chhod do – woh khel rahe hain.
6.92: Aur yeh bhi ek kitaab hai jise humne nazil kiya – barakat wali – tasdeeq karti hai pehle ki – taake tum badi bastiyon ko darao – aur jo uske gird o nawah mein hain – aur jo aakhirat par iman laate hain woh is par bhi iman laate hain – aur woh apni namazon ki hifazat karte hain.
6.93: Aur us se bada zalim kaun jo Allah par jhoot ghade, ya kahe: mujhe bhi wahi aayi hai – halaanke us par kuch bhi nahi aaya – aur jo kahe: main bhi aisa utaar sakta hoon jaisa Allah ne utaara – agar tum dekhte jab yeh zalim maut ki sakhti mein hote hain – aur farishte apne haath phailaye hote hain: nikalo apni jaan – aaj tumhein zaleel azaab diya jaayega is wajah se ke tum Allah ke naam se jhoot bolte thay – aur uski aayaton se ghror karte thay...
6.94: ...aur (us waqt) tumne aa liya hamare paas akelay, jaise humne tumhein pehli martaba paida kiya tha – aur peeche chhod aaye woh sab kuch jo humne tumhein diya tha – aur tumhare sath tumhare woh sifarish karne wale bhi nahi rahe jinko tum samajhte thay ke woh tumhare haq mein shafaat kareinge – ab tum sab ke darmiyan kata gaya – aur woh sab kuch gum ho gaya jo tum dawa karte thay.
6.95: Beshak Allah hi beej aur guthli ko phaadta hai – woh murdon se zinda ko nikaalta hai – aur zindon se murda ko – yahi Allah hai – phir tum kidhar bhatakte ho?
6.96: Wahi fajar ka cheerne wala hai – aur usi ne raat ko sukoon banaya – aur sooraj aur chand ko hisaab ke liye – yeh zabardast aur sab kuch jaane wale ka taqdeer hai.
6.97: Aur wahi hai jisne tumhare liye taare banaye taake tum unke zariye zameen ke andheron mein raasta paao – humne nishaniyaan tafseel se bayaan kar di hain un logon ke liye jo jaante hain.
6.98: Aur wahi hai jisne tumhein ek hi jaan se paida kiya – phir tumhare liye ek thikana aur ek mustaqil qayaam ki jagah banayi – humne aayatein tafseel se bayaan kar di un logon ke liye jo samajhte hain.
6.99: Aur wahi hai jisne aasman se paani barsaya – phir humne usse har cheez ki nabatat nikaali – phir usme se hara pauda nikaala – jis se hum guthliyon par ek ke upar ek dana nikaalte hain – aur khajoor ke guchchhe – aur anguron, zaitoon aur anaar ke baag – jo ek doosre se milte julte bhi hain aur alag bhi – unke phalon ko dekho jab woh phal laate hain aur unke pakne ko – is mein yaqeenan un logon ke liye nishaniyan hain jo iman laate hain.
6.100: Aur unhon ne jinnon ko Allah ke saath shareek thahara liya – halaanke unhon ne unhein paida kiya – aur Allah ke liye beghair ilm ke bete aur betiyan ghadh liye – woh paak hai – aur woh un baaton se bahut ooncha hai jo yeh kehte hain.
6.101: Aasmaanon aur zameen ka paida karne wala – uska koi beta kaise ho sakta hai jabke uski koi biwi hi nahi – aur usne har cheez ko paida kiya – aur woh har cheez ko jaanta hai.
6.102: Yahi Allah tumhara Rab hai – uske siwa koi mabood nahi – har cheez ka paida karne wala – to usi ki bandagi karo – aur woh har cheez ka nigehbaan hai.
6.103: Uski nazar tak koi nahi pahunch sakta – aur woh sab ki nazar ko jaanta hai – aur woh nihayat bareek been, har baat se baakhabar hai.
6.104: Tumhare paas roshni bhari nishaniyan tumhare Rab ki taraf se aa chuki hain – ab jo dekhega woh apne hi liye dekhega – aur jo andha banega woh apne hi nuqsan ke liye banega – aur main tum par nigehbaan nahi hoon.
6.105: Aur is tarah hum aayatein alag alag tareeqon se bayaan karte hain – taake woh kahen: tumne padhaai ki hai – aur taake hum un logon ke liye isay wazeh kar dein jo ilm rakhte hain.
6.106: Unke saath raho jo apne Rab ki taraf bulaate hain – aur usi ka chehra chahte hain – aur us se parehiz karo – aur unki baat na maano jinhon ne uske siwa auron ko apna ilaah banaya – warna tum bhi halak ho jaaoge.
6.107: Aur agar Allah chahta to woh shirk na karte – aur humne tumhein un par nigehbaan nahi banaya – aur na tum unke zimmedar ho.
6.108: Aur un logon ko bura na kaho jinko yeh Allah ke siwa poojte hain – warna woh bhi hadd se guzarte hue Allah ko bura kahenge be samajhe – is tarah hum har qaum ke liye unka amal khushnuma bana dete hain – phir unhein apne Rab ki taraf lautna hai – phir woh unhein bata dega jo woh karte thay.
6.109: Aur yeh Allah ki kasam kha kar kehte hain ke agar unke paas koi nishani aa jaye to woh zaroor iman layenge – keh do: nishaniyan to sirf Allah ke paas hain – aur tumhein kya pata ke agar woh bhi aa jaayein to bhi yeh iman nahi laayenge.
6.110: Aur hum unke dilon aur nazaron ko ulat dete hain jaise woh pehli baar iman nahi laye thay – aur unhein unki sarkashi mein bhatakne dete hain.
6.111: Aur agar hum unke paas farishte utaar dein – aur murde unse baat karein – aur har cheez ko samne le aayen – to bhi yeh iman nahi laayenge – magar jab Allah chahe – magar unmein se zyada log jaahil hain.
6.112: Aur is tarah humne har Nabi ke liye shaitani insaanon aur jinnon ko dushman banaya – woh ek doosre ko musalsal dhoka dene wali baatein waswasa bana kar sunate hain – agar tumhara Rab chahta to yeh aisa na karte – to unhein unki iftara padh kar chhodo.
6.113: Aur taake un logon ke dil uski taraf jhukein jinhon ko aakhirat par yaqeen nahi – aur woh us se razi ho jaayein – aur woh kar guzrein jo woh karne waale hain.
6.114: Kya main Allah ke siwa koi aur faisla karne wala talaash karoon – halaanke usi ne tumhari taraf tafseel se bayaan ki hui kitaab nazil ki hai? Aur jinhein humne kitaab di woh jaante hain ke yeh tere Rab ki taraf se haqq ke saath nazil hui hai – to tum shak karne walon mein se na ho.
6.115: Aur tumhare Rab ka kalima sach aur insaaf ke saath poora ho gaya – koi uske kalimaat ko tabdeel karne wala nahi – aur woh sab kuch sunta jaanta hai.
6.116: Aur agar tum zyada logon ki baat maanoge jo zameen mein hain to woh tumhein Allah ke raaste se bhatka denge – woh to sirf gumaan par chalte hain – aur sirf andazay lagate hain.
6.117: Tumhara Rab behtar jaanta hai kaun uske raaste se bhatak gaya – aur woh behtar jaanta hai hidayat yafta logon ko.
6.118: To us kaat ko khao jis par Allah ka naam liya gaya ho – agar tum uski aayaton par iman rakhte ho.
6.119: Aur kya ho gaya hai tumhein ke tum us cheez ko nahi khaate jis par Allah ka naam liya gaya ho – halaanke usne tumpar har cheez wazeh kar di hai – magar jis mein tum majboor kar diye jao – aur bohot se log apni khwahishon par bina kisi ilm ke logon ko gumraah karte hain – beshak tumhara Rab hadd se badhne walon ko khoob jaanta hai.
6.120: Aur zahiri aur baatini gunaahon se bach jaao – jo log gunaah kamate hain woh zaroor jald uski saza paayenge.
6.121: Aur us cheez ko na khao jis par Allah ka naam na liya gaya ho – beshak yeh fisq hai – aur shaitan apne doston ko waswasa daalte hain taake woh tumse jhagad karein – agar tumne unki baat maani to tum bhi mushrikeen mein se ho jaoge.
6.122: Kya woh shakhs jo pehle murda tha phir humne usko zinda kiya – aur usko ek roshni di jismein woh logon mein chalta hai – us shakhs ke jaisa ho sakta hai jo andheron mein ho aur us se kabhi nikalne wala na ho? Is tarah kafiron ke liye unke aamal khushnuma bana diye gaye hain.
6.123: Aur is tarah har basti mein humne wahaan ke gunaahgaron ko bada banaya taake woh us mein chalaakiyan karein – aur woh sirf apne hi saath chalaakiyan karte hain – aur unhein us ka sha’oor nahi.
6.124: Aur jab unke paas koi nishani aati hai to kehte hain: hum harگز iman nahi laayenge jab tak humein wahi cheez na di jaye jo Allah ke Rasoolon ko di gayi – Allah behtar jaanta hai jise risalat ke liye muntakhib karna hai – jin logon ne jurm kiya hai unhein Allah ke haan zillat aur sakht azaab hoga unki chalaakiyon ke badle.
6.125: Jise Allah hidayat dena chahta hai uska seena Islam ke liye khol deta hai – aur jise gumraah karna chahta hai uska seena tang aur ghutan wala kar deta hai goya woh aasman mein chadh raha ho – is tarah Allah un logon par ganda kar deta hai jo iman nahi laate.
6.126: Aur yeh tumhare Rab ka seedha raasta hai – humne aayatein un logon ke liye tafseel se bayaan ki hain jo naseehat hasil karte hain.
6.127: Unke liye unke Rab ke haan salaamati ka ghar hai – aur woh unka wali hai unke aamaal ke sabab.
6.128: Aur jis din Allah sabko jama karega (farmaayega): Aey jinnon ke giroh! Tumne insano se bahut faida uthaya – aur insano mein se jo unke dost thay woh kahenge: Aey hamare Rab! Humne ek doosre se faida uthaya – aur hum apni us muddat tak pahunche jo tu ne hamare liye muqarrar ki thi – woh farmayega: tumhara thikana aag hai – us mein hamesha rahoge – magar jo Allah chahe – beshak tumhara Rab hakeem, sab kuch jaanta hai.
6.129: Aur is tarah hum kuch zalimon ko doosron ka saathi bana dete hain unke aamaal ke sabab.
6.130: Aey jinnon aur insano ke giroh! Kya tumhare paas tum mein se Rasool nahi aaye jo tumhein meri aayatein sunate thay aur tumhein is din ke mulaqat se darate thay? Woh kahenge: hum khud apne khilaaf gawahi dete hain – unhein duniya ki zindagi ne dhoka diya – aur woh khud apne khilaaf gawahi denge ke woh kafir thay.
6.131: Yeh is liye ke tumhara Rab bastiyon ko zulm se halaak karne wala nahi – halaanke unke rehne walay gafil hon.
6.132: Har shakhs ke liye uske aamaal ke mutabiq darajaat hain – aur tumhara Rab unke aamaal se ghaafil nahi.
6.133: Aur tumhara Rab be-niyaz, reham karne wala hai – agar chahe to tumhein hata kar tumhare baad jise chahe laa bithaaye – jaise tumhein kisi aur qaum se paida kiya.
6.134: Jo kuch tumse waada kiya gaya hai woh zaroor aane wala hai – aur tum Allah ko aajiz nahi kar sakte.
6.135: Keh do: Aey meri qaum ke logon! Tum apni jagah amal karo – main bhi amal kar raha hoon – anqareeb tum jaan loge ke kiska anjaam behtareen hai – beshak zaalim falaah nahi paate.
6.136: Aur unhon ne Allah ke liye kheti aur maweshi mein se ek hissa muqarrar kiya – aur apne kehne se kaha: yeh Allah ke liye hai – aur yeh hamare shareekon ke liye – to jo unke shareekon ke liye hota woh Allah ke paas nahi jaata – aur jo Allah ke liye hota woh unke shareekon ke paas chala jaata – kya hi bura faisla karte hain yeh log!
6.137: Aur is tarah unke shareekon ne un mein se bohot ke liye unke bachon ka qatl achha kar diya – taake unhein halaak kar dein aur unke deen ko un par mushkil bana dein – aur agar Allah chahta to yeh aisa na karte – to unhein aur unke iftara par chhodo.
6.138: Aur kehte hain: yeh jaanwar aur kheti mamnu hai – inhein sirf wohi kha sakta hai jise hum chahein – aur kuch jaanwar hain jin par sawari haram kar di gayi hai – aur kuch hain jin par Allah ka naam nahi lete – yeh sab Allah par jhoot ghadhte hain – anqareeb woh unhein uska badla dega jo yeh iftara karte hain.
6.139: Aur kehte hain: jo kuch in jaanwaron ke pait mein hai woh hamare mardon ke liye khaas hai – aur hamari auraton ke liye haram – aur agar woh murda ho to sab us mein shareek hain – Allah unhein unki baaton ka badla dega – beshak woh hakeem, sab kuch jaane wala hai.
6.140: Nuksaan mein rahe woh log jinhon ne apne bachon ko jahalat se qatal kiya – bina kisi ilm ke – aur Allah par jhoot baandha – un cheezon ko haram kar diya jo Allah ne unhein di thi – unhon ne gumraahi ki – aur woh hidayat paane wale na thay.
6.141: Aur wahi hai jisne baag banaye jinke chhajan hai aur kuch be chhajan – aur khajoor, aur khetiyan mukhtalif phalon wali – aur zaitoon aur anaar – milte julte bhi hain aur alag bhi – us ke phal ka khao jab woh phalein – aur uski katai ke din us ka haqq do – aur israf na karo – beshak Allah israf karne walon ko pasand nahi karta.
6.142: Aur usne paida kiya bohri aur bhojli chalne wale maweshi – khao jo Allah ne tumhein diya hai – aur shaitan ke qadam pe na chalo – beshak woh tumhara khula dushman hai.
6.143: Aath (8) kisam ke – do bheidon mein se, aur do bakriyon mein se – keh do: kya dono nar haram kiye ya dono maada, ya woh jo dono maadaon ke pait mein hain? Mujhe ilm se batao agar tum sachche ho.
6.144: Aur do oonton mein se aur do gayon mein se – keh do: kya dono nar haram kiye ya dono maada, ya woh jo dono maadaon ke pait mein hain? Kya tum us waqt maujood thay jab Allah ne tumhein yeh hukm diya tha? To us se bada zalim kaun jo Allah par jhoot ghade taake logon ko bina ilm ke gumraah kare? Beshaq Allah zalimon ko hidayat nahi deta.
6.145: Keh do: jo kuch meri taraf wahi ke zariye bheja gaya us mein koi cheez haram nahi paata kisi khaane wale par – magar yeh ke woh murda ho, ya baha hua khoon ho, ya suar ka gosht ho – ke woh napaak hai – ya kisi aise cheez ka gosht ho jo gair Allah ke naam par ziba kiya gaya ho – phir jo majboori mein ho, na chah kar, na had se badhne wala – to beshak tumhara Rab bakhshne wala, meherban hai.
6.146: Aur jo log Yahudi hue un par humne har naakhun walay jaanwar ko haram kiya – aur gay aur bakri ki charbi un par haram ki – magar jo unki peeth, ya aantiyon, ya haddiyon se lagi ho – yeh unki sarkashi ke badle mein saza thi – aur hum zaroor sachche hain.
6.147: Phir agar woh tumhein jhutlayen to keh do: tumhara Rab wasi rehmat wala hai – aur uska azaab mujrimon se phira nahi jaa sakta.
6.148: Mushrikeen kahenge: agar Allah chahta to na hum shirk karte, na hamare baap dada – aur na hum kisi cheez ko haram karte – aise hi un se pehle ke logon ne jhutlaya tha yahaan tak ke unhone hamara azaab chakh liya – keh do: kya tumhare paas koi ilm hai to humein dikhao – tum sirf gumaan ki pairwi karte ho – aur sirf andazay lagate ho.
6.149: Keh do: Allah ka hujjat poori hai – agar woh chahta to sab ko hidayat de deta.
6.150: Keh do: apne gawaah lao jo gawahi dein ke Allah ne yeh haram kiya hai – phir agar woh gawahi dein to tum gawahi na dena – aur un logon ki baat na maano jinhon ne hamari aayaton ko jhutlaya – aur jo aakhirat ka inkaar karte hain – aur apne Rab ke barabar dosray thahrate hain.
6.151: Keh do: aao main padhoon jo tumhare Rab ne tum par haram kiya hai: kisi ko us ke saath shareek na thahrana – walidain ke saath achha sulook – apni aulad ko tangdasti ke darr se qatal na karna – hum tumhein aur unhein rizq dete hain – aur behayaiyon ke qareeb bhi na jaana – jo zahir ho ya chhupi ho – aur kisi jaan ko na maarna jise Allah ne haram kiya ho – magar haqq ke saath – yeh hai jo usne tumhein hukm diya hai taake tum samjho.
6.152: Aur yateem ke maal ke qareeb na jao – magar behtareen tareeqe se – yahaan tak ke woh apni baalighi ko pahunch jaaye – aur paimane aur wazan mein insaaf karo – hum kisi shakhs par uski basat se zyada zimma nahi daalte – aur jab baat karo to insaaf ki baat karo – chahe qarabat daar ho – aur Allah ka ahad poora karo – yeh hai jo usne tumhein hukm diya hai taake tum naseehat lo.
6.153: Aur yeh mera seedha rasta hai – to is raaste par chalo – aur doosre raaston par na chalo ke woh tumhein uske raaste se alag kar dein – yeh hai jo usne tumhein hukm diya taake tum taqwa ikhtiyar karo.
6.154: Phir humne Moosa ko kitaab di jo behtareen thi – har cheez ko tafseel se bayan karne wali – aur hidayat aur rehmat – taake woh apne Rab se mulaqat par yaqeen rakhain.
6.155: Aur yeh kitaab humne nazil ki hai – badi barakat wali – to is ki pairwi karo – aur taqwa ikhtiyar karo – shayad ke tum par reham kiya jaye.
6.156: Yeh na ho ke tum kahne lago: humse pehle sirf do girohon par kitaab nazil hui – aur hum unke padhne se ghaafil thay.
6.157: Ya yeh keh do: agar ham par kitaab nazil hoti to hum unse zyada hidayat yafta hote – ab tumhare paas tumhare Rab ki taraf se roshni aur hidayat aayi – to jo isay jhutlaye aur is se mooh moore – us se badtar zalim kaun? Jo log hamari aayaton se mooh moorte hain hum unhein usi moortay rehne ki saza denge.
6.158: Kya ab woh intezar karte hain ke unke paas farishte aa jaayein – ya tumhara Rab aa jaaye – ya tumhare Rab ki kuch nishaniyaan aa jaayein? Us din kisi shakhs ka imaan usay faida nahi dega agar usne pehle iman nahi laya – ya apne imaan mein koi bhalayi nahi ki – keh do: intezar karo – hum bhi intezar kar rahe hain.
6.159: Jinhon ne apna deen tukdon mein baant diya – aur girohon mein bat gaye – un se tumhara koi ta’alluq nahi – unka maamla Allah ke hawale hai – phir woh unhein batayega jo woh kiya karte thay.
6.160: Jo ek neki laye usko das guna diya jaayega – aur jo ek burai laye usko usi ke barabar saza milegi – aur un par zulm nahi kiya jaayega.
6.161: Keh do: mujhe mere Rab ne ek seedha raasta dikhaya hai – ek mazboot deen – Ibraheem ki millat – jo ek taraf tha – aur mushrikon mein se na tha.
6.162: Keh do: meri namaz, meri qurbani, mera jeena aur mera marna sirf Allah ke liye hai – jo sab jahanon ka Rab hai.
6.163: Uska koi shareek nahi – aur mujhe yahi hukm diya gaya hai – aur main pehle Muslimon mein se hoon.
6.164: Kya main Allah ke siwa kisi aur ko Rab banao – halaanke wohi har cheez ka Rab hai? Har shakhs ke amal ka bojh usi par hai – aur koi kisi ka bojh nahi uthayega – phir tum sabka rujoo apne Rab ki taraf hai – phir woh tumhein bata dega jis mein tum ikhtilaaf karte thay.
6.165: Aur wahi hai jisne tumhein zameen mein khalifa banaya – aur tum mein se kuch ko kuch se darajaat mein buland kiya – taake tumhein aazmaye us cheez mein jo tumhein di – beshak tumhara Rab saza dene mein tez hai – aur beshak woh bakhshne wala, meherban hai.

7.2: Yeh ek kitaab hai jo tumhari taraf naazil ki gayi hai, to is se tumhara seena tang na ho, taa ke tum iske zariye logon ko darao, aur yeh momineen ke liye naseehat hai.
7.3: Logo! Jo kuch tumhare Rab ki taraf se tum par naazil hua hai uski pairwi karo, aur uske siwa kisi aur ko apna wali na banao. Tum log bahut kam hi naseehat lete ho.
7.4: Kitni hi bastiyan aisi rahi jinhin humne halaak kar diya. Un par hamara azaab ya to raat mein aaya jab woh so rahe thay, ya din ke waqt jab woh araam kar rahe thay.
7.5: To jab hamara azaab aaya to unka kehna bas yeh tha: 'Beshak hum zaalim thay!'
7.6: To hum un logon se zaroor poochhenge jinhin paigambar bheje gaye, aur paigambaron se bhi zaroor poochhenge.
7.7: Phir hum unhein ilm ke saath sab kuch bata denge, aur hum kahin door nahi hain.
7.8: Us din to tolna sach hoga. Jinka wazan bhaari hoga wahi kamyab honge.
7.9: Aur jinka wazan halka hoga wohi log honge jinhon ne apne aap ko nuqsan mein dala, kyunki woh hamari aayaton ka inkaar karte rahe.
7.10: Aur beshak humne tumhein zameen mein iqamat di aur tumhare liye usmein guzara ka samaan banaya. Tum log bahut kam hi shukar ada karte ho.
7.11: Aur beshak humne tumhein paida kiya, phir tumhari soorat banayi, phir humne farishton se kaha: 'Aadam ko sajda karo!' To sab ne sajda kiya siwa Iblees ke. Usne sajda karne walon mein shamil hone se inkaar kiya.
7.12: Allah ne farmaya: 'Tujhe sajda karne se kis cheez ne roka jab maine tujhe hukm diya?' Usne kaha: 'Main usse behtar hoon. Tu ne mujhe aag se paida kiya hai aur usse mitti se.'
7.13: Allah ne farmaya: 'To utar ja jannat se. Tujhe yahaan rehne ka haqq nahi. Nikal ja, beshak tu zaleel hai.'
7.14: Usne kaha: 'Mujhe us din tak mohallat de jab log uthaye jaayenge.'
7.15: Allah ne farmaya: 'Tujhe mohallat di gayi hai.'
7.16: Usne kaha: 'Ab jo tu ne mujhe gumraah kiya, main unke liye teri seedhi raah par baith jaunga.'
7.17: ‘Phir unke aage se, unke peechhe se, unke daayein se, unke baayein se un par aaoonga, aur tu unmein se zyadatar ko shukar guzaar nahi payega.’
7.18: Allah ne farmaya: 'Nikal ja yahaan se zaleel o ruswa hokar. Jo tu unmein se kisi ko bhi apna pairwi karne wala banayega, to main tum sab se jahannum bhar dunga.'
7.19: Aur Aadam! Tum aur tumhari biwi jannat mein raho, aur jahan se chaho khao, lekin is darakht ke qareeb mat jaana warna tum zalimon mein se ho jaoge.
7.20: To shaitaan ne un dono ko waswasa diya taa ke unki sharmgahen un par zaahir kar de jo pehle chhupi hui thin. Usne kaha: 'Tumhare Rab ne tumhein is darakht se sirf is liye roka hai taa ke tum farishte na ban jao ya hamesha zinda na raho.'
7.21: Aur usne kasam khaayi un dono ke saamne: 'Main tumhara sachcha mushir hoon.'
7.22: To usne un dono ko dhokhe mein daal diya. Phir jab un dono ne us darakht ka maza chakh liya to unki sharmgahen un par zaahir ho gayin, aur woh jannat ke patton se apne aap ko chhupane lage. Aur unka Rab pukara: 'Kya maine tumhein is darakht se roka nahi tha, aur kaha nahi tha ke shaitaan tumhara khula dushman hai?'
7.23: Un dono ne kaha: 'Ai hamare Rab! Humne apne aap par zulm kiya. Agar tu humein maaf na kare aur hum par reham na kare to hum nuqsaan uthaanewalon mein se ho jaayenge.'
7.24: Allah ne farmaya: 'Nikal jao, tum ek dusre ke dushman ho. Zameen mein tumhare liye kuch waqt tak thikaana aur guzara hai.'
7.25: Allah ne farmaya: 'Wahin tum zindagi guzaro ge, wahin maroge, aur wahin se uthaye jaoge.'
7.26: Ai Aadam ke beton! Humne tumhare liye libaas utara jo tumhari sharmgahen chhupata hai aur tumhari zeenat hai. Lekin taqwa ka libaas behtareen hai. Yeh Allah ki nishaniyon mein se hai taa ke log naseehat lein.
7.27: Ai Aadam ke beton! Kahin shaitaan tumhein us tarah na bahka de jaise usne tumhare ma baap ko jannat se nikalwaya. Woh unke libaas utarwa kar unki sharmgahen un par zaahir karna chahta tha. Beshak woh tumhein aur uska qabila tumhein wahan se dekhte hain jahan se tum unhein nahi dekhte. Humne shayateen ko un logon ka dost banaya hai jo imaan nahi laate.
7.28: Aur jab woh koi bura kaam karte hain to kehte hain: 'Humne apne baap dada ko is par paaya aur Allah ne humein iska hukm diya hai.' Kaho: 'Allah kabhi fahashi ka hukm nahi deta. Kya tum Allah ke zimme woh baat lagate ho jiska tumhein ilm nahi?'
7.29: Kaho: 'Mere Rab ne insaaf ka hukm diya hai, aur yeh ke har namaaz ke waqt apna chehra sidha karo aur usi se dua maango, ikhlaas ke saath deen ko usi ke liye khaalis kar ke. Jaise usne tumhein pehli dafa paida kiya, waise hi tum phir uthaye jaoge.'
7.30: Kuchon ko usne hidayat di, aur kuchon par gumraahi sabit ho gayi. Unhon ne Allah ke siwa shayateen ko apna wali bana liya, aur samajhte hain ke woh raah-e-raast par hain.
7.31: Ai Aadam ke beton! Har namaaz ke waqt apni zeenat le lo (accha libaas pehno), aur khao aur piyo lekin hadd se na badho. Beshak Allah hadd se badhne walon ko pasand nahi karta.
7.32: Kaho: 'Kisne Allah ki di hui us zeenat ko haram kiya jo usne apne bandon ke liye nikali hai, aur pakiza cheezein jo usne ata ki hain?' Kaho: 'Yeh duniya ki zindagi mein un logon ke liye hai jo imaan laye, aur qayamat ke din sirf unhi ke liye hogi.' Hum yeh aayatein tafseel se bayan karte hain un logon ke liye jo ilm rakhte hain.
7.33: Kaho: 'Mere Rab ne sirf haram kiya hai fahashi ke kaam, chaahe woh khule hon ya chhupe, aur gunaah aur najaayaz baghaawat, aur Allah ke saath us cheez ko shareek banana jis ka usne koi saboot na utaara, aur Allah ke baare mein woh kehna jo tum nahi jaante.'
7.34: Har ummat ke liye ek waqt muqarrar hai. Jab unka waqt aa jaata hai to na woh ek ghadi peeche hat sakte hain aur na aage badh sakte hain.
7.35: Ai Aadam ke beton! Agar tumhare paas tum mein se hi Rasool aayein jo tumhein meri aayatein sunaayein to jo koi taqwa ikhtiyar karega aur sudhar jaayega to unpar na koi khauf hoga na woh ghamgeen honge.
7.36: Aur jo log hamari aayaton ko jhutlaate hain aur unse ghamand karte hain woh dozakh ke log hain. Jahan woh hamesha rahenge.
7.37: Us shakhs se badhkar kaun zalim hoga jo Allah par jhoot ghade ya uski aayaton ko jhutlaye? Aise logon ko unka likha hua hissa milega, yahaan tak ke jab hamare farishte unki rooh qabz karne aayenge to kahenge: 'Kahan gaye tumhare woh jise tum Allah ke siwa pukarte thay?' Woh kahenge: 'Woh sab humse gayab ho gaye.' Aur woh khud gawahi denge ke woh kaafir thay.
7.38: Allah farmayega: 'Ab dakhil ho jao dozakh mein un ummaton ke saath jo tumse pehle guzri hain jin mein jin aur ins dono thay.' Jab bhi koi ummat dakhil hogi to doosri par laanat bheje gi. Yahaan tak ke jab sab usmein jama ho jaayengi to unmein se baad wali pehli ke baare mein kahegi: 'Ai hamare Rab! Inhon ne humein gumraah kiya, to unhein aag ka dohra azaab de.' Allah farmayega: 'Har ek ke liye dohra hai, lekin tum nahi jaante.'
7.39: Aur pehli un baad waalon se kahegi: 'Tumhein hum par koi fazilat hasil na thi, to ab chakkho azaab us ke badle jo tum kamaate rahe.'
7.40: Beshak jin logon ne hamari aayaton ko jhutlaya aur unke muqable mein ghamand kiya, unke liye aasman ke darwaze na khole jaayenge aur woh jannat mein daakhil na honge jab tak oont sooi ke naqsh mein na guzar jaye – aur hum mujrimon ko aise hi saza dete hain.
7.41: Unke liye jahannum ka bistar hoga aur unke oopar odhne ke liye aag hogi. Aur hum zalimon ko aise hi saza dete hain.
7.42: Aur jin logon ne imaan laya aur neik kaam kiye – hum kisi ko uski basat se zyada takleef nahi dete – woh jannat wale hain, jahan woh hamesha rahenge.
7.43: Aur hum unke seene se har ranj-o-gham nikal denge, unke neeche nehrein beh rahi hongi, aur woh kahenge: 'Sab tareef Allah ke liye hai jisne humein yeh raasta dikhaya, agar Allah humein hidayat na deta to hum hidayat paane wale na hote. Beshak hamare Rab ke Rasool sach le kar aaye.' Unhein pukara jaayega: 'Yeh jannat tumhein milee hai tumhare aamaal ke badle.'
7.44: Aur jannat waale dozakh waalon ko pukaar kar ke kahenge: 'Humne jo hamare Rab ne waada kiya tha use sach paaya. Kya tumne bhi paaya jo tumhare Rab ne waada kiya tha?' Woh kahenge: 'Haan'. To ek pukaarne wala dono ke darmiyan pukarega: 'Allah ki laanat ho zalimon par!'
7.45: Jo Allah ke raaste se rokte hain, usmein tedh dhoondhte hain, aur aakhirat ka inkaar karte hain.
7.46: Aur un dono ke darmiyan ek parda hoga, aur aaraaf (bulandi) par kuch log honge jo sab ko unke nishanon se pehchaanenge, aur jannat waalon ko pukar kar kahenge: 'Salaam ho tum par'. Woh abhi daakhil nahi hue, lekin ummeed rakhte hain.
7.47: Aur jab unki nazar dozakh waalon ki taraf phiregi to kahenge: 'Ai hamare Rab! Humein zaalim logon mein na kar.'
7.48: Aur aaraaf ke log kuch logon ko jinhein woh unke nishanon se pehchante hain pukarenge, aur kahenge: 'Tumhari jamaat aur tumhara ghamand tumhare kisi kaam na aaya.'
7.49: ‘Kya yeh wahi log hain jinke bare mein tum qasam khaate thay ke Allah inhein apni rehmat mein daakhil na karega?’ (Phir unse kaha jaayega) 'Jannat mein dakhil ho jao, tum par na koi khauf hai aur na tum ghamgeen hoge.'
7.50: Aur dozakh waale jannat waalon ko pukarenge: 'Humein kuch pani do ya usmein se kuch do jo Allah ne tumhein diya hai.' Woh kahenge: 'Allah ne yeh dono cheezein kaafiron par haram kar di hain.'
7.51: Jinhon ne apna deen khail aur tamaasha bana liya aur duniya ki zindagi ne unhein dhoka diya, to aaj hum unhein bhula denge jaise unhon ne is din ki mulaqat ko bhula diya tha, aur jaise woh hamari aayaton ka inkaar karte thay.
7.52: Aur beshak hum unke paas ek aisi kitaab laaye jise humne ilm ke saath tafseel se bayan kiya – hidayat aur rehmat un logon ke liye jo imaan laate hain.
7.53: Kya woh bas iske anjam ka intezaar kar rahe hain? Jis din iska anjam aayega to woh log kahenge jo isse pehle ise bhool baithe thay: 'Beshak hamare Rab ke Rasool sach le kar aaye thay. Kya ab humein kuch sifaarish karne wale milenge jo hamare liye sifaarish karein, ya humein wapas bhej diya jaaye taa ke hum woh kaam karein jo pehle nahi kiye?' Unhon ne apne aap ko khasare mein daal diya, aur jo jhoot woh banate thay woh unse gayab ho gaye.
7.54: Beshak tumhara Rab Allah hai jisne aasmanon aur zameen ko cheh (6) dino mein paida kiya, phir Arsh par istiwa kiya. Woh raat ko din se dhak deta hai, jo uske peeche daudta hai. Aur usne sooraj, chaand aur sitare banaaye jo uske hukum ke taabedaar hain. Jaan lo, usi ka hai paida karna aur hukm dena. Har cheez ka malik Allah ba-barkat hai, jo sab jahan walon ka Rab hai.
7.55: Apne Rab se dua karo gidgida kar aur chupke chupke. Beshak woh hadd se badhne walon ko pasand nahi karta.
7.56: Aur zameen mein islah ke baad fasad na karo, aur usse dar kar aur umeed rakh kar dua karo. Beshak Allah ki rehmat neik logon ke qareeb hai.
7.57: Wahi hai jo apni rehmat ke aagey khushkhabri dene wali hawaon ko bhejta hai, yahaan tak ke jab woh bhaari badal uthate hain to hum unhein ek murda shehar ki taraf le jaate hain, phir us se paani barsate hain, phir us se har tarah ke phal nikaalte hain. Aise hi hum murdon ko zinda karte hain, taa ke tum naseehat lo.
7.58: Aur achhi zameen apne Rab ke hukum se uska phal nikalti hai, aur jo buri hoti hai uska phal kharaab nikalta hai. Hum aayatein un logon ke liye tafseel se bayan karte hain jo shukar karte hain.
7.59: Beshak humne Nooh ko uski qaum ki taraf bheja to usne kaha: 'Ai meri qaum! Allah ki ibadat karo, uske siwa tumhara koi maabood nahi. Beshak mujhe tumhare liye ek azeem din ke azaab ka darr hai.'
7.60: Uski qaum ke sardaron ne kaha: 'Beshak hum tumhein khuli gumraahi mein dekhte hain.'
7.61: Usne kaha: 'Ai meri qaum! Mujh mein koi gumraahi nahi hai, balke main to Rabul Aalameen ka Rasool hoon.'
7.62: Main tum tak apne Rab ke paighamaat pahunchata hoon, aur tumhara sacha nasih (naseehat karne wala) hoon.
7.63: Kya tumhein yeh ajeeb lagta hai ke tumhare paas tum mein se ek aadmi ke zariye tumhare Rab ka zikr aaya taa ke woh tumhein daraaye, aur taa ke tum taqwa ikhtiyar karo, aur shayad tum par reham kiya jaaye?
7.64: Phir unhon ne usay jhutlaya, to humne use aur uske saathiyon ko kashti mein bacha liya, aur un logon ko dobo diya jinhon ne hamari aayaton ko jhutlaya. Beshak woh andhae log thay.
7.65: Aur Aad ki taraf humne unke bhai Hud ko bheja. Usne kaha: 'Ai meri qaum! Allah ki ibadat karo, uske siwa tumhara koi maabood nahi. Kya tum nahi darte?'
7.66: Uski qaum ke kafir sardaron ne kaha: 'Hum tumhein bewaqoofi mein mubtala dekhte hain, aur hum tumhein jhooton mein se samajhte hain.'
7.67: Usne kaha: 'Ai meri qaum! Mujh mein koi bewaqoofi nahi, balke main Rabul Aalameen ka Rasool hoon.'
7.68: Main tum tak apne Rab ke paighamaat pahunchata hoon, aur main tumhara khara naseehat karne wala hoon.
7.69: Kya tumhein yeh ajeeb lagta hai ke tumhare paas tum mein se ek aadmi ke zariye tumhare Rab ka zikr aaya? Taa ke woh tumhein daraaye. Yaad karo jab usne tumhein Nooh ki qaum ke baad uska jaane nasheen banaya, aur tumhein khalq mein farawani di. Toh Allah ke inaamaat yaad karo, shayad tum kamiyab ho jao.
7.70: Unhon ne kaha: 'Kya tum is liye aaye ho ke hum sirf Allah ki ibadat karein, aur unko chhod dein jise hamare baap dada poojte thay? To lao agar tum sachche ho to woh azaab jis ka tum wada dete ho.'
7.71: Hud ne kaha: 'Tum par tumhare Rab ki taraf se azaab aur ghadab aa gaya. Kya tum mujhse un naamon ke bare mein jhagarte ho jo tumne aur tumhare baap dada ne rakh liye hain, jinke liye Allah ne koi daleel nahi utari? To intezaar karo, main bhi tumhare saath intezaar kar raha hoon.'
7.72: To humne use aur uske saath walon ko apni rehmat se bacha liya, aur un logon ki jad se kaat diya jinhon ne hamari aayaton ko jhutlaya aur iman nahi laye.
7.73: Aur Samood ki taraf unke bhai Salih ko bheja. Usne kaha: 'Ai meri qaum! Allah ki ibadat karo, uske siwa tumhara koi maabood nahi. Tumhare paas tumhare Rab ki taraf se ek nishani aa gayi hai. Yeh Allah ki naaqa (oontni) tumhare liye nishani hai. Use chhod do ke Allah ki zameen mein chale, aur use takleef na dena warna tumhein dardnaak azaab pakad lega.'
7.74: Aur yaad karo jab usne tumhein Aad ke baad jaane nasheen banaya, aur zameen mein tumhein rehne ka thikaana diya – ke tum usmein mehal banate ho aur pahadon ko gharon mein tarashte ho. To Allah ke inaamaat yaad karo, aur zameen mein fasad na phailao.
7.75: Uski qaum ke ghamand karne wale sardaron ne un kamzoar logon se kaha jo unmein se iman laye thay: 'Kya tum waqai jaante ho ke Salih Allah ka Rasool hai?' Unhon ne kaha: 'Haan, hum us par iman laye hain jo use diya gaya hai.'
7.76: Ghamand karne walon ne kaha: 'Jis par tum iman laye ho, hum usay nahi maante.'
7.77: Phir unhon ne naaqa ki tang kaat di, aur apne Rab ke hukum ki nafarmaani ki, aur kehne lage: 'Ai Salih! Lao hamare paas woh azaab jis ka tumne wada kiya agar tum paigambaron mein se ho.'
7.78: To unhein zalzala ne pakad liya, aur woh apne gharon mein ulte pad gaye.
7.79: Phir Salih unse mooh mor kar chala gaya aur kaha: 'Ai meri qaum! Main ne tum tak apne Rab ka paigham pahuncha diya, aur tumhein naseehat ki, lekin tum naseehat karne walon ko pasand nahi karte.'
7.80: Aur Lut ko bheja jab usne apni qaum se kaha: 'Kya tum aisi fahashi karte ho jo tumse pehle duniya walon mein kisi ne nahi ki?'
7.81: Beshak tum mardon ke paas shahwat se jaate ho na ke auraton ke paas. Beshak tum had se badhne wale log ho.
7.82: Aur uski qaum ka jawab sirf yeh tha: 'Inhein apne gaon se nikaal do, yeh log to bade paak daaman bante hain.'
7.83: To humne usay aur uske ghar walon ko bacha liya siwa uski biwi ke, jo peeche rehne walon mein se thi.
7.84: Aur humne unpar baarish barsayi (patharon ki) – to dekho un mujrimon ka kya anjaam hua.
7.85: Aur Madyan ki taraf unke bhai Shuaib ko bheja. Usne kaha: 'Ai meri qaum! Allah ki ibadat karo, uske siwa tumhara koi maabood nahi. Tumhare paas tumhare Rab ki taraf se ek nishani aa gayi hai. To naap aur tol poora karo, logon ko unki cheezein kam na do, aur zameen mein uske sudhar ke baad fasad na karo. Yeh tumhare liye behtar hai agar tum momin ho.'
7.86: Aur raahon mein na baitho is liye ke logon ko daraao aur Allah ke raaste se roko, aur usmein tedhi raah talasho. Aur yaad karo jab tum kam thay to usne tumhein zyada kiya. Aur dekho fasadiyon ka kya anjaam hua.
7.87: Aur agar tum mein se ek giroh mujh par aur jo kuch mere saath bheja gaya us par imaan laya hai, aur doosra giroh imaan nahi laya, to sabr karo yahaan tak ke Allah hamare darmiyan faisla kare – aur woh behtareen faisla karne wala hai.
7.88: Uski qaum ke ghamand karne wale sardaron ne kaha: 'Ai Shuaib! Hum tujhe aur un logon ko jo tere saath imaan laye hain apne shehar se zaroor nikaal denge, ya tum hamare deen mein laut aao.' Usne kaha: 'Kya hum usmein wapas aa jaayen agarche humein Allah ne usse nijaat de di hai? Hamare liye yeh mumkin nahi ke hum usmein wapas jaayein, siwa iske ke Allah, hamara Rab chahe. Hamara Rab har cheez ko apne ilm se ghera hua hai. Hum Allah par hi bharosa rakhte hain. Ai hamare Rab! Hamare aur hamari qaum ke darmiyan sach sach faisla kar de – aur tu behtareen faisla karne wala hai.'
7.89: To uski qaum ke kafiron ne kaha: 'Agar tumne Shuaib ki pairwi ki to tum zaroor nuqsan uthaoge.'
7.90: Phir unhein zalzala ne pakad liya, aur woh apne gharon mein ulte pad gaye.
7.91: Jinhon ne Shuaib ko jhutlaya woh aise mar gaye ke goya kabhi basay hi na thay. Jinhon ne Shuaib ko jhutlaya woh hi khasare mein rahe.
7.92: Phir woh unse mooh mor kar chala gaya aur kaha: 'Ai meri qaum! Maine tum tak apne Rab ka paigham pahuncha diya, aur tumhein naseehat ki. To ab main kaise gham karoon kaafir qaum ke liye?'
7.93: Aur humne kisi nabi ko uski qaum mein yeh kehkar nahi bheja ke woh kehti hai: 'Tu jadoo karne wala hai ya deewana.'
7.94: Humne kisi basti mein koi nabi nahi bheja magar us ke rehne walon ko tangi aur takleef mein daala taa ke woh giroyaari (tazallul) ikhtiyar karein.
7.95: Phir humne unki takleef ko niyamat se badal diya, yahaan tak ke woh barh gaye, aur kehne lage: 'Hamare baap dada ko bhi takleef aur sukh milta raha hai.' To humne unhein achanak pakad liya jab woh bekhauf thay.
7.96: Agar bastiyon ke log imaan laate aur taqwa ikhtiyar karte to hum un par aasman aur zameen ki barkatein khol dete, lekin unhon ne jhutlaya to humne unhein unke aamaal ke badle pakad liya.
7.97: Kya bastiyon ke log is baat se be-khabar ho gaye ke un par hamara azaab raat ko aa jaye jab woh so rahe hon?
7.98: Ya kya woh is se be-khabar hain ke un par azaab din ke waqt aa jaaye jab woh khel rahe hon?
7.99: Kya woh Allah ke makr se be-fikr ho gaye hain? To sirf nuqsan uthane wale log hi Allah ke makr se be-fikr hote hain.
7.100: Kya jo log zameen ke waris bante hain unhein yeh nahi dikhayi diya ke agar hum chahen to unhein bhi unke gunaahon ke sabab se museebat mein daal dein, aur unke dil par mohar laga dein ke woh na sun sakein?
7.101: Yeh un bastiyon ke kuch haal hain jo hum tumhein sunate hain. Unke paas unke Rasool wazeh daleelon ke saath aaye, to woh aisey na the ke us baat par imaan laate jise unhon ne pehle jhutla diya tha. Aise hi Allah kafiron ke dilon par mohar laga deta hai.
7.102: Aur humne unmein zyadatar ko ahd ka paband na paaya, balke unmein zyadatar fasiq hi paaye.
7.103: Phir humne unke baad Moosa ko apni nishaniyon ke saath Firoun aur us ke afsarano ke paas bheja, to unhon ne un aayaton ka inkar kiya. To dekh lo ke mufsidon ka anjaam kaisa hua.
7.104: Aur Moosa ne kaha: 'Ai Firoun! Main Rabul Aalameen ka Rasool hoon.'
7.105: Mujh par yeh laazmi hai ke Allah ke siwa kisi aur ki baat na kahoon. Main tumhare paas tumhare Rab ki taraf se ek wazeh daleel le kar aaya hoon. To Bani Israel ko mere saath bhej de.
7.106: Firoun ne kaha: 'Agar tu koi nishani le kar aaya hai to usay pesh kar agar tu sachcha hai.'
7.107: To Moosa ne apni laathi daali, to achanak woh ek saaf saaf bala ban gayi.
7.108: Aur usne apna haath nikala to achanak woh dekhnay walon ke liye chamak raha tha.
7.109: Firoun ke sardaron ne kaha: 'Yeh to zaroor ek maahir jaadoo gar hai.'
7.110: Woh chahta hai ke tumhein tumhari zameen se nikal de. To tum log kya mashwara dete ho?
7.111: Unhon ne kaha: 'Us ko aur us ke bhai ko thoda waqt do, aur shehron mein log bhej do jo sab jaadoo garon ko tumhare paas le aayein.'
7.112: Woh tumhare paas har bade jaadoo gar ko le aayenge.
7.113: Aur jaadoo gar Firoun ke paas aaye, unhon ne kaha: 'Agar hum galib aagaye to humein is ka kuch inaam milega?'
7.114: Firoun ne kaha: 'Haan! Aur tum to mere qareebi ho jaoge.'
7.115: Unhon ne kaha: 'Ai Moosa! Ya to pehle daal, ya hum daalte hain.'
7.116: Moosa ne kaha: 'Tum daalo.' Phir jab unhon ne daala to logon ki aankhon ko jaadoo se band kar diya aur unhein dara diya, aur ek badi jaadoo gari dikhaayi.
7.117: Aur humne Moosa ko wahee bheji ke tu apni laathi daal. To woh achanak un sab cheezon ko nigalne lagi jo unhon ne banayi thi.
7.118: To haqq zahir ho gaya, aur jo kuch unhon ne kiya tha woh baatil ho gaya.
7.119: To woh wahan haar gaye, aur zaleel hokar laut gaye.
7.120: Aur jaadoo gar sajde mein gir gaye.
7.121: Unhon ne kaha: 'Hum Rabul Aalameen par imaan laaye.'
7.123: Firoun ne kaha: 'Kya tum mere ijazat diye baghair is par imaan le aaye? Yeh to zaroor ek chaal hai jo tum logon ne shehar mein chalaayi hai taa ke uske logon ko wahan se nikaal do. Ab tumhein maaloom ho jaayega.'
7.124: Main zaroor tumhare haathon aur paon mukhtalif tarafon se kaat dunga, phir sab ko sooli par chadha dunga.
7.125: Unhon ne kaha: 'Hum to apne Rab ki taraf palat jaane wale hain.'
7.126: 'Aur tu hum se sirf is liye badla le raha hai ke hum apne Rab ki nishaniyon par imaan laye jab woh humare paas aayi. Ai hamare Rab! Humein sabr ata farma, aur humein Muslim bana kar wafat de.'
7.127: Firoun ke sardaron ne kaha: 'Kya tu Moosa aur uski qaum ko chhod dega ke woh zameen mein fasad karte phirein, aur tujhe aur tere maaboodon ko chhod dein?' Firoun ne kaha: 'Hum unke beton ko qatal karenge aur unki auraton ko zinda chhod denge, aur hum unpar poora ikhtiyar rakhte hain.'
7.128: Aur Moosa ne apni qaum se kaha: 'Allah se madad maango aur sabr karo. Beshak zameen Allah ki hai, jise chahta hai us mein waaris bana deta hai. Aur anjaam to muttaqi logon ka hi hota hai.'
7.129: Unhon ne kaha: 'Hum to tere aane se pehle bhi takleef mein thay, aur tere aane ke baad bhi.' Moosa ne kaha: 'Qareeb hai ke tumhara Rab tumhare dushman ko halaak kar de, aur tumhein zameen mein unka jaane nasheen bana de, phir dekhe ke tum kya karte ho.'
7.130: Aur humne Firoun ke logon ko qehat aur phalon ki kami se pakda taa ke woh naseehat lein.
7.131: Phir jab un par bhalayi aayi to kehne lage: 'Yeh to hamara haq hai.' Aur jab un par koi museebat aayi to Moosa aur us ke saathiyon ko is ka sabab thehrane lage. Dekho! Unka saara naseeb to Allah ke haath mein hai, magar un mein se aksar nahi jaante.
7.132: Aur unhon ne kaha: 'Tujhe chahe jo nishani bhi laa kar dikha de taa ke tu hum par jaadoo kare, hum tujh par imaan laane wale nahi.'
7.133: To humne unpar sailab, tiddiyan, qeemaz, mendak, aur khoon ki nishaniyan bheje – alag alag nishaniyan – phir bhi woh ghamand kar gaye aur woh log mujrimon mein se thay.
7.134: Aur jab unpar azaab aa jata to kehte: 'Ai Moosa! Apne Rab se hamare liye dua kar us wada ke mutabiq jo us ne tujh se kiya hai. Agar tu hum se azaab hata dega to hum zaroor tujh par imaan layenge aur Bani Israel ko tere saath bhej denge.'
7.135: Phir jab humne un par azaab ek waqt tak hata diya jis tak unhein mohallat di gayi thi to woh foran apni baat se phir gaye.
7.136: To humne unse badla liya, aur unhein samundar mein dobo diya, is wajah se ke unhon ne hamari aayaton ko jhutlaya aur unse beparwahi barati.
7.137: Aur un logon ko jo kamzoor samjhe jaate thay unhein zameen ke mashriq o maghrib ka waris banaya jise humne barakat di thi. Aur tere Rab ka behtareen waada Bani Israel ke haq mein poora hua uske sabr ke sabab se. Aur humne un cheezon ko tabaah kar diya jo Firoun aur us ki qaum banate aur unchi imaratein banate thay.
7.138: Aur humne Bani Israel ko samundar ke paar le jaa diya to woh aise logon ke paas aaye jo apne buton ki pooja kar rahe thay. Unhon ne kaha: 'Ai Moosa! Hamare liye bhi aisa maabood bana de jaise inke maabood hain.' Moosa ne kaha: 'Tum beshak jaahil log ho.'
7.139: Beshak yeh log jinka yeh tareeqa hai tabaah honay wale hain, aur jo kuch woh kar rahe hain woh baatil hai.
7.140: Usne kaha: 'Kya main Allah ke siwa tumhare liye koi aur maabood talaash karoon halanke usi ne tumhein duniya walon par fazeelat di hai?'
7.141: Aur yaad karo jab humne tumhein Firoun ke logon se nijaat di, woh tumhein bura azaab dete thay – tumhare beton ko qatal karte aur tumhari auraton ko zinda rakhte. Aur ismein tumhare Rab ki taraf se tumhare liye azeem aazmaish thi.
7.142: Aur humne Moosa se tees raaton ka waada kiya, aur usmein das raaten aur mila kar waada poora kiya, to uske Rab ka waada chalis raaton ka ho gaya. Aur Moosa ne apne bhai Haroon se kaha: 'Mere baad meri qaum mein mera jaane nasheen ban jaa, aur islaah karna, aur fasadiyon ke raaste par na chalna.'
7.143: Aur jab Moosa hamare waade par aaya aur uske Rab ne us se kalam kiya to usne kaha: 'Ai mere Rab! Mujhe dikhayiye ke main aapko dekhoon.' Allah ne farmaya: 'Tu mujhe nahi dekh sakta, lekin tu is pahad ki taraf dekh, agar yeh apni jagah par qaim raha to tu mujhe dekh lega.' Phir jab uska Rab pahad par zahir hua to usne usay raakh kar diya, aur Moosa behosh hokar gir gaya. Phir jab hosh mein aaya to kaha: 'Ai Allah! Tu paak hai, main teri taraf ruju karta hoon, aur main sab se pehle imaan laane walon mein se hoon.'
7.144: Allah ne farmaya: 'Ai Moosa! Main ne tujhe apne paighamaat aur apni kalaam se logon par fazeelat di, to jo maine tujhe diya use le aur shukar ada karne walon mein se ho ja.'
7.145: Aur humne uske liye alwah mein har cheez likh di – naseehat aur har cheez ki tafseel – to ise mazbooti se pakad aur apni qaum ko hukum de ke ise behtareen tareeqe se apnaayein. Main tumhein fasiqon ka ghar dikhane wala hoon.
7.146: Main un logon ko apni aayaton se hata doonga jo zameen mein na-haqq ghamand karte hain. Aur agar woh har nishani dekh lein to us par imaan nahi laate. Agar woh hidayat ka raasta dekh lein to us raaste ko na apnaayein, aur agar gumraahi ka raasta dekh lein to usi raaste ko apnaayein. Yeh is wajah se hai ke unhon ne hamari aayaton ko jhutlaya aur unse gafil rahe.
7.147: Aur jin logon ne hamari aayaton aur aakhirat ki mulaqat ko jhutlaya unke aamaal zaya ho gaye. Kya unhein unke kiye ke siwa koi jaza milegi?
7.148: Aur Moosa ki qaum ne us ke baad apne gehno se ek bachda (calf) bana liya – ek jism jisme se awaz nikalti thi. Kya unhon ne nahi dekha ke na woh un se bolta hai na unhein koi raasta dikhata hai? Unhon ne usay maabood bana liya, aur woh zalim thay.
7.149: Aur jab unhein apne kiye par pachtawa hua, aur unhon ne dekha ke woh gumraah ho gaye hain to unhon ne kaha: 'Agar hamare Rab ne hum par reham na kiya aur humein maaf na kiya to hum khasare mein pad jaayenge.'
7.150: Aur jab Moosa apni qaum ke paas gusse se bhar kar lauta to usne kaha: 'Tumne mere baad mere saath kaisi buri jaaynasheen banayi?' Aur alwah ko phenk diya, aur apne bhai ka sar pakad kar usay apni taraf kheenchne laga. Haroon ne kaha: 'Ai mere maa ke bete! Logon ne mujhe kamzor samjha aur mujhe qatal karne ka irada kiya. To tu mujh par dushmanon ko hansne ka moka na de, aur mujhe zalimon ke saath na shamil kar.'
7.151: Moosa ne kaha: 'Ai mere Rab! Mujhe aur mere bhai ko maaf kar de, aur humein apni rehmat mein daakhil farma, aur tu sabse behtareen reham karne wala hai.'
7.152: Beshak jin logon ne bachde (calf) ko maabood banaya, unhein unke Rab ke paas se ghadab (gussa) aur zillat milegi duniya ki zindagi mein. Aur hum jhooti baatein banane walon ko aise hi saza dete hain.
7.153: Aur jin logon ne bura kaam kiya, phir uske baad tauba ki aur imaan laye – to beshak tera Rab uske baad zaroor bakhshne wala, nihayat reham karne wala hai.
7.154: Aur jab Moosa ka gussa thanda hua to usne woh alwah (tablets) uthayi jin mein hidayat aur rehmat thi un logon ke liye jo apne Rab se darte hain.
7.155: Aur Moosa ne apni qaum mein se sattar aadmiyon ko hamare waade ke liye chuna. Phir jab unhein zalzala ne pakda to usne kaha: 'Ai mere Rab! Agar tu chahta to inhein aur mujhe pehle hi halaak kar deta. Kya tu humein us wajah se halaak karega jo hamare bewakoofon ne kiya? Yeh to sirf tera imtihaan hai, is se tu jise chahe gumraah kare aur jise chahe hidayat de. Tu hi hamara wali hai, to humein baksh de aur hum par reham kar, aur tu sab se behtareen bakshne wala hai.'
7.156: ‘Aur humein is duniya mein bhi bhalayi de aur aakhirat mein bhi. Beshak hum teri taraf rujoo karte hain.’ Allah ne farmaya: 'Main apna azaab usi par daalta hoon jise chahta hoon, aur meri rehmat har cheez ko ghere hue hai, to main use un logon ke liye likh dunga jo taqwa ikhtiyar karte hain, zakat dete hain, aur hamari aayaton par imaan laate hain.'
7.157: Jo log us Rasool, un Nabi Ummi ki pairwi karte hain jise woh apne paas Taurat aur Injeel mein likha hua paate hain, jo unhein neik kaam ka hukum deta hai aur burai se roakta hai, jo unke liye paak cheezein halal karta hai aur gandgi ko haram karta hai, aur unke bojh unse utaarta hai aur janjeerein jo un par thi. To jo log us par imaan laye, uska ta'zeem kiya, uski madad ki, aur us noor ki pairwi ki jo us ke saath utara gaya – wahi log falaah paane wale hain.
7.158: Kaho: 'Ai logon! Main tum sab ki taraf Allah ka Rasool hoon, us ka jo aasmano aur zameen ki baadshahat ka malik hai. Uske siwa koi maabood nahi. Woh zindagi deta hai aur maut deta hai. To imaan lao Allah par, aur uske Rasool Nabi Ummi par jo Allah par aur uske kalimaat par imaan rakhta hai, aur uski pairwi karo taa ke tum hidayat paao.'
7.159: Aur Moosa ki qaum mein ek giroh aisa bhi hai jo sachayi se raasta dikhata hai aur usi ke mutabiq insaaf karta hai.
7.160: Aur humne unko barah (12) girohon mein taqseem kar diya, aur jab Moosa se uski qaum ne paani maanga to humne us se kaha: 'Apni laathi pathar par maar.' To us se baarah chashme phoot nikle, har giroh ne apna paani pehchan liya. Aur humne un par badal ka saaya kiya, aur un par manna-o-salwa utara. Khao hamari di hui paak cheezein. Aur unhon ne hum par zulm nahi kiya, balke woh khud apne upar zulm kar rahe thay.
7.161: Aur jab un se kaha gaya: 'Is basti mein daakhil ho jao aur us mein jahan se chaho khao, aur 'Hittatun' (maafi) kehna aur darwaze mein sajda karte hue daakhil hona, to hum tumhare gunaah maaf kar denge, aur neik kaam karne walon ko zyada denge.'
7.162: To jo log unmein zalim thay unhon ne woh baat badal di jo un se kahi gayi thi kisi aur baat se, to humne un par unke zulm ke sabab se aasman se azaab bhej diya.
7.163: Aur unse us basti ke bare mein pucho jo samundar ke kinare thi, jab woh sabt (Saturday) ke din hadd se barh jaate thay, jab un ke sabt ke din machhliyaan upar aati thin aur sabt ke siwa ke din nahi aati thin – is tarah hum unhein aazmaate thay is sabab se ke woh nafarmaani karte thay.
7.164: Aur jab unmein se ek giroh ne kaha: 'Tum aise logon ko kyon naseehat karte ho jise Allah halaak karne wala hai ya unhein sakht azaab dene wala hai?' Unhon ne kaha: 'Taa ke hum apne Rab ke huzoor uzar (excuse) pesh kar sakein aur shayad yeh log taqwa ikhtiyar kar lein.'
7.165: Phir jab unhon ne bhula diya woh jo unhein yaad dilaya gaya tha, to humne unhein bacha liya jo buraai se rokte thay, aur zalimon ko sakht azaab mein pakad liya is wajah se ke woh nafarmaani karte thay.
7.166: Phir jab woh us baat se hadd barh gaye jis se mana kiya gaya tha, to humne unhein kaha: 'Ho jao bandar – zaleel o ruswa.'
7.167: Aur yaad karo jab tumhare Rab ne khabar di ke woh qayamat tak un par aisa shakhs musallat karta rahega jo unhein bura azaab chakhaye. Beshak tera Rab saza dene mein tez hai, aur beshak woh bakshne wala, reham karne wala hai.
7.168: Aur humne unhein zameen mein girohon mein taqseem kar diya – kuch saleh thay aur kuch dusre – aur humne unhein achhi aur buri haalaaton se aazmaya taa ke woh baaz aa jaayein.
7.169: Phir unke baad aise naasalein unki jagah aayi jo kitaab ke waris bane, jo is duniya ke thoda fayda lete thay, aur kehte: 'Humein zaroor bakhsh diya jaayega.' Aur agar un ke paas waisa hi fayda phir aata to use bhi le lete. Kya un se kitaab ka ehad nahi liya gaya tha ke woh Allah ke zimme sach ke siwa kuch nahi kahenge? Aur unhon ne jo kuch us kitaab mein tha padha bhi. Aur aakhirat un logon ke liye behtar hai jo taqwa ikhtiyar karte hain. Kya tum nahi samajhte?
7.170: Aur jo log kitaab ko mazbooti se pakadte hain aur namaz qayam rakhte hain, to hum islah karne walon ka ajar zaya nahi karte.
7.171: Aur jab humne koh-e-toor ko upar uthaya jaise ek chhat, aur un par mashkook tor par mandla diya ke woh samajhein ke woh unpar girne wala hai. Aur kaha: 'Jo humne tumhein diya hai use mazbooti se pakdo aur jo us mein hai use yaad karo taa ke tum taqwa ikhtiyar karo.'
7.172: Aur jab tumhare Rab ne Aadam ki aulad se unki naslon se unhein nikal kar un se khud un ki gawahi li: 'Kya main tumhara Rab nahi hoon?' Unhon ne kaha: 'Beshak hum gawahi dete hain.' Taa ke tum qayamat ke din yeh na kaho: 'Humein to is se khabar hi na thi.'
7.173: Ya yeh na kaho: 'Hamara to baap dada hi shirk karte thay, aur hum unke baad un ki aulad hue. To kya tu humein us ka saza dega jo baatil karne walon ne kiya?'
7.174: Aur hum isi tarah aayatein tafseel se bayaan karte hain, taa ke woh rujo karein.
7.175: Aur unhein us shakhs ki misaal sunaao jise humne apni aayaat di thin, phir woh un se nikal gaya, to shaitaan us ke peeche lag gaya, aur woh gumraahon mein se ho gaya.
7.176: Aur agar hum chahte to usay in aayaat ke zariye bulandi dete, lekin usne duniya ki taraf jhukav ikhtiyar kiya aur apni khwahish ka pairo ban gaya. To uski misaal kutte jaisi ho gayi – agar tum us par bhoonko to zubaan lapa lapaaye, aur chhodo to bhi zubaan lapa lapaaye. Yeh misaal un logon ki hai jinhon ne hamari aayaton ko jhutlaya. To in kisso se naseehat hasil karo, shayad woh soch lein.
7.177: Buri misaal hai un logon ki jinhon ne hamari aayaton ko jhutlaya aur apne aap par zulm kiya.
7.178: Jise Allah hidayat de wahi hidayat yafta hai, aur jise woh gumraah kare wahi khasare mein hai.
7.179: Aur beshak humne bohot se jinnon aur insano ko jahannum ke liye paida kiya – unke dil hain jin se woh samajhte nahi, unki aankhein hain jin se woh dekhte nahi, unke kaan hain jin se woh sunte nahi – yeh log jaise jaanwar hain, balke un se bhi zyada gumraah. Yeh hi log hain jo gaflat mein padhe hain.
7.180: Aur Allah ke ache ache naam hain, to unhein usi se pukaro, aur un logon se chhodo jo us ke naam mein ilhad (gumrahi) karte hain. Woh jald hi apne kiye ka badla paayenge.
7.181: Aur un logon mein se kuch aise hain jo haqq ke mutabiq hidayat dete hain aur usi ke mutabiq insaaf karte hain.
7.182: Aur jo log hamari aayaton ko jhutlate hain hum unhein dheere dheere us tareeqe se pakadte hain ke unhein khabar bhi nahi hoti.
7.183: Aur main unhein mohallat deta hoon, beshak mera daanda (grip) mazboot hai.
7.184: Kya unhon ne kabhi ghor nahi kiya? Unke saathi mein koi junoon nahi, woh to sirf ek khula khula daraane wala hai.
7.185: Kya unhon ne aasman-o-zameen ki makhlooq aur jo cheez Allah ne paida ki hai us mein ghor nahi kiya, aur is baat mein ke shayad unka waqt qareeb aa gaya ho? To uske baad kis baat par woh imaan laayenge?
7.186: Jise Allah gumraah kare usay koi hidayat dene wala nahi. Aur woh unhein unki sarkashi mein bhatakte hue chhod deta hai.
