7.187: Woh tumse qayamat ke bare mein poochte hain ke us ka kab waqt aayega. Kaho: 'Uska ilm sirf mere Rab ke paas hai. Usay us ke waqt par koi zaahir nahi karega magar Allah. Woh aasmanon aur zameen mein sakhti ka sabab banegi. Tum par achanak aa jaayegi.' Tumse aise poochte hain jaise tum us se waqif ho. Kaho: 'Uska ilm sirf Allah ke paas hai, lekin zyadatar log nahi jaante.'
7.188: Kaho: 'Main apne liye na kisi faida ka malik hoon na kisi nuqsan ka – siwa is ke jo Allah chahe. Agar main gaib janta to main bohat si bhalayi jama kar leta aur mujhko koi takleef na hoti. Main to sirf ek daraane wala aur basharat dene wala hoon un logon ke liye jo imaan laate hain.'
7.189: Wahi hai jisne tumhein ek hi jaan se paida kiya, aur usi se uska joda banaya taa ke woh us se sukoon le. Phir jab woh usay dhank leta to us ne halki si hamal uthayi jise woh liye liye phirti rahi. Phir jab woh bhaari ho gayi to dono ne Allah, apne Rab se dua ki: 'Agar tu humein nek aulaad de to hum zaroor shukar karne walon mein se honge.'
7.190: Phir jab usne unhein nek aulaad de di to usmein us ka shareek bana diya jise unhon ne diya. To Allah unke shareek thahrane se paak hai.
7.191: Kya woh aise ko shareek thahrate hain jo na unka kuch paida kar sake, na khud kuch ban sake?
7.192: Aur na woh unki madad kar sakte hain, na apni madad hi kar sakte hain?
7.193: Agar tum unhein hidayat ki taraf bulao to tumhari baat na maanein. Tumhare liye barabar hai – tum unhein bulao ya tum chup raho.
7.194: Beshak jinhein tum Allah ke siwa pukarte ho woh bhi tumhare jaise banday hain. To unhein pukaro, phir unhein jawab dena chahiye agar tum sachche ho.
7.195: Kya unke paon hain jinse woh chalte hain? Ya unke haath hain jinse woh pakadte hain? Ya unki aankhein hain jinse woh dekhte hain? Ya unke kaan hain jinse woh sunte hain? Kaho: 'Apne shareek bulao, phir mere khilaaf chaal chalao aur mujhe zara bhi mohallat na do.'
7.196: Beshak mera wali Allah hai jisne kitaab naazil ki, aur wahi nek logon ki himayat karta hai.
7.197: Aur jinhein tum Allah ke siwa pukarte ho woh na tumhari madad kar sakte hain, na apni madad kar sakte hain.
7.198: Agar tum unhein hidayat ki taraf bulao to woh na tumhari baat sunein. Aur tum unhein aise dekhte ho jaise woh tumhari taraf dekh rahe hain, halanke woh kuch nahi dekhte.
7.199: Dar-guzar ko ikhtiyar karo, bhale ka hukum do, aur jaahilon se mooh mor lo.
7.200: Aur agar shaitaan se koi waswasa aaye to Allah ki panaah maango. Beshak woh sunne wala, jaane wala hai.
7.201: Beshak jin logon mein taqwa hoti hai jab unhein koi waswasa shaitaan ki taraf se hota hai to woh yaad kar lete hain, phir foran unki aankhein khul jaati hain.
7.202: Aur unke bhai (shaitaan) unhein gumraahi mein kheench le jaate hain, aur woh usmein phir rukte nahi.
7.203: Aur jab tum koi nishani unke paas na lao to kehte hain: 'Tumne isay khud bana liya.' Kaho: 'Main to wahi paish karta hoon jo mera Rab mere paas bhejta hai. Yeh basbase (insight) hai tumhare Rab ki taraf se, aur hidayat aur rehmat hai un logon ke liye jo imaan laate hain.'
7.204: Aur jab Qur’an padha jaaye to use tawajju se suno aur khamoshi ikhtiyar karo, taa ke tum par reham kiya jaaye.
7.205: Aur apne Rab ka zikr karo apne dil mein, gidgida kar, khauf ke saath, aur dheemi awaaz mein – subah aur shaam – aur ghaflat mein na raho.
7.206: Beshak jo tere Rab ke paas hain woh uski ibadat se gafil nahi, aur uski tasbeeh karte hain, aur usi ke liye sajda karte hain.

8.1: Woh tumse ganimat ke maal ke baare mein poochhte hain. Keh do: ganimat Allah aur Rasool ke liye hai. To Allah se daro, aapas mein sulah karo, aur Allah aur uske Rasool ki itaat karo agar tum momin ho.
8.2: Momin to wahi hain ke jab Allah ka zikr kiya jaye to unke dil kaanp jaate hain, aur jab unpar uski aayatein padhi jaati hain to unka imaan barh jaata hai, aur woh apne Rab par hi bharosa rakhte hain.
8.3: Jo log namaz qayam karte hain aur jo kuch humne unhein diya usmein se kharch karte hain.
8.4: Yahi log haqiqatan momin hain. Inke liye unke Rab ke paas darajaat hain, aur maghfirat hai, aur izzat wala rizq hai.
8.5: Jaise ke tumhare Rab ne tumhein tumhare ghar se haqq ke saath nikala, halaanke momin logon ko ye baat nagawar thi.
8.6: Woh tumse haqq ke baare mein jhagad rahe thay baad iske ke woh wazeh ho chuka tha, goya ke woh maut ki taraf dhakel ja rahe hain aur woh dekh rahe hain.
8.7: Aur yaad karo jab Allah tumse waada kar raha tha ke dono girohon me se ek tumhare liye hoga, aur tum chahte thay ke kamzor giroh tumhare haath aaye, lekin Allah chahta tha ke apne kalimaat se haqq ko qaayam kare aur kafiron ke peeche kaat de.
8.8: Taake haqq ko haqq kar de aur baatil ka batil, chahe mujrim log isse nafrat karein.
8.9: Jab tum apne Rab se madad maang rahe thay to usne tumhari dua qabool ki: main tumhein ek hazaar farishton se madad dunga, jo ek ke baad ek aayenge.
8.10: Aur is madad ko Allah ne bas ek khushi ki baat banaya, aur taake isse tumhare dil mutmain ho jayein. Madad to sirf Allah ke paas se hoti hai. Beshak Allah zabardast, hakeem hai.
8.11: Jab usne tum par neend daali taake tumhein sukoon mile, aur tum par aasmaan se paani barsaya taake tumhein paak kare, aur tum se shaitan ke waswason ko door kare, aur tumhare dilon ko mazboot kare, aur tumhare qadam jama de.
8.12: Jab tumhara Rab farishton ko wahi kar raha tha: main tumhare saath hoon, to tum un logon ko sabit qadam rakho. Main unke dilon mein roab daal doonga. Pas tum unke gardanon par maaro, aur unki ungliyon ke purzo par maaro.
8.13: Yeh is wajah se hai ke unhon ne Allah aur uske Rasool ka muqabla kiya. Aur jo Allah aur uske Rasool ka muqabla karein to beshak Allah sakht azaab dene wala hai.
8.14: Yeh hai (tumhara hisa) to iska maza chakkho, aur kafiron ke liye dozakh ka azaab hai.
8.15: Aey logon jo iman laye ho! Jab tum kafiron se jung mein aamna saamna karo to unhein peeth na dikhao.
8.16: Aur jo shakhs us din unse peeth phere magar yeh ke ladayi ke liye chalaaki se hata ho, ya kisi apne dasti (giroh) se milne ke liye ho, to woh Allah ke gazab ka mustahiq banega, aur uska thikana jahannum hoga – aur woh badi hi buri jagah hai.
8.17: Tumne unhein qatal nahi kiya balke Allah ne unhein qatal kiya, aur tumne jab mitti phenki to tumne nahi phenki balke Allah ne phenki, aur yeh is liye ke momineen ko ek acchi aazmaish se guzare – beshak Allah sab kuch sunta jaanta hai.
8.18: Yeh hai, aur beshak Allah kafiron ki chaal ko kamzor banata hai.
8.19: Aey kafiro! Agar tumne faisla chaaha to lo faisla aa gaya, aur agar baaz aoge to yeh behtari hai tumhare liye, aur agar tum phir wahi karoge to hum bhi phir wahi karenge – aur tumhara jatha tumhare kisi kaam na aa sakega chahe woh kitna hi bada ho – aur Allah momineen ke saath hai.
8.20: Aey logon jo iman laye ho! Allah aur uske Rasool ki itaat karo, aur us se mooh na phero jab tum sun rahe ho.
8.21: Aur un logon ki tarah na ho jao jo kehte hain 'humne suna' halanke woh sunte nahi.
8.22: Beshak Allah ke nazdeek sabse badtar makhlooq woh hai jo behre (bahre) hain, goongay hain, jo nahi samajhte.
8.23: Aur agar Allah unmein koi bhalayi jaanta to unhein sunwa deta – aur agar woh sun lete to bhi munh moad kar phir jaate.
8.24: Aey logon jo iman laye ho! Allah aur Rasool ki daawat par labbaik kaho jab woh tumhein us cheez ki taraf bulayein jo tumhein zindagi deti hai – aur samajh lo ke Allah har aadmi ke dil mein jo kuch hai us se waqif hai – aur yeh bhi ke tum us ke huzoor ikattha kiye jaoge.
8.25: Aur daro us fitne se jo sirf un logon tak mehdood nahi rahega jo tum mein se zalim hain – aur jaan lo ke Allah ka azaab sakht hota hai.
8.26: Yaad karo jab tum kamzor thay, zameen mein dabaye gaye thay, logon se darte thay ke kahin tumhein ukhad na diya jaye, phir Allah ne tumhein panaah di, apni madad se tumhein taqat di, aur tumhein achi cheezein de kar rozi di – taake tum shukar guzar bano.
8.27: Aey logon jo iman laye ho! Allah aur Rasool ke saath khiyanat na karo, aur na hi apne amanaton mein jaan bujh kar khiyanat karo.
8.28: Aur jaan lo ke tumhare maal aur tumhari aulad ek aazmaish hain, aur Allah ke paas bada ajar hai.
8.29: Aey logon jo iman laye ho! Agar tum Allah se daroge to woh tumhein haqq aur baatil mein farq karne wali cheez ata karega, tumhare gunaah mita dega, aur tumhein baksh dega. Aur Allah bada fazl farmane wala hai.
8.30: Aur yaad karo jab kafir tumhare khilaf chalay chaliyan kar rahe thay ke tumhein qaid karein, ya qatal karein, ya nikaal dein – aur woh chalaakiyan kar rahe thay, aur Allah bhi chalaakiyan kar raha tha, aur Allah sabse behtar chalaakiyan karne wala hai.
8.31: Aur jab unhein hamari aayatein sunayi jaati hain to kehte hain: humne suna, agar hum chahein to aisi baatein hum bhi keh sakte hain – yeh to bas pehle logon ke qisse kahaniyan hain.
8.32: Aur jab unhone kaha: Aey Allah! Agar yeh haq hai tere paas se, to hamare upar aasman se pathar barsa de, ya koi dardnaak azaab bhej de.
8.33: Lekin Allah aisa nahi karega jab tak tum (Aey Nabi) un mein ho, aur na hi unhein azaab dega jab tak woh maghfirat maang rahe hon.
8.34: Aur ab kya wajah hai ke Allah unhein azaab na de jabke woh log masjid-e-haram se rok rahe hain, halaanke woh is ke wali bhi nahi – uske wali to sirf muttaqi log hain – lekin un mein se aksar nahi jaante.
8.35: Aur unki namaz Khanah-e-Kaaba ke paas sirf seetiyan bajana aur taaliyan bajana thi – to chakkho azaab, us inkaar ke badle jo tum karte rahe.
8.36: Beshak jo log kufr karte hain woh apne maal is liye kharch karte hain ke logon ko Allah ke raste se roken – to ab woh maal kharch karte rahenge, phir yeh unke liye nadamat ka sabab banenge, phir woh maghloob kiye jayenge – aur jo log kufr karte hain woh jahannum ki taraf ikattha kiye jayenge.
8.37: Taake Allah achhon ko buron se chhant de, aur buron ko ek doosre ke saath jod kar ek dhair bana de, phir unhein jahannum mein daal de – yahi log asal mein nuqsan uthane wale hain.
8.38: Keh do un logon se jo kufr karte hain ke agar woh baaz aa jayein to jo kuch pehle ho chuka maaf kar diya jayega, aur agar woh phir wahi karein to pehle walon ka tareeqa to guzar chuka hai.
8.39: Aur unse ladaai karo yahan tak ke fitna na rahe aur deen poora ka poora Allah ka ho jaye – phir agar woh ruk jaayein to Allah unke aamaal ko dekh raha hai.
8.40: Aur agar woh mooh moad lein to jaan lo ke Allah tumhara maula hai – behtareen maula aur behtareen madadgaar.
8.41: Aur jaan lo ke jo kuch tumhein maal-e-ghaneemat mile uska paanchwa hissa Allah, Rasool, rishtedaron, yateemon, mohtaajon, aur musafiron ke liye hai – agar tum iman laye ho Allah par aur us din par jab dono jama’atain aamne saamne ho gayi theen – aur Allah har cheez par qadir hai.
8.42: Jab tum wadi ke qareeb thay, aur woh dushman door ki taraf, aur caravans neeche ki taraf thay – aur agar tum aapas mein waada karte to zaroor waqt milana mushkil hota – lekin Allah ne faisla kar diya, taake jo kuch hone wala tha woh ho – taake halaakat ho jaye jo halaak hone wala hai daleel ke saath, aur bacha rahe jo bacha daleel ke saath – aur Allah sab kuch sunta, jaanta hai.
8.43: Jab Allah ne tumhein un dushmanon ko tumhare khwaab mein kam dikhaya – agar zyada dikhata to zaroor tum log dar jaate aur jhagad padte – lekin Allah ne bacha liya – beshak woh dilon ki baat jaanta hai.
8.44: Aur jab tum aamne saamne huye to unhein tumhari nigahon mein thoda dikhaya aur tumhein unki nigahon mein kam dikhaya – taake Allah apna kaam pura kare – aur sab ka faisla Allah ki taraf hai.
8.45: Aey logon jo iman laye ho! Jab tum kisi lashkar se takraao to sabit qadam raho, aur Allah ko zyada yaad karo taake tum kamiyab ho jao.
8.46: Aur Allah aur uske Rasool ki itaat karo, aur aapas mein jhagad na karo, warna tum kamzor pad jaoge aur tumhari hawa nikal jaayegi – aur sabr karo – beshak Allah sabr karne walon ke saath hai.
8.47: Aur un logon ki tarah na ho jaana jo apne gharon se akad kar aur logon ko dikhane ke liye nikle, aur Allah ke raaste se rokte rahe – aur Allah un ke aamaal ko gher raha hai.
8.48: Aur jab shaitaan ne unke aamaal ko unke liye khubsurat bana diya, aur kaha: aaj main tumhare saath hoon, koi tum par galba nahi paaye ga – lekin jab dono lashkaron ne aamna saamna kiya to woh ulat gaya aur bola: main tumse bezaar hoon, main woh kuch dekhta hoon jo tum nahi dekhte – main Allah se darta hoon – aur Allah sakht azaab dene wala hai.
8.49: Aur jab munafiq aur woh log jinke dil mein rog tha kehte thay: in logon ko unka deen dhoka de raha hai – halaanke jo Allah par bharosa karta hai, to beshak Allah zabardast, hikmat wala hai.
8.50: Aur agar tum dekhte jab farishte un logon ki roohein qabz karte hain jo kafir hain – woh unke chehron aur peethon par marte hain (aur kehte hain): lo chakkho jhulsa dene wali aag ka azaab!
8.51: Yeh usi cheez ka badla hai jo tumhare haathon ne aage bheji thi – aur beshak Allah bandon par zulm nahi karta.
8.52: Jaise Firaun ke log aur unse pehle ke log – unhone Allah ki aayaat ko jhutlaya – to Allah ne unhein unke gunaahon ke sabab pakad liya – beshak Allah quwwat wala, sakht saza dene wala hai.
8.53: Yeh is liye ke Allah kisi qaum ki ni’mat nahi badalta jab tak woh khud apne aap ko na badlein – aur Allah sab kuch sunta, jaanta hai.
8.54: Jaise Firaun ke log aur unse pehle ke log – unhon ne apne Rab ki aayaton ko jhutlaya – to humne unhein unke gunaahon ke sabab halaak kar diya, aur Firaun ke logon ko garq kar diya – sab zalim thay.
8.55: Beshak sabse badtar makhlooq Allah ke nazdeek woh hain jinhon ne kufr kiya, aur woh iman nahi laate.
8.56: Woh log jinke saath tumne ahad kiya phir har dafa apna ahad tod dete hain, aur Allah se nahi darte.
8.57: To agar tum unhein jung mein paao to unhein aisi saza do ke unke baad jo ho woh bhi sabak lein – taake woh hosh mein aayein.
8.58: Aur agar kisi qaum se khauf ho ke woh dagha baazi karegi to unka ahad barabar tor do – beshak Allah dagha baazon ko pasand nahi karta.
8.59: Aur yeh kafir yeh na samjhein ke woh bach gaye – beshak woh haraas honge.
8.60: Aur unke khilaf jitni taqat ho tayyar rakho – aur ghode bandhe rakho – taake tum Allah ke dushman, apne dushman, aur unke alawa doosron ko dara sako – jinhein tum nahi jaante, Allah jaanta hai – aur jo kuch tum kharch karte ho Allah ke raaste mein, woh tumhein poora diya jaayega, aur tum par zulm nahi kiya jaayega.
8.61: Aur agar woh sulah ki taraf jhukte hain to tum bhi jhuk jao, aur Allah par bharosa rakho – beshak woh sunta, jaanta hai.
8.62: Aur agar woh tumhein dhoka dena chahein to Allah tumhare liye kaafi hai – wahi hai jisne apni madad aur momineen ke zariye tumhein taqat di.
8.63: Aur unke dilon mein muhabbat daal di – agar tum zameen ki saari cheezein bhi kharch karte to unke dil nahi mila sakte thay – lekin Allah ne unhein jod diya – beshak woh zabardast, hikmat wala hai.
8.64: Aey Nabi! Tumhare liye Allah kaafi hai, aur jo momin tumhare saath hain unke liye bhi.
8.65: Aey Nabi! Momineen ko jung ke liye uksao – agar tum mein 20 sabir (sabr karne wale) hon to woh 200 par bhari padenge, aur agar 100 hon to 1000 kafiron par bhari padenge – kyun ke woh samajhte nahi.
8.66: Ab Allah ne tum par se bojh halka kar diya – kyun ke us ne dekha ke tum mein kamzori hai – to agar tum mein 100 sabir hon to woh 200 par bhari padenge, aur agar 1000 hon to 2000 par – Allah ke hukm se – aur Allah sabr karne walon ke saath hai.
8.67: Kisi Nabi ke liye yeh jaayaz nahi ke uske paas qaidiyon ka silsila ho jab tak ke zameen mein khoob qatal na ho jaye – tum duniya ka faida chahte ho, aur Allah aakhirat chahta hai – aur Allah zabardast, hikmat wala hai.
8.68: Agar Allah ka hukm pehle na ho chuka hota to jo kuch tumne liya us par tumhein bada azaab aata.
8.69: To ab jo maal-e-ghaneemat tumhein mila us mein se halaal aur paak cheez khao – aur Allah se daro – beshak Allah bakshne wala, meherban hai.
8.70: Aey Nabi! Kaho un qaidiyon se jo tumhare qabze mein hain: agar Allah tumhare dilon mein koi bhalayi dekhega to jo kuch tumse liya gaya us se behtar tumhein dega, aur tumhein maaf karega – aur Allah bakshne wala, meherban hai.
8.71: Aur agar woh tumhein dhoka dena chahein to pehle bhi Allah ke khilaaf unka dhoka chuka hai – to usne tumhein unpar qadir banaya – aur Allah sab kuch jaanta, hikmat wala hai.
8.72: Jo log iman laye, aur hijrat ki, aur Allah ke raaste mein apne maal aur jaan se jihad kiya – aur jo log (madina mein) reh kar unhein panah di aur madad ki – yahi log ek doosre ke wali hain – aur jo log iman laye lekin hijrat nahi ki to tumhara unse kuch lena dena nahi jab tak ke woh hijrat na karein – lekin agar deen ke silsile mein tumse madad maangein to madad dena farz hai – magar kisi aisi qaum ke khilaaf nahi jinke darmiyan tumhara ahad ho – aur jo kuch tum karte ho Allah use dekh raha hai.
8.73: Aur jo log kufr par rahe woh ek doosre ke wali hain – agar tum yeh (ahd) na karo to zameen mein fitna aur bada fasaad ho jaayega.
8.74: Aur jo log iman laye, aur hijrat ki, aur Allah ke raaste mein jihad kiya – aur jo log panah dene wale aur madad karne wale hain – wahi sacche momin hain – unke liye bakhshish aur izzat bhara rizq hai.
8.75: Aur jo baad mein iman laye, aur hijrat ki, aur tumhare saath mil kar jihad kiya – to woh bhi tum mein se hain – aur rishtedaar ek doosre ke zyada haqq daar hain – Allah ki kitaab mein – beshak Allah har cheez ka ilm rakhta hai.

9.1: Bara'at hai Allah aur uske Rasool ki un mushrikeen se jinke saath tumne ahad kiya tha.
9.2: To zameen mein chaar mahine tak ghoom phir lo, aur jaan lo ke tum Allah ko aajiz nahi kar sakte, aur Allah kafiron ko ruswa karne wala hai.
9.3: Aur Allah aur uske Rasool ki taraf se bada elan hai sab logon ke liye bade Hajj ke din ke Allah aur uska Rasool mushrikeen se bari uz zimma hain. Agar tum toba kar lo to tumhare liye behtar hai. Aur agar mooh phero to samajh lo ke tum Allah ko hara nahi sakte. Aur kafiron ko dardnaak azaab ki khushkhabri suna do.
9.4: Magar woh mushrikeen jinke saath tumne ahad kiya, phir unhon ne tum se kisi ahad ko nahi toda, aur na tumhare khilaf kisi ko madad di, to unka ahad unki muddat tak poora karo. Beshak Allah muttaqiyon ko pasand karta hai.
9.5: To jab hurmat walay mahine guzar jaayein to mushrikeen ko jahan pao qatal karo, aur unhein pakdo, aur gher lo, aur har ghaat mein unka intizaar karo. Agar woh toba kar lein, aur namaz qayam karein, aur zakat dein to unhein chhod do. Beshak Allah bakhshne wala, meherban hai.
9.6: Aur agar koi mushrik tum se panah maange to usay panah do taake woh Allah ka kalaam sun le, phir usay uske aman ki jagah pahucha do. Yeh is liye ke woh log ilm rakhte nahi.
9.7: Mushrikeen ka Allah aur uske Rasool ke saath kya ahad ho sakta hai? Magar jin logon se tumne Masjid-e-Haram ke paas ahad kiya, to jab tak woh tumhare saath seedha rawayya rakhain, tum bhi unke saath seedha rawayya rakho. Beshak Allah muttaqiyon ko pasand karta hai.
9.8: Kaise ho sakta hai? Halanke agar woh tum par galaba paa jayein to na rishte ka lihaz rakhenge aur na kisi ahad ka. Woh tumhein meethi baatein sunate hain, magar unke dil inkaar karte hain. Aur un mein se zyada log fasiq hain.
9.9: Unhon ne Allah ke aayaton ke badle thoda sa mol liya, to woh Allah ke raaste se rokte hain. Beshak woh bure kaam karte hain.
9.10: Woh na kisi mo'min ke silsile mein rishte ka lihaz karte hain na kisi ahad ka. Yahi log hadd se badhne wale hain.
9.11: Agar woh toba kar lein, namaz qayam karein, aur zakat dein to tumhare bhai hain deen mein. Hum aayatein wazeh karte hain ilm rakhne walon ke liye.
9.12: Agar woh apne ahad ke baad bhi apni kasam ko tod dein, aur tumhare deen mein taan karein to un ke kuffar ke sardar se jung karo. Beshak unki kasamon ka koi bharosa nahi. Shayad woh baaz aa jaayein.
9.13: Kya tum un logon se jung nahi karte jinhon ne apne kasam tod diye, aur Rasool ko nikalne ka iraada kiya, aur unhon ne pehle tumse jang shuru ki? Kya tum unse darte ho? To Allah ka zyada haq hai ke tum us se daro agar tum momin ho.
9.14: Unse jung karo! Allah unhein tumhare haathon se saza dega, aur unhein ruswa karega, aur tumhein un par fatah dega, aur momineen ke dil thandak pahunchayega.
9.15: Aur unke dilon ki ghussa door karega. Aur Allah jiski chahe toba qabool kare – Allah sab kuch jaane wala, hakeem hai.
9.16: Kya tum yeh samajhte ho ke chhod diye jaaoge halaanke abhi Allah ne un logon ko to alag nahi kiya jo tum mein se jihad karte hain, aur Allah aur uske Rasool aur momineen ke siwa kisi ko apna raazdar nahi banate – aur Allah tumhare aamaal se baakhabar hai.
9.17: Mushrikeen ke liye yeh laayak nahi ke woh Allah ki masajid ko abaad karein, jab woh khud apne kufr ke gawah hain. Yeh logon ke aamaal zaya ho gaye, aur woh hamesha aag mein rahenge.
9.18: Allah ki masajid ko wahi shakhs abaad karta hai jo Allah aur aakhirat ke din par imaan laye, aur namaz qayam kare, aur zakat de, aur Allah ke siwa kisi se na dare. Umeed hai yeh log hidayat paayein.
9.19: Kya tumne Hajiyon ko paani pilana aur Masjid-e-Haram ko abaad karna us shakhs ke barabar samjha jo Allah aur aakhirat ke din par imaan laya, aur Allah ke raaste mein jihad kiya? Woh Allah ke nazdeek barabar nahi hain. Aur Allah zalimon ko hidayat nahi deta.
9.20: Jo log imaan laye, aur hijrat ki, aur Allah ke raaste mein apne maal aur jaan se jihad kiya – woh Allah ke nazdeek zyada darje wale hain – aur yahi log kamiyab hain.
9.21: Unka Rab unhein apni rehmat, raza aur jannaton ki khushkhabri deta hai jahan unke liye daimi ne'matein hongi.
9.22: Unmein woh hamesha rahenge. Beshak Allah ke paas bada ajar hai.
9.23: Aey logon jo imaan laye ho! Agar tumhare baap aur bhai deen par imaan nahi laate to unhein apna dost na banao. Aur jo unhein dost banaye to wahi zaalim hain.
9.24: Keh do: agar tumhare baap, tumhare bete, tumhare bhai, tumhari biwiyan, tumhare rishtedaar, aur woh maal jo tumne kamaya, aur woh tijarat jiske mand padne ka tumhein darr ho, aur woh ghar jo tumhein pasand hain – agar yeh sab kuch tumhein Allah, uske Rasool, aur uske raaste mein jihad se zyada azeez hai to intezaar karo ke Allah apna faisla sunaaye – aur Allah fasiq logon ko hidayat nahi deta.
9.25: Beshak Allah ne tumhein kai maqamat par madad di – aur Hunain ke din bhi – jab tumhein apni kasrat par ghamand tha, magar woh tumhare kisi kaam na aayi, aur zameen apni wus’at ke bawajood tum par tang ho gayi, phir tum peeth phair kar bhaag gaye.
9.26: Phir Allah ne apne Rasool aur momineen par apni taskeen naazil ki, aur aise lashkar utaare jo tumne nahi dekhe, aur un logon ko azaab diya jinhon ne kufr kiya – aur yahi kafiron ka badla hai.
9.27: Phir Allah jise chahe uski toba qubool kare – aur Allah bakshne wala, meherban hai.
9.28: Aey logon jo imaan laye ho! Mushrik na-pak hain – to is saal ke baad woh Masjid-e-Haram ke qareeb na aayen – aur agar tumhe tangdasti ka darr ho to Allah agar chahe to tumhein apne fazl se ghani kar dega – Allah sab kuch jaane wala, hakeem hai.
9.29: Un logon se ladho jo Allah aur aakhirat ke din par imaan nahi laate, aur jo Allah aur uske Rasool ke haram ki hui cheezon ko haram nahi samajhte, aur deen-e-haqq ko qabool nahi karte – un logon mein se jo ehle kitaab hain – yahan tak ke woh jizya den aur zillat mein rahein.
9.30: Yahood kehte hain: Uzair Allah ka beta hai. Nasara kehte hain: Maseeh Allah ka beta hai. Yeh unki zubani baatein hain – woh un logon ki baaton ki naqal kar rahe hain jo pehle kufr kar chuke hain. Allah unhein halaak kare – yeh kahan bhatak rahe hain!
9.31: Unhon ne apne ulema aur darweshon ko Allah ke siwa rab bana liya – aur Maseeh ibn Maryam ko bhi – halaanke unhein sirf yeh hukm diya gaya tha ke sirf ek Ilah ki ibadat karein – us ke siwa koi ilah nahi – woh paak hai us shirk se jo yeh log karte hain.
9.32: Woh log chahte hain ke Allah ke noor ko apne mooh se bujha dein, lekin Allah apne noor ko poora kar ke rahega, chahe kafiron ko pasand na aaye.
9.33: Wahi hai jisne apne Rasool ko hidayat aur deen-e-haqq ke saath bheja taake isay tamaam deenon par ghalib kar de, chahe mushrikein ko nafrat ho.
9.34: Aey logon jo imaan laye ho! Bohot se ulema aur darwesh logon ka maal na-haqq taur par kha jaate hain, aur Allah ke raaste se rokte hain. Aur jo log sona chandi jama karte hain aur use Allah ke raaste mein kharch nahi karte – unhein dardnaak azaab ki khabar de do.
9.35: Jis din woh sona chandi jahannum ki aag mein garam kiya jaayega – aur us se unke mathe, pehlu aur peeth daaghe jaayenge: yeh hai jo tumne apne liye jama kiya – to ab chakkho jo tum jama karte thay.
9.36: Beshak Allah ke nazdeek mahine barabar hain – 12 – Allah ke kitab mein us din se jab se usne aasmaan aur zameen banaye – unmein se chaar mahine hurmat wale hain – yahi theek deen hai – to inmein apne aap par zulm na karo – aur mushrikeen se ek saath ladho jaise woh tumse sab milke ladte hain – aur jaane raho ke Allah muttaqiyon ke saath hai.
9.37: Mahino ka ta’akhir (nasi) karna sirf kufr mein izafa karta hai – is se woh log gumraahi mein pad jaate hain – ek saal usko halal kar lete hain, ek saal haram – taake woh us taadaad ko poora kar sakein jo Allah ne haram ki hai – is tarah woh Allah ke haram ko halal bana lete hain – unke bure aamal unke liye khushnuma bana diye gaye hain – aur Allah kafiron ko hidayat nahi deta.
9.38: Aey logon jo imaan laye ho! Tumhein kya ho gaya hai ke jab tum se kaha gaya: Allah ke raaste mein nikal pado – to tum zameen se chipak gaye? Kya tum duniya ki zindagi ko aakhirat se zyada pasand karte ho? Duniya ki zindagi ka maza aakhirat ke muqable mein bas thoda sa hai.
9.39: Agar tum na nikle to Allah tumhein dardnaak azaab dega, aur tumhare badle doosri qaum laayega – aur tum usay kuch bhi nuqsaan nahi pahuncha sakte – aur Allah har cheez par qadir hai.
9.40: Agar tum Rasool ki madad na karo to (koi baat nahi) Allah ne uski madad ki jab usay kafiron ne nikaal diya – do mein se doosra – jab dono gharo mein thay – jab woh apne saathi se keh raha tha: gham na kar, Allah hamare saath hai – to Allah ne us par apni taskeen utaari, aur aise lashkar se madad ki jo tumne nahi dekhe – aur kafiron ki baat neeche kar di – aur Allah ka kalaam ooncha raha – aur Allah zabardast, hakeem hai.
9.41: Nikal pado, halke ho ya bhaari – aur Allah ke raaste mein apne maal aur jaan se jihad karo – yeh tumhare liye behtar hai agar tum jaante ho.
9.42: Agar saamne kuch nazdeek faida hota, aur aasaan safar hota to woh tumhare saath nikalte – magar un par lambi musafat bhaari pad gayi – aur woh zaroor Allah ki qasam khate: agar hum mein taqat hoti to zaroor tumhare saath nikalte – woh apne aap ko halaak kar rahe hain – aur Allah jaanta hai ke woh jhoot bol rahe hain.
9.43: Allah tumhein maaf kare! Tumne kyun unhein ijazat di jab tak ke yeh log tum par saaf na ho jaate – aur jhooton ko na pehchan lete?
9.44: Jo log Allah aur aakhirat ke din par imaan rakhte hain woh kabhi tumse maazrat nahi karte ke apne maal aur jaan se jihad chhod dein – aur Allah muttaqiyon ko jaanta hai.
9.45: Tumse to wahi log maazrat karte hain jo Allah aur aakhirat ke din par imaan nahi rakhte – aur unke dil shak mein pad gaye hain – to woh apne shak mein bhatak rahe hain.
9.46: Agar woh nikalna chahte to uske liye tayyari kar lete – lekin Allah ne unki nikalne ki pasand nahi ki, to unhein sust kar diya, aur kaha: baith jaane walon ke saath tum bhi baith jao.
9.47: Agar woh tumhare saath nikalte to sirf fasad karte, aur tumhare darmiyan fitna daalte – aur tum mein unke liye kuch log bhi sunne wale hotay – aur Allah zalimon ko jaanta hai.
9.48: Woh to pehle bhi fitna chahte thay, aur tumhare kaam ulta chahte thay – yahaan tak ke haqq aa gaya, aur Allah ka hukm zahir ho gaya, halaanke woh pasand nahi karte thay.
9.49: Un mein se koi kehta hai: mujhe ijazat de do aur mujhe fitne mein na daalo – sun lo! Woh fitne mein gir chuke – aur beshak jahannum kafiron ko gherne wali hai.
9.50: Agar tumhein bhalayi mile to unhein takleef hoti hai – aur agar tumhein koi museebat pahunche to kehte hain: humne pehle se apna kaam sambhal liya tha – aur woh khush hote hain.
9.51: Keh do: humein sirf wahi pahunchega jo Allah ne likha hai – wohi hamara maula hai – aur momineen ko Allah hi par bharosa karna chahiye.
9.52: Kya tum yeh intezar kar rahe ho ke hamare liye do bhalaiyon mein se ek ho – aur hum tumhare liye intezar kar rahe hain ke Allah tumhein apne haath se ya hamare haathon se azaab de – to intezar karo – hum bhi tumhare saath intezar kar rahe hain.
9.53: Keh do: chaahe tum khushi se kharch karo ya majboori se, woh qabool nahi kiya jaayega – tum fasiqueen ho.
9.54: Unki sadaqaat ko qabool karne se sirf yeh cheez rokti hai ke woh Allah aur uske Rasool ka inkaar karte hain – aur namaz mein susti karte hain – aur sirf nafrat ke saath kharch karte hain.
9.55: To unke maal aur unke bachon se tumhein ta’ajjub na ho – Allah chahta hai ke inhi cheezon ke zariye unhein duniya mein azaab de – aur unki jaan nikal jaayein is haal mein ke woh kafir hon.
9.56: Woh Allah ki qasam khate hain ke woh tum mein se hain, halaanke woh tum mein se nahi – balke woh dar rahe hain.
9.57: Agar woh koi panah ki jagah ya gharoondha paa lein to zaroor usmein chale jaayein – aur wahan bhaag jaayein.
9.58: Un mein se kuch log sadaqaat mein taan karte hain – agar unhein kuch mil jaata hai to khush ho jaate hain – aur agar na mile to gussa karte hain.
9.59: Agar woh razi ho jaate us par jo Allah aur uska Rasool unhein dete, aur kehte ke Allah humein kaafi hai, Allah humein apne fazl se aur uska Rasool bhi dega – aur hum Allah ki hi taraf mutawajjeh hain.
9.60: Sadaqat to sirf fuqara, masakeen, aur un logon ke liye hain jo is par kaam karte hain, aur jinka dil jeetna ho, aur ghulamon ke liye, aur qarzdaaron ke liye, aur Allah ke raaste mein, aur musafiron ke liye – yeh Allah ki taraf se farz hai – aur Allah sab kuch jaane wala, hakeem hai.
9.61: Woh log jo Nabi ko takleef dete hain kehte hain: woh ek kaan hai – keh do: woh kaan tumhare liye behtar hai – woh Allah par imaan rakhta hai, aur momineen par bharosa karta hai – aur un logon ke liye rehmat hai jo momin hain – aur jo log Allah ke Rasool ko takleef dete hain unke liye dardnaak azaab hai.
9.62: Woh tumhein razi karna chahte hain – halaanke Allah aur uska Rasool zyada haqq rakhte hain ke unhein razi kiya jaye agar woh momin hain.
9.63: Kya woh nahi jaante ke jo Allah aur uske Rasool ka muqaabla kare uske liye jahannum ka aag hai, jahan woh hamesha rahega? Yahi bade zaleel karne wale azaab hain.
9.64: Munafiq darr rahe hain ke un par koi surah na utar aaye jo unke dilon ke raaz khol de – keh do: mazaak uthao – Allah zaroor us cheez ko zahir karega jisse tum dar rahe ho.
9.65: Agar tum un se poochho to kehenge: hum to sirf baat kar rahe thay aur mazaak kar rahe thay – keh do: kya Allah, uske aayaat, aur uske Rasool se tum mazaak karte ho?
9.66: Bahane na banao, tum ne iman ke baad kufr kiya. Agar hum tum mein se kuch logon ko maaf bhi kar dein, to kuch logon ko unke jurm ki wajah se azaab denge.
9.67: Munafiq mard aur munafiq auratein ek dosre ke jaise hain. Woh burai ka hukum dete hain aur bhalai se rokte hain, aur apne haathon band kar lete hain. Woh Allah ko bhool gaye, to Allah ne unhein bhula diya. Beshak munafiq hi fasiq hain.
9.68: Allah ne munafiq mardon, aur munafiq auraton, aur kafiron se jahannum ki aag ka wada kiya hai, jismein woh hamesha rahenge. Woh unke liye kaafi hai. Aur Allah ne un par laanat ki hai, aur unke liye hamesha ka azaab hai.
9.69: Tum un logon ki tarah ho jo tum se pehle thay, woh tum se zyada takatwar thay, aur zyada maal aur aulad rakhte thay. Woh apne hisse se lutf utha chuke, to tum bhi apne hisse se lutf utha chuke jaise un logon ne apne hisse se uthaya, aur tum bhi waise hi baaten kar rahe ho jaise un logon ne ki. Unka amal duniya aur aakhirat mein zaya ho gaya. Aur wahi log khasare mein hain.
9.70: Kya un tak un logon ki khabrein nahi pahunchein jo unse pehle thay – Nooh ki qaum, Aad, Samood, Ibrahim ki qaum, Madyan waale, aur woh log jinhein ulta kar diya gaya tha? Unke paas unke Rasool roshan nishaniyan le kar aaye, to Allah aisa na tha ke unpar zulm karta, lekin woh khud apne upar zulm kar rahe thay.
9.71: Momin mard aur momin auratein ek dusre ke wali hain. Woh bhalai ka hukum dete hain, burai se rokte hain, namaz qayam karte hain, zakat dete hain, aur Allah aur uske Rasool ki itaat karte hain. Yahi log hain jin par Allah rehmat karega. Beshak Allah zabardast, hakeem hai.
9.72: Allah ne momin mardon aur momin auraton se aisa jannat ka wada kiya hai jinke neeche nehrein beh rahi hongi. Woh usmein hamesha rahenge. Aur paakiza ghar honge Adn ki jannaton mein. Aur sab se badi cheez Allah ki raza hai. Yahi badi kamiyabi hai.
9.73: Aey Nabi! Kafiron aur munafiqon se jihad karo, aur unpar sakhti ikhtiyar karo. Unka thikana jahannum hai – aur kya hi bura thikana hai.
9.74: Woh Allah ki qasam khate hain ke unhon ne kuch nahi kaha, halanke unhon ne kufr ka kalima kaha, aur Islam qabool karne ke baad kufr kiya, aur woh us baat ka iraada kar baithe jo hasil na kar sake. Aur unka gussa sirf is baat par tha ke Allah ne apne fazl se Rasool ko aur uske saathiyon ko ni’mat di. To agar woh toba kar lein to unke liye behtar hai, aur agar mooh phera to Allah unhein duniya aur aakhirat mein dardnaak azaab dega. Aur unka na koi wali hoga na madadgar.
9.75: Aur kuch log hain jinhon ne Allah se wada kiya tha ke agar usne humein apne fazl se diya to hum sadaqa denge aur saleh logon mein shamil honge.
9.76: Phir jab usne unhein apne fazl se diya to woh usmein bukhl kar baithe, aur mooh modh gaye, aur mooh pher kar chale gaye.
9.77: To usne unke dilon mein nifaq daal diya us din tak ke woh usse milenge – is wajah se ke unhon ne Allah se kiya hua wada toda, aur jhoot bolte rahe.
9.78: Kya unhein maloom nahi ke Allah unka raaz bhi jaanta hai aur unka chupa hua mashwara bhi? Aur Allah sab baat jaane wala hai.
9.79: Woh log jo momineen mein se khud ikhtiyaari taur par sadaqat dene walon ka mazaaq udaate hain, aur un logon ka bhi jo apne mehnat ke siwa kuch nahi laa sakte – Allah unka mazaaq udaata hai – aur unke liye dardnaak azaab hai.
9.80: Chahe tum unke liye maafi maango ya na maango – agar tum unke liye sattar martaba bhi maafi maango to bhi Allah unhein maaf nahi karega. Yeh is liye ke unhon ne Allah aur uske Rasool ka inkaar kiya – aur Allah fasiq logon ko hidayat nahi deta.
9.81: Jo log peechhe reh gaye woh Rasool ke mukhalif hone par khush hue, aur unhon ne pasand kiya ke apne ghar baith jaayein – aur unhon ne Allah ke raaste mein apne maal aur jaan se jihad ko napasand kiya, aur kehne lage: Garmi mein mat niklo – keh do: Jahannum ki aag isse zyada garmi wali hai – kaash yeh samajhte.
9.82: To ab yeh log kam hansen aur zyada roya karein, us badle mein jo yeh kamaate rahe.
9.83: Agar Allah tumhein unmein se kisi giroh ki taraf wapas le aaye, aur woh tumse nikalne ki ijazat maangein to keh dena: Tum kabhi bhi mere saath nahi nikaloge, aur na kisi dushman se ladoge – tum pehli martaba baith gaye to ab bhi peechhe rehne walon ke saath raho.
9.84: Aur unmein se kisi bhi shakhs ke liye kabhi namaz na padhna jo mar jaye, aur na uski qabr par khade hona – kyunke unhon ne Allah aur uske Rasool ka inkaar kiya, aur woh faasiq hi mar gaye.
9.85: Unke maal aur unki aulad tumhein ta'ajjub mein na daalein – Allah to chahta hai ke un cheezon se unhein duniya mein azaab de, aur unki jaan nikal jaaye is halat mein ke woh kafir hon.
9.86: Aur jab koi surah naazil hoti hai: Allah par imaan lao, aur uske Rasool ke saath jihad karo – to unmein se kuch log tumse ijaazat maangte hain: kehne lagte hain: Humein chhod do ke hum baithne walon ke saath hi rahen.
9.87: Woh is baat par raazi ho gaye ke peechhe rehne waalon ke saath rahen, aur unke dilon par mohar lag gayi – to woh samajhte hi nahi.
9.88: Magar Rasool aur woh log jo uske saath imaan laye – unhon ne apne maal aur jaan se jihad kiya – yahi log hain jinke liye bhalaayi hai, aur yahi log falaah paane wale hain.
9.89: Allah ne unke liye jannatein tayar kar rakhi hain jin ke neeche nehrein beh rahi hain – jahan woh hamesha rahenge – yahi badi kamiyabi hai.
9.90: Aur kuch beduin munafiq aaye taake unhein ijaazat mil jaye – aur woh log jinhon ne jhoot bola woh baith gaye – unmein se jin logon ne kufr ikhtiyar kiya unhein dardnaak azaab pahunchega.
9.91: Naa to kamzoron par koi gunah hai, na bimaron par, na un logon par jinke paas kuch nahi ke woh jihad mein na jaa sakein – jab woh dil se Allah aur uske Rasool ke liye khuloos rakhte hon – aise logon par koi malamat nahi – Allah bakshne wala, meherban hai.
9.92: Aur na un logon par jo tumhare paas aaye ke tum unhein sawari do, aur tum ne kaha ke mere paas kuch nahi – to woh palat gaye – unki aankhen aansuon se beh rahi thi – ke woh kuch na paa sakein jo kharch karte.
9.93: Malamat un logon par hai jo ameer hain, phir bhi tumse ijaazat chahte hain – ke woh peechhe reh jaayein – woh khush ho gaye peechhe rehne walon ke saath – aur Allah ne unke dilon par mohar lagadi – to woh jaante hi nahi.
9.94: Jab tum unke paas wapas jaoge to woh tumse maazrat karenge – kehna: maazrat na karo – hum tumhara yaqeen nahi karte – Allah ne humein tumhare haal bata diye hain – aur ab Allah aur uska Rasool tumhara amal dekhenge – phir tum us taraf lauta diye jaaoge jo chhupa ya zahir jaanta hai – phir woh tumhein bata dega jo tum karte rahe.
9.95: Woh tumhare saamne Allah ki qasam khayenge taake tum unse razi ho jao – lekin agar tum razi bhi ho jao to Allah aise faasiq logon se razi nahi hota.
9.96: Woh tumse razi karne ke liye kasmain khayenge – lekin agar tum razi ho jao to Allah aise logon se razi nahi hota jo faasiq hain.
9.97: Beduin kufr aur nifaq mein sabse badh kar hain – aur Allah ne Rasool par jo kuch naazil kiya uske ahkaam se waaqif hone mein sabse peeche hain – aur Allah sab kuch jaanta, hakeem hai.
9.98: Kuch beduin aise hain jo apna diya sadqa jurmana samajhte hain, aur tum par musibat ka intezar karte hain – unhi par burayi ka chakkar hai – aur Allah sab kuch sunta, jaanta hai.
9.99: Aur kuch beduin aise hain jo Allah aur aakhirat ke din par imaan rakhte hain, aur apne maal ko Allah ke nazdeek qurbat aur Rasool ki duaein hasil karne ka zariya samajhte hain – sun lo! Yeh unke liye qurbat hai – Allah unhein apni rehmat mein daakhil karega – beshak Allah bakshne wala, meherban hai.
9.100: Aur sab se pehle iman lanewale Muhajir aur Ansar, aur jo unke baad neik amal karte hue unke peechhe chale – Allah unse razi hua aur woh Allah se razi hue – aur usne unke liye aise jannat tayar kar rakhe hain jinke neeche nehrein beh rahi hain – jahan woh hamesha rahenge – yeh badi kamiyabi hai.
9.101: Aur tumhare aas paas ke beduin mein se kuch munafiq hain – aur Madinah ke logon mein bhi kuch log nifaq mein maahir hain – tum unhein nahi jaante, hum jaante hain – hum unhein do baar azaab denge, phir woh bade azaab ki taraf paltaye jaayenge.
9.102: Aur kuch aise hain jinhon ne apne gunah ka iqraar kiya – unhon ne ek neik amal ke saath doosra bura mila diya – Allah unki toba qubool karega – beshak Allah bakshne wala, meherban hai.
9.103: Unke maal mein se sadaqa le lo taake us se unhein paak karo aur unhein saaf karo – aur unke liye dua karo – beshak tumhari dua unke liye taskeen hai – aur Allah sab kuch sunta, jaanta hai.
9.104: Kya woh nahi jaante ke Allah hi hai jo apne bandon ki toba qubool karta hai aur sadaqat leta hai – aur ke Allah hi hai jo tawbah qabool karta hai, meherban hai?
9.105: Keh do: Amal karo! To Allah tumhare amal dekhega, aur uska Rasool bhi, aur momineen bhi – phir tum us ke paas lautaaye jaoge jo sab gaib aur zahir ka jaanne wala hai – phir woh tumhein bata dega jo tum kiya karte thay.
9.106: Aur kuch log hain jinke baare mein faisla Allah ke hukm par chhoda gaya hai – chahe to unhein azaab de, ya unhein maaf kare – aur Allah sab kuch jaane wala, hakeem hai.
9.107: Aur kuch log aise bhi hain jinhon ne masjid banayi takleef dene, kufr karne, momineen mein tafraqa dalne ke liye, aur us shakhs ke intezaar mein jo pehle se Allah aur uske Rasool ka muqabla kar chuka tha – woh zarur qasam khayenge ke hamara irada sirf bhalai tha – aur Allah gawah hai ke woh jhoot bolte hain.
9.108: Us masjid mein kabhi khade na hona – ek masjid jo taqwa par pehle din se bani hai, woh zyada laayak hai ke usmein khade hua jaye – usmein aise log hain jo paak rehna pasand karte hain – aur Allah paak rehne walon ko pasand karta hai.
9.109: Kya woh shakhs behtar hai jisne apni imarat taqwa aur Allah ki raza par rakhi – ya woh jisne apni imarat ek girne wali khai ke kinare par banayi – to woh uske saath aag mein gir gayi – aur Allah zalimon ko hidayat nahi deta.
9.110: Woh imarat jo unhon ne banayi hai unke dil mein shak ka sabab rahegi jab tak ke unke dil tukde na ho jaayein – aur Allah sab kuch jaanta, hakeem hai.
9.111: Beshak Allah ne momineen se unki jaan aur maal khareed liya hai ke unke liye jannat ho – woh Allah ke raaste mein ladte hain, to qatal karte hain aur qatal kiye jaate hain – yeh Allah ka pakka wada hai Taurat, Injil aur Quran mein – aur Allah se zyada apne wada ko poora karne wala kaun hai? To khushi manao apni is khareedari par – aur yahi badi kamiyabi hai.
9.112: Woh log jo tawba karne wale hain, ibadat karne wale, shukr guzar, roza rakhne wale, ruku karne wale, sajda karne wale, bhalai ka hukum dene wale, burai se roknay wale, aur Allah ki hadon ki hifazat karne wale hain – aur momineen ko khushkhabri suna do.
9.113: Nabi aur momineen ke liye yeh laayak nahi ke mushrikeen ke liye dua e maghfirat karein – agarche woh qareebi rishtedaar hi hon – us ke baad ke un par zahir ho gaya ke woh dozakh ke saathi hain.
9.114: Aur Ibrahim ka apne baap ke liye maghfirat ki dua karna sirf ek waade ki wajah se tha jo usne usse kiya tha – phir jab us par zahir ho gaya ke woh Allah ka dushman hai to us se beraghi kar li – beshak Ibrahim bada narm dil aur burdbaar tha.
9.115: Aur Allah aisa nahi ke kisi qaum ko hidayat dene ke baad gumrah kare, jab tak ke woh unhein wazeh taur par na bata de jis se woh bachein – beshak Allah har cheez ka ilm rakhta hai.
9.116: Beshak Allah hi ke liye hai aasmaano aur zameen ki baadshahi – wahi zindagi deta hai aur wahi maut – aur Allah ke siwa tumhara koi wali aur madadgar nahi.
9.117: Beshak Allah ne Nabi par aur muhajireen aur ansar par meharbani ki – jo us waqt uske saath thay jab unke dil baaz waqt jhuk gaye thay – phir Allah ne unpar apna fazl kiya – beshak Allah un par bada shafeeq aur meherban hai.
9.118: Aur un teenon par bhi jo peechhe chhod diye gaye thay – yahan tak ke zameen un par tang ho gayi apne wus'at ke bawajood – aur unki jaan bhi un par tang ho gayi – aur unhein yaqeen ho gaya ke Allah ke siwa koi panaah nahi – phir Allah ne un par meherbani ki taake woh toba karein – beshak Allah hi toba qabool karta, meherban hai.
9.119: Aey logon jo imaan laye ho! Allah se daro, aur sachchon ke saath ho jao.
9.120: Madinah ke logon aur unke aaspas ke beduinon ke liye laayak nahi ke woh Rasool ke peechhe peechhe na jaayein, aur na hi yeh ke woh uske saath apni jaan se muh na karein – yeh is liye ke unhein Allah ke raaste mein jo bhook, pyaas, thakan pahuncheti hai, aur jo qadam bhi woh kafiron ko satane ke liye uthate hain, aur jo kuch dushman se hasil karte hain – us sab par unke liye neik amal likha jaata hai – beshak Allah neik kaaron ka ajar zaya nahi karta.
9.121: Aur woh jo bhi kharch karte hain, chhota ya bada, aur jo bhi wadi tay karte hain – yeh sab unke liye likh liya jaata hai – taake Allah unhein unke behtareen aamaal ka ajar de.
9.122: Yeh zaroori nahi ke momineen sab ke sab nikal padhein – to aisa kyun na ho ke har giroh mein se kuch log nikle taake deen ka ilm haasil karein, aur jab apne logon ke paas wapas jaayein to unhein daraayein – shayad ke woh hosh mein aa jaayein.
9.123: Aey logon jo imaan laye ho! Apne qareebi kafiron se ladho – aur woh tum mein sakhti mehsoos karein – aur jaan lo ke Allah muttaqiyon ke saath hai.
9.124: Aur jab koi surah naazil hoti hai to un mein se kuch kehte hain: Is surah ne tum mein se kiska imaan badhaya? To jo imaan laye unka imaan aur badh gaya – aur woh khush ho gaye.
9.125: Aur jinke dilon mein marz hai unke liye yeh nafrat mein izafa karti hai – unki maut tak – aur woh kafir hi mar jaate hain.
9.126: Kya yeh log har saal ek ya do martaba aazmaye nahi jaate? Phir bhi na to woh tauba karte hain, aur na naseehat lete hain.
9.127: Aur jab koi surah naazil hoti hai to woh ek doosre ki taraf dekhte hain: Kya tumhein koi dekh raha hai? Phir mooh pher kar chale jaate hain – Allah ne unke dil pher diye hain – is liye ke woh samajhte nahi.
9.128: Tumhare paas ek Rasool aaya tum mein se hi – tumhara takleef mein padna us par bhaari hai – woh tumhari bhalai ka chahne wala hai – momino ke liye narm aur meherban hai.
9.129: Phir agar woh mooh pher lein to keh do: Allah mujhe kaafi hai – uske siwa koi mabood nahi – usi par maine bharosa kiya – aur woh arsh-e-azeem ka Malik hai.

10.1: Alif Laam Raa. Yeh us kitab ki aayatein hain jo hikmat se bharpoor hai.
10.2: Kya logon ke liye yeh ajeeb baat hai ke humne ek aadmi ko unmein se wahi bheji ke logon ko dara de, aur imaan laane walon ko khushkhabri de ke unke liye unke Rab ke paas sachcha rutba hai? Kafiron ne kaha: yeh to khula jaadoo gar hai.
10.3: Beshak tumhara Rab Allah hai jisne aasmano aur zameen ko chhay dinon mein paida kiya, phir arsh par istaawa farmaaya. Woh har kaam ka intezam karta hai. Koi sifarish karne wala nahi siwa uske ijazat ke baad. Yeh Allah tumhara Rab hai, to usi ki ibadat karo. Kya tum hosh mein nahi aate?
10.4: Usi ki taraf tum sab ko lautna hai. Allah ka waada sachcha hai. Woh pehli dafa paida karta hai, phir usi ko dobaara dohrayega, taa ke un logon ko insaaf ke saath jaza de jo imaan laye aur neik amal kiye. Aur jin logon ne kufr kiya unke liye ubalti hui garam paani ki piyalein hongi, aur dardnaak azaab unki nafarmaani ke sabab se.
10.5: Wahi hai jisne sooraj ko chamakdaar banaya aur chand ko roshan kiya, aur uske liye manazil muqarrar ki taake tum saalon ka hisaab aur waqton ka andaaza jaan sako. Allah ne yeh sab kuch haq ke saath banaya. Woh apni aayaton ko tafseel se bayaan karta hai un logon ke liye jo ilm rakhte hain.
10.6: Raat aur din ke ulat phair mein, aur jo kuch Allah ne aasmanon aur zameen mein paida kiya, us mein nishaniyan hain un logon ke liye jo Allah se darte hain.
10.7: Jo log hamari mulaqat ki umeed nahi rakhte, aur duniya ki zindagi par raazi ho gaye hain, aur usi mein mutma'in ho gaye hain, aur jo hamari aayaton se gafil hain,
10.8: Unka thikaana dozakh hai unke kamaaye hue aamal ke badle.
10.9: Beshak jo log imaan laaye aur neik amal kiye, unhein unka Rab unke imaan ke sabab se hidaayat dega. Un ke neeche nahrain beh rahi hongi ne’mat bhare jannaton mein.
10.10: Wahan unki dua yeh hogi: Subhanak Allahumma, aur unka salaam hoga: Salaam. Aur unki dua ka aakhri jumla hoga: Alhamdulillahi Rabbil Aalameen.
10.11: Aur agar Allah logon ke liye buraai mein ta’ajjul farmata jaise woh bhalai ke liye jaldbaazi karte hain to unka waqt poora ho jaata. Magar hum un logon ko jo hamari mulaqat ki umeed nahi rakhte, unke sarshar mein bhatakne ke liye chhod dete hain.
10.12: Aur jab insaan ko koi takleef pahunche to woh lete hue, baithe hue, khade hue – har haal mein humein pukarta hai. Phir jab hum uski takleef door kar dete hain to woh aise chalta hai jaise usne humein kisi museebat ke waqt pukara hi na tha. Aise hi zyadati karne walon ke liye un ke aamal khubsurat bana diye jaate hain.
10.13: Aur humne tumse pehle ke daur ke logon ko halaak kiya jab unhon ne zulm kiya, aur unke Rasool unke paas wazeh daleelon ke saath aaye, lekin woh iman lanay wale na thay. Aise hi hum mujrim logon ko jazaa dete hain.
10.14: Phir humne tumhein zameen mein unke baad khalifa banaya taa ke dekhein tum kya karte ho.
10.15: Aur jab unhein hamari aayatein saaf saaf sunayi jaati hain to woh log jo hamari mulaqat ka yaqeen nahi rakhte kehte hain: Is ke bajaye koi aur Qur’an le aao, ya is mein tabdili karo. Kaho: Mera kaam yeh nahi ke main apni taraf se is mein tabdili kar doon. Main to wahi peerta hoon jo mere paas wahi ke zariye aata hai. Agar main apne Rab ki nafarmaani karun to main ek bade din ke azaab se darta hoon.
10.16: Kaho: Agar Allah chahta to main tumhein yeh Qur’an sunata hi na, aur na Allah tumhein is se muttali karta. Main is se pehle tum mein ek umar guzar chuka hoon. Kya tum samajhte nahi?
10.17: Phir us shakhs se zyada zalim kaun ho sakta hai jo Allah par jhoot baandhe ya uski aayaton ko jhutlaye? Beshak mujrim kabhi kamiyab nahi hote.
10.18: Aur woh Allah ke siwa aise ko poojhte hain jo na unhein nuqsan pohcha sakta hai na faida. Aur kehte hain: Yeh Allah ke haan humare sifarishi hain. Kaho: Kya tum Allah ko aise baat ki khabar dete ho jise na woh aasmano mein jaanta hai na zameen mein? Woh har aisi cheez se paak hai jise woh uska shareek thehrate hain.
10.19: Log ek hi ummat thay, phir un mein ikhtilaf ho gaya. Agar tere Rab ki taraf se ek baat pehle se tai na ho gayi hoti to jinke darmiyan ikhtilaf hua us ka faisla kab ka ho chuka hota.
10.20: Aur kehte hain: Us par us ke Rab ki taraf se koi nishani kyun na nazil hui? Kaho: Ghaib sirf Allah ke ikhtiyar mein hai, to intezaar karo, main bhi tumhare saath intezaar kar raha hoon.
10.21: Aur jab hum logon ko kisi museebat ke baad rehmat ka maza chakhaate hain to woh hamari aayaton mein chaalbaazi karte hain. Kaho: Allah ki chaal sabse tez hai. Beshak hamare Farishte tumhari chaalbaazi ko likh rahe hain.
10.22: Wahi hai jo tumhein khushki aur samundar mein chalat phirat deta hai. Jab tum kashtiyon mein hotay ho aur woh unhein achhi hawa ke saath chalatay hain, aur log us se khush hotay hain, achanak un par tez hawa chalti hai aur un par har taraf se mauj aa jaati hai, aur woh samajh jaate hain ke woh gher liye gaye hain, to woh Allah ko pakar lete hain, ikhlaas ke saath dua karte hain: Agar tu humein is se nijaat de de to hum zaroor shukar guzaar honge.
10.23: Phir jab Allah unhein bacha leta hai to woh zameen mein na-haqq sar-kashi karte hain. Logon! Tumhari sar-kashi sirf tumhari hi jaan par padti hai. Duniya ki zindagi ka kuch arsa hi maza hai, phir tumhein hamare paas laut kar aana hai, phir hum tumhein tumhare aamaal ka badla denge.
10.24: Duniya ki zindagi ki misaal aise hai jaise humne aasman se paani barsaya to us se zameen ki nabatat nikalti hai, jo log aur jaanwar khate hain. Phir jab zameen apne zewer se saj jaati hai aur log samajhte hain ke woh uspe qaabil hai, achanak raat ya din mein hamara hukm aa jaata hai, to hum usay kaat daalte hain jaise kal wahan kuch tha hi nahi. Aise hi hum un logon ke liye nishaniyan tafseel se bayaan karte hain jo sochte hain.
10.25: Aur Allah salamati ke ghar ki taraf bulaata hai, aur jise chahta hai seedhi raah dikhaata hai.
10.26: Jo log neik amal karte hain unke liye achha inaam hai aur zyada bhi. Unke chehron par na to koi gard hogi na zillat. Woh log jannat mein honge, hamesha us mein rahenge.
10.27: Aur jin logon ne buray kaam kiye, unki saza usi jaisi hai, aur un par zillat chaa jaayegi. Unhein Allah se koi bachaane wala na hoga. Unke chehre par andheron ki chadar si hogi, jaise raat ka ek tukda un par gir gaya ho. Yeh woh log hain jo dozakh mein honge, hamesha usi mein rahenge.
10.28: Aur jis din hum un sabko jama karenge phir un logon se jo shirk karte thay kahenge: Apni jagah raho, tum bhi aur tumhare shareek bhi. Phir unmein hum tafreeq kar denge, aur unke shareek kahenge: Tum hamari ibaadat nahi karte thay.
10.29: To Allah humare aur tumhare darmiyan gawah kaafi hai, ke hum tumhari ibaadat se bilkul be-khabar thay.
10.30: Wahan har shakhs apne kiye ka anjaam jaan lega, aur woh Allah ki taraf haazir kiye jaayenge jo unka sachcha Maula hai, aur unse woh sab kuch kho gaya jo woh jhooth ke taur par bana rahe thay.
10.31: Kaho: Kaun tumhein aasman aur zameen se rizq deta hai? Ya kaun tumhare kaano aur aankhon ka malik hai? Aur kaun zinda se murda nikalta hai, aur murda se zinda nikalta hai? Aur kaun har kaam ki tadbeer karta hai? Woh zaroor kahenge: Allah. To kaho: Phir kya tum dar nahi rakhte?
10.32: Yahi Allah tumhara sachcha Rab hai. To haqq ke baad gumraahi ke siwa aur kya reh jaata hai? To tum kahan phiraye ja rahe ho?
10.33: Isi tarah tere Rab ka hukm un logon par bhi lagu ho gaya jo faasiq thay ke woh imaan nahi laayenge.
10.34: Kaho: Kya tumhare woh shareek mein koi hai jo khalq karne ka aaghaz kare, phir usay dobaara paida kare? Kaho: Allah hi khalq ki ibtida karta hai, phir usay dobaara karta hai. Phir tum kahan phiraye ja rahe ho?
10.35: Kaho: Kya tumhare woh shareek mein koi hai jo haqq ki taraf hidaayat kare? Kaho: Allah hi haqq ki taraf hidaayat karta hai. To jo haqq ki taraf hidaayat karta hai, kya woh us se zyada haqdaar nahi ke uski pairwi ki jaye, us ke muqable mein jo hidaayat nahi karta magar khud kisi aur ki hidaayat ka mohtaaj hai? To tum kya ho gaye ho, kaise faisla karte ho?
10.36: Aur un mein se aksar bas gumaan ke peechhe chalte hain. Aur gumaan haq ke muqable mein kuch bhi kaam nahi aata. Beshak Allah un sab ke aamaal se waaqif hai.
10.37: Aur yeh Qur'an aisi kitaab nahi jo Allah ke siwa kisi aur ki taraf se ghadi gayi ho. Balki yeh un kitaabon ki tasdeeq hai jo is se pehle aa chuki hain, aur is mein har baat tafseel se bayan ki gayi hai. Is mein koi shak nahi, yeh Rabul Aalameen ki taraf se hai.
10.38: Kya kehte hain ke isay us ne ghadh liya hai? Kaho: To lao ek surah is jaisi, aur bula lo jise tum bula sako Allah ke siwa agar tum sacche ho.
10.39: Balki unhon ne us cheez ko jhutlaya jisko woh samajh na sake, aur abhi us ka anjaam un ke saamne nahi aaya. Aise hi logon ne unse pehle jhutlaya, to dekh lo zalimon ka anjaam kaisa hua.
10.40: Aur un mein se kuch aise hain jo is par imaan laate hain, aur kuch aise hain jo isay jhutlate hain. Aur tera Rab mufsidon ko khoob jaanta hai.
10.41: Aur agar woh tujhe jhutlaate hain to keh de: Mera amal mere liye hai, aur tumhara amal tumhare liye. Tum jo kuch karte ho us se main bari hoon, aur jo main karta hoon us se tum bari ho.
10.42: Aur un mein se kuch aise hain jo teri baat suntay hain. Kya tu be-sunon ko sunaa sakta hai agar woh samajh na rakhte hon?
10.43: Aur un mein se kuch aise hain jo tujhe dekhte hain. Kya tu andhon ko rasta dikha sakta hai agar woh dekhte na hon?
10.44: Beshak Allah logon par zulm nahi karta, lekin log hi apne aap par zulm karte hain.
10.45: Aur jis din Allah unhein jama karega, to aisa lagega jaise woh ek ghadi bhar ke liye din mein rukay thay, woh ek doosre ko pehchanein ge. Beshak jisne Allah se mulaqat ka inkaar kiya aur hidayat na maani, woh nuksan mein rahe.
10.46: Aur agar hum tujhe woh kuch dikha dein jiska hum unse waada kar rahe hain ya tujhe wafat de dein, har surat mein unhein hamari taraf lautna hai. Phir Allah gawah hai unke aamaal par.
10.47: Aur har ummat ke liye ek Rasool hai. Phir jab unka Rasool aa jata hai to unke darmiyan insaaf se faisla kiya jata hai aur unpar zulm nahi kiya jata.
10.48: Aur kehte hain: Yeh waada kab pura hoga agar tum sacche ho?
10.49: Kaho: Main apne liye na kisi nuqsan ka ikhtiyar rakhta hoon, na kisi faide ka, magar jo Allah chahe. Har ummat ke liye ek waqt muqarrar hai, phir jab unka waqt aa jata hai to woh ek ghadi na peeche hat sakte hain, na aage badh sakte hain.
10.50: Kaho: Kya tum ne kabhi socha agar us ka azaab raat ko aa jaye ya din ko, to aise mujrim kya cheez jaldi talab kar rahe hain?
10.51: Kya phir jab woh aa jaye to tum us par imaan laoge? Kya ab? Halanke tum to usi ke jaldi aane ki demand kar rahe thay.
10.52: Phir un logon se jo zulm karte thay kaha jayega: Chakho ab hamesha ka azaab. Kya tumhein uska badla diya ja raha hai magar jo tum kamaate thay?
10.53: Aur tujh se poochhte hain kya yeh sach hai? Kaho: Haan, mere Rab ki kasam, yeh zaroor sach hai, aur tum is se bach nahi sakte.
10.54: Aur agar har nafs ke paas sab kuch ho jo zameen mein hai to woh usay azaab se chutkaara kharidne ke liye de de. Aur jab woh azaab dekh lenge to pachhtaayenge, aur un ke darmiyan insaaf se faisla kiya jayega. Un par koi zulm na hoga.
10.55: Kya Allah hi ka nahi hai jo kuch aasmano aur zameen mein hai? Kaho: Phir kya tum Allah ke siwa kisi aur se darte ho?
10.56: Wahi zindagi deta hai aur wahi maut deta hai, aur usi ki taraf tum lautaye jaoge.
10.57: Logon! Tumhare paas tumhare Rab ki taraf se ek naseehat aayi hai, aur dilon ki shifa, aur hidayat aur rehmat hai momineen ke liye.
10.58: Kaho: Allah ke fazl aur uski rehmat par hi logon ko khushi manani chahiye. Woh us se behtar hai jo woh jama karte hain.
10.59: Kaho: Kya tum ne dekha ke Allah ne tumhare liye jo rizq nazil kiya, us mein se tumne kuch ko haraam aur kuch ko halaal bana diya? Kaho: Kya Allah ne tumhein iski ijaazat di hai ya tum Allah par jhoot baandhte ho?
10.60: Aur kya khayal hai un logon ka jo Allah par jhoot baandhte hain qayamat ke din ke baare mein? Beshak Allah logon par fazl farmata hai, lekin un mein se aksar shukar nahi karte.
10.61: Aur tum kisi bhi haal mein hotay ho, aur tum Qur’an mein koi hissa padhte ho, aur tum koi bhi amal karte ho, hum us waqt tum par nazar rakhe hote hain jab tum is mein mashghool hotay ho. Tumhare Rab se kuch bhi chhupa hua nahi rehta, na zameen mein aur na aasman mein, na koi zarra, na us se chhota, na bada, magar sab kuch ek wazeh kitaab mein hai.
10.62: Sun lo! Allah ke waliyon par na koi khauf hai aur na woh ghamgeen honge.
10.63: Woh log jo imaan laye aur taqwa ikhtiyar kiya.
10.64: Un ke liye duniya ki zindagi mein bhi khushkhabri hai aur aakhirat mein bhi. Allah ke iradon mein koi tabdili nahi. Yeh hi badi kamiyabi hai.
10.65: Aur unki baaton se tujhe gham na ho. Beshak izzat poori ki poori Allah ke haath mein hai. Wahi sab kuch sunta aur jaanta hai.
10.66: Sun lo! Jo kuch aasmano mein hai aur jo kuch zameen mein hai sab Allah ka hai. Aur jin logon ne Allah ke siwa dusre ko pukara woh kisi cheez ke bhi malik nahi, woh bas andazay lagate hain.
10.67: Wahi hai jisne tumhare liye raat banayi ke us mein tum sukoon pao, aur din roshan banaya. Beshak is mein nishaniyan hain un logon ke liye jo sunte hain.
10.68: Unhon ne keh diya: Allah ne beta bana liya. Woh paak hai! Woh be-niyaaz hai. Jo kuch aasmano mein hai aur zameen mein hai sab usi ka hai. Tumhare paas is ke liye koi daleel nahi. Kya tum Allah par woh baat kehte ho jo tum nahi jaante?
10.69: Kaho: Jo log Allah par jhoot baandhte hain woh kabhi kaamiyab nahi hote.
10.70: Unke liye duniya mein kuch faida hai, phir hamari taraf unhein lautna hai, phir hum unhein unke kufr ka azaab chakhaayenge.
10.71: Aur unhein Nooh ka qissa sunaao jab usne apni qaum se kaha: Ai meri qaum! Agar mera qayaam aur Allah ki aayaton ka yaad dilana tum par bhaari ho gaya hai, to main Allah par bharosa karta hoon. To apna faisla kar lo, apne shareekon ke saath mil kar, phir tumhare faisle mein koi uljhan na ho. Phir mere saath jo karna hai kar daalo aur mujhe mohalat na do.
10.72: Agar tum phir jaate ho to main tumse kuch maangta nahi. Mera ajar to Allah ke zimmedar hai. Aur mujhe hukm diya gaya hai ke main Muslim ho jaaun.
10.73: Phir unhon ne usay jhutlaya, to humne usay aur uske saathiyon ko kashti mein bacha liya, aur unhein khalifa banaya, aur un logon ko gharq kar diya jinhon ne hamari aayaton ko jhutlaya. Pas dekh lo un logon ka anjaam kaisa hua jo daraaye gaye thay.
10.74: Phir humne uske baad kai Rasool unki qaumon ki taraf bheje, to woh unke paas saaf nishaniyan le kar aaye, magar woh aise na thay ke jis cheez ko pehle jhutla chuke thay us par imaan laayein. Aise hi hum hadd se badhne walon ke dilon par mohar laga dete hain.
10.75: Phir unke baad humne Moosa aur Haroon ko apni nishaniyon ke saath Firoun aur uski qaum ki taraf bheja. To unhon ne takabbur kiya, aur woh mujrim log thay.
10.76: Phir jab hamari taraf se unke paas haqq aaya to kehne lage: Yeh to khula jaadoo hai.
10.77: Moosa ne kaha: Kya tum haqq ke baare mein yeh kehte ho jab woh tumhare paas aaya? Kya yeh jaadoo hai? Halanke jaadoo gar kabhi kamiyab nahi hotay.
10.78: Unhon ne kaha: Kya tu humein us raste se pherna chahta hai jise humne apne baap dada se paaya, aur tum dono ko zameen mein badai haasil ho? Hum tum dono par imaan laane wale nahi.
10.79: Aur Firoun ne kaha: Har maahir jaadoo gar ko mere paas le aao.
10.80: Phir jab jaadoo gar aaye to Moosa ne unse kaha: Jo kuch tum daalne wale ho daal do.
10.81: Phir jab unhon ne daala to Moosa ne kaha: Jo kuch tum laaye ho, yeh jaadoo hai. Allah isey abhi fanaa kar dega. Beshak Allah fasaad karne walon ke kaam ko durust nahi karta.
10.82: Aur Allah haqq ko apne kalimaat se qaayam karta hai, chahe mujrim logon ko bura lage.
10.83: Phir Moosa par unke logon mein se sirf ek thoda sa hissa hi imaan laaya, Firoun aur uske afsarano ke darr se, ke kahin woh unhein museebat mein na daal dein. Aur beshak Firoun zameen mein zabardasti aur hadd se badh jaane wala tha. Aur woh hadd se zyada tafreeq karne wala tha.
10.84: Aur Moosa ne kaha: Ai meri qaum! Agar tum Allah par imaan laaye ho to usi par bharosa rakho agar tum Muslim ho.
10.85: Unhon ne kaha: Humne Allah par bharosa kiya. Ai hamare Rab! Humein zalim logon ke liye fitna na bana.
10.86: Aur humein apni rehmat se kaafiron ke qoum se bacha le.
10.87: Aur humne Moosa aur uske bhai ko wahi ki ke tum dono apni qaum ke liye Misr mein ghar bana lo, aur apne gharon ko qibla (ibadat ka rukh) bana lo, aur namaz qayam rakho. Aur momino ko khushkhabri do.
10.88: Aur Moosa ne dua ki: Ai hamare Rab! Tu ne Firoun aur uske sardaron ko duniya ki zindagi mein zeenat aur maal diya hai, ai hamare Rab! Taa ke woh logon ko teri raah se bhatakayein. Ai hamare Rab! Unke maal mitaa de aur unke dilon par mohar laga de, phir woh imaan na laayen jab tak dardnaak azaab na dekh lein.
10.89: Allah ne farmaya: Tum dono ki dua qabool ki gayi, to tum dono raah par mazbooti se qaim raho, aur un logon ki raah na chuno jo ilm nahin rakhte.
10.90: Aur humne Bani Israel ko samundar ke paar nikaal diya, to Firoun aur uski fauj ne had se guzar kar aur taaddi karte hue unka ta’aqub kiya. Jab usay gark hone laga to kehne laga: Main imaan laata hoon ke koi maabood nahi magar wahi jis par Bani Israel imaan laaye, aur main Musalmaan hoon.
10.91: Kya ab? Halanke is se pehle tu nafarmaan tha, aur bigaad karne walon mein se tha.
10.92: Aaj hum teri laash ko bacha lenge taa ke tu unke liye jo tere baad hain ek nishani ban jaye. Aur beshak logon mein se aksar hamari nishaniyon se gafil hain.
10.93: Aur humne Bani Israel ko ek behtareen jagah mein basaya, aur unhein achi cheezein di khanay ke liye. Phir unhon ne ikhtilaaf kiya jab unke paas ilm aa chuka tha. Beshak tera Rab qayamat ke din unke darmiyan faisla karega jismein woh ikhtilaaf karte thay.
10.94: Phir agar tujhe us cheez mein shak ho jo humne tujh par nazil ki hai, to un logon se poochh le jo tujh se pehle kitaab padhtay thay. Beshak haqq tere Rab ki taraf se hai, pas tu shak karne walon mein na ho.
10.95: Aur un logon mein se na ho jo Allah ki aayaton ko jhutlate hain, warna tu bhi nuqsan uthaaney walon mein se ho jaayega.
10.96: Beshak jin logon par tere Rab ka kalma sabit ho chuka hai, woh imaan nahi laayenge.
10.97: Chahe unke paas har nishani aa jaye, jab tak woh dardnaak azaab ko na dekh lein.
10.98: To aisa kyun na hua ke koi basti imaan laayi ho aur uska imaan usay faida de gaya? Magar Yunus ki qaum, jab unhon ne imaan laaya to humne un se duniya ki zindagi mein ruswai ka azaab hata diya, aur unhein ek muddat tak zindagi di.
10.99: Aur agar tera Rab chahta to zameen par jitne log hain sab ke sab imaan le aate. To kya tu logon ko majboor karega ke woh imaan le aayein?
10.100: Aur kisi ke bas mein nahi ke woh imaan laye siwaye Allah ke hukm ke. Aur woh ganda kar deta hai un logon ko jo aqal nahi rakhte.
10.101: Kaho: Zameen aur aasman mein kya kuch hai dekho! Aur un logon ke liye jo imaan nahi laate, nishaniyan aur daraawa kuch kaam nahi aate.
10.102: To kya woh bas isi intezaar mein hain ke un logon jaisa din aaye jo un se pehle guzre? Kaho: To intezaar karo, main bhi tumhare saath intezaar karta hoon.
10.103: Phir hum apne Rasoolon ko aur un logon ko jo imaan laye, bachaa lete hain. Isi tarah hamara zimma hai ke momineen ko bacha lein.
10.104: Kaho: Logon! Agar tum mere deen mein shak mein ho to main un ko nahi poojhta jinhein tum Allah ke siwa poojhte ho, balki main Allah ki ibaadat karta hoon, jo tumhein maut deta hai. Mujhe hukm diya gaya hai ke main momin banun.
10.105: Aur yeh ke apna chehra deen ki taraf rakh kar raast qaim raho, aur mushrikeen mein se na ho.
10.106: Aur unhein na pukaro jo Allah ke siwa tumhein na faida de sakte hain na nuqsan, agar tumne aisa kiya to tum bhi zalim ban jaoge.
10.107: Aur agar Allah tumhein koi takleef pohchaye to us ke siwa koi usay door karne wala nahi, aur agar woh tumhare saath bhalaai ka irada kare to koi uske fazl ko roknay wala nahi. Woh apne bandon mein jise chahta hai pohchata hai. Aur wahi bada bakhshne wala, meherban hai.
10.108: Kaho: Logon! Tumhare paas tumhare Rab ki taraf se haqq aa gaya hai. To jo hidaayat ikhtiyar kare woh apne liye karta hai, aur jo gumraah ho to uska nuqsan bhi usi ka hai. Aur main tumhara zimmedar nahi hoon.
10.109: Aur tu us cheez ki pairwi kar jo tere Rab ki taraf se wahi ki jaati hai, aur sabr kar jab tak Allah faisla na kare. Aur woh behtareen faisla karne wala hai.

11.1: Alif, Lam, Ra. Yeh ek kitaab hai jiske ayaat pukhta aur tafseel se bayan kiye gaye hain, ek Hakeem-o-Khabir ki taraf se.
11.2: Tum na ibadat karo magar Allah ki, main uski taraf se tumko dar sunane wala aur basharat dene wala hoon.
11.3: Aur tum apne Rab se maghfirat maango, phir uski taraf rujoo karo, to woh tumhein ek muqarrar waqt tak achhi zindagi ka lutf uthane dega, aur har fazilat wale ko uska fazl ata karega. Agar tum mooh phero to main tumpar ek bade din ke azaab se darata hoon.
11.4: Tum sabko Allah ki taraf lautna hai, aur woh har cheez par qadir hai.
11.5: Suno! Woh apne seene chhupate hain taake usse chhup jaayein. Haan! Jab woh apne kapdon mein lapet lete hain, to woh jaanta hai jo kuch woh chhupate hain aur jo kuch woh zahir karte hain. Beshak woh seene ke andar ki baatein jaanta hai.
11.6: Zameen par koi chalne wala aisa nahi jiska rizq Allah ke zimmedar na ho, aur woh uska thikaana aur uska amanat rakhne ka jagah jaanta hai. Sab kuch ek saaf kitaab mein hai.
11.7: Aur wahi hai jisne aasmanon aur zameen ko chhe dino mein paida kiya, aur uska arsh paani par tha, taake tumhein azmaye ke tum mein se kaun behtar amal karta hai. Agar tum keh do ke tum marne ke baad uthaye jaoge, to kafir kahenge: Yeh to khula jaadu hai.
11.8: Aur agar hum unse azaab thodi der ke liye taal dein to zaroor kahenge: Kis cheez ne use roka? Sun lo! Jab woh unpar aayega to unse phiraya na ja sakega, aur wohi cheez unhein gher le gi jiska woh mazaak udate rahe.
11.9: Aur agar hum insaan ko apni rehmat ka maza chakhayein, phir use us se cheen lein to woh nihayat mayoos, nashukra ban jaata hai.
11.10: Aur agar usko mushkil ke baad ni’mat ka maza chakhayein to woh zaroor kehta hai: Meri mushkilein door ho gayi hain. Beshak woh khushiyan mein akarta, fakhar karta hai.
11.11: Magar woh log jo sabr karte hain aur neik amal karte hain, unke liye maghfirat aur bada ajar hai.
11.12: To kya tum is baat se chhod doge jo kuch tumhari taraf wahee kiya gaya, aur is wajah se tumhara seena tang ho gaya ke woh kehte hain: Us par koi khazana kyun nahi utara gaya, ya uske saath koi farishta kyun nahi aaya? Tum to sirf dar sunane wale ho, aur Allah har cheez ka wakeel hai.
11.13: Kya woh kehte hain: Usne is Quran ko ghadh liya hai? Keh do: Phir tum is jaisi das suratein le aao jo ghadi hui hon, aur Allah ke siwa jise chaho madad ke liye bula lo, agar tum sachche ho.
11.14: Phir agar woh tumhari baat na maanein to samajh lo ke yeh ilm ke saath hi naazil hua hai, aur yeh ke Allah ke siwa koi mabood nahi. Phir kya tum Muslim hote ho?
11.15: Jo log duniya ki zindagi aur uski zeenat chahte hain, hum unka amal duniya mein poora dete hain, aur unhein ismein koi kami nahi hoti.
11.16: Wohi log hain jinke liye aakhirat mein aag ke siwa kuch nahi, aur unka kiya gaya sab kuch zaya ho gaya, aur jo kuch woh karte thay woh butlaan mein gaya.
11.17: Kya woh shakhs jo apne Rab ki taraf se ek roshan daleel par ho, aur uske peechhe Allah ka gawaah ho, aur usse pehle Musa ki kitaab rehnuma aur rehmat ke taur par (ho) – yeh log us par imaan late hain – aur jo uska inkaar karein un mein se, unka waada jahannum hai. Pas tum ismein shak mein na padna – yeh tumhare Rab ki taraf se haqq hai – magar zyada log imaan nahi late.
11.18: Aur us se bada zalim kaun ho sakta hai jo Allah par jhooth ghade? Aise log apne Rab ke samne pesh kiye jaayenge, aur gawaah kahenge: Yeh log wohi hain jinhon ne apne Rab par jhooth ghada. Sun lo! Allah ki laanat zalimon par hai.
11.19: Woh log jo Allah ke raaste se rokte hain, aur usme tedh dhoondte hain, aur woh aakhirat ka inkaar karte hain.
11.20: Woh zameen mein Allah ko hara nahi sakte, aur na unka Allah ke siwa koi wali hoga. Unke liye azaab dohra hoga. Woh sun nahi sakte thay, aur na dekhte thay.
11.21: Yeh wahi log hain jinhon ne apne aap ko ghata diya, aur unka woh sab kuch gum ho gaya jo woh ghadhte thay.
11.22: Beshak woh log aakhirat mein sabse zyada khasare mein rahne wale hain.
11.23: Beshak woh log jo imaan laye, neik amal kiye, aur apne Rab ke samne ajzi se rahe – wahi jannat waley hain – jahan woh hamesha rahenge.
11.24: Yeh dono giroh ek andhe aur behre jaise hain, aur doosra dekhne wala aur sunne wala – kya yeh dono barabar ho sakte hain? Kya tum sochte nahi?
11.25: Aur beshak humne Nooh ko uski qaum ki taraf bheja, ke maine tumhare liye ek saaf saaf dar sunane wala hoon.
11.26: Ke tum Allah ke siwa kisi ki ibadat na karo – mujhe tum par ek dardnaak din ke azaab ka dar hai.
11.27: To uski qaum ke wo log jinhon ne kufr kiya kaha: Hum tumhein apne jaise hi insaan dekhte hain – aur hum dekhte hain ke tumhari pairwi sirf woh log kar rahe hain jo humare darje ke nichle log hain – hamare khayal ke bagair – aur hum tum mein koi fazilat nahi dekhte apne upar – balke hum to tumhein jhootey samajhte hain.
11.28: Usne kaha: Aey meri qaum! Kya tum dekhte nahi ke agar main apne Rab ki taraf se ek daleel par hoon, aur usne mujhe apne paas se rehmat di ho jo tumhein nazar nahi aayi – to kya hum isay tum par zabardasti thop dein agar tum nafrat karte ho?
11.29: Aur aey meri qaum! Main tumse is kaam par koi maal nahi chahta – mera ajar to sirf Allah ke zimme hai – aur main un logon ko door nahi karne wala jinhon ne imaan laya hai – woh apne Rab se milne wale hain – lekin main tumhein jahil qaum samajhta hoon.
11.30: Aur aey meri qaum! Agar main unhein door kar doon to mujhe Allah se kaun bacha sakega agar main uska nafarmaan banoon? To kya tum hosh mein nahi aate?
11.31: Aur main tumse yeh nahi kehta ke mere paas Allah ke khazane hain, aur na main gaib jaanta hoon, aur na main kehta hoon ke main farishta hoon – aur na main kehta hoon un logon ke baare mein jinhein tum zaleel samajhte ho ke Allah unhein koi bhalaayi nahi dega – Allah unka behtar jaane wala hai – agar main aisa kahoon to main zaalim ho jaunga.
11.32: Unhon ne kaha: Aey Nooh! Tumne humse jhagad liya, aur bohot jhagda kiya, to ab wo azaab le aao jiska tumne wada kiya hai, agar tum sachche ho.
11.33: Usne kaha: Usse sirf Allah hi laye ga agar chahe – aur tum usse rokk nahi sakte.
11.34: Aur mera nasihat tumhein faida nahi degi agar main tumhein naseehat doon, jab Allah tumhein gumrah karna chahe – woh tumhara Rab hai – aur usi ki taraf tum lautaye jaoge.
11.35: Kya woh kehte hain ke usne is Quran ko ghadh liya hai? Keh do: Agar maine isey ghadha hai to mere jurm ka zimma mujh par hai – aur jo jurm tum karte ho us se main bari hoon.
11.36: Aur Nooh ko wahee ki gayi ke tumhari qaum mein ab koi imaan laane wala nahi raha siwa un logon ke jo pehle se imaan la chuke – to unki karstaniyon par gham na karo.
11.37: Aur hamari nigrani mein, aur hamari wahee ke mutabiq ek kashti banao – aur un logon ke baare mein mujh se kuch na kehna jo zulm karte hain – woh doobaye jaayenge.
11.38: Aur woh kashti banata raha – aur jab bhi uski qaum ke log uske paas se guzarte to uska mazaaq udaate – usne kaha: Agar tum hamara mazaaq udate ho to ek din aisa aayega ke hum bhi tumhara mazaaq udayenge jaise tum udate ho.
11.39: Phir tum jaano ge ke kis par azaab aata hai jo use zaleel karta hai – aur kis par hamesha ka azaab aata hai.
11.40: Yahan tak ke jab hamara hukm aa gaya, aur tannur se paani ubalne laga, to humne kaha: Har jins mein se ek ek joda kashti mein le lo – aur apne ghar walon ko siwa un logon ke jinke baare mein pehle faisla ho chuka – aur un logon ko bhi jo imaan laaye – aur uske saath sirf thode log hi imaan laye.
11.41: Aur usne kaha: Chalo ismein sawar ho jao – Allah ke naam se hi iska chalna hai aur uska theharna – beshak mera Rab zarur bakshne wala, meherban hai.
11.42: Aur woh kashti unhein le kar le ja rahi thi lehron ke darmiyan jaise pahaadon ke – aur Nooh ne apne bete ko pukara jo ek kone mein tha: Aey mere bete! Mere saath sawar ho ja – kafiron ke saath na reh.
11.43: Usne kaha: Main kisi pahad par chadh kar apne aap ko paani se bacha loonga. Nooh ne kaha: Aaj kisi ko Allah ke hukm se koi bachaane wala nahi – siwa us ke jise usne reham kiya – aur dono ke darmiyan lehr aa gayi, to woh doob gaya.
11.44: Aur kaha gaya: Aey zameen! Apna paani nigal le – aur aey aasman! Tham ja – aur paani sukha diya gaya – aur kaam tamam ho gaya – aur woh kashti Judi par thehar gayi – aur kaha gaya: Door ho zulm karne wale log.
11.45: Aur Nooh ne apne Rab ko pukara aur kaha: Aey mere Rab! Mera beta mere ghar walon mein se hai, aur tera waada sachcha hai – aur tu sab se behtar faisla karne wala hai.
11.46: Allah ne kaha: Aey Nooh! Woh tumhare ghar walon mein se nahi hai – uska amal ghair saleh hai – to mujhe us cheez ke baare mein na puchho jiska tumhein ilm nahi – main tumhein naseehat karta hoon ke tum jaahil na bano.
11.47: Usne kaha: Aey mere Rab! Main panah chahta hoon tujhse ke main tujhse kisi aisi cheez ka sawal karoon jiska mujhe ilm nahi – aur agar tu mujhe maaf na kare aur mujh par reham na kare to main nuqsan uthaaney walon mein se ho jaunga.
11.48: Kaha gaya: Aey Nooh! Salamti ke saath utar ja – aur barkatein tujh par hoon aur un girohon par jo tere saath hain – aur kuch giroh hain jinko hum kuch (duniya ka) lutf denge – phir unhein hamari taraf se dardnaak azaab pahunchega.
11.49: Yeh gaib ki khabrein hain jo hum tumhari taraf wahee ke zariye bhejte hain – tum unhein pehle jaante na thay – na tumhari qaum – to sabr karo – akhirat muttaqiyon ke haq mein hai.
11.50: Aur Aad ki taraf humne unke bhai Hud ko bheja – usne kaha: Aey meri qaum! Allah ki ibadat karo – uske siwa tumhara koi mabood nahi – tum to bas jhoot ghadte ho.
11.51: Aey meri qaum! Main is kaam par tumse koi ajar nahi maangta – mera ajar to sirf usi par hai jisne mujhe paida kiya – kya tum samajhte nahi?
11.52: Aur aey meri qaum! Apne Rab se maghfirat maango, phir uski taraf rujoo karo – woh tum par aasman se barsaat bhejega, aur tumhari taqat mein izafa karega – aur tum mooh na phero mujrim ban kar.
11.53: Unhon ne kaha: Aey Hud! Tum hamare paas koi roshan daleel nahi laye – aur hum tumhare kehne se apne maaboodon ko chhodne wale nahi – aur na hi hum tum par imaan la rahe hain.
11.54: Hum to kehte hain ke tumhare kuch maaboodon ne tumhein kisi buraayi mein mubtala kar diya hai – usne kaha: Main Allah ko gawah banata hoon – aur tum bhi gawah raho ke main unse bari hoon jise tum Allah ka shareek thehrate ho.
11.55: Unse alag jinhein tum uske siwa poojte ho – to tum sab mil kar mere khilaf chaal chalo, phir mujhe mohalat na do.
11.56: Main to Allah par bharosa karta hoon jo mera bhi Rab hai aur tumhara bhi – koi chalne wala aisa nahi jiski qabz-o-qudrat mein uski naasiyah (maathey ki girah) na ho – beshak mera Rab seedhe raaste par hai.
11.57: Agar tum mooh phero to main tum tak woh paighaam pahuncha chuka hoon jo mujhe dekar bheja gaya – aur mera Rab kisi aur qaum ko tumhare baad laayega – aur tum uska kuch bhi bigaad nahi sakte – beshak mera Rab har cheez par nigraan hai.
11.58: Aur jab hamara hukm aaya to humne Hud ko aur un logon ko jo uske saath imaan laye thay – apni rahmat se bacha liya – aur unhein sakht azaab se najat di.
11.59: Yeh Aad ki qaum thi – unhon ne apne Rab ke aayaat ka inkaar kiya, aur uske Rasoolon ki nafarmaani ki, aur har sarkash dushman ki pairwi ki.
11.60: Aur duniya mein bhi unpar laanat padi, aur qayamat ke din bhi – sun lo! Aad ne apne Rab ka inkaar kiya – sun lo! Aad ke liye laanat hai – woh Hud ki qaum thi.
11.61: Aur Samood ki taraf humne unke bhai Saleh ko bheja – usne kaha: Aey meri qaum! Allah ki ibadat karo – uske siwa tumhara koi mabood nahi – usi ne tumhein zameen se paida kiya aur usmein tumhein abaad kiya – to us se maghfirat maango, phir uski taraf rujoo karo – beshak mera Rab qareeb hai, jawab dene wala.
11.62: Unhon ne kaha: Aey Saleh! Tum to pehle hamare darmiyan umeed ke saath thay – kya tum humein mana karte ho ke hum unki ibadat na karein jinhein hamare baap dada poojte thay? Aur hum to us shak mein hain jiske taraf tum humein bula rahe ho.
11.63: Usne kaha: Aey meri qaum! Kya tum dekhte nahi ke agar main apne Rab ki taraf se ek daleel par hoon, aur usne mujhe apne paas se rehmat di ho – to mujhe uski nafarmaani karne se kaun bacha sakta hai? Agar main uski nafarmaani karun to tum mera kuch bhi nahi bacha sakte.
11.64: Aur aey meri qaum! Yeh Allah ki ountni tumhare liye nishani hai – ise chhod do ke Allah ki zameen mein khaaye – aur ise koi takleef na pahunchaana, warna tumhein qareeb azaab aa lega.
11.65: To unhon ne uski tang kaat di – phir usne kaha: Apne ghar mein teen din aur mazay se rah lo – yeh ek waada hai jo jhoot na hoga.
11.66: Phir jab hamara hukm aaya to humne Saleh ko aur un logon ko jo uske saath imaan laye thay – apni rahmat se bacha liya, aur us din ke ruswai se – beshak tera Rab hi zabardast hai, qadir hai.
11.67: Aur un logon ko ek dahshat ne le liya – to woh apne gharon mein zanoon ke bal gir pade.
11.68: Go yaan ke unhon ne kabhi wahan basera hi na kiya ho – sun lo! Samood ne apne Rab ka inkaar kiya – sun lo! Samood ke liye laanat hai.
11.69: Aur beshak hamare farishte Ibrahim ke paas khushkhabri lekar aaye – unhon ne salaam kiya – usne jawab diya: Salaam – phir der na ki ke ek bhuna hua bachhda le aaye.
11.70: Phir jab unhon ne dekha ke unke haath us tak nahi pahuch rahe to usse ajnabiyat mehsoos ki – aur dil mein unse darr mehsoos kiya – unhon ne kaha: Darro nahi – hum Lut ki qaum ki taraf bheje gaye hain.
11.71: Aur uski biwi khadi thi to woh hans padi – to humne usse Ishaq ki khushkhabri di, aur Ishaq ke baad Yaqub ki.
11.72: Usne kaha: Aey haaye! Kya main bacha paida karungi jab main budhiya ho gayi hoon, aur yeh mera shohar bhi budha hai? Beshak yeh to ajeeb baat hai.
11.73: Unhon ne kaha: Kya tum Allah ke hukm par taajjub karti ho? Allah ki rehmat aur uski barkatein hain tum logon par – Ahl-e-Bayt par – beshak woh hamd wala, majeed hai.
11.74: Phir jab Ibrahim se darr door ho gaya aur us tak khushkhabri pahunch gayi to woh Lut ki qaum ke liye fikr karne laga.
11.75: Beshak Ibrahim bohot hi narm dil, burdbaar tha, baar baar Allah ki taraf rujoo karne wala.
11.76: Aey Ibrahim! Is baat ko chhod do – beshak tumhare Rab ka hukm aa chuka – aur un logon par azaab zaroor aane wala hai jo phiraya na ja sakega.
11.77: Aur jab hamare farishte Lut ke paas aaye to woh unke aane se pareshan ho gaya, aur dil tang ho gaya – unhon ne kaha: Darro nahi, aur gham na karo – hum tumhein aur tumhare ghar walon ko najat dene wale hain – siwa tumhari biwi ke – woh peeche rehne walon mein se hai.
11.78: Aur uski qaum uske paas daudi aaye – aur woh pehle se hi badkaron ka kaam karti thi – usne kaha: Aey meri qaum! Yeh meri betiyan tumhare liye paak hain – Allah se daro, aur mujhe mere mehmaan ke silsile mein ruswa na karo – kya tum mein koi akalmand nahi?
11.79: Unhon ne kaha: Tum jaante ho ke humein tumhari betiyon mein koi dilchaspi nahi – aur tum jaante ho jo hum chahte hain.
11.80: Usne kaha: Kaash mere paas tumhare muqable mein koi taqat hoti, ya main kisi mazboot sahare se lag jata.
11.81: Unhon ne kaha: Aey Lut!
