Hum tumhare Rab ke farishte hain – woh tum tak nahi pahunch sakte – to raat ke kisi pehar apne ghar walon ke saath nikal jao – aur tum mein se koi bhi peechhe na mudhkar dekhe – siwa tumhari biwi ke – us par bhi wahi musibat aayegi jo in logon par aayegi – unka waqt subah hai – kya subah nazdeek nahi?
11.82: Phir jab hamara hukm aa gaya to humne us basti ko ulat diya – aur un par pathar barsaaye jo mitti ke thay, pahle se nishan lagaaye gaye thay – ek ke baad ek.
11.83: Woh tumhare Rab ke paas se nishaan laga kar bheje gaye thay – aur woh zulm karne walon se door nahi hain.
11.84: Aur Madyan ki taraf humne unke bhai Shuaib ko bheja – usne kaha: Aey meri qaum! Allah ki ibadat karo – uske siwa tumhara koi mabood nahi – aur tummeez poori do aur tarazu theek rakho – aur logon ko unki cheezein kam na do – aur zameen mein fasaad na machao baad iske ke uski durusti ho chuki hai – yeh tumhare liye behtar hai agar tum momin ho.
11.85: Aur naap aur tol mein insaaf se kaam lo – aur logon ko unki cheezein kam na do – aur zameen mein fasaad karte na phiro.
11.86: Allah ka jo baqi rakh diya hua hissa hai woh tumhare liye behtar hai agar tum momin ho – aur main tum par nigehbaan nahi.
11.87: Unhon ne kaha: Aey Shuaib! Kya tumhari namaz tumhein yeh hukm deti hai ke hum un cheezon ki ibadat chhod dein jinhein hamare baap dada poojte thay – ya apne maal mein hum jo chahein woh na karein? Beshak tum to ek burdbaar aur akalmand lagte ho.
11.88: Usne kaha: Aey meri qaum! Kya tum dekhte nahi ke agar main apne Rab ki taraf se ek daleel par hoon, aur usne mujhe apne paas se achha rizq diya hai – main nahi chahta ke main tumse us kaam mein mukhalfat karun jis se main tumhein rokun – main to sirf islah chahata hoon jitni meri taaqat hai – aur meri taufeeq sirf Allah par hai – main usi par bharosa karta hoon aur usi ki taraf rujoo karta hoon.
11.89: Aur aey meri qaum! Kahin aisa na ho ke meri mukhalfat tumhein usi musibat mein daal de jo Nooh ki qaum, ya Hud ki qaum, ya Saleh ki qaum par aayi – aur Lut ki qaum tumse door nahi.
11.90: Aur apne Rab se maghfirat maango, phir uski taraf rujoo karo – beshak mera Rab meherban, mohabat karne wala hai.
11.91: Unhon ne kaha: Aey Shuaib! Hum tumhari bohot si baaton ko nahi samajhte – aur hum dekhte hain ke tum hamare darmiyan kamzor ho – agar tumhara khandaan na hota to hum tumhein pathar maar kar maar daalte – aur tum hamare liye koi qeemat nahi rakhte.
11.92: Usne kaha: Aey meri qaum! Kya mera khandaan tum par Allah se zyada izzat rakhta hai ke tumne usse peeth phair li – beshak mera Rab jo kuch tum karte ho uska ghera hua hai.
11.93: Aur aey meri qaum! Apne maqam par amal karo – main bhi apne maqam par amal kar raha hoon – jald hi tumhein maloom ho jaayega kis par ruswa kun azaab aata hai, aur kaun jhoota hai – so intezar karo – main bhi tumhare saath intezar karta hoon.
11.94: Phir jab hamara hukm aa gaya to humne Shuaib ko aur un logon ko jo uske saath imaan laye thay – apni rahmat se bacha liya – aur un logon ko ek dahshat ne le liya – to woh apne gharon mein zanoon ke bal gir pade.
11.95: Go yaan ke unhon ne kabhi wahan raha hi na ho – sun lo! Madyan ke liye bhi waisa hi hua jaise Samood ke saath hua tha.
11.96: Aur beshak humne Musa ko apni nishaniyon aur khuli sanad ke saath bheja.
11.97: Firoun aur uske sardaron ke paas – to unhon ne Firoun ke hukum ko maana – halanke Firoun ka hukum koi hidayat wala nahi tha.
11.98: Woh qayamat ke din apni qaum ka aaga ban kar le jaayega – to unhein aag mein le jaayega – aur kya hi bura hai woh thikana jisme woh pahunche jaayenge.
11.99: Aur is duniya mein bhi unke peechhe laanat lagi – aur qayamat ke din bhi – kya hi bura hai woh inaam jo diya gaya.
11.100: Yeh kuch misaalein hain jo hum tumhein suna rahe hain – un bastiyon ke waqiyat mein se – unmein kuch ab bhi baaqi hain, aur kuch kat gaye hain.
11.101: Aur humne unpar zulm nahi kiya – magar unhon ne khud apne upar zulm kiya – phir jab tumhare Rab ka hukm aaya to unke woh maabood jinhein woh Allah ke siwa poojte thay – unke kuch bhi kaam na aaye – aur unhon ne unhein tabahi ke siwa kuch na diya.
11.102: Aur aise hi teray Rab ki pakad hoti hai jab woh bastiyon ko pakadta hai unke zulm par – beshak uski pakad sakht dardnaak hoti hai.
11.103: Beshak ismein nishani hai us shakhs ke liye jo aakhirat ke azaab se dare – woh ek din hai jisme sab log jama kiye jaayenge – aur yahi ek gawai ka din hai.
11.104: Aur us din ko hum sirf ek muqarrar waqt tak ke liye taakhir dete hain.
11.105: Jis din woh aayega, to koi jaan uske izn ke bagair kuch bol na sakegi – usmein kuch badnaseeb honge aur kuch khush naseeb.
11.106: To jo badnaseeb honge woh aag mein honge – unke liye wahaan cheekhna-pukarna aur seene se saans lena hoga.
11.107: Jahan woh hamesha rahenge – jab tak aasmaan aur zameen qayam rahen – siwa uske jo tumhara Rab chahe – beshak tera Rab jo chahe karne wala hai.
11.108: Aur jo log khush naseeb honge woh jannat mein honge – jahan woh hamesha rahenge – jab tak aasmaan aur zameen qayam hain – siwa uske jo tumhara Rab chahe – yeh ata hai jo kabhi khatam na hoga.
11.109: Pas jo log Allah ke siwa kisi aur ki ibadat kar rahe hain unki shakk mein na padna – woh sirf usi cheez ki ibadat kar rahe hain jise unke baap dada karte aaye – aur hum unhein unka hissa poora dene wale hain kamiyon ke bagair.
11.110: Aur beshak humne Musa ko kitaab di – phir usmein ikhtilaf hua – aur agar tumhare Rab ki taraf se pehle baat na ho chuki hoti to faisla ho gaya hota – aur woh ismein shak mein daal dene wale hain.
11.111: Aur beshak tumhara Rab un sabka poora poora badla dega jo unhon ne kiya – beshak woh unke aamaal se bakhabar hai.
11.112: Pas jaisa tumhein hukm diya gaya hai waisa hi sabit qadam raho – aur woh bhi jo tumhare saath tauba kar chuke hain – aur hadd se na badho – beshak Allah hadd se badhne walon ko pasand nahi karta.
11.113: Aur un logon ki taraf mat jhuko jinhon ne zulm kiya – warna tumhein bhi aag chhoo legi – aur tumha
11.114: Aur namaz qayam karo din ke dono kinarein aur raat ke kuch hisson mein – beshak neikiyan buraiyon ko mita deti hain – yeh naseehat hai yaad rakhne walon ke liye.
11.115: Aur sabr karo – beshak Allah neik amal karne walon ka ajar zaya nahi karta.
11.116: To aisa kyun na hua ke tumse pehle waalon mein kuch log aise hote jo zameen mein fasaad se rokte – siwa un chandh logon ke jinhein humne unmein se bacha liya – aur zalimon ne un cheezon ka peechha kiya jismein unhein aish mili thi – aur woh mujrim the.
11.117: Aur tumhara Rab aisa nahi ke bastiyon ko zulm ke saath halaak kare jab unke log islaah kar rahe hon.
11.118: Aur agar tumhara Rab chahta to sab logon ko ek hi ummat bana deta – magar woh hamesha ikhtilaf mein rahenge.
11.119: Siwa unke jin par tumhare Rab ne reham kiya – aur isi ke liye unhein paida kiya gaya – aur tumhare Rab ka farman poora ho gaya: Main zarur jahannum ko insaanon aur jinnon se bhar dunga.
11.120: Aur hum tumhein sab paighambaron ke waqiyaat sunate hain – taake is se tumhare dil ko mazbooti dein – aur ismein tumhare liye haqq aur naseehat hai, aur momineen ke liye yaad-dihani hai.
11.121: Aur keh do un logon se jo imaan nahi late: Tum apni jagah amal karo – hum bhi amal kar rahe hain.
11.122: Aur intezar karo – hum bhi intezar kar rahe hain.
11.123: Aur Allah ke haath mein hain aasmanon aur zameen ke gaib – aur usi ki taraf sab mamlaat lautaaye jaate hain – pas usi ki ibadat karo, aur usi par bharosa rakho – aur tumhara Rab be-ghaflat nahi jo tum kar rahe ho.

12.1: Alif Laam Raa. Ye aayatein hain ek roshan kitaab ki.
12.2: Beshak humne ise ek arabi Qur’an banaya hai taa ke tum samajh sako.
12.3: Hum aap ko behtareen qissa sunate hain is Qur’an ke zariye jo humne aap ki taraf wahi kiya, jab ke aap is se pehle be-khabar thay.
12.4: Yaad karo jab Yusuf ne apne walid se kaha: Abba jaan! Main ne khwab mein dekha ke 11 sitare, sooraj aur chand mujhe sajda kar rahe hain.
12.5: Unhon ne kaha: Beta! Apna khwab apne bhaiyon ko na batana warna woh tumhare khilaf koi chaal chalenge. Shaytan insaan ka khula dushman hai.
12.6: Aur is tarah tera Rab tujhe chunta hai aur tujhe taabeer-e-khwaab (taabeer ka ilm) sikhaata hai aur apna ehsaan tum par aur Yaqub ki aulad par poora karta hai jaise usne is se pehle tere baap dada Ibrahim aur Ishaq par poora kiya. Beshak tera Rab sab kuch jaane wala, hikmat wala hai.
12.7: Beshak Yusuf aur uske bhaiyon ke qissay mein un logon ke liye nishaniyan hain jo poochhne wale hain.
12.8: Jab unhon ne kaha: Yusuf aur uska bhai (Binyamin) hamare baap ko hum se zyada pyare hain, halanke hum poora giroh hain. Beshak hamara baap khule gumraah mein hai.
12.9: Qatal kar do Yusuf ko ya use kisi zameen mein phenk do taa ke tumhare baap ka dhyan sirf tumhari taraf ho jaye, aur tum uske baad nek ban jao.
12.10: Un mein se ek ne kaha: Yusuf ko qatal na karo, balke use kisi andheree kuwein mein daal do, kuch musafir use nikaal lenge agar tum kuch karna hi chahte ho.
12.11: Unhon ne kaha: Abba jaan! Kya baat hai ke aap Yusuf par humein bharosa nahi karte halanke hum uske khairkhwah hain?
12.12: Kal use humein saath bhej dijiye, woh khel bhi lega aur ghoom bhi lega. Hum uske zimmedar hain.
12.13: Unhon ne kaha: Mujhe gham hai ke tum use le jao, aur mujhe dar hai ke use bhediya na kha jaaye jab tum us se ghaafil ho jao.
12.14: Unhon ne kaha: Agar usay bhediya kha jaye halanke hum ek zorawar giroh hain, to hum to nuksan uthaaney wale honge.
12.15: Phir jab woh use le gaye aur is par mutafiq ho gaye ke use ek andheree kuen mein daal dein, to humne uski taraf wahi ki: Tu zaroor unhein unka yeh kaam bataega jab woh samajh bhi na rahe honge.
12.16: Aur raat ke waqt apne baap ke paas roti roti aaye.
12.17: Unhon ne kaha: Abba jaan! Hum mukabla kar rahe thay aur Yusuf ko apne saman ke paas chhod diya, to usay bhediya kha gaya. Aap humein maanenge nahi halanke hum sach keh rahe hain.
12.18: Aur unhon ne uski kamees jhooti khoon mein rang kar laayi. Unhon ne kaha: Balke tumhare nafs ne ek baat tumhare liye suhaani bana di hai, pas sabr-e-jameel behtar hai. Aur Allah hi se madad maangta hoon us par jo tum bayan kar rahe ho.
12.19: Aur ek qafila aaya, phir unhon ne apna pani laane wala bheja, usne apni dol nikali to kaha: Mubarak ho! Yeh to ek ladka hai. Aur unhon ne use tijarat ka maal samajh kar chhupa liya. Aur Allah unki har baat ko jaanta hai.
12.20: Aur unhon ne use beche diya chand gini hui dirhamon mein, aur woh us ke qadr daan na the.
12.21: Aur jis shakhs ne use Misr mein kharida usne apni biwi se kaha: Isay izzat ke saath rakho, shayad yeh humein faida de ya hum isay beta bana lein. Aur is tarah humne Yusuf ko zameen mein maqam diya aur usay taabeer-e-khwaab ka ilm diya. Aur Allah apne kaam par gaalib hai magar aksar log nahi jaante.
12.22: Aur jab Yusuf apne jawani ko pahuncha to humne usay hikmat aur ilm diya. Aur is tarah hum neikon ko badla dete hain.
12.23: Aur jis ghar mein woh tha uski biwi ne use behkaane ki koshish ki aur us se kaha: Aa mere paas. Usne kaha: Allah ki panaah! Beshak uske malik ne mujhe acchi rehaish di hai. Beshak zalim kabhi kaamiyab nahi hotay.
12.24: Aur us aurat ne us par iraada kiya, aur usne bhi us aurat ka iraada kar liya, agar woh apne Rab ki burhanee na dekh leta. Is tarah humne burai aur fahashi ko us se taal diya. Beshak woh hamare chune hue bandon mein se tha.
12.25: Aur dono darwaze ki taraf daude, aur us aurat ne uski kamees peechhe se phaad di, aur dono ne uske shohar ko darwaze ke paas paaya. Us aurat ne kaha: Kya saza hai us shakhs ki jo teri biwi ke saath bura iraada kare siwa iske ke use qaid kiya jaye ya dardnaak azaab diya jaye?
12.26: Yusuf ne kaha: Usne mujh se behkaane ki koshish ki. Aur us aurat ke ghar walon mein se ek gawah ne gawahi di: Agar uski kamees aage se phati ho to woh sach keh rahi hai aur yeh jhoot bol raha hai.
12.27: Aur agar uski kamees peechhe se phati ho to woh jhoot bol rahi hai aur yeh sach keh raha hai.
12.28: Phir jab usne dekha ke uski kamees peechhe se phati hai to kaha: Yeh tum auraton ki chaal hai. Beshak tumhari chaal badi azeem hoti hai.
12.29: Yusuf! Tu is baat se darguzar kar, aur tu (aurat) apne gunah ki maafi maang, beshak tu hi khata karne walon mein se hai.
12.30: Aur shehar ki auraton ne kaha: Aziz ki biwi apne naukar se uska dil behlaane ki koshish kar rahi hai. Uska ishq iske dil mein chhaya hua hai. Beshak hum use khule gumraah mein dekh rahi hain.
12.31: Phir jab usne unki makaarana baat suni to unhein bula bheja, aur un ke liye ek mehfil tayar ki, aur har ek ko ek chhuri de di, aur (Yusuf se) kaha: Unke samne nikal aa. Phir jab unhon ne use dekha to uski azmat se hairan reh gayi, aur apne haath kaat baithein, aur kehne lagi: SubhanAllah! Yeh to koi bashar nahi, yeh to koi buzurg farishta hai!
12.32: Usne kaha: Yahi woh hai jiske liye tum mujhe malamat kar rahi ho. Beshak main ne ise behkaane ki koshish ki thi, par isne bachaav kiya. Aur agar yeh mera kehna na maana to zaroor qaid kiya jaayega aur zaleel hoga.
12.33: Yusuf ne dua ki: Ai mere Rab! Mujhe qaid zyada pasand hai us se jo yeh mujhe bula rahi hain. Agar tu mujh se inki chaal taal na de to main in ki taraf mayil ho jaunga aur jahilon mein se ho jaunga.
12.34: Phir uske Rab ne uski dua qubool ki aur in auraton ki chaal us se taal di. Beshak woh sunne wala, jaane wala hai.
12.35: Phir unhon ne baad mein samjha ke use kuch arsa qaid rakhna chahiye halanke unhein nishaniyan nazar aa chuki thein.
12.36: Aur us ke saath do jawan qaid mein daakhil huye. Un mein se ek ne kaha: Main dekhta hoon ke main sharab nichod raha hoon. Aur doosre ne kaha: Main dekhta hoon ke main apne sir par roti uthaye hue hoon, jise parinday kha rahe hain. Humein iska matlab bataiye, hum aap ko nek logon mein se samajhte hain.
12.37: Yusuf ne kaha: Jo khana tumhein milne wala hai, us ke aane se pehle main tumhein uski taabeer bata dunga. Yeh un cheezon mein se hai jo mere Rab ne mujhe sikhayi hain. Main un logon ka deen chhod chuka hoon jo Allah par imaan nahi rakhte aur woh aakhirat ka inkaar karte hain.
12.38: Aur main apne baap dada Ibrahim, Ishaq aur Yaqub ka deen ikhtiyar kiya. Hum Allah ke saath kisi ko shareek nahi banate. Yeh Allah ka fazl hai hum par aur sab insano par, lekin aksar log shukar nahi karte.
12.39: Ai mere qaid ke saathi! Kya mukhtalif Rab (maabood) behtar hain ya Allah jo akela, zabardast hai?
12.40: Tum Allah ke siwa sirf aise naam poojhte ho jo tumne aur tumhare baap dada ne rakhe hain, Allah ne unke liye koi hujjat nazil nahi ki. Hukm sirf Allah ka hai. Usi ne hukm diya hai ke usi ki ibaadat karo. Yeh sahi deen hai, lekin aksar log nahi jaante.
12.41: Ai mere qaid ke saathiyo! Tum mein se ek apne Rab ko sharab pilayega, aur doosre ko sooli di jayegi aur parinday uske sar se khayenge. Yeh faisla hai us baat ka jiske baare mein tumne mujh se pucha.
12.42: Aur un mein se jis ke baare mein samjha ke woh bach jaayega us se kaha: Apne Rab ke paas mera zikr karna. Magar shaytan ne use apne Rab ka zikr bhula diya. Phir Yusuf kuch saal qaid mein raha.
12.43: Aur ek din Badshah ne kaha: Main dekhta hoon ke saat moti gaayein hain jinhain saat dubli gaayein kha rahi hain, aur saat hariyan satoon hain aur saat khushk. Ai darbaar walon! Agar tum khwab ki taabeer karte ho to mujhe is khwab ka matlab batao.
12.44: Unhon ne kaha: Yeh to aise khwabon ka majmua hai jin ka matlab hum nahi jaante.
12.45: Aur un dono mein se jo bach gaya tha, use ab yaad aaya kuch waqt ke baad, to usne kaha: Main tumhein is khwab ki taabeer bataunga, mujhe Yusuf ke paas bhej do.
12.46: Usne kaha: Yusuf! Ai sachay aadmi! Humein is khwab ka matlab batao: Saat moti gaayein jinhain saat dubli gaayein kha gayi hain, aur saat hariyan satoon aur saat khushk. Shayad main logon ke paas laut jaun taa ke woh jaan lein.
12.47: Yusuf ne kaha: Saat baras lagatar tum kheti karoge. Phir jo kaato us mein se thoda sa chhod dena uske kanwoun mein siwa uske jo tum kha jao.
12.48: Phir uske baad saat sakht baras aayenge jo us sab ko kha jaayenge jo tumne uske liye pehle jama kiya, siwa uske jo tum thoda sa sambhaal kar rakhoge.
12.49: Phir uske baad ek saal aayega jisme logon ko baarish milegi aur usmein woh nichodenge (sharab, tail waghera).
12.50: Phir Badshah ne kaha: Use mere paas le aao. Phir jab uske paas paighaam laaya gaya to Yusuf ne kaha: Apne Rab (Badshah) ke paas wapas jao aur us se poochho ke un auraton ka kya haal hai jinhon ne apne haath kaat liye the. Mera Rab unki chaalon ko achhi tarah jaanta hai.
12.51: Badshah ne un auraton se poochha: Kya hua jab tumne Yusuf se chhed chhaad ki? Unhon ne kaha: Hasha lillah! Humne us mein koi buraai nahi dekhi. Aziz ki biwi ne kaha: Ab sach saaf ho gaya. Main ne hi use behkane ki koshish ki thi. Aur woh to bilkul sach keh raha tha.
12.52: Yeh is liye ke Yusuf jaane ke main ne unka khoon chhupaya nahi, aur Allah khaayinon ke chaalon ko kamiyab nahi karta.
12.53: Aur main apne nafs ko bhi beqasoor nahi kehta. Beshak nafs to bure ka hukm deta hai siwa uske jis par mera Rab reham kare. Beshak mera Rab bakshne wala, meherban hai.
12.54: Badshah ne kaha: Use mere paas le aao, main use apne nazdik khaas bana lunga. Phir jab usne us se baat ki to kaha: Aaj se tu hamare paas izzatdar aur ameen hai.
12.55: Yusuf ne kaha: Mujhe mulk ke khazaane ka zimma de do. Main dekhbhaal karne wala hoon, ilm rakhta hoon.
12.56: Aur is tarah humne Yusuf ko us mulk mein iqtedaar diya, jahan chahe rehta tha. Hum apni rehmat se jise chahein nawazte hain. Aur nek logon ka ajar hum zaya nahi karte.
12.57: Aur aakhirat ka ajar un logon ke liye behtar hai jo imaan laaye aur taqwa ikhtiyar kiya.
12.58: Aur Yusuf ke bhai Misr aaye, to woh un ke paas aaye. Usne unhein pehchaan liya aur woh log use nahi pehchaan sake.
12.59: Aur jab usne unka samaan taiyar kar diya to kaha: Mujhe tumhara baap ka bhai laakar do. Kya tum nahi dekhte ke main poori naap deta hoon aur behtareen mehmaandari karta hoon?
12.60: Agar tum use mere paas na laaye to na to tumhein mere paas se kuch milega aur na hi tum mere qareeb aana.
12.61: Unhon ne kaha: Hum us ke liye us ke baap se darkhwast karenge, aur yeh hum zaroor karenge.
12.62: Aur Yusuf ne apne naukaron se kaha: Inka maal unki boriyon mein daal do taa ke jab yeh apne ghar jaayein to ise pehchaan lein aur shayad phir laut kar aayein.
12.63: Phir jab woh apne baap ke paas pahunche to kaha: Abba jaan! Humein dobara rashan dena mana kar diya gaya hai. So hamare bhai ko hamare saath bhej dijiye taa ke humein rashan mil sake. Aur hum uski hifazat zaroor karenge.
12.64: Unhon ne kaha: Kya main us ka tum par waisa hi bharosa karoon jaisa Yusuf ke silsile mein kiya tha? Phir Allah hi behtareen hifazat karne wala hai. Aur wahi sab se zyada reham karne wala hai.
12.65: Aur jab unhon ne apna saman khola to paaya ke unka maal unhein wapas kar diya gaya hai. Kehne lage: Abba jaan! Aur kya chahiye? Yeh dekhiye hamara maal bhi humein wapas mil gaya hai. Ab hum apne ghar walon ke liye rashan lekar aayenge, apne bhai ki hifazat bhi karenge, aur ek oont ka boojh aur zyada le aayenge. Yeh asaani se mil jaayega.
12.66: Unhon ne kaha: Main uske saath kabhi nahi bhejoonga jab tak ke tum Allah ke naam se mujh se ehad na karo ke tum use laa kar zaroor wapas laoge siwa uske ke tum sab gher liye jaao. Phir jab unhon ne ehad kar liya to unhon ne kaha: Allah hamare bayan par gawah hai.
12.67: Aur unhon ne kaha: Mere beton! Ek hi darwaze se mat daakhil hona, alag alag darwazon se daakhil hona. Main Allah ki taqdeer se tumhein bacha nahi sakta. Faisla to sirf Allah ka hai. Main usi par bharosa karta hoon. Aur bharosa karne walon ko usi par bharosa karna chahiye.
12.68: Aur jab woh sheher mein daakhil huye jaisa ke unke baap ne kaha tha, to yeh baat unhein Allah ke kisi faislay se nahi bacha sakti thi. Magar Yaqub ne apne dil ki ek baat poori kar li. Aur woh to hamari sikhayi hui cheez se ilm rakhte thay. Magar aksar log nahi jaante.
12.69: Aur jab woh Yusuf ke paas daakhil huye to usne apne bhai ko apne paas alag le liya. Usne kaha: Main tera bhai hoon, to jo kuch yeh log karte thay us se gham na kar.
12.70: Phir jab unka samaan taiyar kar diya to Yusuf ne apne bhai ke saman mein paimane ko rakh diya. Phir ek pukarne wale ne pukara: Ai qafile walon! Tum to chori karte ho.
12.71: Unhon ne unki taraf mur kar kaha: Tumhari kya chori gayi hai?
12.72: Unhon ne kaha: Badshah ka paimana humse gum ho gaya hai, aur jo use laayega uske liye ek oont ka boojh inaam hai, aur main iska zimmedar hoon.
12.73: Unhon ne kaha: Allah ki qasam! Tum jaante ho ke hum is mulk mein fasaad karne nahi aaye aur na hi hum chor hain.
12.74: Unhon ne kaha: Agar tum jhootay nikle to uska kya saza hai?
12.75: Unhon ne kaha: Jiske saman mein mile wahi uski saza hai. Hum zalimon ko aise hi saza dete hain.
12.76: Phir Yusuf ne uski talashi karni shuru ki un ke saman se pehle apne bhai ke saman se. Phir usay nikaal liya apne bhai ke saman se. Humne Yusuf ke liye aise hi chaal chali. Woh badshah ke deen ke mutabiq apne bhai ko pakad nahi sakta tha siwa iske ke Allah chahta. Hum jise chahein rutba dete hain. Aur har ilm wale se upar ek aur ilm wala hota hai.
12.77: Unhon ne kaha: Agar usne chori ki hai to us ka bhai bhi is se pehle chori kar chuka hai. Yusuf ne is baat ko chupaya aur us par kuch nahi kaha. Khud se kaha: Tum bahut hi bure ho, aur Allah jaanta hai jo tum bayaan karte ho.
12.78: Unhon ne kaha: Ai azeez! Uska ek buzurg baap hai, to iski jagah hum mein se kisi ko rakh lo. Hum tumhein neik logon mein se samajhte hain.
12.79: Usne kaha: Allah se panaah! Hum us shakhs ke siwa kisi aur ko kaise rakh lein jiske paas apna maal paaya. Aisa karne wale to zaalim hain.
12.80: Phir jab woh us se naumeed ho gaye to chupke se mashwara karne lage. Un mein se jo sab se bada tha usne kaha: Kya tum jaante nahi ke tumhare baap ne tumse Allah ka ehad liya tha, aur is se pehle Yusuf ke silsile mein tumse ghalati ho chuki hai? Main to kabhi is zameen se nahi jaunga jab tak mera baap mujhe ijaazat na de ya Allah mere liye faisla kar de. Aur woh sab se behtar faisla karne wala hai.
12.81: Tum jao aur apne baap se kaho: Abba jaan! Aapke bete ne chori ki hai. Aur humne wahi kaha jo humein maloom tha. Aur hum gayab ke rakhwale nahi the.
12.82: Aur aap un basti walon se poochh lijiye jahan hum thay, aur us qafile se jisme hum aaye. Beshak hum sach keh rahe hain.
12.83: Unhon ne kaha: Balke tumhare nafs ne ek aur baat tumhare liye suhaani bana di hai. Pas sabr-e-jameel behtar hai. Shayad Allah mujhe un sab par lauta de. Beshak woh sab kuch jaane wala, hakeem hai.
12.84: Aur woh un se mooh pher kar kehne lage: Haye Yusuf! Aur unki aankhein gham ke marein safed ho gayi. Aur woh gham mein ghut rahe thay.
12.85: Unhon ne kaha: Allah ki qasam! Tum Yusuf ka zikr karte rahoge jab tak ke tum mare na jao ya halaak ho jao.
12.86: Unhon ne kaha: Main apna gham aur apna dukh Allah ke saamne bayaan karta hoon, aur Allah se woh jaanta hoon jo tum nahi jaante.
12.87: Ai mere beton! Jaakar Yusuf aur uske bhai ka pata lagao, aur Allah ke rahmat se naumeed mat ho. Beshak Allah ki rahmat se sirf kafir hi naumeed hote hain.
12.88: Phir jab woh Yusuf ke paas aaye to kaha: Ai azeez! Humein aur hamare ghar walon ko badi takleef hui hai. Aur hum thoda maal laaye hain. To humein pura rashan de do, aur humein sadaqa do. Beshak Allah sadaqa dene walon ko jazaa deta hai.
12.89: Usne kaha: Kya tum jaante ho ke tumne Yusuf aur uske bhai ke saath kya kiya jab tum nadaan thay?
12.90: Unhon ne kaha: Kya tum Yusuf ho? Usne kaha: Haan, main Yusuf hoon aur yeh mera bhai hai. Allah ne hum par ehsaan kiya. Beshak jo taqwa ikhtiyar kare aur sabr kare to Allah nekon ka ajar zaya nahi karta.
12.91: Unhon ne kaha: Allah ki qasam! Beshak Allah ne tujhe hum par fazilat di, aur hum ghalati karne walon mein thay.
12.92: Usne kaha: Aaj tum par koi malamat nahi. Allah tumhein maaf kare. Aur woh sab se reham karne wala hai.
12.93: Meri yeh kamees le jao aur mere baap ke chehre par daal do. Unki roshni wapas aa jaayegi. Aur mere paas apne sab ghar walon ko le aao.
12.94: Aur jab qafila chala to unka baap kehne laga: Main Yusuf ki khushboo mehsoos kar raha hoon agar tum mujhe jhootay na keh rahe ho.
12.95: Unhon ne kaha: Allah ki qasam! Aap ab bhi apni purani ghalat fehmi mein hain.
12.96: Phir jab basharat dene wala aaya aur usne kamees unke chehre par daali to unki roshni wapas aa gayi. Unhon ne kaha: Kya main tumse nahi kehta tha ke main Allah se aisi baat jaanta hoon jo tum nahi jaante?
12.97: Unhon ne kaha: Abba jaan! Hamare liye apne Rab se maafi maang lijiye. Hum ghalat kar baithay thay.
12.98: Unhon ne kaha: Main jald hi apne Rab se tumhare liye maafi maang lunga. Beshak woh bakhshne wala, meherban hai.
12.99: Phir jab woh Yusuf ke paas aaye to usne apne maa baap ko apne paas le liya aur kaha: Misr mein daakhil ho jaao agar Allah ne chaaha to aman se rahoge.
12.100: Aur usne apne maa baap ko takht par bithaya, aur sab us ke liye sajda mein gir gaye. Aur usne kaha: Abba jaan! Yeh hai mere us khwab ki taabeer jo main ne pehle dekha tha. Mera Rab ne ise sach kar dikhaya. Usne mujhe qaid se nikaala, aur aap sabko gaon se Misr mein le aaya, uske baad ke shaytan mere aur mere bhaiyon ke darmiyan fasaad daal chuka tha. Beshak mera Rab har baat ko behtareen tareeqe se anjam dene wala hai. Beshak woh sab kuch jaane wala, hikmat wala hai.
12.101: Ai mere Rab! Tu ne mujhe hukumat di aur mujh se khwaabon ki taabeer sikhayi. Ai aasmanon aur zameen ke paida karne wale! Tu hi mera wali hai duniya aur aakhirat mein. Mujhe Musalmaan bana kar utha aur salehon mein shamil farma.
12.102: Yeh ghaib ki khabar hai jise hum aap ki taraf wahi karte hain. Aap un ke paas nahi thay jab unhon ne apna irada pakka kiya aur woh chaal chala kar rahe thay.
12.103: Aur logon mein se zyadah tar imaan nahi laate agarche aap kitna hi chahein.
12.104: Aur aap is par un se koi ajar nahi maangte. Yeh to saari duniya ke liye ek naseehat hai.
12.105: Aur aasmanon aur zameen mein kitni hi nishaniyan hain jin par woh guzarte hain, aur woh un se mooh moad lete hain.
12.106: Aur zyadah tar log Allah par imaan nahi laate magar uske saath shirk karte hain.
12.107: Kya woh is baat se be-khabar hain ke unpar Allah ka azaab aa jaaye ya qayamat achanak un par aa jaaye aur woh is ka shaoor bhi na rakhte hon?
12.108: Kaho: Yeh meri raah hai. Main Allah ki taraf bulata hoon, baseerat ke saath, main bhi aur mere maan-ne wale bhi. Aur Allah paak hai, aur main mushrikeen mein se nahi hoon.
12.109: Aur humne tum se pehle sirf mardon ko (Rasool bana kar) bheja jo bastiyon mein rehte thay. Un par hum wahi bhejte thay. Kya woh zameen mein chale phire nahi ke dekhein ke un logon ka anjaam kaisa hua jo un se pehle thay? Aur aakhirat ka ghar to un logon ke liye behtar hai jo taqwa ikhtiyar karte hain. Kya tum aqal nahi rakhte?
12.110: Phir jab Rasool naumeed hone lagay aur logon ne samjha ke unhein jhoot bola gaya, to unhein hamari madad aa gayi. Phir jise hum chahein bacha lete hain. Aur hamara azaab mujrimon se nahi taal sakta.
12.111: Beshak unke qisson mein aqalmandon ke liye ibarat hai. Yeh banayi gayi baat nahi hai, balke is mein jo kuch is se pehle tha uski tasdeeq hai, har cheez ka tafseel hai, aur momino ke liye hidayat aur rehmat hai.

13.1: Alif Laam Meem Raa. Yeh kitaab ki aayatein hain. Jo kuch tumhare Rab ki taraf se tum par nazil kiya gaya hai woh haqq hai, lekin aksar log imaan nahi laate.
13.2: Allah hi hai jisne aasmaan ko binay sutoon ke uthaya jaisa ke tum dekh rahe ho. Phir usne arsh par iqtedaar qaim kiya, aur sooraj aur chaand ko uske hukm ka tabi bana diya. Har ek apni muddat-e-muqarrara tak chal raha hai. Allah har kaam ko tadbeer se chala raha hai, aur nishaniyon ko tafseel se bayan karta hai, taa ke tum apne Rab se mulaqat ka yaqeen karo.
13.3: Aur wahi hai jisne zameen ko phailaaya aur us mein pahadon aur dariyaon ko banaya. Aur har phal ka joda joda banaya. Woh raat ko din se dhak leta hai. Beshak ismein nishaniyan hain un logon ke liye jo sochte hain.
13.4: Aur zameen mein tukray hain ek doosre se lage hue, aur angur ke baagh hain, aur kheton ke hissey, aur khajoor ke darakht – kuch do do tane waale aur kuch akelay. Pani ek hi hai, phir bhi hum kuch ko kuch par fazilat dete hain zayqe mein. Beshak ismein nishaniyan hain un logon ke liye jo samajhte hain.
13.5: Aur agar tumhein taajjub hai to unka kehna taajjub ka baais hai ke 'kya jab hum mitti ban jaayenge to kya nayi paidaish mein aayenge?' Yehi log hain jo apne Rab se kufr karte hain, aur yehi woh log hain jinke galey mein tauq hoga, aur yehi dozakh ke rehne wale hain. Wahi us mein hamesha rahenge.
13.6: Woh tumse azaab mein jaldi machwate hain bhalaayi se pehle, halanke unse pehle kai azaab guzar chuke hain. Aur beshak tera Rab logon ko unke zulm ke bawajood bhi zaroor bakhshne wala hai, aur beshak tera Rab sakht saza dene wala bhi hai.
13.7: Aur kaafir kehte hain: 'Us par uske Rab ki taraf se koi nishani kyun nahi utari gayi?' Tum to sirf ek daraane wale ho, aur har qaum ke liye ek hidayat dene wala hai.
13.8: Allah har maada (aurat) ka haal jaanta hai, kya woh apne rahm mein kya uthaye hue hai, aur rahm kya kami karta hai aur kya izafa. Aur har cheez us ke haan ek miqdar ke mutabiq hai.
13.9: Woh sab chhupi aur zaahir baat ko jaanta hai. Bada hai, ooncha hai.
13.10: Tum mein se jo chup rahe aur jo baat kare, aur jo chhupa ho aur jo zaahir, us ke liye sab barabar hai.
13.11: Har shakhs ke aage aur peechay ek dekhne wale lagaye gaye hain – Allah ke hukm se. Beshak Allah kisi qaum ki haalat nahi badalta jab tak woh khud apne haal ko na badlein. Aur jab Allah kisi qaum ke saath bura irada karta hai to us ka taalne wala koi nahi, aur us ke siwa unka koi madadgar nahi ho sakta.
13.12: Wahi hai jo tumhein bijli ki chamak se daraata hai aur aasra deta hai, aur badalon ko uthata hai bhaari bhaari.
13.13: Aur ra’ad (gargarahat) uski tasbeeh ke saath uski hamd karta hai, aur farishte bhi uski khauf se. Aur woh bijliyan bhejta hai, phir jise chahta hai unse maar daalta hai. Aur woh Allah ke baare mein jhagda karte hain, halanke woh sakht quwwat wala hai.
13.14: Usi ko haqiqi dua pukaara jata hai. Aur jinhein woh Allah ke siwa pukarte hain, woh unhein kuch bhi jawab nahi dete siwa iske ke jaise koi apne dono haathon se paani ki taraf haath badhaye taa ke paani us ke moo tak pahunch jaye, aur woh us tak nahi pahunchta. Aur kaafiron ki dua sirf gumraahi mein jaati hai.
13.15: Aur Allah hi ke liye jhukta hai jo koi aasmano mein hai aur jo zameen mein hai, khushi se ya zabardasti se, aur unke saaye bhi subah shaam jhukte hain.
13.16: Kaho: Kaun hai aasmanon aur zameen ka Rab? Kaho: Allah. Kaho: Kya tumne uske siwa aise maabood bana liye hain jo apne liye bhi kisi nafa aur nuqsan ke malik nahi? Kaho: Kya andha aur aankhon wala barabar ho sakte hain? Ya kya andheray aur roshni barabar ho sakte hain? Kya unhon ne Allah ke saathi banaye jo usi ki tarah kuch paida karte hain aur unki paidaish mushkil mein pad gayi ho? Kaho: Allah sab cheez ka paida karne wala hai, aur wahi Wahid, Qahhar hai.
13.17: Woh aasmaan se paani barsata hai to har nadi nallah apni miqdaar ke mutabiq beh jaata hai. Phir paani ke upar jhaag uthta hai. Aur jo log ghal-mel karte hain (sona chandi) us par bhi aag garam karte hain to us par bhi jhaag uthta hai. Is tarah Allah haqq aur baatil ka misaal bayan karta hai. Jhaag to jhakar chala jata hai, aur jo logon ke liye faida mand hota hai woh zameen mein tik jata hai. Aise hi misaalein Allah bayan karta hai.
13.18: Jin logon ne apne Rab ka hukm maana unke liye behtareen anjaam hai. Aur jin logon ne uske hukum na maana – agar unke paas zameen bhar sona ho to woh usay de denge. Yeh logon ke liye bura hisaab hoga. Unka thikaana Jahannum hai, aur woh bura thikaana hai.
13.19: Kya woh shakhs jo jaanta hai ke jo kuch tere Rab se nazil hua haqq hai, us shakhs ke barabar ho sakta hai jo andha hai? Baat to sirf samajhne wale hi maan'te hain.
13.20: Woh log jo Allah ka ahad nibhate hain aur us ke pact ko nahi todte.
13.21: Aur woh jo Allah ke jodne ka hukm dete hain use jodte hain, aur apne Rab se darte hain, aur buray hisaab ka khauf rakhte hain.
13.22: Aur jo log apne Rab ke liye sabr karte hain, aur namaz qayam karte hain, aur jo kuch humne unhein diya us mein se khufiyah aur zaahir tor par kharch karte hain, aur burai ko bhalayi se taal dete hain – unhi ke liye aakhirat ka ghar hai.
13.23: Woh jannaten jismein woh daakhil honge aur unmein unke baap dada, unki biwiyan aur unki aulad se jo nek honge woh sab daakhil honge. Aur farishte unke paas har darwaze se daakhil honge.
13.24: Salam ho tum par, tumne sabr kiya. Pas kya hi behtareen anjaam hai yeh ghar (jannat)!
13.25: Aur jo log Allah ke ahad ko todte hain baad iske ke usay mazbooti se baandha gaya, aur Allah ke jodne ka hukm dete hain use kaat dete hain, aur zameen mein fasaad phelate hain – yeh log la’anat mein mubtala honge, aur in ke liye bura ghar hai.
13.26: Allah jise chahta hai rizq barhata hai aur jise chahta hai taang kar deta hai. Aur woh duniya ki zindagi par khush ho jaate hain, halanke duniya ki zindagi aakhirat ke muqable mein sirf thoda sa faida hai.
13.27: Aur kaafir kehte hain: Us par uske Rab ki taraf se koi nishani kyun nahi nazil ki gayi? Kaho: Beshak Allah jise chahta hai gumraah karta hai, aur jise chahta hai hidaayat deta hai – wahi log hain jo uski taraf rujoo karte hain.
13.28: Woh log jo imaan laye aur unka dil Allah ki yaad se itminan paata hai. Kya Allah ki yaad se hi dil itminan nahi paata?
13.29: Jo log imaan laye aur neik amal kiye – unke liye khushi hai, aur behtareen anjaam hai.
13.30: Is tarah humne tujhe ek ummat mein bheja jinke se pehle aur bhi ummaten guzar chuki hain, taa ke tu unhein woh (Qur’an) sunaaye jo humne tujhe wahi kiya, halanke woh Rehman ka inkaar karte hain. Kaho: Wahi mera Rab hai, uske siwa koi maabood nahi. Main usi par bharosa karta hoon, aur usi ki taraf rujoo karta hoon.
13.31: Agar koi Qur’an hota jis se pahadon ko chalaya ja sakta, ya zameen ko phaad diya jata, ya murdon se baat ki jati – to wohi hota. Balki sab ka maamla Allah ke haath mein hai. Kya momin logon ko yeh maloom nahi ke agar Allah chahta to sab logon ko hidayat de deta? Aur jin logon ne kufr ikhtiyar kiya unpar unke kaam ke sabab se musibat aate rahegi ya woh unke ghar ke qareeb utaregi, jab tak Allah ka wa’ada pura na ho. Beshak Allah wa’ada khilafi nahi karta.
13.32: Aur tum se pehle bhi bahut se Rasoolon ka mazaaq udaya gaya. Phir maine un logon ko thoda sa mohallat di jo inkar karte thay. Phir maine unhein pakad liya – to kaisa tha mera azaab!
13.33: Kya woh (Allah) jo har shakhs ki har kamayi ko dekhta hai (uske liye koi shareek ho sakta hai)? Phir bhi logon ne Allah ke saath shareek bana liye hain. Kaho: Kya tum unhein naam bata sakte ho? Kya tum Allah ko aisi baat bata rahe ho jo zameen mein nahi jaanti ya tum khali alfazon se baat kar rahe ho? Balke in ka zain fareb mein hai, aur woh raah se ruk gaye hain. Aur jise Allah gumraah kar de, uska koi rehnuma nahi.
13.34: Unke liye duniya mein azaab hai, aur aakhirat ka azaab to zyada sakht hai. Aur unhein Allah se bachane wala koi bhi nahi.
13.35: Jannat ka misaal jiska waada muttaqiyon se kiya gaya hai – uske neeche dariya beh rahe honge, uske phal aur saaye daimi hain. Yeh unka anjaam hai jo taqwa ikhtiyar karte hain, aur kaafiron ka anjaam dozakh hai.
13.36: Aur jinhein humne kitaab di woh jo kuch tum par nazil kiya gaya hai us par khush hote hain. Aur un mein se kuch log hain jo uske baaz hisso se inkaar karte hain. Kaho: Mujhe sirf yeh hukum diya gaya hai ke main Allah ki ibaadat karun aur uske saath kisi ko shareek na karun. Main usi ki taraf bulata hoon aur usi ki taraf mera rujoo hai.
13.37: Aur is tarah humne ise arabi hukam ke taur par nazil kiya. Aur agar tu unki khwahishon ki pairwi kare iske baad ke tere paas ilm aa chuka hai, to Allah se tera koi wali na hoga aur na hi koi bachane wala.
13.38: Aur humne tumse pehle bhi Rasool bheje aur unke liye biwiyan aur aulad banayi. Aur kisi Rasool ka kaam yeh nahi ke woh Allah ke izn ke baghair koi nishani laa sake. Har waqt ka ek likha hua hukum hai.
13.39: Allah jo chahta hai mita deta hai, aur jo chahta hai baaqi rakhta hai. Aur uske paas Ummul-Kitab hai.
13.40: Agar hum tujhe kuch woh dikhayein jo hum unse waada kar rahe hain, ya tujhe wafat de dein – to tera kaam sirf paighaam pahunchana hai, aur hisaab lena hamara kaam hai.
13.41: Kya woh nahi dekhte ke hum zameen ko unke charon taraf se ghatate chale ja rahe hain? Allah hukm deta hai, koi uske hukm ko taal nahi sakta. Aur woh hisaab lene mein tez hai.
13.42: Aur un logon se pehle bhi logon ne chaalein chal chuki hain. Magar poori chaal to Allah ki hoti hai. Woh jaanta hai jo kuch har shakhs kamata hai. Aur kafiron ko jaldi pata chal jaayega ke anjaam kaisa hota hai.
13.43: Aur yeh kaafir kehte hain: Tum Rasool nahi ho. Kaho: Mera aur tumhara darmiyan gawah hone ke liye Allah aur woh shakhs kaafi hai jiske paas kitaab ka ilm hai.

14.1: Alif, Lam, Ra. Yeh ek kitaab hai jo humne tumhari taraf naazil ki – taake tum logon ko unke Rab ke hukum se andheron se roshni ki taraf nikaalo – us raaste par jo sabse zabardast, hamd ke laayak Allah ka hai.
14.2: Woh Allah jiska hai jo kuch aasmanon aur zameen mein hai – aur kafiron ke liye sakht azaab hai.
14.3: Jo log duniya ki zindagi ko aakhirat par tarjeeh dete hain, aur Allah ke raaste se rokte hain, aur usmein tedh dhoondte hain – yeh log gumraahi mein door ja chuke hain.
14.4: Aur humne har Rasool ko usi qaum ki zubaan mein bheja taake woh un par wazeh bayaan kare – phir Allah jise chahe gumrah karta hai, aur jise chahe hidayat deta hai – aur woh zabardast, hakeem hai.
14.5: Aur beshak humne Musa ko apni nishaniyon ke saath bheja: Apni qaum ko andheron se roshni ki taraf nikaal – aur unhein Allah ke din yaad dila – ismein har bohot sabr aur shukar karne wale ke liye nishaniyan hain.
14.6: Aur yaad karo jab Musa ne apni qaum se kaha: Allah ke tum par kiye hue ehsaan ko yaad karo jab usne tumhein Firoun ke logon se najat di – woh tumhein sakht azaab dete thay, tumhare beton ko qatal karte, aur tumhari auraton ko zinda rakhte – aur ismein tumhare Rab ki taraf se badi aazmaish thi.
14.7: Aur jab tumhare Rab ne elaan kiya: Agar tum shukar karoge to main tumhein aur dunga – aur agar tum kufr karoge to mera azaab bohot sakht hai.
14.8: Aur Musa ne kaha: Agar tum aur zameen ke sab log kufr karo to bhi beshak Allah be-niyaaz, tareef ke laayak hai.
14.9: Kya tumhein un logon ki khabar nahi aayi jo tumse pehle thay – Nooh ki qaum, Aad, Samood, aur unke baad ke log jinhein Allah ke siwa koi nahi jaanta – unke paas unke Rasool roshan daleel ke saath aaye – magar unhon ne apne haathon se mooh pher liya, aur keh diya: Hum to us cheez ka inkaar karte hain jise tum dekar bheje gaye ho – aur jiske taraf tum humein bula rahe ho usmein humein shakk hai jo humein pareshan kar raha hai.
14.10: Unke Rasoolon ne kaha: Kya tum Allah ke baare mein shakk karte ho jo aasmanon aur zameen ka khalik hai? Woh tumhein bulaata hai taake tumhare kuch gunaah maaf kare, aur ek muqarrar waqt tak tumhein mohalat de – unhon ne kaha: Tum bhi bas ek insaan ho jaise hum hain – tum humein un cheezon se rokna chahte ho jise hamare baap dada poojte thay – to laao humein koi roshan daleel.
14.11: Unke Rasoolon ne kaha: Haan, hum bhi sirf insaan hain jaise tum – magar Allah apne bandon mein se jise chahta hai fazl deta hai – aur yeh hamara kaam nahi ke hum tumhare paas koi daleel laayen siwa Allah ke hukum ke – aur momineen ko to Allah par hi bharosa karna chahiye.
14.12: Aur hum kyun na Allah par bharosa kare jabke usi ne humein hamare raaste dikhaye – aur hum zaroor sabr karenge un takleefon par jo tum humein dete ho – aur bharosa rakhne walon ko to Allah par hi bharosa rakhna chahiye.
14.13: Aur un logon ne jo kufr karte thay apne Rasoolon se kaha: Ya to hum tumhein apni zameen se nikaal denge, ya tum hamare deen mein laut aaoge – to unke Rab ne unki taraf wahee bheji: Hum zaroor zalimon ko halaak kar denge.
14.14: Aur unke baad tumhein zameen mein abad karenge – yeh uske liye hai jo mere maqam se dare, aur meri warning se dare.
14.15: Aur unhon ne faisla kiya – aur har sarkash ziddi ne nuksan uthaya.
14.16: Uske peeche jahannum hai – aur use peene ko peep daar paani diya jaayega.
14.17: Jo use ghoont ghoont kar peeyega – aur use nigal bhi na sakega – aur uske paas har taraf se maut aaegi – magar woh marega nahi – aur uske peeche aur bhi sakht azaab hoga.
14.18: Un logon ki misaal jo apne Rab ka inkaar karte hain, unka amal us raakh ki tarah hai jise aandhi ke din tez hawa uda le – woh usmein se kuch bhi haasil nahi kar sakte – yeh dur ki gumraahi hai.
14.19: Kya tum dekhte nahi ke Allah ne aasmanon aur zameen ko haqq ke saath paida kiya? Agar woh chahe to tumhein le jaaye, aur naye log le aaye.
14.20: Aur yeh Allah par kisi tarah bhi bhari nahi hai.
14.21: Aur sab log Allah ke samne zahir honge. Us waqt kamzor log un logon se kahenge jo bade ban baithe thay: Hum to tumhare pairwi karte thay – to kya tum Allah ke azaab mein se kuch hissa hum se taal sakte ho? Woh kahenge: Agar Allah humein hidayat deta to hum bhi tumhein hidayat dete. Ab humein afsos hai – na hamare haath mein kuch hai, na tumhare haath mein. Beshak Allah ne faisla kar diya hai hamare darmiyan – aur Allah hi par sab ka faisla hai.
14.22: Aur shaitaan kahega jab faisla ho chuka hoga: Allah ne tumse sachcha waada kiya tha, aur maine bhi tumse waada kiya tha – phir maine us waade mein tumse dagha ki. Mera tum par koi zabardasti ka ikhtiyaar na tha – siwa iske ke maine tumhein bulaya aur tumne meri baat maan li. To mujhe malamat na karo, apne aap ko malamat karo. Na main tumhari madad kar sakta hoon, na tum meri madad kar sakte ho. Main to pehle hi inkaar kar chuka ke tumne mujhe Allah ka shareek banaya. Beshak zalimon ke liye dardnaak azaab hai.
14.23: Aur jin logon ne imaan laya aur neik amal kiye unhein aise jannaton mein daakhil kiya jaayega jinke neeche nehrein beh rahi hongi – woh wahan hamesha rahenge – apne Rab ke hukm se – aur unka salam hoga: Salam!
14.24: Kya tumne nahi dekha kaise Allah ne ek misaal bayan ki – achhi baat ki misaal ek achhe darakht ki si hai – jiska asaas mazboot hai aur shaakhein aasman mein hain.
14.25: Woh har waqt apne Rab ke hukum se phal deta hai. Allah logon ke liye misaal bayan karta hai – shayad ke woh naseehat haasil karein.
14.26: Aur buri baat ki misaal ek bure darakht ki si hai – jo zameen ke upar se hi ukhad gaya – uske liye koi thikana nahi.
14.27: Allah un logon ko jinhon ne imaan laya mazbooti deta hai pakki baat se – duniya ki zindagi mein bhi aur aakhirat mein bhi – aur Allah zalimon ko gumrah karta hai – aur Allah jo chahta hai karta hai.
14.28: Kya tumne un logon ko nahi dekha jinhon ne Allah ki ni’mat ke badle kufr ko pasand kiya – aur apni qaum ko halaakat ke ghar mein le gaye?
14.29: Jahannum mein jahan woh jalenge – aur woh kya bura thikana hai.
14.30: Aur unhon ne Allah ke liye shareek thaharaye taake uski raah se bhatakayein. Keh do: Mazay le lo – phir aakhirat mein tumhara thikana aag hai.
14.31: Mere bandon se keh do ke woh namaz qayam karein – aur jo kuch humne unhein diya hai usmein se khula aur chhupa kharch karein – us din ke aane se pehle jismein na koi sauda hoga, na dosti.
14.32: Allah hi hai jisne aasmanon aur zameen ko paida kiya – aur aasman se paani barsaya – phir us se tumhare liye phalon ka rizq nikala – aur tumhare liye kashtiyan musakkhar ki – taake usmein samandar mein chalein – aur tumhare liye nadiyan musakkhar ki.
14.33: Aur usne tumhare liye sooraj aur chaand ko musakkhar kiya jo musalsal chal rahe hain – aur tumhare liye raat aur din ko bhi musakkhar kiya.
14.34: Aur usne tumhein har cheez di jis ka tumne us se sawal kiya – aur agar tum Allah ki ni’mat ginne lago to gin nahi sakte – beshak insaan nihayat zalim, nashukra hai.
14.35: Aur yaad karo jab Ibrahim ne kaha: Aey mere Rab! Is shehar ko aman waala bana – aur mujhe aur mere beton ko buton ki pooja se bacha.
14.36: Aey mere Rab! In buton ne bohat se logon ko gumrah kiya – pas jo mera pairwi kare woh meri ummat mein se hai – aur jo mera nafarmaan ho to tu bakhshne wala, meherban hai.
14.37: Aey mere Rab! Main apni aulad ko ek be-ab zameen mein chhod aaya hoon teri muqaddas ghar ke paas – aey mere Rab! Taake woh namaz qayam karein – to tu logon ke dil unki taraf mail kar de – aur unhein phalon ka rizq de – taake woh shukar guzaar baneyin.
14.38: Aey mere Rab! Tu jaanta hai jo kuch hum chhupate hain aur jo zahir karte hain – aur zameen aur aasman mein Allah se kuch chhupa hua nahi.
14.39: Shukar hai Allah ka jisne mujhe budehapi mein Ismail aur Ishaaq diye – beshak mera Rab dua sunne wala hai.
14.40: Aey mere Rab! Mujhe namaz qayam karne waala bana – aur meri aulad mein se bhi – aey hamare Rab! Meri dua qubool farma.
14.41: Aey hamare Rab! Mujh ko, mere walidain ko aur sab momineen ko us din baksh dena jab hisaab ka din aayega.
14.42: Aur tum Allah ko be-khabar na samjho jo zalimon ke aamal se ghaafil hai – woh to sirf unhein us din ke liye taakhir de raha hai jab aankhein phati ki phati reh jaayengi.
14.43: Apne sir uthaye daud rahe honge – unki nigah wapas na aayegi – aur unke dil khauf se khali honge.
14.44: Aur logon ko darao us din se jab un par azaab aayega – to zalim kahenge: Aey hamare Rab! Humein thoda sa waqt aur de de – taake hum teri dawat ko qubool karein aur Rasool ki pairwi karein. Kya tumne pehle qasam nahi khai thi ke tumhein kabhi fanaa na hoga?
14.45: Aur tum un logon ke gharon mein rehte thay jinhon ne apne upar zulm kiya tha – aur tumhein maloom tha ke humne un se kaise sulook kiya – aur humne tumhare liye misaal bayan ki.
14.46: Aur unhon ne apni sari chaalein chali – lekin unki sari chaalein Allah ke saamne hain – agarche unki chaal aisi thi ke us se pahaad hil jaaye.
14.47: To Allah ko unke aamal se be-khabar na samjho – Allah unhein us din ke liye mehlool kar raha hai jab aankhein phati ki phati reh jaayengi.
14.48: Us din log zahir honge – Allah ke samne kuch bhi chhupa na rahega. Aaj kis ki badshahi hai? Sirf Allah – Wahid, Qahhaar ki.
14.49: Aaj har nafs ko uska badla diya jaayega jo usne kamaya – aaj kisi par zulm na hoga – beshak Allah jald hisaab lene wala hai.
14.50: Aur logon ko darao us din se jab azaab unke saamne aa jaayega – to kahenge: Aey hamare Rab! Humein thoda aur mohalat de de – taake hum teri dawat qubool karein aur Rasool ki pairwi karein. Kya tum pehle qasam na khate thay ke tumhein kabhi fanaa na hoga?
14.51: Aur tum un logon ke gharon mein rehte thay jinhon ne apne upar zulm kiya tha – aur tumhein maloom tha ke humne un se kaise sulook kiya – aur humne tumhare liye misaal bayan ki.
14.52: Yeh sab logon ke liye paighaam hai – aur taake is se dara diya jaye – aur taake woh jaanein ke Allah ek hi mabood hai – aur taake aqal waley naseehat haasil karein.

15.1: Alif Laam Raa. Ye ayaatein hain Kitaab aur Qur’an-e-Mubeen ki.
15.2: Kabhi woh waqt aayega jab yeh kaafir kaash karenge ke kaash woh Musalmaan hote!
15.3: Chhoro unhein khaane do, maze karne do, aur jhoot unhein ghaflat mein daale rakhe, anqareeb unhein maloom ho jaayega.
15.4: Humne kisi basti ko halaak nahi kiya magar uska ek likha hua waqt tha.
15.5: Koi ummat apne waqt se na aage jaa sakti hai na peeche reh sakti hai.
15.6: Aur kehte hain: Aey woh shakhs jis par yeh zikr (Qur’an) utara gaya hai, tu zaroor deewana hai!
15.7: Agar tu sachcha hai to farishte hamare saamne kyun nahi laata?
15.8: Hum farishte nahi utarte magar haqq ke saath, aur us waqt unhein mohalat nahi milti.
15.9: Beshak humne yeh zikr (Qur’an) nazil kiya aur hum hi is ke muhafiz hain.
15.10: Aur hum tum se pehle bhi purane logon mein Rasool bhej chuke hain.
15.11: Un ke paas koi Rasool nahi aata magar woh us ka mazaaq udate.
15.12: Aise hi hum is (mazaaq udaye jaane wale) dilon mein is (zikr) ko daakhil kar dete hain.
15.13: Woh is par imaan nahi late, jaise pehle ke log bhi nahi laaye thay.
15.14: Agar hum un ke liye aasmaan ka koi darwaza khol dein aur woh usmein chadh jaayen,
15.15: To yeh zaroor kahenge: Hamari aankhon ko dhoka ho gaya, balki hum par jaadoo kar diya gaya hai.
15.16: Aur humne aasmaan mein burj (stars) banaye aur dekhne walon ke liye usei sawarna diya.
15.17: Aur har shaitaan-e-rajim (maaloon) se uski hifazat ki.
15.18: Siwa uske jo chori chhupke sunn leta hai, to ek teer-shawa shola uska peecha karta hai.
15.19: Aur humne zameen ko phaila diya, usmein pahadon ko rakh diya, aur usmein har cheez ko andazan ugaya.
15.20: Aur usmein tumhare liye roziyaan banayi, aur un ke liye bhi jinhein tum rozi nahi dete.
15.21: Aur har cheez ke khazaane hamare paas hain, aur hum usay ek muqarrar andaaz mein utaarte hain.
15.22: Aur humne hawaon ko baarish ka bojh uthane wala banaya, phir asmaan se paani barsaya, phir us se tumhein pilaaya. Aur tum us ka zakheera karne waale nahi ho.
15.23: Aur beshak hum hi zindagi dete hain aur maut dete hain, aur hum hi sab kuch ke waaris hain.
15.24: Aur beshak hum jaante hain tum mein se aagey jaane waalon ko bhi aur baad mein aane waalon ko bhi.
15.25: Aur beshak tumhara Rab unhein zaroor jama karega. Beshak woh Hakeem hai, Aleem hai.
15.26: Aur beshak humne insaan ko sookhi mitti se banaya, jo ke bajeeb (sookhi bajti hui) mitti thi.
15.27: Aur jinn ko humne pehle lauh-e-sameem (bari garam hawa) se banaya.
15.28: Aur yaad karo jab tumhare Rab ne farishton se kaha: Main insaan ko sookhi bajti mitti se banane wala hoon.
15.29: Phir jab main usey poora bana loon aur us mein apni rooh phoonk doon to tum sab us ke liye sajda mein gir jao.
15.30: To sabhi farishton ne sajda kiya.
15.31: Siwa Iblees ke. Usne sajda karne walon ke saath sajda nahi kiya.
15.32: Allah ne kaha: Aey Iblees! Tujhe kis cheez ne sajda karne se roka jabke main ne apne haathon se usey banaya?
15.33: Usne kaha: Main us se behtar hoon. Tu ne mujhe aag se banaya hai, aur use mitti se banaya hai.
15.34: Allah ne farmaya: Tujhe yahaan se nikal jaane ka hukm hai, tu rejcted hai.
15.35: Aur beshak tu par qayamat ke din tak la’nat rahegi.
15.36: Usne kaha: Aey Rab! Mujhe us din tak mohallat de jab tak log uthaye jaayenge.
15.37: Allah ne farmaya: Tujhe mohallat di gayi hai.
15.38: Ek muayyan waqt ke din tak.
15.39: Iblees ne kaha: Aey mere Rab! Jaisa Tu ne mujhe gumrah kiya, main bhi unhein zameen mein khushnuma bana dunga aur sab ko gumrah kar dunga.
15.40: Siwa Tere un bandon ke jo mukhlis honge.
15.41: Allah ne farmaya: Yeh hai ek seedha rasta, jo meri taraf jaata hai.
15.42: Beshak mere bandon par tera koi ikhtiyaar na hoga siwa unke jo tere peechhe chal padhein – gumraah logon mein se.
15.43: Aur beshak jahannum un sab ka waada hai.
15.44: Uske saat darwaze hain, har darwaze ke liye un mein se ek hissa muqarrar hai.
15.45: Beshak jo log muttaqi hain woh jannaton aur chashmon mein honge.
15.46: Un se kaha jaayega: Is mein salamati ke saath daakhil ho jao, mutma’in hokar.
15.47: Aur hum un ke dilon se keena nikaal denge, woh bhaiyon ki tarah samne samne takhton par baithenge.
15.48: Unhein wahan na to thakan chhu sakti hai, na woh us mein se kabhi nikale jaayenge.
15.49: Aey Nabi! Mere bandon ko bata do ke main hi Ghafoor aur Raheem hoon.
15.50: Aur ye bhi ke Mera azaab bhi dardnaak azaab hai.
15.51: Aur unhein Ibrahim ke mehmaanon ka qissa sunao.
15.52: Jab woh us ke paas aaye to usne salam kiya. Unhon ne kaha: Hum tumse darte hain.
15.53: Usne kaha: Mat daro, hum tumhein ek samajhdar ladke ki khushkhabri dete hain.
15.54: Unhon ne kaha: Kya tum mujhe budhape mein khushkhabri dete ho? Kya ajib baat hai?
15.55: Unhon ne kaha: Humne tujhe bilkul sach diya hai, to tu naumeed na ho.
15.56: Usne kaha: Apne Rab ki rahmat se sirf gumrah hi naumeed hote hain.
15.57: Phir usne kaha: Aey Allah ke farishto! Tumhara maqsad kya hai?
15.58: Unhon ne kaha: Hum ek mujrim qaum ki taraf bheje gaye hain.
15.59: Siwa Lut ke ghar walon ke – unhein hum zaroor bacha lenge.
15.60: Magar uski biwi, humne tay kar diya ke woh peechay rehne walon mein hogi.
15.61: Phir jab farishte Lut ke paas aaye,
15.62: Usne kaha: Tum ajnabee log ho.
15.63: Unhon ne kaha: Balke hum woh le kar aaye hain jismein log shak karte hain.
15.64: Aur hum tere paas haqq le kar aaye hain, aur beshak hum sach keh rahe hain.
15.65: To tu apne ghar walon ke saath raat ke ek hisse mein nikal jao, aur tu unke peechay chalo. Tum mein se koi peechay na mud kar dekhe, aur jahan jaane ka hukum hai wahan chalay jao.
15.66: Aur humne us ke paas yeh faisla bhej diya ke woh log subh hote hi kaat daale jaayenge.
15.67: Aur sheher ke log khushi mein aa gaye.
15.68: Lut ne kaha: Yeh log mere mehmaan hain, meri beizzati na karo.
15.69: Aur Allah se daro, mujhe ruswa na karo.
15.70: Unhon ne kaha: Kya humne tujhe duniya bhar ke logon se rok nahi diya?
15.71: Usne kaha: Yahan meri betiyan hain agar tum kuch karna chahte ho.
15.72: Teri jaan ki qasam! Yeh log to apni mad-masti mein bhatak rahe thay.
15.73: To un par subh ke waqt ek tez aawaaz ka azaab toot para.
15.74: Aur humne us basti ko ulta kar diya, aur un par pakkay pathar barsaye.
15.75: Is mein zaroor nishani hai un logon ke liye jo tafakkur karte hain.
15.76: Aur yeh basti to ek maqool raaste ke qareeb hi hai.
15.77: Is mein yaqeenan nishani hai momino ke liye.
15.78: Aur Aikah waalon ke log bhi zalim thay.
15.79: To humne un se bhi inteqaam liya. Aur yeh dono bastiyan saaf nazar aati hain.
15.80: Aur Hijr ke logon ne Rasoolon ko jhutlaya.
15.81: Aur humne unhein apni nishaniyan di, magar woh un se mooh mod lete thay.
15.82: Aur woh pahadon ko tarash kar ghar banate thay.
15.83: Phir unhein bhi subh ke waqt ek aawaaz ne le daala.
15.84: To unka kuch bhi un ke kamayi ka faida na hua.
15.85: Aur humne aasmaan-o-zameen ko aur jo kuch in ke darmiyan hai, haq ke sath paida kiya. Aur qayamat zaroor aayegi, to tu dar guzarta reh.
15.86: Beshak tera Rab hi sab kuch paida karne wala, har cheez ka ilm rakhne wala hai.
15.87: Aur beshak humne tujhe saat daurane wali aayatein aur Qur’an-e-Azeem diya hai.
15.88: Apni aankhen un cheezon ki taraf na badha jinse humne kuch logon ko dunya ki zindagi mein nafa diya hai, aur un par gham na kar, aur momino ke liye apna jhukao rakh.
15.89: Aur keh do: Beshak main ek khula hua daraane wala hoon.
15.90: Jaisa ke humne un logon par azaab bheja jo hissa banate thay.
15.91: Jinhon ne Qur’an ke tukde tukde kar diye.
15.92: Tere Rab ki qasam! Hum un sab se zaroor poochhenge.
15.93: Un sab kaam ke baare mein jo woh karte thay.
15.94: To tumhein jo hukm diya gaya hai us ka khula elaan karo, aur mushrikeen se mooh mod lo.
15.95: Beshak hum un logon ke liye kaafi hain jo tumhara mazaaq udate hain.
15.96: Jo Allah ke saath doosra khuda banate hain. Anqareeb woh jaan lenge.
15.97: Aur beshak hum jaante hain ke tumhara dil unki baaton se tang hota hai.
15.98: To apne Rab ki tasbeeh karo, us ki hamd ke saath, aur sajda karo.
15.99: Aur apne Rab ki ibaadat karo jab tak ke tumhein yaqeen haasil ho jaye.

16.1: Allah ka hukm aa gaya, to usmein jald-baazi na karo. Paak hai woh, aur bohot ooncha hai us shirk se jo log karte hain.
16.2: Woh farishtey apne hukm se apne bandon mein se jise chahta hai us par wahi ke saath utarta hai: Ke logon ko darao ke mere siwa koi mabood nahi – to mujhi se daro.
16.3: Usne aasmanon aur zameen ko haqq ke saath paida kiya. Uski shaan bohot oonchi hai us shirk se jo log karte hain.
16.4: Usne insaan ko nutfe se paida kiya – magar woh khula dushman ban gaya.
16.5: Aur usne tumhare liye chaupaye paida kiye jinmein se kuch tumhare sawari ke kaam aate hain aur kuch se tum khaate ho.
16.6: Aur unmein tumhare liye husn o jamal hai jab tum unhein waapas le jaate ho aur jab chhute waqt chhodte ho.
16.7: Aur woh tumhare bohot se bojh uthaate hain aise shehron tak jin tak tum bohot mushakkat ke bagair na pahunch sakte – beshak tumhara Rab bohot shafqat wala, meherban hai.
16.8: Aur (usne paida kiya) ghode, khachchar aur gadhe – taake tum unpar sawar ho aur zeenat bhi – aur woh paida karta hai jo tum nahi jaante.
16.9: Aur seedha raasta Allah ke zimmedari hai – aur kuch raaste tedhe bhi hain – aur agar woh chahta to tum sabko hidayat de deta.
16.10: Wahi hai jisne tumhare liye aasman se paani barsaya – us mein se tum peete ho, aur usi mein se ped paida hote hain jin mein tum jaanwaron ko charaate ho.
16.11: Wahi paani se tumhare liye khetiyan ugaata hai, zaitoon, khajoor, angoor aur har qisam ke phal – is mein zaroor ek nishani hai un logon ke liye jo gaur o fikr karte hain.
16.12: Aur usne tumhare liye raat aur din, sooraj aur chaand ko musakkhar kiya – aur taare bhi uske hukum se musakkhar hain – is mein nishaniyan hain un logon ke liye jo aqal se kaam lete hain.
16.13: Aur usne zameen mein tumhare liye mukhtalif rangon ke saamaan paida kiye – is mein nishani hai un logon ke liye jo naseehat hasil karte hain.
16.14: Aur wahi hai jisne samandar ko tumhare qabze mein diya – taake tum usmein se taza (lehaaz) gosht khao, aur usmein se zeenat ki cheezein nikaalo jo tum pehente ho – aur tum usmein jahaazon ko dekhte ho ke paani cheerti chali ja rahi hain – taake tum uska fazl talaash karo – aur shukar ada karo.
16.15: Aur usne zameen mein mazboot pahad rakh diye taake woh tumhein le kar na hil jaaye – aur nadiyaan aur raaste banaaye taake tum raste pa sako.
16.16: Aur nishaniyaan banaayi – aur log sitaaron ke zariye bhi raasta paate hain.
16.17: Kya woh (Allah) jo paida karta hai un jaisa ho sakta hai jo paida nahi kar sakta? Kya tum hosh mein nahi aate?
16.18: Aur agar tum Allah ki ni’maton ko ginna chaho to gin nahi sakte – beshak Allah bada bakhshne wala, meherban hai.
16.19: Aur Allah jaanta hai jo kuch tum chhupate ho aur jo kuch tum zahir karte ho.
16.20: Aur jinhein tum Allah ke siwa poojte ho woh kuch bhi paida nahi kar sakte – woh to khud paida kiye gaye hain.
16.21: Woh murda hain, zinda nahi – aur yeh nahi jaante ke kab uthaye jaayenge.
16.22: Tumhara mabood ek hi Mabood hai – lekin woh log jo aakhirat ko nahi maante unke dil inkaar mein pade hain – aur woh ghamand mein mubtala hain.
16.23: Beshak Allah jaanta hai jo kuch woh chhupate hain aur jo kuch woh zahir karte hain – woh ghamand karne walon ko pasand nahi karta.
16.24: Aur jab unse kaha jaata hai: Tumhare Rab ne kya naazil kiya? To kehte hain: Purani kahaniyan.
16.25: Taake woh qayamat ke din apne bojh bhi uthayein – aur un logon ke bojh bhi jinhein unhone gumrah kiya – bina kisi ilm ke – sun lo! Kitna bura bojh hai jo woh uthayein ge.
16.26: Un logon ne bhi chaalein chali jo unse pehle thay – to Allah ne unki imarat ko buniyad se gira diya – aur un par chhat unke upar se gir gayi – aur azaab unpar aaya jahan se unhein gumaan bhi na tha.
16.27: Phir qayamat ke din Allah unhein ruswa karega – aur kahega: Kahan hain mere woh shareek jinke liye tum ladte rahe? Jo ilm rakhte honge woh kahenge: Beshak ruswaai aaj kafiron ke liye hai.
16.28: Jinhein farishte is halat mein uthaayenge ke woh apne jaanon par zulm kar rahe honge – to woh jhuk kar kahenge: Hum koi bura kaam nahi karte thay. Haan, beshak Allah jaanta hai jo kuch tum kiya karte thay.
16.29: Pas dakhil ho jao jahannum ke darwazon se, jahan tum hamesha rahoge – kitna bura thikana hai mutakabbiron ke liye.
16.30: Aur jab muttaqiyon se kaha jaata hai: Tumhare Rab ne kya naazil kiya? To kehte hain: Behtareen baat – un logon ke liye jinhon ne neik amal kiya is duniya mein bhalai hai – aur aakhirat ka ghar aur bhi behtar hai – aur kya hi behtareen ghar hai muttaqiyon ka!
16.31: Hamesha rehne wali jannatein – jinmein woh daakhil honge – jinke neeche nehrein beh rahi hongi – jahan unke liye har chah rakhi gayi hai – yeh Allah ka ajar hai muttaqiyon ke liye.
16.32: Woh jinhein farishte is halat mein uthaayenge ke woh pakeeza honge – kehne lagte hain: Salam ho tum par – dakhil ho jao jannat mein apne aamal ke badle.
16.33: Kya ab woh iske muntazir hain ke unke paas farishte aa jaayein – ya tumhare Rab ka hukm aa jaaye? Aisa hi un logon ne kiya jo unse pehle thay – aur Allah ne unpar zulm nahi kiya – balke woh khud apne upar zulm kar rahe thay.
16.34: Phir unke kiye ke bure asraat unpar aa gaye – aur jis cheez ka woh mazaak udate thay woh unko gher liya.
16.35: Aur mushrikeen kehte hain: Agar Allah chahta to na hum uske siwa kisi ki ibadat karte, na hamare baap dada – aur na hum kisi cheez ko haram thehrate. Aise hi unse pehle logon ne bhi jhutlaya – to Rasoolon par to sirf paighaam pahuncha dena hai.
16.36: Aur humne har ummat mein Rasool bheja ke: Allah ki ibadat karo, aur taghoot se bach jao – to unmein se kuch aise thay jinko Allah ne hidayat di – aur kuch aise thay jinke liye gumraahi taqdeer mein thi – to zameen mein chalo phiro aur dekho ke jhutlane walon ka kya anjaam hua.
16.37: Tum unki hidayat chaho to bhi Allah usse hidayat nahi dega jise woh gumrah kar de – aur unke liye madadgar bhi nahi honge.
16.38: Aur unhon ne Allah ki sakht qasam khaayi ke Allah usko dobara nahi uthayega jo mar gaya – kyun nahi? Ye us par ek waada hai sachcha – lekin zyada log nahi jaante.
16.39: Taake woh un logon ke saamne us cheez ko wazeh kare jismein woh ikhtilaf karte rahe – aur taake kaafir jaanein ke woh jhoot bole jaate thay.
16.40: Aur jab hum kisi cheez ka irada karte hain to kehte hain us se: Ho ja – to woh ho jaati hai.
16.41: Aur jin logon ne zulm sah kar Allah ke liye hijrat ki unhein duniya mein behtareen thikana dein ge – aur aakhirat ka ajar aur bhi bada hai – kaash woh jaanein.
16.42: Woh sabr karte hain, aur apne Rab par bharosa karte hain.
16.43: Aur humne tumse pehle bhi sirf mard bheje jin par hum wahee bhejte thay – agar tum nahi jaante to ilm waalon se pooch lo.
16.44: Woh daleelein le kar aaye aur kitaabein – aur humne tumhari taraf ye zikr (Qur’an) naazil kiya taake tum logon ke liye wazeh karo jo unki taraf naazil kiya gaya – aur taake woh sochen.
16.45: Kya un logon ne jo bure chaal chalte hain yeh samjha ke Allah unhein zameen mein dhansaa na dega – ya unpar azaab wahan se aa jaaye jahan se unhein gumaan bhi na ho?
16.46: Ya woh unhein pakad le jab woh idhar udhar ghoom rahe hon – to woh Allah ko hara nahi sakte.
16.47: Ya woh unhein pakad le unke dar ke haal mein – to beshak tumhara Rab raheem hai, meherban hai.
16.48: Kya unhon ne dekha nahi ke Allah ki har makhlooq – uska saya dayn ba dayn daayein aur bayein jhukti hai Allah ke saamne – aur woh sab usko sajda karte hain.
16.49: Aur Allah ke liye sajda karta hai jo kuch aasmanon mein hai aur zameen mein – sab janwar aur farishte – aur woh ghamand nahi karte.
16.50: Woh apne Rab se upar hai – uska darr rakhte hain – aur jo hukm diya jaata hai woh anjaam dete hain.
16.51: Aur Allah ne farmaya: Do mabood na banao – woh to ek hi Mabood hai – pas mujh se hi daro.
16.52: Aur jo kuch aasmanon aur zameen mein hai usi ka hai – aur usi ki ibaadat lagataar farz hai – kya phir tum Allah ke siwa kisi aur se darte ho?
16.53: Aur tumhare paas jo bhi ni’mat hai woh Allah ki taraf se hai – phir jab tumhein takleef pahunchti hai to usi ki taraf tum fariyad karte ho.
16.54: Phir jab woh tum se takleef hata deta hai to tum mein se kuch log apne Rab ke saath shirk karne lagte hain.
16.55: Taake woh un cheezon ke inkar ka badla dein jo humne unhein di – pas maze le lo – jald hi tum jaan loge.
16.56: Aur woh un cheezon mein se jinhein humne unhein diya un logon ke liye hissa nikaalte hain jinhein woh jaante tak nahi – Allah ki qasam! Tumse zaroor poocha jaayega jo jhoot ghadhte ho.
16.57: Aur woh Allah ke liye betiyan thahraate hain – woh paak hai – aur unke liye woh rakhte hain jo woh khud pasand karte hain.
16.58: Aur jab unmein se kisi ko beti ki khabar di jaati hai to uska chehra siyah ho jaata hai – aur woh gham se bhar jaata hai.
16.59: Woh logon se chhupta phirta hai is khabar ki wajah se – kya usay zaleel hokar rakhe ya mitti mein daba de? Dekho! Kitna bura faisla hai jo woh karte hain.
16.60: Bure logon ki misaal burai mein hai – aur Allah ki misaal sabse aala hai – woh zabardast, hakeem hai.
16.61: Aur agar Allah logon ko unke zulm par pakadta to zameen par ek bhi makhlooq na chhodi – lekin woh unhein ek muqarrar waqt tak mohlat deta hai – phir jab unka waqt aa jaata hai to na ek ghadi peeche hote hain na aage.
16.62: Aur woh Allah ke liye woh rakhte hain jo woh pasand nahi karte – aur unki zubaan jhoot bolti hai ke unke liye behtareen hai – zaroor unke liye aag hai – aur woh pehle daakhil kiye jaayenge.
16.63: Allah ki qasam! Humne tumse pehle bhi ummatein bheji – lekin unhein shaitaan ne unke aamal khoobsurat bana kar dikhaye – to aaj bhi wohi uska dost hai – aur unke liye dardnaak azaab hai.
16.64: Aur humne yeh kitaab tum par is liye naazil ki taake tum un baaton ko khol kar bata do jismein woh ikhtilaf kar rahe hain – aur yeh momineen ke liye rehnuma aur rehmat hai.
16.65: Aur Allah ne aasman se paani barsaya – aur usse zameen ko uski maut ke baad zinda kiya – is mein zaroor nishani hai un logon ke liye jo sunte hain.
16.66: Aur beshak tumhare liye maweshiyon mein bhi ek sabaq hai – hum tumhein unke pait se nikle beech ki gandi aur khoon ke darmiyan se ek saaf dudh pilate hain – jo peene walon ke liye lazeez hota hai.
16.67: Aur khajooron aur angooron ke phalon mein se bhi – jisse tum nasheela cheez banate ho aur behtareen rizq – is mein bhi nishani hai un logon ke liye jo aqal se kaam lete hain.
16.68: Aur tumhare Rab ne shehed ki makhi ko wahee ki: Ke pahadon mein ghar bana, aur darakhton mein aur un cheezon mein bhi jo log upar chadhaate hain.
16.69: Phir har qisam ke phalon se khao – aur apne Rab ke raaste chalo – asaani se – uske pait se rang birange mashroob nikalte hain – jismein logon ke liye shifa hai – is mein nishani hai un logon ke liye jo sochte hain.
16.70: Aur Allah ne tumhein paida kiya – phir woh tumhein maut deta hai – aur tum mein se kuch log sabse bure umar tak le jaaye jaate hain taake kuch jaanne ke baad kuch bhi na jaanein – beshak Allah sab kuch jaane wala, har cheez par qudrat rakhne wala hai.
16.71: Aur Allah ne tum mein se kuch logon ko dusron par rozi mein fazilat di hai – phir jinhon ko fazilat di gayi woh apni rozi mein se unhein nahi dete jinke woh malik hain – to woh is mein barabar ho jaayein – to kya phir woh Allah ki ni’mat ka inkaar karte hain?
16.72: Aur Allah ne tumhare liye tum mein se tumhari biwiyan banayi – aur tumhare liye unki taraf se tumhare bachay aur pote paida kiye – aur tumhein paak cheezein ata ki – to kya woh baatil mein imaan rakhte hain aur Allah ki ni’mat ka inkaar karte hain?
16.73: Aur Allah ke siwa aise ko poojhte hain jo unke liye kisi bhi rozi ka imkaan nahi rakhte – na aasman se na zameen se – aur na woh kisi cheez ki taqat rakhte hain.
16.74: Pas Allah ke liye misaal na banao – beshak Allah jaanta hai aur tum nahi jaante.
16.75: Allah ek misaal bayan karta hai: Ek ghulaam jo kisi cheez ka malik nahi – aur ek aur shakhs jise humne apni taraf se acchi rozi di hai – aur woh usmein se khula khula deta hai – kya yeh dono barabar ho sakte hain? Sab tareef Allah ke liye hai – balke zyadatar log nahi jaante.
16.76: Aur Allah ek aur misaal bayan karta hai: Do aadmiyon ki – ek goonga hai jo kisi cheez par ikhtiyar nahi rakhta – aur woh apne malik par bojh hai – jahan bhi use bheja jaaye koi kaam acha nahi karta – kya yeh uske barabar ho sakta hai jo insaaf ka hukum deta hai aur khud bhi seedhe raaste par hai?
16.77: Aur Allah ke haath mein hain aasmanon aur zameen ke ghaib – aur qiyamat ki ghadi sirf ek pal ki baat hai – balke usse bhi zyada qareeb – beshak Allah har cheez par qudrat rakhta hai.
16.78: Aur Allah ne tumhein maaon ke paiton se nikala – tum kuch bhi nahi jaante thay – aur usne tumhein sunne, dekhne ki quwwat aur dil diye – taake tum shukar ada karo.
16.79: Kya unhon ne parindon ko nahi dekha jo aasman mein musakkhar hain – unhein Allah ke siwa koi nahi rok sakta – is mein nishaniyan hain un logon ke liye jo imaan rakhte hain.
16.80: Aur Allah ne tumhare liye tumhare gharon ko sukoon ka zariya banaya – aur tumhare liye jaanwaron ki khalon se aise ghar banaye jo tumhein safar aur muqaam dono mein halke lagte hain – aur unke oon aur rom se asbaab aur zarurat ki cheezein banayi jo ek muddat tak tumhare kaam aayengi.
16.81: Aur Allah ne tumhare liye apni paida ki hui cheezon mein se saaye banaye – aur tumhare liye pahadon mein chhupne ki jagah banayi – aur tumhare liye kapde banaye jo garmi se bachate hain – aur aise libaas jo tumhein tumhare hamla awar dushman se mehfooz rakhte hain – is tarah Allah tum par apni ni’mat poori karta hai taake tum farmaanbardar ban jao.
16.82: Phir agar woh mooh moad lein to tum par sirf saaf paighaam pahuncha dena hai.
16.83: Woh Allah ki ni’mat ko pehchaante hain, phir uska inkaar karte hain – aur unmein se zyadatar log kaafir hain.
16.84: Aur (yaad karo) jis din hum har ummat mein se ek gawah khada karein ge – phir kafiron ko na ijazat di jaayegi (kehne ki) na unse maafi talab ki jaayegi.
16.85: Aur jab zalim azaab ko dekhen ge to unse na halka kiya jaayega aur na unhein mohlat di jaayegi.
16.86: Aur jab shirk karne wale apne shareekon ko dekhen ge to kahenge: Aey hamare Rab! Yeh wohi hain jinko hum tujhe chhod kar bulaate thay – to woh unhein jawab denge: Tum jhoot bol rahe ho.
16.87: Aur us din woh Allah ke saamne poori tarah jhuk jaayenge – aur jo kuch woh ghadhte thay woh sab unse kho jaayega.
16.88: Jin logon ne kufr kiya aur logon ko Allah ke raaste se roka – hum unhein azaab par azaab dein ge is wajah se ke woh fasaad kiya karte thay.
16.89: Aur (yaad karo) jis din har ummat mein se hum un par unhi mein se ek gawah khada karein ge – aur (Aey Nabi!) tumhein un logon par gawah banayein ge – aur humne tum par yeh kitaab naazil ki jo har cheez ko wazeh karti hai, aur hidayat, rehmat aur musalmanon ke liye khush khabri hai.
16.90: Beshak Allah insaaf, ehsaan aur rishtedaron ko dene ka hukm deta hai – aur fahsha, burai aur bagawat se rokta hai – woh tumhein naseehat karta hai taake tum yaad rakkho.
16.91: Aur jab tum Allah se koi ahad karo to use poora karo – aur apni qasmon ko uske baad mat todo jabke tumne Allah ko us par gawah banaya ho – beshak Allah jaanta hai jo kuch tum karte ho.
16.92: Aur us aurat ki tarah na ban jao jisne apna soota hua dhaaga mazbooti se banane ke baad tod diya – ke tum apni qasmon ko aapas mein fareb ka zariya banao – is liye ke ek giroh dusre se zyada taaqatwar hai – beshak Allah tumhein is se aazmaata hai – aur woh zaroor qayamat ke din tumhein wazeh kar dega jismein tum ikhtilaf karte thay.
16.93: Aur agar Allah chahta to tum sabko ek ummat bana deta – lekin woh jise chahta hai gumraah kar deta hai – aur jise chahta hai hidayat deta hai – aur tumse zaroor uske baare mein poocha jaayega jo tum kiya karte thay.
16.94: Aur apni qasmon ko aapas mein fareb ka zariya na banao – warna tumhare qadam ladkhada jaayenge iske baad ke woh mazboot thay – aur tum burayi ka maza chakkho ge is wajah se ke tumne Allah ke raaste se roka – aur tumhare liye bada azaab hoga.
16.95: Aur Allah ke ahad ke badle thoda sa faida mat lo – beshak jo kuch Allah ke paas hai woh tumhare liye behtar hai agar tum jaante ho.
16.96: Jo kuch tumhare paas hai woh khatam ho jaayega – aur jo kuch Allah ke paas hai woh baaqi rahega – aur hum un logon ko unke kaamon ka behtareen badla dein ge jo sabr karte hain.
16.97: Jo shakhs neik amal kare – mard ho ya aurat – aur woh momin ho – to hum usse paak zindagi jeena zaroor ata karenge – aur hum unhein unke kaamon ka behtareen badla zaroor dein ge.
16.98: Pas jab tum Qur’an padhne lago to shaitaan-e-rajeem se Allah ki panaah maango.
16.99: Beshak uska koi ikhtiyar un logon par nahi hota jo imaan laate hain aur apne Rab par bharosa karte hain.
16.100: Uska ikhtiyar sirf un par hota hai jo usse dosti karte hain aur jo uske saathi ban jaate hain.
16.101: Aur jab hum ek aayat ko doosri aayat se badalte hain – aur Allah behtar jaanta hai jo kuch woh naazil karta hai – to woh kehte hain: Tum to jhoot gadhte ho – balke unmein se aksar nahi jaante.
16.102: Kaho: Is Qur’an ko Rooh-ul-Qudus ne tumhare Rab ki taraf se haqq ke saath naazil kiya hai – taake woh momineen ko mazboot karein – aur momineen ke liye hidayat aur khush khabri hai.
16.103: Aur hum jaante hain ke woh kehte hain: Ise to ek aadmi sikhaata hai – lekin jinke liye woh ishaara karte hain uski zubaan ajmi hai – aur yeh Qur’an saaf arabi zubaan mein hai.
16.104: Beshak jo log Allah ki aayaton par imaan nahi laate – Allah unhein hidaayat nahi deta – aur unke liye dardnaak azaab hai.
16.105: Jo jhoot banate hain woh hi Allah ki aayaton ka inkaar karte hain – aur yahi log jhootay hain.
16.106: Jo shakhs imaan laane ke baad kufr kare – siwa uske jo majboor kiya gaya ho aur uska dil imaan par mutmain ho – lekin jo dil se kufr kare – unpar Allah ka gussa hai – aur unke liye bada azaab hai.
16.107: Yeh is liye ke unhon ne duniya ki zindagi ko aakhirat par tarjeeh di – aur beshak Allah kafiron ko hidaayat nahi deta.
16.108: Yeh woh log hain jinke dilon, kaanon aur aankhon par Allah ne mohar laga di – aur yahi log ghaflat mein hain.
16.109: Beshak woh aakhirat mein nuksaan uthane wale hain.
16.110: Phir beshak tumhara Rab un logon ke liye – jinhon ne hijrat ki uske baad ke unpar zulm kiya gaya – phir sabr kiya aur jihad kiya – beshak tumhara Rab unke baad zaroor bakshne wala, meherban hai.
16.111: (Yaad karo) jis din har shakhs apni hi fikr mein hoga – aur har shakhs ko uske amal ka poora badla diya jaayega – aur unpar kuch bhi zulm na kiya jaayega.
16.112: Aur Allah ek basti ka misaal deta hai – jo aman aur itminan wali thi – uske paas har taraf se rizq farawani se aata tha – phir usne Allah ki ni’mat ka inkaar kiya – to Allah ne us par bhook aur khauf ka azaab musallat kiya jo uske aamaal ka nateeja tha.
16.113: Aur unke paas ek Rasool aaya – to unhon ne use jhutlaya – to azaab ne unhein le liya – is halat mein ke woh zaalim thay.
16.114: Pas Allah ka diya hua halal aur paak rizq khao – aur uski ni’mat ka shukar karo agar tum usi ki ibaadat karte ho.
16.115: Usne tum par sirf murda jaanwar, khoon, suar ka gosht, aur woh jis par Allah ka naam na liya gaya ho haram kiya hai – lekin jo majboor ho jaaye, baghair bagawat aur hadd se badhe – to beshak Allah bakshne wala, meherban hai.
16.116: Aur apni zubanon se jhoot ghad kar yeh na kaho ke yeh halal hai aur yeh haram – taake tum Allah par jhoot bando – jo log Allah par jhoot bandte hain woh kabhi falah nahi paate.
16.117: Yeh duniya ka thoda sa faida hai – aur aakhirat mein unke liye dardnaak azaab hai.
16.118: Aur jo yahudi hue un par humne woh sab cheezein haram kar di thi jinka zikr hum pehle tumhein kar chuke hain – aur un par zulm humne nahi kiya – balke woh khud apne upar zulm karte thay.
16.119: Phir beshak tumhara Rab un logon ke liye – jinhon ne nadani mein koi bura kaam kiya – phir uske baad tauba ki aur sudhar gaye – to beshak tumhara Rab unke liye bakshne wala, meherban hai.
16.120: Beshak Ibrahim ek ummat tha – Allah ka farmaan bardaar, ek taraf ka hone wala – aur mushrikon mein se na tha.
16.121: Usne Allah ki ni’mat ka shukar ada kiya – usse Allah ne chuna aur seedhe raaste ki hidaayat di.
16.122: Aur humne usko duniya mein bhi acchi jaza di – aur aakhirat mein woh zaroor nek logon mein se hoga.
16.123: Phir humne tumhari taraf wahee bheji ke tum Ibrahim ke deen ki pairwi karo – jo ek taraf ka tha aur mushrikon mein se na tha.
16.124: Aur sabt ka din to un logon par farz kiya gaya tha jinhon ne usmein ikhtilaf kiya – aur beshak tumhara Rab qayamat ke din unmein faisla karega jismein woh ikhtilaf karte thay.
16.125: Apne Rab ke raaste ki taraf dawat do hikmat aur acchi naseehat ke saath – aur unse bahas karo us tareeqe se jo behtareen ho – beshak tumhara Rab behtar jaanta hai kisko uske raaste se bhatak gaya aur kisko hidayat mili.
16.126: Aur agar tum badla lo to utna hi lo jitna tum par zulm hua – lekin agar sabr karo to yeh behtar hai sabr karne walon ke liye.
16.127: Aur sabr karo – aur tumhara sabr sirf Allah ke liye ho – aur un logon ke liye gham na karo – aur jo chaalein chal rahe hain unse tang dil na ho.
16.128: Beshak Allah un logon ke saath hai jo taqwa rakhte hain aur jo neik amal karte hain.

17.1: Paak hai woh (Allah) jo apne bande ko ek raat mein Masjid-e-Haram se Masjid-e-Aqsa tak le gaya, jiska aaspas humne barakat di, taa ke hum usay apni kuch nishaniyan dikhayein. Beshak woh Sunne Wala, Dekhne Wala hai.
17.2: Aur humne Moosa ko kitaab di, aur usey Bani Isra'il ke liye hidayat banaya ke: Mera siwa kisi ko apna wakeel na banao.
17.3: Ai un logon ki aulad jinko humne Nooh ke saath (sawaari mein) uthaya tha. Beshak woh ek shukarguzar banda tha.
17.4: Aur humne Bani Isra'il ke liye kitaab mein faisla kar diya ke: Tum zameen mein do baar fasaad karoge, aur zaroor badapan mein chadhoge badi chadhai.
17.5: Phir jab pehla waada aaya, humne tum par apne kuch bande chhoda, jo sakht takat rakhte thay. To unhon ne tumhare gharon mein talashi li, aur yeh waada poora hona hi tha.
17.6: Phir humne tumhein un par dobara ghalba diya, aur tumhein maal-o-aulaad se madad di, aur tumhein zyada lashkar banaya.
17.7: Agar tum neik amal karoge to apne hi liye karoge, aur agar buraai karoge to woh bhi tumhare liye hi hogi. Phir jab doosra waada aaya, to humne tum par dobara apne dushman bheje taa ke woh tumhare chehray bigaad dein, aur masjid mein jaise pehli baar ghuse thay waise hi ghus jaayen, aur jis cheez par haath padhe usey tabaah kar dein.
17.8: Umeed hai ke tumhara Rab tum par reham kare. Lekin agar tum dobara waise hi karoge to hum bhi waise hi karenge. Aur humne jahannum ko kaafiron ke liye qaidgah bana diya hai.
17.9: Yeh Qur’an woh raasta dikhata hai jo sab se seedha hai, aur un momino ko jo neik amal karte hain yeh basharat deta hai ke unke liye bada ajar hai.
17.10: Aur yeh un logon ko bhi khabardaar karta hai jo aakhirat par imaan nahi rakhte, ke unke liye humne dardnaak azaab tayar kar rakha hai.
17.11: Aur insaan buraai ke liye dua karta hai jaisa ke woh bhalaai ke liye karta hai. Insaan bara hi jaldbaaz hai.
17.12: Aur humne raat aur din ko do nishaniyan banaya, phir raat ki nishani ko mitaya, aur din ki nishani ko roshan banaya taa ke tum apne Rab ka fazl talaash karo, aur saalon ka hisaab aur ginati jaanein. Aur humne har cheez ko tafseel se bayan kiya hai.
17.13: Aur har insan ka naam-a-amaal humne uski gardan mein latka diya hai. Aur qayamat ke din hum us ke liye ek kitaab nikaalenge jo woh khula hua payega.
17.14: Padh le apna kitaab, aaj tu khud apne hisaab ke liye kaafi hai.
17.15: Jo hidayat ikhtiyar kare, us ne apne hi liye ki, aur jo gumraahi ikhtiyar kare to uska nuqsaan bhi usi ko hoga. Koi doosra boojh uthane wala kisi aur ka bojh nahi uthayega. Aur hum kisi qaum ko azaab nahi dete jab tak ek Rasool na bhej dein.
17.16: Aur jab hum kisi basti ko halaak karna chahte hain to uske ashraafon ko hukm dete hain, to woh us mein fasaad karte hain. To us par baat sach ho jaati hai, phir hum usay tabaah kar dete hain.
17.17: Aur kitni hi naslein humne Nooh ke baad halaak ki. Tera Rab apne bandon ke gunaahon ko poori tarah jaanta hai, aur dekh raha hai.
17.18: Jo koi duniya ki zindagi ka chahta rakhay, usko hum yahan jald dete hain jo chahein jise chahein, phir humne us ke liye jahannum tay kiya hai jismein woh zaleel-o-ruswa hokar daakhil hoga.
17.19: Aur jo aakhirat ka irada rakhe aur us ke liye waise hi koshish kare jaise karni chahiye, aur woh momin ho, to aise hi logon ki koshish maqbool hoti hai.
17.20: In dono ko, hum tumhare Rab ka fazl dete hain – duniya walon ko bhi aur aakhirat walon ko bhi. Aur tumhare Rab ka ata mana nahi gaya.
17.21: Dekho kaise humne baaz ko baaz par fazilat di hai. Aur aakhirat zyada badi darjaat wali hai, aur zyada badi fazilat wali hai.
17.22: Allah ke saath koi doosra maabood na banaao, warna tu zaleel ho kar baitha reh jaayega.
17.23: Aur tumhare Rab ne faisla kar diya ke uske siwa kisi ki ibaadat na karo, aur walidain ke saath ihsan karo. Agar dono ya unmein se koi budhape mein tumhare paas rahen to un se 'uff' bhi na kehna, aur na unhein jhidakna, aur un se narmi se baat karna.
17.24: Aur unke saamne reham ke saath jhuk jaao, aur dua karo: 'Aey mere Rab! Jaise unhon ne mujhe chhote mein paala, tu bhi un par reham farma.'
17.25: Tumhara Rab tumhare dilon ke andar ki baatein jaanta hai. Agar tum neik ban jaao to woh un logon ke liye bakhshish karne wala hai jo tauba karne wale hain.
17.26: Aur qarabatdaron ka haq do, aur mohtaaj ka, aur musafir ka. Aur maal ko fazool mat udaao.
