17.27: Beshak fazool kharch log shaytaan ke bhai hain, aur shaytaan apne Rab ka na-shukra hai.
17.28: Aur agar tumhein us se mooh modna pade, jise tumhein apne Rab ki rehmat ka intezaar ho, to unse narmi se baat karo.
17.29: Aur apna haath apni gardan se bandha hua na rakho, aur na hi ise bilkul khol do, ke malamat-zada aur thak gaya baith jao.
17.30: Beshak tera Rab jise chahta hai uska rizq kushada karta hai, aur jise chahta hai tang karta hai. Beshak woh apne bandon ka haal jaanta aur dekhta hai.
17.31: Aur apni aulad ko faqr ke darr se qatl na karo. Hum unhein bhi rizq dete hain, aur tumhein bhi. Beshak unhein maarna badi khata hai.
17.32: Aur zina ke qareeb bhi na jaao. Beshak yeh fahashi hai, aur bura raasta hai.
17.33: Aur kisi jaan ko na haqo se maaro jise Allah ne hurmat di hai – siwa uske jo haqq ke sath maara gaya ho. Aur agar koi mazloom qatal kiya gaya ho to uske wali ko humne ikhtiyaar diya hai. Magar qatal mein had se na guzarna, beshak woh madad diya gaya hai.
17.34: Aur yateem ke maal ke qareeb na jaao magar behtareen tareeqe se, jab tak ke woh apne baaligh pan ko na pahunch jaye. Aur ahad ko poora karo, beshak ahad ke baare mein poocha jaayega.
17.35: Aur paimaane mein poora bhar do jab tum tolte ho, aur sidhe tarazu se tolo – yeh behtar hai aur anjaam mein behtareen hai.
17.36: Aur us cheez ke peechhe na lago jiska tumhein ilm nahi. Beshak kaan, aankh, aur dil – in sab se poocha jaayega.
17.37: Aur zameen mein akad kar na chalo. Beshak tum na zameen ko phaad sakte ho, na pahadon ki unchai ko pahunch sakte ho.
17.38: In sab ki burai tere Rab ke nazdeek nafrat ke kaabil hai.
17.39: Yeh woh hikmat hai jo tere Rab ne tujhe wahee ki hai. Aur Allah ke saath koi aur maabood na banaao, warna tu jahannum mein daakhil hoga zaleel hokar, ruswa hokar.
17.40: Kya tumhare Rab ne tumhein beton se nawaza aur khud farishton ko apni betiyan bana liya? Tum to badi badi baat karte ho.
17.41: Aur humne is Qur’an mein har tarah se samjha diya taa ke woh naseehat lein, lekin unka inkaar sirf barhta hi gaya.
17.42: Kaho: Agar Allah ke saath aur bhi khuda hote jaise yeh kehte hain, to woh Rab-e-Arsh tak pahunchne ka rasta talaash karte.
17.43: Paak hai woh, aur bahut ooncha hai us se jo yeh log kehte hain.
17.44: Uski tasbeeh karte hain saare aasmaan aur zameen ke sab makhlooq, aur har cheez uski hamd ke saath tasbeeh karti hai. Magar tum unki tasbeeh nahi samajhte. Beshak woh Haleem hai, Ghafoor hai.
17.45: Aur jab tum Qur’an padhte ho to hum tumhare aur un logon ke darmiyan jo aakhirat par imaan nahi rakhte ek parda khinch dete hain.
17.46: Aur unke dilon par gilaaf daal dete hain ke woh samajh na saken, aur unke kaanon mein bojh daal dete hain. Aur jab tum Qur’an mein apne Rab ka zikr akela karte ho to woh peeth mod kar bhaag jaate hain.
17.47: Hum jaante hain ke woh kya sunte hain jab woh tumhari baat sunte hain, aur jab yeh chupke se mashwara karte hain to kehte hain: Tum to sirf ek jadoo-zada aadmi ho.
17.48: Dekho unhon ne tumhare liye kis kis qisam ki misaalein bayani. Woh gumrah ho gaye hain, ab unhein raasta nahi milta.
17.49: Aur kehte hain: Kya jab hum haddiyon aur reza-reza ho jaayenge to naye siray se uthaye jaayenge?
17.50: Kaho: Chahe tum pathar ban jaao, ya loha,
17.51: Ya koi aur makhlooq jo tumhare zehan mein azeem lagti ho – phir woh kahenge: Humein kaun dobara paida karega? Kaho: Wahi jisne pehli baar tumhein paida kiya. Phir woh tumhare samne apne sir hilayenge aur kahenge: Yeh kab hoga? Kaho: Ho sakta hai ke woh qareeb ho.
17.52: Jis din woh tumhein pukarega, to tum uski hamd karte hue nikal aaoge, aur samjhoge ke tum sirf thoda sa waqt hi zameen mein the.
17.53: Aur mere bandon se keh do ke woh baat karein jo behtareen ho. Beshak shaitaan unke darmiyan fasaad daalta hai. Beshak shaitaan insaan ka khula dushman hai.
17.54: Tumhara Rab tumhein behtar jaanta hai. Agar chahe to tum par reham kare, aur agar chahe to azaab de. Aur humne tumhein un par na dekhbhaal karne wala banaya hai.
17.55: Aur tera Rab jaanta hai jo kuch aasmaan aur zameen mein hai. Aur humne baaz nabiyon ko baaz par fazilat di, aur Dawood ko Zaboor di.
17.56: Kaho: Pukaaro unhein jise tumne uske siwa khuda samjha hai – woh tumse na takleef door kar sakte hain na badal sakte hain.
17.57: Jinhein yeh pukarte hain woh khud apne Rab ke qareeb hone ka zariya talaash karte hain – kaun zyada qareeb hai – aur uski rahmat ke umeedwaar hain, aur uske azaab se darte hain. Beshak tere Rab ka azaab darne ke laayak hai.
17.58: Aur koi bhi basti nahi magar hum usse qayamat se pehle halaak karenge ya sakht azaab denge. Yeh kitaab mein likha hua hai.
17.59: Aur humein nishaniyan bhejne se sirf yeh roka ke pehle waale jhutla chuke. Aur humne Thamood ko oontni di jo ek khuli nishani thi, to unhon ne us par zulm kiya. Aur hum nishaniyan sirf daraane ke liye bhejte hain.
17.60: Aur yaad karo jab humne tumse keh diya ke beshak tumhara Rab logon ko gher lega. Aur jo manzar humne tumhein dikhaya, use logon ke liye ek fitna bana diya, aur woh darakht bhi jise Qur’an mein laanat di gayi hai. Hum unhein daraate hain, magar yeh unki sarkashi ko aur badhate hain.
17.61: Aur yaad karo jab humne farishton se kaha: Aadmi ko sajda karo. To un sab ne sajda kiya siwa Iblees ke. Usne kaha: Kya main us ko sajda karoon jise tu ne mitti se banaya?
17.62: Usne kaha: Batayiye, kya yehi hai woh jise tu ne mujh par tarjeeh di? Agar tu mujhe qayamat tak mohalat de to main iski aulad ko, siwa kuch ke, apne qabze mein le lunga.
17.63: Allah ne farmaya: Ja, jo bhi tu mein se samet sake unmein se, to le jaa. Lekin jin par main mohibbatafarma hoon, un par tera bas na chalega.
17.64: Aur tu unmein se jise tu apni aawaz se laalch de sakta hai, de, aur apne sawaar aur paidal lashkar lekar un par chadh ja, aur maal-o-aulad mein unke saath shirakat kar, aur un se waade kar – aur shaitaan unse jhoothe waade hi karta hai.
17.65: Beshak mere sachche bandon par tera koi ikhtiyaar na hoga. Tera Rab kaafi hai kaar-saz ke taur par.
17.66: Tumhara Rab hi hai jo tumhare liye samandar mein kashtiyan chalaata hai taake tum uske fazl ka talaash karo. Beshak woh tum par nihayat meherbaan hai.
17.67: Aur jab tum samandar mein museebat mein phans jaate ho to uske siwa jise tum pukarte ho, sab ko bhool jaate ho. Phir jab woh tumhein bachakar khushki tak le aata hai to tum mooh mod lete ho. Aur insaan bara hi na-shukra hai.
17.68: Kya tum is baat se mutma’in ho ke Allah tumhein khushki mein kisi taraf dhasa de ya tum par pathar barsaane wali aandhi bhej de, phir tum apna koi haami-o-madadgar na pao?
17.69: Ya tum is baat se mutma’in ho ke woh tumhein phir samandar mein le jaaye, phir tum par tezi se chalti hawa bhej kar tumhein gark kar de tumhari na-shukri ke sabab se, phir tum uska badla lene waala na pao?
17.70: Aur beshak humne bani Adam ko izzat di, aur unhein khushki aur samandar mein sawari di, aur unhein behtareen cheezon se rizq diya, aur unhein apne kai makhlooq par fazilat di.
17.71: Jis din hum har insaan ko uske imam ke saath bulayenge. Phir jiska naam-e-aamaal uske daaye haath mein diya jaayega, woh apna hisaab khushi khushi padhega, aur unhein zara bhi nuksaan na diya jaayega.
17.72: Aur jo is duniya mein andha raha, woh aakhirat mein bhi andha hi rahega, balki aur zyada bhatka hua.
17.73: Aur woh to tumhein us se hatana chahte hain jo humne tumhari taraf wahee kiya, taake tum humare khilaaf koi aur baat ghadh lo – aur tab woh zaroor tumhein apna dost bana lete.
17.74: Aur agar humne tumhein sabit qadam na rakha hota to qareeb tha ke tum unki taraf thoda sa jhuk jaate.
17.75: Tab hum tumhein zindagi mein bhi azaab ka maza chakhate, aur maut ke baad bhi, phir tum humare muqable mein apna koi madadgaar na paate.
17.76: Aur woh to tumhein is zameen se nikal dena chahte thay, taa ke tumhein wahan se nikal dein, lekin tab woh bhi thoda hi dair rukte tumhare baad.
17.77: Yeh humari sunnat hai un Rasoolon ke saath jo tumse pehle guzar chuke, aur tum hamari sunnat mein koi tabdeeli na paoge.
17.78: Namaz qayam karo din ke dhule se lekar raat ke andhere tak, aur fajr ka Qur’an bhi – beshak fajr ka Qur’an mashhood hota hai.
17.79: Aur raat ke kuch hisse mein bhi tahajjud padha karo, yeh tumhare liye nafil hai, shayad ke tera Rab tujhe maqam-e-mahmood tak pahuncha de.
17.80: Aur kaho: Aey mere Rab! Mujhe sahi tareeqe se daakhil kar, aur sahi tareeqe se nikaal, aur apni taraf se ek madadgaar qudrat ata farma.
17.81: Aur keh do: Haqq aa gaya aur baatil mit gaya. Beshak baatil mit jaane waala hai.
17.82: Aur hum is Qur’an mein woh cheez naazil kar rahe hain jo momino ke liye shifa aur rehmat hai, aur zaalimon ke liye sirf khasara barhata hai.
17.83: Aur jab hum insaan ko niyamat dete hain to woh mooh mod leta hai aur door ho jaata hai. Aur jab use takleef hoti hai to woh be-umeed ho jaata hai.
17.84: Kaho: Har shakhs apne tareeqe par amal karta hai. To tumhara Rab behtar jaanta hai kaun behtareen raste par hai.
17.85: Aur woh tumse rooh ke baare mein poochhte hain. Kaho: Rooh mere Rab ke hukm se hai, aur tumhein iske ilm mein se sirf thoda hi diya gaya hai.
17.86: Aur agar hum chahein to woh sab kuch chheen lein jo humne tumhari taraf wahee kiya hai, phir tum apne liye uske baare mein kisi ko humare muqable mein wakeel na pao.
17.87: Magar yeh tumhare Rab ki rahmat hai. Beshak uska fazl tum par bada hai.
17.88: Kaho: Agar insaan aur jinn mil kar is Qur’an jaisa laane ki koshish karein to woh is jaisa na laa sakein, chahe woh ek dusre ke madadgaar hi kyun na ho jaayein.
17.89: Aur beshak humne is Qur’an mein har tarah ki misaalein bayaan ki hain logon ke liye, magar unmein se zyadatar log inkaar hi karte hain.
17.90: Aur kehte hain: Hum tum par imaan na laayenge jab tak tum humare liye zameen se ek chashma na nikaal do.
17.91: Ya tumhare paas khajooron aur anguron ka ek baagh ho, aur tum usmein dariyaon ko behta do.
17.92: Ya tum aasmaan ko tukdo mein gira do jaisa tum kehte ho, ya Allah aur farishton ko samne le aao.
17.93: Ya tumhara ek sona ka ghar ho, ya tum aasmaan mein chadh jao – aur hum tumhare chadhne par bhi imaan na laayenge jab tak tum hum par ek kitaab na utaar do jo hum padhein. Kaho: Paak hai mera Rab! Kya main sirf ek bashar-e-rasool nahi hoon?
17.94: Aur logon ke imaan laane se sirf yeh baat rukawat bani ke unhon ne kaha: Kya Allah ne ek bashar ko Rasool bana diya?
17.95: Kaho: Agar zameen mein farishte sukoonat karte aur chalte phirte hote to hum un par aasman se ek farishta Rasool bana kar bhejte.
17.96: Kaho: Mere aur tumhare darmiyan Allah hi gawah kaafi hai. Beshak woh apne bandon ko dekhne, jaanne wala hai.
17.97: Aur jise Allah hidayat deta hai wohi hidayat yafta hai, aur jise woh gumrah kar de to tum uske liye Allah ke siwa koi madadgaar na paoge. Aur hum unhein qayamat ke din mooh ke bal andhe, goonge, aur behre uthayenge. Unka thikaana jahannum hai – jab kabhi uski aag halki hogi, hum usay aur tez kar denge.
17.98: Yeh unki saza is liye hai ke unhon ne hamari aayaton ka inkaar kiya, aur kaha: Kya jab hum haddiyan aur reza-reza ho jaayenge to kya naye siray se uthaye jaayenge?
17.99: Kya unhein yeh nazar nahi aata ke jisne aasmaan-o-zameen paida kiya woh un jaison ko paida karne par zaroor qadir hai? Aur usne unke liye ek waqt tay kiya hai jismein koi shakk nahi – lekin zalim sirf inkaar hi karte hain.
17.100: Kaho: Agar tum mere Rab ki rahmat ke khazaane ke maalik hote to usay zaroor rok rakhte kharch karne ke darr se. Insaan bara hi tangdil hai.
17.101: Aur beshak humne Moosa ko nau khuli nishaniyan di, to Bani Isra'il se poochho jab uske paas Firaun aaya to usne us se kaha: Aey Moosa! Mujhe lagta hai ke tu jadoo se mutasir hai.
17.102: Moosa ne kaha: Tu bhi jaanta hai ke yeh sab nishaniyan aasmaan-o-zameen ke Rab ne nazil ki hain, aur yeh sirf basirat ke liye hain. Aur main samajhta hoon tu zaroor halak hone wala hai.
17.103: Phir Firaun ne usay zameen se nikal dena chaha, to humne usay aur uske saathiyon ko gark kar diya.
17.104: Aur uske baad humne Bani Isra'il se kaha: Zameen mein tum rahna, phir jab aakhirat ka waada aayega, to hum tum sabko jama karenge.
17.105: Aur humne is Qur’an ko haq ke saath nazil kiya, aur haq ke saath hi woh utra. Aur humne tumhein sirf basharat dene wala aur daraane wala banaakar bheja.
17.106: Aur is Qur’an ko humne kuch hisso mein utaara taa ke tum use logon ke samne dheere dheere padh sako. Aur humne isay dheere dheere utaara.
17.107: Kaho: Tum is par imaan lao ya na lao – jinhein pehle ilm diya gaya hai jab unhein yeh Qur’an sunaaya jaata hai to woh sajda mein gir jaate hain.
17.108: Aur kehte hain: Paak hai hamara Rab, beshak hamare Rab ka waada poora hone waala tha.
17.109: Aur woh rone ke saath gir jaate hain, aur yeh unke khushu mein izafa karta hai.
17.110: Kaho: Allah kehkar bulao ya Rahman kehkar – jis naam se bhi bulao, sab uske ache ache naam hain. Aur apni namaz mein na to zyada unchi awaaz se padh, aur na hi bilkul dheere, beech ka raasta ikhtiyar karo.
17.111: Aur kaho: Sari tareefein us Allah ke liye hain jisne na to koi beta banaya, aur na uska koi shareek hai baadshahat mein, aur na uska koi madadgaar hai zaleel hone se bachane ke liye – aur uski badi azmat ka izhaar karo!

18.1: Sab tareef Allah ke liye hai jisne apne banday par yeh kitaab naazil ki aur us mein koi tedh na rakhi.
18.2: Bilkul seedhi – taake woh daraaye sakht azaab se – aur momineen ko khush khabri de unke liye accha ajar hai.
18.4: Aur daraaye un logon ko jo kehte hain ke Allah ne kisi ko beta banaya.
18.5: Unke paas is baat ka koi ilm nahi – na unke baap dada ke paas – badi baat hai jo unke mooh se nikalti hai – woh bas jhoot bolte hain.
18.6: Shayad tum unke peechay gham se apne aap ko halak kar daalo ge agar woh is baat par imaan na laayein.
18.7: Beshak humne zameen par jo kuch hai use uske liye zeenat banaya – taake unhein aazmaayein ke unmein kaun behtar amal karta hai.
18.8: Aur beshak hum ise ek din saaf zameen bana denge.
18.9: Kya tum samajhte ho ke Kahf aur Raqeem ke logon ka waqiya hamari nishaniyon mein se ajeeb tha?
18.10: Jab woh jawan gufa mein chale gaye aur kehne lage: Aey hamare Rab! Humein apni rehmat ata kar – aur hamare liye hamare kaam mein raah-e-raast tayyar kar.
18.11: Phir humne unke kaanon par gufa mein chand saal tak pardah daal diya.
18.12: Phir humne unhein uthaya taake dekhein ke do girohon mein kaun behtar waqt ka andaza lagata hai jo unhon ne guzara.
18.13: Hum tumhein unka sachcha waqiya sunate hain – woh kuch jawan thay jo apne Rab par imaan laye – aur humne unki hidayat mein izafa kiya.
18.14: Aur humne unke dilon ko mazboot kiya jab unhon ne khade ho kar kaha: Hamara Rab to wahi hai jo aasmanon aur zameen ka Rab hai – hum uske siwa kisi aur ko mabood kabhi na pukaren ge – agar hum aisa karein to yaqeenan humne ghalat baat kahi.
18.15: Yeh hamari qaum hai jisne uske siwa kai mabood bana liye hain – to inhein chahiye ke inke liye koi waziha daleel layein – to kaun zyadatar zalim hai usse jo Allah par jhoot ghade.
18.16: Aur jab tum unse aur unke maboodon se alag hue ho to gufa mein chale jao – tumhara Rab apni rehmat tum par phaila dega – aur tumhare kaam mein asaani ke liye kuch tay karega.
18.17: Aur tum sooraj ko dekho ge ke jab woh nikalta hai to unki gufa se daayein taraf chala jaata hai – aur jab ghuroob hota hai to unse baayen taraf hat jaata hai – aur woh uske wasee gufa mein hain – yeh Allah ki nishaniyon mein se hai – jise Allah hidayat de woh hi hidayat yafta hai, aur jise woh gumraah kare uske liye tum kabhi koi wali aur rehnuma na paao ge.
18.18: Aur tum samjho ge ke woh jaag rahe hain, halan ke woh so rahe hain – aur hum unhein daayein aur baayen karwat dilwate rahe – aur unka kutta gufa ke dahan par paon phailaye lete tha – agar tum unhein dekh lete to palat kar bhaag jaate – aur tum par iztarab chha jaata.
18.19: Aur isi tarah humne unhein uthaya taake woh aapas mein sawal karein – unmein se ek ne kaha: Tum kitni der rahe? Unhon ne kaha: Ek din ya usse kuch kam – unmein se ek ne kaha: Tumhara Rab behtar jaanta hai jitni der tum rahe – to ab tum mein se kisi ko yeh rupiya le kar shehar bhejo – aur dekhe ke sabse paak khuraak kahan milti hai – aur us mein se kuch khuraak lekar aaye – aur naram rawayya ikhtiyar karein – aur kisi ko tumhare baare mein na bataayein.
18.20: Agar woh tumhein jaan lein ge to ya to tumhein sangsaar karein ge ya apne deen mein wapas le jaayenge – aur tum kabhi bhi falaah nahi paao ge.
18.21: Aur isi tarah humne unka haal sab par aashkaar kiya taake log jaan lein ke Allah ka waada haqq hai – aur ke qayamat mein koi shaq nahi – jab log unke baare mein behas karne lage to unmein se kuch ne kaha: Un par ek imarat banado – unka Rab unke haal se behtar waaqif hai – jin logon ka un par ghalba tha unhon ne kaha: Hum to un par masjid banayein ge.
18.22: Kuch log kahte hain: Woh teen thay aur chautha unka kutta – kuch kehte hain: Woh paanch thay aur chhatha unka kutta – yeh andaz-e-taqreeb hai – aur kuch kehte hain: Woh saat thay aur aathwaan unka kutta – keh do: Mera Rab behtar jaanta hai unki tadaad – unhein thoda hi log jaante hain – pas unke baare mein sirf wahi kehna jo wazeh ho – aur unke baare mein kisi se kuch na poochhna.
18.23: Aur kisi cheez ke baare mein kabhi na kehna ke main yeh kal zaroor karunga.
18.24: Magar yeh kehna ke 'Insha Allah' – aur jab bhool jao to apne Rab ko yaad karo – aur kaho: Mera Rab mujhe isse behtar raasta dikhaaye.
18.25: Aur woh apni gufa mein teen sau saal rahe – aur no (9) saal aur zyada.
18.26: Keh do: Allah behtar jaanta hai jitni der woh rahe – usi ke liye ghaib hai aasmanon aur zameen ka – kya hi behtar hai uska dekhna aur sunna – uske siwa unka koi wali nahi – aur woh apne hukm mein kisi ko shareek nahi karta.
18.27: Aur padho woh jo tumhare Rab ki kitaab mein se tum par naazil hua – uske kalimat mein koi tabdili karne wala nahi – aur uske siwa tum kabhi koi panaah na paao ge.
18.28: Aur apne aap ko un logon ke saath rokiye jo apne Rab ko subah o shaam uski raza ke liye pukarte hain – aur apni aankhon ko unse na hataiye – duniya ki zindagi ki aaraish chah kar – aur us shakhs ki itaat na kijiye jiske dil ko humne apni yaad se gafil kar diya, aur jo apni khwahish ka pairo hai, aur jiska kaam hadd se guzar gaya hai.
18.29: Aur keh do: Haq tumhare Rab ki taraf se hai – ab jo chahe imaan laye aur jo chahe inkaar kare – humne zalimon ke liye aisi aag tayar kar rakhi hai jiske sholon ne unhein gher liya hoga – agar woh paani maangenge to aise paani se pilaaya jaayega jo pighle hue tamba jaisa hoga – jo mooh jala daalega – kitna bura mashroob hai aur kitni buri aaraam gaah!
18.30: Beshak jo log imaan laaye aur neik amal kiye – hum unke amal ka ajar zaya nahi karte.
18.31: Unke liye hamesha rehne wali jannatein hain – jinmein nehrein beh rahi hongi – unhein wahan sone ke kangan pehnaye jaayenge – aur harir ke sabz libaas – aur unhein takhton par takiya lagakar bithaya jaayega – kya hi accha badla hai aur kya hi behtareen thikana!
18.32: Aur unhein ek misaal sunao – do aadmiyon ki – humne ek ko do angoor ke baagh diye aur unke gird khajooron ke darakht lagaye – aur unke darmiyan kheti bhi rakhi.
18.33: Dono baaghon ne apna phal diya aur un mein kuch kami na thi – aur humne unke darmiyan ek nahr chala di.
18.34: Aur us aadmi ke paas aur bhi maal tha – to usne apne saathi se baat ki aur kaha: Main tujhse zyada maal daar hoon aur logon mein mujhse zyada izzat wala hoon.
18.35: Aur woh apne baagh mein daakhil hua aur apne nafs par zulm karta hua bola: Mujhe nahi lagta ke yeh kabhi khatam hoga.
18.36: Aur mujhe nahi lagta ke qayamat aayegi – aur agar main apne Rab ke paas le jaaya bhi gaya to mujhe isse behtar jagah mil jaayegi.
18.37: Uska saathi usse baat karte hue bola: Kya tu us par kufr karta hai jisne tujhe mitti se, phir nutfe se paida kiya, phir tujhe aadmi banaya?
18.38: Lekin main to yeh kehta hoon: Mera Rab Allah hai – aur main kisi ko apne Rab ka shareek nahi banata.
18.39: Aur jab tu apne baagh mein daakhil hota to kyun na yeh kehta: Maasha Allah! Laa quwwata illa billa – agar tu mujhe maal aur aulad mein kam samajhta hai.
18.40: To ho sakta hai mera Rab mujhe tumhare baagh se behtar ata kare – aur tumhare baagh par aasman se koi azaab bhej de – to woh phisalta hua zameen ho jaaye.
18.41: Ya uska paani zameen mein chala jaaye aur tu use dhoondh bhi na paaye.
18.42: Aur uska saara phal gher liya gaya – to woh apne haathon ko taaf karne laga is par jo usne us mein kharch kiya tha – halan ke woh gir gaya tha apni belon par – aur kehta tha: Kaash maine apne Rab ke saath kisi ko shareek na banaya hota!
18.43: Aur uske paas koi jama’at na thi jo uski madad karti Allah ke siwa – aur na hi woh khud madadgar ban saka.
18.44: Wahan ikhtiyaar sirf Allah ka hoga – wahi behtareen ajar dene wala aur behtareen anjaam wala hai.
18.45: Aur unhein duniya ki zindagi ki misaal sunao – yeh to paani ki tarah hai jo humne aasman se naazil kiya – phir uske saath zameen ka sabza mil kar ghana ho gaya – phir woh rukhsar ho gaya – jo hawayein uda le jaati hain – aur Allah har cheez par qudrat rakhta hai.
18.46: Maal aur aulaad duniya ki zindagi ki zeenat hai – lekin baaqi rehne wale neik aamaal tumhare Rab ke nazdeek ajar mein behtar hain aur umeed mein bhi.
18.47: Aur woh din yaad karo jab hum pahaadon ko chalayenge aur tum zameen ko khula dekhoge – aur hum unhein jama karenge – phir unmein se kisi ko bhi na chhodein ge.
18.48: Aur sab tumhare Rab ke huzoor saf karke laya jaayega – tumhare paas aaye jaayenge jaise humne pehli baar tumhein paida kiya – balke tumne to samjha tha ke hum tumhare liye waapas aane ka waqt tay nahi karenge.
18.49: Aur kitaab pesh ki jaayegi – phir tum mujrim logon ko dekhoge ke apni kitaab ke muhtawa se dare hue honge – aur kehenge: Haye hamari tabahi! Is kitaab ne to chhoti badi koi cheez nahi chhodi – sab ko likha hua paaya – aur jo kuch unhon ne kiya hoga woh sab samne laaya jaayega – aur tumhara Rab kisi par zulm nahi karega.
18.50: Aur yaad karo jab humne farishton se kaha: Adam ko sajda karo – to unhon ne sajda kiya – siwa Iblees ke – woh jinnon mein se tha – aur apne Rab ke hukm se bahar nikal gaya – kya phir tum usko aur uski zurriyat ko apna wali banate ho mere siwa – halan ke woh tumhara dushman hai? Kya hi bura badla hai zalimon ke liye!
18.51: Main ne unhein aasmanon aur zameen ke paida karne mein shaamil nahi kiya – aur na hi unki apni paidaish mein – aur na hi main ghalat raaste walon ko madadgar banata hoon.
18.52: Aur us din (yaad karo) jab Allah farmayega: Pukaro unhein jinko tum mere shareek samjhte thay – to woh unhein pukarein ge lekin woh unhein jawab nahi dein ge – aur hum unke darmiyan halaakat ka ek ghaati bana dein ge.
18.53: Aur mujrim aag ko dekhen ge – to samajh jaayenge ke woh usmein girne waale hain – aur woh usse bachne ka koi rasta na paayein ge.
18.54: Aur beshak humne is Qur’an mein har misaal ko logon ke liye tarah tarah se samjhaya – aur insaan sabse zyada jhagdalu hai.
18.55: Aur logon ko hidayat aane ke baad kuch na roka magar yeh kehna ke kya Allah ne ek bashar ko Rasool bana diya?
18.56: Kaho: Main to sirf tumhein khula khula daraane wala hoon – aur jo log iman laye aur neik amal kiye unke liye magfirat aur izzat ka ajar hai.
18.57: Aur jo log hamari aayaton ko jhutlate hain unke liye dardnaak azaab hai.
18.58: Aur tumhara Rab bakhshne wala hai – agar woh pakadta unhein unke aamal par to unke liye azaab jaldi laata – lekin unke liye ek waqt muqarrar hai jisse woh bachkar nahi ja sakte.
18.59: Aur yeh bastiyan hain jinhon ne zulm kiya – to humne unhein halaak kiya – aur unke halaak hone ka waqt tay kar diya.
18.60: Aur yaad karo jab Musa ne apne naujawan se kaha: Main rukunga nahi jab tak ke main do daryaaon ke milne ki jagah na pahuncho – ya barson safar karta rahoon.
18.61: Phir jab woh dono un jagah pahunche jahan dono daryaa milte hain to apni machhli bhool gaye – aur woh machhli samandar mein rasta banate hue nikal gayi.
18.62: Phir jab woh aage chale to Musa ne apne saathi se kaha: Laao hamara naashta – humne to safar se thakan mehsoos ki hai.
18.63: Usne kaha: Kya tumne dekha? Jab hum chattan ke paas the to maine machhli bhool gaya – aur mujhe uska zikr shaitaan ne bhula diya – aur woh ajeeb tareeqe se samandar mein chali gayi.
18.64: Musa ne kaha: Yahi to woh jagah hai jise hum dhoond rahe thay – phir woh dono apne qadam ke nishan par ulta phirein.
18.65: Phir unhon ne ek banday ko paaya hamare bandon mein se jise humne apni rehmat ata ki thi – aur apni taraf se ek ilm diya tha.
18.66: Musa ne usse kaha: Kya main aapke saath rah sakta hoon taake aap mujhe us hidaayat mein se kuch sikhayein jo aapko di gayi hai?
18.67: Usne kaha: Tum mere saath sabr nahi kar sakoge.
18.68: Aur tum kaise sabr kar sakte ho us cheez par jiska tumhein ilm nahi?
18.69: Musa ne kaha: Agar Allah ne chaha to aap mujhe sabr karne wala paayenge – aur main kisi baat mein aapki nafarmaani nahi karoonga.
18.70: Usne kaha: Agar tum mere saath rahna chaho to mujh se kisi baat ka sawaal mat karna jab tak main khud uska zikr na karun.
18.71: Phir woh dono chalein – yahan tak ke woh ek kashti mein sawar huye – to usne us kashti mein suraakh kar diya – Musa ne kaha: Kya aapne ismein suraakh kar diya taake iske logon ko garq kar dein? Aapne to ek ajeeb kaam kiya.
18.72: Usne kaha: Kya maine tumse nahi kaha tha ke tum mere saath sabr nahi kar sakoge?
18.73: Musa ne kaha: Mujhe maaf kijiye ke maine bhool kar aisa kiya – aur mujhe apne saath mushkil mein na daaliye.
18.74: Phir woh chalein – yahan tak ke unhon ne ek ladke ko paaya – to usne us ladke ko qatl kar diya – Musa ne kaha: Kya aapne ek masoom jaan bina kisi wajah ke maar di? Aapne to ek badi na-insaafi ki.
18.75: Usne kaha: Kya maine tumse nahi kaha tha ke tum mere saath sabr nahi kar sakoge?
18.76: Musa ne kaha: Agar iske baad main kuch poochhoon to mujhe apne saath na rakhiye – aap meri taraf se poora uzr pa chuke hain.
18.77: Phir woh chalein – yahan tak ke woh ek basti mein gaye aur wahan ke logon se khana maanga – lekin unhon ne un dono ki mehmaan nawazi se inkaar kar diya – phir unhon ne wahan ek deewar dekhi jo girne wali thi – to usne usse seedha kar diya – Musa ne kaha: Agar aap chahte to is kaam ka kuch ujrat le lete.
18.78: Usne kaha: Yeh mere aur tumhare darmiyan judaai ka waqt hai – ab main tumhein un baaton ki haqeeqat bataata hoon jin par tum sabr nahi kar sake.
18.79: Kashti to kuch gareeb logon ki thi – jo samandar mein kaam karte the – to maine usmein suraakh isliye kiya ke unke peechhe ek badshah tha jo har kashti ko zabardasti chheen leta.
18.80: Aur ladka – uske maa baap momin thay – to humein andesha hua ke yeh unhein sarakshi aur kufr mein mubtala karega.
18.81: To humne chaha ke unka Rab unke badle mein unhein behtar paaki daaman aur reham dil aulaad ata kare.
18.82: Aur deewar – woh do yateem bachon ki thi is shehar mein – aur uske neeche unka ek khazana tha – aur unka baap ek neik aadmi tha – to tumhare Rab ne chaha ke woh dono apni baalighi ko pahunchein aur apna khazana nikaalein – yeh tumhare Rab ki rehmat se tha – aur maine yeh sab apne faislay se nahi kiya – yeh us baat ki haqeeqat hai jin par tum sabr na kar sake.
18.83: Aur tum se Zulqarnain ke baare mein poochhte hain – keh do: Main tumhein uska kuch waqiya sunata hoon.
18.84: Beshak humne usay zameen mein qudrat di thi – aur har cheez ka ek sabab diya.
18.85: To usne ek sabab ko ikhtiyar kiya.
18.86: Yahan tak ke jab woh sooraj ke doobne ki jagah pahuncha to usne dekha ke woh ek kaale pani mein doob raha hai – aur usne wahan ek qaum ko paaya – humne kaha: Aey Zulqarnain! Chahe unhein azaab do ya unke saath husn-e-suluk ikhtiyar karo.
18.87: Usne kaha: Jo zulm karega usko hum azaab dein ge – phir woh apne Rab ke paas lautaya jaayega – aur woh usay sakht azaab dega.
18.88: Aur jo imaan laya aur neik amal kiya to uske liye behtareen ajar hai – aur hum us se apna aasan hukm kehnge.
18.89: Phir usne ek aur sabab ka raasta ikhtiyar kiya.
18.90: Yahan tak ke jab woh sooraj ke nikalne ki jagah pahuncha to usne dekha ke sooraj ek aisi qaum par nikalta hai jinke liye us se bachne ka koi saaya nahi banaya gaya.
18.91: Aisa hi tha – aur beshak hum uske haal se bakhabar thay.
18.92: Phir usne ek aur sabab ka raasta ikhtiyar kiya.
18.93: Yahan tak ke jab woh do pahaadon ke darmiyan pahuncha to usne unke aage ek qaum ko paaya jo mushkil se baat samajhte thay.
18.94: Unhon ne kaha: Aey Zulqarnain! Yajooj aur Majooj is zameen mein fasaad karte hain – to kya hum tumhein kuch maal dein ke tum hamare aur unke darmiyan ek rokaawat bana do?
18.95: Usne kaha: Mere Rab ne jo qudrat mujhe di hai woh behtar hai – tum mujhe bas mehnat se madad do – main tumhare aur unke darmiyan ek mazboot deewar bana doonga.
18.96: Mujhe lohe ke tukde laa do – yahan tak ke jab dono pahaadon ke darmiyan barabar kar diya to kaha: Phook maaro – yahan tak ke jab usne us lohe ko aag kar diya to kaha: Mujhe pighla hua taamba do taake main us par daal doon.
18.97: Phir Yajooj Majooj na to us par charh sakein aur na hi usmein suraakh kar sakein.
18.98: Usne kaha: Yeh mere Rab ki rehmat hai – phir jab mere Rab ka waada aayega to usay gira dega – aur mere Rab ka waada hamesha sach hota hai.
18.99: Aur us din hum unhein chhod denge ke woh ek doosre par ghuse jaayenge – aur soor phoonka jaayega – phir hum sab ko ikattha karenge.
18.100: Aur us din hum kafiron ke samne jahannum ko aayan kar denge.
18.101: Woh jin ki aankhein mere zikr se parde mein thi – aur woh sun nahi sakte thay.
18.102: Kya un logon ne samjha ke mere siwa unhein mere banday apna wali bana lenge? Beshak humne jahannum ko kafiron ke liye mehmaani tayar kar di hai.
18.103: Keh do: Kya main tumhein un logon ki khabar doon jo apne aamaal ke hawale se sabse zyada ghaate mein hain?
18.104: Woh jinke sab aamaal duniya ki zindagi mein zaya ho gaye – aur woh samajhte rahe ke woh accha kaam kar rahe hain.
18.105: Woh log jinhon ne apne Rab ki aayaton ka inkaar kiya – aur uski mulaqat ka – to unke aamaal zaya ho gaye – phir hum unke liye qayamat ke din koi wazan nahi rakhte.
18.106: Yeh unki saza hai – ke unhon ne kufr ikhtiyar kiya – aur meri aayaton aur mere Rasoolon ka mazaak udaaya.
18.107: Beshak jo log imaan laaye aur neik amal kiye – unke liye firdous ke baagh hote hain jahan woh hamesha rahenge.
18.109: Keh do: Agar samundar mere Rab ke kalimat likhne ke liye siyahi ban jaaye to samundar khatam ho jaaye pehle ke mere Rab ke kalimat khatam hon – aur agar hum us jaisa ek aur samundar le aayein.
18.110: Keh do: Main to bas ek insaan hoon tum jaisa – mere paas wahee ki jaati hai ke tumhara Rab ek hi Rab hai – to jo koi apne Rab se mulaqat ki umeed rakhta hai to use chahiye ke neik amal kare – aur apne Rab ki ibaadat mein kisi ko shareek na kare.

19.2: Yeh hai tere Rab ki rehmat ka zikr uske bande Zakariya par.
19.3: Jab usne apne Rab ko chupke se pukara.
19.4: Usne kaha: Aey mere Rab! Meri haddiyan kamzor ho gayi hain aur sir safed ho gaya hai budhape se, aur aey mere Rab! Main kabhi tujhe pukar kar niraasha nahi hua.
19.5: Aur main apne baad apne warison se dar raha hoon, aur meri biwi baanjh hai, to mujhe apne paas se ek waris ata farma.
19.6: Jo meri bhi waris ho, aur Yaqoob ke khandan ka bhi waris ho, aur aey mere Rab! usey apna pasandida bana le.
19.7: Allah ne farmaya: Aey Zakariya! Hum tujhe ek ladke ki khushkhabri dete hain jiska naam Yahya hoga. Humne is se pehle kisi ko us ka hum-naam nahi banaya.
19.8: Usne kaha: Aey mere Rab! Mera kaise beta hoga jab ke meri biwi baanjh hai aur main khud budhape ki inteha ko pahunch chuka hoon?
19.9: Allah ne farmaya: Aisa hi hoga. Tera Rab farmata hai: Ye mere liye asaan hai, maine tujhe pehle se paida kiya jab tu kuch bhi na tha.
19.10: Usne kaha: Aey mere Rab! Mere liye koi nishani bana de. Farmaya: Teri nishani yeh hai ke tu teen raat tak logon se baat na kare, jabke tu theek hoga.
19.11: Phir woh mehraab se apni qaum ke paas nikla, to unhein ishaare se kaha: Subah-o-shaam Allah ki tasbeeh karo.
19.12: Aey Yahya! Kitaab ko mazbooti se pakad lo. Aur humne usey bachpan hi mein hikmat ata ki.
19.13: Aur apni taraf se narmi aur paaki di. Aur woh parhezgaar tha.
19.14: Aur woh apne walidain ka farma bardar tha, aur sarkash aur nafarmaan na tha.
19.15: Aur salaam ho us par jis din woh paida hua, jis din woh marega, aur jis din woh zinda uthaya jayega.
19.16: Aur is kitaab mein Maryam ka zikr karo, jab woh apne ghar ke logon se alag ho kar ek purab ki jagah chali gayi.
19.17: Phir usne unse hijab le liya. Phir humne uske paas apna rooh bheja, to woh uske samne ek poore insani surat mein aaya.
19.18: Usne kaha: Main tujh se rehman ki panaah maangti hoon agar tu Allah se darne wala hai.
19.19: Usne kaha: Main to tere Rab ka farishta hoon, taake tujhe ek paak beta doon.
19.20: Usne kaha: Mera kaise beta hoga jabke mujhe kisi mard ne chhua bhi nahi, aur main badchalan bhi nahi hoon?
19.21: Usne kaha: Aisa hi hoga. Tera Rab kehta hai: Ye mere liye asaan hai, aur hum isse logon ke liye nishani aur apni rehmat banana chahte hain. Aur yeh ek tay kiya hua kaam hai.
19.22: Phir woh us bachche ke saath hamla bar-daar ho gayi, aur usse lekar ek door ki jagah chali gayi.
19.23: Phir dard-e-zah usay ek khajoor ke darakht ke neeche le aaya. Usne kaha: Kaash main is se pehle mar gayi hoti aur logon ke nazar se bilkul bhool jaati!
19.24: Phir usay neeche se awaaz aayi: Gham na kar! Tere Rab ne tere neeche ek chashma jari kar diya hai.
19.25: Aur tu is khajoor ke darakht ko apni taraf hilaa, tujh par taaza khajooren girengi.
19.26: To kha, pee aur aankh thandak pa. Aur agar tu kisi insan ko dekhe to keh dena: Main ne rehman ke liye roze ka nazar maana hai, to main kisi se baat nahi karoongi.
19.27: Phir woh us bachche ko lekar apni qaum ke paas aayi. Unhon ne kaha: Aey Maryam! Tu to ajib cheez le aayi hai.
19.28: Aey Haroon ki behan! Na tera baap koi bura aadmi tha, aur na teri maa koi badchalan thi.
19.29: Phir usne bachche ki taraf ishaara kiya. Unhon ne kaha: Hum ek bachche se kaise baat karein jo abhi goode mein hai?
19.30: Bachcha bola: Main Allah ka banda hoon. Usne mujhe kitaab di hai aur mujhe Nabi banaya hai.
19.31: Aur mujhe jahan bhi rahoon mubarak banaya, aur mujhe namaz aur zakat ka hukm diya jab tak main zinda hoon.
19.32: Aur mujhe apni maa ka farma bardar banaya, aur mujhe sarkash aur badnaseeb nahi banaya.
19.33: Aur salaam hai mujh par jis din main paida hua, jis din marunga, aur jis din zinda uthaya jaunga.
19.34: Yeh hai Isa ibne Maryam – haqq baat jismein log shak karte hain.
19.35: Allah ke liye yeh laayak nahi ke woh kisi ko beta banaye. Woh paak hai. Jab woh kisi kaam ka faisla karta hai to sirf keh deta hai: 'Ho ja' – to woh ho jaata hai.
19.36: Aur Isa ne kaha: Allah hi mera Rab aur tumhara Rab hai, to uski ibaadat karo. Yahi seedha raasta hai.
19.37: Phir unke darmiyan firqay pad gaye, to kafiron ke liye afsos hai ek bade din ke samne aane se.
19.38: Kitna ache se woh sunenge aur dekhenge us din jab woh hamare paas aayenge! Magar aaj woh zalim khuli gumraahi mein hain.
19.39: Aur unhein dara do us din se jab faisla kiya jaayega, jab woh gafil hain aur imaan nahi laate.
19.40: Beshak hum hi zameen ke waris hain aur uske upar walon ke bhi. Aur humari hi taraf sab lautaye jaayenge.
19.41: Aur is kitaab mein Ibrahim ka zikr karo. Beshak woh sachche aur Nabi the.
19.42: Jab unhon ne apne baap se kaha: Aey mere baap! Tu aise ko kyun poojhta hai jo na sunta hai, na dekhta hai, na hi tere kisi kaam aata hai?
19.43: Aey mere baap! Mere paas aisa ilm aaya hai jo tere paas nahi aaya, to tu meri pairwi kar, main tujhe seedha raasta dikhata hoon.
19.44: Aey mere baap! Shaitaan ki ibaadat na kar. Beshak shaitaan rehman ka nafarmaan hai.
19.45: Aey mere baap! Mujhe darr hai ke tu rehman ke azaab mein phans jaaye, to tu shaitaan ka saathi ban jaaye.
19.46: Usne kaha: Aey Ibrahim! Kya tu mere ilahon se munh modta hai? Agar tu baaz na aaya to main tujhe sangsaar kar dunga. Aur tu hamesha ke liye mujhse door ho ja.
19.47: Ibrahim ne kaha: Salam ho tujhe. Main tere liye apne Rab se maghfirat ki dua karoonga. Beshak woh mujh par nihayat meherbaan hai.
19.48: Aur main tumse aur Allah ke siwa jinhein tum poojhte ho unse alag hota hoon, aur main apne Rab se dua karta rahunga. Umeed hai ke main apne Rab se maayus na honga.
19.49: Phir jab woh unse aur unke maaboodon se alag ho gaya to humne usko Ishaaq aur Yaqub ata kiya, aur sabko Nabi banaya.
19.50: Aur humne unhein apni rehmat di, aur unka zikar-e-khair buland kiya.
19.51: Aur is kitaab mein Moosa ka bhi zikr karo. Beshak woh chune hue the, aur Rasool Nabi the.
19.52: Aur humne usse Toor ki daahni taraf se nida ki, aur usey apni khususi baat-cheet ke liye qareeb bulaya.
19.53: Aur humne usey apne bhai Haroon ko apna Nabi banakar ata kiya.
19.54: Aur is kitaab mein Ismaeel ka bhi zikr karo. Beshak woh waade ka saccha tha, aur Rasool Nabi tha.
19.55: Aur woh apne ghar walon ko namaz aur zakat ka hukm deta tha, aur apne Rab ke nazdeek maqbool tha.
19.56: Aur is kitaab mein Idrees ka bhi zikr karo. Beshak woh sachche Nabi the.
19.57: Aur humne unhein unchi jagah utha liya.
19.58: Yeh wahi log hain jinhein Allah ne niyamat di – Nabi banakar – Aadam ki aulad mein se, aur un logon mein se jinhein humne Nooh ke saath sawari di, aur Ibraheem aur Israel (Yaqub) ki nasl se, aur un mein se jinko humne hidayat di aur chuna. Jab unke saamne rehman ki aayatein padhi jaati hain, to woh sajda karte hue ro padte hain.
19.59: Phir unke baad aise naasalein aayi jo namaz ko zaya karne lage, aur khwahishat ke peechhe chale. To anqareeb woh gumraahi ka anjaam dekhenge.
19.60: Siwa un logon ke jo tauba kar lein, imaan laayein, aur neik amal karein. Yeh log jannat mein daakhil honge, aur un par zara bhi zulm na hoga.
19.61: Hamesha rahne wali jannatein, jin ka rehman ne apne bande se gayab mein waada kiya hai. Beshak uska waada poora hone wala hai.
19.62: Wahan woh koi fazool baat na sunenge, siwa salaam ke. Aur unke liye subah-shaam unka rizq hoga.
19.63: Yeh woh jannat hai jiska waris hum apne un bandon ko banayenge jo parhezgaar thay.
19.64: Aur (farishte keh karte hain:) Hum tumhare Rab ke hukm ke bagair nahi utarte. Uska hi hai jo hamare aage, peechhe aur darmiyan hai. Aur tera Rab bhoolne wala nahi.
19.65: Wahi hai aasmaanon aur zameen ka Rab, aur jo kuch unke darmiyan hai. To usi ki ibaadat kar, aur uski ibaadat mein sabr kar. Kya tum us ka koi hum-naam jaante ho?
19.66: Aur insaan kehta hai: Kya jab main mar gaya to kya zinda nikal laya jaunga?
19.67: Kya insaan yaad nahi karta ke humne usey pehle paida kiya, jab woh kuch bhi na tha?
19.68: Tere Rab ki qasam! Hum unhein aur shayateen ko zaroor jama karenge, phir unhein jahannum ke ird gird ghutno ke bal gira denge.
19.69: Phir hum har firqay mein se unhein nikaal lenge jo rehman ke mukhalif sabse zyada sarkash thay.
19.70: Aur hum un logon ko sabse behtar jaante hain jo usmein daakhil hone ke mustahiq hain.
19.71: Aur tum mein se koi bhi aisa nahi jo us par (jahannum ke kinare) se na guzre. Yeh tere Rab par lazmi faisla hai.
19.72: Phir hum parhezgaaron ko bacha lenge, aur zalimon ko usmein ghutno ke bal gira denge.
19.73: Aur jab unhein hamari khuli aayatein sunayi jaati hain to kaafir momino se kehte hain: Dono girohon mein kaun behtar jagah rakhta hai, aur kaun behtar majlis waala hai?
19.74: Aur kitni hi nasalein humne unse pehle halaak ki, jo maal-o-daulat aur zaahiri shaan mein inse zyada acchi thein!
19.75: Kaho: Jo gumraahi mein hai usey rehman dhilaai deta hai, yahan tak ke jab woh us cheez ko dekhen jiska unse waada kiya gaya hai – ya azaab ya qayamat – to us waqt unhein pata chal jaayega ke kis ka maqam bura hai, aur kis ka lashkar kamzor hai.
19.76: Aur Allah hidayat paane walon ki hidayat mein izafa karta hai. Aur baaqi rehne wali neikiyan tere Rab ke nazdeek sawab mein bhi behtar hain, aur anjaam mein bhi behtar.
19.77: Kya tu ne us shakhs ko dekha jo hamari aayaton ka inkaar karta hai, aur kehta hai: Mujhe maal-o-aulaad zaroor milegi?
19.78: Kya usne gayab dekh liya hai? Ya usne rehman se koi ahd le rakha hai?
19.79: Hargiz nahi! Hum zaroor uska likha likha karenge, aur uske azaab ko lamba karte chale jaayenge.
19.80: Aur jo kuch woh kehta hai, hum usey apne kabze mein le lenge, aur woh tanha hamare paas aayega.
19.81: Aur unhon ne Allah ke siwa aur maabood bana liye hain, taa ke woh unke liye izzat ka sabab ban jaayein.
19.82: Hargiz nahi! Woh to unki ibaadat ka inkaar karenge, aur unke mukhalif ban jaayenge.
19.83: Kya tu ne nahi dekha ke humne shayateen kaise kaafiron par chhod rakha hai ke woh unhein ubhaarte hain?
19.84: To tu unke liye jald azaab na maang. Hum unka hisaab poora kar rahe hain.
19.85: Jis din hum parhezgaaron ko rehman ke huzoor mehmaan banakar jama karenge,
19.86: Aur mujrim ko pyaase jahannum ki taraf haakenge.
19.87: Unhein kuch bhi shifa’at ka ikhtiyaar na hoga siwa us ke jisne rehman se ahd le rakha hai.
19.88: Aur unhon ne kaha ke rehman ne beta bana liya hai.
19.89: Beshak tum ne badi bhayanak baat ki hai.
19.90: Isse to aasman phat jaayein, aur zameen chaak ho jaaye, aur pahad toot kar gir jaayein,
19.91: Ke unhon ne rehman ke liye beta bana diya.
19.92: Rehman ke liye beta banana laayak nahi.
19.93: Zameen aur aasman mein jitne hain, sab rehman ke bande bankar hi aayenge.
19.94: Usne un sab ka shumar kar liya hai, aur unhein poori tarah gin rakha hai.
19.95: Aur un mein se har shakhs qayamat ke din uske paas tanha aayega.
19.96: Beshak jo log imaan laye aur neik amal kiye, rehman unke liye dilon mein mohabbat paida karega.
19.97: To humne is Qur’an ko teri zabaan mein asaan banaya taake tu us se parhezgaaron ko khushkhabri de aur jhagadalu qaum ko dara de.
19.98: Aur humne unse pehle kitni hi nasalein halaak ki. Kya tu unmein se kisi ko dekhta hai, ya unki halki si awaaz bhi sunta hai?

20.2: Humne tum par Qur’an is liye naazil nahi kiya ke tum museebat mein padh jao.
20.3: Magar ek naseehat ke taur par uske liye jo dar rakhta hai.
20.4: Yeh us Zaat ka nazil karda hai jisne zameen aur un buland aasmanon ko paida kiya.
20.5: Woh Rahman arsh par istawa farma gaya.
20.6: Usi ka hai jo kuch aasmanon mein hai aur jo kuch zameen mein, aur jo kuch in donon ke darmiyan hai, aur jo kuch zameen ke neeche hai.
20.7: Aur agar tum apni baat pukhta kar ke kaho (ya chup raho) to woh har raaz ko jaanta hai.
20.8: Allah! Usi ke siwa koi mabood nahi – uske hain behtareen naam.
20.9: Aur kya tumhein Musa ka waqiya pahuncha hai?
20.10: Jab usne ek aag dekhi aur apne ghar walon se kaha: Thehro! Maine ek aag dekhi hai – shayad main wahan se koi shola laaoon ya aag ke paas koi raasta paa loon.
20.11: Phir jab woh aag ke paas aaya to usay pukara gaya: Aey Musa!
20.12: Main hi hoon tumhara Rab – apne jootay utaar do – tum Tuwa ki muqaddas waadi mein ho.
20.13: Aur main ne tumhein chuna hai – to suno jo kuch wahee ki ja rahi hai.
20.14: Main Allah hoon – mere siwa koi mabood nahi – to meri ibaadat karo aur meri yaad ke liye namaz qayam karo.
20.15: Beshak qayamat aane wali hai – main use chhupa raha hoon taake har shakhs ko uske amal ka badla diya jaaye.
20.16: To koi shakhs tumhein usse roknay na paaye jo uspar imaan nahi rakhta aur apni khwahish ka pairo hai – warna tum tabah ho jaoge.
20.17: Aur aey Musa! Tumhare haath mein kya hai?
20.18: Usne kaha: Yeh meri laathi hai – main is par sahara leta hoon – aur is se apne janwaron ke liye pattiyan giraata hoon – aur is mein meri aur bhi zaruratein hain.
20.19: Allah ne farmaya: Aey Musa! Isay daal do.
20.20: To usne isay daala – to achanak woh ek saanp ban gayi jo daud raha tha.
20.21: Allah ne farmaya: Pakad lo use – aur daro nahi – hum usay phir usi surat mein le aayenge.
20.22: Aur apna haath apni baghal mein daalna – woh safed nikal aayega bina kisi takleef ke – yeh ek aur nishani hai.
20.23: Taake hum tumhein apni kuch badi nishaniyan dikhayein.
20.24: Fir’awn ke paas jao – usne hadd se zyada sarکashi ki hai.
20.25: Usne kaha: Aey mere Rab! Mera seena khol de.
20.26: Aur mera kaam mere liye aasan kar de.
20.27: Aur meri zubaan ki girah khol de.
20.28: Taake woh meri baat samajh saken.
20.29: Aur mere liye mere ghar walon mein se ek madadgaar muqarrar kar.
20.31: Us se meri kamar mazboot kar.
20.32: Aur usay mere kaam mein shareek kar.
20.33: Taake hum tera bohot zyada tasbeeh kar sakein.
20.34: Aur tujhe bohot yaad kar sakein.
20.35: Tu to hamesha humein dekhta hai.
20.36: Allah ne farmaya: Aey Musa! Tumhari sab duaen qubool ki gayi hain.
20.37: Aur beshak humne tum par ek aur baar bhi ehsaan kiya tha.
20.38: Jab humne tumhari maa ko wahi ki jo usay bataya gaya.
20.39: Ke use sandook mein daal do – phir usay dariya mein daal do – to dariya use kinare phenk dega – use uthaa lega mera dushman aur uska dushman – aur maine tum par apni muhabbat daal di – taake tum meri nazar ke samne palein.
20.40: Jab tumhari behan chali – to usne kaha: Kya main tumhein aisa shakhs bataoon jo uski dekh bhaal kare? – to humne tumhein tumhari maa ke paas lauta diya taake uski aankhein thandak paayein aur gham na kare – aur tumne ek shakhs ko qatl kar diya – to humne tumhein gham se nijaat di – aur tumhein aazmaya – phir tum kai saal Madayan mein rahe – phir aey Musa! Tum muqarrar waqt par aa gaye ho.
20.41: Aur maine tumhein apne liye chuna.
20.42: Jaao tum aur tumhara bhai mere nishanon ke saath – aur dono meri yaad mein susti na karna.
20.43: Fir’awn ke paas jao – usne hadd se zyada sarکashi ki hai.
20.44: Aur us se narmi se baat karo – shayad ke woh naseehat qabool kare ya dar jaaye.
20.45: Unhon ne kaha: Aey Rab! Humein dar hai ke woh hum par zulm kare ya hadd se guzar jaaye.
20.46: Allah ne farmaya: Daro mat – main tumhare saath hoon – sab sunta hoon aur dekhta hoon.
20.47: Jaao uske paas – aur kaho: Hum tere Rab ke bheje huye Rasool hain – to Bani Isra’il ko hamare saath bhej de – aur unhein azaab na de – hum tere paas ek nishani lekar aaye hain tere Rab ki taraf se – aur salaam ho us par jo hidayat ikhtiyar kare.
20.48: Beshak humein wahee ki gayi ke azaab hoga us par jo jhutlaye aur mooh moad le.
20.49: Usne kaha: Aey Musa! Kaun hai tumhara Rab?
20.50: Usne kaha: Hamara Rab woh hai jisne har cheez ko uski surat di – phir raasta dikhaya.
20.51: Usne kaha: To pehle naslon ka kya haal hai?
20.52: Usne kaha: Unka ilm mere Rab ke paas kitaab mein hai – mera Rab na bhoolta hai aur na ghalat karta hai.
20.53: Woh jisne tumhare liye zameen ko bichhaaya – aur usmein raaste banaye – aur asmaan se paani utaara – phir uske zariye humne har qisam ke jodon mein behtareen paude ugaaye.
20.54: Khao aur apne jaanwaron ko bhi charao – beshak ismein aqalmandon ke liye nishaniyan hain.
20.55: Usi zameen se humne tumhein paida kiya – aur usi mein tumhein wapas le jaayenge – aur usi se tumhein ek baar phir nikaalenge.
20.56: Aur beshak humne usay apni tamam nishaniyan dikhayi – to usne jhutlaya aur na maana.
20.57: Usne kaha: Kya tu hamare paas aaya hai taake tu humein hamare mulk se nikaal de apne jadoo ke zariye aey Musa?
20.58: To hum bhi tere muqable mein waisa hi jadoo le aayenge – to tu hamare darmiyan aur tere darmiyan ek waqf muqarrar kar de – na hum usay todhein aur na tu – aur woh barabar ki jagah ho.
20.59: Musa ne kaha: Tumhare liye Eid ka din tay hai – aur logon ka din chhutti ka ho – aur sab subah jama ho jaayein.
20.60: Phir Fir’awn ne wahan se palta – aur apne chhal ka saara bandobast kiya – phir aaya.
20.61: Musa ne unse kaha: Tumhaari barbaadi ho – Allah par jhoot na ghado warna woh tumhein kisi azaab se mita dega – beshak jhoot banane waale na kamyab honge.
20.62: To woh apne maamle mein baahmi bahas karne lagein – aur chhupi chhupi baatein karne lagein.
20.63: Un mein se kuch ne kaha: Yeh dono jaadu karne waale hain – yeh chahte hain ke tumhein tumhaare mulk se nikaal dein apne jadoo ke zariye – aur tumhaare behtareen tareeqe mita dein.
20.64: To tum apni chaal jama lo – phir qata’i taur par aao – aaj jo jeeta woh hi baazi le jaayega.
20.65: Unhon ne kaha: Aey Musa! Tum pehle daalo ya hum pehle daalen?
20.66: Musa ne kaha: Tumhi daalo – phir achanak unki rassiyan aur chhadiyaan unke jaadu ke zariye aise dikhne lagein jaise woh daud rahi hain.
20.67: To Musa ne apne dil mein khauf mehsoos kiya.
20.68: Humne kaha: Mat daro – beshak tum hi sabse oonche ho.
20.69: Aur jo kuch tumhaare haath mein hai usay daal do – woh un sab ko nigal jaayega jo unhon ne banaya hai – unhon ne sirf ek jaado ka chaal chal rakha hai – aur jaadoo karne waala jahaan bhi ho kabhi kaamyab nahi hota.
20.70: Phir jaado karne waale sajda mein gir gaye – unhon ne kaha: Hum Haroon aur Musa ke Rab par imaan laaye.
20.71: Fir’awn ne kaha: Kya tum us par imaan laaye ho pehle ke main tumhein ijaazat doon? Beshak woh tumhara bada hai jisne tumhein jaadoo sikhaya – to main zaroor tumhaare haath aur paon mukhalif taraf se kaat doonga – aur tumhein khajoor ke tanon par sooli par chadha doonga – aur tum jaan jaaoge ke hum mein se kis ka azaab zyada sakht hai aur zyada dair rehne waala.
20.72: Unhon ne kaha: Hum tumhein kabhi tarjeeh nahi denge un daleelon par jo humein mili hain – aur us Zaat par jisne humein paida kiya – to tu jo karne wala hai kar guzro – tu sirf is duniya ki zindagi mein hi faisla kar sakta hai.
20.73: Beshak hum apne Rab par imaan laaye – taake woh hamare gunaahon ko maaf kar de – aur us jaadoo ko bhi jo tu ne humein sikhaya – aur Allah hi behtareen hai aur baaqi rehne waala.
20.74: Beshak jo shakhs apne Rab ke paas mujrim ban kar aaya – to uske liye jahannum hai – na woh wahan marega aur na jiyega.
20.75: Aur jo uske paas momin ban kar aaya – aur usne neik amal kiya – to aise logon ke liye sabse unchi darajat hai.
20.76: Hamesha rehne ke baagh – jinke neeche nehrein beh rahi hain – yeh jaza hai unki jo paak safa rahe.
20.77: Aur humne Musa ko wahee ki: Mere bandon ko raaton raat nikal le jao – aur unke liye samandar mein ek khushk raasta bana do – na tumhein koi darr hoga aur na tumhein kisi ka khauf.
20.78: Phir Fir’awn ne unka peecha kiya apne lashkar ke saath – to samandar ne unhein dubo diya jaisa usne dhak diya tha.
20.79: Fir’awn ne apni qaum ko gumraahi mein daala – aur usne unhein hidayat nahi di.
20.80: Aey Bani Isra’il! Humne tumhein tumhare dushman se nijaat di – aur tumhein Toor ke daayein taraf bulaaya – aur humne tum par man o salwa utara.
20.81: Khao un achhi cheezon mein se jo humne tumhein di hain – aur usmein hadd se na badho warna tum par mera gazab toot padega – aur jis par mera gazab toot pada to woh tabah ho gaya.
20.82: Aur beshak main bohot bakhshne wala hoon us shakhs ke liye jo tauba kare – aur imaan laaye – aur neik amal kare – phir hamesha hidayat par qayam rahe.
20.83: Aur aey Musa! Tumhara apne logon se pehle aana kis wajah se hua?
20.84: Usne kaha: Woh mere peeche hain – aur main tere paas aaya hoon aey Rab! Taake tu razi ho jaaye.
20.85: Allah ne farmaya: To humne tumhaari qaum ko tumhaare baad aazmaya – aur unhein Samiri ne gumraah kar diya.
20.86: Phir Musa apni qaum ke paas gusse mein bhar kar aaya – aur kaha: Aey meri qaum! Kya tumhare Rab ne tumse ek accha waada nahi kiya tha? Kya tum par zyada waqt beet gaya – ya tumne chaha ke tum par mere Rab ka gazab toot pade – is liye tumne mujhse waada khilaafi ki?
20.87: Unhon ne kaha: Humne apni marzi se tumse waada khilaafi nahi ki – lekin hum par kuch logon ke zevar ka bojh tha – to humne use daal diya – aur isi tarah Samiri ne bhi daala.
20.88: Phir usne unke liye ek bachhra nikala – jis mein se ek aawaaz nikalti thi – to unhon ne kaha: Yeh tumhara mabood hai aur Musa ka bhi – lekin woh use bhool gaya.
20.89: Kya woh dekhte nahi the ke woh na unse koi baat karta hai aur na unke kisi nuqsaan ya faayde ka malik hai?
20.90: Aur beshak Haroon ne unhein is se pehle keh diya tha: Aey meri qaum! Tum is se sirf aazmaaye ja rahe ho – aur tumhara Rab to Rahman hai – to meri pairwi karo aur meri baat maano.
20.91: Unhon ne kaha: Hum is par lage rahenge jab tak Musa hamare paas na laut aaye.
20.92: (Musa ne) kaha: Aey Haroon! Jab tumne dekha ke woh gumraah ho rahe hain to tumhein kya roka?
20.93: Ke tum mere peechhe na aaye – kya tumne mere hukum ki nafarmaani ki?
20.94: Usne kaha: Aey mere maa baap ke betay! Meri daari aur sar na pakdo – mujhe darr tha ke tum kahoge ke tumne Bani Isra’il mein tafreeq daal di aur meri baat ka intezar nahi kiya.
20.95: (Musa ne) kaha: Aey Samiri! Tera kya maamla hai?
20.96: Usne kaha: Maine woh dekha jo unhon ne nahi dekha – to maine Rasool ke naqsh-e-qadam se ek muthi uthayi – phir maine use daal diya – aur mera dil mujhe yahi sujha raha tha.
20.97: Musa ne kaha: To chali ja – tujhe zindagi mein yahi kehna hoga ke koi mujhe haath na lagaye – aur tujhe ek waada hai jo tu se har haal mein poora hoga – aur apne is mabood ko dekho jise tu barso se poojhta raha – hum use zaroor jala kar raakh kar denge – phir use dariya mein bikhair denge.
20.98: Tumhara mabood to sirf Allah hai – uske siwa koi mabood nahi – uska ilm har cheez ko gheray huye hai.
20.99: Yeh sab kuch hum tumhein un waqiyaat mein se suna rahe hain jo guzar chuke – aur beshak humne tumhein apne paas se ek zikr (Qur’an) diya hai.
20.100: Jo is se munh moadta hai woh qayamat ke din ek bohot bhaari bojh uthaye ga.
20.101: Jismein woh hamesha rahenge – aur qayamat ke din woh unke liye bohot bura bojh hoga.
20.102: Jis din soor phoonka jaayega – to us din hum mujrimoon ko is tarah ikattha karenge ke unki aankhen neeli ho jaayengi.
20.103: Woh aapas mein chhupi baat karenge – tum sirf das din rahe.
20.104: Hum zyada behtar jaante hain jo woh kahenge – jab sabse zyada samajhdaar kahega: Tum sirf ek din rahe ho.
20.105: Aur tumse pahadon ke baare mein poochha jaayega – to kehna: Mera Rab unhein uraakar chhor dega.
20.106: Phir woh unhein ek chattaan sa banadega – na usmein koi tedhapan hoga aur na oonchaai.
20.107: Us din sab pukarne wale ki pukaar par chalein ge – jismein koi tedhapan nahi hoga – aur sab aawazon ko Rahman ke samne daba diya jaayega – aur tum sirf halki si aawaz sunoge.
20.108: Us din kisi ki sifarish kaam nahi aayegi siwa us ke jise Rahman ijazat dega – aur jiska qoul pasand karega.
20.109: Woh jaante hain jo kuch unke saamne hai aur jo peeche hai – aur log usay ilm mein nahi gher sakte.
20.110: Aur sab chehre zinda aur qayam rehne waale ke liye jhuk jaayenge – aur jinhon ne zulm kiya woh nakaam rahenge.
20.111: Aur jo koi neik amal kare aur momin ho – to usay na kisi zulm ka khauf hoga aur na kisi haq ki kami ka.
20.112: Aur is tarah humne isay Arabi Qur’an banakar nazil kiya – aur ismein tarah tarah ke waaeed bayan kiye – taake log dar jaayein ya unke liye yeh koi yaad bankar reh jaaye.
20.113: To Allah bahut ooncha hai – Haqeeqi Badshah – aur is Qur’an ke aane se pehle tum kisi aur halat mein thay – to kabhi bhi usay jaldi mein na sunna – jab tak uski wahee tum par mukammal na ho – aur kehna: Aey mere Rab! Mera ilm barha de.
20.114: Aur humne pehle hi Aadam se ehad liya – to woh bhool gaya – aur humne use irade mein mazboot na paaya.
20.115: Aur jab humne farishton se kaha: Aadam ko sajda karo – to un sab ne sajda kiya siwa Iblees ke – usne inkaar kiya.
20.116: To humne kaha: Aadam! Beshak yeh tumhara dushman hai tumhaare liye aur tumhaari biwi ke liye – to kahin yeh tumhein jannat se na nikaal de – warna tum mushakkat mein padh jaoge.
20.117: Yahan to tumhein na bhookh lagegi aur na nangaapan.
20.118: Aur na yahan tumhein pyas lagegi aur na dhup.
20.119: Phir shaitaan ne usay waswasa diya – aur kaha: Aey Aadam! Kya main tumhein hamesha rehne waale darakht aur la zawaal badshaahat na bataoon?
20.120: To dono ne us se kha liya – phir unke aurganoon par unki sharmgahain zaahir ho gayi – aur woh dono apne upar jannat ke patton ko chipkane lagein – aur Aadam ne apne Rab ki nafarmaani ki to bhatak gaya.
20.121: Phir uske Rab ne use chuna – aur uski tauba qabool ki – aur use hidaayat di.
20.122: Kaha: Utra jaao yahan se – tum sab ek doosre ke dushman hoge – phir agar mere paas se koi hidaayat tumhare paas aaye – to jo uski pairwi kare to woh na gumraah hoga aur na museebat mein padega.
20.123: Aur jo mere zikr se munh moade to uske liye tang zindagi hogi – aur hum usay qayamat ke din andha uthaayenge.
20.124: Woh kahega: Aey Rab! Tu ne mujhe andha kyun uthaya – jabke main to dekhta tha?
20.125: Allah farmayega: Isi tarah humari aayaat tumhare paas aayi – to tumne unhein bhula diya – isi tarah aaj tum bhool diye gaye ho.
20.126: Aur isi tarah hum hadd se guzarne waalon ko jaza dete hain – aur unhein aakhirat ka azaab hai jo zyada sakht aur zyada baaqi rehne waala hai.
20.127: Kya unhein yeh raah nahi dikhayi gayi ke hum unse pehle kitni qaumon ko halaak kar chuke hain – jinke gharon mein woh chalte hain – ismein yaqeenan aqalmandon ke liye nishaniyan hain.
20.128: Aur agar tere Rab se ek baat pehle na ho chuki hoti – aur ek muqarrar waqt na hota – to zaroor azaab aa chuka hota.
20.129: To unki baaton par sabr karo – aur apne Rab ki hamd ke saath uski tasbeeh karo suraj ke tuloo se pehle aur uske ghuroob se pehle – aur raat ke kuch hisson mein uski tasbeeh karo – aur din ke kinaaron mein bhi – taake tum razi ho jaao.
20.130: Aur apne Rab ki tasbeeh karo subah o shaam – aur raat ke kuch hisson mein bhi uski tasbeeh karo – aur din ke kuch hisse mein bhi – taake tum mutmaeen ho jaao.
20.131: Aur apni aankhein un cheezon ki taraf na badhao jinse humne kuch logon ko duniya ki zindagi ka zinnaat diya hai – taake unhein aazmaayen – aur tumhare Rab ka diya hua behtar hai aur zyada baaqi rehne waala hai.
20.132: Aur apne ghar walon ko namaz ka hukum do – aur khud bhi us par sabr se kaayam raho – hum tumse rozi nahi maangte – hum tumhein rozi dete hain – aur behtareen anjaam taqwa waalon ka hota hai.
20.133: Aur kehte hain: Koi nishani le aao apne Rab ki taraf se – kya unke paas woh saari roshan nishaniyan nahi aa chuki hain jo pehle sahifon mein likhi hui thi?
20.134: Agar hum unhein kisi azaab se pehle halaak kar dete to woh kehte: Aey hamare Rab! Tu ne humein koi Rasool kyun nahi bheja taake hum teri aayaton ka paalan karte aur momin ban jaate.
20.135: Keh do: Har shakhs intezaar mein hai – to tum bhi intezaar karo – phir tumhein maloom ho jaayega kaun seedhi raah par hai – aur kaun hidaayat paane waala hai.

21.1: Logon ke hisaab ka waqt qareeb aa gaya hai, aur woh gafil ho kar mooh mor rahe hain.
21.2: Unke Rab ki taraf se unke paas koi nayi naseehat nahi aati magar woh usay suntay hain mazaak udate hue.
21.3: Unke dil tafreeh mein lage hue hain. Aur zalim aapas mein chupke se keh rahe hain: Kya yeh shakhs tum jaisa hi bashar hai? Kya tum dekh kar jadoo mein phans jaoge?
21.4: Usne kaha: Mera Rab har baat ko jaanta hai jo aasman aur zameen mein hai. Aur woh sunne wala, jaane wala hai.
21.5: Balkeh unhon ne kaha: Yeh uljhe uljhe khwab hain. Balkeh usne isay ghadh liya hai. Balkeh woh ek shaayar hai. To chalo woh hamare paas koi nishani laaye jaise pehle wale Rasool bheje gaye thay.
21.6: Unse pehle kisi basti waalon ne jo humne halaak kiye, imaan nahi laya. To kya yeh log imaan layenge?
21.7: Aur humne tum se pehle sirf mardon ko hi Rasool banaya jinke paas hum wahee bhejte thay. To (aey logon) agar tum nahi jaante to ahl-e-zikr se poochh lo.
21.8: Aur humne unhein aisa jism nahi diya tha ke woh khana na khaate hon. Aur na woh hamesha ke liye rehne wale thay.
21.9: Phir humne un se apna waada poora kiya, to unhein bacha liya, aur jinhein hum chaahte thay, aur hadd se badhne walon ko halaak kar diya.
21.10: Beshak humne tumhari taraf ek kitaab nazil ki hai jismein tumhara zikr hai. Kya tum samajhte nahi ho?
21.11: Aur kitni hi aisi bastiyan humne tabaah ki jin ke log zalim thay, aur unke baad doosri qaum ko uthaya.
21.12: Phir jab unhon ne hamara azaab mehsoos kiya, to wahan se bhaagne lage.
21.13: Na bhaago, aur laut jao usi aasayish aur apne gharon ki taraf jismein tum rahe thay, taake tum se sawaal kiya jaaye.
21.14: Unhon ne kaha: Haye hamari barbaadi! Beshak hum zalim thay.
21.15: Aur yeh unki fariyad yun hi chalte rahi jab tak humne unhein katiya (bilkul khatam) kar diya.
21.16: Aur humne aasman aur zameen ko, aur jo kuch unke darmiyan hai, bina kisi maqsad ke nahi banaya.
21.17: Agar hum kisi tafreeh ka irada karte to usi ko apne paas se bana lete, agar humein karna hota.
21.18: Balkeh hum haqq ko baatil par phenk dete hain to woh uska sar kuchal deta hai. Aur woh mitt jaata hai. Aur tumhare liye afsos hai un baaton par jo tum banate ho.
21.19: Aur usi ka hai jo kuch aasmanon aur zameen mein hai. Aur jo us ke paas hain woh uski ibaadat se ghamzada nahi hote, aur na woh thakte hain.
21.20: Woh raat din uski tasbeeh karte hain, aur kabhi rukte nahi.
21.21: Kya unhon ne zameen mein se aise maabood bana liye hain jo (logon ko) zinda karte hain?
21.22: Agar aasman aur zameen mein Allah ke siwa aur maabood hote to zaroor dono tabaah ho jaate. Pas Allah, Arsh ka Rab, un baaton se paak hai jo woh kehte hain.
21.23: Woh apne kaam ke baare mein poocha nahi jaata, aur un se poocha jaata hai.
21.24: Kya unhon ne uske siwa maabood bana liye hain? Kaho: Apni daleel lao. Yeh mere saathiyon ki yaadgar hai, aur mujhse pehle ke logon ki yaadgar bhi. Balkeh unmein se aksar log haqq ko nahi jaante, is liye mooh mor lete hain.
21.25: Aur humne tumse pehle koi Rasool nahi bheja magar usi ki taraf wahee bheji ke mere siwa koi maabood nahi, pas meri ibaadat karo.
21.26: Aur unhon ne kaha: Rehman ne beta bana liya hai. Paak hai woh! Balkeh woh izzat wale bande hain.
21.27: Woh us se baat mein pehle nahi badhte, aur uske hukm par amal karte hain.
21.28: Woh jaanta hai jo kuch unke samne hai aur jo kuch unke peechhe hai, aur woh sifarish nahi karte siwa uske jise woh pasand karein. Aur woh uske khauf se dare rehte hain.
21.29: Aur jise woh kahe: Main Allah ke siwa maabood hoon – usse hum jahannum ka badla denge. Hum zalimon ko isi tarah saza dete hain.
21.30: Kya un logon ne nahi dekha ke aasman aur zameen ek saath band thay, to humne unhein khol diya? Aur humne paani se har zinda cheez paida ki. Kya phir bhi woh imaan nahi laate?
21.31: Aur humne zameen mein pahadon ko rakha taa ke woh unhein hilne na de, aur humne usmein chaurahe banaye taa ke woh raasta paa sakein.
21.32: Aur humne aasman ko mehfooz chhat banaya, lekin woh uski nishaniyon se mooh modte hain.
21.33: Aur wahi hai jisne raat aur din ko, aur sooraj aur chand ko banaya. Har ek apne apne falak mein tair raha hai.
21.34: Aur humne tumse pehle kisi insan ko hamesha ke liye zindagi nahi di. To agar tum mar jao to kya yeh log hamesha rahenge?
21.35: Har shakhs ko maut ka maza chakhna hai. Aur hum tumhein buraai aur bhalaai dono se aazmate hain. Aur tum hamari taraf hi lautaye jaoge.
21.36: Aur jab kaafir tumhein dekhte hain to tumhara mazaak banate hain ke: Kya yeh hai jo tumhare maaboodon ka zikr karta hai? Aur woh rehman ke zikr se inkaar karte hain.
21.37: Insaan jaldi mein bana hai. Main tumhein apni nishaniyan dikhaunga, to tum jaldi na machao.
21.38: Aur woh kehte hain: Kab poora hoga yeh waada agar tum sachche ho?
21.39: Kaash woh log jaan lete jab woh na to apne chehron se aag ko hata sakein ge, na apne peeth se, aur na unhein madad milegi.
21.40: Balkeh woh un par achanak aa padegi, aur unhein hairan kar degi. Na woh use taal sakein ge aur na unhein mohalat milegi.
21.41: Aur tumse pehle bhi Rasoolon ka mazaak udaya gaya. To jin logon ne unka mazaak udaya, unhein wahi cheez ghera jo woh mazaak udate thay.
21.42: Kaho: Raat aur din tumhein rehman se kaun bacha sakta hai? Balkeh woh apne Rab ke zikr se mooh mor rahe hain.
21.43: Kya unke kuch maabood hain jo humein chhuda lein? Woh to na apni madad kar sakein, na hamari mukhalafat kar sakein.
21.44: Balkeh humne unhein aur unke baap dada ko lutf uthane diya yahan tak ke unki umr lambi ho gayi. Kya woh nahi dekhte ke hum zameen ko uske kinare se kam kar rahe hain? To kya woh ghalib aayenge?
21.45: Kaho: Main to sirf tumhein wahee ke zariye daraata hoon. Lekin bahre sunte nahi pukar ko jab unhein daraaya jaata hai.
21.46: Aur agar unhein tere Rab ke azaab ka jhoka bhi lag jaaye to zaroor kahenge: Haye hamari tabahi! Beshak hum zalim thay.
21.47: Aur hum qayamat ke din theek theek tolne wale tarazoo lagaayenge. To kisi par zara bhi zulm na hoga. Aur agar raaee ke dana barabar bhi koi cheez hogi to hum usey le aayenge. Aur hum kaafi hain hisaab lene ke liye.
21.48: Aur beshak humne Moosa aur Haroon ko Furqan diya – roshni aur parhezgaaron ke liye naseehat.
21.49: Jo apne Rab se baghair dekhe darte hain, aur jo qayamat se ghabrate hain.
21.50: Aur yeh ek mubarak naseehat hai jo humne naazil ki. To kya tum isay nahi maante?
21.51: Aur beshak humne Ibrahim ko uski hidayat pehle hi de di thi, aur hum usay jaante thay.
21.52: Jab usne apne baap aur qaum se kaha: Yeh kya hain jinki tum pooja karte ho?
21.53: Unhon ne kaha: Humne apne baap dada ko inhi ki ibaadat karte paaya hai.
21.54: Usne kaha: Tum aur tumhare baap dada khuli gumraahi mein ho.
21.55: Unhon ne kaha: Kya tu hamare paas haqq laya hai, ya tu mazaak karta hai?
21.56: Usne kaha: Balkeh tumhara Rab aasmanon aur zameen ka Rab hai jo unhein paida karne wala hai, aur main usi ka gawaah hoon.
21.57: Aur Allah ki qasam main tumhare buton ka ek chaal se zaroor kuch karunga jab tum mooh mod ke chale jaoge.
21.58: To usne unhein tukde tukde kar diya siwa ek bade ke, taa ke woh uski taraf rujoo karein.
21.59: Unhon ne kaha: Hamare maaboodon ka yeh haal kisne kiya? Beshak woh zalimon mein se hai.
21.60: Unhon ne kaha: Humne ek naujawaan ko suna jo unka zikr bura tareeqe se karta tha. Uska naam Ibrahim hai.
21.61: Unhon ne kaha: Usay logon ke saamne le aao taa ke log gawahi dein.
21.62: Unhon ne kaha: Kya tu ne hamare maaboodon ke saath yeh kiya hai, Aey Ibrahim?
21.63: Usne kaha: Balkeh yeh kaam unke is bade ne kiya hoga. Tumhi unse poochh lo agar woh bolte hain.
21.64: Phir woh apne dil ki taraf mutawajeh huye aur kehne lage: Beshak tumhi zalim ho.
21.65: Phir unka sir ulat gaya (aur kehne lage): Tu jaanta hai yeh bolte nahi.
21.66: Usne kaha: To kya tum Allah ke siwa un cheezon ki ibaadat karte ho jo na tumhein nafa deti hain na nuqsan?
21.67: Tch tch tum par aur un cheezon par jinki tum Allah ke siwa ibaadat karte ho! Kya tum samajhte nahi?
21.68: Unhon ne kaha: Use jala do, aur apne maaboodon ki madad karo agar tumhe kuch karna hi hai.
21.69: Humne kaha: Aey aag! Ibrahim par thandi aur salamati wali ho ja.
21.70: Aur unhon ne uske saath bura chaala chala, to humne unhein sabse zyada nuksan uthane wala bana diya.
21.71: Aur hum usko aur Lut ko bacha kar us zameen mein le aaye jismein humne sab jahon ke liye barakat rakh di thi.
21.72: Aur humne usay Ishaaq diya, aur Ishaaq ko Yaqub diya, aur sab ko neik banaya.
21.73: Aur humne unhein imam banaya jo hamare hukm se hidayat dete thay, aur humne unhein neik amal, namaz aur zakat ka hukm diya, aur woh hamare ibaadat guzaar thay.
21.74: Aur Lut ko humne hikmat aur ilm diya, aur use us basti se bacha liya jo badkari karti thi. Beshak woh bure, fasiq log thay.
21.75: Aur humne use apni rehmat mein daakhil kiya. Beshak woh neik logon mein se tha.
21.76: Aur Nooh ko yaad karo jab usne pehle hi humein pukara, to humne uski dua qubool ki aur usay aur uske ghar walon ko bade gham se bacha liya.
21.77: Aur un logon ke mukhalif se uski madad ki jo hamari aayaton ko jhutlate thay. Beshak woh bure log thay, to humne un sab ko dooba diya.
21.78: Aur Dawood aur Sulaiman ko yaad karo, jab woh kheti ke baare mein faisla kar rahe thay, jab logon ki bakriyan raat mein usmein chali gayi thein, aur hum unke faislay ko dekh rahe thay.
21.79: To humne faisla Sulaiman ko samjha diya, aur dono ko hikmat aur ilm diya tha. Aur humne pahadon ko uske saath tasbeeh mein musakkhar kiya tha, aur parindon ko bhi. Aur hum hi karne wale thay.
21.80: Aur humne usay tumhare liye jaame banane ka hunar sikhaya taa ke tumhein jang mein bachaye. To kya tum shukar guzaar ho?
21.81: Aur Sulaiman ke liye humne tez hawa ko musakkhar kar diya jo uske hukm se us zameen ki taraf chalti thi jismein humne barakat rakhi thi. Aur hum har cheez ko jaante hain.
21.82: Aur kuch shayateen uske liye kaam karte thay – ghota lagate thay, aur uske siwa doosre kaam bhi. Aur hum unke nigehbaan thay.
21.83: Aur Ayub ko yaad karo jab usne apne Rab ko pukara: Mujhe takleef pahunchee hai, aur tu sabse zyada rahm karne wala hai.
21.84: To humne uski dua qubool ki, aur jo museebat usay thi use door kar diya, aur usay uske ghar wale wapas diye, aur unke saath unke jese aur bhi, apni taraf se rehmat ke taur par, aur ibaadat guzaaron ke liye naseehat ke liye.
21.85: Aur Ismail, Idrees aur Zul-Kifl ko bhi yaad karo, sab sabr karne walon mein se thay.
21.86: Aur humne unhein apni rehmat mein daakhil kiya. Beshak woh neik logon mein se thay.
21.87: Aur Zun-Noon (Yunus) ko yaad karo jab woh ghusse mein chala gaya, samjha ke hum uspar tangi na karenge. Phir usne andheron mein pukara: Tere siwa koi maabood nahi. Tu paak hai, beshak main zalimon mein se tha.
21.88: To humne uski dua qubool ki, aur use gham se bacha liya. Aur isi tarah hum mo’mineen ko bacha lete hain.
21.89: Aur Zakariya ko yaad karo jab usne apne Rab ko pukara: Aey mere Rab! Mujhe akela na chhod, aur tu sab warison se behtar hai.
21.90: To humne uski dua qubool ki, aur usay Yahya ata kiya, aur uski biwi ko uske liye laayak banaya. Beshak woh naiki mein jaldbaazi karte thay, aur humein ummeed aur khauf ke saath pukarte thay, aur woh hamare samne khushu karne wale thay.
21.91: Aur us (Maryam) ko yaad karo jisne apni paak daaman ko mehfooz rakha. Phir humne usmein apni rooh phoonki, aur usay aur uske bete ko jahon ke liye nishani banaya.
21.92: Beshak yeh tumhari ummat ek hi ummat hai, aur main tumhara Rab hoon. To meri ibaadat karo.
21.93: Magar unhon ne apne deen ko tukdon mein baant diya. Har firqa apne paas wali baat par khush hai.
21.94: To jo koi neik amal karega, aur woh momin bhi hoga, to uski mehnat ka inkar na kiya jaayega. Beshak hum uske liye likhne wale hain.
21.95: Aur jis basti ko humne halaak kiya us par ye haram hai ke woh laut aayein.
21.96: Yahan tak ke jab Yajooj Majooj khol diye jaayenge, aur woh har oonche se tezi se niche aa jaayenge.
21.97: Aur haq waada qareeb aa jaayega. To achanak un logon ki aankhen phat jaayengi jinhon ne kufr kiya: Haye hamari tabahi! Hum to is se gafil thay. Balkeh hum hi zalim thay.
21.98: Beshak tum aur woh jinhein tum Allah ke siwa poojhte ho, jahannum ke indhan ho. Tum us mein daakhil hone wale ho.
21.99: Agar yeh maabood hote to is mein na aate. Aur sab us mein hamesha rahenge.
21.100: Unke liye wahan cheekh pukar hogi, aur woh us mein kuch nahi sunenge.
21.101: Beshak jinhon ne hamari taraf se achhi jagah paa li, woh us se door rakkhe jaayenge.
21.102: Woh uski sarsaraahat bhi na sunenge, aur woh hamesha apni manpasand cheezon mein rahenge.
21.103: Unhein us sabse badi dehshat ghamgeen na karegi, aur farishte unka istakbaal karenge ke: Yeh tumhara woh din hai jo tumse waada kiya gaya tha.
21.104: Jis din hum aasman ko is tarah lapet denge jaise kitaabon ka safha lapeta jaata hai. Jis tarah humne pehle takhleeq ki shuruat ki thi, usi tarah phir paida karenge – yeh hum par ek waada hai. Hum isay zaroor poora karne wale hain.
21.105: Aur beshak humne Zaboor mein naseehat ke baad likha ke zameen ke waris mere neik banday honge.
21.106: Is mein yaqeenan ibadat guzaaron ke liye paighaam hai.
21.107: Aur (Aey Nabi!) Humne tumhein tamam jahon ke liye rehmat banakar bheja hai.
21.108: Kaho: Mujh par wahi ki jaati hai ke tumhara maabood ek hi maabood hai. To kya tum farma bardari ikhtiyar karte ho?
21.109: Agar woh mooh mod lein to keh do: Main tum sabko barabar aghaah kar chuka hoon. Aur mujhe nahi maloom ke qareeb hai ya door, woh cheez jiska tumse waada kiya gaya hai.
21.110: Beshak woh un baaton ko jaanta hai jo unchi kahi jaati hain, aur woh bhi jo tum chhupa kar rakhte ho.
21.111: Aur mujhe nahi maloom – shayad yeh tumhare liye aazmaish ho, aur kuch der tak zindagi ka lutf uthana ho.
21.112: Rasool ne kaha: Aey mere Rab! Haq ke saath faisla kar de. Aur hamara Rab – Rehman – un baaton ke muqable mein madad mangne layak hai jo tum bayaan karte ho.

22.1: Logon! Apne Rab se daro – beshak qayamat ka zalzala badi khaufnaak cheez hai.
22.2: Jis din tum use dekho ge – har doodh pilane wali apne doodh pilane wale bachche ko bhool jaayegi – aur har haamila apne haaml ko gira degi – aur tum logon ko madhosh dekhoge – haalanki woh madhosh nahi honge – magar Allah ka azaab bohot sakht hai.
22.3: Kuch log aise hain jo Allah ke baare mein bina ilm ke jhagadte hain – aur har shaitaan sarkash ki pairwi karte hain.
22.4: Jis ke baare mein likh diya gaya hai ke jo uska saathi banega to woh usko gumraah kar dega – aur usay dozakh ka azaab chakhayega.
22.5: Aey logon! Agar tum kisi shakk mein ho ke hum tumhein dobara zinda karein ge – to socho ke humne tumhein mitti se paida kiya – phir nutfa se – phir khoon ke lohtay se – phir gosht ke ek takray se – jo mukammal bhi hota hai aur na mukammal bhi – taake hum tum par apni qudrat zaahir karein – aur hum jo chaahte hain ek muqarrar muddat tak bacho’n ke paida hone tak bachaate hain – phir tumhein bachpan se bada karte hain – kuch tum mein se jawani tak pahunche hain – aur kuch mar jaate hain – aur tum mein se kuch aise hain jo zillat ki umar tak lauta diye jaate hain taake sab kuch jaankar hone ke baad kuch bhi na jaanein – aur tum zameen ko sukhi dekhtay ho – phir jab hum us par pani barsaate hain to woh lehrati aur ubharti hai – aur har qisam ke khushnuma pauday uga deti hai.
22.6: Yeh is liye ke Allah hi haqq hai – aur wahi murdon ko zinda karta hai – aur woh har cheez par qudrat rakhta hai.
22.7: Aur beshak qayamat aane waali hai – isme koi shakk nahi – aur Allah unhein zinda karega jo qabron mein hain.
22.8: Aur kuch log aise hain jo Allah ke baare mein bina kisi ilm, hidayat, aur roshan kitaab ke jhagadte hain.
22.9: Woh takabbur se gardan taan kar (haq se) hat jaate hain taake logon ko Allah ke raaste se bhatkaayein – uske liye duniya mein ruswaai hai – aur hum qayamat ke din usay jhulas dene wale azaab ka maza chakhayenge.
22.10: Yehi hai jo tere dono haathon ne aage bheja – aur beshak Allah apne bandon par zulm nahi karta.
22.11: Aur kuch log aise hain jo Allah ki ibaadat sirf ek kinare se karte hain – agar unhein koi bhalai milti hai to mutmaeen ho jaate hain – aur agar un par koi aazmaish aati hai to mooh pher kar palat jaate hain – unka nuksaan duniya aur aakhirat mein hota hai – yehi khula ghaata hai.
22.12: Woh Allah ke siwa aise ko pukarte hain jo na unhein nuqsaan pahuncha sakta hai na faida – yeh hi dur bhatkanay wali gumraahi hai.
22.13: Woh aise ko pukarte hain jis ka nuqsaan uske faide se zyada qareeb hai – kya hi bura hai yeh sarparast – aur kya hi bura hai yeh saathi.
22.14: Beshak Allah un logon ko jo imaan laaye aur neik amal kiye unhein aise baaghon mein daakhil karega jinke neeche nehrein beh rahi hongi – beshak Allah jo chahta hai karta hai.
22.15: Jo shaks samajhta hai ke Allah uski duniya aur aakhirat mein madad nahi karega to usay chahiye ke woh asmaan tak koi rassi taan le – phir usay kaat de – phir dekhe ke kya uski chaal usay wo cheez door karne mein kaamyaab karti hai jo use gussa dilati hai.
22.16: Aur isi tarah humne ise roshan nishaniyon ke taur par nazil kiya – aur beshak Allah jise chahta hai hidaayat deta hai.
22.17: Beshak jo log imaan laaye, aur jo Yahudi hain, aur Sabi’een, aur Nasara, aur Majusi, aur jin logon ne shirk kiya – Allah un sab ke darmiyan qayamat ke din faisla karega – beshak Allah har cheez par gawah hai.
22.18: Kya tum dekhte nahi ke jo koi asmaanon aur zameen mein hai – aur suraj, chand, sitare, pahaad, darakht, jaanwar aur bohot se log Allah ke aage sajda karte hain – aur bohot se log aise hain jinke liye azaab tay ho chuka hai – aur jise Allah zillat de to use koi izzat dene wala nahi – beshak Allah jo chahta hai karta hai.
22.19: Yeh do jhagadne wale log hain jo apne Rab ke baare mein jhagad rahe hain – to jin logon ne kufr ikhtiyar kiya unke liye aag ke kapde kaate jaayenge – unke saron par khaulta hua paani ubala jaayega.
22.20: Jisse unke paiton ke andar ka sab kuch aur unki jildein gal jaayengi.
22.21: Aur unke liye lohay ke gurz (hathode) honge.
22.22: Jab bhi woh us mein se nikalne ki koshish karenge – us gham se – to us mein lauta diye jaayenge – aur kaha jaayega: Chakho aag ka azaab.
22.23: Beshak jo log imaan laaye aur neik amal kiye – unhein aise baaghon mein daakhil kiya jaayega jinke neeche nehrein beh rahi hongi – unhein wahan sunehri kangano’n se aaraasta kiya jaayega – aur woh resham ke sabz aur surkh libaas pehnenge – aur wahan takiya laga kar baithe honge – kya hi behtareen badla – aur kya hi behtareen rahne ki jagah!
22.24: Aur unhein paak zubaan ki hidaayat di gayi – aur unhein tareef ke laayak Raste ki taraf hidaayat di gayi.
22.25: Beshak jin logon ne kufr ikhtiyar kiya – aur logon ko Allah ke raaste se aur Masjid-e-Haraam se roka – jise humne sab logon ke liye banaya hai – jo wahan rehta hai aur jo wahan se guzarta hai – aur jo us mein nafrat ke saath zulm ka iraada karega usay hum dardnaak azaab ka maza chakhayenge.
22.26: Aur jab humne Ibrahim ke liye ghar (Kaabah) ki jagah tay ki to kaha: Mere saath kisi ko shareek na bana – aur mere ghar ko paak rakh – un logon ke liye jo tawaf karte hain, qayam karte hain, rukoo aur sajda karte hain.
22.27: Aur logon mein hajj ka elan karo – woh tumhare paas paidal aur har dubli oontni par aayenge – jo door ke raaston se aati hai.
22.28: Taake woh apne faide dekhein – aur Allah ke naam ka zikr karein un muqarrar dino mein – jo jaanwar usne unhein diye – to us mein se khud bhi khao aur tang haal faqeer ko bhi khilao.
22.29: Phir woh apni gandagi door karein – aur apni mannat poori karein – aur purane ghar ka tawaf karein.
22.30: Yeh hai (hukm) – aur jo shakhs Allah ke haraam ki hurmaton ka adab kare to yeh uske Rab ke paas behtari hai – aur tumhare liye jaanwaron mein faida hai – ek muqarrar muddat tak – phir unka qurbani ka maqam purana ghar hai.
22.31: Aur har haal mein Allah ke liye khaalis hokar – uske saath kisi ko shareek na banate hue – aur jisne Allah ke saath shirk kiya uski misaal us shakhs ki hai jo aasmaan se gir gaya – to use ya to parinday choong gaye – ya hawa use kisi door jagah mein uda le gayi.
22.32: Aur jo shakhs Allah ke nishanon ka adab kare to yeh dilon ke taqwe ka nateeja hai.
22.33: Tumhare liye us mein ek muqarrar waqt tak faida hai – phir unka qurbani ka maqam purana ghar hai.
22.34: Aur har ummat ke liye humne qurbani ka tareeqa muqarrar kiya taake woh Allah ka naam lein us par jo usne unhein diya – qurbani ke jaanwaron mein se – to tumhara mabood ek hi mabood hai – to usi ke liye khaalis ho jao – aur mutii (farmaabardaar) logon ko khush khabri de do.
22.35: Woh log jinka dil Allah ke zikr se kaamp uthta hai – aur jo museebat mein sabr karte hain – aur namaz qayam rakhte hain – aur humne unhein jo diya us mein se kharch karte hain.
22.36: Aur humne tumhare liye oonton ko bhi Allah ki nishaniyon mein se bana diya – tumhare liye usmein bhalai hai – to unhein khada karke Allah ka naam lo un par – phir jab woh gir jaayein (qurbani ke baad) to usmein se khud bhi khao aur qanaat-pasand aur mangne wale ko bhi khilao – aise hi hum unhein tumhare liye musakkhar karte hain – taake tum shukar ada karo.
22.37: Allah tak na to unka gosht pahunchega na unka khoon – lekin us tak tumhara taqwa pahunchega – isi tarah usne unhein tumhare liye musakkhar kar diya – taake tum Allah ki badi baat kiya karo is par ke usne tumhein hidaayat di – aur neik amal karne waalon ko khush khabri de do.
22.38: Beshak Allah un logon se dafa karta hai jo imaan laaye – beshak Allah kisi kha’in aur na shukar karne wale ko pasand nahi karta.
22.39: Un logon ko ijazat di gayi hai (ladne ki) jin par zulm kiya gaya – aur beshak Allah unki madad karne par zaroor qadir hai.
22.40: Woh log jinhein beja unke gharon se nikaala gaya – sirf is wajah se ke woh kehte the: Hamara Rab Allah hai – aur agar Allah logon ke ek hisson ko doosre hisson ke zariye na hataata to zaroor girjey, mandir, sinagog aur masjidein gira di jaatein jahan Allah ka naam bohot zyada liya jaata hai – aur Allah zaroor un logon ki madad karega jo uski madad karte hain – beshak Allah zaroorat se zyada quwwat wala, zabardast hai.
