22.41: Yeh woh log hain – agar hum unhein zameen mein ikhtiyaar dein to woh namaz qayam rakhte hain, zakat dete hain, neiki ka hukum dete hain aur burai se rokte hain – aur sab ka anjaam Allah ke haath mein hai.
22.42: Aur agar yeh log tumhein jhutlaate hain to in se pehle Nooh ki qaum, Aad, aur Samood bhi jhutlaa chuke hain.
22.43: Aur Ibrahim ki qaum, Lut ki qaum bhi.
22.44: Aur Madyan ke log bhi – aur Musa bhi jhutlaaye gaye – to maine kafiron ko dheel di – phir unhein pakad liya – to kaisi thi meri saza?
22.45: Kitni hi bastiyan humne halaak ki – jabke woh zulm kar rahi thi – to ab woh apni chaton par ulti padhi hain – aur kitne kuan aur unchi imaaratein chor gayi hain.
22.46: Kya unhein zameen mein chalne ki soch nahi hui taake unke dil samajh sakein ya kaan sun sakein? To baat yeh hai ke unki aankhen andhi nahi hoti – lekin unke dil andhe ho jaate hain jo seene mein hote hain.
22.47: Aur woh tumse azaab jaldi lane ki darkhwast karte hain – aur Allah apne waade mein harگز khalaf nahi karta – aur beshak tumhare Rab ke paas ek din tumhare ginte ke hazaar saal ke barabar hai.
22.48: Aur kitni hi bastiyon ko maine dheel di – haalanki woh zalim thi – phir maine unhein pakad liya – aur unka palatna meri hi taraf hai.
22.49: Keh do: Aey logon! Main to tumhein sirf saaf saaf khabardar karne wala hoon.
22.50: To jo log imaan laaye aur neik amal kiye – unke liye bakhshish hai aur izzat bhara rizq.
22.51: Aur jo log hamari aayaton ko naa manney wale hain – woh jahannum ke saabit rahne waale hain.
22.52: Aur humne tumse pehle koi Rasool ya Nabi nahi bheja magar yeh ke jab usne kuch khwaahish ki to shaitaan ne uski khwahish mein kuch mila diya – to Allah shaitaan ki daal ko mita deta hai – phir Allah apni aayatein mazboot kar deta hai – aur Allah sab kuch jaane wala, hikmat wala hai.
22.53: Taake woh shaitaan ki daal ko un logon ke liye fitna banaye jinke dil mein marz hai – aur jin ke dil sakht hain – aur beshak zalim log door ki gumraahi mein pad gaye hain.
22.54: Aur taake woh log jinko ilm diya gaya hai jaanein ke yeh haq hai tumhare Rab ki taraf se – aur woh us par imaan laayein – aur unke dil uske liye jhuk jaayein – aur beshak Allah imaan laane walon ko seedhe raaste ki hidaayat deta hai.
22.55: Aur woh log jinhein kufr ne ghira hua hai – woh us mein shak karte rahenge yahan tak ke un par achanak qayamat aa jaaye – ya kisi nafrat bhare din ka azaab un par aa jaaye.
22.56: Us din badshahat Allah ki hogi – woh unke darmiyan faisla karega – to jo log imaan laaye aur neik amal kiye woh ne’maton waali jannaton mein honge.
22.57: Aur jinhon ne kufr kiya aur hamari aayatein jhutlaayi – to unke liye zaleel karne wala azaab hoga.
22.58: Aur jo log Allah ke raaste mein hijrat karein – phir qatal kar diye gaye ya mar gaye – to Allah unhein behtareen rozi dega – aur beshak Allah behtareen rozi dene wala hai.
22.59: Woh unhein aise maqam mein daakhil karega jise woh pasand karenge – aur beshak Allah sab kuch jaane wala, haleem hai.
22.60: Yeh (saza) hai – aur jo kisi ke saath utna hi bartao kare jitna us ke saath kiya gaya ho – phir us par zyadati ki jaaye – to Allah zaroor uski madad karega – beshak Allah maaf karne wala, bakhshne wala hai.
22.61: Yeh is liye ke Allah raat ko din mein daakhil karta hai aur din ko raat mein – aur beshak Allah sab kuch sunne wala, dekhne wala hai.
22.62: Yeh is liye ke Allah hi haq hai – aur woh jise tum uske siwa pukarte ho baatil hai – aur beshak Allah hi sabse ooncha, sabse bada hai.
22.63: Kya tum dekhte nahi ke Allah aasman se paani barsata hai – to zameen hara bhara ho jaata hai? Beshak Allah lateef hai, khabar rakhne wala hai.
22.64: Usi ka hai jo kuch aasmanon mein hai aur jo kuch zameen mein hai – aur beshak Allah hi be-niyaz, hamd ke laayak hai.
22.65: Kya tum dekhte nahi ke Allah ne tumhare liye zameen ko musakkhar kar diya – taake tum us ke raaston mein chalo – aur us ka diya hua rizq khao? Aur usi ki taraf tumhein uthna hai.
22.66: Aur wahi hai jo tumhein zindagi deta hai – phir tumhein maut deta hai – phir wahi tumhein zinda karega – beshak insaan bohot hi na-shukar hai.
22.67: Har ummat ke liye humne kuch ibadat ke tareeqe muqarrar kiye hain – jin par woh amal karte hain – to tum un mein kisi se jhagra na karo – aur apne Rab ki taraf bulao – beshak tum seedhi raah par ho.
22.68: Aur agar woh tumse jhagad karein to keh do: Allah jaanta hai jo tum karte ho.
22.69: Allah tumhare darmiyan qayamat ke din faisla karega jismein tum ikhtilaaf karte the.
22.70: Kya tum nahi jaante ke Allah har cheez ko jaanta hai jo aasman aur zameen mein hai? Yeh sab kuch ek kitaab mein hai – aur yeh Allah ke liye asaan hai.
22.71: Aur woh Allah ko chhor kar aise ko poojhte hain jiske liye Allah ne koi sanad (daleel) nahi utaari – aur na hi unke paas ilm hai – aur zalimon ke liye koi madadgaar nahi.
22.72: Aur jab unke saamne hamari roshan aayatein padhkar sunayi jaati hain to tum kafiron ke chehron mein inkaar dekhte ho – woh qareeb hote hain ke un par toot padein jo unhein hamari aayatein suna rahe hote hain – keh do: Kya main tumhein bataoon ke is se bhi badtar cheez kya hai? Woh aag hai – jise Allah ne un logon ke liye tayyar kiya hai jo kufr karte hain – aur woh kya hi bura anjaam hai!
22.73: Aey logon! Ek misaal di jaati hai – use dhyan se suno – jinhein tum Allah ke siwa pukarte ho woh sab milkar bhi ek makkhi nahi bana sakte – agar makkhi unse kuch cheen le to woh usse chhuda nahi sakte – talib bhi kamzor hai aur matloob bhi.
22.74: Un logon ne Allah ki qadr nahi ki jaise uski qadr karni chahiye – beshak Allah qawi hai, zabardast hai.
22.75: Allah farishton mein se paighambaron ko chunta hai – aur insano mein se bhi – beshak Allah sab kuch sunne wala, dekhne wala hai.
22.76: Woh jaanta hai jo kuch unke aage hai aur jo kuch unke peeche – aur saare kaam Allah hi ki taraf palataye jaate hain.
22.77: Aey logon jo imaan laye! Ruko, sajda karo, apne Rab ki ibaadat karo, aur neik amal karo – taake tum kamiyab ho jao.
22.78: Aur Allah ke liye aise jihad karo jaise uske jihad ka haqq hai – usi ne tumhein chuna hai – aur deen mein tum par koi tangi nahi rakhi – tumhare baap Ibrahim ka tareeqa – usi (Allah) ne pehle tumhara naam Muslim rakha – aur is Qur’an mein bhi – taake Rasool tum par gawah banein – aur tum logon par gawah bano – to namaz qayam rakho, zakat do, aur Allah ko mazbooti se thaam lo – wahi tumhara maula hai – behtareen maula aur behtareen madadgaar hai.

23.2: Jo apni namazon mein khushu ikhtiyar karte hain.
23.3: Aur jo lagv (fuzool baaton) se mooh modte hain.
23.4: Aur jo zakat ada karte hain.
23.5: Aur jo apni sharamgaahon ki hifazat karte hain.
23.6: Siwa apni biwiyon ya un (laundiyon) ke jo unki milk mein ho, to un par malamat nahi.
23.7: Phir jo iske siwa kuch aur chahe, to aise log had se badhne wale hain.
23.8: Aur jo apni amanaton aur apne ahadon ka khayal rakhte hain.
23.9: Aur jo apni namazon ki pabandi karte hain.
23.11: Jo Firdous ke waris honge, jahan woh hamesha rahenge.
23.12: Aur beshak humne insan ko mitti ke nچore se paida kiya.
23.13: Phir humne usay ek qatray ki surat mein ek mehfooz jaga mein rakha.
23.14: Phir humne qatre ko alaqua banaya, phir alaqua ko gosht ka lothra banaya, phir lothray ko haddiyan banaya, phir haddiyon par gosht chadhaya, phir humne usay ek aur makhlooq bana diya. To bahut hi ba-barkat hai Allah, sab banane walon se behtareen.
23.15: Phir beshak tum uske baad zaroor marne wale ho.
23.16: Phir qayamat ke din tum zaroor uthaye jaoge.
23.17: Aur beshak humne tumhare upar saat aasman banaye, aur hum makhlooq se bekhabar nahi.
23.18: Aur humne aasman se paani barsaya ek muqarrar miqdaar mein, phir usay zameen mein utara, aur beshak hum usay le jaane par bhi zaroor qaadir hain.
23.19: Phir humne us se tumhare liye khajooron aur angooron ke baagh paida kiye, jin mein tumhare liye bahut se phal hain, aur tum unse khaate ho.
23.20: Aur aik darakht bhi hai jo Toor-e-Sina se nikalta hai, jo tel nikale aur khane walon ke liye saalan ban jaaye.
23.21: Aur beshak tumhare liye chaara hai maweshiyon mein. Hum tumhein unke pait se doodh pilate hain, aur un mein tumhare liye bohot se faide hain, aur unmein se tum khaate ho.
23.22: Aur un par aur kashtiyon par tum sawar hote ho.
23.23: Aur beshak humne Nooh ko uski qaum ki taraf bheja, to usne kaha: Aey meri qaum! Allah ki ibaadat karo. Uske siwa tumhara koi maabood nahi. Kya tum darte nahi?
23.24: To uski qaum ke wo sardaar jinhon ne kufr kiya tha bole: Yeh to sirf ek bashar hai tum jaisa. Chahta hai ke tum par fazilat hasil kare. Aur agar Allah chahta to farishte utarta. Humne to yeh baat apne pehle baap-dadaon mein nahi suni.
23.25: Yeh shakhs sirf ek deewana hai. Pas kuch der tak uska intezar karo.
23.26: Usne kaha: Aey mere Rab! Inka inkaar hai.
23.27: To humne uski taraf wahee ki ke hamari nigraani mein aur hamari wahee ke mutabiq kashti banao. Phir jab hamara hukm aa jaye aur tannoor ubalne lage to us mein har qisam ke do joday (narkh aur madah) rakh lo, aur apne ghar walon ko bhi siwa uske jiske khilaaf pehle faisla ho chuka ho. Aur mujrim logon ke baare mein mujh se kuch na kehna. Woh zaroor dooba diye jaayenge.
23.28: Phir jab tu kashti mein aur tere saath wale sab sawar ho jaayein, to kehna: Shukar hai Allah ka jisne humein zalim logon se nijaat di.
23.29: Aur kehna: Aey mere Rab! Mujhe barakat wali jagah utaar, aur tu sab se behtar utarne wala hai.
23.30: Is mein nishaniyan hain, aur beshak hum aazmate hain.
23.31: Phir humne unke baad ek doosri nasl paida ki.
23.32: Phir humne un mein ek Rasool bheja: Allah ki ibaadat karo. Tumhare liye uske siwa koi maabood nahi. Kya tum darte nahi?
23.33: Aur uski qaum ke wo sardaar jinhon ne kufr kiya aur aakhirat ki mulaqat ko jhutlaya, aur humne unhein duniya ki zindagi mein raahat di thi, unhon ne kaha: Yeh to sirf ek bashar hai tum jaisa. Jo kuch tum khaate ho, wahi yeh bhi khata hai. Aur jo kuch tum peeta ho, wahi yeh bhi peeta hai.
23.34: Agar tumne apne jese ek bashar ki itaat ki to zaroor tum ghaate mein jaoge.
23.35: Kya yeh tum se wada karta hai ke jab tum mar jaoge aur mitti aur haddiyan ho jaoge to tum nikaale jaoge?
23.36: Haye re, yeh baat bohot door ki hai jo tumse waada ki ja rahi hai.
23.37: Yeh to sirf duniya ki zindagi hai. Marte hain, jeete hain, aur hum uthaye nahi jaayenge.
23.38: Yeh to sirf ek shakhs hai jisne Allah ke naam par jhoot ghad liya hai, aur hum is par imaan laane wale nahi.
23.39: Usne kaha: Aey mere Rab! Inka inkaar hai.
23.40: Allah ne farmaya: Anqareeb woh zaroor pashtaayenge.
23.41: To unhein cheekh ne pakad liya bilkul theek ke mutabiq, to humne unhein kachra bana diya. Pas door ho zulm karne walon ke liye.
23.42: Phir humne unke baad aur qaumein uthayi.
23.43: Koi ummat apne waqt se na aage badhti hai na peechhe rehti hai.
23.44: Phir humne lagataar Rasool bheje. Jab bhi kisi ummat ke paas uska Rasool aaya, unhon ne usay jhutlaya. To humne unhein ek ke baad ek halaak kar diya, aur unhein afsane bana diya. Pas door ho imaan na laane walon ke liye.
23.45: Phir humne Moosa aur uske bhai Haroon ko apni nishaniyon aur sareeh daleel ke saath bheja.
23.46: Firaun aur uske sardaron ki taraf, to unhon ne takabbur kiya, aur woh baday the.
23.47: To unhon ne kaha: Kya hum apne jese do aadmiyon par imaan le aayen? Aur unki qaum to hamari ghulaam hai.
23.48: To unhon ne un dono ko jhutlaya, to woh halaak kar diye gaye.
23.49: Aur beshak humne Moosa ko kitaab di taa ke woh hidayat paayein.
23.50: Aur humne Ibn-e-Maryam (Isa) aur uski maa ko ek nishani banaya, aur un dono ko ek oonchi aur pur-aamaan jagah par rukawat aur chashmay wali jagah mein panah di.
23.51: Aey Rasoolon! Paak cheezein khao, aur neik amal karo. Main jo kuch tum karte ho us se bakhabar hoon.
23.52: Aur yeh tumhari ummat ek hi ummat hai, aur main tumhara Rab hoon. Pas mujh se daro.
23.53: Magar unhon ne apna deen tukdon mein baant diya. Har firqa apne paas wali baat par khush hai.
23.54: To unhein unki gaflat mein kuch muddat ke liye chhod do.
23.55: Kya yeh samajhte hain ke hum unhein maal-o-aulaad se madad dete hain.
23.56: To woh humare liye nekiyon mein daud rahe hain? Nahi, balkeh woh samajhte nahi.
23.57: Beshak woh log jo apne Rab ke khauf se dare rehte hain.
23.58: Aur jo apne Rab ki aayaton par imaan late hain.
23.59: Aur jo apne Rab ke saath kisi ko shareek nahi karte.
23.60: Aur jo kuch dete hain, aur unke dil darte hain ke woh apne Rab ki taraf lautne wale hain.
23.61: Wahi log nekiyon mein daudte hain, aur wahi unmein sabqat le jaate hain.
23.62: Aur hum kisi shakhs ko uski taaqat se zyada takleef nahi dete. Aur hamare paas ek kitaab hai jo sach ke saath bolti hai, aur un par zulm nahi kiya jaayega.
23.63: Magar unke dil is se gafil hain, aur unke kuch aur a’maal bhi hain jo woh karte hain.
23.64: Yahan tak ke jab hum unke aish-o-aaraam mein doobay huye logon ko azaab mein pakadte hain to woh cheekhne lagte hain.
23.65: Aaj cheekho mat, beshak tum humse madad nahi paa sakte.
23.66: Mere aayatein tumhein sunayi jaati thi to tum ulta mooh pher lete thay.
23.67: Takabbur karte huye, aur is tarah baatein banate ke jaise tumne usay suna hi nahi, jaise tumhare kaanon mein sanpan hai. To azaab ka maza chakkho, ke tum baaz nahi aate thay.
23.68: Kya un logon ne is baat mein ghoro-fikr nahi kiya? Ya unke paas woh cheez aayi hai jo unke pehle baap-dadaon ke paas nahi aayi thi?
23.69: Ya unhon ne apne Rasool ko nahi pehchana, is liye usay na maana?
23.70: Ya kehte hain ke usay junoon hai? Balkeh woh unke paas haqq le kar aaya hai, aur unmein se zyada log haqq se nafrat rakhte hain.
23.71: Aur agar haqq inki khwahishon ke mutabiq chalta to aasman aur zameen aur jo kuch unmein hai, sab bigad jaate. Balkeh hum unhein unka zikr diya, magar woh apne zikr se mooh modhne wale hain.
23.72: Kya tu unse koi ajar maangta hai? Tere Rab ka ajar behtar hai, aur woh sab behtareen raziq hai.
23.73: Aur beshak tu unhein seedhe raaste ki taraf bulaata hai.
23.74: Aur jo log aakhirat par imaan nahi rakhte woh raah se hat gaye hain.
23.75: Aur agar hum unpar reham karein, aur unki museebat door kar dein to bhi woh apni sar-kashi mein bhatak gaye rahenge.
23.76: Aur beshak humne unhein azaab mein pakda, to bhi unhon ne apne Rab ke aage jhukna nahi seekha, aur na hi woh girgiraye.
23.77: Yahan tak ke jab hum unke saamne sakht azaab ka darwaza khol denge to woh usmein mayoos ho jaayenge.
23.78: Wahi hai jisne tumhare liye kaan, aankhein, aur dil banaye. Tum kam hi shukar ada karte ho.
23.79: Aur wahi hai jisne tumhein zameen mein phaila diya, aur usi ki taraf tum sab ikattha kiye jaoge.
23.80: Aur wahi hai jo zindagi deta hai, aur mauta deta hai. Aur usi ka hai raat aur din ka tasalsul. Kya tum samajhte nahi?
23.81: Balkeh unhon ne wahi kaha jo unse pehle walon ne kaha.
23.82: Unhon ne kaha: Kya jab hum mar jaayenge, aur mitti aur haddiyan ho jaayenge to kya hum phir uthaye jaayenge?
23.83: Yeh hum se pehle bhi wada kiya jaata raha, aur hamare baap-dadaon se bhi. Yeh sirf pehle logon ki kahaniyan hain.
23.84: Kaho: Zameen aur jo kuch usmein hai, agar tum jaante ho, kis ka hai?
23.85: Woh kahenge: Allah ka. Kaho: To kya tum hosh mein nahi aate?
23.86: Kaho: Saaton aasmaanon ka, aur azeem Arsh ka Maalik kaun hai?
23.87: Woh kahenge: Allah. Kaho: To kya tum us se nahi darte?
23.88: Kaho: Agar tum jaante ho to batao ke sab kuch kis ke haath mein hai, jo har cheez par ikhtiyar rakhta hai, aur jise koi nahi bacha sakta?
23.89: Woh kahenge: Allah ka. Kaho: To phir tum kahan se dhoka kha rahe ho?
23.90: Balki hum unke paas haqq laye, aur woh jhoot bolte hain.
23.91: Allah ne kisi ko beta nahi banaya, aur na uske saath koi aur maabood hai. Warna har maabood apni makhlooq ko le jaata, aur ek doosre par ghalib aata. Allah paak hai un baaton se jo woh banate hain.
23.92: Woh chhupi aur khuli har cheez ka jaane wala hai. Woh un cheezon se baala o bartar hai jo woh shirk karte hain.
23.93: Kaho: Aey mere Rab! Agar tu mujhe woh dikhaye jiska unse wada kiya gaya hai.
23.94: To aey mere Rab! Mujhe zalim logon ke saath na rakhna.
23.95: Aur beshak hum is par poore qudrat rakhte hain ke jo kuch in se wada kiya gaya hai woh tujhe dikha dein.
23.96: Burayi ko us tareeqe se dafa karo jo behtareen ho. Hum behtar jaante hain jo kuch woh bayaan karte hain.
23.97: Aur kaho: Aey mere Rab! Main shayateen ke vaswason se teri panaah maangta hoon.
23.98: Aur aey mere Rab! Main is se bhi teri panaah maangta hoon ke woh mere paas aayein.
23.99: Yahan tak ke jab inmein se kisi ko maut aati hai to kehta hai: Aey mere Rab! Mujhe wapas bhej de.
23.100: Taa ke main neik kaam kar loon jo chhor aaya hoon. Hargiz nahi! Yeh bas ek baat hai jo woh keh raha hai. Aur unke peeche ek parda hai qayamat tak ke din tak.
23.101: Phir jab soor mein phoonka jaayega to us din na to unke darmiyan rishtedari rahegi, aur na woh ek doosre ko poochhenge.
23.102: Phir jinke tarazu bhaari honge wohi kaamiyab honge.
23.103: Aur jinke tarazu halkay honge, wahi log honge jinhon ne apna nuksan kiya. Woh jahannum mein hamesha rahenge.
23.104: Aag unke chehron ko jala degi, aur woh us mein munh latkaaye honge.
23.105: Kya tumhein meri aayatein nahi sunayi jaati thi? Phir tum unhein jhutlaya karte thay.
23.106: Woh kahenge: Aey hamare Rab! Hamari bad-naseebi hum par haavi ho gayi, aur hum gumraah log thay.
23.107: Aey hamare Rab! Humein is se nikaal de. Agar hum phir waise hi karen to hum zalim honge.
23.108: Allah farmaye ga: Reh jao us mein zillat ke saath, aur mujhse baat na karo.
23.109: Mere kuch bande thay jo kehte thay: Aey hamare Rab! Hum imaan laaye, to humein maaf kar de, aur hum par reham kar, aur tu sab se behtar reham karne wala hai.
23.110: To tum un par hansne lage, yahan tak ke tum unhein bhula baithe, aur tum un par hansi udate rahe.
23.111: Aaj main unhein unke sabr ka badla de raha hoon ke woh hi kamiyab hain.
23.112: Allah poochega: Tum zameen mein kitne saal rahe?
23.113: Woh kahenge: Ek din ya ek din ka kuch hissa. Ginti karne walon se poochh lijiye.
23.114: Allah farmaye ga: Tum bas kuch hi der rahe. Kaash tum jaante.
23.115: Kya tumne samjha ke humne tumhein fazool banaya, aur tum hamari taraf lautaye nahi jaoge?
23.116: To Allah buzurg hai, sachcha baadshah. Uske siwa koi maabood nahi. Arsh-e-karim ka Rab hai.
23.117: Aur jo Allah ke saath kisi aur maabood ko pukare, jiske liye uske paas koi daleel nahi, to uska hisaab uske Rab ke paas hai. Beshak kafir kamiyab nahi honge.
23.118: Aur (aey Nabi!) Kaho: Aey mere Rab! Maaf kar de, aur reham farma, aur tu sab se behtar reham karne wala hai.

24.1: Yeh ek Surah hai jise humne nazil kiya – aur iske ahkamat ko farz kiya – aur ismein roshan aayatein nazil ki hain – taake tum yaad raho.
24.2: Zina karne wali aur zina karne wale – in dono mein se har ek ko sau (100) koore maaro – aur Allah ke deen ke maamle mein tum par koi narmi na ho agar tum Allah aur aakhirat ke din par imaan rakhte ho – aur unka azaab mominon ke ek giroh ke samne hona chahiye.
24.3: Zina karne wala sirf zina karne wali ya mushrik aurat se nikah karega – aur zina karne wali se sirf zina karne wala ya mushrik aadmi nikah karega – aur yeh (nikah) mominon par haraam hai.
24.4: Aur jo log paak daaman auraton par ilzaam lagayein – phir chaar gawah na laa sakein – to unhein assi (80) koore maaro – aur unki gawaahi ko kabhi qabool na karo – yeh log faasiq hain.
24.5: Siwa un logon ke jo iske baad tauba karein aur apni islah kar lein – to beshak Allah bakhshne waala, meherbaan hai.
24.6: Aur jo log apni biwiyon par ilzaam lagayein – aur unke paas apne siwa koi gawah na ho – to har ek ki gawaahi yeh hai ke woh chaar martaba Allah ki qasam khaaye ke woh sach bol raha hai.
24.7: Aur paanchwin martaba kahe ke agar woh jhoot bol raha ho to us par Allah ki laanat ho.
24.8: Aur us aurat se azaab taal diya jaayega agar woh chaar martaba Allah ki qasam khaaye ke woh jhoot bol raha hai.
24.9: Aur paanchwin martaba kahe ke agar woh sach bol raha ho to us par Allah ka ghadab ho.
24.10: Aur agar tum par Allah ka fazl aur uski rehmat na hoti – aur Allah tauba qabool karne wala, hikmat wala na hota – to kya hota?
24.11: Beshak jinhon ne bohtaan baandha woh tum mein se hi ek giroh hai – isey apne liye bura na samjho – balke yeh tumhare liye behtari ka baais hai – un mein se har shakhs ke liye woh gunaah hai jo usne kamaya – aur jiske zimmedar ne is ka bada hissa uthaya uske liye bada azaab hai.
24.12: Tumhare paas yeh afwaah aayi to momin mardon aur auraton ne apne dil mein bhala guman kyun na kiya – aur kyun na kaha: Yeh to khula jhooth hai?
24.13: Woh chaar gawah kyun na laayein? Jab woh gawah nahi laa sakein to yeh log Allah ke nazdeek jhoothe hain.
24.14: Aur agar tum par Allah ka fazl aur uski rehmat na hoti duniya aur aakhirat mein – to tum par zaroor ek bada azaab aata us baat ke sabab jo tum mein fail gayi.
24.15: Jab tum usay apni zabanon se bayan kar rahe thay – aur apne mooh se woh baat keh rahe thay jise tum jaante na thay – aur tum use halka samajh rahe thay jab ke Allah ke nazdeek yeh badi baat thi.
24.16: Aur tumhein chahiye tha ke jab tum isay sunte to kehte: Hamen yeh kehna zaib nahi deta – Subhanak Allah! Yeh to bada bohtaan hai.
24.17: Allah tumhein naseehat deta hai ke aisa kabhi na karna agar tum momin ho.
24.18: Aur Allah tumhein aayatein saaf taur par samjhaata hai – aur Allah sab kuch jaane wala, hikmat wala hai.
24.19: Jo log chaahte hain ke mominon ke darmiyan fahashi fail ho – unke liye duniya aur aakhirat mein dardnaak azaab hai – aur Allah jaanta hai, tum nahi jaante.
24.20: Aur agar Allah ka fazl aur uski rehmat tum par na hoti – aur Allah meherbaan, bakhshne wala na hota – to kya hota?
24.21: Aey logon jo imaan laaye ho! Shaitaan ke qadmon par na chalo – aur jo shaitaan ke raaste par chalta hai to woh usay fahashi aur burai ka hukum deta hai – aur agar Allah ka fazl tum par na hota to tum mein se koi bhi kabhi paak na hota – magar Allah jise chahta hai paak kar deta hai – aur Allah sab kuch sunta, sab kuch jaanta hai.
24.22: Tum mein se jo fazl aur kushhaali wale hain woh qasam na khaayein ke woh qaraabatdaron, miskeenon, aur muhajiro’n ko na dein – balke unhein maaf kar dena chahiye, aur chhod dena chahiye – kya tum yeh nahi chaahte ke Allah tumhein maaf kare? Aur Allah to bakhshne wala, meherbaan hai.
24.23: Beshak jo log paak daaman, be-khabar imaan wali auraton par bohtaan lagate hain – woh duniya aur aakhirat mein laanat ke mustahiq hain – aur unke liye bada azaab hai.
24.24: Jis din unke khilaaf unki zaban, unke haath, aur unke paon unke kiye ki gawahi denge.
24.25: Us din Allah unhein unka poora badla dega – aur woh jaan lenge ke Allah hi khula sach hai.
24.26: Buri auratein bure mardon ke liye hain – aur bure mard buri auraton ke liye – achhi auratein achhe mardon ke liye – aur achhe mard achhi auraton ke liye – yeh log bohtaan se paak hain – unke liye maghfirat aur izzat bhara rizq hai.
24.27: Aey logon jo imaan laaye ho! Apne gharon ke siwa kisi aur ke gharon mein daakhil na ho jab tak ijaazat na lo – aur un par salam na karo – yeh tumhare liye behtareen hai, shayad ke tum yaad rakkho.
24.28: Agar wahan kisi ko na pao to wahan daakhil na ho jab tak tumhein ijaazat na di jaaye – aur agar tum se kaha jaaye ke laut jao to laut jaao – yeh tumhare liye paaki hai – aur Allah tumhare amal se waaqif hai.
24.29: Tumhare liye koi harj nahi ke aise gharon mein daakhil ho jaao jahan kisi ka rehna na ho – aur jin mein tumhara koi faida ho – aur Allah jaanta hai jo tum zaahir karte ho aur jo tum chhupate ho.
24.30: Momin mardon se keh do ke apni nazar neeche rakkhein – aur apni sharmgah ki hifazat karein – yeh unke liye zyada paaki ka baais hai – beshak Allah un kaam se waaqif hai jo woh karte hain.
24.31: Aur momin auraton se keh do ke apni nazar neeche rakkhein – aur apni sharmgah ki hifazat karein – aur apni zeenat ko zaahir na karein siwa us ke jo zaahir hai – aur apne seenon par dupatte daal ke rakkhein – aur apni zeenat kisi ke saamne zaahir na karein siwa apne shohar, ya baap, ya shohar ke baap, ya apne beton, ya shohar ke beton, ya bhaiyon, ya bhaiyon ke beton, ya behnon ke beton, ya apni auraton, ya apne ghulaamon, ya un naukaron ke jo shahwat rakhne wale nahi, ya bachche jo auraton ke posheeda azaaib se waaqif nahi – aur apne paon zameen par is tarah na maaren ke unki zeenat ka ilm ho jaaye – aur sab ke sab Allah ki taraf tauba karo aey momino! Taake tum falaah pao.
24.32: Aur jo log tum mein se be-nikah hon unka nikah karwa do – aur tumhare ghulaam aur laundiyan jo qabil hain unka bhi – agar woh mohtaj hon to Allah unhein apne fazl se be-niyaz kar dega – aur Allah wus’at wala, ilm wala hai.
24.33: Aur jo log (nikah ki) tawanai nahi rakhte to woh paaki daari ikhtiyar karein jab tak Allah unhein apne fazl se be-niyaz na kar de – aur tumhare ghulaam tumse likhwaayi karein agar tum un mein bhalai pao to unse likhwaayi karo – aur unhein Allah ke maal mein se do jo usne tumhein diya – aur apni laundiyon ko duniya ki zindagi ka faida haasil karne ke liye fahashi par majboor na karo – agar woh paak daaman rahna chahein – aur jo unhein majboor karega to Allah unke majboor hone ke baad unka ghafoor, raheem hai.
24.34: Aur beshak humne tumhari taraf roshan aayatein – aur tumse pehle logon ke misaal – aur parhezgaaron ke liye naseehat bheji.
24.35: Allah aasmanon aur zameen ka noor hai – uske noor ki misaal aise hai jaise ek taaq (niche) mein ek chiragh ho – aur chiragh shishe mein ho – aur shisha aisa jaise chamakta hua taara ho – jo jalaaya gaya ho ek mubarak zaitoon ke darakht ke tail se – jo na mashriqi ho na maghribi – uska tail aisa hai ke baghair aag chhuye hi chamak uthta hai – noor par noor – Allah apne noor ki taraf jisay chahta hai hidaayat deta hai – aur Allah logon ke liye misaalein bayan karta hai – aur Allah har cheez ka ilm rakhta hai.
24.36: Un gharon mein (yeh noor hai) jinki ijaazat Allah ne di hai ke unhein buland kiya jaaye – aur unmein uska naam liya jaaye – unmein uski tasbeeh karta hai subah o shaam aise logon ke zariye –
24.37: Jo na unhein tijarat aur na koi kharido-farokht Allah ke zikr se, namaz qayam karne se, aur zakat dene se rokti hai – woh us din se darte hain jis mein dilon aur aankhon ka ulat phulat hoga.
24.38: Taake Allah unhein unke a’maal ka behtareen badla de – aur unhein apne fazl se zyada de – aur Allah jise chahta hai be-hisaab rizq deta hai.
24.39: Aur jin logon ne kufr kiya unke a’maal ki misaal hai jaise ek sehra mein saraab – jisey pyasa pani samajhta hai – jab wahan pahunche to kuch na paaye – aur usne Allah ko apne paas paya – phir usne uska pura hisaab chuka diya – aur Allah hisaab lene mein tezi karta hai.
24.40: Ya unke a’maal ki misaal gehri samandar ki si hai – jise upar upar lehr dhak le – aur uske upar ek aur lehr ho – aur uske upar badal ho – andhiyaan hi andhiyaan hain – ek ke upar ek – jab koi apna haath nikaale to use bhi mushkil se dekh sake – aur jise Allah noor na de uske liye koi noor nahi.
24.41: Kya tumne nahi dekha ke Allah ki tasbeeh karta hai jo kuch aasmanon aur zameen mein hai – aur parinday bhi apne pankhon mein saf bandh kar – har ek apni namaaz aur tasbeeh ko jaanta hai – aur Allah unke a’maal ko jaanta hai.
24.42: Aur Allah hi ki hai badshahi aasmanon aur zameen ki – aur Allah hi ki taraf sab ko lautna hai.
24.43: Kya tumne nahi dekha ke Allah baadal ko chalata hai – phir use ekatha karta hai – phir use dher bana deta hai – phir tum dekhte ho ke uske darmiyan se baarish nikalti hai – aur woh aasman se barf ke pahadon se ole barsata hai – aur jise chahta hai unse maar deta hai – aur jise chahta hai bacha leta hai – uski bijli ki chamak aankhon ki roshni le jaati hai.
24.44: Allah raat aur din ka ulat phair karta hai – ismein sabak hai un logon ke liye jo aankhein rakhte hain.
24.45: Aur Allah ne har chalne waale ko paani se paida kiya – to kuch unmein se pait ke bal chalte hain – aur kuch do pairon par – aur kuch chaar par chalte hain – Allah jo chahta hai paida karta hai – beshak Allah har cheez par qadir hai.
24.46: Beshak humne roshan aayatein utaari hain – aur Allah jise chahta hai seedhe raaste ki hidaayat deta hai.
24.47: Aur kehte hain: Hum Allah aur Rasool par imaan laaye – phir unmein se ek giroh palat jaata hai – aur woh momin nahi hain.
24.48: Aur jab unhein Allah aur uske Rasool ki taraf bulaya jaata hai taake woh unke darmiyan faisla karein to unmein se ek giroh munh mod leta hai.
24.49: Agar unka haq ho to farmaan bardari ke saath aa jaate hain.
24.50: Kya unke dil mein marz hai? Ya woh shak mein hain? Ya unhein yeh khauf hai ke Allah aur uska Rasool un par zulm karein ge? Balke yeh log hi zalim hain.
24.51: Momino’n ka to yeh haal hai ke jab unhein Allah aur uske Rasool ki taraf bulaya jaaye taake woh unke darmiyan faisla karein to woh kehte hain: Humne suna aur maana – yahi log falaah paane wale hain.
24.52: Aur jo Allah aur uske Rasool ki itaat kare – aur Allah se dare – aur uski nikal baaz ho – to yahi log kamiyab hain.
24.53: Aur yeh log Allah ki pakki kasmein khaate hain ke agar aap unhein hukum dein to yeh zaroor nikalenge – keh do: Kasam mat khao – tumhari itaat ma’aloom hai – beshak Allah tumhare a’maal se khabar rakhne wala hai.
24.54: Keh do: Allah ki itaat karo – aur Rasool ki bhi – agar tum munh modte ho to woh (Rasool) apne zimmedari ka zimmedar hai – aur tum apni zimmedari ke – aur agar tum uski itaat karoge to hidayat paoge – aur Rasool ke zimmedari sirf paighaam pohcha dena hai.
24.55: Allah ne waada kiya hai un logon se jo tum mein se imaan laaye aur neik amal kiye ke woh unhein zaroor zameen mein khilafat dega – jaise un logon ko di jo unse pehle thay – aur unke liye unke deen ko jise usne pasand kiya mazbooti se jamadega – aur unki khauf ko aman se badal dega – woh meri ibaadat karenge – mere saath kisi ko shareek nahi karenge – aur jo iske baad kufr kare to wahi faasiq hain.
24.56: Aur namaz qayam rakho, zakat do – aur Rasool ki itaat karo – taake tum par reham kiya jaaye.
24.57: Un logon ko jo kufr karte hain – tum na samjho ke woh zameen mein Allah ko aajiz kar sakte hain – aur unka thikaana dozakh hai – aur woh bura thikaana hai.
24.58: Aey logon jo imaan laye ho! Tumhare ghulaam aur tumhare bachche jo abhi bulugh ko nahi pahunche – teen waqt tumse ijaazat le kar aayein – fajr ki namaz se pehle, dopahar ko jab tum kapde utaarte ho, aur isha ki namaz ke baad – yeh teen auqat tumhare liye parda daari ke hain – inke baad na tum par kuch gunaah hai na unpar – ke woh tumhare paas aate jaate rahein – ek doosre ke paas – is tarah Allah tumhare liye aayatein wazeh karta hai – aur Allah sab kuch jaanta hai, hikmat wala hai.
24.59: Aur jab tumhare bachche bulugh ki umar ko pahunchein to woh bhi usi tarah ijaazat lein jaise unse pehle waale lete thay – is tarah Allah tumhare liye apni aayatein wazeh karta hai – aur Allah sab kuch jaanta, hikmat wala hai.
24.60: Aur woh auratein jo buzurg ho chuki hain – jo shadi ki ummeed nahi rakhti – un par koi harj nahi agar woh apne kapde utaar dein bina zeenat zaahir kiye – lekin agar woh is se bhi bachein to yeh unke liye behtar hai – aur Allah sab kuch sunta, sab kuch jaanta hai.
24.61: Koi harj nahi andhe par, na langde par, na beemar par, na tum par ke tum apne gharon se, ya apne baap ke gharon se, ya apni maa ke, ya bhai ke, ya behan ke, ya chacha ke, ya phoophi ke, ya mamoo ke, ya khala ke gharon se khao, ya us ghar se jiska chabi tumhare paas hai, ya apne doston ke ghar se – tum par koi harj nahi ke tum milkar khao ya alag alag – phir jab tum gharon mein daakhil ho to apne aap par salam karo ek behtareen dua ke saath jo Allah ki taraf se hai – badi barkat wali aur paaki saaf – is tarah Allah tumhare liye apni aayatein wazeh karta hai taake tum samjho.
24.62: Momin to wahi hain jo Allah aur uske Rasool par imaan layein – aur jab woh kisi kaam mein Rasool ke saath hotay hain to bina ijaazat liye nahi jaate – jo tumse ijaazat lete hain wahi log hain jo Allah aur uske Rasool par imaan rakhte hain – to agar woh tumse kisi kaam ke liye ijaazat maangein to un mein se jise tum chaho ijaazat de do – aur unke liye Allah se maafi maango – beshak Allah bakhshne wala, meherbaan hai.
24.63: Rasool ke bulane ko aapas mein ek doosre ko bulane ki tarah na samjho – Allah un logon ko jaanta hai jo tum mein se chupke se nikal jaate hain – to jo log uske hukum ki mukhalfat karte hain woh dar lein ke un par koi fitna na aa jaaye ya un par dardnaak azaab na aajaye.
24.64: Khabardar! Allah hi ke liye hai jo kuch aasmanon aur zameen mein hai – woh jaanta hai jis haal par tum ho – aur jis din log uski taraf lautaye jaayenge to woh unhein bata dega jo kuch unhon ne kiya – aur Allah har cheez ka ilm rakhta hai.

25.1: Barkat wala hai woh jisne Furqan (haq o batil mein farq karne wali kitaab) apne bande par nazil ki, taa-ke woh sab jahon ke liye daraane wala ban jaye.
25.2: Woh (Allah) jiski hai mulk-e-haqeeqi aasmanon aur zameen ki, aur usne na kisi ko beta banaya, na uske saath koi shaareek hai mulk mein, aur har cheez ko usne paida kiya, aur uske liye ek taqdeer muqarrar ki.
25.3: Aur un logon ne uske siwa aise maabood bana liye hain jo kuch bhi paida nahi karte balkeh woh khud paida kiye gaye hain, aur na woh apne liye kisi nuqsan ya nafa ke malik hain, aur na maut, zindagi aur dobara uthaye jaane par kisi cheez ke ikhtiyar rakhte hain.
25.4: Aur jin logon ne inkaar kiya woh kehte hain: Yeh (Quran) to sirf jhoot hai jo isne ghad liya hai, aur doosre logon ne isme uski madad ki hai. Yaqeenan yeh bada zulm aur jhoot hai.
25.5: Aur kehte hain: Purane logon ki kahaniyan hain jo usne likhwa li hain, jo usay subah o shaam sunayi jaati hain.
25.6: Keh do: Isay nazil kiya hai usne jo aasmanon aur zameen ke raaz jaanta hai. Beshak woh bakhshne wala, meherbaan hai.
25.7: Aur kehte hain: Yeh kaisa Rasool hai jo khana khata hai, aur bazaaron mein chalta hai? Us par koi farishta utara hota jo uske saath darane wala ban jaata.
25.8: Ya is par koi khazana utarta, ya iske liye koi baagh hota jisse yeh khata? Aur zalim kehte hain: Tum to ek jaadu kiye huye aadmi ki pairwi kar rahe ho.
25.9: Dekho unhon ne tumhare liye kaisi misaalen banayi hain, pas woh bhatak gaye, aur ab kisi raaste ko paa nahi sakte.
25.10: Barkat wala hai woh agar chahe to tumhare liye isse behtar cheezein kare – jannat jinke neeche nehrein beh rahi hoon, aur tumhare liye qasrein banaye.
25.11: Balkeh unhon ne us ghadi (qayamat) ko jhutlaya, aur humne us (ghadi) ko jhutlane walon ke liye bhadakti aag tayyar kar rakhi hai.
25.12: Jab woh (aag) unhein door se dekhegi to woh uska josh-o-ghazab sunenge.
25.13: Aur jab unhein jahanam ke kisi tang maqam mein baandh diya jaayega, to us waqt woh halakat ki dua karenge.
25.14: Aaj ek halakat ki nahi, bohot si halakaton ki dua karo.
25.15: Kaho: Kya yeh behtar hai ya woh jannat jiska waada muttaqi logon se kiya gaya hai, jo unke liye jaza aur manzil hai?
25.16: Usmein unke liye hamesha rehna hai. Yeh waada hai tumhare Rab ka jo zimmedari ke saath poora kiya gaya hai.
25.17: Aur jis din Allah unhein aur unke un maaboodon ko ikattha karega jinhein woh Allah ke siwa poojte thay, to farmayega: Kya tumne mere in bandon ko gumraah kiya tha, ya ye khud raasta bhool gaye thay?
25.18: Woh kahenge: Tu paak hai! Humein yeh laayak na tha ke tere siwa kisi aur ko apna maabood bana lein. Magar tu ne inhein aur unke baap dada ko itna aish diya ke yeh zikr bhool gaye, aur yeh halakat ke laayak log ban gaye.
25.19: To ab yeh log tumhari baat jhutla rahe hain jo tum kehte thay, ab na tum azaab ko taal sakte ho, na madad paa sakte ho. Aur jo tum mein zulm karein, hum unhein bada azaab chakhayenge.
25.20: Aur humne tumse pehle jo Rasool bheje woh sab bhi khana khate thay aur bazaaron mein chalte thay. Aur humne tumhein ek dusre ke liye aazmaish banaya hai. Kya tum sabr karte ho? Aur tumhara Rab dekh raha hai.
25.21: Aur jin logon ko hamari mulaqat ki umeed nahi, woh kehte hain: Hamare upar farishte kyun nahi utare, ya hum apna Rab kyun nahi dekh lete? Beshak unhon ne apne aap ko bahut bada samjha, aur baday takabbur ke saath baat ki.
25.22: Jis din woh farishton ko dekhenge, us din mujrim logon ke liye koi khushi na hogi, aur woh kahenge: Allah kare humein door kar diya jaye.
25.23: Aur hum un ke kiye hue a’maal ki taraf badhenge, aur unhein ura hua gubar bana denge.
25.24: Us din jannat walon ke liye behtareen thikana aur behtareen sukoon ki jagah hogi.
25.25: Jis din aasman badalon ke saath phatega aur farishte utarein, baar baar.
25.26: Us din asli baadshahat Rehman ki hogi. Aur woh kafiron ke liye sakht din hoga.
25.27: Aur us din zalim apne haathon ko kaat khaayega, kahega: Kaash maine Rasool ke saath raasta ikhtiyar kiya hota!
25.28: Haye meri tabahi! Kaash maine falan (dost) ko apna dost na banaya hota.
25.29: Usne to mujhe naseehat aane ke baad gumraah kar diya. Aur shaytan insaan ko chhod deta hai jab woh uska kaam bana leta hai.
25.30: Aur Rasool kahenge: Aey mere Rab! Meri qaum ne is Quran ko chor diya tha.
25.31: Aur isi tarah humne har nabi ke liye ek dushman banaya – mujrim logon mein se. Aur tumhara Rab hidayat dene aur madad karne ke liye kaafi hai.
25.32: Aur kafir kehte hain: Quran us par ek hi baar mein poora kyun nahi utara gaya? Humne ise is liye utara hai ke is se tumhare dil ko mazboot karein, aur humne isay tarteel ke saath utara.
25.33: Aur woh tumhare liye koi misaal nahi laate magar hum tumhare paas uska sach aur behtareen tafsir le aate hain.
25.34: Woh log jo apne mooh ke bal jahannum ki taraf le jaaye jaayenge, wahi sabse zyada gumraah hain, aur woh sabse badtareen maqam mein honge.
25.35: Aur humne Moosa ko kitaab di, aur uske saath uska bhai Haroon madadgaar banakar bheja.
25.36: Phir humne kaha: Dono us qaum ke paas jaao jinhon ne hamari aayatein jhutlayi hain. Phir humne unhein tabah kar diya.
25.37: Aur Nooh ki qaum ko jab unhon ne Rasoolon ko jhutlaya to humne unhein dooba diya, aur unhein logon ke liye nishani banaya. Aur humne zalimon ke liye dardnaak azaab tayyar kar rakha hai.
25.38: Aur Aad, Samood, aur Rass walon ko, aur inke darmiyan ke bohot se naslon ko bhi (halaak kiya).
25.39: Aur humne sab ko misaalein dee, aur sab ko puri tarah tabah kiya.
25.40: Aur beshak woh basti jiske logon par baarish se azaab aaya tha, us par woh guzar chuke hain. Kya unhon ne usay nahi dekha? Balkeh woh dobara uthaye jaane ki umeed nahi rakhte.
25.41: Aur jab woh tumhein dekhte hain to tumhara mazaaq udaate hain: Kya yeh hai woh jise Allah ne Rasool bana kar bheja hai?
25.42: Isne to humein gumraah kar diya hota agar hum uske upar sabr na karte. Aur anqareeb jab woh azaab dekhenge to jaan lenge ke kaun sabse zyada gumraah hai.
25.43: Kya tumne us shaks ko dekha jisne apni khwahish ko apna maabood bana liya? Kya tum us par zimmedar banaye gaye ho?
25.44: Kya tum samajhte ho ke unmein se zyada log sunte ya samajhte hain? Woh to bas jaanwaron ki tarah hain, balkeh unse bhi zyada gumraah.
25.45: Kya tumne nahi dekha ke tumhara Rab saaya kaise phailata hai? Aur agar chahta to use motion mein rehne wala banata. Phir humne sooraj ko us par daleel banaya.
25.46: Phir humne use dheere dheere apni taraf kheench liya.
25.47: Aur wahi hai jo tumhare liye raat ko libaas banata hai, aur neend ko sukoon ka sabab, aur din ko uthne ka waqt banata hai.
25.48: Aur wahi hai jo apne reham se pehle hawaon ko khushkhabri banakar bhejta hai. Aur hum aasmaan se paani barsate hain jo saaf hota hai.
25.49: Taa ke iske zariye murda zameen ko zinda karein, aur apne banaye huye bepanah jaanwaron aur insaanon ko pilaayein.
25.50: Aur humne is paani ko unke darmiyan baar baar samjhaaya taa ke woh naseehat lein. Magar aksar log inkaar ke siwa kuch nahi karte.
25.51: Aur agar hum chahte to har basti mein ek daraane wala bhejte.
25.52: Pas tum kafiron ka kehna na maano, aur is Quran ke zariye unke saath badi jehd (jihad) karo.
25.53: Aur wahi hai jisne do samandar chhod diye ke woh ek doosre se milte hain.
25.54: Magar un dono ke darmiyan ek rok hai, ek hadood jis se woh tajawuz nahi karte.
25.55: Aur wahi hai jisne paani se insaan ko paida kiya, phir usay nasab aur rishtedari banaya. Aur tumhara Rab har cheez par qudrat rakhta hai.
25.56: Aur yeh log Allah ke siwa aise maaboodon ki ibadat karte hain jo na unke kisi faide ke malik hain, na nuqsan ke, aur kafir to apne Rab se peeth moad kar chalta hai.
25.57: Kaho: Main is par tumse koi ajar nahi maangta, magar yeh ke jo chahe apne Rab tak rasta ikhtiyar kare.
25.58: Aur us zinda (hasti) par bharosa karo jo kabhi nahi maregi, aur uski hamd ke saath uski tasbeeh karo. Aur uske bandon ke gunaahon se kaafi waqif hai.
25.59: Wahi hai jisne aasmanon aur zameen ko, aur unke darmiyan jo kuch hai, cheh dinon mein banaya. Phir Arsh par istawa farmaaya. Woh Rehman hai, to uski baat kisi waqif se poochho.
25.60: Aur jab unhein kaha jaata hai ke Rehman ko sajda karo to kehte hain: Rehman kya hota hai? Kya hum usi ko sajda karein jise tu hukm deta hai? Aur yeh aur zyada bhaag jaate hain.
25.61: Barkat wala hai woh jisne aasmaan mein burj banaye, aur usmein ek chirag (sooraj) aur chamakdaar chaand banaya.
25.62: Aur wahi hai jisne raat aur din ko ek doosre ke baad aane wala banaya, jo chahe naseehat le ya shukar guzari kare.
25.63: Aur Rehman ke (sachche) banday woh hain jo zameen par narmi se chalte hain, aur jab unhein jaahil log mukhatib karte hain to kehte hain: Salaam.
25.64: Aur woh log jo apne Rab ke liye sajda aur qiyaam mein raat guzaarte hain.
25.65: Aur woh kehte hain: Aey hamare Rab! Humse jahannum ka azaab hata de. Uska azaab badi musibat hai.
25.66: Woh to bura thikana hai, aur buri rehne ki jagah.
25.67: Aur woh log jab kharch karte hain to na fizool udhayein karte hain na tang-dili se kaam lete hain, balkeh dono ke darmiyan raah ikhtiyar karte hain.
25.68: Aur woh log jo Allah ke saath kisi aur maabood ko nahi bulate, aur kisi us jaan ko nahi maarte jise Allah ne haram kiya hai siwa haq ke, aur na zina karte hain – aur jo koi yeh kaam karega, woh saza paayega.
25.69: Qayamat ke din uska azaab dugna kiya jaayega, aur woh usmein zillat ke saath hamesha rahega.
25.70: Magar jo tawba kare, aur imaan laaye, aur neik amal kare to aise logon ke buray a’maal ko Allah achhe a’maal mein badal dega. Aur Allah bahut bakhshne wala, meherbaan hai.
25.71: Aur jo tawba kare, aur neik amal kare, to woh Allah ki taraf sachche dil se lautta hai.
25.72: Aur woh log jo jhooti gawahi nahi dete, aur jab behooda baaton ke paas se guzarte hain to izzat ke saath guzar jaate hain.
25.73: Aur woh log jab apne Rab ki aayatein yaad dilaayi jaati hain to unpar andhey aur behre bankar nahi girte.
25.74: Aur woh kehte hain: Aey hamare Rab! Humein apni biwiyon aur aulad ki aankhon ki thandak bana, aur humein muttaqiyon ka imam bana.
25.75: Yeh log jannat mein unka badla paayenge, aur unhein upar ke kamre milenge ke woh sabr karte rahe. Aur unhein salam aur tahiyyat di jaayegi.
25.76: Wahan woh hamesha rahenge. Wah kya achhi jagah aur kya achha thikana hai.
25.77: Kaho: Mere Rab ko tumhari kuch parwaah nahi agar tum na dua karo. Tumne jhutlaya to ab yeh (azaab) lazmi ho gaya hai.

26.2: Yeh kitaab roshan ayaaton wali hai.
26.3: Shayad ke tum (Aey Nabi) apni jaan gham mein gira do ke woh log imaan nahi laate.
26.4: Agar hum chahein to un par aasman se ek nishani utaar dein to unki gardanain uske saamne jhuk jaayen.
26.5: Aur unke paas Rahman ki taraf se koi nai yaad-dihani nahi aati magar woh usse mooh mor lete hain.
26.6: To unhon ne jhutla diya, to anqareeb unke paas us cheez ki khabrein aayengi jiska woh mazaaq udaate hain.
26.7: Kya unhon ne zameen ko nahi dekha ke humne usmein har qisam ki behtareen cheezen ugayi hain?
26.8: Beshak is mein nishani hai, lekin in mein se aksar log imaan nahi laate.
26.9: Aur beshak tumhara Rab to sab par ghalib, nihayat meherbaan hai.
26.10: Aur yaad karo jab tumhare Rab ne Musa ko pukara ke zaalim qaum ke paas jao.
26.11: Fir'awn ki qaum ke paas – kya woh nahi darte?
26.12: (Musa ne) kaha: Aey mere Rab! Mujhe dar hai ke woh mujhe jhutlayenge.
26.13: Aur mera seena tang hota hai, aur meri zubaan nahi chalti – to Haroon ko bhi bhej de.
26.14: Aur unka mujh par ek jurm bhi hai – to mujhe dar hai ke woh mujhe maar na daalein.
26.15: (Allah ne) farmaya: Harگز nahi, tum dono jao hamari nishaniyon ke saath – hum tumhare saath hain, sunte hain.
26.16: To tum dono Fir'awn ke paas jao aur kaho: Hum sab jahaanon ke Rab ke Rasool hain.
26.17: Ke tum Bani Isra'il ko hamare saath bhejne do.
26.18: (Fir'awn ne) kaha: Kya humne tujhe bachpan mein apne paas paala nahi tha? Aur tumne apni umar ke kai saal hamare andar nahi guzare?
26.19: Aur tumne woh kaam kiya jo tumne kiya – aur tum na-shukriyon mein se ho.
26.20: (Musa ne) kaha: Maine yeh kaam us waqt kiya tha jab main gumraah tha.
26.21: To main tumse dar kar bhaag gaya, phir mera Rab mujhe hikmat di, aur mujhe Rasoolon mein se bana diya.
26.22: Aur yeh ehsaan tum mujh par jata rahe ho ke tumne Bani Isra'il ko ghulaam bana rakha tha.
26.23: Fir'awn ne kaha: Aur Rab kaun hai sab jahaanon ka?
26.24: (Musa ne) kaha: Aasmanon aur zameen ka Rab aur jo kuch in dono ke darmiyan hai – agar tum yaqeen rakhte ho.
26.25: (Fir'awn) ne apne aas paas ke logon se kaha: Kya tum sunte nahi?
26.26: (Musa ne) kaha: Tumhara Rab aur tumhare agle baap dada ka Rab.
26.27: (Fir'awn ne) kaha: Tumhara Rasool jo tumhari taraf bheja gaya hai, bilkul deewana hai!
26.28: (Musa ne) kaha: Mashriq aur maghrib ka Rab, aur jo kuch in dono ke darmiyan hai – agar tum samajh rakhte ho.
26.29: (Fir'awn) ne kaha: Agar tumne kisi ko mere siwa mabood banaya to main tumhein qaidiyon mein daal doonga.
26.30: (Musa ne) kaha: Agar main tumhare paas koi saaf daleel le aaoon to bhi?
26.31: (Fir'awn ne) kaha: Phir le aao agar tum sachche ho.
26.32: To Musa ne apni laathi phenki – to achanak woh ek zameendaar sa saanp ban gaya.
26.33: Aur usne apna haath nikaala – to woh dekhne walon ke liye chamak raha tha.
26.34: (Fir'awn) ne apne chhote-chhote amilon (afsaroon) se kaha: Beshak yeh to ek maahir jaadoo-gar hai.
26.35: Yeh chahta hai ke apne jaadoo se tumhein tumhari zameen se nikaal de – to tum kya mashwara dete ho?
26.36: Unhon ne kaha: Isay aur iske bhai ko thoda muhlat do – aur shehron mein jaadoo-garon ko bhej do.
26.37: Ke woh tumhare paas har bade jaadoo-gar ko le aayein.
26.38: To jaadoo-gar ek muqarrar din ke waqt mein jama kiye gaye.
26.39: Aur logon se kaha gaya: Kya tum bhi jama hote ho?
26.40: Taake hum jaadoo-garon ka galib aana dekhein – agar woh gaalib aayein.
26.41: Phir jab jaadoo-gar aaye to unhon ne Fir'awn se kaha: Kya humein ajar milega agar hum gaalib aayein?
26.42: Usne kaha: Haan, aur us waqt tum mere qareebi ho jaaoge.
26.43: Musa ne unse kaha: Daal do jo kuch tum daalna chahte ho.
26.44: To unhon ne apni rassi aur laathiyan daal di aur kaha: Fir‘awn ke izzat ki qasam! Hum hi gaalib aayenge.
26.45: Phir Musa ne apni laathi daali to woh turant unke jhoot ko nigal gayi jo unhon ne ghadha tha.
26.46: To sab jaadoo-gar sajda mein gir gaye.
26.47: Unhon ne kaha: Hum Haroon aur Musa ke Rab par imaan laaye.
26.48: (Fir‘awn) ne kaha: Kya tum us par imaan laaye ho pehle ke main tumhein ijaazat doon? Beshak woh tumhara bada hai jisne tumhein jaadoo sikhaya!
26.49: Main zaroor tumhare haath aur paon mukhalif tarafon se kaat doonga, aur tum sab ko sooli par chadha doonga.
26.50: Unhon ne kaha: Koi harj nahi! Hum to apne Rab ki taraf lautne waale hain.
26.51: Beshak hum umeed rakhte hain ke hamara Rab hamari ghaltiyan maaf karega, is liye ke hum sabse pehle imaan laaye hain.
26.52: Aur humne Musa ko wahee ki: Mere bandon ko le kar raat mein nikal jaao, tumhara peecha kiya jaayega.
26.53: Phir Fir‘awn ne shehron mein jasoos bheje.
26.54: (Usne kaha:) Yeh log to thodi si jamaat hain.
26.55: Aur yeh humein gussa dilaa rahe hain.
26.58: Khazaane aur behtareen maqamaat se nikaal diya.
26.59: Aise hi (humne kiya), aur Bani Isra’il ko un sab cheezon ka waris bana diya.
26.60: To Fir‘awn ke lashkar unka sooraj nikalte hi peecha karne lage.
26.61: Phir jab dono jama’aton ne ek doosre ko dekha, to Musa ke saathiyon ne kaha: Hum to pakde gaye!
26.62: Musa ne kaha: Hargiz nahi! Mera Rab mere saath hai, woh zaroor mujhe raasta dikhayega.
26.63: Phir humne Musa ko wahee ki: Apni laathi samandar par maaro. To samandar phatt gaya aur har hissa bade pahad ki tarah ban gaya.
26.64: Aur humne wahan doosron ko bhi qareeb laaya.
26.65: Aur Musa ko un sab ke saath bacha liya.
26.66: Phir humne doosron ko dooba diya.
26.67: Beshak is mein nishani hai, lekin in mein se aksar log imaan nahi laate.
26.68: Aur beshak tumhara Rab hi sab par ghalib, nihayat meherbaan hai.
26.69: Aur inhein Ibraheem ka waaqia sunao.
26.70: Jab usne apne baap aur qaum se kaha: Tum kis cheez ki ibaadat karte ho?
26.71: Unhon ne kaha: Hum buton ki ibaadat karte hain, aur unhi par hum lagaataar qaim hain.
26.72: Usne kaha: Kya woh tumhari sunte hain jab tum unhein pukarte ho?
26.73: Ya tumhein koi faida ya nuqsaan pahunchaate hain?
26.74: Unhon ne kaha: Balki humne apne baap dada ko aise hi karte paaya hai.
26.75: Usne kaha: Kya tumne dekha bhi hai un cheezon ko jinhein tum poojhte ho?
26.76: Tum bhi aur tumhare agle baap dada bhi?
26.77: Beshak yeh sab mere dushman hain siwa uske jo sab jahaanon ka Rab hai.
26.78: Wahi jisne mujhe paida kiya, phir mujhe raasta dikhata hai.
26.79: Aur wahi mujhe khilata hai aur pilaata hai.
26.80: Aur jab main beemar padta hoon to wahi mujhe shifa deta hai.
26.81: Aur wahi mujhe maut dega, phir mujhe zinda karega.
26.82: Aur wahi jis se main umeed rakhta hoon ke woh mere gunaah maaf karega qayamat ke din.
26.83: Aey mere Rab! Mujhe hikmat ata farma, aur mujhe saaliheen mein shamil farma.
26.84: Aur meri liye aakhireen mein achhi yaad chhor.
26.85: Aur mujhe ne’mat bhare jannat ke waris bana.
26.86: Aur mere baap ko maaf kar de – beshak woh gumraahon mein se tha.
26.87: Aur mujhe ruswa na kar us din jab log uthaye jaayenge.
26.88: Jis din na maal kaam aayega, na bete.
26.89: Siwa uske jo Allah ke paas saaf dil ke saath aaya ho.
26.90: Aur jannat muttaqiyon ke qareeb laayi jaayegi.
26.91: Aur jahannam gumraah logon ke saamne zahir ki jaayegi.
26.92: Aur unse kaha jaayega: Kahan hain woh jise tum pooja karte thay?
26.93: Allah ke siwa? Kya woh tumhari madad karte hain ya khud apni madad kar sakte hain?
26.94: To woh sab usmein ulat diye jaayenge – aur sab gumraah log bhi.
26.96: Wahan woh kahenge: Jab hum aag mein daale gaye to woh bhi hamare saath daale gaye.
26.97: Aur woh kahenge: Allah ki qasam! Hum to khuli gumraahi mein thay.
26.98: Jab hum tumhein sab jahaanon ke Rab ke barabar karte thay.
26.99: Aur hamen gumraah kiya unhi mujrim logon ne.
26.100: To ab hamare liye koi sifaarish karne wala nahi.
26.101: Aur na koi dildaar dost hai.
26.102: Kaash humein ek baar palatne ka moka mil jaaye to hum momin ban jaayein.
26.103: Beshak is mein ek nishani hai, lekin in mein se aksar log imaan nahi laate.
26.104: Aur beshak tumhara Rab hi sab par ghalib, nihayat meherbaan hai.
26.105: Nooh ki qaum ne Rasoolon ko jhutlaya.
26.106: Jab unke bhai Nooh ne unse kaha: Kya tum nahi darte?
26.108: To Allah se daro aur meri ita'at karo.
26.109: Aur main tumse is paighaam par koi ajar nahi maangta, mera ajar to sirf Rab-ul-Aalameen par hai.
26.110: To Allah se daro aur meri ita'at karo.
26.111: Unhon ne kaha: Kya hum tum par imaan le aayein jab ke tumhari pairwi zaleel logon ne ki hai?
26.112: Nooh ne kaha: Mujhe is se kya lena dena ke woh kya karte hain?
26.113: Unka hisaab to mere Rab ke zimmedar hai – kaash tum samajh sakte!
26.114: Aur main un logon ko nahi hanka sakta jo imaan laye hain.
26.115: Main to sirf saaf saaf dara dene wala hoon.
26.116: Unhon ne kaha: Aey Nooh! Agar tum baaz na aaye to tum pathraaye jaaoge.
26.117: (Nooh ne) kaha: Aey mere Rab! Meri qaum ne mujhe jhutlaya.
26.118: To tu mere aur inke darmiyan khula faisla karde – aur mujhe aur mere saathiyon ko bacha le.
26.119: To humne use aur jo uske saath the bhar ke kashti mein bacha liya.
26.120: Phir humne baaqi sab ko garq kar diya.
26.121: Beshak is mein nishani hai, lekin in mein se aksar log imaan nahi laate.
26.122: Aur beshak tumhara Rab hi sab par ghalib, nihayat meherbaan hai.
26.124: Jab unke bhai Hud ne unse kaha: Kya tum nahi darte?
26.126: To Allah se daro aur meri ita'at karo.
26.127: Aur main tumse is paighaam par koi ajar nahi maangta, mera ajar to sirf Rab-ul-Aalameen par hai.
26.128: Kya tum har unchi jagah par bekaar nishaan banate ho bas tafreeh ke liye?
26.129: Aur kya tum bade-bade imaarat banate ho aise jaise tum hamesha zinda rahoge?
26.130: Aur jab pakadte ho to zalimon ki tarah pakadte ho?
26.131: To Allah se daro aur meri ita'at karo.
26.132: Aur us se daro jisne tumhein un cheezon se nawaza jo tum jaante ho.
26.135: Main tumhare liye ek bade din ke azaab se dar raha hoon.
26.136: Unhon ne kaha: Hum tum par imaan laayein ya na laayein, hum par koi asar nahi padta.
26.137: Yeh to sirf purane logon ka tareeqa hai.
26.138: Aur hum par koi azaab nahi aane wala.
26.139: To unhon ne use jhutlaya – phir humne unko halaak kar diya – is mein ek nishani hai, lekin in mein se aksar log imaan nahi laate.
26.140: Aur beshak tumhara Rab hi sab par ghalib, nihayat meherbaan hai.
26.142: Jab unke bhai Saleh ne unse kaha: Kya tum nahi darte?
26.144: To Allah se daro aur meri ita'at karo.
26.145: Aur main tumse is paighaam par koi ajar nahi maangta, mera ajar to sirf Rab-ul-Aalameen par hai.
26.146: Kya tum is cheez par sukoonat rakhte ho ke tum yahan ke baaghon aur chashmon mein ho?
26.147: Aur kheton aur nakhlustano mein jin ke phal ras bhare hue hain?
26.148: Aur tum pahadon ko kaat kar ghar banaate ho bade hunar se?
26.149: To Allah se daro aur meri ita'at karo.
26.150: Aur un logon ki baat na maano jo hadd se guzar jaate hain.
26.151: Jo zameen mein fasaad machaate hain aur islah nahi karte.
26.152: Unhon ne kaha: Tu to sirf unhi logon mein se hai jo jaadoo kiye hue hain.
26.153: Tu sirf ek insaan hai hamare jaisa – to koi nishani le aao agar tum sacche ho.
26.154: Usne kaha: Yeh ek oontni hai – iske peene ka ek din hai aur tumhare liye bhi ek muqarrar din hai peene ka.
26.155: Aur isay kisi tarah se takleef na dena, warna tum par ek bade din ka azaab toot padega.
26.156: Phir unhon ne usay maar daala – to woh apne kiye par pashemaan ho gaye.
26.157: Phir un par azaab toot pada – is mein ek nishani hai, lekin in mein se aksar log imaan nahi laate.
26.158: Aur beshak tumhara Rab hi sab par ghalib, nihayat meherbaan hai.
26.159: Lut ki qaum ne bhi Rasoolon ko jhutlaya.
26.160: Jab unke bhai Lut ne unse kaha: Kya tum nahi darte?
26.162: To Allah se daro aur meri ita'at karo.
26.163: Aur main tumse is paighaam par koi ajar nahi maangta, mera ajar to sirf Rab-ul-Aalameen par hai.
26.164: Kya tum duniya ke sab logon mein se mardon ke paas jaate ho?
26.165: Aur apne Rab ke banaye hue joray (biwiyon) ko chhod dete ho? Balke tum to hadd se badhne waale log ho.
26.166: Unhon ne kaha: Aey Lut! Agar tu baaz na aaya to tu zaroor nikaala jaayega.
26.167: Usne kaha: Main tumhare amal se bad dil hoon.
26.168: Aey mere Rab! Mujhe aur mere ghar walon ko bacha le jo yeh kar rahe hain.
26.169: To humne use aur uske sab ghar walon ko bacha liya.
26.170: Siwa ek budi aurat ke jo peechhe reh gayi.
26.171: Phir humne baaqi sab par azaab barasa diya.
26.172: To un par barsaaya gaya ek bara bura barsa.
26.173: Beshak is mein ek nishani hai, lekin in mein se aksar log imaan nahi laate.
26.174: Aur beshak tumhara Rab hi sab par ghalib, nihayat meherbaan hai.
26.175: Aikah walon ne bhi Rasoolon ko jhutlaya.
26.176: Jab unse Shoaib ne kaha: Kya tum nahi darte?
26.178: To Allah se daro aur meri ita'at karo.
26.179: Aur main tumse is paighaam par koi ajar nahi maangta, mera ajar to sirf Rab-ul-Aalameen par hai.
26.180: Naapo tol mein kami na karo.
26.181: Pimane thik bhro aor ksi ko ghata nh do
26.182: Aur logon ko unki cheezein kam de kar na do.
26.183: Aur zameen mein fasaad na machao.
26.184: Aur us Zaat se daro jisne tumhein aur pehle ke logon ko paida kiya.
26.185: Unhon ne kaha: Tu to sirf un jaadoo-garon mein se hai.
26.186: Aur tu to sirf ek insaan hai hamare jaisa – aur hum samajhte hain ke tu jhoota hai.
26.187: To tu hum par aasman ka ek tukda gira laa agar tu saccha hai.
26.188: Usne kaha: Mera Rab behtar jaanta hai jo kuch tum kar rahe ho.
26.189: Phir unhon ne use jhutlaya, to un par Aikah ke din ka saaya azaab toot pada – beshak woh ek bade din ka azaab tha.
26.190: Beshak is mein ek nishani hai, lekin in mein se aksar log imaan nahi laate.
26.191: Aur beshak tumhara Rab hi sab par ghalib, nihayat meherbaan hai.
26.192: Aur beshak yeh (Qur'an) Rab-ul-Aalameen ka nazil kiya hua hai.
26.194: Tumhare dil par – taake tum dara dene waalon mein se ho jaao.
26.196: Aur beshak yeh pehle logon ke kitaabon mein bhi tha.
26.197: Kya inke liye yeh nishani nahi ke Bani Isra'il ke ulema isay jaante hain?
26.198: Agar hum isay kisi gair Arab par nazil karte,
26.200: To bhi ye is par imaan na laate.
26.201: Hum isay aise logon ke dilon mein daakhil karte hain jo zalim hain.
26.202: Woh is par imaan nahi laate jab tak ke dardnaak azaab na dekh lein.
26.203: To woh aayega achanak, jab ke unhein ehsaas bhi na hoga.
26.204: Phir woh kahenge: Kya humein kuch mohulat milegi?
26.205: Kya yeh log hamare azaab mein jaldi kar rahe hain?
26.206: Kya tumne socha, agar hum unhein kuch saalon tak chain dete?
26.207: Phir unpar woh azaab aa jaaye jiska unse wada kiya gaya tha,
26.208: To jo kuch woh chain ke saal guzaar chuke usse unhein koi faida na hoga.
26.209: Aur hum kabhi bhi kisi basti ko halaak nahi karte jab tak ke uske liye dara dene waala bhej na dein.
26.210: Aur yeh Qur'an shayateen ne nazil nahi kiya.
26.211: Na to yeh unke laayak hai, na woh is par qaadir hain.
26.212: Woh to isay sun bhi nahi sakte.
26.213: To tum Allah ke saath kisi aur ko mabood na banao, warna tum azaab paane walon mein ho jaaoge.
26.214: Aur apne qareebi rishtedaaron ko darao.
26.215: Aur un momino ke saath jhuk kar chalo jo tumhaare pairwi karte hain.
26.216: Agar woh tumhari nafarmaani karein to keh do: Main jo kuch tum karte ho usse bari uz-zimma hoon.
26.217: Aur Allah par bharosa rakho jo sab kuch sunne wala, jaanne wala hai.
26.218: Jo tumhein uthata hai jab tum raat mein ibadat ke liye uthte ho.
26.219: Aur tumhara sajda karna dekh raha hota hai.
26.220: Beshak woh sab kuch sunta, jaanta hai.
26.221: Kya main tumhein bataun ke shayateen kis par utarte hain?
26.222: Woh har jhoothe, paapi par utarte hain.
26.223: Jo suntay hain, lekin un mein se aksar jhooth bolte hain.
26.224: Aur sha'ir unhein gumrah karte hain jo gumrah hain.
26.225: Kya tum nahi dekhte ke woh har waadi mein bhatak rahe hote hain?
26.226: Aur woh woh baatein kehte hain jo woh karte nahi.
26.227: Siwa un logon ke jo imaan laaye, neik amal kiye, Allah ko zyada yaad kiya – aur jab unpar zulm kiya gaya to uska badla liya – aur jin logon ne zulm kiya, anqareeb woh jaan lenge ke unka anjaam kya hota hai.

27.1: Taa Seen. Ye Qur’an aur ek roshan Kitaab ki aayaat hain.
27.2: Hidayat aur khushkhabri hai momino ke liye.
27.3: Jo log namaz qayam karte hain, zakat dete hain, aur aakhirat par yaqeen rakhte hain.
27.4: Beshak jo log aakhirat par imaan nahin rakhte, un ke liye humne un ke a’maal ko khushnuma bana diya hai, to woh bhatak rahe hain.
27.5: Wahi log hain jinke liye bura azaab hai, aur wahi log aakhirat mein sab se zyada ghaate mein hain.
27.6: Aur beshak tumhein yeh Qur’an ek Hakeem o Aleem (Hikmat walay aur sab kuch jaanne walay) ki taraf se diya jaa raha hai.
27.7: (Zikar hai) jab Moosa ne apne ghar walon se kaha: Main ek aag dekhta hoon. Main jald hi wahan se koi khabar laata hoon, ya koi jalta hua kanda, taa-ke tum log garam ho sako.
27.8: Phir jab wahan pahuncha to usay pukara gaya: Mubarak hai jo is aag mein hai, aur jo us ke ird gird hai. Aur paak hai Allah, sab jahon ka Rab.
27.9: Aey Moosa! Main hi Allah hoon, Qahhar aur Hakeem.
27.10: Aur apni laathi zameen par phenko. Phir jab us ne dekha ke woh saanp ki tarah hil rahi hai to woh peeth pher kar bhaaga aur peeche mur kar na dekha. (Allah ne farmaya:) Aey Moosa! Daro mat, mere huzoor Rasool dar nahi karte.
27.11: Siwa uske jo zulm kare. Phir burayi ke baad bhalaayi se usay badal de to main to bakhshne wala meherbaan hoon.
27.12: Aur apna haath apne gareban mein daal, chamakta hua nikal aayega bina kisi takleef ke. In do nishaniyon ke saath Firaun aur uske giroh ke paas jao. Yeh to faasiq log hain.
27.13: Phir jab hamari roshan nishaniyaan un ke samne aayi to unhon ne keh diya: Yeh to khula jaadu hai.
27.14: Aur unhon ne inkaar kiya, halan keh un ke dil in par yaqeen la chuke thay. Yeh log zyadati aur ghamand mein mubtala thay.
27.15: Aur beshak humne Dawood aur Suleman ko ilm diya. Aur unhon ne kaha: Allah ka shukar hai jis ne humein apne bohot se momin bandon par fazilat di.
27.16: Aur Suleman Dawood ke waris hue, aur unhon ne kaha: Aey logon! Humein parindon ki boli sikhaayi gayi hai, aur humein har cheez di gayi hai. Yeh to khuli fazilat hai.
27.17: Aur Suleman ke liye un ke jinn, insaan, aur parindon mein se lashkar jama kiya gaya tha, aur woh tarteeb se rakkhe jaate thay.
27.18: Yahan tak ke jab woh sab cheentiyon ki waadi mein pahunche, to ek cheenti ne kaha: Aey cheentiyon! Apne bilon mein chale jao, aisa na ho ke Suleman aur uska lashkar tumhein kuchal de, aur unhein pata bhi na ho.
27.19: To (Suleman) uski baat par muskuraaya aur hans diya, aur kaha: Aey mere Rab! Mujhe taufeeq de ke main tera shukar ada karun un ni’maton ka jo tu ne mujhe aur mere walidain ko di, aur main neik kaam karun jin se tu raazi ho. Aur apni rehmat se mujhe apne neik bandon mein daakhil farma.
27.20: Aur usne parindon ka jaiza liya, aur kaha: Mujhe hudhud nazar nahi aata. Kya woh gayab hai?
27.21: Main use sakht saza doonga, ya usay zabh kar doonga, ya woh koi wazeh uzr laaye.
27.22: To kuch der baad hudhud aaya, aur kaha: Mujhe woh maaloom hua jo tumhein maaloom nahi, aur main Saba ke ilaqe se yaqini khabar laaya hoon.
27.23: Main ne wahan ek aurat dekhi jo un par hukoomat karti hai, aur usay har cheez di gayi hai, aur uska ek azeem takht hai.
27.24: Main ne dekha ke woh aur us ki qaum sooraj ko sajda karte hain Allah ke siwa, aur shaytan ne un ke a’maal un ke liye khushnuma bana diye hain, aur unhein raah se rok diya hai. To woh hidayat nahi paate.
27.25: Woh Allah ko sajda kyun nahi karte jo aasmanon aur zameen ki chhupi cheezon ko zahir karta hai, aur tumhara jaane waala, aur tumhara chhupa rakhnay waala bhi jaanta hai?
27.26: Allah, uske siwa koi maabood nahi. Arsh-e-azeem ka Maalik.
27.27: Suleman ne kaha: Dekhenge, kya tu ne sach kaha hai, ya tu jhooton mein se hai.
27.28: Mera yeh khat le jaa, aur un ke samne daal de, phir un se peechay ho ja, aur dekho ke woh kya jawab dete hain.
27.29: (Malika ne) kaha: Aey sardaro! Mere paas ek izzat wala khat daala gaya hai.
27.30: Woh Suleman ki taraf se hai, aur yeh hai: Bismillah ir-Rahman ir-Raheem.
27.31: Yeh mat kehna ke mere samne ghamand karo, aur mere paas musalmaan ban kar aao.
27.32: Usne kaha: Aey sardaro! Mera mashwara do is kaam mein. Main kisi faisle mein tumhare bagair koi raai nahi banati.
27.33: Unhon ne kaha: Hum quwwat aur saza mein mazboot hain, aur faisla aap ka hai. Dekhiye aap kya hukm karti hain.
27.34: Usne kaha: Jab badshah kisi basti mein daakhil hote hain to usay tabaah kar dete hain, aur us ke izzat walon ko zaleel kar dete hain. Aur yeh kaam woh hamesha karte aaye hain.
27.35: Main unki taraf ek tohfa bhej rahi hoon, phir dekhti hoon ke paigham laane walay kya jawab le kar aate hain.
27.36: Phir jab woh Suleman ke paas aaya to usne kaha: Kya tum mujhe maal se razi karna chahte ho? Jo kuch Allah ne mujhe diya hai woh tumhare diye hue se behtar hai. Balkeh tum hi apne tohfe se khush ho jao!
27.37: Un ki taraf laut jao. Hum zaroor un par aisa lashkar bhejenge jiska muqabla nahi kar sakenge, aur unhein wahan se zaleel kar ke nikaalenge.
27.38: Usne kaha: Aey sardaro! Tum mein kaun hai jo us ka takht mere paas le aaye, is se pehle ke woh mere paas musalmaan hokar aa jaayein?
27.39: Ek taaqatwar jinn bola: Main use aap ke paas le aaoonga is se pehle ke aap apni jagah se uthain. Aur main is par yaqeenan qaadir hoon, ameen hoon.
27.40: Us shaks ne kaha jiske paas kitaab ka ilm tha: Main use aap ke paas laa doonga ek pal mein. Phir jab Suleman ne use apne samne rakha dekha to kaha: Yeh mere Rab ka fazl hai, taa-ke woh mujhe aazmaaye ke main shukar ada karta hoon ya na-shukri.
27.41: Usne kaha: Us ka takht pehchaanne laayak bana do, taa-ke dekhein woh pehchaanti hai ya un logon mein se hai jo hidayat nahin paate.
27.42: Phir jab woh aayi to us se kaha gaya: Kya yeh tumhara takht hai? Usne kaha: (Ajeeb hai) ye to wahi lagta hai. Humein to pehle hi ilm de diya gaya tha, aur hum musalmaan ho gaye thay.
27.43: Aur usay us cheez ne rok liya tha jo woh Allah ke siwa poojti thi, beshak woh ek kaafir qaum mein se thi.
27.44: Us se kaha gaya: Mahal mein daakhil ho jao. Phir jab usne use dekha to samjhi ke yeh gehra talaab hai, aur apne kapre utha liye. Suleman ne kaha: Yeh sheesha se banaya gaya hai. Us ne kaha: Aey mere Rab! Main ne apne aap par zulm kiya, aur main Suleman ke saath Allah, sab jahon ke Rab par imaan laayi.
27.45: Aur humne Samood ki taraf un ke bhai Saleh ko bheja, ke Allah ki ibaadat karo. Phir unhon ne do giroh banakar apas mein jhagd liya.
27.46: Usne kaha: Aey meri qaum! Tum bhalayi se pehle burayi ko jaldi kyun maangte ho? Tum Allah se maafi kyun nahi maangte taa-ke tum par reham kiya jaye?
27.47: Unhon ne kaha: Hum ne to tujhe aur teri qoum ko badnaseeb paaya hai. Saleh ne kaha: Tumhari naseebi ka sabab Allah ke paas hai, balkeh tum log fitne mein mubtala ho.
27.48: Aur us shehar mein nau (9) aadmi thay jo zameen mein bigaadh karte thay aur islaah nahi karte thay.
27.49: Unhon ne kaha: Saleh aur us ke ghar walon par raat ke waqt hamla karo, phir un ke waliyon se keh dena ke hum un ke ghar walon ke halaak hone ke waqt wahan maujood hi nahi thay. Aur hum sach keh rahe hain.
27.50: Unhon ne chaal chali, aur humne bhi ek chaal chali, aur woh samajh nahi paaye.
27.51: Phir dekho ke unki chaal ka anjaam kya hua — humne unhein aur unki qaum ko sab ko halaak kar diya.
27.52: To yeh unke ghar hain jo unke zulm ki wajah se veeran paday hain. Beshak is mein un logon ke liye nishani hai jo ilm rakhte hain.
27.53: Aur humne imaan lanay walon ko bacha liya jo taqwa ikhtiyar karte thay.
27.54: Aur Lut ko yaad karo jab usne apni qaum se kaha: Kya tum khuli badkaari karte ho, halan ke tum dekhte ho?
27.55: Kya tum apni shahwat poori karne ke liye mardon ke paas jaate ho, aur tum log jahil ho?
27.56: To uski qaum ka jawab kuch na tha siwa iske ke usay apni basti se nikaal do, yeh log to bohot paak saaf banna chahte hain.
27.57: Phir humne use aur us ke ghar walon ko bacha liya siwa us ki biwi ke — humne usay peechay rehne walon mein muqarrar kiya.
27.58: Aur un par ek barish barsayi, pas dekho ke un mujrim logon ka anjaam kaisa hua.
27.59: Kaho: Sab tareef Allah ke liye hai, aur salaam ho un bandon par jinhon ko usne chuna. Kya Allah behtar hai ya woh jise tum uska shareek banate ho?
27.60: Woh kaun hai jisne aasmanon aur zameen ko paida kiya, aur tumhare liye aasman se paani barsaya, phir humne uske zariye sabz o shadaab baagh ugaye jinhein tum ugane par qadir na thay? Kya Allah ke saath koi aur maabood hai? Nahin! Balkeh yeh log raaste se bhatak rahe hain.
27.61: Woh kaun hai jisne zameen ko qarar-gaah banaya, us mein dariyaon ko chalaaya, us mein pahadon ko banaya, aur do samundaron ke darmiyan rukawat banayi? Kya Allah ke saath koi aur maabood hai? Nahin! Magar in mein se aksar log ilm nahi rakhte.
27.62: Woh kaun hai jo pareshan halat mein giraftaar insaan ki dua sunta hai jab woh usay pukarta hai, aur takleef door karta hai, aur tumhein zameen mein khalifa banata hai? Kya Allah ke saath koi aur maabood hai? Tum log kam hi naseehat lete ho.
27.63: Woh kaun hai jo tumhein khauf aur umeed ke waqt zameen aur samandar ke andheron mein raasta dikhata hai, aur jo hawaon ko apni rehmat ke aagey khushkhabri banakar bhejta hai? Kya Allah ke saath koi aur maabood hai? Allah un logon se baala o bala hai jise woh shareek banate hain.
27.64: Woh kaun hai jo paida karta hai, phir usay dobaara zindagi deta hai, aur jo tumhein aasman o zameen se rizq deta hai? Kya Allah ke saath koi aur maabood hai? Kaho: Apna daleel lao agar tum sachay ho.
27.65: Kaho: Aasmaanon aur zameen mein Allah ke siwa koi gaib ka ilm nahin rakhta. Aur woh yeh nahi jaante ke woh kab uthaye jayenge.
27.66: Balkeh unka ilm aakhirat se shakk mein hai. Balkeh woh uski taraf se andhey hain. Balkeh woh us se mooh moad lete hain.
27.67: Aur kafir kehte hain: Kya jab hum aur hamare baap dada mitti ban gaye honge to kya humein dobara nikala jayega?
27.68: Yeh waada to humse pehle bhi kiya gaya tha, hamare baap dada se bhi. Yeh kuch bhi nahin siwaate pehle logon ki kahaniyon ke.
27.69: Kaho: Zameen mein chalo phiro aur dekho ke mujrimon ka anjaam kaisa hua.
27.70: Aur tum un par gham na karo, aur na unki chaalon se tangdil ho.
27.71: Aur kehte hain: Yeh waada kab pura hoga agar tum sachay ho?
27.72: Kaho: Ho sakta hai ke jis azaab ko tum jald laane ki taqazaa kar rahe ho, us mein tum mein se kuch log mere peechay hon.
27.73: Aur beshak tumhara Rab logon par badi fazl farmane wala hai, magar in mein se aksar log shukar nahi karte.
27.74: Aur beshak tumhara Rab woh jaanta hai jo unke dil chhupaye hue hain aur jo woh zaahir karte hain.
27.75: Aur zameen mein koi bhi chhupi cheez nahi siwa iske ke woh ek wazeh kitaab mein hai.
27.76: Beshak yeh Qur’an Bani Israeel ke aksar unhi maamlaat mein faisla karta hai jin mein woh ikhtilaf karte hain.
27.77: Aur yeh hidayat hai aur rehmat hai un logon ke liye jo imaan laate hain.
27.78: Beshak tumhara Rab unke darmiyan apne faisle se faisla karega. Aur woh zabardast, sab kuch jaane wala hai.
27.79: To tum Allah par bharosa rakho. Tum yaqeenan roshan haqq par ho.
27.80: Beshak tum murdon ko nahi suna sakte, aur na behron ko apna pukarna suna sakte ho jab woh peeth moad kar bhaag jaate hain.
27.81: Aur na tum andhon ko unki gumraahi se hidayat de sakte ho. Tum sirf un logon ko suna sakte ho jo hamari aayaat par imaan laate hain, phir woh farmabardaar ban jaate hain.
27.82: Aur jab un par azaab ka hukum poora ho jaayega to hum unke liye zameen se ek daabba (creature) nikaalenge jo un se baat karega ke log hamari aayaat par yaqeen nahi laate thay.
27.83: Aur jis din hum har ummat mein se ek giroh un logon ka ikattha karenge jo hamari aayaat ko jhutlate thay, phir unhein roka jaayega.
27.84: Yahan tak ke jab woh aa jaayenge to Allah farmayega: Kya tumne meri aayaat ko jhutlaya halan ke tum unhein poora ilm se nahi jaante thay? Ya tumne kya kiya tha?
27.85: Aur un par azaab ka hukum poora ho jaayega un ke zulm ke sabab, to woh kuch nahin bol sakenge.
27.86: Kya unhein yeh nazar nahi aata ke humne raat ko sukoon ke liye, aur din ko roshan banaya? Beshak is mein un logon ke liye nishaniyan hain jo imaan laate hain.
27.87: Aur jis din soor (trumpet) mein phoonka jaayega to jo aasmanon aur zameen mein hain sab ghabra jaayenge, siwa unke jise Allah chahe. Aur sab us ke huzoor zaleel hokar hazir honge.
27.88: Aur tum pahadon ko dekhoge to samjho ge ke woh jame hue hain, halan ke woh baadalon ki tarah chal rahe honge. Yeh Allah ki sana’at hai jisne har cheez ko mazboot banaya. Beshak woh jo kuch tum karte ho us se baakhabar hai.
27.89: Jo shakhs ek neik amal laye to us ke liye us se behtar jaza hogi. Aur woh log us din ki daang se mehfooz honge.
27.90: Aur jo shakhs bura amal laye to aise log munh ke bal dozakh mein daale jaayenge. Kya tumhein usi ka badla diya jaa raha hai jo tum kiya karte thay?
27.91: Main to bas mujhe hukum diya gaya hai ke is sheher (Makkah) ke Rab ki ibaadat karun jisne ise muqaddas banaya, aur har cheez ka maalik wahi hai. Aur mujhe hukm diya gaya hai ke main musalmaan banoon.
27.92: Aur ke main Qur’an ki tilawat karun. Phir jo hidayat ikhtiyar kare to woh apne hi liye hidayat ikhtiyar karta hai. Aur jo gumraah ho to keh do ke main to sirf daraane walon mein se hoon.
27.93: Aur kaho: Har tareef Allah ke liye hai. Anqareeb tumhein us ki nishaniyan nazar aayengi, to tum unhein pehchan loge. Aur tumhara Rab ghaaful nahi hai un a’maal se jo tum karte ho.

28.2: Yeh Kitaab ki aayaat hain jo saaf saaf bayaan karti hain.
28.3: Hum tumhein Musa aur Fir’awn ka sachcha waaqiya suna rahe hain, un logon ke liye jo imaan laate hain.
28.4: Beshak Fir’awn ne zameen mein ghamand kiya aur uske logon ko girohon mein taqseem kar diya, un mein se ek giroh ko kamzor bana diya, unke beton ko qatal karta aur auraton ko zinda chhod deta. Beshak woh mufsidon mein se tha.
28.5: Aur hum chahte thay ke jin logon ko zameen mein kamzor bana diya gaya tha un par ehsaan karein, aur unhein imam banayein, aur unhein waris banayein.
28.6: Aur unhein zameen mein iqtidaar dein, aur Fir’awn, Haamaan aur unke lashkar ko woh dikhayein jiska unhein darr tha.
28.7: Aur humne Musa ki maa ko wahee ki ke use doodh pilao, phir jab tumhein us par darr ho to use dariya mein daal do, aur na daro, na ghamgin ho. Beshak hum usay tumhari taraf wapas laayenge aur use Rasool banayenge.
28.8: To Fir’awn ke ghar walon ne use uthaa liya taake woh unka dushman aur gham ka sabab bane. Beshak Fir’awn, Haamaan aur unke lashkar ghalati karne wale thay.
28.9: Fir’awn ki biwi ne kaha: Yeh meri aur tumhari aankhon ki thandak hai. Isay qatal na karo, shayad yeh humein faida de ya hum ise beta bana lein. Aur woh samajhte na thay.
28.10: Aur Musa ki maa ka dil khaali ho gaya, woh to use zaahir karne hi waali thi agar hum uske dil ko mazboot na karte taake woh imaan walon mein se rahe.
28.11: Aur usne uski behan se kaha: Uske peeche peeche jao. To woh usay door se dekh rahi thi aur unhein khabar bhi na thi.
28.12: Aur humne us par pehle se doodh haram kar diya tha. To usne kaha: Kya main tumhein ek aise ghar walon ka bataun jo iske liye paalna sambhalen aur woh iske khairkhwah bhi hon?
28.13: To humne usay uski maa ke paas wapas laa diya taake uski aankhen thandak paayein aur woh gham na kare, aur taake woh jaane ke Allah ka waada sachcha hai. Lekin zyadatar log nahi jaante.
28.14: Aur jab woh apni poori jawani ko pahunch gaya aur barh gaya, to humne usay hikmat aur ilm diya. Aur hum neik kaaron ko aise hi jaza dete hain.
28.15: Aur woh shehar mein aise waqt daakhil hua jab uske log gafil so rahe thay. To usne dekha ke do aadmi lad rahe hain, ek uski qaum se hai aur doosra uske dushmanon mein se. To us qaumi aadmi ne usay madad ke liye pukara jo uski qaum se tha. To Musa ne us dushman ko mukka maara aur usay qatal kar diya. Kaha: Yeh shaytaan ka kaam tha. Beshak woh khula gumraah karne wala dushman hai.
28.16: Kaha: Aey mere Rab! Maine apne aap par zulm kiya, to mujhe maaf kar de. To Allah ne usay maaf kar diya. Beshak woh bada bakhshne wala, meherbaan hai.
28.17: Kaha: Aey mere Rab! Jo tu ne mujh par ehsaan kiya, main kabhi mujrim ka madadgaar na banunga.
28.18: Phir agle din woh shehar mein dar kar chhupte hue gaya, phir wahi shakhs jo kal uski madad maang raha tha, usne phir madad maangi. Musa ne kaha: Beshak tum to khuli gumraahi mein ho.
28.19: Phir jab Musa ne us aadmi ko pakarna chaha jo dono ke dushman tha, to usne kaha: Aey Musa! Kya tum mujhe bhi qatal karna chahte ho jaise kal ek shakhs ko qatal kiya tha? Tum to sirf zameen mein jabar karna chahte ho, aur musleh banna nahi chahte.
28.20: Aur ek aadmi shehar ke us siray se dauda aaya, kaha: Aey Musa! Qaum ke sardaar tumhare baare mein mashwara kar rahe hain ke tumhein qatal kar dein. To nikal jao, main tumhara sachcha khairkhwah hoon.
28.21: To woh wahan se nikal gaya dar ke maare dekh raha tha ke kya hota hai. Kaha: Aey mere Rab! Mujhe zalimon se bacha le.
28.22: Aur jab woh Madyan ki taraf rukh karke chala, to kaha: Ummed hai mera Rab mujhe raasta dikha dega.
28.23: Aur jab woh Madyan ke paani ke chashme par pahuncha to usne dekha ke us par log apne jaanwaron ko paani pila rahe hain, aur unse hat kar do auratein hain jo apne jaanwaron ko roke hue hain. Kaha: Tumhara kya maamla hai? Unhon ne kaha: Hum jab tak yeh charwahay chale na jaayein hum paani nahi pilaatein, aur hamara baap bohot boodha hai.
28.24: To Musa ne unke liye paani pilaya, phir ek saaye mein laut aaya, aur kaha: Aey mere Rab! Jo tu mere paas bhej de us khair mein se, main uska mohtaaj hoon.
28.25: To un dono mein se ek larki sharam se chalte hue uske paas aayi, kaha: Mera baap tumhein bulaata hai taake tumhein us kaam ka badla de jo tumne hamare liye kiya. Phir jab Musa uske paas aaya aur usay poora waaqiya sunaya, to usne kaha: Dar mat, ab tu zalimon se bach gaya.
28.26: Un mein se ek ne kaha: Aey abba jaan! Isay naukar rakh lo. Beshak behtareen naukar woh hota hai jo taqatwar aur ameen ho.
28.27: Usne kaha: Main chahata hoon ke main apni ek beti ka nikah tumse kar doon is shart par ke tum aath saal meri naukri karo. Phir agar tum das saal pura kar lo to tumhara ehsaan. Main tum par sakhti nahi karna chahta. Insha’Allah tum mujhe neik logon mein paoge.
28.28: Musa ne kaha: Yeh mere aur tumhare darmiyan ka wada hai. In dono muddaton mein se jo main poori kar doon mujh par koi giraan nahi, aur Allah hamare is qoul ka wakeel hai.
28.29: Phir jab Musa ne muddat poori ki aur apne ghar walon ke saath chala to usne Toor ki taraf ek aag dekhi. Usne apne ghar walon se kaha: Tum thahro, maine ek aag dekhi hai. Shayad main wahan se koi khabar le aaun ya aag ka koi angara laa doon taake tum taap sako.
28.30: Phir jab woh us ke paas aaya to wadi ke daayein kinare ek mubarak jagah mein, ek darakht se usay pukara gaya ke Aey Musa! Main Allah hoon, sab jahaanon ka Rab.
28.31: Aur apni laathi phenko. Phir jab usne dekha ke woh laathi aise hil rahi hai jaise woh saanp hai, to woh peeth moad kar bhaaga aur palat kar bhi na dekha. (Allah ne) farmaya: Aey Musa! Samne aao aur na daro. Beshak tum mehfooz ho.
28.32: Apna haath apne bagal mein daal, woh safed nikal kar aayega bina kisi takleef ke. Aur apna haath jhuka lo (dilon ke) khauf se. Yeh do daleelein hain tumhare Rab ki taraf se Fir’awn aur uske sardaron ke liye. Beshak woh faasiq log hain.
28.33: Musa ne kaha: Aey mere Rab! Maine un mein se ek aadmi ko qatal kiya hai, mujhe darr hai ke woh mujhe qatal kar denge.
28.34: Aur mera bhai Haroon zaban mein mujhse zyada fasih hai. To usay mere saath madad ke liye bhej de, taake woh meri tasdeeq kare. Mujhe darr hai ke woh mujhe jhutla denge.
28.35: (Allah ne) farmaya: Hum tumhare bazu ko tumhare bhai ke zariye mazboot karenge, aur tum dono ko ek qaboo denge. To woh tum tak nahi pahunch sakenge. Hamari aayaat ke zariye. Tum dono aur jo tumhara pairwi kare unki hi jeet hogi.
28.36: Phir jab Musa unke paas hamari khuli khuli nishaniyan le kar aaya, to unhon ne kaha: Yeh to bas ghada hua jaadoo hai. Aur humne yeh baat apne baap dada se nahi suni.
28.37: Aur Musa ne kaha: Mera Rab behtar jaanta hai ke uske paas se hidaayat lekar kaun aaya hai aur kiska anjaam behtar hoga. Beshak zaalim kabhi falaah nahi paate.
28.38: Aur Fir’awn ne kaha: Aey sardaro! Main tumhare liye apne siwa koi mabood nahi jaanta. To aey Hamaan! Mere liye mitti par aag jala kar ek imarat bana do taake main Musa ke mabood tak pahunch sakoon. Aur main to use jhoota samajhta hoon.
28.39: Aur usne aur uske lashkaron ne zameen mein naahaq ghamand kiya, aur samjha ke woh hamari taraf lautaye na jaayenge.
28.40: To humne use aur uske lashkar ko pakad liya aur samandar mein daal diya. To dekh lo ke zaalimon ka anjaam kaisa hota hai.
28.41: Aur humne unhein aise logon ka peshwa banaya jo (logon ko) jahannum ki taraf bulatay hain, aur qayamat ke din unhein koi madad nahi milegi.
28.42: Aur humne is duniya mein unke peeche laanat laga di, aur qayamat ke din woh badsurat logon mein honge.
28.43: Aur beshak humne Musa ko Kitaab di, uske baad ki naslon ke liye roshni aur hidaayat aur rehmat banakar, taake woh naseehat lein.
28.44: Aur tum Toor ke maghribi taraf na thay jab humne Musa ko hukum diya, aur na tum un dekhne walon mein se thay.
28.45: Lekin humne (kai naslon ko) paida kiya, phir un par lambi muddat beet gayi. Aur tum Madayan walon mein rehne waale na thay ke un par hamari aayaat sunaate, lekin hum hi bhejne waale thay.
