28.46: Aur tum Toor ke kinare na thay jab humne pukara, lekin yeh tumhare Rab ki rahmat hai, taake tum us qaum ko darao jinke paas tumse pehle koi daraane wala nahi aaya, taake woh naseehat lein.
28.47: Aur (agar hum Qur’an na bhejte) to jab un par koi museebat aati jo unke haathon ke kaam se hoti, to woh kehte: Aey hamare Rab! Tu ne hamari taraf koi Rasool kyun na bheja taake hum teri aayaat ki pairwi karte aur momin hote.
28.48: Phir jab unke paas hamari taraf se haq aaya to unhon ne kaha: Kyun na use wahi kuch diya gaya jo Musa ko diya gaya tha? Kya unhon ne jo Musa ko diya gaya tha uska inkaar nahi kiya tha? Unhon ne kaha: Dono jaadoogar ek doosre ke madadgaar hain. Aur keh diya: Hum kisi ko bhi nahi maante.
28.49: Kaho: Agar tum sacche ho to laao Allah ke paas se koi kitaab jo in dono se zyada hidaayat wali ho, main uski pairwi karunga.
28.50: Phir agar woh tumhari baat na maanein to samajh lo ke woh bas apni khwahishon ke peeche chale hain. Aur us se zyada gumraah kaun hai jo bina hidaayat ke Allah ke hukm ke apni khwahishon ka paaband ho? Beshak Allah zaalim logon ko hidayat nahi deta.
28.51: Aur beshak humne unke liye kalima kalima karke yeh baat samjha di taake woh naseehat lein.
28.52: Woh log jinhein humne is se pehle kitaab di thi, woh is (Qur’an) par imaan laate hain.
28.53: Aur jab un par yeh padha jaata hai to kehte hain: Hum is par imaan laaye, beshak yeh hamare Rab ki taraf se haq hai. Hum to pehle hi muslim the.
28.54: Aise logon ko unke sabr ke sabab dohara ajar diya jaata hai, aur woh buraai ko bhalai se taalte hain, aur humne jo kuch unhein diya hai us mein se kharch karte hain.
28.55: Aur jab woh lagwaani baaton ko sunte hain to us se mooh moad lete hain aur kehte hain: Hamare liye hamare amal hain aur tumhare liye tumhare amal. Tumhein salaam, hum jaahilon mein se nahi.
28.56: Beshak tum jise chaaho hidaayat nahi de sakte, lekin Allah jise chahta hai hidaayat deta hai. Aur woh hidayat paane walon ko behtar jaanta hai.
28.57: Aur unhon ne kaha: Agar hum is Qur’an ko maan lein to hum apni zameen se nikal diye jaayenge. Kya humne unhein ek haram (aman waali jagah) mein jaga nahi di, jahan har kisam ke phal laye jaate hain – hamari taraf se rozi ke taur par? Lekin unmein se aksar log nahi jaante.
28.58: Aur kitni hi bastiyan humne halaak kar di jin mein unke log apni zindagi mein akarr rahe thay. To woh unke baad mein ab kam hi basaye gaye.
28.59: Aur tumhara Rab bastiyon ko halaak karne wala nahi tha jab tak ke unke markazi shehar mein ek Rasool na bhej de jo unhein hamari aayaat sunaye. Aur hum bastiyon ko halaak nahi karte jab tak unke bashindey zaalim na ban jaayein.
28.60: Aur jo kuch tumhein diya gaya hai woh sirf duniya ki zindagi ka saamaan hai aur uska zeenat hai. Aur jo kuch Allah ke paas hai woh behtar aur baaqi rehne waala hai. Kya tum samajhte nahi ho?
28.61: Kya woh shakhs jise humne acchi rozi di ho, aur woh us se faida utha raha ho, us ke barabar ho sakta hai jo humare azaab mein gira hua ho, aur usay qayamat ke din giraftar kiya jaaye?
28.62: Aur us din Allah unhein pukarega aur poochega: Kahan hain mere woh shareek jinhein tum samjhte thay?
28.63: Woh log jin par hukm lag chuka hoga kahenge: Aey hamare Rab! Yeh log thay jinhein humne gumraah kiya, jaise hum khud gumraah hue, ab hum unse alag hote hain jaise woh humse alag ho rahe hain. Humne tera kehna maan liya tha.
28.64: Aur kaha jaayega: Ab apne woh shareek bulao. To woh unhein pukarenge, lekin woh unhein jawab na denge, aur woh azaab ko dekh lenge. Kaash woh hidayat pa lete.
28.65: Aur us din Allah unhein pukarega aur poochega: Tumne Rasoolon ko kya jawab diya tha?
28.66: To us din un par saari baatein andheri ho jaayengi, aur woh ek doosre se kuch bhi poochh na sakenge.
28.67: Lekin jo tauba kare, imaan laye aur neik amal kare, to ummeed hai ke woh kaamyaab ho jaaye.
28.68: Aur tumhara Rab jo chahta hai paida karta hai aur (jise chahta hai) chunta hai. Unka chunaav (kisi ke kehne se) nahi hota. Allah paak hai aur woh unki shirk se bahut ooncha hai.
28.69: Aur tumhara Rab jaanta hai jo kuch unke seenon mein chhupa hai aur jo kuch woh zaahir karte hain.
28.70: Aur wahi Allah hai jiske siwa koi mabood nahi. Har tareef usi ke liye hai pehle bhi aur aakhir mein bhi. Aur usi ka faisla hoga. Aur usi ki taraf tum lautaye jaoge.
28.71: Kaho: Tumne socha agar Allah tum par raat ko qayamat tak ke liye daaim kar de to Allah ke siwa kaunsa mabood hai jo tumhein roshni de sakta hai? Kya tum suntay nahi ho?
28.72: Kaho: Tumne socha agar Allah tum par din ko qayamat tak ke liye daaim kar de to Allah ke siwa kaunsa mabood hai jo tumhein raat de sake taake tum usmein sukoon karo? Kya tum dekhte nahi ho?
28.73: Aur usi ne tumhare liye raat aur din banaya taake tum usmein sukoon karo aur uske fazl (rozi) ka talab karo, aur taake tum shukar guzaar ho.
28.74: Aur us din Allah unhein pukarega aur poochega: Kahan gaye mere woh shareek jinhein tum samjhte thay?
28.75: Aur hum har ummat mein se ek gawah laayenge, phir kahenge: Apni daleel lao. Phir woh jaan lenge ke haq Allah hi ka hai, aur woh jhoot ghadhte thay.
28.76: Beshak Qaroon Musa ki qaum mein se tha, phir usne un par zyada ghamand kiya. Aur humne usay itne khazaane diye thay ke unki kunjiyan bohot saari log milkar mushkil se utha sakte thay. Jab uski qaum ne us se kaha: Ubhro nahi, Allah ghamand karne walon ko pasand nahi karta.
28.77: Aur Allah ne jo kuch tujhe diya hai us mein aakhirat ka ghar haasil karne ki koshish kar, aur duniya mein se apna hissa bhi bhool mat, aur jaise Allah ne tujh par ehsaan kiya, tu bhi (logon par) ehsaan kar, aur zameen mein fasaad na macha, beshak Allah fasaad karne walon ko pasand nahi karta.
28.78: Usne kaha: Mujhe yeh sab kuch ek ilm ke zariye mila hai jo mere paas hai. Kya usay nahi pata ke Allah ne usse pehle kitni qaumen halaak kar di jo usse zyada taqatwar aur jamaah mein badhtar the? Aur mujrim logon se unke gunaah ke baare mein poochha nahi jaata.
28.79: Phir woh apni qaum ke samne apne zeenat mein nikla. To jo duniya ki zindagi ke talabgaar thay unhon ne kaha: Kaash humein bhi aisa kuch milta jaise Qaroon ko diya gaya hai, beshak woh bada naseebwala hai.
28.80: Aur jinhon ne ilm diya gaya tha unhon ne kaha: Tumhare liye Allah ka sawab behtar hai un logon ke liye jo imaan laate hain aur neik amal karte hain. Aur yeh sawab sirf sabr karne walon ko diya jaata hai.
28.81: Phir humne use aur uske ghar ko zameen mein dafan kar diya. Phir uske paas koi jamaat na thi jo Allah ke muqaable mein uski madad karti, aur na hi woh khud apne aap ko bacha saka.
28.82: Aur jo log kal uski jagah ki tamanna kar rahe thay, woh kehne lage: Afsoos! Allah jise chahta hai rozi kushada deta hai aur jise chahta hai tang kar deta hai. Agar Allah hum par ehsaan na karta to humein bhi zameen mein dafa kar deta. Afsoos! Kaafiron ko falaah nahi milti.
28.83: Yeh aakhirat ka ghar un logon ke liye hai jo zameen mein ghamand aur fasaad nahi chahte, aur achha anjaam muttaqiyon ka hota hai.
28.84: Jo neik amal laayega uske liye usse behtar jaza hogi. Aur jo bura amal laayega to aise logon ko sirf unka kiya hua badla diya jaayega.
28.85: Beshak jisne tum par Qur’an ka farz kiya hai woh tumhein lauta laayega ek waapsi ki jagah. Kaho: Mera Rab behtar jaanta hai us shakhs ko jo hidaayat laya aur us shakhs ko jo khuli gumraahi mein hai.
28.86: Aur tum ummeed nahi rakhte thay ke tum par Qur’an nazil kiya jaayega. Magar yeh tumhare Rab ki rahmat hai. To tum kabhi bhi kafiron ke madadgaar na bano.
28.87: Aur unhein tumhein Allah ki aayaat se na roknay paayein jab woh tum par nazil ho chuki hain. Aur apne Rab ki taraf dawat do. Aur harگز mushrikon mein se na ho jao.
28.88: Aur Allah ke saath kisi aur ko mabood na banaana. Uske siwa koi mabood nahi. Har cheez halaak hone wali hai siwa uske chehre ke. Usi ka hukum hai, aur usi ki taraf tum lautaye jaoge.

29.2: Kya log samajhte hain ke bas kahne se imaan le aayenge? Nahin, jab tak unhein dardnaak musibat na pahunche.
29.3: Aur humne un logon ki imtihan li hai jo un se pehle guzre. Aur Allah zaroor raazi hone walon ko pehchanta hai.
29.4: Kya yahudi sochne lage ke yeh log un se achhay hain? Humne un ke anasir ke darmiyan se un ko khatam kar diya – yeh log ab tak unki qasam khatey hain magar woh unko nahin paaye gaye.
29.5: Yeh log Irāḳ (Misraqī Bartil) mein thay jis par humne apne nishaniyaan nazil ki, phir yeh log use mitti mein dafn hue.
29.6: Aur ye log Bani Isra’il bhi hain – humne un ke liye Qur’ān mein bohot se chappar khule paida kiye aur nehrein behne di, unhon ne to azmat ka maza lete hue kufr kiya, to humne unko ghaate mein gira diya.
29.7: Kya yeh log nahī samajhte ke Allah hi wafā-dār wāhīd hai? Aur jinhon ne uske siwa dusray maabood banaye unki hamd nahi karte.
29.8: Aur jab un par khauf ya umeed aayi to jab humari aayatein padhkar sunai jaati hain to woh unko jhutlā dete hain.
29.9: Aur woh log pewāṛī na paaye jo humse pehle guzre, jab hum unko pareshān karte the; aur Allah unki halat se bahut waaqif hai.
29.10: Aur Aadam ka zikr karo jab usne apne Rab se kahi: Aey mere Rab! Mujhe aur meri biwi ko Jannat mein wuh rehne wala bana, aur humein Gunah se bachake rakh, aur hum tumhari hifazat ka waasta dete hain.
29.11: Phir woh ne us ko gumraah kar diya, phir us ko jahannum mein gira diya; phir uske baad humne duniya mein iske naslon ko paida kiya – aur qayamat tak bhi woh naseeb-e-haanat rahega.
29.12: Aur humne Fir’aun aur uske nazdeekiyon ko naseehat ki; magar unhon ne zalimī kami mein koi kami na hone di.
29.13: Aur humne Fir’aun ke ghar walon mein se un logon ko jo ham pehle hi Nazar ke zariye chune hue thay – aur wo nazdeek hi nahi the – aur humney duniya mein unko ijjat ata ki; phir humne unhein mushkil mein daal diya. Aur woh anqareeb azaab rahe gaya jiski tasveer aati hai.
29.14: Phir humne dono ko zameen se uthaya, sahi tareeqay se, aur duniya mein unke liye aisa aasani di jisme woh tarah-tarah se nishaniyon mein cheeni jaati hain, phir woh mujrimon mein se nikle.
29.15: Aur humne unko aur unki qaum ko samandar mein dooba diya; aur humne unke nazdeek ke shehro par barkat di – par kyun na hum unhein apni hukm se khatam karte?
29.16: Yeh sab humare buray a’mal ke asbaab thay – phir hum unko sabit qadam rakh kar hidayat dete jinhein humchaahte thay.
29.17: Kya unhon ne Quran nahīn dekha ke yeh sub kuch duniya aur akhiraat ke liye ek naseehat hai? Aur aksar log baaqhi qaum se hi wahan pahu nits rahe hain – jo khoob raah par hain.
29.18: Aur jab usne farmaya: Aey mere Rab! Mujhse sabr ka zara imtihan kar – to usne jawab diya: Inke bagair meri rizq hum kabhi na giraun ga.
29.19: Phir hum ne uske liye tahme exploit karin – tum kahoge: 'Meri ibadat ke sahare Allah hi sab kuch kenha phailata hai.' Magar kaash woh log samajhe.
29.20: Aur hum har Rasool ko ek aisa khitab diya ke woh uska imam bana sakte – aur humne unhein duniya mein talaash karne wala farishte bhi banaya.
29.21: Aur hum har un qaum ko “Right Way” mein bhi daakhil kiya – wo qaum jo jinnatein hain – aur hum unhein sunate huye aur dekhte huye daryaban mein rakhte hain.
29.22: Aur jab unke paas humari aayatein pahunchein to woh kehte: 'Yeh baatein to pehle ke logon ki kahaniyan hain.'
29.23: Aur humne un par apna saazish-e-khuda pehra kar diya, phir woh atishe mein daakht ho gaye.
29.24: Aur humare Rasoolon ko jhoota kahte thay – aur jab un par aasman se azaab bhara jaye to woh cheekh kehte: 'Aey hamari barbadi! Hum to zalim thay.'
29.25: Aur hum ne unko us se nikaal diya jo un par sakht zulm karta tha – phir hum un par unke zakaam ka jhokabar barsa diya:
29.26: Siwa un ke walidain ke unke – lekin aksar log shukr guzaar nahin honay par mooh mod lete hain.
29.27: Aur humne duniya mein ek jism-nizaam banaaya ke tum khana khaate ho – lekin woh sab raste woh la rahe hain ke tum kis seedha raasta par ho?
29.28: Aur jab humari aayatein padhi jaati hain to unke andar koi jazbaat ubhar uthte hain hakim not kareingy hidayat ko – phir woh uske baad gum ho jaateh.
29.29: Aur humne zameen aur aasman ko, jin ka humne zikr paaida kiya hai – to kya tum apne Maaboodon ko ikhtiyar kar rahay ho jinhein humne paida nahi kiya, aur woh faqat tum ko khushnuma khata ke nazar mein laate hain?
29.30: Aur agar woh koi saazish karta to kabhi uska saya na reh jaata.
29.31: Aur humne tumhein bada banakar rahey aur tumharay dilon mein 'zil o zulm' ka khauf paida kiya – phir hum tumhein tumhari takleef tak chhod ke jaatey hain – ki tum khud raaste par aa jao.
29.32: Aur humne tumhein ek khushkhabri aur dharaav dene wala paighambar bheja hai, jise log sunate hain but nahin rehte.
29.33: Aur jo log jhooth bolte hain – unhein ghnate wala azaab hai – par unke kaam ne pehchaan diya hai – phir hum har burayi ka asar un par khol dete hain.
29.34: Aur jab humari aayatein unhein samjhai jati hain to zyada nahi badhte siwa ke ke khurooj par (gumraah hone mein).
29.35: Aur hum jab khushi dete hain to unka abar andar badh jaata hai – to woh khade ho jaate hain – atee mumkin hai ke us waqt woh khushi chor de.
29.36: Aur hum jab unko museebat mein dalte hain to woh behad khamosh ho jaate hain – ke woh shayad parakh tra-series kar sakte.
29.37: Aur jab unhein naqla samjhaaya jaata hai to logon ki lode milti hai ke Allah apna sahi saazish milaye.
29.38: Aur jab hum apni rehmat par roshan karte hain to woh darte hain ke unhein jaldi aaayega, lekin woh junoon ko chhodte nahin.
29.39: Aur agar hum unhein sakht azaab ki aik jhoka nazil karein to woh kareeb hosh mein aa jaate hain – aur fir lyah baat me bhalai nahin karte.
29.40: Aur beshak humne Qur’an mein tumhare liye sabk aur Khair ke zariye diya hai, aur har tarah se tanqeebaat hui hai – kya tum samajhte nahin?
29.61: Aur agar tum unse poochho ke aasmaan aur zameen ko kisne paida kiya, aur sooraj aur chand ko kisne musakkhar kiya to zaroor kahenge ke Allah ne. To phir kahan se tum log dhoka kha rahe ho?
29.62: Allah hi hai jo apne bandon mein se jise chahta hai rizq faraham karta hai, aur (jis ke liye chahta hai) tang karta hai. Beshak Allah har cheez ka jaane wala hai.
29.63: Aur agar tum unse poochho ke kisne aasmaan se paani barsaya, phir uske zariye zameen ko uske murdgi ke baad zinda kiya? To zaroor kahenge ke Allah ne. Kaho: Sab tareef Allah hi ke liye hai. Magar in mein se aksar log aqal se kaam nahi lete.
29.64: Yeh duniya ki zindagi to bas khel aur tafreeh hai. Aur asal zindagi to aakhirat ki zindagi hai, kaash woh jaanein.
29.65: Phir jab woh kashtiyon mein sawar hote hain to Allah ko pakdil hokar pukarte hain. Phir jab woh unhein khushki tak pahuncha deta hai, to phir woh shirk karne lagte hain.
29.66: Taa-ke woh hamari di hui ne’mat ka inkaar karein. To kuch arsa maze le lo, phir anqareeb tumhein pata chal jaayega.
29.67: Kya unhon ne yeh nahi dekha ke humne ek pur-aman haram banaya hai, jabke logon ko unke ird gird se utha liya jaata hai (loot liya jaata hai)? Kya phir bhi woh baatil par imaan laate hain, aur Allah ki ni’mat ka inkaar karte hain?
29.68: Aur us se bada zalim kaun ho sakta hai jo Allah par jhoot ghade, ya jab uske paas haqq aaye to ussey jhutlaya? Kya aise kaafiron ka thikaana jahannum mein nahi hai?
29.69: Aur jo log hamare raaste mein mujahida (koshish) karte hain, hum unhein zaroor apne raaste dikhate hain. Aur beshak Allah neik kaaron ke saath hai.

30.3: Qareeb ke mulk mein, lekin woh apni shikast ke baad jald hi ghalib aa jaayenge.
30.4: Teen se nau saal ke andar. Allah ka hi faisla hai pehle bhi aur baad mein bhi. Aur us din momineen khush honge.
30.5: Allah ki madad se. Woh jise chahta hai madad deta hai, aur woh zabardast aur meharbaan hai.
30.6: Yeh Allah ka waada hai. Allah apne waade ke khilaaf nahi karta, lekin aksar log jaante nahi hain.
30.7: Woh sirf duniya ki zindagi ke zaahiri pehlu ko jaante hain, aur woh aakhirat se gaflat mein hain.
30.8: Kya unhon ne apne dil mein yeh ghoor nahi kiya ke Allah ne aasmano aur zameen ko aur jo kuch unke darmiyan hai haqq ke saath aur ek muddat ke liye paida kiya hai? Aur beshak bohot se log apne Rab ki mulaqat ke munkir hain.
30.9: Kya unhon ne zameen mein chal kar yeh nahi dekha ke un se pehle ke logon ka kya anjaam hua? Woh un se taqat mein zyada thay, aur unhon ne zameen ko zyada abad kiya tha, aur paighambaron bhi unke paas khuli nishaniyon ke saath aaye. Phir Allah ne unpar zulm karne waala nahi tha, lekin woh khud apne upar zulm karte thay.
30.10: Phir bura anjaam un logon ka hua jinhon ne burai ki, ke unhon ne Allah ki aayaat ko jhutlaya, aur unka mazaaq udaya.
30.11: Allah hi khalq (paida) karta hai ibtida mein, phir wahi usay dobaara paida karega, phir usi ki taraf tum lautaye jaoge.
30.12: Aur jis din qayamat qayam hogi, mujrim sakht mayoos ho jaayenge.
30.13: Aur unke koi shareek unke liye sifarish karne wale nahi honge, aur woh apne shareekon ke munkir ho jaayenge.
30.14: Aur jis din qayamat qayam hogi, us din woh sab baant diye jaayenge.
30.15: Pas jo log imaan laye aur neik amal kiye, woh ek baagh mein khushhaal aur chain mein honge.
30.16: Aur jin logon ne kufr kiya aur hamari aayaat ko jhutlaya aur aakhirat ki mulaqat ko jhutlaya, woh azaab mein haazir kiye jaayenge.
30.17: Pas tasbeeh karo Allah ki jab shaam hoti hai aur jab subah hoti hai.
30.18: Aur usi ki tareef hai aasmanon aur zameen mein, aur shaam ke waqt bhi aur jab tum zohar mein jaate ho.
30.19: Wahi zinda karta hai aur wahi maarta hai, aur wahi hai jo zameen aur aasman mein raat aur din ka tabadla karta hai. Kya tum nahi samajhte?
30.20: Aur uski nishaniyon mein se yeh hai ke usne tumhein mitti se paida kiya, phir achanak tum insaan ban gaye jo phail rahe ho.
30.21: Aur uski nishaniyon mein se hai ke usne tumhare liye tumhi mein se jodiyan banayi taake tum unke paas sukoon pao, aur usne tumhare darmiyan mohabbat aur rehmat daali. Beshak is mein sochne walon ke liye nishaniyan hain.
30.22: Aur uski nishaniyon mein se hai aasmanon aur zameen ka paida karna, aur tumhari zubanon aur rangon ka ikhtilaaf. Beshak is mein ilm rakhne walon ke liye nishaniyan hain.
30.23: Aur uski nishaniyon mein se hai tumhara raat mein sona aur din mein uske fazl ka talab karna. Beshak is mein sunne walon ke liye nishaniyan hain.
30.24: Aur uski nishaniyon mein se hai ke woh tumhein bijli dikhaata hai khauf aur umeed ke liye, aur woh aasman se paani barsata hai, phir us se zameen ko uske murdah hone ke baad zinda karta hai. Beshak is mein aqal walon ke liye nishaniyan hain.
30.25: Aur uski nishaniyon mein se hai ke aasman aur zameen uske hukm se qayam hain, phir jab woh tumhein ek hi baar zameen se bulayega, to tum nikal aaoge.
30.26: Aur usi ka hai jo kuch aasmanon aur zameen mein hai. Sab usi ke taabedar hain.
30.27: Aur wahi hai jo khalq ka aaghaz karta hai, phir usay dobaara karega, aur yeh uske liye aasaan hai. Aur uske liye sabse oonchi misaal hai aasmanon aur zameen mein, aur wahi zabardast, hakeem hai.
30.28: Usne tumhare liye tumhi mein se misaal bayaan ki: Kya tumhare woh ghulaam jo tumhare qabze mein hain, uss maal mein tumhare barabar ke shareek hain jo humne tumhein diya hai, aur tum unse darte ho jaise tum apne aapas ke logon se darte ho? Is tarah hum aayaat ko tafseel se bayaan karte hain un logon ke liye jo aqal rakhte hain.
30.29: Balki zaalim apni hawaon ka peechha karte hain baghair ilm ke. To jo shakhs ko Allah gumraah kar de, uska koi haami o madadgaar nahi.
30.30: To apna rukh sidhe taur par us deen ki taraf rakho, fitrat Allah ki jis par usne logon ko paida kiya. Allah ki khalqat mein koi tabdili nahi. Yehi seedha deen hai, lekin aksar log nahi jaante.
30.31: Usi ki taraf ruju karo, aur us se daro, aur namaz qayam karo, aur mushrikin mein se na ho jao.
30.32: Un logon mein se jo apna deen tukde tukde kar baithe aur firqon mein bat gaye, har firqa usi par khush hai jo uske paas hai.
30.33: Aur jab logon ko koi takleef pohanchti hai to apne Rab ko pukarte hain uski taraf ruju karke, phir jab woh unhein apni rehmat ka maza chakhaata hai to unmein se kuch apne Rab ke saath shirk karne lagte hain.
30.34: Taa ke woh us cheez ke naashukar ban jaayein jo humne unhein di. To kuch lutf uthalo. Anqareeb tumhein maloom ho jaayega.
30.35: Kya humne unpar koi daleel utari hai jo unhein shirk karne ki ijazat deti hai?
30.36: Aur jab hum logon ko rehmat ka maza chakhaate hain to woh khush ho jaate hain, aur jab unhein unke haathon ke kiye se koi museebat pohanchti hai to woh mayoos ho jaate hain.
30.37: Kya unhon ne nahi dekha ke Allah rozi kushada karta hai jise chahta hai, aur tang karta hai jise chahta hai? Is mein yaqeenan imaan laane walon ke liye nishaniyan hain.
30.38: To qareeb-daar ko uska haqq do, aur mohtaaj ko bhi, aur musafir ko bhi. Yeh behtar hai un logon ke liye jo Allah ka chehra chaahte hain, aur wahi falaah paane wale hain.
30.39: Jo tum sood dete ho taake logon ke maal mein izafa ho jaaye, to woh Allah ke nazdeek nahi badhta. Magar jo tum zakat dete ho Allah ki raza ke liye, to yahi log do guna karne wale hain.
30.40: Allah hi hai jisne tumhein paida kiya, phir tumhein rozi di, phir woh tumhein maut dega, phir woh tumhein zinda karega. Kya tumhare shareekon mein koi aisa hai jo yeh kuch kar sake? Woh paak hai, aur unke shirk se ooncha hai.
30.41: Zameen aur samandar mein fasaad phel gaya hai logon ke haathon ke kiye se, taake Allah unhein kuch maza chakhaaye jo unhon ne kiya hai, taake woh ruju karein.
30.42: Kaho: Zameen mein chalo phiro aur dekho ke un logon ka kya anjaam hua jo pehle thay. Aksar unmein mushrik thay.
30.43: To apna rukh sidhe taur par us deen ki taraf rakho, us se pehle ke woh din aa jaaye jise Allah se koi taal na sake. Us din log alag alag ho jaayenge.
30.44: Jo shakhs kufr karega uska kufr usi par hoga, aur jo neik amal karega woh apne liye raahein saaf karega.
30.45: Taake Allah apne fazl se imaan laane walon aur neik amal karne walon ko jaza de. Beshak woh kaafiron ko pasand nahi karta.
30.46: Aur uski nishaniyon mein se hai ke woh hawaon ko bhejta hai basharat ke taur par, aur taake tumhein apni rehmat ka maza chakhaaye, aur taake kashtiyan uske hukum se chalti rahein, aur taake tum uska fazl talab karo, aur taake tum shukar guzaar bano.
30.47: Aur beshak humne tumse pehle Rasool unki qaumon ke paas bheje, to woh unke paas khuli nishaniyan le kar aaye. Phir humne un logon se inteqam liya jo mujrim thay, aur momineen par hamara farz hai unki madad karna.
30.48: Allah hi hai jo hawaon ko bhejta hai, phir woh badalon ko uthati hain, phir woh unhein aasman mein jaisa chahta hai phaila deta hai, aur unhein tukdon mein taqseem karta hai, phir tum dekhte ho ke us mein se baarish nikalti hai. Phir jab woh us se jis par chahta hai barsaata hai, to woh log khush ho jaate hain.
30.49: Halankeh us se pehle ke woh unpar barse woh mayoos ho rahe thay.
30.50: To dekho Allah ki rehmat ke asraat kaise hain ke woh zameen ko uske murdah hone ke baad zinda karta hai. Beshak wahi murdon ko zinda karega, aur woh har cheez par qudrat rakhta hai.
30.51: Aur agar hum ek hawa bhej dein aur woh use zard (sookha) dekh lein to woh zaroor kufr karne lag jaayenge.
30.52: Pas tum murdon ko nahi suna sakte, aur na hi behron ko apni pukar suna sakte ho jab woh peeth pher ke bhaag jaayein.
30.53: Aur na tum andhon ko unki gumraahi se nikal kar hidayat de sakte ho. Tum to sirf unhi ko suna sakte ho jo hamari aayaat par imaan laate hain aur farmaabardaar ban jaate hain.
30.54: Allah hi hai jisne tumhein kamzori se paida kiya, phir kamzori ke baad taqat di, phir taqat ke baad kamzori aur budhaapa diya. Wahi paida karta hai jo chahta hai, aur wahi sab kuch jaane wala, sab kuch karne wala hai.
30.55: Aur jis din qayamat qayam hogi to mujrim kasam khayenge ke woh sirf ek ghadi bhar the. Aise hi woh ulta phiraaye jaate thay.
30.56: Aur jinhein ilm aur imaan diya gaya woh kahenge: Tum Allah ke likhe ke mutabiq qayamat ke din tak rahe. Ab yeh qayamat ka din hai, magar tum jaante nahi thay.
30.57: To us din zalimon ke liye na koi uzr hoga aur na unse riza karne ka kaha jaayega.
30.58: Aur beshak humne is Qur’an mein logon ke liye har misaal bayaan ki hai. Aur agar tum unke paas koi nishani le aao to woh zaroor kahenge: Tum to jhoot bolne wale ho.
30.59: Is tarah Allah un logon ke dilon par mohr laga deta hai jo ilm se faida nahi uthate.
30.60: Pas sabr karo. Beshak Allah ka waada sach hai. Aur jo log yaqeen nahi rakhte woh tumhein bechain na karein.

31.2: Yeh woh Kitaab hai jisme hikmat hai – tum is par zaroor iman lao agar log Allah ki ibadat karne wale ho.
31.3: Yeh hidayat hai un logon ke liye jo munaasib amal karte hain, aur zakaat ada karte hain, aur un yakin rakhte hain ke unhein apne Rab ke nazdeek lautna hai.
31.4: Aur yeh log wahi hain jo apne Rab ke hukm ke baad sabr se kaam lete hain.
31.5: Aur yeh wahi log hain jo apne Rab ki ayaton ko yaqeen ke saath sunte hain – woh andhon ki tarah nahin jinhon ne har taraf ghum ho jaate hain.
31.6: Aur agar unko bewakht khushkabiari pada karein, to yeh samajhte hain ke woh kisi imtihaan ka hissa hai, aur phir woh palat kar kehte hain: “Yeh humari taraf waqt ke saath barhti hui takleef hai.”
31.7: Un logon ke liye jinko hidayat mili hai aur woh neik amal karte hain, badi kushi ki basharat hai.
31.8: Aur agar woh hidayat na lein, to hum ne unke liye dardnaak saza tayar kar rakhi hai.
31.9: Kya unhon ne nahin dekha ke hum ne zameen bhi tameer ki hai aur usmein pahad aur qudrati rahdariyan bana di hain, aur hum ne usmein rang‑birangi cheezen paida ki? Ye sab momino ke liye daleel hain.
31.10: Aur wahi hai jisne aasman ko nashonuma ka sanad banaya, aur zameen ko aamdani ka. Aur hum in nishaniyon mein yaqeen rakhne wale logon ke liye hidayat bakhshte hain.
31.11: Aur agar hum logon ko ek ek qabre ke mutaabiq saza de dete jo woh kamate hain, to zaroor un par daira bandi kar dete.
31.12: Aur hum ne Adam ko (ilm ata kiya), phir Ibrahim ke awlad ke darmiyan nasab ka silsila chala. Aur humne Adam ko jaahil logon par ilm mein barhawa diya.
31.13: Aur jab Luqman ne apne bete se kehna shuru kiya, to usne kaha: “O mere bete! Allah ki shukriya ada karna — har shakhs par yeh fars hai jise Allah ne nimaton se nawaza hai.”
31.14: Aur hamare Rabb ne insaan se hukum diya ke woh apne walidain ke saath husn‑ekhlaq se pesh aaye, aur agar unmein se koi budhape mein tera saath de raha ho to usse “uff” bhi na kehna, na jhinkaana, balkeh unke liye akhlaq‑nisban neeki se mooh modana aur unke saamne narmi se jhuk jaana, aur dua karna: “Rabb humare! Jaise inho ne hamein bachpan mein paala, tum bhi un par reham farma.”
31.15: Aey mere bete! Islām ke siwa kisi aur deen ko mat apna. Tumhare Rab ne insaaf aur lekin papaadari ke nazdeek samana zaida pasand kiya hai (insani fitrat ne paida kiya hai). Agar tu saarmat balanze kehta hai toh samjho tu ghalat raaste par hai.
31.16: Aur baat‑kabar ho ke banda sirf namaaz, zakat aur neik ka cump-based amal se mumtajji neik nahin banta; balkeh har cheez jiska ilm milti hai usko qabool kar ke amal karna bhi namazi naigi ke saath hota hai.
31.17: Aur kaan, aankh aur dil — in teen cheezon se mutamakin hona — un sab cheezon ka mashq kar ke amal karna hi haqīqat mein sabr hai.
31.18: Aur zameen par akadu mat chao. Beshak Allah us talū qayamat tak zameen ko nahin phaadega, aur na tār-edg ki unchai humse mumkin hai.
31.19: Yeh sab burai ke aamaal hain jin se Allah nabahzat karta hai.
31.20: Kya tum logon ne nahi dekha ke Allah ne tumhare liye jo kuch aasmanon aur zameen mein hai use musakkhar kar diya, aur tumpar apni zaahiri aur baatini ne’matein tamam kar di? Phir bhi logon mein se kuch aise hain jo Allah ke baare mein bagair kisi ilm, hidayat aur roshan kitaab ke jhagadte hain.
31.21: Aur jab unse kaha jata hai ke us cheez ki pairwi karo jo Allah ne nazil ki hai, to kehte hain: Nahi, hum to usi par chalayenge jisme humne apne baap dada ko paya. Kya agar shaitaan unhein dozakh ke azaab ki taraf bula raha ho (tab bhi yeh usi raah par chalenge)?
31.22: Jo shakhs Allah ke aage jhuk gaya aur woh nek amal bhi karta hai, to usne mazboot rassi thaam li, aur sab ka anjaam Allah hi ke haath mein hai.
31.23: Aur jisne kufr ikhtiyar kiya to uska gham na karo. Unka hisaab to sirf Allah ke zimme hai. Aur woh tumhein bata dega jo kuch woh karte rahe.
31.24: Hum unhein thoda sa maza lene dete hain, phir unhein sakht azaab ki taraf kheench le jaayenge.
31.25: Aur agar tum inse poochho ke kisne aasman aur zameen ko paida kiya to zaroor kahenge ke Allah ne. Kaho: Phir kya tum ghalat raaste par ho?
31.26: Aasmaan aur zameen mein jo kuch hai woh Allah ka hai. Beshak Allah be-niyaz hai, tareef ke laayak hai.
31.27: Agar zameen ke sab darakht qalam ban jayein, aur samandar uski siyahi ho, uske baad saat aur samandar usmein mila diye jayein, tab bhi Allah ke kalmaat khatam na honge. Beshak Allah zabardast hai, hakeem hai.
31.28: Tum sab ka paida karna aur dobara uthana ek hi shakhs ke paida karne aur uthane jaisa hai. Beshak Allah sab kuch sunne wala, dekhne wala hai.
31.29: Kya tum ne nahi dekha ke Allah raat ko din mein daakhil karta hai, aur din ko raat mein, aur sooraj aur chand ko musakkhar kiya? Har ek ek muqarrar waqt tak chalta hai. Aur Allah us se bakhabar hai jo kuch tum karte ho.
31.30: Yeh is liye ke Allah hi haqq hai, aur uske siwa jinhein yeh log pukarte hain woh baatil hain. Aur Allah hi buland martabay wala, bada hai.
31.31: Kya tum ne nahi dekha ke kashti samandar mein Allah ke fazl se chalti hai taa-ke woh tumhein apni kuch nishaniyan dikhayein? Beshak is mein har sabr karne wale, shukar karne wale ke liye nishaniyan hain.
31.32: Aur jab unhein samandar mein lehron ne dhank liya jaise ke chhata (chatt), to Allah hi ko pakdil ho kar pukarte hain. Phir jab woh unhein khushki tak bacha laata hai to unmein se kuch log raaste par rehte hain. Aur sirf har dagha baaz, na shukar shakhs hi hamari nishaniyon ka inkaar karta hai.
31.33: Logon! Apne Rab se daro, aur us din ka khauf rakho jab na koi baap apne bete ke kuch kaam aayega, aur na koi beta apne baap ke kuch kaam aayega. Beshak Allah ka waada sach hai. Pas duniya ki zindagi tumhein dhoka na de, aur na dhokebaaz tumhein Allah ke baare mein dhoka de.
31.34: Beshak Allah hi ke paas hai qayamat ka ilm, aur wahi barsata hai baarish, aur jaanta hai jo kuch maaon ke rahmon mein hai. Koi shakhs nahi jaanta ke woh kal kya karega, aur koi shakhs nahi jaanta ke kis zameen mein marega. Beshak Allah hi sab kuch jaanta hai, khabar rakhne wala hai.

32.2: Yeh Kitaab ka naazil kiya jana har tareeq se Rab-ul-aalameen ki taraf se hai.
32.3: Kya yeh log kehte hain ke isay usne ghadh liya hai? Balke yeh haqq hai tere Rab ki taraf se, taa-ke tu un logon ko daraye jinko koi daraane wala nahi aaya tujhse pehle, shayad ke woh hidaayat paayein.
32.4: Allah hi hai jisne aasmanon aur zameen ko aur unke darmiyan ki cheezon ko cheh din mein paida kiya, phir arsh par istaawa kiya. Tumhara koi bhi madadgaar aur sifarish karne wala uske siwa nahi. Kya tum hosh mein nahi aate?
32.5: Woh aasman se zameen tak ka hukm chalata hai, phir woh ek din mein uske paas chadhta hai jo tumhare ginne mein hazaar saal ke barabar hai.
32.6: Yeh hai woh gaib-o-shahadat ka jaanne wala, zabardast, nihayat meherban.
32.7: Jo har cheez ko behtareen tareeq se paida karta hai, aur insaan ki khalq (paidaish) ka aaghaz mitti se karta hai.
32.8: Phir uski nasal ek hakeer pani ke nuchore se nikali.
32.9: Phir usne use durust kiya aur us mein apni rooh phoonki, aur tumhein kaan, aankhen aur dil diye. Tum kam hi shukar karte ho.
32.10: Aur kehte hain: Kya jab hum mitti mein mil jaayenge, to kya hum dobaara paida kiye jaayenge? Balke yeh apne Rab se mulaqat ke munkir hain.
32.11: Kaho: Tumhein moaut ka farishta jo tum par muqarrar kiya gaya hai, wafaat dega, phir tum apne Rab ki taraf lautaye jaoge.
32.12: Kaash tum dekh sako jab mujrim apne Rab ke saamne jhuk kar kahenge: Aey hamare Rab! Humne dekh liya aur sun liya. Ab humein wapas bhej de taa-ke neik amal karein. Ab humein yaqeen ho gaya hai.
32.13: Agar hum chahte to har nafs ko uski hidaayat de dete, lekin meri baat haq ban gayi ke main jahannum ko jinno aur insano se bhar dunga.
32.14: Ab maza chakkho us cheez ka ke tumne us din ki mulaqat ko bhula diya. Humne bhi tumhein bhula diya. Ab hamesha azaab ka maza chakkho us ka badla jo tum karte rahe.
32.15: Hamari aayaat par wahi log imaan late hain jo jab unhein yaad dilayi jaati hain to sajda mein gir jaate hain aur apne Rab ki tasbeeh karte hain, aur woh takabbur nahi karte.
32.16: Unke pehlu bistar se alag rehte hain, woh apne Rab ko dar ke aur umeed ke saath pukarte hain, aur humne unhein jo rozi di us mein se kharch karte hain.
32.17: Koi nahi jaanta ke unke liye aankh ki thandak ka kya kuch chhupa rakha gaya hai, jo unke aamal ka badla hoga.
32.18: Kya woh shakhs jo momin hai us ke barabar ho sakta hai jo faasiq hai? Yeh dono barabar nahi ho sakte.
32.19: Jo log imaan laye aur neik amal kiye unke liye to jannat ki mehmaani hogi, unke aamal ke badle mein.
32.20: Aur jo faasiq hain, unka thikaana dozakh hai. Jab bhi woh us se nikalna chaahenge us mein lauta diye jaayenge, aur kaha jaayega: Chakkho azaab-e-jahannum ka maza, jise tum jhutlaya karte thay.
32.21: Aur hum unhein duniya ke chhote azaab ka maza chakkhate hain bade azaab se pehle, shayad ke woh ruju karein.
32.22: Aur kaun zaalim hai us shakhs se jo apne Rab ki aayaat se nasihat dilaye jaane ke baad bhi unse munh mod le? Hum mujrimon se zaroor inteqam le kar rahenge.
32.23: Aur humne Musa ko Kitaab di, to us mein bhi shak na karo ke tum us se mil rahe ho. Humne usay Bani Isra'il ke liye hidaayat banaya.
32.24: Aur jab unhon ne sabr kiya aur hamari aayaat par yaqeen kiya to humne unmein se rehnuma banaye jo hamare hukum se hidaayat dete thay.
32.25: Beshak tera Rab qayamat ke din unke darmiyan un baaton ka faisla karega jin mein woh ikhtilaaf karte thay.
32.26: Kya unhein yeh dikhayi nahi deta ke hum unse pehle kitni qaumon ko halaak kar chuke hain jo unke rehne ki jagah mein chalte phirte hain? Is mein nishaniyan hain. Kya yeh sunte nahi?
32.27: Kya unhon ne nahi dekha ke hum paani ko sukhi zameen ki taraf le jaate hain, phir us se hara bhara maidan nikaalte hain jismein unke jaanwar bhi charte hain aur woh khud bhi khate hain? Kya yeh nahi dekhte?
32.28: Aur kehte hain: Yeh faisla kab hoga agar tum sachche ho?
32.29: Kaho: Faisle ke din imaan laane walon ko unka imaan kuch faida nahi dega, aur na hi unhein mohlaat di jaayegi.
32.30: Pas unse munh mod lo, aur intezaar karo, woh bhi intezaar kar rahe hain.

33.1: Aey Nabi! Allah se daro aur kafiron aur munafiqon ki baat na maano. Beshak Allah sab kuch jaanta, hikmat wala hai.
33.2: Aur usi ki pairwi karo jo tumhare Rab ki taraf se tumhari taraf wahee ki jaati hai. Beshak Allah jo kuch tum karte ho us se bakhabar hai.
33.3: Aur Allah par bharosa rakho. Aur Allah kaafi hai kaar-saaz (nigehbaan) ke taur par.
33.4: Allah ne kisi aadmi ke seene mein do dil nahi banaye. Aur na usne tumhari un biwiyon ko jinke tum zihar karte ho (unhein maa keh kar) tumhari maa banaya hai. Aur na tumhare god liye hue beton ko tumhara haqiqi beta banaya hai. Yeh to sirf tumhare muh ke alfaaz hain. Aur Allah sach farmata hai aur wahi raasta dikhata hai.
33.5: Apne munh bole beton ko unke (asal) baapon ke naam se pukaro. Yeh Allah ke nazdeek zyada insaaf par mabni hai. Pas agar tum unke baapon ko nahi jaante to woh tumhare deen mein tumhare bhai aur dost hain. Aur jo kuch tumne ghalati se keh diya us par koi giraft nahi, lekin (giraft) us baat par hogi jo tum dil se karo. Aur Allah bakshne wala, raheem hai.
33.6: Nabi momineen ke liye unke apne jaan se zyada haqq rakhte hain, aur Nabi ki biwiyan unki maaon ki tarah hain. Aur rishtedaar Allah ke kitaab mein ek doosre par (mairaas mein) zyada haqq rakhte hain banisbat momineen aur muhajireen ke. Siwa iske ke tum apne doston ke saath neki karna chaaho. Yeh hukm kitaab mein likha hua hai.
33.7: Aur (yaad karo) jab humne nabiyon se ahad liya, aur tumse bhi (aey Muhammad), aur Nooh se, aur Ibrahim se, aur Moosa se, aur Isa ibn-e-Maryam se. Humne unse pakka ahad liya.
33.8: Taa-ke (Allah) sachchon se unki sachchai ke bare mein pooche, aur kafiron ke liye dardnaak azaab tayar kar rakha hai.
33.9: Aey logon jo iman laye ho! Allah ki us ni’mat ko yaad karo jo usne tumhein di, jab tum par lashkaron ne chadhai ki, to humne unpar ek aandhi bheji aur aise lashkar jo tumhein nazar na aaye. Aur Allah jo kuch tum karte ho use dekh raha tha.
33.10: Jab woh tum par upar se aur neeche se chadh aaye, aur jab aankhein phat gayi aur dil mooh ko aa gaye, aur tum Allah ke bare mein mukhtalif gumaano mein pad gaye.
33.11: Wahan momineen aazmaye gaye, aur jhunjhura diye gaye shadeed jhunjhora jaana.
33.12: Aur yaad karo jab munafiq aur jin logon ke dilon mein rog tha kehte thay: Allah aur uske Rasool ne hum se jo waada kiya tha woh sirf dhoka tha.
33.13: Aur jab unmein se ek giroh ne kaha: Aey Yathrib (Madinah) walon! Tumhare liye ab yahan koi jagah nahi, is liye laut chalo. Aur unmein se kuch log Nabi se ijaazat maangne lage, kehte ke hamare ghar khali hain, halan ke woh khali na thay, woh to sirf bhaagna chahte thay.
33.14: Agar un par shehar ke chaaron taraf se dushman ghus aaye hote, phir unse fitna talab karne ko kaha jata to woh use zaroor kartay aur thoda sa bhi dair na karte.
33.15: Halan ke pehle unhon ne Allah se pakka waada kiya tha ke woh peeth na phirayenge. Aur Allah se kiya gaya waada zaroor poocha jayega.
33.16: Kaho: Agar tum bhaag jao, maut ya qatal se, to bhaag kar bhi zyada fayda na utha sakoge. Aur agar (kuch zindagi) bachi bhi to woh kam hi ho gi.
33.17: Kaho: Kaun hai jo tumhein Allah se bacha sakta hai agar woh tumpar bura irada kare, ya tumpar rahmat karna chahe? Aur yeh log Allah ke siwa na kisi ko apna wali paayenge aur na madadgaar.
33.18: Allah un logon ko jaanta hai jo tum mein se (ghazwat-e-ahzab ke waqt) rukawat karte hain, aur jo apne bhaiyon se kehte hain ke hamare paas aa jao. Aur woh jung mein kam hi aate hain.
33.19: Tumpar tangdili ke waqt bakheel hain, phir jab khauf ka waqt aata hai to tum dekhte ho ke tumhari taraf dekha karte hain unki aankhein ghoom rahi hoti hain jaise kisi par maut chhayi ho. Phir jab khauf chala jaata hai to woh tumhein teekhi zubaan se takleef dete hain, maal ke lobhi hain. Yeh log asal mein imaan nahi laye, is liye Allah ne unke aamal zaya kar diye. Aur yeh Allah ke liye asaan hai.
33.20: Yeh log samajhte hain ke lashkar abhi chale nahi gaye. Aur agar lashkar waqayi aa jaayein to yeh yeh chaahenge ke yeh bediyon mein ho kar bedouin logon ke saath ho jaayein, aur wahan se tumhari khabrein puchte rahein. Agar yeh tumhare saath hote to bhi kam hi ladte.
33.21: Tumhare liye Allah ke Rasool mein behtareen misaal hai, uske liye jo Allah aur aakhirat ka din chahta hai, aur Allah ko kasrat se yaad karta hai.
33.22: Aur jab momineen ne lashkaron ko dekha to kaha: Yeh wahi hai jis ka humein Allah aur uske Rasool ne waada diya tha, aur Allah aur uske Rasool ne sach kaha. Aur isne unke imaan aur tasleem mein izafa hi kiya.
33.23: Momineen mein aise log bhi hain jinhon ne Allah se kiya hua ahad sach kar dikhaya. Un mein se kuch apni nazar ko poora kar chuke, aur kuch intezar mein hain. Aur unhon ne apne waade mein koi tabdili nahi ki.
33.24: Taa-ke Allah sachchon ko unki sachchai ka sila de aur munafiqon ko chahe to azaab de, ya un par maafi farma de. Beshak Allah bakshne wala, raheem hai.
33.25: Aur Allah ne kafiron ko unke gusse ke saath waapas pher diya, woh koi bhalaai haasil na kar sake. Aur Allah ne momineen ki taraf se jung ka kaam le liya. Aur Allah zabardast, quwwat wala hai.
33.26: Aur un logon ko jinhon ne unka saath diya (ahl-e-kitab mein se) unke qilon se utaar diya aur unke dilon mein roab daal diya. Tum un mein se ek giroh ko qatal karte thay aur doosron ko qaid kar lete thay.
33.27: Aur Allah ne unki zameen, unke gharon aur unke maal tumhein de diye, aur aisi zameen bhi tumhein di jise tumne kabhi kadam tak nahi rakha tha. Aur Allah har cheez par qadir hai.
33.28: Aey Nabi! Apni biwiyon se keh do: Agar tum duniya ki zindagi aur uski zeenat chahti ho to aao, main tumhein kuch maal de kar achey tareeqe se rukhsat kar doon.
33.29: Aur agar tum Allah aur uske Rasool aur aakhirat ke ghar ki talib ho to (jaan lo ke) Allah ne tum mein se neik aurtoun ke liye bada ajar tayar kar rakha hai.
33.30: Aey Nabi ki biwiyon! Tum mein se jo koi khuli badkaari karegi use dohra azaab diya jaayega. Aur yeh Allah ke liye asaan hai.
33.31: Aur tum mein se jo Allah aur uske Rasool ki farmabardari karegi, aur neik amal karegi, usko hum dohra ajar denge, aur uske liye humne izzat afzaa rizq tayar kar rakha hai.
33.32: Aey Nabi ki biwiyon! Tum aam aurton ki tarah nahi ho. Agar tum Allah se daro to baat mein naram lehja ikhtiyar na karo, warna woh shakhs jiske dil mein rog hai lalach karega. Aur baat hamesha theek kaha karo.
33.33: Apne gharon mein tik kar raho, aur pehle jaahiliyat ki tarah apna banawat na dikhao. Aur namaz qayam karo, zakat do, aur Allah aur uske Rasool ki itaat karo. Beshak Allah chahta hai ke Ahl-e-Bait se gandagi ko door karde, aur tumhein paak saaf karde jese paak karne ka haq hai.
33.34: Aur jo kuch tumhare gharon mein Allah ki aayaat aur hikmat mein se padhi jaati hai use yaad rakho. Beshak Allah lateef hai, khabar rakhne wala hai.
33.35: Muslim mardon aur auraton, momin mardon aur auraton, farmabardar mardon aur auraton, sacche mardon aur auraton, sabr karne wale mardon aur auraton, khushu karne wale mardon aur auraton, sadqa dene wale mardon aur auraton, roze rakhne wale mardon aur auraton, apni haya ki hifazat karne wale mardon aur auraton, aur Allah ka zyada zikr karne wale mardon aur auraton ke liye Allah ne maghfirat aur bada ajar tayar kar rakha hai.
33.36: Aur kisi momin mard ya aurat ke liye yeh laayak nahi ke jab Allah aur uska Rasool kisi faislay ka hukm de de to unke liye apne faislay ka ikhtiyar baqi rahe. Aur jo Allah aur uske Rasool ki nafarmani kare, to woh khuli gumraahi mein pad gaya.
33.37: Aur yaad karo jab tum kehte thay us shakhs se jise Allah ne ni’mat di aur tumne bhi ni’mat di (Zaid se): Apni biwi ko rokey rakho aur Allah se daro. Aur tum apne dil mein woh chhupa rahe thay jise Allah zaahir karne wala tha, aur tum logon se dar rahe thay, halan ke Allah zyada haqdaar hai ke us se daro. Phir jab Zaid ne us se talaaq le li to humne us se tumhara nikaah kar diya taa-ke momineen ke liye apne munh bole beton ki biwiyon se nikaah mein rukawat na rahe jab woh talaaq de dein. Aur Allah ka hukm poora hokar rehta hai.
33.38: Nabi ke liye us kaam mein koi tangi (haraj) nahi jo Allah ne uspar farz kar diya ho. Allah ka yahi tareeqa un sab pehle guzar chukay logon mein raha hai. Aur Allah ka hukm tay shuda hai.
33.39: Jo Allah ke paighaam pahunchaate hain aur us se darte hain, aur Allah ke siwa kisi se nahi darte. Aur Allah hisaab lene ke liye kaafi hai.
33.40: Muhammad tumhare mardon mein se kisi ke baap nahi hain, lekin woh Allah ke Rasool aur sab nabiyon ke mohar (seal) hain. Aur Allah har cheez ka ilm rakhne wala hai.
33.41: Aey logon jo iman laye ho! Allah ka zyada se zyada zikr karo,
33.42: Aur subah shaam uski tasbeeh karo.
33.43: Wahi hai jo tum par rehmat bhejta hai, aur uske farishte bhi, taa-ke woh tumhein andheron se nikaal kar roshni ki taraf le aaye. Aur woh momineen par nihayat meharban hai.
33.44: Jis din woh usse milenge, unka salam hoga 'Salam ho tum par', aur Allah ne unke liye izzat afzaa ajar tayar kar rakha hai.
33.45: Aey Nabi! Humne tumhein gawaah, basharat dene wala aur daraane wala banakar bheja hai,
33.46: Aur Allah ki taraf bulane wala uske hukum se, aur roshan chirag banakar.
33.47: Aur momineen ko basharat de do ke unke liye Allah ki taraf se bada fazl hai.
33.48: Aur kafiron aur munafiqon ki baat na maano, aur unki aziyat ka bardaasht karo, aur Allah par bharosa rakho. Aur Allah kaafi hai kaar-saz.
33.49: Aey logon jo iman laye ho! Agar tum momin auraton se nikaah karo, phir unhein haath lagane se pehle talaaq de do, to un par tumhara kuch haqq nahi kisi iddat ka jo tum gino. To unhein kuch saamaan do aur acchi tarah se chhod do.
33.50: Aey Nabi! Humne tumhare liye halal kar di hain tumhari wo biwiyan jinhein tumne unke mehar de diye, aur wo (auratein) jo Allah ne tumhein mal-e-ghaneemat mein di hain, aur tumhari chachiyon ki betiyan, tumhari khalon ki betiyan, tumhare bhaiyon ki betiyan, tumhari behnon ki betiyan — jin auraton ne tumhare saath hijrat ki, aur wo momin aurat jisne apna aap Nabi ko baksh diya ho agar Nabi usse nikaah karna chahe — yeh khas tumhare liye hai, dusre momineen ke liye nahi. Humne unhein maloom karwa diya hai jo unke biwiyon aur unke malikana haquq mein hai — taa-ke tum par koi tangi na ho. Aur Allah bakshne wala, raheem hai.
33.51: Tum unmein se jise chaho door rakho, aur jise chaho apne paas rakh lo. Aur agar tum unmein se kisi ko wapas bula lo jise tumne alag kiya ho, to tum par koi gunah nahi. Yeh zyada qareeb hai ke unki aankhein thandak paayein, aur gham na karein, aur woh sab par raazi rahen jo tum unhein do. Aur Allah jaanta hai jo kuch tumhare dilon mein hai. Aur Allah sab kuch jaane wala, burdbaar hai.
33.52: Un auraton ke baad ab tumhare liye aur auratein halal nahi, aur na iski ijaazat hai ke unki biwiyan chhod kar kisi aur se nikaah karo, khwa unka husn tumhein kyu na pasand aaye. Siwa uske jo tumhari milk mein aayein. Aur Allah har cheez par nigraani rakhne wala hai.
33.53: Aey logon jo iman laye ho! Nabi ke gharon mein dakhil na ho jab tak tumhein ijazat na di jaye, aur na khana khane ke liye aise waqt mein jao jab tak ke uske banne ka waqt na ho. Balki jab bulaya jaye to jao, aur jab khana khalo to chale jao. Baaton mein ghusne waale ban kar na baitho. Yeh baat Nabi ko takleef deti hai, magar woh tumse sharmaata hai. Aur Allah haqq ko bayaan karne se nahi sharmaata. Aur jab tum Nabi ki biwiyon se koi cheez maango to parde ke peechay se maango. Yeh tumhare aur unke dilon ke liye zyada paaki ka baais hai. Tumhara yeh haqq nahi ke Allah ke Rasool ko takleef do, aur na hi yeh ke uske baad kabhi uski biwiyon se nikaah karo. Yeh Allah ke nazdeek bara gunaah hai.
33.54: Agar tum kisi cheez ko zaahir karo ya chhupao, to Allah har cheez ka ilm rakhta hai.
33.55: Un par (Nabi ki biwiyon par) apne baap, apne beton, apne bhaiyon, bhatijon, bhatijiyon ke beton, behnon ke beton, apni auraton, aur apne gulamon (maalik ke mardon) ke samne koi pabandi nahi. Aur Allah se daro. Beshak Allah har cheez par gawah hai.
33.56: Beshak Allah aur uske farishte Nabi par durood bhejte hain. Aey logon jo iman laye ho! Tum bhi unpar durood bhejo aur khoob salam bhejte raho.
33.57: Jo log Allah aur uske Rasool ko takleef dete hain, unpar duniya aur aakhirat mein Allah ki laanat hai, aur unke liye zillat ka azaab tayar kiya gaya hai.
33.58: Aur jo log momin mardon aur auraton ko bagair kisi kasoor ke takleef dete hain, to unhon ne ek bohot bara jhoot aur khula gunaah uthaya hai.
33.59: Aey Nabi! Apni biwiyon, apni betiyon, aur momino ki auraton se keh do ke apne upar apne jilbaab (chadar) latka liya karein. Yeh zyada qareeb hai ke woh pehchaani jaayein aur pareshaan na ki jaayein. Aur Allah bakshne wala, raheem hai.
33.60: Agar munafiq, wo jin ke dilon mein rog hai, aur Madinah mein afwah phailane waale log, baaz na aayein, to zaroor hum tumhein unke khilaaf utha khada karenge, phir woh wahan tumhare saath mushkil se hi reh sakenge.
33.61: Maloona (la’nat kiye hue) honge, jahan pakde gayein jaayenge, pakad pakad kar qatl kiye jaayenge.
33.62: Yeh Allah ka tareeqa hai jo un logon mein chalta aaya hai jo pehle guzar chuke. Aur tum Allah ke tareeqe mein kabhi koi tabdili nahi paoge.
33.63: Log tumse Qayamat ke baare mein poochte hain. Kaho: Uska ilm to Allah hi ke paas hai. Tumhein kya khabar, shayad qayamat qareeb hi ho.
33.64: Beshak Allah ne kafiron par la’nat ki hai, aur unke liye bhadakti aag tayar kar rakhi hai.
33.65: Jisme woh hamesha rahenge, na koi wali paayenge, na madadgaar.
33.66: Jis din unke mooh aag mein ulte ulte ghaseete jaayenge, woh kahenge: Kaash humne Allah ki itaat ki hoti aur Rasool ki bhi.
33.67: Aur kahenge: Aey Rab! Humne apne sardaron aur apne bado ki itaat ki, to unhon ne humein raah-e-raast se bhatka diya.
33.68: Aey Rab! Unhein dohra azaab de aur unpar badi la’nat bhej.
33.69: Aey logon jo iman laye ho! Un logon ki tarah na ho jao jinhon ne Moosa ko takleef di, phir Allah ne usse jo kuch kehna tha us se bari kar diya. Aur woh Allah ke nazdeek izzat wala tha.
33.70: Aey logon jo iman laye ho! Allah se daro aur baat seedhi kaha karo.
33.71: Woh tumhare aamal ko durust kar dega aur tumhare gunaah maaf kar dega. Aur jo Allah aur uske Rasool ki itaat kare to usne badi kamiyabi haasil ki.
33.72: Beshak humne amaanat aasmanon, zameen aur pahadon ke samne pesh ki to unhon ne use uthana gavarah na kiya aur us se darr gaye. Magar insaan ne use uthaa liya. Beshak woh bara zalim, nadan hai.
33.73: Taa-ke Allah munafiq mardon aur auraton, aur mushrik mardon aur auraton ko azaab de, aur momin mardon aur auraton ki tauba qubool kare. Aur Allah bakshne wala, raheem hai.

34.1: Sab tareef Allah ke liye hai, jiske liye hai jo kuch aasmanon mein hai aur jo kuch zameen mein hai, aur usi ke liye hai tareef aakhirat mein bhi. Aur wahi Hakeem (hikmat wala), Khabir (baakhabar) hai.
34.2: Woh jaanta hai jo kuch zameen mein jaata hai aur jo kuch us se nikalta hai, aur jo kuch aasman se nazil hota hai aur jo kuch us mein chadhta hai. Aur woh meherbaan, bakhshne wala hai.
34.3: Aur kaafir kehte hain: Hum par qayamat nahi aayegi. Kaho: Kyun nahi! Mere Rab ki qasam, zaroor tum par aayegi, jo gaib ka ilm rakhta hai. Asmaan aur zameen mein us se kuch bhi chhupa hua nahi hai, na zarra barabar aur na us se chhota, na bada, magar sab kuch kitaab-e-mubeen mein hai.
34.4: Taake Allah un logon ko jaza de jo imaan laye aur neik amal kiye. Unhi ke liye maghfirat hai aur izzat bhara rizq.
34.5: Aur jinhon ne hamari aayaat ki takzeeb ki, unke liye dardnaak azaab hai, dardnaak azaab ke badle mein.
34.6: Aur jinhein ilm diya gaya hai woh jaante hain ke jo kuch tere Rab ki taraf se tujhe naazil kiya gaya hai woh haq hai, aur woh usi ka raasta dikhata hai jo zabardast, qaabil-e-taareef hai.
34.7: Aur kaafir kehte hain: Kya hum tumhein aisa aadmi batayein jo tumhein batata hai ke jab tum bilkul tor phor diye jaoge to ek naye paidaish mein aaoge?
34.8: Kya usne Allah par jhoot ghada hai ya usay junoon hai? Balki jo log aakhirat par imaan nahi rakhte woh azaab mein mubtala hain aur woh hi sabse badhkar gumraah hain.
34.9: Kya unhon ne aasman aur zameen ko nahi dekha jo unke aage aur peechay hain? Agar hum chahein to unhein zameen mein daasa de ya unpar aasman ka tukda gira dein. Beshak is mein nishani hai har us bande ke liye jo apne Rab ki taraf ruju kare.
34.10: Aur beshak humne Dawood ko apni taraf se fazilat di. (Humne kaha): Aey pahadon! Us ke saath mil kar tasbeeh karo, aur aey parindon (tum bhi)! Aur uske liye loha narm kar diya.
34.11: Ke tayyar karo puri lambi zirah (baktar), aur usmein andaaz se kadiyan jodo, aur neik amal karo. Beshak main jo kuch tum karte ho use dekh raha hoon.
34.12: Aur Sulaiman ke liye humne hawa ko musakhar kar diya, ke uski subah ki raah ek mahine ki thi aur shaam ki raah bhi ek mahine ki. Aur humne uske liye pighla hua taamba bahaaya. Aur kuch jin uske samne uske Rab ke hukum se kaam karte thay. Aur jo unmein se hamare hukum se hat karta, usay hum bhadakte azaab ka maza chakkhate.
34.13: Woh uske liye banate thay jo woh chahta, unchi imaratein, mujaasim (moortiyan), hauz jaise bartans, aur bhari bhari deghen. Aey Dawood ke gharwalo! Shukar ke kaam karo. Aur mere bandon mein kam hi shukar guzaar hain.
34.14: Phir jab humne us par maut ka faisla kiya to jinno ko uski maut ka pata kisi ne nahi diya siwa ek keede ke jo uski laathi ko kha raha tha. Jab woh gir gaya to jinno ko samajh aaya ke agar woh gaib jaante hote to is zaleel karne wale azaab mein na padte.
34.15: Saba ke liye unke gharon mein ek nishani thi – do baagh daayein aur baayein. Khao apne Rab ka rizq aur uska shukar ada karo – ek behtareen sheher aur bakhshne wala Rab.
34.16: Magar unhon ne mooh mod liya, to humne un par sailab ka toufan bhej diya, aur unke dono baagh do aise baaghon mein badal diye jismein bekaar phal, kaante aur kuchh behad kadwe darakht thay.
34.17: Yeh humne unki na-shukri ki saza mein diya. Aur kya hum kisi ke saath zulum karte hain?
34.18: Aur humne unke darmiyan aur un shehron ke darmiyan jinmein humne barkat di thi nazdeek ke raste bana diye. Aur humne unmein safar ke itne asaan marahil banaye ke (kehte thay) raaton aur dino ke waqt unmein sukoon se chalo phiro.
34.19: Magar unhon ne kaha: Aey Rab! Hamare safar ke darmiyan faasla daal de. Aur unhon ne apne upar zulum kiya. To humne unhein afsosnaak qisse bana diya aur unhein bilkul chheer phaad diya. Beshak is mein har sabr karne wale aur shukar karne wale ke liye nishani hai.
34.20: Aur beshak Iblees ne un par apna andaza sahi saabit kar diya. To unmein se zyada log uske peechhe ho liye siwa ek chhoti jamaa’at ke jo momin thay.
34.21: Aur uska un par koi zabardasti nahi thi, magar yeh (azmaish) thi taake hum jaan lein ke kaun aakhirat par imaan rakhta hai aur kaun us se shak mein hai. Aur tera Rab har cheez ka nigraan hai.
34.22: Kaho: Jinhein tum Allah ke siwa mabood samajhte ho unhein pukaro, woh na aasmanon mein zarra barabar kisi cheez ke malik hain na zameen mein, aur na unmein se kisi ka unmein shirkat hai, aur na us mein unka koi madadgaar hai.
34.23: Aur uske paas sifarish kisi ki kuch bhi kaam nahi aati siwa uske jise woh ijazat de. Jab unke dilon se dehshat door ki jaayegi to woh kahenge: Tumhare Rab ne kya farmaya? Woh kahenge: Haq. Aur woh Buland-o-Baala aur Buzurg hai.
34.24: Kaho: Kaun tumhein aasmanon aur zameen se rizq deta hai? Kaho: Allah. Aur beshak hum ya tum hidayat par hain ya khuli gumraahi mein.
34.25: Kaho: Tumse hamara koi gila nahi. Tumhare aamaal tumhare liye hain aur hamare aamaal hamare liye. Hum se kuchh bewajah nahi kiya jaayega.
34.26: Kaho: Hamare Rab humein ikattha karega, phir hamare darmiyan haqq ke saath faisla karega. Aur wahi hai behtareen faisla karne wala, sab jaane wala.
34.27: Kaho: Mujhe woh dikhlao jinko tumne us ke saath shareek banaya hai. Hargiz nahi! Balke woh Allah hai, jo zabardast, hikmat wala hai.
34.28: Aur humne tumhein tamam logon ke liye basharat dene wala aur daraane wala bana kar bheja hai. Lekin zyada log jaante nahi.
34.29: Aur kehte hain: Yeh waada kab poora hoga agar tum sachche ho?
34.30: Kaho: Tumhare liye ek waada ka din hai jise na tum ek ghadi peechhe kar sakte ho aur na aage.
34.31: Aur kaafir kehte hain: Hum is Qur’an ko na maanenge aur na un kitaabon ko jo is se pehle guzri hain. Aur kaash tum dekh sako jab yeh zalim apne Rab ke samne khade kiye jaayenge – ek doosre par ilzaam daal rahe honge.
34.32: Kamzor log un logo se jo bade bante thay kahenge: Agar tum na hote to hum zaroor momin hotay.
34.33: Woh bade log kahenge: Kya humne tumhein hidaayat ke baad gumraah kiya jabke tum khud mujrim thay?
34.34: Aur humne kisi basti mein koi daraane wala nahi bheja magar wahan ke aish karne walon ne kaha: Jo kuch tum laye ho hum uske munkir hain.
34.35: Aur unhon ne kaha: Humare paas maal aur aulaad zyada hai, aur hum par kabhi azaab nahi aayega.
34.36: Kaho: Mera Rab jise chahta hai uski rozi kushada karta hai aur jise chahta hai tang karta hai. Magar zyada log jaante nahi.
34.37: Tumhare maal aur tumhari aulaad woh cheez nahi jo tumhein hamare qurb mein le aaye, magar jo imaan laye aur neik amal kiye – to unke liye do guna jaza hai unke amal ke badle mein, aur woh jannat mein chain se rahenge.
34.38: Aur jo hamari aayaat ki takzeeb karte hain woh azaab mein pakde jaayenge.
34.39: Kaho: Mera Rab apne bandon mein jise chahta hai rozi kushada karta hai aur jise chahta hai tang karta hai. Aur tum jo kuch kharch karte ho, woh uska badal deta hai. Aur woh sab behtareen rozi dene wala hai.
34.40: Aur jis din woh sab ko ikattha karega, phir farishton se kahega: Kya yeh tumhi ko pooja karte thay?
34.41: Woh kahenge: Tu paak hai! Tu hi hamara wali hai, na ke woh. Balke woh jinnon ko pooja karte thay – unmein se zyada un par imaan laate thay.
34.42: To aaj tum ek doosre ke na to faida ke malik ho aur na nuqsaan ke. Aur hum zalimon se kahenge: Chakkho ab us aag ka azaab jise tum jhutlaya karte thay.
34.43: Aur jab unhein hamari saaf saaf aayaat sunayi jaati hain to kehte hain: Yeh to sirf ek aadmi hai jo tumhein rokna chahta hai un cheezon se jinko tumhare baap dada poojte thay. Aur kehte hain: Yeh sirf jhootha jadoo hai.
34.44: Aur humne unhein koi kitaab nahi di thi jisko woh padhte, aur na tumse pehle koi daraane wala unke paas bheja gaya tha.
34.45: Aur unse pehle ke logon ne bhi jhutlaya tha. Aur yeh log us ka daswaan bhi nahi pahunche jaisa unko diya gaya tha – phir unhon ne mere Rasoolon ko jhutlaya, to dekh lo mera inkar kaisa tha!
34.46: Kaho: Main tumhein sirf ek baat ki naseehat karta hoon – ke tum Allah ke liye do do aur ek ek kar ke khade ho jao – phir ghoor karo – tumhare saathi mein koi junoon nahi. Woh to sirf tumhein sakht azaab ke aane se pehle daraane wala hai.
34.47: Kaho: Main tumse is par koi ajar nahi maangta – woh tumhare liye hi hai. Mera ajar to sirf Allah ke zimme hai, aur woh har cheez par gawah hai.
34.48: Kaho: Beshak mera Rab haqq ke saath wahy karta hai – woh sab baaton ko jaane wala hai.
34.49: Kaho: Haqq aa gaya, aur baatil na to shuru kar sakta hai aur na phir waapas laa sakta hai.
34.50: Kaho: Agar main gumraah ho jaata hoon to sirf apne hi nuqsan mein gumraah hota hoon, aur agar main hidaayat par hoon to yeh mere Rab ki wahy ki wajah se hai. Beshak woh sunne wala, qareeb hai.
34.51: Aur kaash tum dekh sakte jab yeh log ghabra jaayenge, phir bach kar na ja sakenge, aur qareeb jagah se pakad liye jaayenge.
34.52: Aur kahenge: Hum us par imaan laaye. Lekin kahan se haasil ho unke liye wo cheez jo pehle door chuki thi?
34.53: Halankeh is se pehle woh is ka inkaar kar chuke thay, aur be-ghaib se teer andazi karte rehte thay.
34.54: Aur unke darmiyan wo rokaawat dal di gayi jaayegi jaise unke hum jins pehle logon ke darmiyan daali gayi thi. Beshak woh bhi shak mein mubtala rehte.

35.1: Sab tareef Allah ke liye hai jo aasmanon aur zameen ka paida karne wala hai, jisne farishton ko paigam rasan banaya do do, teen teen, aur chaar chaar paron wale. Woh apni makhlooq mein jo chahta hai izafa karta hai. Beshak Allah har cheez par qadir hai.
35.2: Jo rehmat Allah logon ke liye khol de, to koi use rok nahi sakta. Aur jo woh rok le to koi use uske baad chhor nahi sakta. Aur woh zabardast hai, hikmat wala hai.
35.3: Aey logon! Allah ki woh ni’mat yaad karo jo usne tum par ki. Kya Allah ke siwa koi aur khaliq hai jo tumhein aasman aur zameen se rizq de? Uske siwa koi maabood nahi, phir tum kahaan phiraye ja rahe ho?
35.4: Agar woh tumhein jhutlayen to (gham na karo), tumse pehle bhi kai Rasool jhutlaye gaye, aur sab ka maamla Allah hi ke hawale kiya gaya.
35.5: Aey logon! Allah ka waada sach hai. To duniya ki zindagi tumhein dhoka na de, aur na dhokebaaz tumhein Allah ke bare mein dhoke mein dale.
35.6: Beshak shaitaan tumhara dushman hai, to usse dushman samjho. Woh to apne giroh ko sirf is liye bulata hai ke woh bhadakti aag ke log ban jaayein.
35.7: Jo log kafir hue unke liye sakht azaab hai. Aur jo log iman laye aur neik amal kiye unke liye maghfirat aur bada ajar hai.
35.8: Kya woh shakhs jiske bure amal uske liye khushnuma bana diye gaye ho (kamaal par hai)? Beshak Allah jise chahta hai gumraah karta hai, aur jise chahta hai hidayat deta hai. To (aey Nabi) is par afsos mein na jao. Beshak Allah unhein jaanta hai jo kuch woh karte hain.
35.9: Aur Allah hi hai jo hawa bhejta hai, to woh badal uthatin hai, phir hum usse ek murda basti ki taraf le jaate hain, aur zameen ko uske murdgi ke baad zinda karte hain. Isi tarah (dobara uthana) hoga.
35.10: Jo shakhs izzat chahta hai to sab izzat Allah ke liye hai. Uski taraf ache alfaaz chadte hain, aur neik amal unhein upar uthata hai. Aur jo log buraiyon ke daam rachte hain unke liye sakht azaab hai, aur unki chaal zaaya ho jaati hai.
35.11: Aur Allah ne tumhein mitti se paida kiya, phir nutfe se, phir tumhein joda banaya. Aur koi aurat na to kuch uthati hai na paida karti hai magar Allah ke ilm se. Aur na koi lambi umr paata hai aur na uski umr se kuch kam hota hai magar yeh sab ek kitaab mein likha hota hai. Beshak yeh Allah ke liye asaan hai.
35.12: Aur do samundar ek se barabar nahi — ek meetha hai, pyasa bujhane wala, peene mein mazedar; aur doosra khara hai, kadwa. Phir bhi tum dono se taaza gosht (machhli) khaate ho aur zevar nikalte ho jise tum pehente ho. Aur tum dekhte ho ke kashtiyan usmein pani cheerti hain taa-ke tum uska fazl talaash karo, aur shukar ada karo.
35.13: Wahi hai jo raat ko din mein daakhil karta hai aur din ko raat mein, aur usne sooraj aur chaand ko musakkhar kiya, har ek muqarrar waqt tak chalta hai. Yahi Allah tumhara Rab hai, usi ki baadshahi hai. Aur jinhein tum uske siwa pukarte ho woh ek dana bhi malik nahi.
35.14: Agar tum unhein pukaro to woh tumhari dua nahi sunte, aur agar sunn bhi lein to tumhara jawab nahi de sakte. Aur qayamat ke din woh tumhare shirk ka inkaar kar denge. Aur tumhein koi us jaisa khabar dene wala nahi milega.
35.15: Aey logon! Tum Allah ke mohtaj ho, aur Allah be-niyaz, tareef ke laayak hai.
35.16: Agar woh chahe to tumhein mita de aur naye log le aaye.
35.17: Aur yeh Allah ke liye kuch mushkil nahi.
35.18: Aur koi bojh uthane wala doosre ka bojh nahi uthayega. Aur agar koi bhaari bojh uthane wala apna bojh uthane ke liye kisi ko bulaye to us mein se kuch bhi na uthaya jaaye, khwa woh uska qareebi rishtedaar hi kyu na ho. Tum un logon ko hi dara sakte ho jo bagair dekhe apne Rab se darte hain aur namaz qayam karte hain. Aur jo paak hota hai, woh apne hi liye paak hota hai. Aur Allah ki taraf hi sab ko lautna hai.
35.19: Aur andha aur dekhne wala barabar nahi.
35.20: Aur na andheray aur roshni barabar hain.
35.21: Aur na saaya aur dhup barabar hain.
35.22: Aur na hi zindon aur murdon mein musawat hai. Beshak Allah jis se chahta hai sunwa deta hai. Aur tum us ko sunwa nahi sakte jo qabron mein hain.
35.23: Tum to sirf ek daraane wale ho.
35.24: Beshak humne tumhein haqq ke saath bheja, basharat dene wala aur daraane wala. Aur har qaum mein ek daraane wala zaroor guzra hai.
35.25: Aur agar yeh tumhein jhuthlayen to in se pehle logon ne bhi jhuthlaya tha. Unke paas unke Rasool roshan daleelon, zabooron aur noorani kitaab ke saath aaye.
35.26: Phir maine in kafiron ko pakda, to meri saza kaisi thi!
35.27: Kya tumne nahi dekha ke Allah aasman se paani barsata hai, phir us se hum mukhtalif rangon ke phal nikalte hain. Aur pahadon mein safed, surkh, aur gehri kali dharion wale raaste hote hain mukhtalif rangon ke.
35.28: Aur insano, janwaron aur maweshiyon mein bhi isi tarah mukhtalif rang hain. Allah ke bandon mein sirf ulema hi us se darte hain. Beshak Allah zabardast hai, bakshne wala hai.
35.29: Beshak jo log Allah ki kitab padhte hain, aur namaz qayam karte hain, aur jo kuch humne unhein diya us mein se raaz-o-niyaz mein kharch karte hain — woh ek tijarat (soda) hai jo kabhi nuqsan mein nahi jaayegi.
35.30: Taa-ke Allah unhein unka poora ajar de aur apne fazl se unhein mazeed de. Beshak woh bakshne wala, shukar ka qabil hai.
35.31: Aur jo kuch humne tumhari taraf kitaab wahee ki hai woh haqq hai, tasdeeq karne wali hai un kitaabon ki jo us se pehle aayi. Beshak Allah apne bandon se bakhabar, dekhne wala hai.
35.32: Phir humne is kitaab ka waris banaya un logon ko jinhein humne apne bandon mein chuna — un mein se kuch to apne upar zulm karne wale hain, kuch mo’tadil hain, aur kuch Allah ke hukum se nekiyon mein sabqat le jaate hain. Yahi bada fazl hai.
35.33: Woh daakhil honge hamesha ke liye adan ke baaghat mein. Unhein wahan sone ke kangano aur motiyon se sajaa jaayega, aur unka libas hoga resham ka.
35.34: Aur woh kahenge: Sab tareef Allah ke liye hai jisne hum se gham door kiya. Beshak hamara Rab bakshne wala, shukar ka qabil hai.
35.35: Jo humein apne fazl se hamesha ke liye ek aise ghar mein le aaya jahan na to humme thakan aayegi aur na hi kabhi uktaahat.
35.36: Aur jin logon ne kufr ikhtiyar kiya unke liye dozakh ki aag hai. Na to unka faisla kiya jaayega ke woh mar jaayein, aur na un se uska azaab halka kiya jaayega. Isi tarah hum har na-shukar ko saza dete hain.
35.37: Aur woh wahan cheekh cheekh kar kahenge: Aey hamare Rab! Humein yahan se nikaal de taa-ke hum neik amal karein (un se behtar jo pehle karte rahe). Kya humne tumhein itni umar nahi di thi ke jo sochne wala hai woh soch leta? Aur tumhare paas daraane wala bhi aaya tha. To ab chakkho (azaab). Zalimon ka koi madadgaar nahi.
35.38: Beshak Allah hi aasmanon aur zameen ke ghayb ko jaanta hai. Beshak woh seenon ka haal bhi jaanta hai.
35.39: Wahi hai jisne tumhein zameen mein khalifa banaya. To jo shakhs kufr karega uska kufr usi ke khilaaf hoga. Aur kafiron ke kufr ki wajah se unka gussa unke Rab ke haan barhta hai. Aur unka nuksaan barhta jaata hai.
35.40: Kaho: Kya tumne kabhi dekha ke tum jinhein Allah ke siwa pukarte ho unhon ne zameen mein kya paida kiya? Ya unka aasman mein koi hissa hai? Lao koi kitaab is se pehle ki (jo is baat ki daleel de), ya koi ilm ka baqaya, agar tum sachche ho.
35.41: Beshak Allah hi hai jo aasmanon aur zameen ko sambhale hue hai ke woh gir na padein. Aur agar woh gir jaayein to Allah ke siwa koi aur unhein sambhal nahi sakta. Beshak woh burdbaar hai, bakshne wala hai.
35.42: Aur unhon ne Allah ke sakht qasmein khai thi ke agar unke paas koi daraane wala aaya to woh har ummat se zyada hidayat par honge. Phir jab unke paas daraane wala aaya to unka bhaagna aur barh gaya.
35.43: Zameen mein bade pan aur buri chaal chalan ki wajah se. Magar buri chaal kisi aur ko nahi balki uske karne wale ko hi nuqsan deti hai. To ab woh kya kisi aur tareeqe ke intezar mein hain jo pehle logon ke liye chala? Tum Allah ke tareeqe mein koi tabdili nahi paoge, aur na tum Allah ke tareeqe mein koi gardish (badlaw) paoge.
35.44: Kya unhon ne zameen mein ghoom phir kar nahi dekha ke un logon ka anjaam kya hua jo unse pehle thay? Halaanke woh unse zyada taqatwar thay. Aur Allah aise kisi cheez se aajiz nahi jo aasmanon aur zameen mein ho. Beshak woh sab kuch jaanta, qudrat rakhta hai.
35.45: Agar Allah logon ko unke aamaal par pakadta to zameen par kisi makhlooq ko zinda na chhorta. Magar woh unhein ek muqarrar waqt tak mohil deta hai. Phir jab unka waqt aa jaata hai to beshak Allah apne bandon ko dekh raha hota hai.

36.3: Beshak tum Rasoolon mein se ho,
36.5: Yeh naazil hua hai zabardast aur nihayat meherban ke taraf se.
36.6: Taake tum un logon ko darao jinke baap dada ko daraaya nahi gaya, is liye woh gaflat mein pade hue hain.
36.7: Unmein zyada logon par sach ka qaul sabit ho chuka hai, so woh imaan nahi laate.
36.8: Humne unke gardano mein tauq daal diye hain jo unki thodiyon tak hain, is wajah se woh sir uthaye hue hain.
36.9: Aur humne unke aage ek deewar aur unke peechhe ek deewar bana di, aur unhein dhak diya, to woh kuch nahi dekhte.
36.10: Unke liye barabar hai ke tum unhein darao ya na darao, woh imaan nahi laayenge.
36.11: Tum to sirf usi ko dara sakte ho jo naseehat maan kar andar se darr gaya ho. To aise shaks ko maghfirat aur izzat bhara ajar suna do.
36.12: Beshak hum hi murdon ko zinda karte hain, aur jo kuch unhon ne aage bheja aur jo kuch peeche chhoda usay likhte hain. Aur har cheez ko humne ek saaf kitaab mein gin rakha hai.
36.13: Aur unhein ek basti ka misaal sunaao, jahan Rasool aaye.
36.14: Jab humne unki taraf do bheje, to unhon ne dono ko jhutlaya, phir humne teesra bheja, to unhon ne kaha: Hum tumhari taraf bheje gaye hain.
36.15: Unhon ne kaha: Tum sirf insaan ho hamare jaise, aur Rahman ne kuch bhi nahi naazil kiya, tum sirf jhoot bol rahe ho.
36.16: Unhon ne kaha: Hamara Rab jaanta hai ke hum zaroor tumhari taraf bheje gaye hain.
36.17: Aur hamare zimmedar sirf paighaam ko saaf taur par pohchana hai.
36.18: Unhon ne kaha: Humne tumhein manhoos samjha hai. Agar tum baaz na aaye to hum zaroor tumhein sangsaar karenge, aur tumhein dardnaak azaab zaroor milega.
36.19: Unhon ne kaha: Tumhari manhoosi tumhare saath hai. Kya is liye ke naseehat ki gayi? Balke tum hadd se badhne waale log ho.
36.20: Aur ek shakhs sheher ke doori se daudta hua aaya, usne kaha: Aey meri qaum ke logon! Paighambaron ki pairwi karo.
36.21: Unki pairwi karo jo tumse koi ajar nahi maangte aur woh raah-e-raast par hain.
36.22: Aur mujhe kya hua ke main us shaks ki ibaadat na karun jisne mujhe paida kiya aur jiske paas tum sabko laut kar jaana hai?
36.23: Kya main us ke siwa doosre ko mabood bana loon? Agar Rahman mujhe koi takleef dena chahe to unki sifarish mujhe kuch bhi na de sakti aur na woh mujhe bacha sakte.
36.24: Tab to main khuli gumraahi mein ho jaaunga.
36.25: Main to tumhare Rab par imaan la chuka hoon, meri baat sun lo.
36.26: Us se kaha gaya: Jannat mein daakhil ho jao. Usne kaha: Kaash meri qaum ko maaloom hota.
36.27: Ke mera Rab mujhe maaf kar diya aur mujhe izzat walon mein shamil kiya.
36.28: Aur uske baad humne uski qaum par koi lashkar nahi utaara aasman se, aur na hi hum utarne wale thay.
36.29: Sirf ek cheekh thi, phir woh achanak bujh gaye.
36.30: Afsos hai bandon par! Koi Rasool unke paas nahi aaya magar unhon ne us ka mazaaq hi banaya.
36.31: Kya unhon ne nahi dekha ke unse pehle kitni naslen halaak kar di gayi jo unki taraf kabhi wapas nahi aayin?
36.32: Aur sab ke sab humare saamne hazir kiye jaayenge.
36.33: Aur ek nishani unke liye murda zameen hai. Humne us mein zindagi bakshi aur us mein se daana nikala jise woh khate hain.
36.34: Aur us mein humne khajoor ke darakht aur angoor ke baagh banaye, aur us mein chashme phod diye.
36.35: Taake woh uske phal khayein – yeh unke haathon ka banaaya hua nahi. Kya phir bhi woh shukar nahi karte?
36.36: Paak hai woh jisne har kisam ke joday banaye – un cheezon mein se jo zameen ugati hai, aur unmein se bhi, aur un cheezon mein se bhi jinhein woh nahi jaante.
36.37: Aur ek nishani unke liye raat hai – hum us mein se din ko kheench lete hain to woh andhere mein reh jaate hain.
36.38: Aur sooraj apne muqarrar manzil ki taraf chal raha hai – yeh zabardast, sab jaane wale ka taqdeer hai.
36.39: Aur chand ke liye humne manzilein muqarrar kar di hain, jab tak ke woh purani khajoor ki shakh ki tarah ho jaata hai.
36.40: Na to sooraj ko yeh zaabta diya gaya ke woh chand ko pakad le, aur na raat din par sabqat le jaati hai – sab ek ek falak mein tair rahe hain.
36.41: Aur unke liye ek nishani yeh bhi hai ke humne unki naslon ko bhari hui kashti mein sawar kiya.
36.42: Aur humne unke liye us jaise aur sawar hone ke saadhan banaye.
36.43: Aur agar hum chahein to unhein gheraab mein gira dein, to na unka koi bachaane wala ho aur na woh bacha sakein.
36.44: Magar humari taraf se rehmat hai aur ek muddat tak ki zindagi ka saamaan.
36.45: Aur jab unhein kaha jaata hai ke tumse pehle jo kuch nazil hua aur jo kuch is waqt nazil ho raha hai uska paalan karo, to woh kehte hain: Hum to us cheez par amal karte hain jise humne apne baap dada se paaya.
36.46: Kya agar unka baap dada be-aqal thay aur hidaayat par na thay (to bhi unki pairwi karenge)?
36.47: Aur jab unhein kaha jaata hai ke jo kuch Allah ne diya hai us mein se kharch karo, to kaafir mominon se kehte hain: Kya hum unhein khilayein jinhein agar Allah chahta to khud khila deta? Tum to bas khuli gumraahi mein ho.
36.48: Aur kehte hain: Yeh waada kab poora hoga agar tum sachche ho?
36.49: Woh sirf ek cheekh ki muntazir hain jo unhein pakad le gi jabke woh jhagad rahe honge.
36.50: Phir na to woh koi wasiyat kar paayenge aur na apne gharon ko laut kar jaa sakenge.
36.51: Aur soor phoonka jaayega, to woh qabron se nikal kar apne Rab ki taraf daud padeinge.
36.52: Kehte honge: Haye hamari tabahi! Kisne humein hamari qabr se utha diya? Yeh wahi hai jo Rahman ne waada kiya tha, aur Rasoolon ne sach kaha tha.
36.53: Bas ek cheekh hogi to sab ek saath hamare saamne laa khade kiye jaayenge.
36.54: Aaj kisi shakhs par zara bhi zulm nahi kiya jaayega – aur tumhein sirf usi ka badla diya jaayega jo tum kiya karte thay.
36.55: Beshak jannat wale aaj maze mein apne kaamon mein khush honge.
36.56: Woh aur unki biwiyan saaye mein takiye laga kar takhton par baithe honge.
36.57: Unke liye wahan phal honge, aur jo kuch woh chahein unke liye hoga.
36.58: Unhein salamti ka paighaam diya jaayega – ‘Salaam’, ek meherban Rab ki taraf se.
36.59: Aur aaj alag ho jao aey mujrim logon!
36.60: Kya main ne tumse, Aey Aadam ke beton, ahad nahi liya tha ke tum shaitaan ki ibaadat na karo? Beshak woh tumhara khula dushman hai.
36.61: Aur yeh ke tum meri ibaadat karo – yeh hi seedha raasta hai.
36.62: Aur usne tum mein se bahut si jamaaton ko gumraah kar diya. Kya tum samajhte nahi thay?
36.63: Yeh woh jahannum hai jiska tumhein waada diya gaya tha.
36.64: Aaj us mein daakhil ho jao apne kufr ke sabab.
36.65: Aaj hum unke mooh par mohar laga denge, aur unke haath hum se bolenge, aur unke paon gawahi denge jo kuch woh kiya karte thay.
36.66: Agar hum chahte to unki aankhein mita dete, phir woh raasta na paa sakte – to phir woh kaise dekhte?
36.67: Aur agar hum chahte to unhein unki jagah par hi rooposh kar dete – phir na woh aage badh sakte aur na peeche lautte.
36.68: Jise hum lambi zindagi dete hain uske haal mein ulat pher kar dete hain – kya woh samajhte nahi hain?
36.69: Aur humne is Nabi ko shayari nahi sikhayi – aur na yeh uske laayak hai – yeh sirf ek naseehat aur saaf Qur’an hai.
36.70: Taake woh daraaye unhein jo zinda hain – aur kaafiron par qaul sabit ho jaaye.
36.71: Kya unhon ne nahi dekha ke humne unke liye apne haathon se banaye huye janwaron mein se mawaashi banaye, jise woh maalik bante hain?
36.72: Aur humne unhein unke liye muti’ bana diya, to kuch unmein se sawari hain aur kuch ko woh khaate hain.
36.73: Aur unmein unke liye faide aur mashroobaat hain – kya phir bhi woh shukar nahi karte?
36.74: Aur unhon ne Allah ke siwa aur mabood bana liye – taake unhein madad mile.
36.75: Woh na unki madad kar sakte hain, aur woh unke liye lashkar ban kar hazir kiye jaayenge.
36.76: To tum unki baaton se gham na khao – hum unke raaz bhi jaante hain aur jo kuch woh zahir karte hain.
36.77: Kya insaan nahi dekhta ke humne use nutfe se paida kiya – phir woh khulaa jhagadne waala ban gaya?
36.78: Aur woh hamare liye misaal banata hai – aur apne paida hone ko bhool jaata hai – kehta hai: Kaun haddiyon ko zindagi dega jab ke woh sadi hui hongi?
36.79: Kaho: Woh hi unhein zindagi dega jisne pehli baar unhein paida kiya – aur woh har makhlooq ka ilm rakhta hai.
36.80: Wohi hai jisne tumhare liye sabz darakht se aag banayi, phir tum us se aag jalate ho.
36.81: Kya woh jinhon ne aasmanon aur zameen ko paida kiya un jaise logon ko paida karne par qadir nahi? Beshak woh qadir hai.
36.82: Uska kaam sirf itna hai ke jab woh kisi cheez ka irada karta hai to kehta hai: ‘Ho ja’, to woh ho jaati hai.
36.83: Pas paak hai woh jiske haath mein har cheez ka ikhtiyaar hai, aur usi ki taraf tum lautaye jaoge.

37.1: Qasam hai un (farishton) ki jo saf baandhte hain,
37.3: Phir zikr (Allah ka) sunane wale hain,
37.4: Beshak tumhara Ma’bood yaqeenan ek hi hai,
37.5: Rab aasmanon aur zameen ka aur un sab cheezon ka jo unke darmiyan hain, aur mashriqon ka bhi, (Wahi hai).
Aasmaanon aur zameen ka Rubb, aur jo kuch in dono ke darmiyan hai, aur mashriqon ka Rubb hai.
37.6: Beshak humne qareeb ke aasmaan ko sitaron ki zeenat se saja diya hai.
37.7: Aur har sarkash shaitaan se usko mehfooz kar diya hai.
37.8: Woh farishton ki baatein nahi sun sakte, aur har taraf se un par pathar barsaye jaate hain.
37.9: Unhein door kar diya jata hai, aur unke liye daaim azaab hai.
37.10: Magar koi ek baat chura le to uska peecha ek roshan sholah (shola-e-aag) karta hai.
37.11: To (aey Nabi) inse puchho: Kya unka banana zyada mushkil hai ya humne jinhein paida kiya? Humne unhein chipakne wale gareet se paida kiya.
37.12: Balki tum hairan ho aur woh mazaak uda rahe hain.
37.13: Aur jab unhein naseehat ki jaati hai to woh naseehat qabool nahi karte.
37.14: Aur jab woh koi nishani dekhte hain to uska mazaaq udaate hain.
37.15: Aur kehte hain: Yeh to khula jaadu hai.
37.16: Kya jab hum mar jaayenge, mitti aur haddiyan ban jaayenge to kya hum dobara uthaye jaayenge?
37.17: Aur kya hamare baap dada bhi?
37.18: Kaho: Haan, aur tum sab zaleel honge.
37.19: Bas woh ek zabardast aawaz hogi, aur achanak woh dekh rahe honge.
37.20: Aur kahenge: Haye hamari tabahi! Yeh to badla lene ka din hai.
37.21: Yeh woh din hai faislay ka jis mein tum jhutlaya karte thay.
37.22: (Allah kahega) Jama karo un sab ko jinhon ne zulm kiya, unke sathi, aur jise woh pooja karte thay.
37.23: Allah ke siwa, aur unhein jahannam ka rasta dikhao.
37.24: Aur unhein thoda rok lo, kyun ke unse poochna hai.
37.25: Tumhein kya hua ke tum ek doosre ki madad nahi karte?
37.26: Balki woh aaj jhuk gaye hain.
37.27: Aur kuch ek doosre ki taraf palat rahe hain poochhne ke liye.
37.28: Kehenge: Tum hi hamare paas daayein (daai) bankar aate thay.
37.29: Woh kahenge: Nahin! Tum khud momin banne waale na thay.
37.30: Aur hamara tum par koi zabardasti ka zor na tha. Balki tum hi sarkash log thay.
37.31: To hamare Rubb ka farman hum par sacha sabit ho gaya. Ab hum zaroor azaab chakh rahe hain.
37.32: To humne tumhein behkaya, kyunke hum khud behke hue thay.
37.33: To us din woh sab azaab mein mushtarak honge.
37.34: Beshak hum mujrimon ke saath yahi sulook karte hain.
37.35: Kyunkay jab unse kaha jaata tha ke Allah ke siwa koi aur maabood nahi, to woh takabbur karte thay.
37.36: Aur kehte thay: Kya hum ek shair paagal ke kehne se apne maaboodon ko chhod dein?
37.37: Balki woh haqq lekar aaya, aur sab Rasoolon ki tasdeeq karta hai.
37.38: Beshak tum zaroor dardnaak azaab ka maza chakhne waale ho.
37.39: Aur tumhein tumhare aamaal ke siwa kuch aur badla nahi diya jaa raha.
37.40: Magar Allah ke chune hue (khaalis) bande (is azaab se bache hue honge).
Magar Allah ke chune hue (khaalis) bande (is azaab se bache hue honge).
37.42: Har tarah ke mewe; aur woh izzat diye gaye honge.
37.44: Bistaron par aamne saamne baithne wale.
37.45: Unke gird sharbat ke jaame ghoom rahe honge, chashme se bhare hue.
37.46: Chamakdar safed sharbat, jo peene walon ke liye lazeez hoga.
37.47: Na usmein koi nasha hoga, na woh behakne wale honge.
37.48: Aur unke paas neechi nazar rakhne wali, haseen aankhon wali (auratein) hongi.
37.49: Aisa lagta hai jaise woh ande mein chhupi hui moti ho.
37.50: Phir woh ek doosre ki taraf muqabil ho kar poochhne lagte hain.
37.51: Un mein se ek kehne wala kahega: Beshak mera ek saathi tha,
37.52: Jo mujhse kaha karta: Kya tum bhi tasdeeq karne walon mein se ho?
37.53: Kya jab hum mar chuke honge aur mitti aur haddiyan ban jaayenge, to kya hum hisaab ke liye uthaye jaayenge?
37.54: Kya tum log (use) dekhna chahte ho?
37.55: Phir usne jhank kar dekha, to use jahannum ke beech mein dekha.
37.56: Kaha: Allah ki kasam! Tum to mujhe bhi halakat mein daal deta.
37.57: Aur agar mere Rubb ka fazl na hota to main bhi pakda gaya hota.
37.58: Kya ab hum marne waale nahi hain?
37.59: Siwa hamari pehli maut ke? Aur na hum azaab diye jaayenge?
37.60: Beshak yeh badi badi kamiyabi hai.
37.61: Aise logon ke liye amal karne walon ko amal karna chahiye.
37.62: Kya yeh mehmaan nawazi behtar hai ya zaqqum ka darakht?
37.63: Beshak humne us darakht ko zalimon ke liye ek aazmaish banaya hai.
37.64: Woh ek darakht hai jo jahannum ke neechay ke hisse se nikalta hai.
37.65: Uske phal aise hain jaise shaitanon ke sar.
37.66: Woh log us mein se khaayenge aur apna pait bhar lenge.
37.67: Phir unke liye us par garam paani milaya jaayega.
37.68: Phir unki baapsi jahannum ki taraf hi hogi.
37.69: Beshak unhon ne apne baap dada ko gumraahi mein paaya,
37.70: Aur woh unke naqsh-e-qadam par daud rahe hain.
37.71: Unse pehle aksar log gumraah ho chuke hain.
37.72: Aur humne un mein daraane walay bheje thay.
37.73: To dekho daraaye jaane walon ka anjaam kaisa hua!
37.74: Magar Allah ke chune hue bande (baaqi) rahe.
37.75: Aur Nooh ne humein pukara, to hum kitne behtareen jawab dene wale hain.
37.76: Aur humne use aur uske ghar walon ko badi museebat se nijaat di.
37.77: Aur uski nasl ko baaqi rakh diya.
