37.78: Aur baad mein aane walon mein uska zikr chhod diya.
37.79: Salaam ho Nooh par duniyaon mein.
37.80: Beshak hum neik amal karne walon ko aise hi badla dete hain.
37.81: Beshak woh hamare mo’min bandon mein se tha.
37.82: Phir humne baaqi sab ko dobo diya.
37.83: Aur beshak Ibraheem bhi usi ki qaum se tha.
37.84: Jab woh apne Rubb ke paas poore dil se aaya.
37.85: Jab usne apne baap aur qaum se kaha: Tum kis cheez ki ibadat karte ho?
37.86: Kya jhoot ghadey hue maaboodon ko chahte ho Allah ke siwa?
37.87: To tumhara Allah ke bare mein kya khayal hai?
37.88: Phir usne sitaron ki taraf ek nazar daali.
37.89: Aur kaha: Main to bimar hoon.
37.90: To woh sab us se moo morh kar chalay gaye.
37.91: Phir unhon ne unki taraf peeth phairi aur kaha: Kya tum khate nahi ho?
37.92: Tumhein kya ho gaya hai ke bolte nahi ho?
37.93: Phir un par zor se haath maara (toot phoot kar diyaa).
37.95: Kaha: Kya tum un cheezon ki ibadat karte ho jinhein tum khud tarashte ho?
37.96: Halaanke Allah hi ne tumhein aur tumhare amal ko paida kiya hai.
37.97: Unhon ne kaha: Iske liye ek bhatti banwao, aur isey bhadakti aag mein daal do.
37.98: Phir unhon ne iske saath chhaal kiya, to humne unhein neecha kar diya.
37.99: Aur usne kaha: Main apne Rubb ki taraf jaane wala hoon, woh zaroor meri rehnumayi karega.
37.100: Aey mere Rubb! Mujhe neik aulaad ata farma.
37.101: To humne usse haleem (bardasht karne wala) beta ki basharat di.
37.102: Phir jab woh (beta) uske saath chalne phirne ki umar ko pahuncha to usne kaha: Aey mere bete! Main ne khwab mein dekha ke main tujhe zabah kar raha hoon. Ab tu dekh, tera kya khayaal hai? Usne kaha: Aey abba! Jo hukm diya gaya hai use kar dijiye. InshaAllah aap mujhe sabr karne walon mein paayenge.
37.103: Phir jab dono ne tasleem kar liya (hukm ko) aur usne use maathe ke bal lita diya,
37.104: Aur humne usko pukara: Aey Ibraheem!
37.105: Tumne apna khwab saccha kar dikhaya. Beshak yeh khuli aazmaish thi.
37.106: Aur humne iske badle ek bade qurbani (dumba) ka intezam kiya.
37.107: Aur humne uska zikr baad ki naslon mein chhod diya.
37.109: Hum neik amal karne walon ko aise hi badla dete hain.
37.110: Beshak woh hamare mo’min bandon mein se tha.
37.111: Aur humne usse Ishaq ki basharat di, ek Nabi neik logo mein se.
37.112: Aur usko aur Ishaq ko barakat di. Aur un dono ki nasl mein kuch neik aur kuch khuli naframaan the.
37.113: Aur beshak humne Moosa aur Haroon par bhi ehsaan kiya.
37.114: Aur unhein aur unki qaum ko bade sakht gham se nijaat di.
37.115: Aur unhein madad di to woh hi ghaalib rahe.
37.116: Aur unhein ek saaf raasta dikhaya.
37.117: Aur unhein yaadgar bana diya unke baad aane walon ke liye.
37.118: Salaam ho Moosa aur Haroon par.
37.119: Hum neik amal karne walon ko aise hi badla dete hain.
37.120: Beshak woh hamare mo’min bandon mein se thay.
37.121: Aur beshak Ilyas bhi Rasoolon mein se tha.
37.122: Jab usne apni qaum se kaha: Kya tum dar nahi rakhte?
37.123: Kya tum Ba’al (but) ko pukarte ho, aur behtareen khaliq ko chhod dete ho?
37.124: Allah ko, jo tumhara Rubb hai, aur tumhare pehle baap dada ka Rubb.
37.125: Phir unhon ne usay jhutlaya, to woh sab pakde gaye.
37.126: Magar Allah ke chune hue (khaalis) banday (bache rahe).
37.127: Aur humne unka zikr baad ki naslon mein chhod diya.
37.129: Hum neik amal karne walon ko aise hi badla dete hain.
37.130: Beshak woh hamare mo’min bandon mein se tha.
37.131: Aur beshak Lut bhi Rasoolon mein se tha.
37.132: Yaad karo jab humne usko aur uske sab ghar walon ko nijaat di.
37.133: Magar ek budee (aurat) jo peeche reh jaane walon mein thi.
37.134: Phir humne baaki sab ko tabaah kar diya.
37.135: Aur beshak tum subah uthte waqt unke gharon ke paas se guzarte ho.
37.136: Aur raat mein bhi. Kya tum samajhte nahi?
37.137: Aur beshak Yunus bhi Rasoolon mein se tha.
37.138: Yaad karo jab woh ek bhari bharkam kashti ki taraf bhaaga.
37.139: Phir usne qura andazi ki, to woh ghata dene walon mein se ho gaya.
37.140: Phir usay machhli ne nigal liya aur woh malamat ke laayak tha.
37.141: Phir agar woh tasbeeh karne walon mein se na hota,
37.142: To uske pait mein qayamat tak rehta.
37.143: Phir humne usay ek khula maidan mein phenk diya, aur woh bimar tha.
37.144: Aur humne uspar ek bael darakht uga diya.
37.145: Aur humne usko ek lakh ya usse zyada logon ki taraf bheja.
37.146: Phir woh iman laaye, to humne unhein ek waqt tak mazay ki zindagi di.
37.147: To unse puchho: Kya tumhare Rubb ke liye betiyan hain aur inke liye beton?
37.148: Ya humne farishton ko auratein banaya, aur yeh dekh rahe thay?
37.149: Khabardaar! Yeh apni ifk (jhuth) gadh rahe hain jab ke kehte hain:
37.150: Allah ne farishton ko betiyan banaya hai.
37.151: Sunte raho! Yeh log jhoot bolte hain.
37.152: Kya Allah ne betiyan pasand ki aur tumhein beton se nawaza?
37.153: Tumhein kya ho gaya hai, tum kaise faisla karte ho?
37.155: Ya tumhare paas koi saaf kitaab hai?
37.156: Ke usmein tumhein yeh likha hua milta ho ke tumhare liye beton hain aur Allah ke liye betiyan?
37.157: Ya tumhare paas koi sanad (daleel) hai, to lao agar tum sachche ho.
37.158: Aur unhon ne Allah aur farishton ke darmiyan nasab ka ta’alluq banaya. Halaanke farishton ko maloom hai ke yeh log pakad ke laayak hain.
37.159: Allah un baaton se paak hai jo yeh log bayan karte hain.
37.160: Magar Allah ke khaalis banday (is se paak hain).
37.161: To tum aur tumhare poojne wale,
37.162: Kisi ko uske khilaf gumraah nahi kar sakte,
37.163: Magar usi ko jo bhadakte hue aag mein daakhil hoga.
37.164: Aur (farishte) kehte hain: Ham mein se koi bhi nahin, magar uska maqam maloom hai.
37.165: Aur hum to saf dar saf khade rehte hain.
37.166: Aur hum tasbeeh karte rehte hain.
37.168: Kaash hamare paas bhi pehle logon ki kitaab hoti,
37.169: To hum Allah ke mukhlis (khaalis) banday ban jaate.
37.170: To (ab) woh is (Qur’an) ko jhutlate hain, to anqareeb unhein (azaab ka) pata chal jaayega.
37.171: Aur beshak hamara kalma (waada) hamare bheje huye bandon ke liye pehle hi sabit ho chuka hai.
37.172: Ke beshak unhi ka ghalba hoga.
37.173: Aur beshak hamari lashkar (fauj) hi ghalib rahegi.
37.174: To ek waqt tak un se munh morh lo.
37.176: Kya woh hamare azaab ko jald laana chahte hain?
37.177: To jab woh unke aangan mein utrega to bura subah hoga unke liye jinhein daraya gaya tha.
37.178: Aur ek waqt tak unse munh morh lo.
37.180: Tumhara Rubb, izzat wala, un baaton se paak hai jo woh bayaan karte hain.
37.182: Aur sab tareef Allah ke liye hai, jo sab jahanon ka Rubb hai.

38.2: Balki yeh log takabbur aur mukhalfat mein pad gaye hain.
38.3: Unse pehle humne kitni naslein halaak ki jinhein unhon ne pukara – magar woh nikalne ka waqt na tha.
38.4: Aur yeh is baat par hairaan hain ke unke paas ek darane wala unhi mein se aa gaya – aur kafiron ne kaha: Yeh to jaadugar aur jhoota hai.
38.5: Kya isne sab ilaahon ko ek hi Ilaah bana diya? Yeh to ajeeb baat hai.
38.6: Aur sardaron ne kaha: Chalo aur apne ilaahon par jamay raho – yeh to bas ek chaal hai jo chali gayi hai.
38.7: Humne to yeh baat pichhli qaumon mein nahi suni – yeh to bas ek gadh banayi gayi baat hai.
38.8: Kya hidaayat hum mein se is par naazil hui hai? Balki yeh shakhs jhooti baat hai – balke woh jhoota hai.
38.9: Kya unke paas tumhara Rubb ki rehmat ke khazane hain, woh zabardast ata karne wala hai?
38.10: Ya unke paas aasmanon aur zameen aur in ke darmiyan jo kuch hai us par hukumat hai? To woh bulandi par chadh kar dekhen.
38.11: Yeh bas ek jamaa’at hai jo yahan shikast khayegi.
38.12: Unse pehle Nooh ki qaum, Aad aur mekhon wale Fir’awn ne jhutlaya.
38.13: Aur Samood, Lut ke log, aur Aikah walon ne bhi – yeh sab jhutlane wale the.
38.14: In sab ne Rasoolon ko jhutlaya, to mera azaab un par laazim ho gaya.
38.15: Aur yeh log sirf ek cheekh ka intezar kar rahe hain – jismein koi taakhir na hogi.
38.16: Aur kehte hain: Aey hamare Rubb! Hamaara hissa humein roz-e-hisaab se pehle hi de de.
38.17: Unki baaton par sabr karo, aur daawood ka zikr karo jo hamara banda tha – woh bada ruju karne waala tha.
38.18: Humne pahaadon ko uske saath musakhar kar diya – jo shaam ko aur subah ko tasbeeh karte.
38.19: Aur parindon ko bhi jama kar diya – sab us ke paas jamaa hote.
38.20: Aur humne uski badshahat mazboot ki – aur usay hikmat aur faisle ki taqat di.
38.21: Kya tumhein jhagadne walon ka waaqiya pahunchaa – jab woh minar-e-ibadat par chadh aaye?
38.22: Jab woh Daawood ke paas aaye, to woh unse ghabra gaya. Unhon ne kaha: Darna nahi – hum do jhagda karne wale hain, ek ne doosre par zulm kiya hai – to hamare darmiyan sach ke saath faisla karo, aur zulm na karo, aur humein seedha raasta dikha do.
38.23: Yeh mera bhai hai, iske paas 99 bhehnain hain, aur mere paas ek hi hai – isne kaha use bhi mujhe de do – aur baat mein mujh par dabao daal diya.
38.24: Daawood ne kaha: Usne tujhmein zulm kiya ke teri ek ko bhi apni mein shaamil kar liya. Aur beshak zyada log ek doosre par zulm karte hain siwa un logon ke jo imaan laye aur neik amal kiye – aur aise log bahut kam hain. Aur Daawood ne samjha ke humne use aazmaya hai – to usne apne Rubb se maafi maangi, aur sajda mein gir gaya, aur ruju kar liya.
38.25: To humne use maaf kar diya. Aur beshak uske liye hamare paas qurbat, aur achhi thikana hai.
38.26: Aey Daawood! Humne tujhe zameen mein khalifa banaya – to tu logon mein sach ke saath faisla kar – aur apni khwahish ke peeche na chal, warna yeh tujhe Allah ke raaste se hata degi. Beshak jo log Allah ke raaste se bhatak jaate hain unke liye sakht azaab hai, is wajah se ke unhon ne hisaab ke din ko bhool diya.
38.27: Aur humne aasman aur zameen ko aur jo kuch unke darmiyan hai bekaar paida nahi kiya – yeh to un logon ka gumaan hai jinhon ne kufr kiya – to kafiron ke liye tabahi hai aag ki wajah se.
38.28: Kya hum un logon ko jo imaan laye aur neik amal kiye, un jaison jaisa bana denge jo zameen mein fasaad machaate hain? Ya hum mutaqiyon ko fujjar jaisa kar denge?
38.29: Yeh ek kitaab hai jo humne tum par naazil ki hai – badi barkat wali hai – taake log iske aayaat mein ghuroor-o-fikr karein – aur taake aqalmand log naseehat haasil karein.
38.30: Aur humne Daawood ko Sulaiman ata kiya – kitna accha banda! Beshak woh bada ruju karne waala tha.
38.31: Jab uske saamne shaam ko tez raftaar ghode haazir kiye gaye.
38.32: To usne kaha: Main ne is maal ki muhabbat apne Rubb ki yaad ke sabab chhodi hai – yahan tak ke woh ghode parde ke peeche chhup gaye.
38.33: Phir kaha: Unhein mere paas wapas lao – to usne unki pindliyon aur gardanon par haath phiraaya.
38.34: Aur humne Sulaiman ko aazmaya – aur uske takht par ek jism daal diya – phir usne ruju kiya.
38.35: Usne kaha: Aey mere Rubb! Mujhe maaf kar de – aur mujhe aisi baadshahat de jo kisi ke laayak na ho mere baad – beshak tu hi dene wala hai.
38.36: To humne uske liye hawa ko musakhar kar diya – jo uske hukm se chalti thi, jahan bhi woh chahta.
38.37: Aur shayateen ko bhi – jo uske liye ta’meer karte the, aur ghoota lagate the.
38.38: Aur doosre jinko zanjeeron mein jakda gaya tha.
38.39: Yeh hamara ata hai – tu chahe to de ya roke – ismein tere liye koi hisaab nahi.
38.40: Aur beshak uske liye hamare paas qurbat aur achhi thikana hai.
38.41: Aur apne banda Ayyub ka zikr karo – jab usne apne Rubb ko pukara: Mujhe shaitaan ne takleef aur azaab mein daal diya hai.
38.42: Humne farmaya: Apna paon zameen par maar – yeh thanda pani hai nahaane aur peene ke liye.
38.43: Aur humne use uske gharwaalon ko wapas diya – aur unke saath utne hi aur – hamari rehmat ke taur par aur aqalmandon ke liye naseehat ke liye.
38.44: Aur humne farmaya: Apne haath mein ek guchcha le lo (taaki apni qasam poori karo) – aur us se maaro – aur apni qasam na toodo. Beshak hum ne use sabr karne wala paaya – kya behtareen banda! Beshak woh ruju karne waala tha.
38.45: Aur apne banda Ibrahim, Ishaq, aur Yaqub ka zikr karo – woh sab bade haathon waale aur ruju karne waale thay.
38.46: Beshak humne unhein ek khaas baat ke liye chuna – ke woh aakhirat ke ghar ko yaad rakhte thay.
38.47: Aur beshak woh hamare nazdeek chune huye aur neik logon mein se thay.
38.48: Aur Ismail, Al-Yasa, aur Zulkifl ka bhi zikr karo – sab ne achha amal kiya.
38.49: Yeh ek yaad hai – aur mutaqiyon ke liye achhi thikana hai.
38.50: Hamesha rehne wali jannatein, jinke darwaze unke liye khol diye gaye hain.
38.51: Usmein woh takiye lagaye baithenge – wahan woh phal aur mashroobat maangein ge.
38.52: Aur unke paas woh hoor hongi jo nigaahon ko jhukaaye baithi hongi, hum umar.
38.53: Yeh woh cheez hai jiska tumhein waada diya gaya tha roz-e-hisaab ke liye.
38.54: Yeh hamara ata hai – ismein tumhare liye koi kami nahi.
38.55: Yeh sab kuch hai – aur baghi logon ke liye bad tar thikana hai.
38.56: Jahannum – jismein woh jhulkaye jaayenge – kitni buri jagah hai.
38.57: Yeh hai unke liye – to woh iska maza chakkhein – garm paani aur peep.
38.58: Aur us ke siwa aur azaab bhi.
38.59: Yeh ek giroh tumhaare paas aa raha hai – unke liye bhi koi khushamdid nahi – beshak woh bhi aag mein jalne waale hain.
38.60: Woh kahenge: Tum hi ho – koi khushamdid nahi – tum hi to humein yeh sab dilaane wale thay – to kitni buri jagah hai yeh.
38.61: Woh kahenge: Aey hamare Rubb! Jo is sab ko hum tak laya usay aag mein dohra azaab de.
38.62: Aur woh kahenge: Humein woh log nazar kyun nahi aate jinko hum buray samjha karte thay?
38.63: Kya hum unka mazaaq banate thay ya unhein dekhte nahi?
38.64: Beshak yeh theek baat hai – jhagda karne waalon ka jhagda.
38.65: Kaho: Main sirf ek darane wala hoon – aur koi ilaah nahi siwa Allah ke – ek hai, sab par ghalib.
38.66: Aasmanon aur zameen ka Rubb, aur jo kuch unke darmiyan hai – zabardast, bakshne waala.
38.67: Kaho: Yeh ek badi khabar hai.
38.68: Jis se tum munh moadte ho.
38.69: Mujhe is baat ka ilm nahi tha jab farishton mein jhagda hua.
38.70: Mujhe to sirf is liye wahee ki gayi ke main saaf taur par dara dene wala hoon.
38.71: Jab tere Rubb ne farishton se kaha: Main mitti se insaan banane wala hoon.
38.72: Phir jab main use poora bana doon aur usmein apni rooh phoonk doon to us ke liye sajda mein gir jao.
38.73: To sab farishton ne sajda kiya –
38.74: Siwa Iblees ke – usne takabbur kiya aur kafir ban gaya.
38.75: Allah ne farmaya: Aey Iblees! Tujhe kis cheez ne roka ke tu usko sajda na kare jise maine apne haathon se banaya? Kya tu takabbur karta hai ya tu un oonche logon mein se hai?
38.76: Usne kaha: Main usse behtar hoon – tu ne mujhe aag se paida kiya hai, aur use mitti se.
38.77: Allah ne farmaya: To nikal ja yahan se – tu dhoothkardaa hai.
38.78: Aur beshak tu par meri laanat hai qayamat ke din tak.
38.79: Usne kaha: Aey Rubb! Mujhe us din tak mohallat de jab tak log uthaye jaayenge.
38.80: Allah ne farmaya: Achha, tujhe mohallat milti hai.
38.81: Us waqt tak ke din ka waqt maloom ho jaaye.
38.82: Usne kaha: Tere izzat ki qasam! Main sab ko behkakar rahunga.
38.83: Siwa unke jo tere chune huye bande hain.
38.84: Allah ne farmaya: To yeh haq hai – aur main haq ke saath kehta hoon.
38.85: Main zaroor jahannum ko tujhse aur un sab logon se bhar doonga jo unmein se teri pairwi karein ge.
38.86: Kaho: Main tumse is paighaam ka koi ajar nahi maangta – aur na main banawati logon mein se hoon.
38.87: Yeh to bas ek naseehat hai poori duniya ke liye.
38.88: Aur tum zaroor is ka haal kuch arse baad jaan loge.

39.1: Yeh kitaab Allah ki taraf se naazil ki gayi hai jo zabardast hai, sab kuch jaane wala hai.
39.2: Beshak humne tumhari taraf yeh kitaab haqq ke saath naazil ki hai, to tum Allah ki ibadat karo, usi ke liye deen ko khalis karke.
39.3: Khabardar! Khalis deen sirf Allah ke liye hai. Aur jin logon ne uske siwa dusre ko wali bana liya kehte hain: Hum unki ibadat sirf is liye karte hain taake woh humein Allah ke qareeb le jaayein. Beshak Allah unke darmiyan us baat ka faisla karega jismein woh ikhtilaf karte hain. Beshak Allah us shakhs ko hidayat nahi deta jo jhoota aur na-shukar hai.
39.4: Agar Allah kisi ko beta banana chahta to jinhein woh paida karta un mein se jise chahta chunta. Paak hai woh! Woh Allah, Yaktah hai, sab par qaadir hai.
39.5: Usne aasmanon aur zameen ko haqq ke saath paida kiya. Woh raat ko din par lapet deta hai aur din ko raat par. Aur usne sooraj aur chaand ko musakkhar kar diya, har ek apne waqt tak chalta hai. Khabardar! Wahi Allah hai, tumhara Rubb. Usi ki baadshahi hai. Aur jinhein tum uske siwa pukarte ho woh ek dana bhi malik nahi hain.
39.6: Usne tumhein ek hi jaan se paida kiya, phir usi se uski biwi banayi. Aur usne tumhare liye aath (8) joday maweshiyon ke utare. Woh tumhein tumhari maaon ke pait mein teen andheron mein ek halqah ke baad doosri halqah mein paida karta hai. Yeh Allah tumhara Rubb hai, usi ki baadshahi hai. Uske siwa koi maabood nahi. To tum kidhar phiray ja rahe ho?
39.7: Agar tum kufr karo to Allah be-niyaz hai tumse. Aur woh apne bandon ke liye kufr ko pasand nahi karta. Aur agar tum shukar karo to woh tumse razi ho jaata hai. Koi gunah uthane wala doosre ka gunah nahi uthayega. Phir tum sab ko apne Rubb ki taraf lautna hai, to woh tumhein bata dega jo tum karte rahe. Beshak woh seenon ke raaz jaanta hai.
39.8: Aur jab aadmi ko koi takleef pahunchti hai to woh apne Rubb ko palat kar usi ki taraf ruju karta hai. Phir jab woh usko apni taraf se koi ni’mat deta hai to woh bhool jaata hai jis ke liye pehle dua karta tha, aur Allah ke raaste mein bhatkaane ke liye misal banata hai. Kaho: Kufr se thoda lutf utha le, beshak tu dozakh walon mein se hai.
39.9: Kya woh shakhs jo raat ke awqat mein sajde mein aur qiyaam mein ibadat karta hai, aakhirat se darta hai, aur apne Rubb ki rehmat ki umeed rakhta hai... (kya woh aur dusre barabar hain)? Kaho: Kya un logon ke barabar woh log hain jo jaante hain aur woh jo nahi jaante? Bas samajh wale hi naseehat lete hain.
39.10: Kaho: Aey mere woh bandon jo imaan laye ho! Apne Rubb se daro. Jin logon ne is duniya mein neiki ki unke liye bhalai hai. Aur Allah ki zameen wasi hai. Beshak sabr karne walon ko unka ajar be-hisaab diya jaata hai.
39.11: Kaho: Mujhe hukm diya gaya hai ke main deen ko Allah ke liye khalis karke uski bandagi karoon.
39.12: Aur mujhe hukm diya gaya hai ke main sab se pehla Muslim banoon.
39.13: Kaho: Agar main apne Rubb ki nafarmaani karoonga to mujhe ek bade din ke azaab ka dar hai.
39.14: Kaho: Main sirf Allah hi ki ibadat karta hoon, deen ko uske liye khalis karke.
39.15: Tum uske siwa jise chaho ibadat mein le aao. Kaho: Nuksaan uthane wale wahi log hain jinhon ne qayamat ke din apne aap ko aur apne ghar walon ko nuksaan mein daala. Khabardar! Yahi khula nuksaan hai.
39.16: Unke upar se aag ke saaye honge, aur neeche se bhi. Yeh woh cheez hai jis se Allah apne bandon ko daraata hai. To aey mere bandon! Mujhse daro.
39.17: Aur jin logon ne taaghut (jhoote maabood) se doori ikhtiyar ki aur Allah ki taraf ruju kiya, unke liye basharat hai. To mere bandon ko basharat de do.
39.18: Woh log jo baat suntay hain aur uske behtareen pehlu ki pairwi karte hain. Yahi woh log hain jinhon ne Allah ki hidayat paayi, aur yahi samajhdar hain.
39.19: Kya jis par azaab ka faisla ho chuka ho (woh chhootega)? Kya tum us shakhs ko bacha sakte ho jo aag mein ho?
39.20: Magar jo log apne Rubb se darte rahe unke liye unchey makan honge jin ke neechey aur bhi makan honge, jin ke neechey nehrein beh rahi hongi. Yeh Allah ka waada hai. Allah waada khilafi nahi karta.
39.21: Kya tum nahi dekhte ke Allah aasmaan se paani barsata hai, phir use zameen mein chashme bana kar chala deta hai, phir us se mukhtalif rangon ke kheti nikalti hai, phir woh sukh jaati hai to tum use peela dekhte ho, phir usay chura chura (raiza raiza) kar deta hai? Ismein aqal walon ke liye nishani hai.
39.22: Kya woh shakhs jiska seena Allah ne Islam ke liye khol diya aur woh apne Rubb ki roshni par hai (behtar hai), ya woh shakhs jiska dil Allah ke zikr se sakht ho gaya hai? Aise log khuli gumraahi mein hain.
39.23: Allah ne behtareen baat utari hai — ek aisi kitaab jo apne lafzon mein ek jaisi hai, baar baar dauraayi jaane wali — jis se un logon ke jism kaanpte hain jo apne Rubb se darte hain, phir unke jism aur dil Allah ke zikr ki taraf narm ho jaate hain. Yeh Allah ki hidayat hai, jise chahta hai us tak pahunchata hai. Aur jise Allah gumraah kar de, uska koi haadi (rehnuma) nahi.
39.24: Phir kya woh shakhs jo apne munh ke bal azaab ke samne aata hai (bacha reh sakta hai)? Kaha jaayega: Chakh lo jo tum kamaaya karte thay.
39.25: Unse pehle logon ne bhi jhutlaya tha to un par azaab aaya jahan se unhein khayal bhi na tha.
39.26: To Allah ne unhein duniya mein ruswa kiya, aur aakhirat ka azaab to aur bhi bada hai, kaash woh jaante.
39.27: Aur humne logon ke liye is Qur’an mein har misaal bayaan ki hai taake woh naseehat lein.
39.28: Ek Qur’an Arabic zaban mein, jismein koi tedh (kaaj) nahi, taake woh dar rakhain.
39.29: Allah ek misaal bayan karta hai: ek aadmi jiska ek se zyada malik ho aur woh aapas mein ladte rahte hon, aur ek aadmi jo sirf ek hi aadmi ka ghulam ho — kya dono barabar ho sakte hain? Sab tareef Allah ke liye hai, magar in mein se aksar jaante nahi.
39.30: Tum (aey Nabi) zaroor mar jaane wale ho, aur woh bhi zaroor marne wale hain.
39.31: Phir tum sab apne Rubb ke samne jhagadoge qayamat ke din.
39.32: To us se bada zalim kaun hoga jo Allah par jhooth ghade, aur sach ko jhutlaye jab woh uske paas aaye? Kya aise kafiron ke liye jahannum mein jagah nahi?
39.33: Aur jo sach laye aur jisne usay sach maana, wahi log muttaqi hain.
39.34: Unke liye unke Rubb ke haan har wo cheez hai jo woh chahein. Yeh neik amal karne walon ka badla hai.
39.35: Taa-ke Allah unki buraiyon ko unse door kare, aur unhein unke ache kaam ka ajar de jo woh kiya karte thay.
39.36: Kya Allah apne banday ke liye kaafi nahi? Aur tum un logon se dar rahe ho jo uske siwa doosre hain? Jise Allah gumraah kar de uska koie rehnuma nahi.
39.37: Aur jise Allah hidayat de usay koie gumraah nahi kar sakta. Kya Allah zabardast, badla lene wala nahi?
39.38: Aur agar tum unse poochho ke kisne aasman aur zameen ko paida kiya to woh zaroor kahenge: Allah ne. Kaho: To kya tum sochte nahi jo log Allah ke siwa doosron ko pukarte hain?
39.39: Kaho: Aey meri qaum ke logon! Apne tareeqe par amal karo, main bhi apne tareeqe par amal kar raha hoon. Anqareeb tumhein maloom ho jaayega.
39.40: Kis par ruswa kun azaab aata hai, aur kis par daimi azaab naazil hota hai.
39.41: Beshak humne tumhari taraf yeh kitaab logon ke liye haqq ke saath naazil ki hai. To jo hidaayat ikhtiyar kare woh apne liye karta hai, aur jo gumraah ho woh apne hi nuksan ke liye. Tum unpar koi zimmedar nahi ho.
39.42: Allah hi hai jo maut ke waqt roohon ko qabz karta hai, aur jo nahi mari unki rooh neend ke waqt. Phir jin par maut ka faisla karta hai unhein roak leta hai, aur doosron ko ek muqarrar waqt tak ke liye chhod deta hai. Beshak ismein nishaniyan hain un logon ke liye jo gaur o fikr karte hain.
39.43: Kya unhon ne Allah ke siwa sifarish karne wale bana liye hain? Kaho: Agar woh kuch bhi ikhtiyar na rakhte hon aur na samajhte hon (to bhi)?
39.44: Kaho: Saari sifarish Allah ke haan hai. Aasmaanon aur zameen ki baadshahi usi ki hai. Phir usi ki taraf tum wapas jaoge.
39.45: Aur jab sirf Allah ka zikr kiya jaata hai to un logon ke dil tang ho jaate hain jo aakhirat par imaan nahi rakhte. Aur jab uske siwa dusron ka zikr hota hai to woh khushi se chamak uthte hain.
39.46: Kaho: Aey Allah! Aasmaan aur zameen ke paida karne wale! Ilm-e-ghaib aur haazir ke jaane wale! Tu hi faisla karega tere bandon ke darmiyan us baat mein jismein woh ikhtilaf kar rahe thay.
39.47: Agar zulm karne walon ke paas sab kuch hota jo zameen mein hai, aur uske saath utna hi aur bhi, to woh qayamat ke din ke azaab ke badle mein sab kuch de daalte. Aur unke liye Allah ki taraf se woh kuch samne aayega jiska unhein gumaan bhi na tha.
39.48: Aur unke kiye hue buray aamaal un par zahir ho jaayenge, aur jis azaab ka woh mazaaq udaya karte thay woh unko gher lega.
39.49: Phir jab aadmi ko takleef pahunchti hai to woh humein pukarta hai. Phir jab hum usay apni taraf se koi ni’mat dete hain to kehta hai: Yeh to mujhe ilm ki wajah se diya gaya hai. Balke yeh ek aazmaish hai magar aksar log jaante nahi.
39.50: Unse pehle ke log bhi yahi keh chuke hain, phir unka kamaya unke kuch kaam na aaya.
39.51: Phir unhon ne apne kiye ka anjaam bhugat liya. Aur in logon mein se bhi jin logon ne zulm kiya unhein bhi anqareeb apne kiye ka anjaam bhugatna hoga, aur woh humein hara nahi sakte.
39.52: Kya woh nahi jaante ke Allah jise chahta hai rozi wasi deta hai aur jise chahta hai tang karta hai? Beshak ismein nishaniyan hain un logon ke liye jo imaan late hain.
39.53: Kaho: Aey mere woh bandon jinhon ne apne nafs par zulm kiya! Allah ki rehmat se mayoos mat ho. Beshak Allah sab gunaahon ko maaf kar deta hai. Beshak woh bahut maaf karne wala, nihayat reham wala hai.
39.54: Apne Rubb ki taraf palat aao aur usi ke farman ke mutabiq apne aap ko uske hawale kar do, is se pehle ke tum par azaab aa jaye, phir tumhari koi madad na ki jaaye.
39.55: Aur us behtareen baat ki pairwi karo jo tumhare Rubb ki taraf se tumhari taraf naazil hui hai, is se pehle ke tum par azaab aa jaye achanak, aur tumhein khabar bhi na ho.
39.56: Kahin aisa na ho ke koi shakhs kahe: Haye afsos! Maine Allah ke huqooq ada karne mein kotahi ki, aur main to mazaaq udaane walon mein se tha.
39.57: Ya kahe: Kaash Allah mujhe hidayat de deta to main muttaqi ban jaata.
39.58: Ya azaab dekh kar kahe: Kaash mujhe ek aur moqa mil jaata to main neik amal karne walon mein se hota.
39.59: (Jawab diya jaayega:) Kyun nahi! Meri aayatein tere paas aayi thin, phir tu ne unhein jhutlaya, aur tu takabbur karta raha, aur tu kafiron mein se ho gaya.
39.60: Aur qayamat ke din tum dekhoge ke jin logon ne Allah par jhooth bandha tha unke chehray siyah honge. Kya jahannum mein ghar nahi un logon ke liye jo takabbur karte hain?
39.61: Aur Allah un logon ko bachaa lega jo uska taqwa ikhtiyar karte rahe, unhein koi takleef nahi pahunchayegi, aur na woh ghamgeen honge.
39.62: Allah har cheez ka khaliq hai, aur wahi har cheez par nigehbaan hai.
39.63: Usi ke paas aasmaanon aur zameen ke khazane hain. Aur jo log Allah ki aayaton ka inkaar karte hain wahi nuksan uthane wale hain.
39.64: Kaho: Kya tum mujhe Allah ke siwa doosron ki ibadat karne ka hukum dete ho, aey jaahil logon?
39.65: Aur beshak tumhari taraf (aey Nabi) aur tumse pehle (har Nabi) ki taraf yeh wahi bheji gayi thi ke agar tum shirk karoge to tumhara amal zaroor zaya ho jaayega, aur tum zaroor nuksan uthane walon mein se ho jaoge.
39.66: Balki Allah ki ibadat karo, aur shukar karne walon mein se ho jao.
39.67: Aur unhon ne Allah ki qadr nahi ki jaise uski qadr karni chahiye thi. Qayamat ke din poori zameen uski mutthi mein hogi, aur aasman uske haath mein lipte hue honge. Paak hai woh, aur buland hai un se jo woh uska shirk karte hain.
39.68: Aur soor mein phoonka jaayega to jo bhi aasmaanon aur zameen mein hain behosh ho jaayenge, siwa uske jise Allah chahe. Phir doosri baar phoonka jaayega to woh achanak uth kar dekhne lag jaayenge.
39.69: Aur zameen apne Rubb ke noor se chamak uthegi, aur kitaab rakh di jaayegi, aur Nabi aur gawaah laaye jaayenge, aur unke darmiyan haqq ke saath faisla kiya jaayega, aur unpar zulm nahi kiya jaayega.
39.70: Aur har shakhs ko uske amal ka pura badla diya jaayega. Aur woh jaante hain jo kuch woh karte thay.
39.71: Aur jin logon ne kufr kiya unhein jahannum ki taraf jhund jhund le jaaya jaayega, yahan tak ke jab woh us tak pahunch jaayenge to uske darwazay khol diye jaayenge, aur unse uske darban kahenge: Kya tumhare paas tum mein se Rasool nahi aaye thay jo tumhein tumhare Rubb ki aayatein sunate thay aur tumhein is din ke mulaqaat se darate thay? Woh kahenge: Kyun nahi, lekin azaab ka faisla kafiron par poora ho gaya.
39.72: Kaha jaayega: Dakhil ho jao jahannum ke darwazon mein hamesha usmein rahne ke liye. To kitna bura hai mutakabbiron ka thikaana.
39.73: Aur jin logon ne apne Rubb ka taqwa ikhtiyar kiya unhein jhund jhund jannat ki taraf le jaaya jaayega, yahan tak ke jab woh uske paas pahunch jaayenge, aur uske darwazay khul jaayenge, aur uske darban unse kahenge: Salam ho tum par, tum ache thay, to daakhil ho jao usmein hamesha ke liye.
39.74: Aur woh kahenge: Sab tareef Allah ke liye hai jisne apna waada sach kar dikhaya, aur humein is zameen ka waaris banaya, ab hum jannat mein jahan chahein rahain. To kitna behtareen badla hai amal karne walon ka!
39.75: Aur tum farishton ko dekhoge arsh ke gird halqah banaye hue apne Rubb ki tasbeeh kar rahe honge, aur logon ke darmiyan haqq ke saath faisla kiya jaayega, aur kaha jaayega: Sab tareef Allah ke liye hai jo sab jahanon ka Rubb hai.

40.2: Yeh kitaab Allah ki taraf se naazil ki gayi hai – jo zabardast hai, sab kuch jaanne wala hai.
40.3: Gunaahon ko maaf karne wala, tauba qabool karne wala, saza dene mein sakht, aur fazl karne wala hai – uske siwa koi mabood nahi – usi ki taraf sab lautaye jaate hain.
40.4: Koi bhi Allah ki aayaat mein jhagda nahi karta siwa un logon ke jo kufr karte hain – to unka sheharon mein ghoomna tumhein dhoka na de.
40.5: Unse pehle Nooh ki qaum ne, aur unke baad ke girohon ne bhi jhutlaya – har ummat ne apne Rasool ko pakadne ki koshish ki – aur jhagde jhoot ke zariye kiye taake haq ko mita dein – to main ne unhein pakda – to kaisi thi meri saza!
40.6: Aur is tarah tumhare Rubb ka kalma un logon par sach ho gaya jo kufr karte hain – ke woh log aag walay hain.
40.7: Jo farishte arsh ko uthaye huye hain aur jo uske aas paas hain – woh apne Rubb ki tasbeeh ke saath tareef karte hain, us par imaan rakhte hain, aur mominon ke liye dua karte hain: Aey hamare Rubb! Tu har cheez ko apni rehmat aur ilm se gheray huye hai – to un logon ko maaf kar de jo tauba karte hain aur tere raaste ki pairwi karte hain – aur unhein jahannum ke azaab se bacha le.
40.8: Aey hamare Rubb! Unhein hamesha rahne wali jannaton mein daakhil farma – jin ka tu ne unse waada kiya hai – aur unke baap daadon, biwiyon, aur aulad mein se jo neik hon – tu beshak zabardast, hikmat wala hai.
40.9: Aur unhein buraiyon se bacha le – aur jisey tu buraiyon se bacha le us din – to tu ne us par rahmat ki – aur yahi badi kamiyabi hai.
40.10: Yeh log jin logon ne kufr kiya unse pukara jaayega: Allah ka gussa tum par us se zyada tha jitna tum apne upar gussa karte thay jab tum imaan lane se inkaar karte thay.
40.11: Kehte hain: Aey hamare Rubb! Tu ne humein do baar maut di aur do baar zindagi di – ab hum apne gunaahon ka iqraar karte hain – to kya nikalne ka koi raasta hai?
40.12: Yeh is liye hai ke jab sirf Allah ko pukara jaata tha to tum inkaar karte thay – aur agar us ke saath kisi ko shareek kiya jaata to tum maan lete thay – to faisla Allah, Buland-o-Bartar, Bade ke haath mein hai.
40.13: Wahi hai jo tumhein apni nishaniyan dikhata hai – aur tumhare liye aasman se rozi nazil karta hai – aur naseehat sirf usi ko faida deti hai jo ruju kare.
40.14: To Allah ko pukaro ikhlas ke saath uski bandagi mein, agar tumhein bachaav pasand hai.
40.15: Buland darajaat wala, Arsh ka maalik – apne bandon mein se jise chahe apne hukm se rooh (wahee) ata karta hai – taake woh mulaqat ke din se daraaye.
40.16: Jis din sab zahir ho jaayenge – Allah se unmein se koi baat chhupi na rahegi – aaj kis ki baadshahi hai? Sirf Allah, Wahid, Qahhar ki.
40.17: Aaj har shakhs ko uske kiye ka badla diya jaayega – aaj kisi par zulm na hoga – beshak Allah hisaab lene mein tez hai.
40.18: Aur unhein darao us din se jo qareeb hai – jab dil ghaley (halq tak) aaye honge, chhupe honge – zalimon ke liye na koi dosti hogi aur na koi sifarish kabool ki jaayegi.
40.19: Woh aankhon ke chhupne ko jaanta hai aur dilon ke raaz bhi.
40.20: Aur Allah sach ke saath faisla karta hai – aur jise woh uske siwa bulate hain woh kuch bhi faisla nahi kar sakte – beshak Allah sab kuch sunta, sab kuch dekhta hai.
40.21: Kya unhon ne zameen mein chal kar nahi dekha ke unse pehle logon ka kya anjaam hua? Woh inse zyada taaqatwar thay, aur zameen mein zyada asaar chhod gaye – to Allah ne unhein unke gunaahon ke sabab pakad liya – aur unko Allah se koi bachaane wala na tha.
40.22: Yeh is liye hua ke unke Rasool unke paas khule daleel ke saath aaye – to unhon ne inkaar kiya – to Allah ne unhein pakad liya – beshak woh taaqatwar, sakht azaab dene wala hai.
40.23: Aur beshak humne Musa ko apni nishaniyon aur sareeh sanad ke saath bheja.
40.24: Fir’awn, Haamaan aur Qaroon ki taraf – to unhon ne kaha: Jadoo karne waala, jhoota hai.
40.25: Phir jab woh unke paas hamari taraf se haqq laya to unhon ne kaha: In logon ke beton ko qatl karo, aur auraton ko zinda rakho – aur kafiron ki chaal bas zaya hi jaati hai.
40.26: Fir’awn ne kaha: Chhodo mujhe, main Musa ko qatl kar doon, aur woh apne Rubb ko pukarta rahe – mujhe darr hai ke woh tumhara deen badal dega ya zameen mein fasaad phaila dega.
40.27: Aur Musa ne kaha: Main apne Rubb aur tumhare Rubb ki panaah leta hoon har us ghamand karne wale se jo qayamat ke din par imaan nahi laata.
40.28: Aur ek shakhs ne kaha – jo Fir’awn ke ghar ke logon mein se tha aur apna imaan chhupata tha: Kya tum ek shakhs ko is liye qatl karte ho ke woh kehta hai mera Rubb Allah hai – aur woh tumhare paas tumhare Rubb ki taraf se nishaniyan le aaya hai? Agar woh jhoota hai to uska jhoot us par hai – aur agar woh saccha hai to kuch azaab tum par aa padein ge – beshak Allah hadd se guzarne wale, jhooton ko hidaayat nahi deta.
40.29: Aey meri qaum ke logon! Aaj mulk tumhara hai, aur tum is mein gaalib ho – lekin agar humein Allah ka azaab aa gaya to kaun madad karega?
40.30: Aur woh shakhs bola: Aey meri qaum! Mujhe darr hai ke tum par bhi waisa din na aa jaaye jaisa pehle logon ka aaya tha.
40.31: Jaise Nooh ki qaum, Aad, Samood aur un ke baad ke log – aur Allah apne bandon par zulm nahi karta.
40.32: Aur aey meri qaum! Mujhe darr hai ke tum par qayamat ke din ka azaab na aa jaaye.
40.33: Jis din tum peeth pher kar bhaagoge – tumhein Allah se koi bachaane wala na hoga – aur jise Allah gumraah kare uske liye koi hidaayat dene wala nahi.
40.34: Aur beshak Yusuf bhi tumhare paas aaye the, khuli nishaniyon ke saath – phir tum hamesha us ke laane mein shak karte rahe – yahan tak ke jab woh wafat kar gaye to tumne kaha: Allah unke baad koi Rasool nahi bhejega – is tarah Allah har hadd se guzarne wale shak karne wale ko gumraah kar deta hai.
40.35: Jo Allah ke aayaat mein bina kisi daleel ke jhagadte hain – yeh Allah ke nazdeek aur imaan laane walon ke nazdeek bohot sakht nafrat ki baat hai – is tarah Allah har ghamand karne wale zaalim ke dil par mohar laga deta hai.
40.36: Aur Fir’awn ne kaha: Aey Haamaan! Mere liye ek buland imarat bana de – shayad main aasman tak pahunch jaun.
40.37: Aur main Musa ke Ilaah ko dekhun – mujhe to lagta hai ke woh jhoota hai – is tarah Fir’awn ke liye uske bure amal khushnuma bana diye gaye – aur woh raahe raste se roka gaya – aur Fir’awn ka chhaal bilkul tabah hone wali thi.
40.38: Aur woh shakhs bola jo imaan laya tha: Aey meri qaum! Meri baat maano – main tumhein hidaayat ki raah dikhata hoon.
40.39: Aey meri qaum! Yeh duniya ki zindagi bas ek chhoti si zindagi hai – aur aakhirat hi sahi ghar hai.
40.40: Jo bura amal karega use usi ke barabar badla milega – aur jo neik amal karega, mard ho ya aurat, aur momin ho – to woh jannat mein daakhil hoga jahan usse bepanah rozi milegi.
40.41: Aey meri qaum! Mujhe yeh kya hua ke main tumhein najat ki taraf bulaata hoon aur tum mujhe aag ki taraf bulaate ho?
40.42: Tum mujhe is baat ki dawat dete ho ke main Allah ka inkaar karun aur us ke saath us cheez ko shareek thahrata hoon jise main jaanta bhi nahi – aur main tumhein Zabardast, Bakhshne wale ki taraf bulaata hoon.
40.43: Beshak jis cheez ki tum mujhe dawat dete ho – na duniya mein us ka koi daawa hai, na aakhirat mein – aur hamara palatna Allah ki taraf hai – aur hadd se guzarne wale hi aag waale honge.
40.44: Phir tum jo kuch bhi kaho – main to Allah par bharosa kar chuka hoon – beshak Allah sunne wala hai, dekhne wala hai.
40.45: To Allah ne usay un ke burey chaalon se bacha liya – aur Fir’awn ke logon ko bure azaab ne gher liya.
40.46: Aag ke saamne subah-o-shaam laaya jaate hain – aur jab qayamat qayam hogi to kaha jaayega: Ab Fir’awn ke logon ko sakht azaab mein daakhil karo.
40.47: Aur jab woh jhagadenge aag mein – to kamzor log badon se kahenge: Hum tumhaare peechhe chale – kya tum humse aag ka kuch hissa hata sakte ho?
40.48: Bade log kahenge: Hum sab usmein hain – Allah hi faisla karega bandon ke darmiyan.
40.49: Aur jo aag mein honge kahenge: Aey jahannam ke darogha! Tere Rubb se keh ke hamara kaam tamaam karwa de.
40.50: Woh kahega: Tum sab yahin rahoge.
40.51: Beshak hum apne Rasoolon aur mominon ki madad karte hain duniya ki zindagi mein bhi, aur us din bhi jab gawaah khade kiye jaayenge.
40.52: Us din unhein unka kuch bhi faida na dega jab zaalimon ke liye maafi na hogi, aur unpar laanat hogi aur unke liye buray thikaane honge.
40.53: Aur beshak humne Musa ko hidaayat di – aur Bani Isra’il ko kitaab ka waris banaya.
40.54: Jo samajh rakhne walon ke liye hidaayat aur naseehat hai.
40.55: Pas sabr karo – beshak Allah ka waada sachcha hai – aur apne gunaah ki maafi maango – aur subah-o-shaam apne Rubb ki tasbeeh karo.
40.56: Beshak jo log bina daleel ke Allah ki aayaat mein jhagadte hain – unke dil mein ghamand ke siwa kuch nahi – aur woh us maqam tak pahunchne wale nahi – to Allah se panaah maango – beshak woh sunne wala, dekhne wala hai.
40.57: Zaroori hai ke aasman aur zameen banana logon ko paida karne se bada kaam hai – magar zyada log jaante nahi.
40.58: Aur andha aur dekhne wala barabar nahi – aur na woh log jo imaan laye aur neik amal kiye, un jaise hain jo bura kaam karte hain – tum log kam hi sochte ho.
40.59: Beshak qayamat aakar rahegi – is mein koi shak nahi – lekin zyada log us par imaan nahi laate.
40.60: Aur tumhara Rubb kehta hai: Mujhe pukaro – main tumhari dua qubool karoonga – beshak jo log meri ibaadat se ghamand karte hain woh zaleel hokar jahannam mein daakhil honge.
40.61: Allah hi hai jisne tumhare liye raat banayi taake tum usmein aaraam karo – aur din roshan banaya – beshak Allah logon par fazl karne wala hai – magar zyada log shukar nahi karte.
40.62: Yeh Allah tumhara Rubb hai – har cheez ka khaliq – uske siwa koi mabood nahi – to tum kahaan bhatak rahe ho?
40.63: Aise hi log bhatak jaate hain jo Allah ki aayaat ka inkaar karte hain.
40.64: Allah hi ne tumhare liye zameen ka thikaana banaya, aur aasman banaya – aur tumhein surat di, aur behtareen surat di – aur tumhein paak cheezein di – yeh hai Allah – to kitni kam tum shukar ada karte ho.
40.65: Wahi Zinda hai, uske siwa koi mabood nahi – to usi ko pukaro ikhlas ke saath uski bandagi mein – sab tareef Allah ke liye hai, jo sab jahan ka Rubb hai.
40.66: Keh do: Mujhe mana kiya gaya hai ke main un ki ibaadat karun jinhein tum Allah ke siwa bulate ho – jabke mere paas mere Rubb ki taraf se khuli daleelein aa chuki hain – aur mujhe hukum diya gaya hai ke main Rubb-ul-Aalameen ke aage jhuk jaaun.
40.67: Wahi hai jisne tumhein mitti se, phir nutfe se, phir leechi se paida kiya – phir tum bachpan se bade hote ho – phir budhape ko pahuchte ho – aur tum mein se kuch us se pehle hi mar jaate hain – taake tum muqarar waqt tak pahuncho – aur taake tum samjho.
40.68: Wahi zindagi deta hai aur wahi maut deta hai – aur jab woh kisi kaam ka faisla karta hai to kehta hai: ‘Ho ja’, to woh ho jaata hai.
40.69: Kya tumne nahi dekha un logon ko jo Allah ki aayaat mein jhagadte hain – kaise woh palat diye jaate hain?
40.70: Jo is kitaab aur un paighambaron ko jhutlate hain jinhein humne bheja – to anqareeb woh jaan lenge.
40.71: Jab tauqe unke gardanon mein daale jaayenge – aur zanjeerein mein baandh kar woh kheenche jaayenge.
40.72: Khaulte paani mein – phir aag mein jalaaye jaayenge.
40.73: Phir unse kaha jaayega: Kahan gaye tumhare woh shuraaka jinhein tum Allah ke siwa pooja karte thay?
40.74: Woh kahenge: Woh humse kho gaye – balke hum pehle kabhi kisi cheez ko nahi poojhte thay – is tarah Allah kafiron ko gumraah karta hai.
40.75: Yeh is wajah se hai ke tum zameen mein baghair haq ke khush hote thay – aur tum bahut ulhanay waale thay.
40.76: Ab daakhil ho jaao jahannam ke dwaar mein – hamesha usmein rahoge – to kya bura thikaana hai takabbur karne walon ke liye.
40.77: Pas sabr karo – beshak Allah ka waada sachcha hai – to agar hum tumhein us azaab ka kuch hissa dikha dein jiska hum unhein waada de rahe hain – ya tumhein utha lein – to unka palatna to hamari taraf hi hai.
40.78: Aur humne tumse pehle bhi Rasool bheje – unmein se kuch tumhein bata chuke hain, aur kuch nahi bataye – aur kisi Rasool ki yeh majal nahi ke woh Allah ke hukum ke baghair koi nishani le aaye – to jab Allah ka hukum aa jaata hai to insaaf ke saath faisla kar diya jaata hai – aur us waqt jhoot bolne walay nuksaan mein hote hain.
40.79: Allah hi ne tumhare liye chaara paida kiya – taake tum usmein se kuch khaao.
40.80: Aur unmein tumhare liye faide bhi hain – aur un par tum apne zaroorat ke maqamat tak pahuchte ho – aur un par tum sawar bhi hote ho.
40.81: Aur woh tumhein apni nishaniyan dikhata hai – to tum Allah ki kaunsi nishaniyon ka inkaar karte ho?
40.82: Kya unhon ne zameen mein chal kar nahi dekha ke unse pehle logon ka kya anjaam hua? Woh inse zyada the taqat mein – aur zameen mein zyada asar chhod gaye – magar unhein unke amaal ka koi faida na hua.
40.83: Phir jab unke paas unke Rasool khuli daleelon ke saath aaye to woh unke ilm se khush hue jo unke paas tha – to un par woh azaab aa gaya jis ka woh mazaak uda rahe thay.
40.84: Phir jab unhon ne hamara azaab dekha to kehne lage: Hum Allah par imaan laye – aur uske saath jise hum shirk karte thay use chhod diya.
40.85: Magar unka imaan lana us waqt unke kisi kaam na aaya – yeh Allah ka sunnat hai jo uske bandon mein guzar chuki hai – aur us waqt kafir nuksaan uthane wale ban jaate hain.

41.2: Yeh Qur’an, Rahman aur Raheem ki taraf se naazil kiya gaya hai.
41.3: Yeh ek kitaab hai jiska lafz lafz tafseel se bayan kiya gaya hai – ek Qur’an Arabi, un logon ke liye jo samajhte hain.
41.4: Basharat dene wala aur daraane wala – lekin zyada log mooh modte hain, is liye woh sunte hi nahi.
41.5: Aur kehte hain: Hamare dilon par pardo hai is cheez se jiski taraf tum humein bulaate ho – aur hamare kaanon mein bojh hai – aur hamare aur tumhare darmiyan ek parda hai – to tum apna kaam karo, hum apna kaam kar rahe hain.
41.6: Keh do: Main to ek bashar hoon tum jaise hi – mujhe wahee ki jaati hai ke tumhara mabood sirf ek hi Allah hai – to seedha rasta ikhtiyar karo usi ki taraf – aur us se maafi maango – aur halaakat hai un mushrikeen ke liye.
41.7: Jo zakat nahi dete, aur woh aakhirat ke inkaar karne wale hain.
41.8: Beshak jo log imaan laye aur neik amal kiye – unke liye kabhi khatam na hone wala ajar hai.
41.9: Keh do: Kya tum us zat ka inkaar karte ho jisne zameen ko do dinon mein paida kiya – aur us ke liye hum-shariko ka tayun karte ho? Wahi sab jahanon ka Rubb hai.
41.10: Aur us mein upar se pahad bana diye – aur us mein barakat rakhi – aur uske andar roziyon ka intizaam kiya – sab kuch chaar dinon mein – barabar sab mangnewalon ke liye.
41.11: Phir usne aasman ki taraf rujoo kiya jab woh dhuan tha – to kaha: Aao, khushi se ya majboori se – unhon ne kaha: Hum khushi se aate hain.
41.12: Phir usne unhein saat aasman bana diya do dinon mein – aur har aasman mein uska hukm jaari kiya – aur humne qareebi aasman ko sitaron se saja diya aur hifazat ki – yeh hai taqdeer us zaat ki jo sab kuch jaanta hai.
41.13: Phir agar woh mooh modte hain to keh do: Main tumhein aise bijli ke azaab se daraata hoon jaise Aad aur Samood par aaya tha.
41.14: Jab unke paas Rasool aaye samne se aur peeche se – ke Allah ke siwa kisi ki bandagi na karo – unhon ne kaha: Agar hamara Rubb chahta to zaroor farishte utaarta – to jo kuch tum le kar aaye ho us se hum inkaar karte hain.
41.15: Aad ne zameen mein baghair haqq ke ghamand kiya – aur kaha: Kaun hum se zyada taaqatwar hai? Kya unhon ne nahi dekha ke Allah jinhon ne unhein paida kiya woh unse zyada taaqatwar hai? Aur woh hamari aayaat ka inkaar karte rahe.
41.16: To humne unpar bohot sakht hawa bheji kuch dinon tak – taake hum unhein duniya ki zindagi mein zaleel kar dein – aur aakhirat ka azaab to aur bhi zyada zillat wala hai – aur unki madad na ki jaayegi.
41.17: Aur rahe Samood – to humne unhein hidaayat di, magar unhon ne hidaayat ko andha bana liya – to un par zillat ke azaab ki bijli girayi gayi – unke kiye ke badle mein.
41.18: Aur jo imaan laye aur taqwa ikhtiyar kiya – unhein humne bacha liya.
41.19: Aur jis din Allah ke dushman jahannum ki taraf jamaa kiye jaayenge – to unhein roka jaayega.
41.20: Yahan tak ke jab woh wahan pahunch jaayenge – to unke kaan, unki aankhen, aur unki jild (skin) unke khilaaf gawahi denge un ke aamaal ke baare mein.
41.21: Aur woh apni jildon se kahenge: Tumne hamare khilaaf kyun gawahi di? Woh kahenge: Humein us Allah ne bolne ki taqat di jisne har cheez ko bolna sikhaya – usi ne tumhein pehli dafa paida kiya, aur usi ki taraf tum lautaye ja rahe ho.
41.22: Aur tum chhuptay nahi thay ke tumhare kaan, tumhari aankhen, aur tumhari jild hamare khilaaf gawahi na den – balke tumne yeh samjha ke Allah tumhare bahut se kaamon se be khabar hai.
41.23: Aur yeh tumhara gumaan tha jo tumne apne Rubb ke baare mein rakha – tumhein tabaah kar diya – aur tum nuksaan uthane waalon mein se ho gaye.
41.24: To ab agar woh sabr karein bhi to unka thikaana jahannum hi hai – aur agar woh maafi maangein to unse maafi na li jaayegi.
41.25: Aur humne unke liye kuch saathi muqarrar kar diye thay – jo unke saamne aur peeche kaam unke liye khushnuma bana diye – aur un par bhi wahi kalma sach ho gaya jo un se pehle guzar chuke jinnon aur insaanon ke liye sach hua – beshak woh khasara uthane waale thay.
41.26: Aur kafiron ne kaha: Is Qur’an ko na suno – aur is mein hungama machao – shayad ke tum ghalib aa jao.
41.27: To hum un kafiron ko zaroor sakht azaab ka maza chakhayenge – aur unhein unke badtareen kaamon ka badla denge.
41.28: Yeh hai Allah ke dushmano ka badla – aag – jismein woh hamesha rahenge – yeh badla hai isliye ke woh hamari aayaat ka inkaar karte thay.
41.29: Aur kafir kahenge: Aey hamare Rubb! Humein dikha de un jinnon aur insaanon ko jinhon ne humein gumraah kiya – hum unhein apne paon ke neeche rakh dein taake woh zaleel ho jaayein.
41.30: Beshak jin logon ne kaha: Hamara Rubb Allah hai, phir woh is par qayam rahe – unpar farishte naazil hote hain – ke daro mat, gham na karo – aur khush ho jao us jannat ke saath jis ka tum se waada kiya gaya hai.
41.31: Hum tumhare wali hain duniya ki zindagi mein bhi, aur aakhirat mein bhi – aur jannat mein jo kuch tum chaaho sab milega – aur jo kuch tum maango ge woh milega.
41.32: Mehmaan nawaazi us Rubb ki taraf se jo bakhshne wala, meharbaan hai.
41.33: Aur us se behtar kaun hai jo Allah ki taraf bulaaye, neik amal kare aur kahe: Main musalmaan hoon.
41.34: Aur bhalai aur burai barabar nahi hoti – bhalai se burai ko dafa karo – phir dekho ke jis se dushmani thi woh tumhara ghanisht dost ban gaya.
41.35: Aur yeh nahi milta siwa un logon ke jo sabr karte hain – aur yeh nahi milta siwa un logon ke jo bade naseeb waale hain.
41.36: Aur agar tumhein shaitaan se koi vaswasa aaye to Allah ki panaah maango – beshak woh sab kuch sunne wala, sab kuch jaane wala hai.
41.37: Aur uski nishaniyon mein se hai raat aur din, aur sooraj aur chaand – na sajda karo sooraj ko aur na chaand ko – balke sajda karo Allah ko jisne unhein paida kiya – agar tum usi ki ibaadat karte ho.
41.38: Lekin agar woh ghamand karein to bhi woh log jo tumhare Rubb ke paas hain – woh uski tasbeeh karte hain raat din, aur woh thakte nahi.
41.39: Aur uski nishaniyon mein se hai ke tum zameen ko sukhi dekhtay ho – phir jab hum uspar paani barsaate hain to woh hilti hai aur ubhar aati hai – beshak jisne usay zindagi di wahi murdon ko zindagi dega – beshak woh har cheez par qudrat rakhta hai.
41.40: Jo log hamari aayaat mein tedhaapan rakhte hain woh hum se chhupaye nahi gaye – to kya woh jo aag mein daala jaayega behtar hai ya woh jo qayamat ke din mehfooz hokar aayega? Karo jo chaaho – beshak Allah jo kuch tum karte ho dekh raha hai.
41.41: Beshak woh log jinhon ne Qur’an ka inkaar kiya jab woh unke paas aaya – to woh ek zabardast kitaab hai.
41.42: Na jhoot uske aage se aa sakta hai, na uske peechhe se – yeh us zaat ki taraf se naazil kiya gaya hai jo hikmat wala, tareef ke laayak hai.
41.43: Tumse bhi wahi kaha jaa raha hai jo tumse pehle Rasoolon se kaha gaya tha – ke tumhara Rubb zarur maafi dene wala hai, aur zarur dardnaak azaab dene wala bhi.
41.44: Aur agar hum use gair arabi banate to woh kehte: Uski aayaat ko tafseel se kyun nahi bayan kiya gaya? Ghair arabi kitaab aur arab zubaan wala Rasool? Keh do: Woh iman walon ke liye hidayat aur shifa hai – lekin jo log imaan nahi late unke kaanon mein bojh hai – aur woh andhe hain – woh aise logon ki tarah hain jinko door se pukara jaata hai.
41.45: Aur humne Musa ko kitaab di – phir us mein ikhtilaf kiya gaya – aur agar tumhare Rubb se ek baat pehle na likhi ja chuki hoti to unka faisla ho chuka hota – aur woh usmein shak mein pade hain.
41.46: Jo neik amal karega to woh apne hi liye karega – aur jo bura karega to uska wabaal bhi usi par padega – aur tumhara Rubb zalim nahi hai.
41.47: Usi ke paas hai qayamat ka ilm – aur wahi baarish barsaata hai – aur maaon ke rehm mein jo kuch hai usay jaanta hai – aur koi na jaane ke kal kya kamaayega – aur na kisi ko maloom ke kis jagah mein marega – beshak Allah sab kuch jaane wala, sab se waaqif hai.
41.48: Aur un se woh sab kuch gaib ho jaayega jise pehle woh pukarte thay. Aur woh samajh jaayenge ke unke liye koi bachao ka rasta nahi.
41.49: Insaan kabhi thak nahi ta dua karne se achhai ke liye. Aur agar usse koi burai chhoo jaye to woh niraasha aur ghamzada ho jaata hai.
41.50: Aur agar burai ke baad hum use apni rehmat ka maza chakha dein to zaroor woh kehta hai: Yeh to meri mehnat ki wajah se hai. Aur main nahi samajhta ke qayamat kabhi aayegi. Aur agar main apne Rubb ke paas le jaaya bhi gaya to mere liye uske haan bhi achha hi hoga. To zaroor hum kufr karne walon ko un ke amaal se aagah karenge, aur unhein sakht azaab ka maza chakhaayenge.
41.51: Aur jab insaan par hum ehsaan karte hain to woh munh moad leta hai aur door ho jaata hai. Aur jab usay koi takleef chhoo jaati hai to woh lambi lambi duaayein karne lagta hai.
41.52: Kaho: Kya tumne dekha agar yeh Qur’an Allah ki taraf se hua ho phir tum us ka inkaar karo to us se zyada gumraah kaun hoga jo gehri mukhalfat mein ho?
41.53: Anqareeb hum unhein apni nishaniyan dikhayenge afaaq mein (aafaq mein – aasmaanon aur zameen mein) aur unke apne nafs mein – yahan tak ke un par wazeh ho jaayega ke yeh (Qur’an) haq hai. Kya tumhara Rubb kaafi nahi ke woh har cheez ka gawaah hai?
41.54: Dekho, woh shak mein hain ke woh apne Rubb se milenge. Sun lo! Woh har cheez ko gherne waala hai.

42.3: Isi tarah Allah, Jo zabardast hai aur sab kuch jaane wala hai, tumhari taraf aur tum se pehle logon ki taraf wahee bhejta hai.
42.4: Jo kuch aasmanon mein hai aur jo kuch zameen mein hai sab usi ka hai, aur wahi Buland o Buzurg hai.
42.5: Aasman upar se phat padne ko hain, aur farishte apne Rubb ki hamd ke saath uski tasbeeh karte hain, aur zameen walon ke liye maafi maangte hain. Sun lo! Beshak Allah bakhshne wala, meharban hai.
42.6: Aur jin logon ne uske siwa kuch aur ko apna wali bana rakha hai, Allah un par nigrani rakhta hai, aur tum un par wakeel nahi ho.
42.7: Aur isi tarah humne tumhari taraf Arabi Qur’an wahee kiya hai, taake tum makkah walon ko aur uske ird gird rehne walon ko darao – aur darao us bade jama hone wale din se jiska koi shaq nahi – ek giroh jannat mein hoga aur ek giroh dozakh mein.
42.8: Aur agar Allah chahta to sabko ek ummat bana deta, lekin woh jisey chahta hai apni rehmat mein daakhil karta hai, aur zaalimon ka na koi wali hai na madadgaar.
42.9: Kya unhon ne Allah ke siwa kuch aur wali bana liye hain? To Allah hi wali hai, wahi murdon ko zinda karta hai, aur wahi har cheez par qudrat rakhta hai.
42.10: Aur jis cheez mein tum ikhtilaf karte ho uska faisla Allah karega – yeh Allah mera Rubb hai, usi par main bharosa karta hoon aur usi ki taraf rujoo karta hoon.
42.11: Woh aasmanon aur zameen ka paida karne wala hai – usne tumhare liye tumhi mein se jodey banaye, aur jaanwaron mein bhi jode banaye – is tarah woh tumhein barhata hai – us jaisa koi nahi – wahi sab kuch sunne wala, dekhne wala hai.
42.12: Aasmaano aur zameen ki kunjiyan usi ke paas hain – jis ke liye chahta hai rozi kushada karta hai, aur jis ke liye chahta hai tang kar deta hai – beshak woh har cheez ka ilm rakhta hai.
42.13: Usne tumhare liye wahi deen muqarrar kiya hai jo Nooh ko diya tha, aur wahi humne tumhari taraf wahee ki hai, aur wahi humne Ibrahim, Moosa aur Isa ko diya – ke deen ko qayam rakho aur usmein tafreeq na daalo – mushrikon par wahi baat bohot sakht hai jis ki taraf tum unhein bula rahe ho – Allah jisey chahta hai apni taraf bula leta hai, aur jisey chahta hai hidaayat deta hai.
42.14: Aur log usmein tafreeq na karte, magar iske baad ke unke paas ilm aa gaya – sirf aapas ke hasad ki wajah se – aur agar tumhare Rubb ki taraf se ek baat pehle na likhi ja chuki hoti to unka faisla turant ho gaya hota – aur woh iske baare mein shak mein padey hain.
42.15: To is liye daawat do – aur jaise tumhein hukm diya gaya hai waisa raho – aur unki khwahishon ki pairwi na karo – aur keh do: Main us kitaab par imaan laya jo Allah ne naazil ki – aur mujhe hukm diya gaya hai ke main tumhare darmiyan insaaf karoon – Allah hi hamara Rubb hai aur tumhara Rubb bhi – hamare liye hamare aamaal hain, aur tumhare liye tumhare aamaal – hamare darmiyan koi jhagra nahi – Allah ham sabko ikattha karega, aur usi ki taraf hum ko palatna hai.
42.16: Aur jo log Allah ke deen mein jhagra karte hain uske baad ke log usay qubool kar chuke hain, unki hujjat Allah ke paas bekaar hai – aur un par Allah ka gussa hai, aur unke liye sakht azaab hai.
42.17: Allah hi hai jisne haqq ke saath kitaab aur mi’zan naazil ki – aur tumhein kya pata, shayad qayamat ka waqt qareeb ho.
42.18: Jo log us par imaan nahi rakhte woh uski jaldi maangte hain – aur jo log us par imaan rakhte hain woh us se darte hain, aur jaante hain ke woh haq hai – sun lo! Jo qayamat mein shaq daal rahe hain woh gumrahi mein padey hain.
42.19: Allah apne bandon par nihayat hi meharban hai – jise chahta hai rozi deta hai – aur woh zabar dast, quwwat wala hai.
42.20: Jo koi aakhirat ki kheti chahta hai hum uski kheti mein izafa kar dete hain – aur jo duniya ki kheti chahta hai usay hum usmein dete hain – lekin uska aakhirat mein koi hissa nahi.
42.21: Kya unhon ne aise shareek bana liye hain jinhon ne unke liye deen ka woh tareeqa banaya hai jiska Allah ne ijaazat nahi di? Aur agar faisla ka lafz na ho gaya hota to unka faisla turant kar diya jata – aur zaalimon ke liye dardnaak azaab hai.
42.22: Tum zalimon ko dekhoge ke apne kiye ke sabab ghabraye hue hain – aur woh un par waqeh hoga – aur jo imaan laye aur neik amal kiye woh jannat ke baaghon mein honge – unke liye unke Rubb ke paas jo kuch chahein hoga – yeh hai bada fazl.
42.23: Yeh wahi basharat hai jo Allah apne un bandon ko deta hai jo imaan laye aur neik amal kiye – keh do: Main is kaam par tumse koi ajar nahi maangta siwa is ke ke rishtedari ka haq ada karo – aur jo koi ek neiki karega hum uske liye us mein aur izafa kar denge – beshak Allah bakhshne wala, shukar qabool karne wala hai.
42.24: Kya woh kehte hain ke us bande ne jhoot ghadh liya hai? To agar Allah chahe to tumhare dil par mohar laga de – aur woh baatil ko mitaa deta hai aur haqq ko apne kalimaat se qayam karta hai – beshak woh seenon ke haal ko jaanta hai.
42.25: Aur wahi hai jo apne bandon ki tauba qubool karta hai, aur unke gunaah maaf karta hai, aur jaanta hai jo kuch tum karte ho.
42.26: Aur woh imaan walon aur neik amal karne walon ki dua qubool karta hai, aur apne fazl se unhein aur zyada deta hai – aur kafiron ke liye sakht azaab hai.
42.27: Aur agar Allah apne bandon ke liye rozi kushada kar deta to woh zameen mein sarkashi karne lagte – lekin woh jo kuch chahta hai ek andaze ke saath naazil karta hai – beshak woh apne bandon se baakhabar hai, unhein dekhta hai.
42.28: Aur wahi hai jo logon ke mayous hone ke baad baarish barsaata hai – aur apni rehmat phaila deta hai – aur wahi wali hai, tareef ke laayak hai.
42.29: Aur uski nishaniyon mein se hai aasmanon aur zameen ka paida karna – aur unmein usne har tarah ke chalne wale makhlooq phaila diye – aur woh jab chahe unhein ikattha karne par qudrat rakhta hai.
42.30: Aur jo museebat tumhein pahunchi hai to woh tumhare apne haathon ke kaaran hai – aur woh to bahut si baaton se darguzar karta hai.
42.31: Aur tum zameen mein Allah ko aajiz nahi kar sakte – aur na tumhara Allah ke siwa koi wali hai na madadgaar.
42.32: Aur uski nishaniyon mein se hai samandar mein chalne wale jahaz – jaise pahaad.
42.33: Agar woh chahe to hawa ko thehra de – to woh samandar ki satah par ruk jaayein – beshak is mein har shakhs ke liye nishaniyan hain jo sabr kare aur shukar kare.
42.34: Ya woh unhein tabah kar de unke aamaal ke sabab – aur bohot se logon ko maaf bhi kar de.
42.35: Aur jo log hamari aayaat mein behas karte hain – unhein pata chal jaaye ke unke liye koi chhutkaara nahi.
42.36: To jo kuch tumhein diya gaya hai woh duniya ki zindagi ka mataa hai – aur jo kuch Allah ke paas hai woh behtar hai aur hamesha rehne wala – un logon ke liye jo imaan laye, aur apne Rubb par bharosa karte hain.
42.37: Aur jo bade gunaahon aur behayaiyon se bachte hain – aur jab gussa aaye to maaf kar dete hain.
42.38: Aur jo apne Rubb ka hukum maante hain – aur apne maamlaat mein mashwara karte hain – aur jo humne unhein diya us mein se kharch karte hain.
42.39: Aur jab unpar zulm hota hai to badla le lete hain.
42.40: Aur burai ka badla utni hi burai hai – lekin jo maaf kare aur sulah kare to uska ajar Allah ke paas hai – beshak woh zaalimon ko pasand nahi karta.
42.41: Aur jo zulm hone ke baad badla le – un par koi giraft nahi.
42.42: Giraft to unhi par hai jo logon par zulm karte hain – aur zameen mein najaiz tarike se sarakasht hote hain – unke liye dardnaak azaab hai.
42.43: Aur jo sabr kare aur maaf kare to yeh zarur azeem himmat ka kaam hai.
42.44: Aur jise Allah gumraah kar de to uske baad uska koi wali nahi – aur tum zalimon ko dekhoge ke jab woh azaab dekhenge to kehenge: Kya palatne ka koi raasta hai?
42.45: Aur tum unhein dekhoge ke woh aag ke samne laye jaayenge – zaleel ho rahe honge – chhupi nigah se dekh rahe honge – aur momin kahenge: Nuksaan uthane wale to waqai wohi hain jinhon ne apne aap ko aur apne ghar walon ko qayamat ke din nuksaan mein daal diya – sun lo! Zaalim hamesha azaab mein rahenge.
42.46: Aur unka koi madadgaar na hoga jo unhein Allah se bacha sake – aur jise Allah gumraah kar de uska koi rasta nahi.
42.47: Apne Rubb ki dawat par labbaik kaho us din se pehle ke na Allah ki taraf se palatne ka koi din ho, aur na panah dene wala ho.
42.48: Agar woh mooh modte hain to humne tumhein unpar nigraani ke liye nahi bheja – tumhara kaam sirf paigham pahuncha dena hai – aur jab hum insan ko apni rehmat ka maza chakhate hain to woh khushi mein phool jata hai – lekin agar unpar koi museebat aati hai unke haathon ke kiye se to woh naumeed ho jaate hain.
42.49: Allah ke liye hai aasmaano aur zameen ki baadshahi – woh jo chahta hai paida karta hai – jise chahta hai betiyan deta hai, jise chahta hai bete.
42.50: Ya dono mila kar deta hai, aur jise chahta hai be-aulad rakhta hai – beshak woh sab kuch jaanta hai, har cheez par qudrat rakhta hai.
42.51: Aur kisi bashar se Allah baat nahi karta magar wahee ke zariye – ya parde ke peeche se – ya koi Rasool bhejta hai jo uske hukum se wahee karta hai jo woh chahta hai – beshak woh buland martaba, hikmat wala hai.
42.52: Aur isi tarah humne tumhari taraf apne hukum se rooh (Qur’an) wahee ki – tum nahi jaante thay ke kitaab kya hai, aur na imaan kya hai – lekin humne isay roshni banaya, jise hum apne bandon mein se jise chahein hidayat dete hain – aur beshak tum zarur seedhe raahe ki taraf hidaayat karte ho.
42.53: Us Allah ki raah ki taraf jiska jo kuch aasmanon mein hai aur jo kuch zameen mein hai usi ka hai – sun lo! Har kaam Allah hi ki taraf rujoo karta hai.

43.3: Beshak humne isay ek Arabi Qur’an banaya taake tum samajh sako.
43.4: Aur yeh asal Kitaab hamare paas Lauh-e-Mahfooz mein hai – jo nihayat buland aur hikmat wali hai.
43.5: Kya hum is wahee ko tum se is liye hata dein ke tum hadd se guzar gaye ho?
43.6: Kitni hi pehle qaumon ko humne halaak kiya – jo unke paas koi Rasool aata to uska mazaq hi udate.
43.7: Aur jab bhi un ke paas koi nayi wahee aayi to woh us se munh moad lete.
43.8: To humne un se zyada takatwar logon ko halaak kiya – aur guzishta qaumon ki misaal guzar chuki hai.
43.9: Aur agar tum un se poochho: Kis ne aasman aur zameen ko paida kiya? To zaroor kahenge: Unhein Zabar Dast, Sab Jaanne wale ne paida kiya.
43.10: Jis ne tumhaare liye zameen ko bistar banaya – aur usmein tumhare liye raaste banaye – taake tum hidayat paao.
43.11: Aur jis ne aasman se ek andaze ke saath paani barsaya – phir us se humne ek murda sheher ko zinda kiya – isi tarah tum uthaye jaoge.
43.12: Aur jis ne sab jodey paida kiye – aur tumhaare liye kashtiyan aur jaanwar banaye jin par tum sawar hote ho.
43.13: Taake tum unki peethon par sawar ho kar apne Rubb ka fazl yaad karo – aur kaho: Paak hai woh jis ne isay hamare liye musakhar kiya – warna hum isay qaboo mein nahi la sakte thay.
43.14: Aur hum to apne Rubb ki taraf palatne wale hain.
43.15: Aur unhon ne uske bandon mein se kuch ko uska hissa bana diya – beshak insan khula kaafir hai.
43.16: Kya usne apne liye betiyan lein aur tumhein betay diye?
43.17: Aur jab un mein se kisi ko us cheez ki khabar di jaati hai jo us ne Rahman ke liye misaal banayi – to uska chehra siyah ho jaata hai aur woh gham se bhar jaata hai.
43.18: Kya woh jo gehno mein paala jaata hai – aur jhagde mein apni baat ko wazeh nahi kar sakta?
43.19: Aur unhon ne farishton ko – jo Rahman ke bandey hain – auratein qarar de diya – kya unhon ne unki paidaish dekhi hai? Unka bayan likha jaayega aur un se poocha jaayega.
43.20: Aur kehte hain: Agar Rahman chahta to hum unhein na poojhte – inka kuch ilm un ke paas nahi – yeh sirf andaza lagate hain.
43.21: Kya humne unhein koi kitaab di hai jise woh pakde hue hain?
43.22: Balki woh kehte hain: Humne apne baap dada ko ek tareeqa par paaya – aur hum unhi ke naqsh-e-qadam par chal rahe hain.
43.23: Aur isi tarah humne tumse pehle kisi basti mein koi daraane wala nahi bheja magar uske aish parast ne kaha: Humne apne baap dada ko ek tareeqa par paaya – aur hum unhi ki pairwi kar rahe hain.
43.24: Us Rasool ne kaha: Kya agar main tumhare paas us se behtar hidayat laaya ho jismein tumne apne baap dada ko paaya? To woh kehte hain: Hum us cheez ko nahi maante jise tum lekar aaye ho.
43.25: To humne unse inteqaam liya – to dekho jhutlane walon ka anjaam kaisa hua.
43.26: Aur yaad karo jab Ibrahim ne apne baap aur qaum se kaha: Main un cheezon se berag hoon jinki tum ibadat karte ho.
43.27: Magar us ke jo mujhe paida karta hai – wahi mujhe hidayat dega.
43.28: Aur isi baat ko usne apni aane wali nasal ke liye baaqi chhoda – taake log rujoo karein.
43.29: Balki main inhein aur inke baap dada ko chand saalon ka lutf uthane diya – yahan tak ke unke paas haqq aur ek roshan Rasool aa gaya.
43.30: Aur jab haqq unke paas aaya to unhon ne kaha: Yeh to jaadu hai – aur hum isay nahi maante.
43.31: Aur kehte hain: Yeh Qur’an is shakhs par kyun na naazil hua jo dono bastiyon mein kisi bade aadmi mein se hota?
43.32: Kya woh tumhare Rubb ki rehmat baant-te hain? Humne unke darmiyan duniya ki zindagi mein unka guzara taqseem kiya – aur humne un mein se kuch ko kuch par darjaat mein faazil banaya – taake woh ek doosre se kaam lein – aur tumhare Rubb ki rehmat us cheez se behtar hai jo woh jama karte hain.
43.33: Agar log ek ummat ban jaane ka darr na hota to hum rahman ka inkaar karne walon ke gharon ke liye chandi ke chhat aur seedhiyan banate jin par woh chadhte.
43.34: Aur unke gharon ke liye chandi ke darwazay aur takht bhi banate jin par woh tikte.
43.35: Aur aur bhi kisam kisam ki aaraam ki cheezein – lekin yeh sab duniya ki zindagi ka mataa hai – aur aakhirat tere Rubb ke paas un ke liye hai jo taqwa ikhtiyar karte hain.
43.36: Aur jo Rahman ki yaad se andha ban gaya to hum us par ek shaitaan musallat kar dete hain jo uska saathi ban jaata hai.
43.37: Aur woh unhein raah se bhatkaate hain – aur woh samajhte hain ke woh hidayat yafta hain.
43.38: Yahan tak ke jab woh hamare paas aayega to kahega: Kaash mere aur tere darmiyan mashriq aur maghrib ki doori hoti – tu to bura saathi tha.
43.39: Aur aaj tumhein kuch faida nahi hoga – ke tumne zulm kiya – ab tum azaab mein saathi ban gaye ho.
43.40: Kya tum bahron ko suna sakte ho ya andhon ko dikhla sakte ho – ya unhein hidaayat de sakte ho jo khuli gumraahi mein hain?
43.41: Agar hum tumhein utha lein to bhi hum un se inteqaam lene wale hain.
43.42: Ya hum tumhein woh dikhla dein jiska humne un se waada kiya hai – to bhi hum unpar qudrat rakhte hain.
43.43: To tum us cheez ko mazbooti se pakdo jo tumhari taraf wahee ki gayi hai – beshak tum seedhe raahe par ho.
43.44: Aur yeh Qur’an tumhare aur tumhari qaum ke liye ek naseehat hai – aur tum se sawal kiya jaayega.
43.45: Aur un Rasoolon se poochho jinhon ko humne tum se pehle bheja – kya humne Rahman ke siwa kisi aur ko mabood banane ka hukum diya tha?
43.46: Aur humne Moosa ko apni nishaniyon ke saath Fir’awn aur us ke darbaar walon ke paas bheja – to unhon ne kaha: Main duniya ka Rasool hoon.
43.47: Phir jab unke paas hamari nishaniyaan aayi to woh un par hansne lage.
43.48: Aur humne unhein aisi har nishani dikhayi jo pehli se badh kar thi – aur humne unhein azaab mein pakda – taake woh baaz aa jaayein.
43.49: Aur unhon ne kaha: Aey jaado gar! Apne Rubb se hamaare liye dua karo jis ka tu ne hum se waada kiya hai – beshak hum hidayat paa jaayenge.
43.50: Phir jab humne un se azaab hata diya to woh phir se todh dete.
43.51: Aur Fir’awn ne apni qaum mein pukar kar kaha: Kya Misr ki baadshahi meri nahi hai? Aur yeh nehrein mere neeche nahi beh rahi hain? Kya tum dekhte nahi?
43.52: Ya main is shakhs se behtar nahi jo haqaart ka shikar hai – aur apne baat ko saaf taur par bayan nahi karta?
43.53: To us par soney ke kanganoon ka girna kyun na hua – ya uske saath farishton ka qatar bandi se aana kyun na hua?
43.54: To usne apni qaum ko halka samjha – to unhon ne uska kehna maan liya – beshak woh faasiq log thay.
43.55: Phir jab unhon ne humein ghussa dila diya to humne un se inteqaam liya – aur un sab ko garq kar diya.
43.56: Aur humne unhein guzishta aur aane waalon ke liye misaal bana diya.
43.57: Aur jab Isa ibn-e-Maryam ki misaal di gayi to tumhari qaum us par cheekhne lagi.
43.58: Aur kehte hain: Kya hamare mabood behtar hain ya woh? Unhon ne is misaal ko sirf jhagde ke liye diya – balke woh jhagde baaz log hain.
43.59: Woh to sirf ek banda tha jise humne niyamat di – aur usay Bani Isra’il ke liye misaal bana diya.
43.60: Aur agar hum chahein to tum mein se farishtey paida kar dein jo zameen mein khaleefa ban jaayein.
43.61: Aur woh (Isa) to ek nishani hai qayamat ki – to us mein shaq na karo – aur meri pairwi karo – yeh hi seedha rasta hai.
43.62: Aur shaitaan tumhein roke na – beshak woh tumhara khula dushman hai.
43.63: Aur jab Isa roshan nishaniyon ke saath aaya to usne kaha: Main tumhare paas hikmat ke saath aaya hoon – aur taake kuch baaton mein tumhare darmiyan faisla kar doon – to Allah se daro aur meri itaat karo.
43.64: Beshak Allah hi mera Rubb hai aur tumhara Rubb – to usi ki ibadat karo – yeh hi seedha rasta hai.
43.65: Phir un mein se giroh ne ikhtilaf kiya – to jinhon ne zulm kiya unke liye dardnaak azaab hai.
43.66: Kya woh bas yeh dekh rahe hain ke achanak un par qayamat aa jaaye – aur unhein pata bhi na chale?
43.67: Us din sab dosti waale ek dusre ke dushman ho jaayenge siwa muttaqi logon ke.
43.68: Aey mere bandon! Aaj tumhare liye koi khauf nahi – aur na hi tum udaas hoge.
43.69: Woh jo hamari aayaat par imaan laye – aur musalmaan ban gaye.
43.70: Tum aur tumhari biwiyan jannat mein daakhil ho jao – khushi ke saath.
43.71: Un ke saamne sona aur chandi ke bartan pesh kiye jaayenge – aur un mein jo kuch dil karega, aur aankh ko raahat de woh sab hoga – aur tum us mein hamesha rahoge.
43.72: Yeh hi woh jannat hai jis ke tum waris banaye gaye – apne aamaal ke sabab.
43.73: Is mein tumhare liye bohot se phal hain jin mein se tum khaoge.
43.74: Beshak mujrim hamesha jahannum mein rahenge.
43.75: Un se azaab halka nahi kiya jaayega – aur woh us mein mayoos pade rahenge.
43.76: Aur humne un par zulm nahi kiya – balke woh khud hi zaalim the.
43.77: Aur woh cheekh kar kahenge: Aey Maalik! Tera Rubb hamare saath kaam tamaam kar de – woh kahega: Tumhein yahan rehna hai.
43.78: Beshak hum tumhare paas haqq lekar aaye – lekin tum mein se zyada log haqq se nafrat karte hain.
43.79: Kya unhon ne koi faisla kar liya hai? To ham bhi faisla karne wale hain.
43.80: Kya unhein lagta hai ke hum unki baatein nahi sunte? Balki hamare farishte unke paas likh rahe hain.
43.81: Keh do: Agar Rahman ka koi beta hota to main sabse pehle ibadat karta.
43.82: Paak hai aasmanon aur zameen ka Rubb – arsh ka Rubb – us se jo woh bayaan karte hain.
43.83: To chhod do unhein – woh bakwas karte rahein – aur khelte rahein – yahan tak ke woh apna din dekh lein jisse unhein daraya gaya hai.
43.84: Wahi aasman mein bhi mabood hai – aur zameen mein bhi mabood – aur woh hikmat wala, sab kuch jaane wala hai.
43.85: Aur paak hai woh jis ke liye aasmaano aur zameen ki baadshahi hai – aur jo kuch un ke darmiyan hai – aur usi ke paas qayamat ka ilm hai – aur usi ki taraf tum lautaye jaoge.
43.86: Aur jise woh bulaate hain Allah ke siwa – un ke paas kisi ki sifarish ka ikhtiyaar nahi – siwa un ke jo haq ki gawahi de aur woh jaante hon.
43.87: Aur agar tum un se poochho: Kis ne unhein paida kiya? To woh zarur kahenge: Allah ne – to phir woh kahaan phir jaate hain?
43.88: Aur uski yeh dua: Aey mere Rubb! Yeh to aise log hain jo imaan nahi laate.
43.89: To tum un se dar guzr karo – aur keh do: Salaam – anqareeb tumhein haq maloom ho jaayega.

44.2: Qasam hai is kitaab ki jo roshan hai.
44.3: Beshak humne isey ek barkat wali raat mein nazil kiya. Beshak hum dar sunane wale hain.
44.4: Us raat mein har hikmat wala kaam faisla kiya jaata hai.
44.5: Hamare paas se hukm ke mutabiq. Beshak hum Rasool bhejne wale hain.
44.6: Tumhare Rubb ki rehmat se. Beshak woh sunne wala, jaanne wala hai.
44.7: Aasmanon aur zameen ka Rubb, aur jo kuch in dono ke darmiyan hai, agar tum yaqeen laane waale ho.
44.8: Us ke siwa koi maabood nahi. Wahi zindagi deta hai aur wahi maut deta hai, tumhara Rubb aur tumhare pehle baap daada ka bhi Rubb.
44.9: Balki woh shak mein pade huye khel rahe hain.
44.10: To us din ka intezaar karo jab aasmaan ek saaf dhuwan laye ga.
44.11: Jo logon ko gher lega. Yeh ek dardnaak azaab hai.
44.12: (Log kahenge:) Aey hamare Rubb! Humein is azaab se nijaat de, hum yaqeen laate hain.
44.13: Unhein kahan se naseehat yaad aayegi, jabke unke paas ek roshan Rasool aa chuka tha.
44.14: Phir bhi unhon ne us se mooh morh liya aur kaha: Yeh to sikhaya gaya, deewana hai.
44.15: Agar hum thodi dair ke liye azaab hata dein to tum zaroor phir se waise hi ban jaoge.
44.16: Us din hum pakad karne wale honge, pakad bohot sakht hogi.
44.17: Humne unse pehle Firaun ki qaum ko bhi aazmaya. Unke paas ek izzat wala Rasool aaya.
44.18: (Usne kaha:) Allah ke bandon ko mere hawale karo. Main tumhare liye ek amaan-daar Rasool hoon.
44.19: Aur Allah ke muqable mein takabbur na karo. Main tumhare paas ek saaf daleel le kar aaya hoon.
44.20: Aur main apne Rubb aur tumhare Rubb ki panaah leta hoon ke tum mujhe sangsaar (patthar se maar) karo.
44.21: Agar tum mujh par imaan nahi laate to mujh se alag ho jao.
44.22: Phir usne apne Rubb ko pukara: Yeh log mujhe mujrim samajh rahe hain.
44.23: (Jawab aaya:) Mere bandon ko raat ke waqt le jao. Tum peechay se peechay dekhe jaane wale ho.
44.24: Aur samundar ko sukoon mein chhod do. Beshak woh gark kiye jaane wale lashkar hain.
44.25: Kitni hi baghichein aur chashmein unhon ne chhodiin.
44.27: Aur ni’mat se bhare zindagi ke saaz-o-saaman, jin mein woh maze le rahe thay.
44.28: Aisa hi hua. Aur humne unka waris dusri qaum ko bana diya.
44.29: Phir un par na aasmaan roya, aur na zameen. Aur na unhein mohlet mili.
44.30: Aur Bani-Israel ko humne azaab-e-zaleel se nijaat di.
44.31: Firaun se. Beshak woh sar-kash tha, hadd se guzarne waala.
44.32: Aur humne unhein ilm ke bawajood aalameen par afzal banaya.
44.33: Aur unhein aisi nishaniyaan di jin mein khuli aazmaish thi.
44.35: Hamari pehli maut ke siwa koi maut nahi, aur hum uthaye nahi jaayenge.
44.36: To lao apne baap-dada ko agar tum sachche ho.
44.37: Kya yeh log behtar hain ya Tubba’ ki qaum aur un se pehle ke log? Humne un sab ko halaak kar diya. Beshak woh mujrim thay.
44.38: Aur humne aasmaanon aur zameen ko aur jo kuch inke darmiyan hai bina kisi faayde ke paida nahi kiya.
44.39: Humne unhein haqq ke saath paida kiya, lekin aksar log jaante nahi.
44.40: Beshak faislay ka din sab ka miyaad hai.
44.41: Us din koi dost kisi dost ke kuch kaam nahi aayega, aur na unki madad ki jaayegi.
44.42: Siwa uske jise Allah reham kare. Beshak woh zabardast, nihayat reham karne wala hai.
44.45: Jaise pighle hue taamba, pait mein is tarah ghoontay jaayega jaise ubla hua paani.
44.46: (Kaha jaayega:) Pakdo usay, aur use beech mein ghasit lo.
44.47: Phir uske sar par kholte paani ka azaab daalo.
44.48: Chakh! Beshak tu hi woh azmat wala izzat daar tha.
44.49: Yeh wahi cheez hai jismein tum shak karte thay.
44.50: Beshak muttaqi log aman wa salamat jagah mein honge.
44.52: Har kisam ke libaas pehne hue, woh aapas mein takiya laga kar baithenge.
44.53: Waisi hi hoorin unke paas hongi, neiki aur husn wali.
44.54: Aisi hi jannat unko milegi, jiska waris hum unke aamal ke badle banayenge.
44.55: Wahan woh kisi maut ka maza nahi chakhenge, siwa usi maut ke jo duniya mein aa chuki, aur Allah unhein dozakh ke azaab se bacha lega.
44.56: Yeh tumhare Rubb ka fazl hoga. Yeh hi badi kamiyabi hai.
44.57: To humne is Qur’an ko tumhari zaban mein aasan bana diya hai, taake tum naseehat haasil karo.
44.58: To intezaar karo, woh bhi intezaar kar rahe hain.
44.59: Pas tum bhi intezar karo, woh bhi intezar kar rahe hain.

45.2: Is Kitaab ka nazil kiya jaana Allah ki taraf se hai – jo Zabardast, Hakeem hai.
45.3: Aasmanon aur zameen mein mominon ke liye bohot si nishaniyan hain.
45.4: Aur tumhaari apni paidaish mein bhi – aur un jaanwaron mein bhi jinhein woh phaila raha hai – yaqeen laane waalon ke liye nishaniyan hain.
45.5: Aur raat aur din ke badalne mein – aur us rizq mein jo Allah aasman se naazil karta hai, jis se woh zameen ko uske murda hone ke baad zinda karta hai – aur hawaon ke gardish mein – un logon ke liye nishaniyan hain jo aqal rakhte hain.
45.6: Yeh Allah ki aayaat hain jo hum tumhein sachai ke saath suna rahe hain – to Allah ke kis bayan ke baad yeh log imaan laayenge?
45.7: Har jhoot ghadne wale gunaahgaar ke liye halakat hai.
45.8: Jo Allah ki aayaat ko sunta hai jab us ke samne padh kar sunayi jaati hain – phir takabbur ke saath is tarah reh jaata hai jaise us ne suna hi nahi – to usay dardnaak azaab ki bashaarat de do.
45.9: Aur jab us tak hamari koi aayat pohanchti hai to uska mazaaq banaata hai – aise logon ke liye zillat ka azaab hai.
45.10: Un ke aage jahannum hai – na to un ka kuch bhi kamaya hua un ke kisi kaam aayega – aur na woh saathi jinhein unhon ne Allah ke siwa ikhtiyar kiya – aur unke liye azeem azaab hai.
45.11: Yeh hidayat hai – aur jin logon ne apne Rubb ki aayaat ko jhutlaya un ke liye dardnaak azaab hai – dardnaak saza – unki badkari ke sabab.
45.12: Allah hi hai jis ne samandar ko tumhaare liye musakhar kiya – taake usmein uske hukm se kashtiyaan chalen – aur tum uska fazl talash karo – aur taake tum shukr ada karo.
45.13: Aur jo kuch aasmanon mein hai aur zameen mein hai sab ko usne apne hukm se tumhaare liye musakhar kiya – yaqeenan is mein un logon ke liye nishaniyan hain jo sochte hain.
45.14: Iman laane walon se keh do ke jo log Allah ke dinon ki mulaqat ki tawaqqu nahi rakhte unhein maaf kar dein – taake Allah ek qaum ko us ke kiye ka badla de.
45.15: Jo koi neik amal karega to apne liye karega – aur jo bura amal karega to uska nuqsan bhi usi ko hoga – phir tum apne Rubb ki taraf lautaaye jaoge.
45.16: Aur humne Bani Isra’il ko kitaab, hukum aur nabuwwat ata ki – aur unhein paak cheezon se rizq diya – aur unhein duniya mein sab par fazilat di.
45.17: Aur unhein deen mein khuli khuli daleelen di – to unhon ne apas mein ikhtilaf nahi kiya magar uske baad ke unke paas ilm aa gaya – sirf aapas ke hasad ke wajah se – beshak tera Rubb qayamat ke din un mein faisla karega jin baaton mein woh ikhtilaf karte rahe.
45.18: Phir humne tumhein deen ka ek saaf raasta diya – to tum us par chalo – aur un logon ki khwahishon ka paalan na karo jo ilm nahi rakhte.
45.19: Beshak woh Allah ke azaab se tumhara kuch bhi bachaav nahi kar sakte – aur beshak zaalim ek doosre ke dost hote hain – aur Allah muttaqiyon ka wali hai.
45.20: Yeh (Qur’an) logon ke liye baseerat (roshni) hai – aur hidayat aur rehmat hai un logon ke liye jo yaqeen rakhte hain.
45.21: Kya jin logon ne buray kaam kiye hain unka yeh khayaal hai ke hum unhein un logon ke barabar kar denge jo imaan laye aur neik amal kiye – dono ka jeena aur marna barabar ho jaayega? Kitna bura faisla karte hain.
45.22: Aur Allah ne aasmanon aur zameen ko haqq ke saath paida kiya – taake har shakhs ko us ke kiye ka badla diya jaaye – aur un par zulm na kiya jaaye.
45.23: Kya tumne us shakhs ko dekha jis ne apni khwahish ko apna mabood bana liya – aur Allah ne usay ilm ke bawajood gumraahi mein chhod diya – aur uske kaan aur dil par mohar laga di – aur uski aankhon par parda daal diya – ab usay Allah ke siwa kaun hidaayat de sakta hai? Kya tum sabak nahi lete?
45.24: Aur kehte hain: Sirf yeh hi hamari duniya ki zindagi hai – yahan marte hain, yahan jeete hain – aur humein waqt hi halaak karta hai – jab ke unhein is baat ka kuch ilm nahi – yeh to sirf andaza laga rahe hain.
45.25: Aur jab unhein hamari roshan aayaat sunayi jaati hain to unki hujjat yahi hoti hai ke kehte hain: Agar tum sachche ho to hamare baap dada ko le aao.
45.26: Keh do: Allah hi tumhein zindagi deta hai – phir tumhein maut deta hai – phir qayamat ke din tumhein ikattha karega – is mein koi shaq nahi – lekin zyada log nahi jaante.
45.27: Aasmaanon aur zameen ki baadshahi Allah ke liye hai – aur jis din qayamat qayam hogi – us din baatil ke maan-ne waale khasare mein pad jaayenge.
45.28: Aur har ummat ko dekhoge ke ghootno ke bal giri hogi – har ummat ko uske amal ki kitaab ki taraf bulaya jaayega – aaj tumhein tumhare kiye ka badla diya jaayega.
45.29: Yeh hamari kitaab hai – jo tumhaare khilaf sach bolti hai – jo kuch tum karte thay hum ne usay likh rakha tha.
45.30: To jin logon ne imaan laaya aur neik amal kiye – unhein unka Rubb apne raham mein daakhil karega – yeh hi khuli kamiyabi hai.
45.31: Aur jin logon ne kufr ikhtiyar kiya – un se kaha jaayega: Kya tumhare saamne meri aayaat nahi padh kar sunayi jaati thi? Magar tumne takabbur kiya – aur mujrim log ban gaye.
45.32: Aur jab kaha jaata: Allah ka waada sach hai – aur qayamat mein koi shaq nahi – to tum kehte: Hum nahi jaante qayamat kya hoti hai – hum to sirf andaza lagate hain – aur hum uske bare mein yaqeen se nahi kehte.
45.33: Aur un ke samne un ke buray amal zahir ho jaayenge – aur unhein wohi cheez gher le gi jiska woh mazaaq udaate thay.
45.34: Aur kaha jaayega: Aaj hum tumhein bhool jaayenge – jaise tumne is din ki mulaqat ko bhula diya tha – aur tumhara thikaana aag hai – aur tumhara koi madadgaar nahi.
45.35: Yeh is liye ke tumne Allah ki aayaat ko mazaaq bana liya – aur tumhein duniya ki zindagi ne dhoka diya – to aaj na to woh aag se nikale jaayenge – aur na un se maafi hi maangi jaayegi.
