45.36: To Allah ke liye hi sab tareef hai – jo aasmanon ka Rubb hai, zameen ka Rubb hai, jahon ka Rubb hai.
45.37: Aur usi ke liye aasmaanon aur zameen mein sab oonchai hai – aur wahi zabardast, Hakeem hai.

46.2: Is Kitaab ka nazool Allah ki taraf se hai jo Zabardast, Hakeem hai.
46.3: Humne aasmanon aur zameen ko aur jo kuch unke darmiyan hai haqq ke saath aur ek muqarrar muddat ke liye paida kiya – aur jin logon ne kufr ikhtiyar kiya woh us cheez se munh moad rahe hain jise unhein daraaya gaya hai.
46.4: Kaho: Kya tumne dekha un maaboodon ko jinhein tum Allah ke siwa pukaarte ho? Mujhe dikhayo unhonne zameen mein kya paida kiya hai – ya aasmanon mein unka koi hissa hai? Lao koi kitaab is se pehle ki aayi ho – ya koi ilm ka asar – agar tum sachche ho.
46.5: Us shakhs se zyada gumraah kaun ho sakta hai jo Allah ko chhod kar unko pukare jo qayamat tak uski dua ka jawab na de sakte – balki woh unki duaon se bekhabar hain?
46.6: Aur jab log ikattha kiye jaayenge to woh unke dushman ban jaayenge – aur unki ibaadat ka inkaar karenge.
46.7: Aur jab unhein hamari roshan aayaat sunayi jaati hain to woh log jinhein kufr hai, sach aane ke baad kehte hain: Yeh to khula jaadu hai.
46.8: Kya woh kehte hain ke isay usne ghad liya hai? Kaho: Agar maine isay ghad liya hai to tum mujhe Allah se bacha nahi sakte – woh jaanta hai jo kuch tum is mein baatein banate ho – mere aur tumhare darmiyan wahi gawah kaafi hai – aur woh bada bakhshne wala, meharbaan hai.
46.9: Kaho: Main koi naya Rasool to nahi hoon – aur main nahi jaanta ke mere saath kya kiya jaayega aur tumhare saath kya – main to sirf usi wahee ka paalan karta hoon jo meri taraf bheji gayi hai – aur main to sirf saaf saaf dara dene waala hoon.
46.10: Kaho: Tum socho – agar yeh Qur’an Allah ki taraf se ho aur tum is ka inkaar kar do – aur Bani Isra’il ka ek gawah is par gawahi de chuka ho – aur woh imaan laaya ho – aur tum takabbur karo – to yaqeenan Allah zaalim logon ko hidaayat nahi deta.
46.11: Aur jin logon ne kufr kiya kehte hain: Agar yeh kuch bhi accha hota to yeh log is par hum se pehle imaan na laate – aur jab unhon ne hidayat ko qabool nahi kiya to zarur kahenge ke yeh to ek purani jhooti baat hai.
46.12: Aur is se pehle Moosa ki kitaab rehnuma aur rehmat thi – aur yeh kitaab (Qur’an) hai jo uski tasdeeq karne wali hai – Arabi zabaan mein – taake woh logon ko zalimon ko daraaye – aur neik logon ke liye khushkhabri ho.
46.13: Beshak jo log kehte hain: Hamara Rubb Allah hai – phir is par mustaqil rahe – to un par na koi khauf hoga aur na woh ghamgeen honge.
46.14: Woh jannat waley hain – jahan woh hamesha rahenge – unke kiye ke badle mein jaza hai.
46.15: Aur humne insaan ko apne walidain ke saath husn-e-sulook karne ka hukum diya – uski maa ne use dard ke saath uthaya – aur dard ke saath usay janam diya – aur uska doodh chhuraana tees maheenon mein hota hai – yahaan tak ke jab woh apni poori taqat ko pahuncha – aur 40 saal ka ho gaya – to kehne laga: Aey mere Rubb! Mujhe tawfeeq de ke main tera shukr ada karun jo tu ne mujh par aur mere walidain par kiya – aur main aise neik amal karun jin se tu raazi ho jaaye – aur meri aulad ko bhi neik bana – main tere paas tauba karta hoon – aur main musalmaanon mein se hoon.
46.16: Yeh wahi log hain jin se hum unke behtareen amal qubool karenge – aur unke buray kaamon se darguzar karenge – jannat walon mein – yeh sachcha waada hai jo un se kiya gaya tha.
46.17: Aur jis shakhs ne apne walidain se kaha: Uff tum dono par! Kya tum mujhe daraate ho ke main phir se uthaya jaunga? Halankeh mujh se pehle kitni hi naslein guzar chuki hain – (walidain) Allah se madad maangte hain – kehte hain: Tujhe afsos ho – imaan le aa – Allah ka waada sach hai – to woh kehta hai: Yeh to sirf purani kahaniyan hain.
46.18: Yeh wahi log hain jin par azaab ka faisla sabit ho gaya – un ummaton ke saath jo un se pehle guzar chuki – jin mein se jinn aur ins the – beshak yeh log ghaate mein hain.
46.19: Aur sab ke darjaat unke aamal ke mutabiq hain – taake Allah unhein unke aamal ka poora badla de – aur un par zulm na kiya jaaye.
46.20: Aur jis din woh log jinhon ne kufr kiya aag ke samne laye jaayenge – to unse kaha jaayega: Tumne apni duniya ki zindagi mein apni niyamatein le li aur un se lutf utha liya – to aaj tumhein zillat ka azaab diya jaayega – is liye ke tum zameen mein baghair haqq ke takabbur karte the – aur is liye ke tum faasiq thay.
46.21: Aur Aad ke bhaai ko yaad karo – jab usne apni qaum ko Ahqaf mein daraaya – aur us se pehle bhi daraane waale aa chuke thay – aur uske baad bhi – ke sirf Allah ki ibaadat karo – mujhe tum par ek bade din ke azaab ka darr hai.
46.22: Unhon ne kaha: Kya tu humein daraane aaya hai ke hum apne maaboodon ko chhod dein? To le aa jis se tu humein daraata hai agar tu sachcha hai.
46.23: Usne kaha: Ilm to sirf Allah ke paas hai – aur main to wohi paighaam tumhein pahunchata hoon jo mujhe bheja gaya hai – magar main dekh raha hoon ke tum log jaahil ho.
46.24: Phir jab unhon ne use apne waadiyon ki taraf aate dekha – to kehne lage: Yeh to ek baadal hai jo humein baarish dene waala hai – nahi, balke yeh wahi cheez hai jise tum jaldi la rahe the – yeh ek aandhi hai jismein dardnaak azaab hai.
46.25: Woh har cheez ko apne Rubb ke hukum se tabah kar deti thi – to woh is halat mein ho gaye ke unke gharon ke siwa kuch nazar na aata tha – is tarah hum gunahgaar qaum ko jaza dete hain.
46.26: Aur humne unhein us cheez mein maqam diya tha jis mein humne tumhein maqam nahi diya – aur unhein kaan, aankhen, aur dil diye – magar unka kaan, unki aankhen, aur unka dil unke kuch bhi kaam na aaye – is liye ke woh Allah ki aayaat ka inkaar karte thay – aur un cheezon ne unhein gher liya jinka woh mazaaq udate thay.
46.27: Aur beshak humne un bastiyon ko halaak kiya jo tumhare ird gird thin – aur humne baar baar apni aayaat bayaan ki – taake woh rujoo kar lein.
46.28: Phir unhein un (maaboodon) ne kyun na bachaya jinko unhon ne Allah ke siwa maabood samajh kar qareeb banaya tha? Balke woh to unse gaib ho gaye – aur yeh unka jhoot tha – aur woh jo iftara karte thay.
46.29: Aur (yaad karo) jab humne kuch jinnon ko tumhari taraf bheja jo Qur’an sun rahe thay – phir jab woh us jagah pahunche to kehne lage: Khaamosh raho – phir jab woh mukammal ho gaya to apni qaum ki taraf laut gaye taake unhein daraayein.
46.30: Unhon ne kaha: Aey hamari qaum ke logon! Humne ek kitaab suni hai jo Moosa ke baad naazil hui hai – jo apne se pehle ki tasdeeq karne wali hai – jo haqq aur seedha raasta dikhane waali hai.
46.31: Aey hamari qaum ke logon! Allah ki dawat dene wale ko maan lo – aur us par imaan le aao – Allah tumhare gunaahon ko maaf kar dega – aur tumhein dardnaak azaab se bacha lega.
46.32: Aur jo Allah ki daawat dene wale ka kehna na maane – to woh zameen mein Allah ko hara nahi sakta – aur uska Allah ke siwa koi wali nahi – aise log khuli gumraahi mein hain.
46.33: Kya un logon ne nahi dekha ke Allah hi hai jisne aasmanon aur zameen ko paida kiya – aur usay unhein paida karne se kuch thakan nahi mehsoos hui – to kya woh murdon ko zinda nahi karega? Kyun nahi – woh to har cheez par qaadir hai.
46.34: Aur jis din kafiron ko aag ke saamne laaya jaayega – to kaha jaayega: Kya yeh sach nahi? Woh kahenge: Kyun nahi, hamare Rubb ki qasam – to kaha jaayega: To ab azaab ka maza chakkho apne kufr ke sabab.
46.35: To (aey Nabi) sabr karo jaise azeem honsle waale Rasoolon ne sabr kiya – aur unke liye jaldi na karo – jis din woh log us cheez ko dekhenge jiska unhein waada diya gaya hai to unhein lagega ke woh duniya mein sirf ek din ya ek din ka hissa hi rahe.

47.1: Jin logon ne kufr ikhtiyar kiya aur (logon ko) Allah ke raaste se roka, Allah ne unke aamal zaya kar diye.
47.2: Aur jin logon ne imaan laya aur neik amal kiye, aur jo kuch Muhammad par naazil kiya gaya use maante hain (aur woh unke Rubb ki taraf se haqq hai), Allah ne unki buraiyan door kar di aur unka haal sudhaar diya.
47.3: Yeh is liye ke jo log kufr karte hain unhon ne jhoot ka paalan kiya, aur jo log imaan laye unhon ne apne Rubb ki taraf se aayi hui haqq baat ko maana. Aise hi misaalein Allah logon ke liye bayan karta hai.
47.4: Phir jab tum (jang mein) kafiron se takraao to unki gardan maaro, yahan tak ke jab tum unhein achhi tarah kamzor kar do to (unhein) qaid karo. Phir ya to ehsaan kar ke chhod do ya fidya le kar, yahan tak ke jang apne bojh utaar de. Yehi hai (hukm). Aur agar Allah chahta to unse khud badla leta, lekin (aesa na karke) tumhein aazmana chahta hai. Aur jo log Allah ke raaste mein qatal kiye jaate hain, Allah unke aamal zaya nahi karta.
47.5: Unhein jald hi seedhi raah dikha dega, aur unka haal behtar karega.
47.6: Aur unhein us jannat mein daakhil karega jiska unhon ne ta’aruf sun rakha hai.
47.7: Aey logon jo imaan laye ho! Agar tum Allah ki madad karoge to woh tumhari madad karega, aur tumhare qadam mazboot karega.
47.8: Aur jin logon ne kufr kiya unke liye tabahi hai, aur Allah ne unke aamal zaya kar diye.
47.9: Yeh is wajah se hai ke unhon ne Allah ke naazil kiye huye ko napasand kiya, to Allah ne bhi unke aamal zaya kar diye.
47.10: Kya un logon ne zameen mein ghoom kar dekha nahi ke unse pehle logon ka kya anjaam hua? Allah ne unpar tabahi taan di, aur kaafiron ke liye waisa hi anjaam hai.
47.11: Yeh is liye ke Allah un logon ka wali hai jo imaan laye, aur kafiron ka koi wali (madadgar) nahi.
47.12: Beshak jo log imaan laye aur neik amal kiye, unhein un jannaton mein daakhil kiya jaayega jinke neechey nehrein beh rahi hongi. Aur jin logon ne kufr kiya woh duniya ki zindagi ka lutf utha rahe hain, aur jaanwaron ki tarah kha rahe hain, aur unka thikaana dozakh hai.
47.13: Aur kitni hi bastiyan (aesi hui) jo tumhari basti se zyada taqatwar thin jinhon ne tumhein nikaala. Unhein humne halaak kar diya, aur unka koi madadgar na tha.
47.14: Kya jo shakhs apne Rubb ki taraf se ek saaf daleel par ho woh us shakhs ki tarah ho sakta hai jiske liye uska bura amal khushnuma bana diya gaya ho aur woh apni khwahish ke peeche chala ho?
47.15: Us jannat ki misaal jiska waada muttaqi logon se kiya gaya hai (yeh hai): Usmein paani ke aise nehrein hongi jo kabhi na sadhe, aur doodh ki nehrein hongi jiska zaiqa kabhi na badle, aur sharbat ki nehrein hongi jo peene walon ke liye lazeez hoga, aur saaf shaheed (asal) ki nehrein hongi. Wahan unke liye har qisam ke phal honge, aur unke Rubb ki taraf se bakhshish bhi. Kya yeh log un logon jaise ho sakte hain jo hamesha dozakh mein rahenge, aur unhein aesa pani pilaya jaayega jo ubla hua ho, aur unke peit cheer kar rakh de?
47.16: Aur unmein se kuch aise hain jo tumhari baat sunte hain, lekin humne unke dilon par parde daal diye hain taake woh use na samajh sakein, aur unke kaanon mein bojh hai. Agar woh har nishani bhi dekh lein to bhi us par imaan na laayenge. Yeh log is had tak pahunch gaye hain ke jab tumhare paas aa kar tumse behas karte hain to kehte hain: Yeh to bas purane logon ki kahaniyan hain.
47.17: Aur jo log hidayat ikhtiyar karte hain Allah unki hidayat mein izafa karta hai, aur unhein unka taqwa ata karta hai.
47.18: Kya yeh log bas is cheez ka intezar kar rahe hain ke achanak un par qayamat aa jaaye? Uski nishaniyan to aa chuki hain. Phir jab woh aayegi to unke liye hidaayat haasil karna kaise faida dega?
47.19: To (aey Nabi!) jaane lijiye ke Allah ke siwa koi maabood nahi, aur apne gunaah ke liye aur momin mardon aur momin auraton ke liye maghfirat maangte rahiye. Aur Allah tumhari har chaal ko aur tumhari har jagah ko jaanta hai.
47.20: Aur jo log imaan laye kehte hain: Kyon nahi naazil hoti koi surat? Phir jab koi saaf hukm wali surat naazil hoti hai, aur usmein jung ka zikr hota hai, to tum dekhte ho ke jinke dilon mein rog (bimari) hai, woh tumhari taraf is tarah dekhte hain jaise kisi par maut chhayi ho. To unke liye tabahi hai.
47.21: Unka haal to yeh hai ke (unki liye behtar tha) ke woh ta’at karte, aur achhi baat ke paband rehte. Jab faisla ho jaaye to agar woh Allah se sachcha rawayya rakhte to unke liye behtari thi.
47.22: To kya tumse yeh umeed ki ja rahi hai ke tum zameen mein fasad karo, aur apne rishtedaron ke ta’alluqaat tod do?
47.23: Yahi woh log hain jinpar Allah ne la’nat ki, aur unhein behra banaya, aur unki aankhein andhi kar di.
47.24: Kya yeh log Qur’an mein gaur nahi karte? Ya unke dilon par tala laga hua hai?
47.25: Jo log hidayat milne ke baad peeth pher gaye, shaitaan ne unhein behka diya, aur unko ummeedein lagwa di.
47.26: Yeh is wajah se hua ke unhon ne un logon se kaha jo Allah ki naazil ki hui cheez se nafrat rakhte thay: Hum kuch maamla mein tumhari baat maan lenge. Aur Allah unke raaz jaanta hai.
47.27: To kaise hoga jab farishte unke chehron aur unki peethon par maarte hue unki rooh nikaalenge?
47.28: Yeh is wajah se ke unhon ne us cheez ka paalan kiya jo Allah ko naraz karti thi, aur uski raza se nafrat ki, to usne unke aamaal zaya kar diye.
47.29: Kya jin logon ke dilon mein rog hai woh samajh baithe hain ke Allah unke keene (bugz) ko zahir nahi karega?
47.30: Agar hum chahen to unhein tumhein dikha dein to tum unhein unke chehron se pehchan lo, aur tum unhein unke lehje se bhi pehchan loge. Aur Allah tumhare sab aamaal ko jaanta hai.
47.31: Aur hum tumhein zaroor aazmaayenge, yahan tak ke hum jaanein un logon ko jo tum mein se jihad karne wale hain, aur sabir hain, aur tumhare haal ko jaanch lein.
47.32: Beshak jin logon ne kufr kiya, aur Allah ke raaste se roka, aur Rasool ke mukhalif hue uske baad ke unpar hidaayat wazeh ho chuki thi — woh Allah ka kuch bhi nahi bigaad sakte, aur woh unke aamaal zaya kar dega.
47.33: Aey logon jo imaan laye ho! Allah ki ita’at karo, aur Rasool ki bhi, aur apne aamaal zaya na karo.
47.34: Beshak jin logon ne kufr kiya, aur Allah ke raaste se roka, phir kufr ki halat mein mar gaye — Allah unhein kabhi maaf nahi karega.
47.35: To himmat mat haaro, aur sulah ki darkhwast na karo jab tumhi ghalib ho. Allah tumhare saath hai, aur woh tumhare aamaal ko zaya nahi karega.
47.36: Duniya ki zindagi sirf khel aur tamasha hai. Agar tum imaan lao aur taqwa ikhtiyar karo to woh tumhein tumhara ajar dega, aur tumse tumhare maal nahi maangega.
47.37: Agar woh tumse maal maange, aur tum par dabao dale, to tum bukhl karoge, aur tumhare dilon ke bugz (keene) ko zahir kar dega.
47.38: Dekho! Tumhi ho jo Allah ki raah mein dene ke liye bulaye ja rahe ho, to tum mein se kuch bukhl karte hain. Aur jo bukhl karta hai woh apne hi liye bukhl karta hai. Allah to be-niyaz hai, aur tum mohtaaj ho. Aur agar tum mooh phero to Allah kisi aur qaum ko le aayega, jo tum jaise na hogi.

48.1: Beshak humne tumhein khuli fatah ata ki.
48.2: Taake Allah tumhaare agle pichhle gunaah maaf kar de – aur apni ni’mat tum par poori kar de – aur tumhein seedhe raaste par qayam rakhe.
48.3: Aur Allah tumhein ek zabardast fatah de.
48.4: Wahi hai jisne mominon ke dil mein sukoon naazil kiya – taake apne imaan ke saath woh aur imaan mein barh jaayein – aur Allah ke liye hi hain aasmanon aur zameen ke lashkar – aur Allah sab kuch jaane wala, Hakeem hai.
48.5: Taake Allah momin mardon aur momin auraton ko jannatein mein daakhil kare jinke neeche nehrein beh rahi hain – jahan woh hamesha rahenge – aur unki buraiyon ko unse door kar de – aur yeh Allah ke nazdeek badi kamiyabi hai.
48.6: Aur un munafiq mardon aur auraton aur mushrik mardon aur auraton ko azaab de – jo Allah ke bare mein bure gumaan rakhte hain – un par buraaiyon ka daira phir gaya – aur Allah unse ghussa hai – aur un par laanat ki – aur unke liye jahannum tayyar ki – aur woh bohot bura thikaana hai.
48.7: Aur Allah ke liye hi hain aasmanon aur zameen ke lashkar – aur Allah zabardast, Hakeem hai.
48.8: Beshak humne tumhein gawah, mubashshir (khushkhabri dene waala), aur nazeer (daraane waala) bana kar bheja.
48.9: Taake tum Allah aur uske Rasool par imaan lao – aur uska saath do, uski ta’zeem karo, aur subah shaam uski tasbeeh karo.
48.10: Beshak jo log tumse bai’at karte hain – woh dar-asal Allah se bai’at karte hain – Allah ka haath unke haathon par hai – phir jo koi ahd todta hai to woh apne hi nuqsan ke liye todta hai – aur jo us ahd ko poora karta hai jo usne Allah se kiya hai to Allah usay bada ajar dega.
48.11: Jo beduin pichhe reh gaye thay woh zaroor kahenge: Humein hamare maal aur gharwalon ne mashgool kar diya – to hamare liye magfirat ki dua karo – woh apne dil mein woh baat rakhte hain jo tum nahi jaante – keh do: Kaun tumhaare liye Allah ke muqaable mein kuch kar sakta hai agar woh tumhein nuqsan pahunchana chahe ya faida pahunchana chahe? Balke Allah ko tumhaare aamaal ki poori khabar hai.
48.12: Balki tumne ye samjha ke Rasool aur momin kabhi apne gharon mein laut kar na aayenge – aur yeh tumhaare dilon mein achha bana diya gaya – aur tumne bura gumaan kiya – aur tum halaak hone waale log ho.
48.13: Aur jo Allah aur uske Rasool par imaan nahi laate – to beshak humne aise kafiron ke liye bhadakti aag tayyar kar rakhi hai.
48.14: Aur Allah ke liye hi hai aasmanon aur zameen ki baadshahi – jise chahta hai baksh deta hai, aur jise chahta hai azaab deta hai – aur Allah bakhshne waala, meharbaan hai.
48.15: Jab tum ganimat lene jaoge to woh log jo peechhe chhod diye gaye thay kahenge: Humein bhi apne saath chalne do – woh chahte hain Allah ke kalam ko badal dena – keh do: Tum hargiz humare saath nahi chaloge – Allah ne pehle se yeh faisla kar liya hai – phir woh kahenge: Balke tum humse hasad karte ho – (nahi), balki woh log samajhte nahi hain magar thoda.
48.16: Keh do: Tum un logon ke muqaable mein bulaye jaoge jo bade ladne waale honge – unse tum ladoge ya woh musalmaan ho jaayenge – phir agar tum itaat karoge to Allah tumhein accha ajar dega – aur agar tum munh moroge jaise pehle mor chuke ho to woh tumhein dardnaak azaab dega.
48.17: Andha, langda, aur beemar (ladhai mein shirkat na kar sakein) – unpar koi gunah nahi – aur jo Allah aur uske Rasool ki itaat kare – Allah usay un jannaton mein daakhil karega jinke neeche nehrein beh rahi hain – aur jo munh morega use dardnaak azaab dega.
48.18: Beshak Allah un mominon se razi ho gaya – jab woh tumse darakht ke neeche bai’at kar rahe thay – to jo kuch unke dilon mein tha Allah ne jaan liya – to usne unpar sukoon naazil kiya – aur unhein fatah-e-qareeb se nawaza.
48.19: Aur bohot si ganimatein bhi – jine woh leinge – aur Allah zabardast, Hakeem hai.
48.20: Allah ne tumse bohot si ganimatein ka waada kiya hai – jinhein tum log haasil karoge – aur yeh (fatah) tumhein jald hi de di – aur logon ke haathon ko tum se roka – taake yeh imaan laane walon ke liye nishani ban jaaye – aur tumhein seedhe raaste par chalaaye.
48.21: Aur doosri (ganimatein) bhi hain jinke tum qaabil nahi thay – magar Allah ne unko gher liya – aur Allah har cheez par qaadir hai.
48.22: Aur agar woh tumse ladhte to zarur peeth pher ke bhaag jaate – phir unhein koi wali na milta aur na madadgaar.
48.23: Yeh Allah ka dastoor hai jo pehle se chalta aa raha hai – aur tum Allah ke dastoor mein koi tabdili na paoge.
48.24: Aur wahi hai jisne unki kuffar wali shiddat ko roka Makkah ke seene mein – tum log un par gaalib aa gaye thay – aur Allah tumhare har amal ko dekh raha hai.
48.25: Woh hi log hain jinhon ne kufr kiya – aur tumhein Masjid-e-Haram se roka – aur woh qurbani ke jaanwar bhi roke gaye – ke woh apni jagah tak na pahunch sakein – aur agar kuch momin mard aur momin auratein tum mein na hote jinhein tum jaante nahi – ke kahin tum unhein kuch nuksaann na pahunchaa do – to humne yeh roka – taake tum jaahilpan mein kisi qatl ka muqaddam na uthao – agar woh alag hote to hum unmein se jin logon ne kufr kiya unhein dardnaak azaab de daalte.
48.26: Jab kuffar ne apne dilon mein jahiliyat ka ghamand bhar liya – to Allah ne apne Rasool aur mominon par sukoon naazil kiya – aur unhein taqwa ka kalima ata kiya – aur woh uske zyada haqdaar thay aur uske laayak bhi – aur Allah har cheez ko jaane waala hai.
48.27: Beshak Allah ne apne Rasool ka woh sachcha khwab poora kar dikhaya – tum zaroor Masjid-e-Haram mein daakhil hoge – agar Allah ne chaha – amaan se – apne sir moonh mundwaaye hue aur baal chhote karwaaye hue – bina kisi khauf ke – to Allah woh jaanta hai jo tum nahi jaante – to usne iske alawa ek qareeb fatah ata ki.
48.28: Wahi hai jisne apne Rasool ko hidaayat aur deen-e-haq ke saath bheja – taake use tamaam deenon par gaalib kar de – aur Allah kaafi hai gawaah banne ke liye.
48.29: Muhammad Allah ke Rasool hain – aur jo log unke saath hain woh kuffar ke muqaable mein sakht hain – aapas mein bepanah rehamdil – tum unhein rukoo aur sujood mein dekhte ho – Allah ka fazl aur uski raza talash karte hain – unke chehron par sujood ke nishaan hain – yeh unka misaal Taurat mein hai – aur Injeel mein unki misaal aise hai jaise ek beej ho jo apni naazuk kali nikaale – phir use mazboot kare – phir moota ho jaaye – phir apne tanay par sidha khada ho jaaye – kisaanon ko woh pasand aaye – taake Allah unke zariye kuffar ko gussa dilaye – Allah ne un logon se jo imaan laaye aur neik amal kiye magfirat aur azeem ajar ka waada kiya hai.

49.1: Aey logon jo imaan laye ho! Allah aur uske Rasool ke aagey na badho, aur Allah ka taqwa ikhtiyar karo. Beshak Allah sab kuch sunne wala, jaanne wala hai.
49.2: Aey logon jo imaan laye ho! Apni awazon ko Nabi ki awaaz se unchi na karo, aur na us se baat karte hue unchi awaaz mein baat karo jaise tum aapas mein ek doosre se karte ho, kahin aisa na ho ke tumhare a’maal zaya ho jaayein aur tumhein khabar bhi na ho.
49.3: Jo log Rasool ke paas apni awaazon ko dheema rakhte hain, wahi log hain jinke dilon ko Allah ne taqwa ke liye azma liya hai. Unke liye maghfirat aur bada ajar hai.
49.4: Jo log tumhare hujron ke bahar se awaaz lagate hain, unmein se aksar samajh nahi rakhte.
49.5: Agar woh sabr karte yahan tak ke tum unke paas nikal kar aate to unke liye behtar hota. Aur Allah bada bakhshne wala, meharbaan hai.
49.6: Aey logon jo imaan laye ho! Agar koi faasiq tumhare paas koi khabar laaye to uski tehqiqat kar lo, kahin aisa na ho ke tum kisi qaum ko nadani mein nuqsaan pahunchaa baitho, phir apne kiye par pashemaan ho jao.
49.7: Aur jaane raho ke tum mein Allah ka Rasool maujood hai. Agar woh tumhari baat kaheen kaheen maan liya kare to tum mushkil mein pad jao. Lekin Allah ne tumhare liye imaan ko pasandida bana diya, aur usay tumhare dilon mein roshan kar diya, aur kufr, fisq aur nafarmani ko tumhare liye nafrat angez bana diya. Yeh log hi hidayat yafta hain.
49.8: Yeh Allah ka fazl aur uski rehmat hai, aur Allah sab kuch jaanne wala, hikmat wala hai.
49.9: Agar momino ke do giroh aapas mein lad padein to unke darmiyan sulah karao. Phir agar unmein se ek doosre par zyadati kare to jo zyadati kar raha ho us se ladho, yahan tak ke woh Allah ke hukum ki taraf laut aaye. Phir agar laut aaye to unke darmiyan insaaf ke saath sulah karao. Aur insaaf se kaam lo, be shak Allah insaaf karne walon ko pasand karta hai.
49.10: Mominein to aapas mein bhaai hain, to apne do bhaaiyon ke darmiyan sulah karao, aur Allah ka taqwa ikhtiyar karo, taake tum par reham kiya jaye.
49.11: Aey logon jo imaan laye ho! Na mardon ka ek giroh doosre ka mazaaq udaaye, ho sakta hai woh unse behtar hon. Aur na auratein doosri auraton ka mazaaq udaayein, ho sakta hai woh unse behtar hon. Aur na aapas mein taana-zani karo, aur na ek doosre ko bure alqaab do. Imaan laane ke baad faasiq kehna bohot bura hai. Aur jo is se baaz na aaye to wahi zaalim hain.
49.12: Aey logon jo imaan laye ho! Bohot zyada gumaan se bacho, kuch gumaan gunaah hota hai. Tajassus (taftish) na karo, aur tum mein se koi kisi ki gheebat na kare. Kya tum mein se koi pasand karega ke apne murda bhaai ka gosht khaaye? Tum isse ghin karoge. Allah ka taqwa ikhtiyar karo. Beshak Allah tauba qubool karne wala, meharbaan hai.
49.13: Aey logon! Humne tumhein ek mard aur ek aurat se paida kiya, aur tumhein quomon aur qabail mein taqseem kiya taake tum ek doosre ko pehchaano. Allah ke nazdeek tum mein sabse izzat wala woh hai jo sabse zyada muttaqi hai. Beshak Allah sab kuch jaanta hai, bakhabar hai.
49.14: Bedouin (dehati) kehte hain: Hum imaan laye. Kaho: Tum imaan nahi laye, balke yun kaho ke hum muslimaan hue hain, kyunke abhi tak imaan tumhare dilon mein daakhil nahi hua. Aur agar tum Allah aur uske Rasool ki ita’at karoge to woh tumhare a’maal mein koi kami nahi karega. Beshak Allah bada bakhshne wala, meharbaan hai.
49.15: Momin to woh log hain jo Allah aur uske Rasool par imaan layein, phir shak na karein, aur Allah ke raaste mein apne maal aur jaan se jihad karein. Yahi sachche log hain.
49.16: Kaho: Kya tum Allah ko apne deen ka ilm dete ho, jabke Allah zameen aur aasmanon ki har cheez ko jaanta hai, aur Allah har cheez se waaqif hai?
49.17: Woh tumpar ehsaan jatate hain ke unhon ne islam qabool kiya. Kaho: Apne islam ka ehsaan mujh par na jatao. Balki Allah tumpar ehsaan karta hai ke usne tumhein imaan ki hidayat di agar tum sachche ho.
49.18: Beshak Allah aasmanon aur zameen ki ghaib ka ilm rakhta hai. Aur jo kuch tum karte ho Allah use dekhta hai.

50.1: Qaaf. Qasam hai is azeem Qur’an ki.
50.2: Balki unhein hairani hai ke unke paas ek daraane waala unhi mein se aaya – to kafiron ne kaha: Yeh to ek ajeeb baat hai.
50.3: Kya jab hum mar jaayenge aur mitti ban jaayenge? Kya hum phir zinda uthaye jaayenge?
50.4: Hum jaante hain jo kuch zameen unmein se ghaata hai – aur hamare paas ek likhne wali kitaab hai.
50.5: Balke unhon ne sach ko jhutla diya jab woh unke paas aaya – to woh uljhan mein hain.
50.6: Kya unhon ne upar aasman ki taraf nahi dekha? Kaise humne use banaya aur sajaaya – aur usmein koi daraar nahi.
50.7: Aur zameen ko humne bichha diya – aur usmein pahaad daal diye – aur har qisam ke khushnuma pauday usmein ugaye.
50.8: Taake samajhne aur rujoo karne wale ke liye yeh nishani ho.
50.9: Aur humne aasman se barkat wali paani utara – phir us se baagh ugaye – aur katne waale anaaj ke kheton ko.
50.10: Aur unkhil (tall date palms) jinke phalon par guchchhe chhuke hue hote hain.
50.11: Yeh sab kuch bandon ke liye rozi ke tor par – aur humne is paani se murdon ko zinda kiya – isi tarah tum bhi zameen se nikale jaaoge.
50.12: Un se pehle Nooh ki qaum, Ashaab-ur-Rass, aur Samood ne jhutlaaya.
50.13: Aur Aad, Fir’awn, aur Lut ke bhai ne bhi.
50.14: Aur Aikah wale aur Tubba’ ki qaum ne bhi – sabne Rasoolon ko jhutlaaya – to mera wa’ada sach ho gaya.
50.15: Kya hum pehli dafa paida karne se thak gaye? Balke woh naye paida kiye jaane mein shak mein hain.
50.16: Aur beshak humne insaan ko paida kiya – aur jaante hain jo kuch uska dil waswasa daalta hai – aur hum us se uski shah rag se bhi zyada qareeb hain.
50.17: Jab daayein aur baayein baithne wale farishte likh rahe hote hain.
50.18: Woh koi baat muh se nahi nikaalta magar uske paas ek tayyar nigran hota hai.
50.19: Aur maut ki sakhti haq ke saath aa gayi – yeh wahi cheez hai jisse tu bhaagta tha.
50.20: Aur soor mein phoonka jaayega – yeh hai waada ka din.
50.21: Aur har shakhs apne saath ek hankaane waala aur ek gawah ke saath aayega.
50.22: Tu beparwah tha is se – to humne tera parda hata diya – to aaj tera nigaah tez hai.
50.23: Aur uska saathi kahega: Yeh hai jo mere saath tha tayyar.
50.24: Tum dono daakhil karo jahannam mein har sakht na-shukar aur zid karne wale ko.
50.25: Jo bhalaai se roakta tha, hadd se badhta tha, aur shak mein padta tha.
50.26: Jo Allah ke saath doosre ilaah ko banata tha – to tum dono use sakht azaab mein daakhil karo.
50.27: Uska saathi kahega: Aey hamare Rubb! Main ne usay gumraah nahi kiya – lekin woh khud hi door bhatak gaya.
50.28: Allah farmayega: Jhagdo mat mere saamne – main ne pehle hi tumhein dhamki de di thi.
50.29: Mere haan baat badli nahi jaati – aur main apne bandon par zulm nahi karta.
50.30: Jis din hum jahannam se kahenge: Kya tu bhar gayi? Woh kahegi: Kya kuch aur bhi hai?
50.31: Aur jannat muttaqiyon ke qareeb laayi jaayegi – bilkul paas.
50.32: Yeh hai jo tumse waada kiya gaya – har us shakhs ke liye jo Allah ki taraf rujoo karta, aur hifaazat karta.
50.33: Jo Rehman se dar raha tha bina dekhe – aur ek mutma’in dil ke saath aaya.
50.34: Dakhil ho jaao is jannat mein salaam ke saath – yeh rehne ka din hai.
50.35: Unke liye jahan jo kuch chahein milega – aur hamare paas kuch zyada bhi hai.
50.36: Aur humne inse pehle kitni naslon ko halaak kiya – woh inse zyada taaqatwar thay – aur unhone poori duniya mein phira – koi jagah hai bhagne ki?
50.37: Is mein nishani hai us shakhs ke liye jo dil rakhta hai – ya joh tawajju se suntan hai.
50.38: Aur beshak humne aasmanon aur zameen ko – aur jo kuch unke darmiyan hai – chheh din mein paida kiya – aur humein zara bhi thakan mehsoos nahi hui.
50.39: To sabr karo jo woh kehte hain – aur apne Rubb ki tasbeeh karo pehle suraj ke nikalne se – aur uske ghuroob se pehle.
50.40: Aur kuch hisson mein raat ke – uski tasbeeh karo – aur sajdon ke baad bhi.
50.41: Aur suno! Jab pukaarne wala ek qareeb jagah se pukarega.
50.42: Jis din woh sachchi aawaaz sunenge – yeh nikalne ka din hoga.
50.43: Beshak hum hi zinda karte hain aur marte hain – aur humi ko palatna hai.
50.44: Jis din zameen unhein udaal degi – aur woh jald nikal aayenge – yeh ek asaan jamaat hai hamare liye.
50.45: Hum behtar jaante hain jo kuch woh kehte hain – aur tum unpar jabardasti karne wale nahi ho – to is Qur’an ke zariye usay naseehat karo jo mere waayde se dar jaata ho.

51.1: Qasam hai un hawaon ki jo tez chalti hain.
51.2: Phir unki jo bojh uthati hain.
51.3: Aur unki jo aasan chalta hai.
51.4: Phir unki jo hukm ka taqseem karti hain.
51.5: Beshak jo tumse waada kiya gaya hai woh zaroor sach hai.
51.6: Aur beshak faislay ka waqt zaroor aane waala hai.
51.7: Qasam hai aasman ki jo raaston se bhara hua hai.
51.8: Tum log mukhtalif baat mein pade hue ho.
51.9: Us se munh mod diya gaya hai har jhootay modne waale ne.
51.10: Maar ho jhoot bolne waalon ke liye.
51.11: Jo gusse mein bewajah uljhan mein hain.
51.12: Woh poochhte hain: Faislay ka din kab hoga?
51.13: Jis din woh aag par azaab diye jaayenge.
51.14: Chakh lo apna azaab – yeh wahi hai jiske liye tum jaldbaazi karte thay.
51.15: Beshak muttaqiyon ke liye jannatein aur chashme hain.
51.16: Woh le rahe honge jo unka Rubb unhein dega – woh pehle se hi neik kaam karne wale thay.
51.17: Woh raaton ko kam sote thay.
51.18: Aur subah ke auqaat mein woh maghfirat mangte thay.
51.19: Aur unke maal mein ek hissa tha maangne wale aur mehroom ke liye.
51.20: Aur zameen mein nishaniyan hain yaqeen rakhne walon ke liye.
51.21: Aur tumhaare apne nafs mein bhi – kya tum dekhte nahi?
51.22: Aur aasman mein tumhaara rizq hai aur woh bhi jo tumse waada kiya gaya hai.
51.23: To qasam hai aasman aur zameen ke Rubb ki – yeh zaroor haq hai jaisa ke tum baat karte ho.
51.24: Kya tumhare paas Ibraheem ke izzat daar mehmaanon ki khabar aayi?
51.25: Jab woh uske paas aaye to unhon ne salaam kiya – usne jawab diya: Anjaane log.
51.26: Phir woh apne ghar waalon ke paas gaya – aur ek mota gosht wala bachhda (bacha hua bakra) le aaya.
51.27: Aur usay unke saamne rakh diya – kaha: Kya tum nahi khaate?
51.28: Phir usne unse darr mehsoos kiya – unhon ne kaha: Darro nahi.
51.29: Aur unhon ne usay ek samajhdaar larki ka basharat di.
51.30: Phir uski biwi cheekh padi – aur apna chehra peet liya – aur kehne lagi: Main to banjh hoon.
51.31: Unhon ne kaha: Tere Rubb ne aisa hi farmaya hai – beshak wahi hikmat wala, sab kuch jaane wala hai.
51.32: Ibraheem ne kaha: Aey Rasoolon! Tumhara asal maqsad kya hai?
51.33: Unhon ne kaha: Hum ek mujrim qaum ki taraf bheje gaye hain.
51.35: Jo tere Rubb ke haan haddiyon se aage badhne walon ke liye nishaan laga kar rakha gaya hai.
51.36: Phir hum ne wahan ke sab logon ko nikaal diya jo momin thay.
51.37: Aur wahan humne ek ghar ke siwa kisi musalman ko nahi paya.
51.38: Aur us mein ek nishani hai un logon ke liye jo dardnaak azaab se darte hain.
51.39: Aur Musa ke waqaye mein bhi – jab humne usay Fir’awn ke paas bheja.
51.40: To usne apne lashkar ke saath mooh mod liya – to usne kaha: Yeh jaadoogar ya deewana hai.
51.41: Phir humne usay aur uske lashkar ko pakad liya – aur samandar mein daal diya – aur woh malamat ke laayak tha.
51.42: Aur Aad mein bhi nishani hai – jab humne unpar ek andhi toofan waali hawa bheji.
51.43: Jo kisi cheez par guzarti thi use sukkha kar ke chhod deti thi.
51.44: Aur Samood mein bhi – jab unse kaha gaya: Kuch arse tak lutf utha lo.
51.45: Magar unhon ne apne Rubb ke hukm se sar-taabi ki – to unko ek kadak ne pakad liya jab woh dekh rahe thay.
51.46: To na woh uth kar khade ho sakein – aur na hi unhein madad mil saki.
51.47: Aur humne aasman ko apne haathon se banaya – aur hum usko barhate hi ja rahe hain.
51.48: Aur humne zameen ko bichha diya – to kya hi behtareen bichhaane wale hain.
51.49: Aur humne har cheez ke jodey paida kiye – taake tum naseehat le sako.
51.50: To Allah ki taraf bhaago – main tumhare liye uski taraf se ek saaf daraane waala hoon.
51.51: Aur Allah ke saath kisi aur ko ilaah na banao – main tumhare liye uski taraf se ek saaf daraane waala hoon.
51.52: Isi tarah pehle ke logon mein bhi koi Rasool unke paas nahi aaya magar unhon ne kaha: Jaadoogar ya deewana hai.
51.53: Kya unhon ne ise baahmi keh diya? Balke woh sarey sar sar kash log hain.
51.54: To unse mooh mor jao – tum par koi malamat nahi.
51.55: Aur naseehat dete raho – beshak naseehat mominon ko faida deti hai.
51.56: Aur maine jinn aur insaanon ko sirf is liye paida kiya ke woh meri ibaadat karein.
51.57: Main unse rizq nahi chahta aur na chahta hoon ke woh mujhe khilaayein.
51.58: Beshak Allah hi rizq dene waala hai – quwwat wala, mazbooti wala.
51.59: To beshak jin logon ne zulm kiya unke liye bhi wahi hisaab hai jaise unke saathiyon ka tha – to woh mujhe jald karne se na ghabraayein.
51.60: To tabahi hai un logon ke liye jo us din ke azaab ko jhutlaate hain.

52.3: Jo khule parchay mein likhi gayi hai.
52.7: Beshak tumhare Rubb ka azaab zaroor aane waala hai.
52.9: Jis din aasman hilega zor se hila diya jaayega.
52.10: Aur pahaad chalte phirte nazar aayenge.
52.11: Us din halakat ho jhoot bolne walon ke liye.
52.12: Jo baat-cheet mein lagay rehte hain.
52.13: Jis din woh dhakke kha kar dozakh ki aag mein daale jaayenge.
52.14: Yeh wahi aag hai jise tum jhutlaya karte thay.
52.15: Kya yeh jaadu hai ya tum dekh nahi rahe?
52.16: Jal jao us mein – chaho sabr karo ya na karo – barabar hai – tumhein usi ka badla diya jaa raha hai jo tum karte thay.
52.17: Beshak muttaqee log jannaton aur ni'maton mein honge.
52.18: Jo kuch unka Rubb unhein dega, usse woh khush honge – unka Rubb unhein jahannum ke azaab se bacha lega.
52.19: Khao, peeo maze se jo kuch tumne amal kiya uske badle.
52.20: Woh takiye lagaye honge safon mein – aur hum unhein hur-e-ayn se joda karenge.
52.21: Aur jin logon ki aulad ne imaan mein unka tab'a kiya – hum unhein unke saath mila denge – aur unke amal mein hum kuch kami nahin karenge – har shakhs apne kiya ka zimmedar hai.
52.22: Aur hum unhein har tarah ke phal aur gosht denge jo woh chahein.
52.23: Wahan woh ek dusre se jaam le rahe honge – jismein na koi behkaawat hogi aur na koi paap.
52.24: Aur unke paas unke liye naujawaan ladke phirte honge – jaise chhupaaye huye moti.
52.25: Aur woh ek dusre ki taraf rujoo kar ke poochhenge.
52.26: Kehte honge: Pehle hum apne ghar walon mein se darne waale thay.
52.27: To Allah ne hum par ehsaan kiya – aur humein jhultey azaab se bacha liya.
52.28: Hum pehle usi se dua karte thay – beshak woh bepanah meherbaan hai.
52.29: To (aey Rasool) naseehat karte raho – apne Rubb ke fazl se tum na to kaahin ke paagal ho.
52.30: Ya kehte hain: Yeh ek shaayar hai – jise waqt ke haadse ka intezaar hai.
52.31: Kaho: Intezaar karo – main bhi tumhare saath muntazir hoon.
52.32: Kya unki aqlein unhein yeh keh rahi hain ya woh hadd se badhne wale log hain?
52.33: Kya woh kehte hain: Usne isay ghadh liya hai? Balki woh imaan nahi la rahe.
52.34: To agar woh sachche hain to us jaise das surah le aao.
52.35: Kya unhon ne khud apne aap ko paida kiya ya woh khud paida karne wale hain?
52.36: Kya unhon ne aasman aur zameen ko paida kiya? Balke woh yaqeen nahi rakhte.
52.37: Kya unke paas tumhare Rubb ke khazane hain ya woh khud nigehban hain?
52.38: Kya unke paas aasman ki seedhi hai jismein woh sunte hain? To sunne wala unmein koi saaf daleel laaye.
52.39: Kya Allah ke liye betiyan aur tumhare liye betay hain?
52.40: Kya tum unse koi ajar maangte ho ke woh qarz tale dabay hue hain?
52.41: Kya unke paas ghaib ka ilm hai jise woh likhte hain?
52.42: Kya woh koi chaal chalna chahte hain? Magar kaafiron ke liye unki chaal hi hai jo unhein gher legi.
52.43: Kya Allah ke siwa koi ilaah hai? Allah unki shirk se paak hai.
52.44: Agar woh aasman ke kisi tukde ko girta hua dekh lein to kehte hain: Yeh to baadal hai jo jam raha hai.
52.45: To unhein chhod do – jab tak apna din poora na kar lein jismein woh behosh kiya jaayenge.
52.46: Jis din unki chaal unko kuch bhi faida na degi aur na unki madad ki jaayegi.
52.47: Aur jin logon ne zulm kiya unke liye azaab hai iske baad bhi – magar unmein se aksar nahi jaante.
52.48: To apne Rubb ke faislay ka sabr se intezar karo – aur hamesha uski tasbeeh karo jab tum uthte ho.
52.49: Aur raat ke kuch hisso mein uski tasbeeh karo – aur sitaaron ke peechay hatt jaane ke baad bhi.

53.1: Qasam hai taare ki jab woh girta hai.
53.2: Tumhara saathi na bhatka hai aur na bhoola hai.
53.3: Woh apni hawa se kuch nahi kehta.
53.4: Woh to sirf wahi hai jo us par wahee ki jaati hai.
53.5: Use sikhaya hai ek nihayat taaqatwar (farishta).
53.6: Jo sahib-e-quwwat hai, apni asli shakal mein khada hua.
53.8: Phir woh uske qareeb aaya, aur aur qareeb.
53.9: To dono ke darmiyan faasla do kamanon ya usse bhi kam ka reh gaya.
53.10: Phir usne apne banday ko wahi batayi jo batayi.
53.11: Dil ne jhoot nahi bola jo dekha.
53.12: Kya tum usse jhagad rahe ho jo usne dekha?
53.13: Aur usne to use ek aur baar bhi dekha.
53.16: Jab sidrah par chhane waali chhayi.
53.17: Na nigaah bhatki na hadd se aage badi.
53.18: Usne apne Rubb ki sabse badi nishaniyaan dekhi.
53.19: Kya tumne Lat aur Uzza ko dekha?
53.20: Aur teesri Manat, jo teesri hai?
53.21: Kya tumhare liye betay hain aur uske liye betiyan?
53.22: Yeh to ek na-insaafi baat hai.
53.23: Yeh sirf tumhare aur tumhare baapon ke naam hain – Allah ne unke liye koi sanad nahi utaari.
53.24: Kya sirf tumhare pas gumaan (guess) hai, jabki hidayat Rabb ke haan hai?
53.25: Aakhirat aur duniya sab Allah ke haan hai.
53.26: Aasman mein kitne hi farishte hain – unki sifarish kuch bhi kaam nahi aati – jab tak Allah ijaazat na de aur jise chahe raazi na ho.
53.27: Jo log aakhirat par imaan nahi laate woh farishton ke liye aurton ke naam rakhte hain.
53.28: Unke paas iska koi ilm nahi – woh sirf gumaan par chalte hain.
53.29: To jo hamari yaad se mooh modta hai aur duniya ki zindagi se razi ho gaya – usay chhod do.
53.30: Yeh unka ilm ki inteha hai – beshak tumhara Rubb unhein jaanta hai jo raahe se bhatke aur jo hidayat paa gaya.
53.31: Allah hi ke liye hai jo kuch aasmanon aur zameen mein hai – taake buray ka badla de aur neik logon ko neiki ka ajar de.
53.32: Jo bade gunaahon aur besharmi se bachte hain magar chhoti chhoti lagzishon se – beshak tumhara Rubb wasee maghfirat wala hai.
53.33: Kya tumne dekha usay jisne mooh mod liya?
53.35: Kya uske paas ghaib ka ilm hai ke woh likhta hai?
53.36: Kya usne Moosa ke aur Ibraheem ke sahifon mein nahi dekha?
53.37: Jo apna wada poora karne waale thay.
53.38: Ke koi na kisi dusre ka bojh uthaye.
53.39: Aur ke insaan ke liye wahi hai jo usne kiya.
53.40: Aur uska amal zaroor dekha jaayega.
53.41: Phir usko pura badla diya jaayega.
53.42: Aur beshak aakhirat ka faisla tere Rubb hi ka hai.
53.43: Wohi hansata hai aur rulata hai.
53.44: Aur wahi maut deta hai aur zindagi deta hai.
53.45: Wahi paida karta hai joda: mard aur aurat.
53.47: Aur dusri paidaish bhi usi ke zimmedaar hai.
53.48: Wahi be-niyaz banata hai aur mutma’in karta hai.
53.49: Aur wohi Shira ka Rubb hai.
53.50: Wahi Aad ko tabaah karne waala tha.
53.51: Aur Samood ko bhi – aur kisi ko chhoda nahi.
53.52: Aur Nooh ki qaum ko is se pehle – woh to zyada zaalim aur sarkash thay.
53.53: Aur woh ulti bastiyan (qaum-e-Lut) girayi gayi.
53.54: To unhein chhapa diya jis tarah chhapa jaata hai.
53.55: To aey Nabi, naseehat karte raho – tum sirf naseehat dene waale ho.
53.57: Magar jo mooh modta hai aur kufr karta hai.
53.58: To Allah usay sabse bada azaab dega.
53.59: Beshak unka waapsi tere Rubb ki taraf hai.
53.60: Aur beshak wahi unhein sabse zyada jaanta hai.
53.61: Aur tum (uski taraf) haste ho, roote nahi?
53.62: Aur tum sajda bhi nahi karte Allah ke liye?

54.1: Qayamat qareeb aa gayi hai aur chaand phat gaya hai.
54.2: Aur agar koi nishani dekhte hain to mooh mod lete hain aur kehte hain: Ye to sada hua jaadu hai.
54.3: Aur unhon ne jhutlaaya aur apni khwahishon ke peechay chale – aur har kaam apne anjam tak pahunch jaata hai.
54.4: Aur unke paas aise waqiyat aa chuke hain jin mein naseehat hai.
54.5: Yeh aik mukammal hikmat wali baat hai – lekin daraaway kuch faida nahi dete.
54.6: To unse mooh morh lo – jis din pukaarne wala kisi ajeeb cheez ki taraf pukarega.
54.7: Jis din log apni qabron se nikal padenge is tarah ke unki aankhen neechi hogi – jaise woh bikhri hui tiddi hain.
54.8: Pukaarne wale ki taraf daudte hue – kafir kahenge: Ye din to sakht hai.
54.9: Nooh ki qaum ne jhutlaaya – to unke bande (Nooh) ne dua ki: Main maghloob ho gaya hoon to tu meri madad farma.
54.10: To humne aasmaan ke darwaze khol diye mohtaasir baarish ke saath.
54.11: Aur zameen se chashme phoot nikle – phir paani ek hukm ke mutabiq mil gaya.
54.12: Aur humne us par Nooh ko sawaar kiya – jo takhtiyon aur keelon wali kashti thi.
54.13: Woh humari nigraani mein chal rahi thi – ek jaza thi us shakhs ki jisay inkaar kar diya gaya tha.
54.14: Aur beshak humne use nishani banaya – to kya koi naseehat lene wala hai?
54.15: Phir dekh lo kaisa tha mera azaab aur daraawa.
54.16: Aur beshak humne Quran ko asaan banaya naseehat ke liye – to kya koi naseehat lene wala hai?
54.17: Aad ne jhutlaaya – to kaisa tha mera azaab aur daraawa.
54.18: Beshak humne unpar ek toofani hawa bheji – jismein ek manhoos din mein lagataar azaab tha.
54.19: Jo logon ko is tarah gira rahi thi jaise woh khej gaye khajoor ke tanay hon.
54.20: To dekh lo kaisa tha mera azaab aur daraawa.
54.21: Aur beshak humne Quran ko asaan banaya naseehat ke liye – to kya koi naseehat lene wala hai?
54.23: To unhon ne kaha: Kya hum apne mein se ek bande ka kehna maan lein? Tab to hum gumraahi aur deewangi mein pad jaayenge.
54.24: Kya hamare darmiyan wahi paigambar bana diya gaya? Balke woh jhoota aur mutakabbir hai.
54.25: Kal woh jaanein ge kis ke jhootay hone ka anjaam bura hai.
