57.1: Allah ki tasbeeh ki hai har us cheez ne jo aasmaanon aur zameen mein hai – aur wahi sab par ghalib, hikmat wala hai.
57.2: Aasmaanon aur zameen ki badshahi usi ki hai – woh zindagi deta hai aur maut deta hai – aur har cheez par qudrat rakhta hai.
57.3: Wahi Awwal (pehla) hai aur Akhir (aakhri), Zahir (zaahir) hai aur Batin (chhupa hua) – aur woh har cheez ka ilm rakhta hai.
57.4: Wahi hai jisne aasmaanon aur zameen ko chhe din mein paida kiya – phir arsh par istawa farmaaya – jo kuch zameen mein daakhil hota hai, aur jo us mein se nikalta hai, jo aasmaan se utarta hai aur jo us mein chadhta hai – sab usay maaloom hai – aur woh tumhare saath hai jahan kahin bhi tum ho – aur Allah tum jo kuch bhi karte ho dekh raha hai.
57.5: Aasmaanon aur zameen ki baadshahi usi ki hai – aur sab ka faisla usi ki taraf lautaya jaayega.
57.6: Raat ko din mein daakhil karta hai aur din ko raat mein – aur woh dilon ke raaz tak jaanta hai.
57.7: Allah aur uske Rasool par imaan lao – aur us maal mein se kharch karo jise Allah ne tumhein diya hai – to tum mein se jo log imaan laate hain aur kharch karte hain unke liye bada ajr hai.
57.8: Tum Allah par imaan kyun nahi laate – jabke Rasool tumhein bula raha hai ke tum apne Rubb par imaan lao – aur woh tumse misaaq le chuka hai – agar tum momin ho.
57.9: Wahi hai jo apne bande par roshan aayaat nazil karta hai – taake tumhein andheron se roshni ki taraf nikale – aur beshak Allah tum par nihayat shafqat aur meherban hai.
57.10: Tum Allah ki raah mein kharch kyun nahi karte – haalanke aasmaanon aur zameen ki maalikiyat Allah hi ki hai? Tum mein se jo log fatah (nasr) ke baad kharch karte hain aur ladte hain, woh barabar nahi hain un logon ke jo us se pehle kharch kar chuke hain aur lad chuke hain – unka darja unse zyada hai – lekin har ek se Allah ne bhalayi ka waada kiya hai – aur jo kuch tum karte ho Allah use jaanta hai.
57.11: Kaun hai jo Allah ko qarz-e-hasan de – taake Allah use kai guna bada kar ke wapas de – aur uske liye izzat ka ajar ho.
57.12: Jis din tum momin mardon aur momin auraton ko dekhoge ke unka noor unke aage aage daud raha hoga – aur unke daayein taraf hoga – (kaha jaayega:) Aaj tumhein jannatein mubarak hon jin ke nichey nehrein beh rahi hain – jahan tum hamesha raho ge – yeh badi kamiyabi hai.
57.13: Us din munafiq mard aur munafiq auratein mominon se kahenge: Zaraa humein intezaar karo ke hum tumhare noor se roshni lein – jawab milega: Peeche laut jao aur roshni talaash karo – phir unke darmiyan ek deewar khinch di jaayegi – jismein ek darwaza hoga – uske andar rehmat hogi aur uske baahar azaab.
57.14: Woh unse pukar kar kahenge: Kya hum tumhare saath na thay? Woh kahenge: Haan, magar tumne apne aap ko fitne mein daala, intezaar karte rahe, shak mein pad gaye, aur khwahishon ne tumhein dhoka diya – yahaan tak ke Allah ka hukm aa gaya – aur tumse dhoke baaz ne (shaytaan ne) dhoka diya.
57.15: Aaj na tumse fidya liya jaayega aur na un logon se jinhon ne kufr ikhtiyaar kiya – tumhara thikaana jahannum hai – wohi tumhara saathi hai – aur woh bura thikaana hai.
57.16: Kya ab bhi un logon ke liye waqt nahi aaya jo imaan laaye ke unke dil Allah ke zikr ke liye jhuk jaayein – aur us haqq ke liye jo nazil hua hai? Aur woh un logon ki tarah na ho jaayein jinhon ne pehle kitaab di gayi – phir unpar lamba arsa guzar gaya – to unke dil sakht ho gaye – aur un mein se aksar fasiq ban gaye.
57.17: Jaan lo ke Allah zameen ko uski maut ke baad zinda karta hai – humne tumhare liye nishaniyan wazeh kar di hain – taake tum samajh sako.
57.18: Beshak sadaqaat dene wale mard aur auratein – aur jin logon ne Allah ko achha qarz diya – unhein kai guna bada diya jaayega – aur unke liye izzat ka ajr hoga.
57.19: Aur jo log Allah aur uske Rasool par imaan laaye – wohi apne Rubb ke nazdeek siddeeq aur shaheed hain – unke liye unka ajr aur roshni hai – lekin jin logon ne kufr ikhtiyaar kiya aur hamari aayaat ko jhutlaya – woh dozakh ke rehne waale hain.
57.20: Jaan lo ke duniya ki zindagi sirf khel, tamaasha, zeenat, baahmi fakhr aur maal aur aulaad mein izafa ka zariya hai – jaise ek baarish jis se kashtkaar khush ho jaaye – phir woh sukha jaaye to tu dekhe ke woh zard ho gayi – phir woh raakh ban jaaye – aur aakhirat mein sakht azaab hai aur Allah ki maghfirat aur raza hai – aur duniya ki zindagi sirf dhokhe ka saamaan hai.
57.21: Apne Rubb ki maghfirat aur us jannat ki taraf daudo jiska was’a aasmaanon aur zameen ke barabar hai – jo un logon ke liye tayyar ki gayi hai jo Allah aur uske Rasool par imaan laaye – yeh Allah ka fazl hai – jise chahe ata kare – aur Allah azeem fazl wala hai.
57.22: Zameen mein koi museebat nahi aati – aur na tumhaare jismon mein – magar woh ek kitaab mein likhi hui hai is se pehle ke hum use paida karen – yeh Allah ke liye aasaan hai.
57.23: Taa ke tum us cheez par gham na karo jo tumse chhin jaaye – aur us cheez par fakhar na karo jo tumhein di gayi – aur Allah fakhar karne waalon aur ghamand karne waalon ko pasand nahi karta.
57.24: Woh log jo bukhl karte hain – aur logon ko bukhl ka hukum dete hain – aur jo Allah ki ata se mooh moadte hain – to Allah be-niyaz hai, tareef ke laayak hai.
57.25: Humne apne Rasoolon ko roshan daleelon ke saath bheja – aur unke saath kitaab aur meezan (insaaf ka tarazu) nazil ki taake log insaaf qaim karein – aur loha bhi nazil kiya jismein sakht taqat hai aur logon ke liye faida hai – taake Allah dekh le kaun uski aur uske Rasool ki madad karta hai bagair dekhe – beshak Allah taqatwar aur zabardast hai.
57.26: Aur humne Nooh aur Ibrahim ko bheja – aur unki nasl mein nabuwat aur kitaab rakh di – phir unmein se kuch hidayat yafta thay – aur aksar unmein fasiq thay.
57.27: Phir unke peechhe humne unhi ke naqsh-e-qadam par apne Rasool bheje – aur Isa ibne Maryam ko bheja – aur usko Injeel di – aur uske pairwan ke dil mein narmi aur reham daal diya – aur jo rahbaniyat unhon ne ikhtiyar ki – woh unhon ne apni taraf se bana li – humne unpar woh farz nahi kiya tha – magar Allah ki raza haasil karne ke liye unhon ne kiya – phir unhon ne iski poori hifazat nahi ki – to un mein se jo imaan laaye unko humne unka ajr diya – lekin un mein se aksar fasiq hain.
57.28: Aey logon jo imaan laaye ho! Allah se daro – aur uske Rasool par imaan lao – Allah tumhein apne fazl mein se do hisson ka ajr dega – aur tumhare liye roshni paida karega jismein tum chalo ge – aur tumhein bakhsh dega – aur Allah bakhshne wala, meherban hai.
57.29: Taa ke ahli kitaab jaan lein ke woh Allah ke fazl par kisi tarah ka ikhtiyaar nahi rakhte – aur yeh ke fazl to sirf Allah ke haath mein hai – jise chahta hai deta hai – aur Allah bada fazl wala hai.

58.1: Allah ne sun li us aurat ki baat jo apne shohar ke mutaaliq tumse jhagda kar rahi thi aur Allah se shikayat kar rahi thi. Allah tum dono ke darmiyan ki guftagu sun raha tha. Beshak Allah sab kuch sunne wala, dekhne wala hai.
58.2: Tum mein se jo log apni biwiyon se zihar karte hain (maa keh dete hain), woh unki maaen nahin ban jaati. Unki maaen to sirf wohi hain jinhon ne unhein paida kiya. Yeh log zaroor ek ghalat aur jhooti baat keh rahe hain. Aur beshak Allah bada maaf karne wala, darguzar karne wala hai.
58.3: Jo log apni biwiyon se zihar kar baithte hain phir apni baat se rujoo karte hain, to unhein chahiye ke ek ghulam aazaad karein is se pehle ke dono ek dusre ko chhooen. Yeh baat tumhein naseehat ki ja rahi hai. Aur Allah tumhare sab aamaal se bakhabar hai.
58.4: Phir jo is kaam ki taaqat na rakhta ho to do mahine lagataar roze rakkhe is se pehle ke dono ek dusre ko chhooen. Aur jo iski bhi taaqat na rakhta ho to saath miskeenon ko khana khilaye. Yeh is liye hai taake tum Allah par imaan lao aur uske Rasool par. Yeh Allah ki hudood hain. Aur kafiron ke liye dardnaak azaab hai.
58.5: Beshak jo log Allah aur uske Rasool ki mukhalifat karte hain woh aise dabaye jaayenge jaise unse pehle ke log dabaye gaye. Aur humne saaf saaf aayatein naazil ki hain. Aur kafiron ke liye zillat ka azaab hai.
58.6: Jis din Allah un sab ko uthaye ga to woh tumhein bhi unke kiye hue aamaal bata dega. Allah ne unhein gin rakha hai, jabke woh bhool chuke hain. Aur Allah har cheez par gawah hai.
58.7: Kya tumhein maloom nahin ke Allah aasmanon aur zameen ki har cheez ka ilm rakhta hai? Teen aadmiyon ki koi baat aapas mein hoti hai to Allah unmein choutha hota hai, aur paanch hoti hai to woh chhatha hota hai, aur is se kam ya zyada, jahan bhi woh hote hain Allah unke saath hota hai. Phir woh qayamat ke din unhein bata dega jo kuch unhon ne kiya. Beshak Allah har cheez ka ilm rakhta hai.
58.8: Kya tumne dekha un logon ko jo chhup chhup kar baat karte hain? Woh gunaah aur dushmani aur Rasool ki nafarmani ki baat karte hain. Aur jab tumhare paas aate hain to tumhein aise salam karte hain jaisa Allah ne tumhein salam nahi kiya, aur kehte hain: Hum jo keh rahe hain, Allah humein azaab kyun nahi deta? Unke liye jahannum kaafi hai. Woh usmein jhulenge. Aur kya hi bura anjaam hai.
58.9: Aey logon jo imaan laye ho! Jab tum aapas mein chhup kar baat karo to gunaah aur dushmani aur Rasool ki nafarmani ki baat na karo, balke neki aur taqwa ki baat karo. Aur us Allah se daro jiske paas tum sab ikattha kiye jaaoge.
58.10: Yeh chhup kar baat karna shaitaan ki taraf se hai taake woh imaan laane walon ko gham mein daale, jabke woh unhein kuch bhi nuqsaan nahi de sakta siwaye Allah ke hukm ke. Aur momin logon ko Allah par bharosa rakhna chahiye.
58.11: Aey logon jo imaan laye ho! Jab tum se kaha jaye ke majlis mein jagah do to jagah de do, Allah tumhein faraghat dega. Aur jab kaha jaye uth jao to uth jao, Allah un logon ko buland darjaata deta hai jo imaan laye aur jinko ilm diya gaya. Aur Allah ko tumhare sab aamaal ka ilm hai.
58.12: Aey logon jo imaan laye ho! Jab tum Rasool se kisi khas mashwara lena chaho to mashwara se pehle kuch sadqa do. Yeh tumhare liye behtar aur paak karne wala hai. Agar tum sadqa na do to Allah bada bakshne wala, meharbaan hai.
58.13: Kya tum is se ghabra gaye ke mashware se pehle sadqa do? Jabke tumne yeh na kiya aur Allah ne tumhein maaf kar diya to ab namaaz qayam karo, zakat do aur Allah aur uske Rasool ki itaat karo. Aur jo kuch tum karte ho Allah us se bakhabar hai.
58.14: Kya tumne un logon ko dekha jinhon ne aise logon se dosti ki jin par Allah ka ghadab hai? Woh na tum mein se hain na unmein se. Aur jhoot par kasmein khaate hain, halanke woh jaante hain.
58.15: Allah ne unke liye sakht azaab tayar kar rakha hai. Beshak woh bohot bura kaam karte rahe.
58.16: Unhon ne apni kasmon ko dhaal bana liya aur logon ko Allah ke raaste se roka. Unke liye ruswa kun azaab hai.
58.17: Na unka maal unke kisi kaam aayega na unki aulad, Allah ke saamne. Yeh log dozakh wale hain, woh usmein hamesha rahenge.
58.18: Jis din Allah unhein sab uthaye ga, to woh usi tarah uske saamne kasmein khaayenge jaise duniya mein tumhare saamne khaate thay, samajhte hain ke unka kuch ban jaayega. Khabardaar! Woh hi jhoothe hain.
58.19: Un par shaitaan chha gaya to unhein Allah ka zikr bhula diya. Yeh shaitaan ke giroh ke log hain. Aagah ho jao! Shaitaan ka giroh nuksaan uthane wala hai.
58.20: Jo log Allah aur uske Rasool ki mukhalifat karte hain, woh sabse zaleel logon mein honge.
58.21: Allah ne likh diya hai ke main aur mere Rasool hi gaalib rahenge. Beshak Allah zabardast, zabti wala hai.
58.22: Tum aise log na paoge jo Allah aur qayamat ke din par imaan rakhte hon aur un logon se dosti rakhte hon jo Allah aur uske Rasool ke mukhalif hain, chahe woh unke baap, beta, bhai ya khandaan hi kyun na hon. Yeh woh log hain jinke dilon mein Allah ne imaan likh diya hai aur apne rooh se unki taeed ki hai. Aur unhein jannat mein daakhil karega jinke neeche nehrein beh rahi hongi, jahan woh hamesha rahenge. Allah unse razi, woh Allah se razi. Yeh Allah ki jamaat hai. Sun lo! Allah ki jamaat hi falaah paane wali hai.

59.1: Allah ki tasbeeh ki har us cheez ne ki jo aasmaanon aur zameen mein hai, aur wahi zabardast hikmat wala hai.
59.2: Wahi hai jisne ahl-e-kitaab mein se un logon ko jo kufr ikhtiyar kiye hue the, pehle hi jamaa’at ke tor par unke gharon se nikaal diya. Tumne na socha tha ke woh nikal jayenge, aur unhein lagta tha ke unki qilay unhein Allah se bacha lenge. To Allah un par aaya jahan se unhein gumaan bhi na tha, aur unke dilon mein ro’b daal diya. Woh apne haathon se apne gharon ko ujaar rahe thay, aur momineen ke haathon se bhi. To sabak lo, aye aqalmando!
59.3: Aur agar Allah ne un ke liye jila watan na likha hota to unhein duniya mein azaab deta, aur aakhirat mein to unke liye dozakh ka azaab hai hi.
59.4: Yeh is liye ke unhon ne Allah aur uske Rasool ki mukhalifat ki. Aur jo Allah ki mukhalifat karta hai, to beshak Allah sakht azaab dene wala hai.
59.5: Jo khejiyan tumne kaat di ya khadi chhod di, to yeh sab Allah ke izn se tha, aur yeh is liye tha ke woh faasiqon ko ruswa kare.
59.6: Aur jo maal Allah ne unse Rasool ke haath lagwaya, tumne uspe na ghoday daudaye aur na oont. Lekin Allah apne Rasoolon ko jahan chahta hai galba deta hai. Aur Allah har cheez par qadir hai.
59.7: Jo maal Allah ne apne Rasool ke liye basiyon se hasil karwaya, woh Allah, Rasool, uske qaraabatdaron, yateemon, mohtaajon, aur musafiron ke liye hai – taake woh maal tumhare ameeron mein hi ghoomta na rahe. Jo kuch Rasool tumhein de de lo aur jis se rok de, ruk jao. Aur Allah se daro. Beshak Allah sakht saza dene wala hai.
59.8: Woh maal un mohtaaj muhajireen ke liye bhi hai, jo apne gharon aur maal se nikaal diye gaye, Allah ka fazl aur uski raza talab karte hain, aur Allah aur uske Rasool ki madad karte hain – wahi sachche log hain.
59.9: Aur jo log un se pehle se Madinah mein base hue aur imaan mein sabqat le gaye, woh un logon se muhabbat karte hain jo hijrat kar ke unke paas aaye, aur unke dilon mein koi khata nahi paate us cheez par jo muhajireen ko di gayi. Balki unhein apne upar tarjeeh dete hain agarche khud mohtaaj hon. Aur jo bukhl se bacha liya gaya, wahi falaah paane waale hain.
59.10: Aur jo unke baad aaye kehte hain: Aey hamare Rubb! Humein aur hamare un bhaiyon ko bakhsh de jo imaan mein hum se pehle sabqat le gaye – aur hamare dilon mein imaan walon ke liye bughz na rakh – aey hamare Rubb! Tu nihayat shafqat wala, meherban hai.
59.11: Kya tumne un munafiqon ko nahi dekha jo apne ahl-e-kitaab bhaiyon se kehte hain: Agar tum nikale to hum bhi tumhare saath nikalenge, aur tumhari kisi baat mein kabhi farmabardari na karenge, aur agar tumse lada gaya to hum tumhari madad karenge. Lekin Allah gawah hai ke woh jhoot bolte hain.
59.12: Agar woh nikale to yeh unke saath na niklenge, aur agar unse ladai ki gayi to madad na denge, aur agar madad denge bhi to peeth dikhakar bhaag jaayenge – phir unhein madad na milegi.
59.13: Tumhare dil mein Allah se zyada unka ro’b hai, yeh is liye ke woh samajhne wali qaum nahi hain.
59.14: Woh tumse milkar ladai nahi karte, siwaaye qilo’n mein ya deewar ke peeche se – unka aapas mein ta’alluq mazboot hai – tu unhein ek samjhta hai, magar unke dil paraagandah hain – yeh is liye ke woh aqal nahi rakhte.
59.15: Woh un logon ki misaal hain jo unse thodi der pehle guzre – unka haal yeh hua ke apne amal ka maza chakh liya – aur unke liye dardnaak azaab hai.
59.16: Unka misaal shaitaan ki tarah hai, jisne insaan se kaha: Kufr kar – to jab usne kufr kiya to kaha: Main tujh se bari hoon – main to Allah Rabb-ul-aalameen se darta hoon.
59.17: Aakhirat mein dono ka anjaam yeh hoga ke woh dozakh mein honge – aur yeh zalimon ki kya hi bura thikaana hai.
59.18: Aey imaan walon! Allah se daro – aur har shakhs yeh dekhe ke kal ke liye kya bheja hai – aur Allah se daro – beshak Allah tumhare aamaal se bakhabar hai.
59.19: Aur un logon ki tarah na ho jao jinhon ne Allah ko bhula diya – to Allah ne unhein khud unka nafs bhula diya – yeh hi log faasiq hain.
59.20: Jahannum wale aur jannat wale kabhi barabar nahi ho sakte – jannat wale hi kaamyab hain.
59.21: Agar hum yeh Qur’an kisi pahad par utaarte to tu dekhta ke woh khauf se phata ja raha hota aur toot kar gir padta – yeh misaalein hum logon ke liye dete hain taake woh soch samajh saken.
59.22: Wahi Allah hai jiske siwa koi maabood nahi – chhupa hua aur zaahir – har cheez ka jaan-ne wala.
59.23: Wahi hai Rehman, Raheem, Badshah, Quddoos, Salaam, Momin, Muhaimin, Azeez, Jabbaar, Mutakabbir – Allah paak hai un cheezon se jo woh uske saath shareek karte hain.
59.24: Wahi hai Khaaliq, Baari, Musawwir – usi ke liye hain ache ache naam – usi ki tasbeeh karta hai jo kuch aasmaanon aur zameen mein hai – aur wahi zabardast, hikmat wala hai.

60.1: Aey logon jo imaan laye ho! Mere aur apne dushmanon ko apna dost na banao. Tum un se dosti ka paighaam bhejte ho, halanke unhon ne haqq ka inkaar kiya jo tumhare paas aaya hai. Woh Rasool ko aur tumhein is liye nikaal dete hain ke tum apne Rubb, Allah par imaan laye ho. Agar tum mere raaste mein jihad aur meri raza ki talaash mein nikle ho to (yeh dosti na karo). Tum unse chup chup kar dosti karte ho, jabke main jaanta hoon jo kuch tum chupate ho aur jo kuch tum zaahir karte ho. Aur jo tum mein se aisa kare to woh be-raah ho gaya seedhe raaste se.
60.2: Agar woh tum par haavi ho jaayein to tumhare dushman ban jaayenge, aur tumhare haathon aur zubanon se takleef dene lagenge, aur chaahenge ke tum bhi kufr mein palat jao.
60.3: Tumhare qaraabatdaar aur tumhari aulad tumhare kuch bhi kaam nahi aayegi. Qayamat ke din Allah tumhare darmiyan faisla karega. Aur Allah jo kuch tum karte ho usse dekhta hai.
60.4: Tumhare liye Ibraheem aur unke saathiyon mein ek accha namoona hai jab unhon ne apni qaum se kaha: Hum tumse aur un se jinhein tum Allah ke siwa poojte ho, beraat ka izhar karte hain. Hum tum se kufr karte hain. Aur hamare darmiyan dushmani aur dushmani ka izhaar hamesha ke liye hai jab tak ke tum sirf Allah par imaan na lao. Siwaye Ibraheem ke kehne ke apne baap ke liye: Main zaroor tumhare liye maghfirat maangunga, aur main Allah se tumhare liye kuch nahi rakh sakta. Aey hamare Rubb! Humne tere upar bharosa kiya, aur teri taraf hi rujoo kiya, aur teri taraf hi palatna hai.
60.5: Aey hamare Rubb! Humein kafiron ke liye fitna na bana, aur humein maaf kar. Beshak tu hi zabardast, hikmat wala hai.
60.6: Tumhare liye unmein ek behtareen namoona hai, har us shakhs ke liye jo Allah aur aakhirat ke din ki talaash mein ho. Aur jo koi mooh moad le to samajh lo ke Allah be-niyaz hai, tareef ke laayak hai.
60.7: Qad ho sakta hai ke Allah tumhare aur unke darmiyan dosti paida kar de jin se ab tum dushmani rakhte ho. Aur Allah sab kuch karne par qaadir hai. Aur Allah bada bakhshne wala, meharbaan hai.
60.8: Allah tumhein un logon se dosti karne se nahi rokta jo tumse deen ke maamle mein ladayi nahi karte, aur na hi tumhein tumhare gharon se nikaalte hain. Tum unse accha sulook karo aur insaaf se pesh aao. Beshak Allah insaaf karne walon ko pasand karta hai.
60.9: Allah tumhein sirf un logon se dosti karne se roakta hai jo tumse deen ke maamle mein ladayi karte hain, aur tumhein tumhare gharon se nikaalte hain, aur tumhare nikaal mein doosron ki madad karte hain. Jo log unse dosti karte hain woh hi zaalim hain.
60.10: Aey logon jo imaan laye ho! Jab tumhare paas momin auratein hijrat karke aayein to unhein aazmao. Allah unke imaan ko khoob jaanta hai. Phir agar tumhein maloom ho jaaye ke woh momin hain to unhein kafiron ke paas wapas na bhejo. Na woh (kafir) unke liye halal hain aur na woh unke (kafiron) ke liye halal hain. Unhon ne jo kuch kharch kiya ho use unhein wapas de do. Aur unhein nikaah mein lao jab tum unhein unka mahr de do. Aur kafir auratein apne nikah mein na rakho. Unka kharch jo tumne kiya ho, tum uska mutalba karo, aur woh bhi apne kharch ka mutalba karein. Yeh Allah ka hukum hai. Woh tumhare darmiyan faisla karta hai. Aur Allah sab kuch jaanne wala, hikmat wala hai.
60.11: Aur agar tumhari biwiyan tumse chhoot kar kafiron ke paas chali jaayein, phir tum kisi jang mein un (kafiron) par ghalib aa jaao, to un logon ko jinki biwiyan chali gayi thi utna maal de do jitna unhon ne kharch kiya tha. Aur Allah se daro jise tum maante ho.
60.12: Aey Nabi! Jab momin auratein tumse bay’at karne aayein ke woh Allah ke saath kisi ko shareek na karengi, chori na karengi, zina na karengi, apne bachon ko qatal na karengi, kisi ke upar jhoot ka ilzaam apne haathon aur paon ke darmiyan laa kar na lagaayengi, aur kisi maamle mein tumhari nafarmani na karengi to unse bay’at le lo. Aur unke liye Allah se maghfirat maango. Beshak Allah bada bakhshne wala, meharbaan hai.
60.13: Aey logon jo imaan laye ho! Apne us doston ko dost na banao jinke khilaaf Allah ghadabnaak hai. Woh aakhirat se naumeed hain jaise ke kafir qabron walon se naumeed hain.

61.1: Allah ki tasbeeh ki hai har us cheez ne jo aasmanon aur zameen mein hai, aur wahi zabardast, hakeem hai.
61.2: Aey logon jo imaan laye ho! Tum kyun woh baat kehte ho jo tum karte nahi?
61.3: Bohat bura hai Allah ke nazdeek ke tum woh baat kaho jo tum karte nahi.
61.4: Beshak Allah un logon ko pasand karta hai jo uski raah mein is tarah saf bandh kar ladte hain jaise ke woh ek mazboot deewar ho.
61.5: Aur yaad karo jab Moosa ne apni qaum se kaha: Aey meri qaum! Tum mujhe kyun takleef dete ho, halanke tum jaante ho ke main Allah ka Rasool hoon jo tumhari taraf bheja gaya hoon. Phir jab unhon ne tedhaapan kiya to Allah ne unke dil tedhe kar diye. Aur Allah faasiq logon ko hidaayat nahi deta.
61.6: Aur yaad karo jab Isa ibn-e-Maryam ne kaha: Aey Bani-Israel! Main Allah ka Rasool hoon jo tumhari taraf bheja gaya hoon, main tasdeeq karta hoon Taurat ki jo mujh se pehle aayi, aur ek Rasool ki bashaarat deta hoon jo mere baad aayega jiska naam Ahmed hoga. Phir jab woh unke paas khuli nishaniyon ke saath aaya to unhon ne kaha: Yeh to khula jaadu hai.
61.7: Aur us shakhs se zyada zaalim kaun ho sakta hai jo Allah par jhoot bandhe jabke usay Islam ki dawat di ja rahi ho? Allah aise zaalim logon ko hidaayat nahi deta.
61.8: Woh chahte hain ke Allah ke noor ko apne mooh se bujha dein, lekin Allah apne noor ko mukammal kar ke rahega, khwa kaafiron ko bura hi kyun na lage.
61.9: Wahi hai jisne apne Rasool ko hidayat aur deen-e-haqq ke saath bheja taake use tamaam deenon par gaalib kare, khwa mushrikon ko bura hi kyun na lage.
61.10: Aey logon jo imaan laye ho! Kya main tumhein ek aise saudeh ki taraf na bulaoon jo tumhein dardnaak azaab se bacha le?
61.11: Tum Allah aur uske Rasool par imaan lao, aur Allah ki raah mein apne maal aur jaan se jihad karo. Yeh tumhare liye behtareen hai agar tum samajh sako.
61.12: Woh tumhare gunaahon ko baksh dega, aur tumhein un jannaton mein daakhil karega jinke neechey nehrein beh rahi hongi, aur paakeeza makaan dega jannat-e-‘Adan mein. Yeh bohot badi kaamiyabi hai.
61.13: Aur doosri cheez jo tum pasand karte ho: Allah ki taraf se madad aur qareeb fatah. Aur (Aey Nabi!) momino ko khushkhabri de do.
61.14: Aey logon jo imaan laye ho! Allah ke madadgaar bano, jaise Isa ibn-e-Maryam ne apne hawariyon se kaha: Kaun hai mera madadgaar Allah ki taraf? Hawariyon ne kaha: Hum Allah ke madadgaar hain. Phir Bani-Israel mein ek giroh imaan laya aur doosre ne kufr kiya. To humne imaan laane walon ko unke dushmano par gaalib kar diya, to woh un par gaalib ho gaye.

62.1: Allah ki tasbeeh ki har us cheez ne ki jo aasmanon aur zameen mein hai. Woh baadshah hai, paak hai, zabardast hai, hakeem hai.
62.2: Wahi hai jisne ummiyon mein ek Rasool bheja jo unko uske aayaat sunata hai, unka tazkiya karta hai, aur unhein kitaab aur hikmat sikhaata hai, halanke woh log is se pehle khuli gumraahi mein the.
62.3: Aur unhi mein se doosron ke liye bhi (yeh Rasool bheja gaya hai) jo abhi un se nahi miley. Aur woh zabardast, hakeem hai.
62.4: Yeh Allah ka fazl hai, jise chahta hai deta hai. Aur Allah bada fazl wala hai.
62.5: Un logon ki misaal jinhon ne Taurat ka burden uthaaya phir us par amal na kiya, us gadhe ki misaal ki tarah hai jo kitaaben uthaaye hue ho. Kitni buri misaal hai un logon ki jinhon ne Allah ki aayaat ko jhutlaya. Aur Allah zalimon ko hidaayat nahi deta.
62.6: Kaho: Aey logon jo yahoodi ban gaye ho! Agar tum yeh samajhte ho ke Allah ke nazdeek sirf tumhi uske dost ho, aur dusre log nahi, to phir maut ki tamanna karo agar tum apne da’we mein sachche ho.
62.7: Lekin yeh uski kabhi tamanna na karenge us wajah se jo unke haathon ne aage bhej rakha hai. Aur Allah zalimon ko khoob jaanta hai.
62.8: Kaho: Woh maut jisse tum bhaagte ho, woh tumse zaroor milegi, phir tum us zaat ki taraf lautaye jaoge jo ghaib aur haazir ka ilm rakhta hai. Phir woh tumhein bata dega jo kuch tum kiya karte thay.
62.9: Aey logon jo imaan laye ho! Jab jumay ke din namaaz ke liye azaan di jaaye to Allah ke zikr ki taraf daud padho aur khareed-o-farokht chhod do. Yeh tumhare liye behtareen hai agar tum samajh jao.
62.10: Phir jab namaaz poori ho jaaye to zameen mein phail jaao, aur Allah ka fazl talaash karo, aur Allah ko zyada yaad karo, taake tum falaah paao.
62.11: Aur jab unhon ne ek tijarat ya tamasha dekha to uski taraf daud gaye aur tumhein khara chhod diya. Kaho: Jo kuch Allah ke paas hai woh tamashe aur tijarat se behtar hai. Aur Allah behtareen raziq hai.

63.1: Jab munafiq tumhare paas aate hain to kehte hain: Hum gawahi dete hain ke aap Allah ke Rasool hain. Allah jaanta hai ke aap uske Rasool hain, lekin Allah gawahi deta hai ke munafiq jhootay hain.
63.2: Unhon ne apni kasmon ko dhaal bana liya, phir Allah ke raaste se roka. Beshak woh kaam bohot hi bura karte hain.
63.3: Yeh is liye ke unhon ne imaan laane ke baad kufr ikhtiyar kiya, to unke dilon par mohar lag gayi. Ab woh samajhte hi nahin.
63.4: Aur jab tum unhein dekhte ho to unke jism tumhein achhe lagte hain, aur agar woh baat karein to tum unki baat sunte ho. Goya ke woh deewar ke sahare rakhe hue lakdi ke tukde hain. Har cheekh-pukaar ko apne khilaaf samajhte hain. Yeh dushman hain, in se bach kar raho. Allah unhein maar daale, kahan phiraye ja rahe hain!
63.5: Aur jab unse kaha jata hai: Aao, Allah ke Rasool tumhare liye maafi maangein, to woh apna sar ghumate hain aur tum dekhte ho ke woh ghamand mein munh mod lete hain.
63.6: Tum unke liye maafi maango ya na maango, unke liye barabar hai. Allah unhein kabhi maaf nahi karega. Beshak Allah fasiq logon ko hidaayat nahi deta.
63.7: Woh kehte hain: Allah ke Rasool ke paas jo log hain un par kuch kharch na karo, taake woh chhoot jaayein. Halanke Allah ke liye aasmaanon aur zameen ke khazaane hain. Lekin munafiq samajhte nahi.
63.8: Woh kehte hain: Agar hum Madinah laut kar gaye to zarur izzat wala wahan se zaleel ko nikaal dega. Halanke izzat to sirf Allah aur uske Rasool aur momineen ke liye hai, lekin munafiq jaante nahi.
63.9: Aey logon jo imaan laye ho! Tumhare maal aur tumhari aulad tumhein Allah ke zikr se gafil na kar dein. Aur jo aisa karein to woh nuksaan uthane wale hain.
63.10: Aur jo kuch humne tumhein diya hai usmein se kharch karo, is se pehle ke maut tum par aa jaaye, phir tum kehne lago: Aey mere Rubb! Thodi si mohlaat de de, taake main sadaqa karoon aur nek logon mein se ho jaaun.
63.11: Lekin jab kisi ki maut ka waqt aa jata hai to Allah usse harگز mohalat nahi deta. Aur Allah tumhare sab aamaal se baakhabar hai.

64.1: Jo kuch aasmanon aur zameen mein hai Allah ki tasbeeh karta hai. Usi ke liye baadshahi hai, aur usi ke liye hamd hai. Aur woh har cheez par qadir hai.
64.2: Wahi hai jisne tumhein paida kiya, phir tum mein se koi kafir hai aur koi momin. Aur Allah jo kuch tum karte ho use dekh raha hai.
64.3: Usne aasmanon aur zameen ko barhaqq paida kiya, aur tumhein soorat di, aur behtareen soorat di. Aur usi ki taraf sab ko lautna hai.
64.4: Woh jaanta hai jo kuch aasmanon aur zameen mein hai, aur jaanta hai jo kuch tum chhupate ho aur jo kuch tum zaahir karte ho. Aur Allah dilon ke raaz jaanta hai.
64.5: Kya tumhein un logon ki khabar nahi mili jo tumse pehle kufr kar chuke hain? To unhone apne aamal ka wabal chakh liya, aur unke liye dardnaak azaab hai.
64.6: Yeh is liye ke unke paas unke Rasool saaf daleelon ke saath aaye, phir unhone kaha: Kya ek bashar humein hidayat dega? To unhon ne inkaar kiya aur munh modh liya. Aur Allah beparwah hai, aur woh be nihayat qabil-e-hamd hai.
64.7: Woh log jinhon ne kufr ikhtiyar kiya, unhein yeh gumaan hai ke woh dobara uthaye nahi jaayenge. Kaho: Kyun nahi, mere Rubb ki qasam! Tum zarur uthaye jaaoge, phir jo kuch tumne kiya hai, zarur uski tumhein khabar di jaayegi. Aur yeh Allah ke liye asaan hai.
64.8: To imaan lao Allah par, aur uske Rasool par, aur us roshni par jo humne naazil ki hai. Aur Allah ko jo kuch tum karte ho uska ilm hai.
64.9: Jis din woh tum sab ko ikattha karega jamaa hone ke din ke liye, wahi hoga Taghabun ka din (loss and gain ka din). Aur jo Allah par imaan laye aur neik amal kare, to woh uske gunaahon ko door kar dega aur usko jannaton mein daakhil karega jinke neeche nehrein beh rahi hongi, jahan woh hamesha rahenge. Yeh badi kamiyabi hai.
64.10: Aur jinhon ne kufr kiya aur hamari aayaton ko jhutlaya, woh dozakh walay hain, jahan woh hamesha rahenge. Aur woh kya hi bura thikaana hai.
64.11: Koi museebat nahi aati magar Allah ke izn se. Aur jo Allah par imaan laata hai, Allah uske dil ko hidayat deta hai. Aur Allah har cheez ka ilm rakhta hai.
64.12: Aur Allah ki itaat karo aur Rasool ki bhi. Phir agar tum mooh modh lo to hamare Rasool par sirf wazeh paighaam pahunchana hai.
64.13: Allah ke siwa koi maabood nahi. To momino ko Allah hi par bharosa karna chahiye.
64.14: Aey logon jo imaan laye ho! Tumhare biwiyon aur tumhare bachon mein se kuch tumhare dushman hain, to unse hoshiyar raho. Aur agar tum maaf kar do, darguzar karo aur bakhsh do, to Allah bhi bada bakhshne wala, meherbaan hai.
64.15: Tumhare maal aur tumhare bachay tumhare liye fitna hain. Aur Allah ke paas bada ajar hai.
64.16: To Allah se daro jitna ho sake, aur suno, aur itaat karo, aur kharch karo — yeh tumhare liye behtar hai. Jo apne dil ke bukhilpan se bacha liya gaya, woh hi kamiyab hai.
64.17: Agar tum Allah ko achi tarah qarz do, to woh usay tumhare liye dugna kar dega, aur tumhein maaf kar dega. Aur Allah bada qadardaan, burdbaar hai.
64.18: Ghaib ka jaane wala aur zaahir ka bhi — woh zabardast, hikmat wala hai.

65.1: Aey Nabi! Jab tum aurat ko talaaq do to unhein unke iddat ke liye talaaq do, aur iddat ka shumar karo. Aur Allah se daro, jo tumhara Rubb hai. Tum unhein unke gharon se na nikalo, aur na hi woh khud niklein, jab tak ke woh kisi khuli fahashi mein mubtala na ho. Yeh Allah ki hadain hain. Aur jo Allah ki hadon ko todta hai to usne apne aap par zulm kiya. Tum nahi jaante, shayad Allah uske baad koi naya haal paida kar de.
65.2: Phir jab woh apni iddat ke qareeb pahunch jaayein to ya to unhein bhale tareeqe se roke raho, ya bhale tareeqe se alag kar do. Aur apne mein se do insaaf walon ko gawah bana lo. Aur tum gawahi ko Allah ke liye qayam karo. Yeh naseehat hai uske liye jo Allah aur aakhirat ke din par imaan rakhta ho. Jo Allah se daray, Allah uske liye nikalne ka raasta nikal deta hai.
65.3: Aur usay wahan se rozi deta hai jahan uska gumaan bhi na ho. Aur jo Allah par bharosa kare, to woh us ke liye kaafi hai. Beshak Allah apna kaam poora karke rehta hai. Allah ne har cheez ke liye ek miqdar muqarrar ki hai.
65.4: Aur un aurat mein se jo mahwari se naumeed ho chuki hoon, agar tumhein shak ho, to unki iddat teen mahine hai, aur unki bhi jo mahwari se guzri nahi. Aur hamla daaron ki iddat unka bachcha paida hona hai. Jo Allah se daray, Allah us ke liye uska maamla asaan kar deta hai.
65.5: Yeh Allah ka hukm hai jo usne tumhari taraf naazil kiya hai. Aur jo Allah se daray, Allah uske gunaahon ko maaf kar deta hai aur uske ajar ko bada kar deta hai.
65.6: Unhein wahan rakho jahan tum rehte ho, jaisa ke tumhare bas mein hai. Aur unhein tang na karo taake un par zindagi tang kar do. Agar woh hamla daar ho to unhein unka kharch do jab tak ke unka bachcha paida ho. Phir agar woh tumhare liye doodh pilayein to unhein uska ujrat do. Aur aapas mein bhale tareeqe se mashwara karo. Agar tum mushkil mein ho to usay doosri aurat doodh pilaye.
65.7: Maaldaar ko chahiye ke apni haisiyat ke mutabiq kharch kare. Aur jiske paas thoda ho woh us mein se kharch kare jo Allah ne use diya hai. Allah kisi ko uske bas se zyada takleef nahi deta. Allah mushkil ke baad asaani paida karta hai.
65.8: Aur kitni hi bastiyan aisi guzri hain jinhon ne apne Rubb aur uske Rasoolon ke hukm se sar taazi nahi ki. To humne unhein sakht hisaab mein liya aur unhein sakht azaab diya.
65.9: To unhon ne apne kiye ka wabal chakh liya, aur unka anjaam khasare ka tha.
65.10: Allah ne unke liye sakht azaab tayar kar rakha hai. Pas Allah se daro, aey aqal walon! Jo imaan laye ho. Beshak Allah ne tumhari taraf ek zikr naazil kiya hai.
65.11: (Yaani) ek Rasool jo tumhein Allah ke saaf saaf ayaton ko sunata hai, taake woh un logon ko jo imaan laye aur neik amal kiye andheron se nikal kar roshni mein le aaye. Jo Allah par imaan laye aur neik amal kare, Allah usko aise jannaton mein daakhil karega jinke neeche nehrein beh rahi hongi. Jahan woh hamesha rahenge. Allah ne uske liye behtareen rozi tayar ki hai.
65.12: Allah hi hai jisne saat aasman paida kiye aur zameen se bhi un jaise. Uska hukm inke darmiyan utaarta rehta hai, taake tum jaano ke Allah har cheez par qadir hai, aur Allah ne har cheez ko ilm ke saath gher rakha hai.

66.1: Aey Nabi! Tum kyun wo cheez haram karte ho jo Allah ne tumhare liye halal ki hai? (Kya) apni biwiyon ki khushi chahte ho? Aur Allah bada bakhshne wala, meharban hai.
66.2: Allah ne tumhare liye apni qasmon ka kaffara dena farz kar diya hai. Aur Allah tumhara wali hai, aur woh sab kuch jaane wala, hakeem hai.
66.3: Aur jab Nabi ne apni ek biwi se ek baat chhup kar kahi, phir jab usne (wo baat) bayaan kar di aur Allah ne Nabi ko uska izhar kar diya, to Nabi ne kuch usme se bayaan kiya aur kuch nazarandaz kiya. Phir jab Nabi ne usko (us izhaar ki baat) batayi to usne kaha: Kisne tumhein yeh bataya? Nabi ne kaha: Mujhe usne bataya jo sab kuch jaanta hai, har baat se khabar rakhta hai.
66.4: Agar tum dono Allah ke saamne tauba kar lo to behtari hai, kyunki tumhare dil seedhe nahi rahe. Aur agar tum Nabi ke khilaf ek ho jao to (kuch baat nahi) Allah uska wali hai, aur Jibraeel, aur neik momin, aur iske baad farishte bhi uske madadgaar hain.
66.5: Agar Nabi tumhein talaq de de to uska Rubb use tumse behtar biwiyan ata karega — Muslim, momin, itaat guzaar, tauba karne wali, ibadat guzaar, rozay rakhne wali — pehle se shadi shuda bhi aur kuwari bhi.
66.6: Aey logon jo imaan laye ho! Apne aap ko aur apne ghar walon ko aag se bachaao jis ka indhan log aur pathar hain. Jis par sakht mizaj aur taqatwar farishte muqarrar hain, jo kabhi Allah ke hukum ki nafarmaani nahi karte, aur wahi karte hain jo unhein hukm diya gaya.
66.7: Aey logon jo kufr kar chuke ho! Aaj kisi uzr ka sahara na lo. Tumhein sirf usi ka badla diya jaa raha hai jo tum karte thay.
66.8: Aey logon jo imaan laye ho! Allah ke saamne khuli tauba karo. Ummed hai ke tumhara Rubb tumhari buraiyan tum se door kar dega, aur tumhein jannaton mein daakhil karega jinke neeche nehrein beh rahi hongi. Us din Allah Nabi ko aur un logon ko jo uske saath imaan laye izzat ata karega. Unka noor unke aage aur unke daayein taraf daud raha hoga. Keh rahe honge: Aey hamare Rubb! Hamare noor ko poora kar de, aur humein bakhsh de. Tu har cheez par qudrat rakhne wala hai.
66.9: Aey Nabi! Kafiron aur munafiqon se jihad karo aur un par sakhti ikhtiyar karo. Unka thikaana jahannum hai. Aur woh kya hi bura anjaam hai.
66.10: Allah ne kafiron ke liye Nooh ki biwi aur Lut ki biwi ki misaal di. Woh dono hamare neik bandon ke nikaah mein thein, phir un dono ne unse khayanat ki. To woh dono Allah ke aazab se unke kisi kaam na aaye. Aur un se kaha gaya: Dono aag mein dakhil ho jao dusron ke saath.
66.11: Aur Allah ne momineen ke liye Fir’oun ki biwi ki misaal di. Jab usne kaha: Aey mere Rubb! Mere liye apne paas jannat mein ek ghar bana de, aur mujhe Fir’oun se aur uske amal se bacha le, aur mujhe zalimon ki qaum se nijaat de.
66.12: Aur Maryam bint-e-Imran ki misaal, jisne apni sharamgaah ki hifazat ki, phir humne usmein apni rooh phoonki, aur usne apne Rubb ke kalimaat aur uski kitaabein tasdeeq ki, aur woh itaat guzaar logon mein se thi.

67.1: Barkat wala hai woh jiske haath mein badshahi hai, aur woh har cheez par qadir hai.
67.2: Jisne maut aur zindagi ko paida kiya taake tumhein aazmaye ke tum mein se kaun behtareen amal karta hai. Aur woh zabardast, bakhshne wala hai.
67.3: Jisne saat aasman teh-ba-teh banaye. Tum Rahman ki takhleeq mein koi be-rabti na paoge. To dobara nigah daal, kya tumhein koi daraar nazar aati hai?
67.4: Phir do baar nigah daal, tumhari nigah thak kar neeche laut aayegi, aur woh majboor aur bekaar ho jaayegi.
67.5: Aur humne qareebi aasman ko sitaaron se saja diya, aur unhein shayateen ke liye pathar banaya. Aur unke liye humne aag ka azaab tayar kar rakha hai.
67.6: Aur jin logon ne apne Rubb ka inkaar kiya, unke liye jahannum ka azaab hai. Aur woh kya hi bura thikaana hai.
67.7: Jab woh usmein daale jaayenge, to uska jhoonkna sunenge, aur woh josh mein honge.
67.8: Gooya woh gusse se phata ja raha ho. Jab kabhi koi giroh us mein daala jaayega, uske darogha un se poochhenge: Kya tumhare paas koi dar sunane wala nahi aaya?
67.9: Woh kahenge: Kyun nahi, humare paas dar sunane wala aaya tha, magar humne jhutlaya, aur kaha: Allah ne kuch nahi naazil kiya, tum to bas badi gumraahi mein ho.
67.10: Aur woh kahenge: Kaash hum sunte ya samajhte to aaj hum dozakhiyon mein na hote.
67.11: To woh apne gunaahon ka iqraar kar lenge. Pas dur ho jaye dozakh ke log!
67.12: Beshak jo log apne Rubb se bin dekhe darte hain, unke liye bakhshish hai aur bada ajar hai.
67.13: Aur apni baat chhupao ya zaahir karo, beshak woh dilon ke raaz tak jaanta hai.
67.14: Kya woh na jaanega jisne paida kiya, jabki woh lateef, baakhabar hai.
67.15: Wahi hai jisne tumhare liye zameen ko mutii banaya. To ismein chalo phiro aur uski rozi mein se khao. Aur usi ki taraf tumhein uthaya jaayega.
67.16: Kya tum is se be-khauf ho gaye ho ke woh jo aasman mein hai tumhein zameen mein na dhansa de, aur woh achanak hilne lage?
67.17: Ya kya tum is se be-khauf ho ke woh jo aasman mein hai tum par pathar barsane wali aandhi na bhej de? To phir tumhein pata chal jaayega ke mera khabar dar sunana kaisa tha!
67.18: Aur un logon ne bhi jhutlaya jo tumse pehle thay, to kaisa raha mera azaab!
67.19: Kya unhon ne parindon ko nahi dekha apne upar par phailaye hue, aur woh inhein samete bhi hain? Unhein sirf Rahman hi sambhale hue hai. Beshak woh har cheez ko dekhne wala hai.
67.20: Kaun hai jo tumhara lashkar ban kar Allah ke siwa tumhari madad kare? Kafir to dhokhe mein hain.
67.21: Kaun hai jo tumhein rizq de agar woh apna rizq rok le? Balke yeh log sarkashi aur nafrat mein phans gaye hain.
67.22: To bhala woh jo mooh ke bal chalta hai be-raaste, behtar hai ya woh jo seedhe raaste par chalta hai?
67.23: Kaho: Wahi hai jisne tumhein paida kiya, aur tumhare liye kaan, aankhen aur dil banaye. Tum kam hi shukar karte ho.
67.24: Kaho: Wahi hai jisne tumhein zameen mein phailaya. Aur usi ki taraf tum jama kiye jaaoge.
67.25: Aur kehte hain: Yeh waada kab poora hoga agar tum sachche ho?
67.26: Kaho: Ilm sirf Allah ke paas hai. Aur main to sirf khule taur par dara sunane wala hoon.
67.27: Phir jab woh ise qareeb dekh lenge to unke chehre bigad jaayenge jin logon ne kufr kiya. Aur kaha jaayega: Yahi hai jiska tum dawa kar rahe thay.
67.28: Kaho: Tumne socha, agar Allah mujhe aur mere saathiyon ko halaak kar de ya hum par reham kare, to kaun hai jo kafiron ko dardnaak azaab se bacha sake?
67.29: Kaho: Wahi Rahman hai, usi par hum imaan laye, aur usi par bharosa kiya. To anqareeb tumhein maloom ho jaayega kaun khuli gumraahi mein hai.
67.30: Kaho: Kabhi socha, agar tumhara paani zameen mein chala jaaye to kaun hai jo tumhare paas behta hua paani le aaye?

68.1: Noon. Qalam ki qasam hai aur us cheez ki bhi jo woh likhte hain.
68.2: Tum apne Rubb ke fazl se deewane nahin ho.
68.3: Aur beshak tumhare liye ek lagataar milne wala ajar hai.
68.4: Aur beshak tum azeem akhlaaq par ho.
68.5: To anqareeb tum bhi dekh loge aur woh bhi dekhenge.
68.6: Ke tum mein se kaun deewana hai.
68.7: Beshak tumhara Rubb unhein behtar jaanta hai jo uski raah se bhatak gaye hain, aur woh unhein bhi jaanta hai jo hidayat par hain.
68.8: To jhootay ki baat na maano.
68.9: Woh chahte hain ke tum kuch jhuko to woh bhi jhuk jaayen.
68.10: Aur kisi aise shakhs ki baat na maano jo bahut kasmein khata ho aur zaleel ho.
68.11: Chughalkhor, idhar udhar baatein phailane wala.
68.12: Bhalaai se rokne wala, hadd se badhne wala, gunaahgar.
68.13: Zatiyat mein dakhal dene wala, iske bawajood ke badnasib hai.
68.14: Sirf is liye ke uske paas maal aur bete hain.
68.15: Jab uske saamne hamari aayatein padhi jaati hain to kehta hai: 'Yeh to sirf purani kahaniyaan hain.'
68.16: Hum uski naak pakad kar kheench lenge.
68.17: Jaise ke humne bagh walon ko aazmaya, jab unhon ne iraada kiya ke subah subah phal tod lenge.
68.18: Aur unhon ne Allah ki marzi ka zikar na kiya.
68.19: To tere Rubb ki taraf se, jab woh soye hue thay, ek aafat aayi.
68.20: Aur woh bagh kat gaya jaise ke kaata gaya ho.
68.21: Phir unhon ne subah subah ek dusre ko pukara.
68.22: Ke chalo apne bagh ki taraf agar phal todna hai.
68.23: To woh nikle aapas mein aahista aahista baat karte hue.
68.24: Ke aaj kisi mohtaj ko kuch na dena.
68.25: Aur woh subah jaldi chalein, jabke woh is faislay par puqaar thay.
68.26: Phir jab us bagh ko dekha to kehne lage: Hum gumrah ho gaye hain.
68.27: Balki hum sab kuch se mehroom kar diye gaye hain.
68.28: Un mein se ek ne kaha: Kya maine tumse nahi kaha tha ke Allah ki tasbeeh karo?
68.29: Unhon ne kaha: Paak hai hamara Rubb, beshak hum zalim thay.
68.30: Phir woh ek dusre ki taraf rujoo hue, ek dusre ko malamat karte hue.
68.31: Unhon ne kaha: Afsoos hai hum par, shayad hamara Rubb humein iska badla de de. Hum apne Rubb ki taraf rujoo karte hain.
68.32: Aisi hi saza hoti hai. Aur aakhirat ka azaab to sabse bada hai, kaash woh jaante.
68.33: Beshak muttaqiyon ke liye unke Rubb ke paas naemat bhari jannatein hain.
68.34: Kya hum muslimanon ko mujrim banayenge?
68.35: Tumhein kya ho gaya hai, kaise faislay karte ho?
68.36: Kya tumhare paas koi kitaab hai jisme tum padhtay ho?
68.37: Ke tumhare liye usme woh sab kuch hai jo tum chahte ho?
68.38: Ya tumse hamne qayamat tak ke liye kasmein le li hain, jo na tootne wali hain?
68.39: Poochho inmein se kaun iska zimmedar hai?
68.40: Kya inke paas koi shareek hain? To le aayein apne shareekon ko agar sachay hain.
68.41: Us din jab parda hata diya jaayega, aur unhein sajda karne ko kaha jaayega, to woh sajda nahi kar sakenge.
68.42: Unki aankhein jhuki hongi, zaleel honge, aur woh sajda karne ko bulaaye jaayenge jabke woh tandurust thay.
68.43: Ab chhodo mujhe aur jhoot ko jhutlane walon ko. Hum unhein dheere dheere aise tareeqay se pakdenge ke unhein pata bhi na chale.
68.44: Main unhein mohalat deta hoon, meri chaal bohot mazboot hai.
68.45: Kya tum unse koi ajar maangte ho ke woh uske bojh tale dab gaye hain?
68.46: Kya unke paas ghaib ka ilm hai ke woh likhte hain?
68.47: To apne Rubb ke faislay ka intezar karo, aur machhli wale (Yunus a.s.) ki tarah na ho jao jab usne gham mein pukara.
68.48: Agar uske Rubb ka fazl us tak na pahuncha hota to woh nindaa shuda (malamat shuda) haal mein chhootey maidan mein phaink diya jata.
68.49: Magar uske Rubb ne use chuna aur usko salehon mein se bana diya.
68.50: Aur in kafiron ke liye aisa waqt aane wala hai ke jab woh is Quran ke samne jhukein ge aur kehne lagenge: 'Kaash humein hidayat milti.'
68.51: Aur kafir jab Quran sunte hain to tumhe nazar se gira dena chahte hain, aur kehte hain ke woh deewana hai.
68.52: Halaanke yeh to sirf sab jahan walon ke liye naseehat hai.

69.3: Aur tumhein kya maloom kya hai Haqqah?
69.4: Samood aur Aad ne taghaawun se jhutlaya.
69.5: To Samood ko tabah kar diya gaya hadh se barh jane wale sadme se.
69.6: Aur Aad ko tabah kiya gaya ek tez aur sarsar aandhi se.
69.7: Jise usne un par musalsal saat raatein aur aath din chala diya, to tum unhein dekhtay ke woh giray hue thay jaise ke khokhle nakhlistan ke tanay.
69.8: Phir tum mein se koi usay baaqi reh gaya dekh paya?
69.9: Aur Firaun aur unse pehle logon aur ultao walon ne (bhi) ghalti ki.
69.10: Jinhon ne apne Rubb ke Rasool ki nafarmani ki, to unhein pakad liya pakad zabardast.
69.11: Beshak jab paani charh gaya to humne tumhein kishti mein sawar kiya.
69.12: Taake isay tumhare liye ek sabaq bana de aur yaad rakhne wale kaan yaad rakhein.
69.13: Phir jab ek baar sur mein phoonka jaayega,
69.14: Aur zameen aur pahad uthaaye jaayenge, phir ek hi baar mein kuchal diye jaayenge,
69.15: To us din waaqiya waaqe ho jaayega.
69.16: Aur aasman phat jaayega, us din woh kamzor hoga.
69.17: Aur farishte us ke girde gird honge, aur us din aapke Rubb ka Arsh aath farishton ke upar uthaya jaayega.
69.18: Us din tum pesh kiye jaaoge, tumhara koi raaz chhupa na rahega.
69.19: Phir jise uska amal nama daye haath mein diya jaayega, woh kahega: Lo! Mera naamah-e-aamal padho.
69.20: Main to samajhta tha ke mujhe mera hisaab milega.
69.21: To woh pasandida zindagi mein hoga.
69.24: Khao aur peeyo maze se apne guzashte dinon ke amal ke badle.
69.25: Aur jise uska naamah-e-aamal uske baaye haath mein diya jaayega, woh kahega: Kaash mujhe mera kitaab na milta.
69.26: Aur mujhe kabhi na pata chalta mera hisaab kya hai.
69.28: Mera maal mujhe kuch kaam na aaya.
69.30: (Hukum hoga:) Pakdo isay, aur isay giriftar karo.
69.31: Phir isay dozakh mein jhonk do.
69.32: Phir usay ek lambi zanjeer mein jhankar do.
69.33: Beshak yeh Allah-e-Azeem par imaan nahi laata tha.
69.34: Aur mohtaaj ko khilane par targhib nahi deta tha.
69.35: To aaj uska yahan koi gharmijaz dost nahi.
69.36: Aur na koi khane ki cheez siwa goonay daaron ke peep ke.
69.38: To main qasam khata hoon us cheez ki jo tum dekhte ho,
69.40: Beshak yeh ek buzurg Rasool ka paighaam hai.
69.41: Aur yeh kisi shaayar ka kalaam nahi, tum log kam hi yaqeen karte ho.
69.42: Aur yeh kisi kaahin ka kalaam bhi nahi, tum log kam hi sochtae ho.
69.43: Yeh to saare jahan ke Rubb ki taraf se naazil hua hai.
69.44: Agar woh hum par koi baat ghadh kar keh deta,
69.45: To hum uske daaye haath ko pakad lete,
69.46: Phir uski shah rag kaat daalte.
69.47: Aur tum mein se koi us se hamesha baaz na aata.
69.48: Aur yeh zarur parheesgaaron ke liye ek naseehat hai.
69.49: Aur hum jaante hain ke tum mein se kuch jhutlane wale hain.
69.50: Aur yeh kafiron ke liye hasrat ka baais hai.
69.51: Aur yeh yaqeenan haqq yaqeeni (haqeeqi) sach hai.
69.52: To apne Rubb-e-Azeem ke naam ki tasbeeh karo.

70.1: Ek mangne wale ne mangi azaab ki ek aane wali cheez ke liye.
70.2: Kafir logon ke liye, jise koi taalne wala nahi.
70.3: Allah se jo buland darjon wala hai.
70.4: Farishtay aur Rooh uski taraf chadhte hain ek din mein, jiska andaza pachaas hazar saal ka hai.
70.5: Pas (aey Nabi) tu khoob sabr kar, ek khoobsurat sabr.
70.6: Woh log use door dekh rahe hain.
70.7: Aur hum use qareeb dekh rahe hain.
70.8: Jis din aasmaan pighli hui chaandi jaisa ban jaayega.
70.9: Aur pahad rangin oon jese ban jaayenge.
70.10: Aur koi dost kisi dost ka haal na poochega.
70.11: Unhein dikhaya jaayega – gunaahgaar chaahega ke us din ke azaab se chutkara paane ke liye apne bachchon ko fidiya de de.
70.12: Aur apni biwi ko, aur apne bhai ko.
70.13: Aur apne qareebi khandaan ko jo usay panaah deta tha.
70.14: Aur zameen par jitne log hain sab ko – phir yeh chahe ke khud ko bacha le.
70.15: Hargiz nahi! Yeh to ek bhadakti aag hai.
70.17: Jo bulaati hai us shaks ko jisne mooh moada aur peeth phairi.
70.18: Aur maal ikattha kiya aur sambhaal kar rakha.
70.19: Beshak insaan be-sabr paida kiya gaya hai.
70.20: Jab use takleef pohchti hai to ghabra jaata hai.
70.21: Aur jab use achhai milti hai to bukhl karta hai.
70.22: Siwaye un logon ke jo namaz padte hain.
70.23: Jo apni namazon mein dawam rakhte hain.
70.24: Aur jinke maal mein ek hissa maqarrar hai.
70.25: Mange wale aur mehroom ke liye.
70.26: Aur jo log qayamat ke din ko sach mante hain.
70.27: Aur jo apne Rubb ke azaab se darte hain.
70.28: Beshak unka Rubb ka azaab kisi se mehfooz nahi.
70.29: Aur jo apni sharmgah ko bacha ke rakhte hain.
70.30: Siwaye apni biwiyon aur unke kabze mein aayi huwi (laundiyon) ke – to woh malamat ke laayak nahi.
70.31: Lekin jo is ke siwa chaahe to wahi hadd se guzarne wale hain.
70.32: Aur jo apni amanaton aur apne ahad ki hifazat karte hain.
70.33: Aur jo apni gawahiyon mein sachay hote hain.
70.34: Aur jo apni namaz ki hifazat karte hain.
70.35: Yahi log jannaton mein izzat ke saath honge.
70.36: To un kafiron ko kya ho gaya hai ke woh tumhari taraf daudte chale aa rahe hain.
70.37: Daayein aur baayein se giroh giroh banakar.
70.38: Kya har shakhs unmein se yeh tamaana karta hai ke use ni’mat bhari jannat mein daakhil kiya jaaye?
70.39: Hargiz nahi! Humne unhein jis cheez se paida kiya woh jaante hain.
70.40: Pas main qasam khata hoon mashriqon aur maghribon ke Rubb ki ke hum zaroor qudrat rakhte hain.
70.41: Ke unki jagah behtar log laayen – aur hum koi aajiz nahi hain.
70.42: Pas chhod do unhein baaton mein lage rahen, aur khelte rahen – yahaan tak ke apna woh din dekh lein jiska unse waada kiya jaata hai.
70.43: Jis din woh qabron se nikal kar bhaag rahe honge – jaise ke woh kisi nishaan ki taraf daud rahe hon.
70.44: Unki nigahein jhuki hongi, un par zaleelat chhayi hogi – yeh hai woh din jiska unse waada kiya gaya tha.

71.1: Beshak humne Nooh ko uski qaum ki taraf bheja – ke apni qaum ko azaab aane se pehle dara do.
71.2: Usne kaha: Aey meri qaum ke logon! Main tumhare liye khuli khuli hidaayat dene wala hoon.
71.3: Ke tum Allah ki bandagi karo, us se daro, aur meri itaat karo.
71.4: Woh tumhare gunaahon ko maaf karega, aur tumhein ek muqarrar muddat tak mohalat dega. Beshak jab Allah ka waqt aa jaye to usay taalne ka koi tareeqa nahi – kaash tum jaante.
71.5: Usne kaha: Aey mere Rubb! Maine apni qaum ko raat din bulaaya.
71.6: Lekin meri daawat unke liye faqat nafrat mein izafa karti gayi.
71.7: Aur jab bhi maine unhein bulaya taake tu unhein maaf karde, to unhon ne apne kaanon mein ungliyan daal li, aur apne kapde lapet liye, aur zid mein atak gaye, aur bade takabbur ke saath othe.
71.8: Phir maine unhein bulaya khule aam bhi aur chhup kar bhi.
71.9: To maine kaha: Apne Rubb se maafi maango – beshak woh bohot bakhshne wala hai.
71.10: Woh tum par asmaan se bohot si baarish barsaega.
71.11: Aur tumhein maal aur aulaad se nawazega.
71.12: Aur tumhare liye baag banayega, aur tumhare liye nehrein jaari karega.
71.13: Tumhein kya ho gaya hai ke tum Allah ke liye koi jalal nahi rakhte?
71.14: Halankeh usne tumhein marahil se guzar kar paida kiya.
71.15: Kya tum dekhte nahi ke Allah ne kaise saat aasmaanon ko teh-ba-teh banaya?
71.16: Aur unmein chand ko roshan banaya, aur sooraj ko roshni dene wala.
71.17: Aur Allah ne tumhein zameen se ugaya.
71.18: Phir woh tumhein us mein lauta dega, aur phir nikaal khada karega.
71.19: Aur Allah ne tumhare liye zameen ko farsh banaya.
71.20: Taa-ke tum usmein chauraston ke raaston par chalo.
71.21: Nooh ne kaha: Aey mere Rubb! Inhon ne meri baat nahi maani – aur aise logon ki pairwi ki jo maal-o-aulad mein badh gaye hain, aur sirf nuksaan mein hain.
71.22: Aur unhon ne badi badi chaalen chali.
71.23: Aur kaha: Apne maboodon ko na chhodo – na wadd ko, na suwa’ ko, na yaghus ko, na ya’uq ko, aur na nasr ko.
71.24: Aur unhon ne bohoton ko gumraah kiya – aur tu zaalimon ko sirf gumraahi mein aur zyada kar.
71.25: Unhein unke gunaahon ki wajah se garq kar diya gaya, phir dozakh mein daakhil kiya gaya – aur unke liye koi madadgaar na mila.
71.26: Aur Nooh ne kaha: Aey mere Rubb! Zameen par kisi kafir basne wale ko zinda na chhodd.
71.27: Agar tu unhein chhod dega to yeh tere bandon ko gumraah karenge, aur faqat fasiq aur na-shukr aulad paida karenge.
71.28: Aey mere Rubb! Mujhe, mere walidain ko, jo bhi mere ghar mein momin ke taur par aaye, aur sab momin mardon aur aurton ko maaf farma – aur zaalimon ke liye halaakat ke siwa kuch na barha.

72.1: Kaho (Aey Nabi): Mujh par wahee ki gayi ke kuch jinon ne Qur’an suna, to unhon ne kaha: Beshak humne ek ajeeb Qur’an suna.
72.2: Jo hidayat ki taraf rehnumaai karta hai, to hum us par imaan le aaye, aur hum apne Rubb ke saath kisi ko shareek na karenge.
72.3: Aur yeh ke hamare Rubb ki shaan bahut oonchi hai – usne na kisi ko biwi banaya, na beta.
72.4: Aur yeh ke hamare nadan log Allah ke baare mein bohot baatein karte rahe.
72.5: Aur hum samajhte the ke insaan aur jinn, Allah ke baare mein kabhi jhoot nahi bolenge.
72.6: Aur kuch insanoon ne kuch jinno ko panaah di, to unhon ne unki gumraahi mein izafa kiya.
72.7: Aur unhon ne bhi samjha jaisa tum samajhte ho ke Allah kisi ko dobara uthayega nahi.
72.8: Aur humne asmaan ko talash kiya, to use mazboot pahredaron se bhara hua paaya, aur jalte teeron (shulaa) se.
72.9: Aur hum pehle wahan baith kar sunne ki jagah banate thay, lekin ab jo bhi sunna chahta hai uske liye ek jalta hua shola tayar hai.
72.10: Aur hum nahi jaante ke zameen walon ke saath bura irada kiya gaya hai ya unka Rubb unke liye bhala chahta hai.
72.11: Aur ham mein se kuch ache hain aur kuch doosray, hum mukhtalif tareeqon par hain.
72.12: Aur hum samajhte hain ke hum Allah ko zameen mein na aajiz kar sakte hain aur na bhaag kar us se bach sakte hain.
72.13: Aur jab humne hidayat suni to hum us par imaan le aaye – to jo apne Rubb par imaan laye usay na koi khauf hai aur na koi nuqsan.
72.14: Aur ham mein se kuch musalmaan hain aur kuch haqdar zulm – to jo musalmaan hue woh hidaayat dhoondhne wale ban gaye.
72.15: Aur jo haqdar zulm hue woh jahannum ke indhan ban gaye.
72.16: Aur agar woh raah par chalte to hum unhein khoob paani pilate.
72.17: Taake unhein isme aazmaayein – aur jo apne Rubb ki yaad se munh moade, Allah use sakht chadhte azaab mein daakhil karega.
72.18: Aur masjidein Allah ke liye hain, to Allah ke saath kisi aur ko na pukaaro.
72.19: Aur jab Allah ka banda use bulane ke liye khada hua to woh us par toot pade – lag bhag ke ghir girte.
72.20: Kaho: Main to sirf apne Rubb ko pukarta hoon, aur us ke saath kisi ko shareek nahi karta.
72.21: Kaho: Main tumhein na koi nuqsan pahunchane ka ikhtiyar rakhta hoon, na koi bhalaai.
72.22: Kaho: Mujhe Allah se koi nahi bacha sakta, aur na main uske siwa koi panaah dhoond sakta hoon.
72.23: Main to sirf Allah ki taraf se paighaam deta hoon – jo uski baatein na maane, uske liye jahannum ka azaab hai – hamesha usmein rahne ke liye.
72.24: Yahan tak ke jab yeh log woh cheez dekhenge jiska unhein waada diya gaya tha, to jaan lenge ke kaun zyada kamzor madadgaar hai aur taadaad mein kamzor.
72.25: Kaho: Main nahi jaanta ke jis cheez ka tumse waada kiya gaya hai woh qareeb hai ya mera Rubb uske liye lambi muddat muqarrar karega.
72.26: Woh ilm-e-ghaib ka jaan-ne wala hai – apne ghaib ko kisi par zaahir nahi karta.
72.27: Siwaaye us Rasool ke jise woh pasand kare – to woh uske aage aur peeche pahredar muqarrar kar deta hai.
72.28: Taake woh jaan le ke unhon ne apne Rubb ke paighaamaat pahuncha diye – aur woh har cheez ko gherta hai, aur har cheez ko gin gin kar rakhta hai.

73.2: Raat ko uth kar namaaz padho – magar thoda.
73.3: Aadha raat ya us se thoda kam.
73.4: Ya us par kuch zyada – aur Qur’an ko saaf saaf padho.
73.5: Beshak hum tum par ek bhaari baat nazil karne wale hain.
73.6: Raat ka uthna nafs ko zyada baandhne wala hai – aur baat ko saaf kehne mein zyada theek hai.
73.7: Beshak tumhare liye din mein lambi mashgooliyat hai.
73.8: Aur apne Rubb ka naam yaad karo – aur sab kuch chhod kar usi ke ho jao.
73.9: Wahi mashriq aur maghrib ka Rubb hai – uske siwa koi mabood nahi – to usi ko apna wakeel banao.
73.10: Aur jo kuch woh log kehte hain us par sabr karo – aur un se acchi tareeqe se alag ho jao.
73.11: Aur mujhe aur jhutlane walon ko chhod do – ni’maton walon ko – aur unhein thoda waqt do.
73.12: Beshak hamare paas zanjeerein hain, aur bhadakti aag.
73.13: Aur gala ghoont dene wala khana, aur dardnaak azaab.
73.14: Jis din zameen aur pahad kaampenge – aur pahad reza reza ret ban jaayenge.
73.15: Beshak humne tumhari taraf ek Rasool bheja hai jo tum par gawah hai – jaise humne Fir’awn ke paas Rasool bheja tha.
73.16: To Fir’awn ne us Rasool ki nafarmaani ki, to humne use sakht pakad ke pakad liya.
73.17: To agar tum kufr karo to us din se kaise bachaoge – jo bachchon ko boodha bana dega?
73.18: Jis se aasmaan phat jaayega – us ka waada poora karna us par laazim hai.
73.19: Beshak yeh ek yaad-dihani hai – pas jo chahe apne Rubb ki taraf rasta ikhtiyar kare.
73.20: Beshak tumhara Rubb jaanta hai ke tum raat ka do-teehai hissa, ya aadha, ya us se thoda kam uth kar (ibadat karte ho), aur ek giroh tumhare saath bhi – aur Allah hi raat aur din ka andaza lagata hai – woh jaanta hai ke tum iska poora hisaab nahi rakh sakte, to usne tum par meharbani ki – pas jitna Qur’an aasani se padh sako, padh lo. Allah jaanta hai ke kuch log bimar honge, aur kuch log rozi ke liye zameen mein safar karenge, aur kuch Allah ki raah mein ladenge – to jitna aasani se padh sako, padh lo. Aur namaaz qayam karo, zakat do, aur Allah ko achha qarz do. Jo bhalaai tum apne liye aage bhejoge, use Allah ke haan behtar aur bade ajar ke roop mein paoge. Aur Allah se maafi maango – beshak Allah bada bakhshne wala, meharbaan hai.

74.3: Aur apne Rubb ki badi taareef karo.
74.4: Aur apne kapdon ko paak rakho.
74.5: Aur gande kaam se door raho.
74.6: Aur na ehsaan jatao zyada paane ke liye.
74.7: Aur apne Rubb ke liye sabr karo.
74.9: To woh din ek sakht din hoga.
74.10: Kafir ke liye asaan na hoga.
74.11: Mujhe chhod do us shakhs ke saath jise maine akela banaya.
74.13: Aur uske aas paas ke log bhi.
74.14: Aur uske liye raahatein asaan ki.
74.15: Phir bhi woh aur chahta hai ke main usko aur doon.
74.16: Hargiz nahi! Beshak woh hamari aayaat ke dushman hai.
74.17: Main use sakht chadhte azaab mein daal dunga.
74.19: To tabah ho jaaye – kaisa andaza lagaya!
74.20: Phir tabah ho jaaye – kaisa andaza lagaya!
74.22: Phir munh banaya aur naak chadhayi.
74.23: Phir peeth phair li aur takabbur kiya.
74.24: Phir kaha: Yeh to sirf ek jaadu hai jo pehle se chalta aaya hai.
74.25: Yeh to ek insaan ka qoul hai.
74.27: Aur tumhein kya pata ke saqar kya hai?
74.28: Na woh kisi cheez ko chhodegi, na bakhshegi.
74.31: Aur humne sirf farishtey hi dozakh ke nigraani par muqarrar kiye hain, aur unki tadaad ko kafiron ke liye fitna banaya, taake ahl-e-kitaab yaqeen laayen, aur momin ka imaan barh jaaye, aur ahl-e-kitaab aur momineen shak mein na padhein – aur jin logon ke dilon mein rog hai aur kafir kehne lagen: Allah ka is misaal se kya maqsad hai? Aise hi Allah jise chahe gumraah karta hai, aur jise chahe hidaayat deta hai. Aur tumhara Rubb hi uske lashkaron ko jaanta hai. Aur yeh sirf insaan ke liye ek naseehat hai.
74.32: Hargiz nahi! Qasam hai chaand ki.
74.33: Aur raat ki jab woh palatti hai.
74.34: Aur subah ki jab woh chamakti hai.
74.37: Tum mein se jo aage badhna chahe ya peeche reh jaaye.
74.38: Har shakhs apne kiye ka rehno-maal hai.
74.40: Woh jannaton mein honge, poochh rahe honge.
74.42: Kya cheez tumhein saqar mein le gayi?
74.43: Woh kahenge: Hum namaz nahi padhtay thay.
74.44: Aur miskin ko khana nahi khilate thay.
74.45: Aur baatilon mein lag jaate thay baatilon ke saath.
74.46: Aur hum jhoot ko jhutlaate thay qayamat ke din tak.
74.47: Yahan tak ke maut humein aa gayi.
74.48: Pas sifaarish karne walon ki sifaarish un ke kisi kaam na aayi.
74.49: To unhein kya ho gaya hai ke woh is naseehat se mooh moad rahe hain?
74.50: Jaise ke woh daude bhage ja rahe hon geedhon jaise.
74.51: Jo shair se dar kar bhaag rahe hon.
74.52: Balke un mein se har shakhs yeh chahta hai ke use khuli kitaab di jaaye.
74.53: Hargiz nahi! Balki woh aakhirat se nahi darte.
74.54: Hargiz nahi! Yeh to ek naseehat hai.
74.55: Pas jo chahe is se naseehat le.
74.56: Aur koi naseehat nahi le sakta siwaaye ke Allah chahe – woh dar ka laayak hai aur maghfirat ka ahl hai.

75.1: Main qasam khata hoon qayamat ke din ki.
75.2: Aur main qasam khata hoon malamat karne wale nafs ki.
75.3: Kya insaan samajhta hai ke hum uski haddiyon ko jama nahi karenge?
75.4: Balki hum uski ungliyon ke poron tak ko dobara banane par qadir hain.
75.5: Balki insaan chahta hai ke samne hi gunaah karta rahe.
75.6: Woh poochhta hai: Qayamat ka din kab aayega?
75.9: Aur suraj aur chaand ek saath mila diye jaayenge.
75.10: Us din insaan kahega: Kahan bhaag ke jaaun?
75.11: Koi panaah ki jagah nahi hogi.
75.12: Us din sirf tere Rubb ke paas pahunch hogi.
75.13: Us din insaan ko uske aage bheje hue aur peeche chhode hue a’maal bataye jaayenge.
75.14: Balki insaan khud apne upar nigehbaan hai.
75.15: Chahe kitni bhi uzr baazi kare.
75.16: (Aey Nabi!) Apni zubaan ko is (Qur’an) ke saath jaldbaazi mein hilaaya na karo.
75.17: Isay jama karna aur padhwana hamaare zimme hai.
75.18: Phir jab hum ise padh chukein, to uski tilaawat ka paaband ban jaao.
75.19: Phir uske baad uski wazahat bhi hamaare zimme hai.
75.20: Hargiz nahi! Balke tum duniya se muhabbat rakhte ho.
75.21: Aur aakhirat ko chhod dete ho.
75.22: Us din kuch chehre roshan honge.
75.23: Apne Rubb ki taraf dekh rahe honge.
75.24: Aur kuch chehre udaasi mein honge.
75.25: Samajhte honge ke un par koi toofan tootne wala hai.
75.26: Hargiz nahi! Jab jaan hansli tak pahunch jaaye.
75.27: Aur kaha jaaye: Kaun hai raqeem (jadoo ya dawa wala)?
75.28: Aur samajh jaaye ke yeh faaqa (judai ka waqt) hai.
75.29: Aur painvandi pai painvandi ho jaaye.
75.30: Us din tere Rubb ki taraf rawangi hogi.
75.31: Na usne tasdeeq ki, na namaaz padhi.
75.32: Balki jhutlaya aur peeth phair li.
75.33: Phir apne ghar walon ke paas fakhr se chala gaya.
75.35: Phir tabahi ho tujhe, tabahi ho!
75.36: Kya insaan samajhta hai ke woh yunhi chhoda jaayega?
75.37: Kya woh ek qatra mani na tha jo giraaya gaya?
75.38: Phir woh ek lauh-e-jamida bana, phir Allah ne use banaya aur uska nafs banaya.
75.39: Phir us mein se mard aur aurat do banaye.
75.40: Kya woh is par qadir nahi ke murdon ko zinda kare?

76.1: Kya insaan par aisa waqt nahi aaya ke woh yaad mein laane ke laayak bhi nahi tha?
76.2: Beshak humne insaan ko milti hui nutfay se paida kiya – usko aazmaate rahe – is liye humne usay sunne wala, dekhne wala banaya.
76.3: Beshak humne use rasta dikhaya – chahe woh shukar guzari kare ya na shukri.
76.4: Beshak humne kaafiron ke liye zanjeerein, tauq aur bhadakti aag tayar ki hai.
76.5: Beshak neik log (Jannat mein) sharab ke jaam piyenge jisme kaafur mila hoga.
76.6: Aisa chashma jisse Allah ke banday piyenge – woh use jahan chahenge bahaate le jaayenge.
76.7: Woh nazr ada karte hain aur us din se darte hain jiska azaab har taraf chha jaayega.
76.8: Aur woh khana khilate hain – khud chaa kar – miskeen ko, yateem ko, aur qaidiyon ko.
76.9: Kehte hain: Hum tumhein sirf Allah ke liye khilaate hain – na tumse koi jaza chahte hain, na shukriya.
76.10: Beshak hum apne Rubb se us din ka darr rakhte hain jo sakht gham aur takleef bhara hoga.
76.11: To Allah unhein us din ke sharr se bacha lega – aur unhein roshan chehre aur khushi ata karega.
76.12: Aur unhein jannat dega aur resham ke kapde – jo us sabr ke badle mein hai jo unhon ne kiya.
76.13: Wahan woh takhton par baithenge, unhein na dhoop lagegi, na thand.
76.14: Aur un par jannat ke saaye jhuk jaayenge, aur unke phalon ke gucchay nazdeek kar diye jaayenge.
76.15: Aur unke ird gird chandi ke bartan aur sheeshe ke jaam le kar ghooma jaayega.
76.16: Chandi ke sheeshe jo andaza ke mutabiq bhar diye gaye honge.
76.17: Aur unhein wahan ek jaam pilaya jaayega – jo zanjabeel (adrak) se mila hoga.
76.18: Wahan ek chashma hoga jiska naam salsabeel hai.
76.19: Aur un ke paas hamesha jawaan ladke ghoomte rahenge – jab tum unhein dekhoge to samjho ge ke woh bikhri moti hain.
76.20: Aur jab wahan dekho ge to naimat aur ek badi badi saltanat dekho ge.
76.21: Unke libaas resham ke hote hain – sabz, aur baraq – aur unhein chandi ke kangan pehnaye jaate hain – aur unka Rubb unhein paak mashroob pilata hai.
76.22: Yeh sab tumhare kaam ka badla hai, aur tumhari mehnat qubool ki gayi.
76.23: Beshak humne tum par Qur’an nazil kiya – thoda thoda karke.
76.24: Pas apne Rubb ke hukum ka intezaar karo – aur unmein se kisi gunaahgaar ya kaafir ki baat na maano.
76.25: Aur apne Rubb ka naam subah shaam yaad karo.

76.29: Beshak yeh ek naseehat hai – to jo chahe apne Rubb ki taraf rasta ikhtiyar kare.
76.30: Aur tum nahi chah sakte – siwa is ke ke Allah chahe – Beshak Allah sab kuch jaane wala, sab kuch samajhne wala hai.
76.31: Woh jise chahe apni rehmat mein daakhil kare – aur zalimon ke liye usne dardnaak azaab tayar kar rakha hai.

77.1: Qasam hai un hawaon ki jo lagataar bheji jaati hain.

77.3: Aur jo (haq ko) phailati hain barabari ke saath.

77.5: Aur jo naseehat ko nazil karti hain.

77.8: Phir jab sitare mitaa diye jaayenge.

77.12: Kis din ke liye taakhir kiya gaya?

77.15: Tabahi hai us din jhutlane walon ke liye!
77.16: Kya humne pehle waalon ko halaak nahi kiya?
77.17: Phir unke baad aane walon ko bhee.
77.18: Aise hi hum mujrimon ke saath karte hain.
77.19: Tabahi hai us din jhutlane walon ke liye!
77.20: Kya humne tumhein ek haqeer pani (nutfah) se paida nahi kiya?
77.21: Phir humne usko ek maqam-e-mehfooz mein rakha.
77.23: Phir humne taqdeer banayi – to hum kya behtareen taqdeer banaane waale nahi?
77.24: Tabahi hai us din jhutlane walon ke liye!
77.25: Kya humne zameen ko ek jameen waali jagah nahi banaya?
77.27: Aur humne usmein unchi unchi pahadein rakh di aur tumhein meetha paani pilaya.
77.28: Tabahi hai us din jhutlane walon ke liye!
77.29: Chalo us taraf jise tum jhutlaya karte thay.
77.30: Jao us saaye ki taraf jo teen shaakhein rakhta hai.
77.31: Na woh thanda hai, na kisi se bachaata hai.
77.32: Woh aag ke sholay faink raha hoga – jaise mahal.

77.34: Tabahi hai us din jhutlane walon ke liye!
77.35: Woh din hoga – jab log bol nahi paayenge.
77.36: Aur unhein ijazat bhi nahi milegi ke uzr pesh karein.
77.37: Tabahi hai us din jhutlane walon ke liye!
77.38: Yeh faislay ka din hai – hum tumhein aur pehle waalon ko jama karenge.
77.39: Agar tumhare paas koi chhaal ho to chhaal chalo.
77.40: Tabahi hai us din jhutlane walon ke liye!
77.41: Beshak muttaqiyon ke liye chhaon, chashme aur har qisam ke phalon wali jagah hogi.
77.42: Jo kuch chaahein woh milega – jo kuch maangein diya jaayega.
77.43: Tumhein diya jaayega jazaa – tumhare a’maal ke badle mein.
77.44: Beshak hum mohsinon ko aise hi badla dete hain.
77.45: Tabahi hai us din jhutlane walon ke liye!
77.46: Khao aur maze karo thode din – tum to mujrim ho.
77.47: Tabahi hai us din jhutlane walon ke liye!
77.48: Aur jab unse kaha jaata hai ruku karo, to nahi karte.
77.49: Tabahi hai us din jhutlane walon ke liye!
77.50: Phir kis baat ke baad woh iman laayenge?

78.1: Kis cheez ke baare mein woh aapas mein pooch rahe hain?
78.2: Us badi khabar ke baare mein.
78.3: Jismein woh mukhtalif raaye rakhte hain.
78.4: Nahin! Jaldi hi unhein pata chal jaayega.
78.5: Phir dobara, nahin! Jaldi hi unhein pata chal jaayega.
78.6: Kya humne zameen ko bichhaav nahi banaya?
78.8: Aur tumhein joda joda paida kiya?
78.9: Aur tumhari neend ko sukoon banaya?
78.11: Aur din ko guzara ka waqt banaya?
78.12: Aur humne tumhare upar saatoon mazboot aasmaan banaye?
78.13: Aur ek chamakti roshni waala (sooraj) rakha?
78.14: Aur baadal se musalsal barish barsayi?
78.15: Taake us se anaj aur pauday ugaayein.
78.17: Beshak faislay ka din ek muqarrar waqt hai.
78.18: Jis din soor mein phoonka jaayega – to tum afwaaj ban kar aa jaaoge.
78.19: Aur aasmaan khol diya jaayega – phir usmein raaste hi raaste honge.
78.20: Aur pahadon ko chalaya jaayega – to woh mirage (chakmak) ban jaayenge.
78.24: Na usmein kisi thandak ka maza chakkhenge, na peene ki cheez.
78.25: Siwa garm pani aur peep ke.
78.26: Yeh poori saza hai – unke a’maal ka badla.
78.27: Beshak woh kisi hisaab ki tawaqqu nahi rakhte thay.
78.28: Aur hamari aayaton ko jhutlaya tha jhutlaye jaane se.
78.29: Aur har cheez humne kitaab mein likh kar rakhi hai.
78.30: To ab maza chakkho – hum tumhare azaab mein izafa karte rahenge.
78.31: Beshak muttaqiyon ke liye kaamyabi hai.
78.35: Jismein na behoodgi hogi, na jhoot.
78.36: Tumhare Rubb ki taraf se ek inaam – ek hisaab ke mutabiq ata.
78.37: Rubb-e-aasmaan o zameen aur jo kuch unke darmiyan hai – woh nihayat Rehman hai – usse baat karne ka koi haq na rakhega.
78.38: Jis din Rooh (Jibraeel) aur farishte saf ba saf khade honge – koi bol nahi sakega – siwa us ke jise Rehman ijazat de aur woh sahi baat kahe.
78.39: Yeh hai sachcha din – to jo chahe apne Rubb ki taraf rasta bana le.
78.40: Beshak humne tumhein ek qareeb aane wale azaab se dara diya hai – jis din insaan dekhega jo uske haathon ne aage bheja – aur kafir kahega: Kaash main mitti hota!

79.1: Qasam hai un (farishton) ki jo sakhti se jaan nikaalte hain.
79.2: Aur unki jo narmi se nikaalte hain.
79.3: Aur unki jo tairti huee jaati hain.
79.4: Phir unki jo sabqat leti hain.
79.5: Phir unki jo hukm bajalati hain.
79.6: Us din ek bhayanak jhatka hoga.
79.7: Jiske baad ek aur jhatka hoga.
79.8: Us din kuch dil kamp uthenge.
79.10: Kehte hain: Kya hum dobara waapas lautaaye jaayenge?
79.11: Kya jab hum gale sade hue honge?
79.12: Kehte hain: Yeh to nuksan bharay waapsi hogi.
79.13: Lekin woh sirf ek cheekh hogi.
79.14: Aur achanak sab zameen par honge.
79.15: Kya tumhein Musa ki kahani pahunchi hai?
79.16: Jab uske Rubb ne usay muqaddas waadi Tuwa mein pukara.
79.17: Jao Fir’awn ke paas – beshak woh sar-kash ho gaya hai.
79.18: Aur us se kaho: Kya tu chaahta hai ke tu paak ho jaaye?
79.19: Aur main tujhe tere Rubb ki taraf rasta dikha doon – taake tu us se dare?
79.20: Phir usne usay sabse badi nishani dikhayi.
79.21: To usne jhutlaya aur nafarat ki.
79.22: Phir peeth pher kar daud gaya.
79.23: Phir logon ko ikattha kiya – aur unhein pukara.
79.24: Aur kaha: Main hi tumhara sabse bada Rubb hoon.
79.25: To Allah ne usay aakhri aur duniya dono azaab mein pakad liya.
79.26: Beshak ismein ibrat hai – us ke liye jo dare.
79.27: Kya tumhara paida karna zyada mushkil hai – ya aasmaan ka? Usne use banaya.
79.28: Usne uski chhat uthayi aur usay tarteeb di.
79.29: Aur uski raat ko andhera kiya aur uske din ko roshan kiya.
79.30: Aur zameen ko uske baad bichhaya.
79.31: Usmein se uska paani nikala aur charaagah banayi.
79.33: Tumhare aur tumhare jaanwaron ke liye.
79.34: Phir jab sabse badi aafat aayegi.
79.35: Us din insaan samjhega ke usne kya kiya tha.
79.36: Aur jahannum un sabko dikhayi jaayegi.
79.38: Aur duniya ki zindagi ko tarjeeh di.
79.39: To jahannum hi uska thikaana hai.
79.40: Aur jo apne Rubb ke saamne khade hone ka darr rakhta tha – aur apne nafs ko hawaa se roke rakha.
79.41: To jannat hi uska thikaana hai.
79.42: Woh tumse poochte hain ke qayamat kab aayegi?
79.43: Tumhara usko yaad karna kis kaam ka?
79.44: Uska aakhri faisla to tumhare Rubb ke paas hai.
79.45: Tum to sirf usko daraane wale ho jo us se dare.
79.46: Jab woh isay dekhenge to aisa lagega ke sirf ek shaam ya ek subah ruke thay.

80.1: Woh (Nabi) bigad gaya jab us ke paas ek andha aaya.
80.2: Aur usay kya maaloom ke shayad woh paak ho jaye.
80.3: Ya naseehat haasil kare, to naseehat usay faida de.
80.5: To tum uski taraf tawajju dete ho.
80.6: Halanke tum par koi zimmedari nahin ke woh paak ho.
80.7: Aur jo tumhare paas daud kar aaya.
80.9: To tum us se mooh mor lete ho.
80.10: Hargiz nahi, yeh to ek naseehat hai.
80.11: To jo chahe ise yaad rakhe.
80.12: Yeh un kitaabon mein hai jo badi izzat wali hain,
80.15: Jo moazzaz (izzat wale), neik sifat hain.
80.16: Qatal ho insaan, kitna na-shukar hai!
80.17: Allah ne use kis cheez se paida kiya?
80.18: Ek qatre se paida kiya, phir uska andaaza muqarrar kiya.
80.19: Phir us ke liye raasta asaan kiya.
80.20: Phir usay maut di aur qabar mein daala.
80.21: Phir jab chahega usay zinda uthaye ga.
80.22: Kalla (Hargiz nahi), abhi usne Allah ka hukum poora nahi kiya.
80.23: To insaan ko chahiye ke apne khurak ko dekhe.
80.24: Beshak humne pani barsaya faraghat se.
80.25: Phir zameen ko chira (phoda) achhi tarah.
80.31: Tumhare liye aur tumhare maal-dawat ke liye.
80.33: Us din insaan bhaage ga apne bhai se,
80.34: Aur apni maa aur baap se,
80.35: Aur apni biwi aur beton se.
80.36: Us din har shakhs ko apni hi fikr hogi jo usay masroof rakhegi.
80.37: Kuch chehre us din chamakte honge,
80.38: Hans rahe honge, khushi mein honge.
80.39: Aur kuch chehre us din dhool se dhake honge,
80.41: Yeh wahi log honge jo kafir aur fasiq hain.
80.42: Aur un par afsos ki saari alamaat hon gi.

81.4: Aur jab 10 maheenay ki bharee huee ootniyaan chhodi jaayengi.

81.6: Aur jab samundar bhadka diye jaayenge.
81.7: Aur jab roohon ko joda jaayega.
81.8: Aur jab zinda gaadi gayi ladki se poochha jaayega,
81.9: Kis gunaah mein use qatal kiya gaya?
81.10: Aur jab amaal nama khola jaayega.
81.11: Aur jab aasmaan ki chilke utar jaayenge.

81.24: Aur woh kisi gayab ki baat chhupane wala nahi hai.

81.28: Un logon ke liye jo seedhi raah chahte hain.

82.3: Aur jab samandar phaad diye jaayenge.

83.1: Tabahi hai nap tol mein kami karne walon ke liye,

83.29: Beshak jin logon ne gunaah kiya woh imaan laane walon ka mazaak udaya karte thay.

83.35: Takhton par baith kar dekh rahe hain.
83.36: Kya kafiron ko unke kiye ka pura badla de diya gaya?

84.5: Aur apne Rubb ka hukum sunegi — aur yeh uske laayak hai,
84.6: Aey insaan! Tu mehnat karta hai apne Rubb ki taraf, phir us se mulaqat karega.

84.8: To us se aasaan hisaab liya jaayega,
84.9: Aur woh apne logon ki taraf khushi se lautega.

84.21: Aur jab Quran unhein pad kar sunaya jaata hai, to woh sajda nahi karte?
84.23: Aur Allah unke sab haal jaanta hai.
84.24: To unhein dardnaak azaab ki khushkhabri de do.

85.1: Qasam hai burj waale aasmaan ki.

85.17: Kya tumhein fauj waalon ka haal nahi mila?

85.20: Aur Allah unhein har taraf se gher raha hai.
85.21: Balki yeh ek buzurg Qur’an hai.
