88.18: Aur aasmaan ko kaise buland kiya gaya?
88.19: Aur pahaadon ko kaise khada kiya gaya?
88.20: Aur zameen ko kaise bichhaaya gaya?
88.21: To naseehat do – tum sirf naseehat dene wale ho.
88.22: Tum un par zabardasti karne wale nahi.
88.23: Magar jisne mooh moada – aur jhutlaya.
88.24: To Allah use sabse bade azaab dega.
88.25: Beshak unka lautna hamare paas hi hai.
88.26: Aur unka hisaab lena bhi hamare zimme hai.

89.4: Aur raat ki jab woh chale jaaye.
89.5: Kya is mein aqalmand ke liye qasam nahin hai?
89.6: Kya tumne nahi dekha ke tumhare Rubb ne Aad ke saath kya kiya?
89.7: Irama zaat al-‘imad – jiske jaise koi paida nahi kiya gaya duniya mein.
89.8: Aur Samood – jinhon ne wadiyon mein pathron ko kaata.
89.9: Aur Firaun – jis ke mekhain thay (mazboot hukoomat waale).
89.10: Jinhon ne mulk mein taghyaan kiya.
89.11: Aur us mein bohot fasaad phailaaya.
89.12: To tumhare Rubb ne unpar azaab ka korah barsaya.
89.13: Beshak tumhara Rubb dekh raha hai.
89.14: Lekin insaan – jab uska Rubb usko aazmata hai – to izzat aur ni’mat deta hai – kehta hai: Mera Rubb mujhe izzat de raha hai.
89.15: Aur jab usay aazmata hai – aur uska rizq tang karta hai – to kehta hai: Mera Rubb mujhe zaleel kar raha hai.
89.16: Nahin! Balki tum yateem ki izzat nahi karte.
89.17: Aur ek doosre ko gareeb ko khilane par nahi uksate.
89.18: Aur tum maal ko muhabbat se jama karte ho.
89.19: Aur tum virasat ka maal poora chaat jaate ho.
89.20: Jab zameen ko chakkna choor kar diya jaayega.
89.21: Aur tera Rubb aa jaayega – aur farishtay saf ba saf aayenge.
89.22: Aur us din jahannum saamne laayi jaayegi – us din insaan samjhega – magar samajhne ka kya faida?
89.23: Kehne lagega: Kaash main ne apne liye kuch aage bheja hota.
89.24: Phir us din na us ka azaab kisi ka azaab hoga.
89.25: Aur na uski pakad kisi ki pakad jaisi hogi.
89.27: Apne Rubb ki taraf laut ja – tu us se razi, woh tujh se razi.
89.28: To meri bandagi mein shaamil ho ja.
89.29: Aur meri jannat mein daakhil ho ja.
89.30: Yahi hai kamyabi ka asal manzil.

90.1: Nahin! Main qasam khata hoon is shehar ki.
90.2: Aur tum is shehar mein rehte ho.
90.3: Aur baap aur uski aulaad ki qasam.
90.4: Humne insaan ko museebat mein paida kiya.
90.5: Kya woh samajhta hai ke us par koi qaaboo nahi paayega?
90.6: Kehte hai: Maine khoob maal udaaya.
90.7: Kya woh samajhta hai ke usko koi nahi dekhta?
90.8: Kya humne uske liye do aankhein nahi banaayi?
90.9: Aur ek zabaan aur do hont?
90.10: Aur usay do raaston ki hidaayat di?
90.11: Phir usne aaqabah (sakht raaste) ko par nahi kiya.
90.12: Aur tumhein kya pata ke aaqabah kya hai?
90.14: Ya bhookhe din mein khana khilana.
90.16: Ya gareeb ko jo mitti mein pada ho.
90.17: Phir woh un logon mein se ho jo imaan layein aur sabr aur reham ki naseehat karein.
90.19: Aur jo hamari aayaat ko jhutlaate hain – woh baayin (bad) walay hain.
90.20: Un par aag band ki jaayegi.

91.1: Qasam hai sooraj ki aur uske ujale ki.
91.2: Aur chaand ki jab woh uska peechha kare.
91.3: Aur din ki jab woh sooraj ko roshan kare.
91.4: Aur raat ki jab woh use dhak le.
91.5: Aur aasmaan ki aur usne use kaise banaya.
91.6: Aur zameen ki aur usne kaise bichhaaya.
91.7: Aur nafs ki aur usay kaise sudhaara.
91.8: Phir usko uski burai aur taqwa samjhaayi.
91.9: Woh kaamyab hua jisne isay paak kiya.
91.10: Aur nakaam hua jisne isay ganda kiya.
91.11: Samood ne jhootlaya apni sarkashi ke sabab.
91.13: To Rasool ne kaha: Allah ki oontni ko aur uske peene ko na roko.
91.14: Lekin unhon ne jhutlaaya aur usay maar diya – to unke Rubb ne un par unke gunaah ke sabab azaab bheja aur unhein barabar kar diya.

92.1: Qasam hai raat ki jab woh chhha jaaye.
92.2: Aur din ki jab woh chamak uthe.
92.3: Aur us Zaat ki jisne mard aur aurat ko paida kiya.
92.5: Jo deta hai, taqwa ikhtiyar karta hai.
92.6: Aur behtareen ko sach maanta hai.
92.7: Uske liye hum asaani ka raasta aasan kar denge.
92.8: Lekin jo bukhl karta hai aur beparwa hota hai.
92.10: Uske liye hum sakhti ka raasta aasan kar denge.
92.11: Aur uska maal uske kisi kaam nahi aayega jab woh girega.
92.12: Beshak humare zimme hidaayat dena hai.
92.13: Aur akhirat aur duniya dono humari hain.
92.14: Main tumhein aag se daraata hoon jo bhadakti hai.
92.16: Jo jhutlata hai aur mooh moadta hai.
92.17: Aur sabse zyada bachne wala woh hai.
92.18: Jo maal deta hai apne aap ko paak karne ke liye.
92.19: Aur uska kisi par koi ehsaan nahi ke uska badla de.
92.20: Siwa Allah ki raza ke liye.
92.21: Aur zarur woh raazi ho jaayega.

93.1: Qasam hai duha (subah ke roshan waqt) ki.
93.2: Aur raat ki jab woh sukoon se chhha jaaye.
93.3: Tumhare Rubb ne tumhein chhoda nahi aur na nafrat ki.
93.4: Aur aakhirat tumhare liye duniya se behtar hai.
93.5: Aur tumhara Rubb tumhein zarur ata karega – phir tum razi ho jaaoge.
93.6: Kya usne tumhein yateem nahi paaya phir panaah di?
93.7: Aur tumhein raasta bhoolta paaya – phir hidaayat di?
93.8: Aur tumhein fakir paaya – phir be-niyaaz bana diya?
93.9: To yateem par ziadti na karo.
93.10: Aur mangne wale ko jhiddak na do.
93.11: Aur apne Rubb ki ne’mat ka zikr karo.

94.1: Kya humne tumhara seena kushada nahi kiya?
94.2: Aur tumhara bojh tumse halka nahi kiya.
94.3: Jo tumhari kamar tod raha tha.
94.5: Beshak har takleef ke saath aasani hai.
94.6: Beshak har mushkil ke saath asaani hai.
94.7: To jab farigh ho to ibadat mein lag jao.
94.8: Aur apne Rubb ki taraf ragbat karo.

95.1: Qasam hai teen (anjeer) aur zaitoon ki.
95.3: Aur is aman waale shehar ki.
95.4: Humne insaan ko sabse behtareen surat mein paida kiya.
95.5: Phir usay sabse niche lauta diya.
95.6: Siwa unke jo imaan laaye aur neik amal kiye – unke liye kabhi khatam na hone wala ajar hai.
95.7: To iske baad tumhein kya jhutlata hai deen ke silsile mein?
95.8: Kya Allah sab hukm dene waalon se behtar nahi?

96.1: Padho – apne Rubb ke naam se jisne paida kiya.
96.2: Insaan ko ek jame hue khoon se paida kiya.
96.3: Padho – aur tumhara Rubb sabse bada Karam wala hai.
96.4: Jisne qalam ke zariye ilm diya.
96.5: Insaan ko woh kuch sikhaaya jo woh nahi jaanta tha.
96.6: Haqeeqat yeh hai ke insaan hadd se guzar jaata hai.
96.7: Is liye ke woh apne aap ko be-niyaaz samajhta hai.
96.8: Beshak tumhare Rubb ki taraf lautna hai.
96.9: Kya tumne us shakhs ko dekha jo roakta hai?
96.10: Ek banda jab woh namaaz padhta hai.
96.11: Kya tumne dekha ke agar woh hidayat par ho?
96.12: Ya taqwa ki naseehat karta ho?
96.13: To kya tumne dekha agar usne jhutlaaya aur mooh moad liya?
96.14: Kya woh nahi jaanta ke Allah sab dekh raha hai?
96.15: Nahi! Agar woh baaz na aaya to hum uski naasi (maathe ke baal) pakad lenge.
96.17: To woh bulaaye apne doston ko.
96.18: Hum bulaayenge jahannum ke daroga ko.
96.19: Nahi! Tum uski baat na maano – aur sajda karo – aur Rubb ke qareeb ho jao.

97.1: Beshak humne isay qadr ki raat mein nazil kiya.
97.2: Aur tumhein kya pata qadr ki raat kya hai?
97.3: Qadr ki raat hazaar maheenon se behtar hai.
97.4: Ismein farishte aur Rooh (Jibreel) utarte hain apne Rubb ke hukum se – har maamla ke liye.
97.5: Woh salamati wali raat hai – subah ke tuloo tak.

98.1: Woh log jinhein Kitaab di gayi aur mushrik, alag na hue jab tak unke paas bayyinah (saaf daleel) na aa gayi.
98.2: Allah ka Rasool – jo saaf aur paak sahifon ko padh kar sunata hai.
98.3: Un mein likhi hui sahi baatein hain.
98.4: Aur un logon mein ikhtilaaf hua jinhon ne Kitaab paayi thi – baad mein.
98.5: Aur unhein sirf yeh hukm diya gaya tha ke Allah ki ibaadat karein – uske deen ko ikhlaas ke saath – haneef ban kar – aur namaaz qayam karein – aur zakat dein – yeh hi sahi deen hai.
98.6: Beshak jin logon ne kufr ikhtiyar kiya – Kitaab walay ho ya mushrik – woh dozakh mein jaayenge – hamesha rahenge – woh sabse bure makhlooq hain.
98.7: Aur jin logon ne imaan laaya aur neik amal kiya – woh sabse behtareen makhlooq hain.
98.8: Unka badla unke Rubb ke paas hai – hamesha rehne wali jannatein – jinke neeche nehrein beh rahi hain – woh unmein hamesha rahenge – Allah unse razi – aur woh Allah se razi – yeh uske liye hai jo apne Rubb se dare.

99.1: Jab zameen apni zabardast zalzale se hilaayi jaayegi.
99.2: Aur zameen apne bojh (dafeenay) nikaal degi.
99.3: Aur insaan kahega: Isko kya ho gaya?
99.4: Us din woh apni tamam khabrein sunayegi.
99.5: Kyunkay tumhare Rubb ne use is kaam ka hukm diya.
99.6: Us din log muntashir ho kar aayenge – taake unhein unke amal dikhayein jaayen.
99.7: To jisne raayi ke daane ke barabar bhi nek amal kiya – woh usay dekh lega.
99.8: Aur jisne raayi ke daane ke barabar bhi bura amal kiya – woh usay dekh lega.

100.1: Qasam hai un ghoṛon ki jo haanpte daurte hain.
100.2: Phir chingariyaan nikaalte hain pairon se.
100.3: Phir subah subah hamla karte hain.
100.4: Phir us waqt ghubar udaate hain.
100.5: Phir usmein dushman ke beech jaa ghuste hain.
100.6: Beshak insaan apne Rubb ke liye bohot na-shukra hai.
100.7: Aur woh is par khud gawah hai.
100.8: Aur woh maal se shiddat se muhabbat karta hai.
100.9: Kya usay pata nahi jab qabron mein jo kuch hai nikaala jaayega?
100.10: Aur jo kuch seenon mein chhupa hai woh zahir kiya jaayega?
100.11: Beshak us din unka Rubb unse poori khabar rakhne wala hoga.

101.3: Aur tumhein kya samjhaaye ke Qari’ah kya hai?
101.4: Us din log bikhre hue parwaanon ki tarah honge.
101.5: Aur pahad dhunke hue rangin oon ki tarah honge.
101.6: Phir jis ka tarazu bhaari hoga.
101.8: Aur jis ka tarazu halka hoga.
101.10: Aur tumhein kya samjhaaye ke Hawiyah kya hai?
101.11: Woh ek bhadakti hui aag hai.

102.1: Tumhein maal ki haars ne gafil kar diya.
102.2: Yahan tak ke tum qabron tak ja pahunche.
102.3: Nahi, tum jald hi jaan loge.
102.4: Phir nahi, tum jald hi jaan loge.
102.5: Nahi, kaash tum yaqeen ke saath jaante.
102.7: Phir usay zarur yaqeen ki aankhon se dekho ge.
102.8: Phir us din tumse zarur poocha jaayega ne’maton ke baare mein.

103.3: Siwa un logon ke jo imaan laaye, neik amal kiye, aur ek dusre ko haqq aur sabr ki naseehat ki.

104.1: Tabahi hai har us shakhs ke liye jo taana dene wala, burai chugli karne wala ho.
104.2: Jo maal jama karta hai aur usay baar baar gin gin kar rakhta hai.
104.3: Woh samajhta hai ke uska maal use hamesha zinda rakhega.
104.4: Nahi! Woh zarur Hutamah mein daala jaayega.
104.5: Aur tumhein kya pata Hutamah kya hai?
104.6: Allah ki bhadakti hui aag hai.
104.8: Woh un par band ki jaayegi.

105.1: Kya tumne nahi dekha ke tumhare Rubb ne haathi waalon ke saath kya kiya?
105.2: Kya usne unki chaal ko nakaam nahi kar diya?
105.3: Aur unpar jhund ke jhund parindey bhej diye.
105.4: Jo un par pathar barsaate the jo konay se bane hue thay.
105.5: To unhein aisa kar diya jaise chabaye hue bhuse.

106.2: Unki jaadon aur garmi ki safar ki aadat.
106.3: To unhein chahiye ke woh is ghar (Kaaba) ke Rubb ki ibaadat karein.
106.4: Jisne unhein bhookh mein khilaya aur khauf se amaan diya.

107.1: Kya tumne us shakhs ko dekha jo deen ko jhutlata hai?
107.2: To woh wahi hai jo yateem ko dhakke deta hai.
107.3: Aur miskin ko khilane par nahi uksata.
107.4: To tabahi hai un namaaziyon ke liye.
107.5: Jo apni namaaz se ghaafil hain.
107.7: Aur chhoti madad ki cheezein bhi rok lete hain.

108.2: To apne Rubb ke liye namaaz padho aur qurbani do.
108.3: Beshak tumhara dushman hi be-namo nishaan hai.

109.2: Main un ki ibaadat nahi karta jise tum poojhte ho.
109.3: Aur na tum ibaadat karte ho jise main poojhta hoon.
109.4: Aur main kabhi ibaadat karne wala nahi hoon jise tum poojhte ho.
109.5: Aur na tum ibaadat karne wale ho jise main poojhta hoon.
109.6: Tumhare liye tumhara deen, mere liye mera deen.

110.1: Jab Allah ki madad aayi aur fatah hui.
110.2: Aur tum ne dekha log girohon mein Allah ke deen mein daakhil ho rahe hain.
110.3: To apne Rubb ki tasbeeh karo uski hamd ke saath – aur us se maghfirat maango – beshak woh tauba qabool karne waala hai.

111.1: Tabah ho gaya Abu Lahab ke dono haath, aur woh khud bhi tabah ho gaya.
111.2: Na uska maal uske kaam aaya aur na hi uski kamayi.
111.3: Woh anqareeb aag mein daala jaayega jo shola zaar hogi.
111.4: Aur uski biwi bhi — jo eendhan utha kar laati thi.
111.5: Us ke gardan mein rassi hogi majboor ki hui fibre se.

112.1: Kaho: Woh Allah hai, Ek hai.
112.3: Na uski koi aulad hai, aur na woh kisi ki aulad hai.
112.4: Aur koi uska humsar nahi hai.

113.1: Kaho: Main panaah maangta hoon subah ke Rubb ki,
113.2: Har us cheez ke shar se jo usne paida ki.
113.3: Aur andheray ke shar se jab woh chhaa jaaye.
113.4: Aur girhon mein phoonk maarnay waaliyon ke shar se.
113.5: Aur hasad karne wale ke shar se jab woh hasad kare.

114.1: Kaho: Main panaah maangta hoon logon ke Rubb ki,
114.4: Waswasay daalne wale chhup kar aane wale ke shar se,
114.5: Jo logon ke seene mein waswasa daalta hai,
114.6: Chahe woh jinon mein se ho ya insano mein se.
